Title: SHES BYA'I GTER MDZOD

shes bya'i gter mdzod

Author: MI RIGS DPE MDZOD KHANG

mi rigs dpe mdzod khang

Descriptor: vol. 2-3 have imprint: [pe cin]: mi rigs dpe skrun
khang

Original Publication: n/a;n/a

Place: khreng tu'u

Publisher: si khron mi rigs dpe skrun khang

Date: 1984-1997

Volume: 3

Total Volumes: 3

TBRC Pages: 2

Introductory Pages: n/a

Text Pages: n/a

Scanning Information: Scanned at Tibetan Buddhist Resource
Center, 150 West 17th St, New York City, NY 10011, US.

@001B [BLANK PAGE]

@002A *, ,BOD GANGS CAN GYI GRUB MTHA' RIS MED KYI MKHAS DBANG

BRGYA DANG BRGYAD CU LHAG GI GSUNG 'BUM SO SO'I DKAR CHAG

PHYOGS GCIG TU BSGRIGS PA SHES BYA'I GTER MDZOD

CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

(SMAD CHA)

MI RIGS DPE MDZOD KHANG GIS BSGRIGS PA,

MI RIGS DPE SKRUN KHANG,

@002B [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@001 GLENG GZHI,

BOD RIGS NI RANG RGYAL GYI LO RGYUS YUN RING LDAN PA'I MI RIGS
RLABS CHEN ZHIG YIN LA, LAS LA BRTZON ZHING

DPA' BA DANG BLO RIG LDAN PA ZHIG KYANG RED, RLABS CHEN GYI
MES RGYAL GSAR GTOD BYED PA'I GO RIM NANG DU BYAS

RJES 'OD STONG 'BAR BA BZHAG YOD CING, LO RGYUS 'PHEL RGYAS
KYI CHU KLUNG RING PO 'DI'I NANG DU BOD MI RIGS DANG

MI RIGS GZHAN DAG THUN MONG THOG NAS MES RGYAL GYI RIG GZHUNG
'OD STONG RAB TU 'PHRO BA ZHIG GSAR GTOD BYAS

YOD PA RED, BOD YIG GI DPE RNYING 'DI DAG NI MES RGYAL MI RIGS
KYI RIG GZHUNG GI NOR MDZOD NANG GI MU TIG

GZI 'OD RAB TU 'PHRO BA ZHIG RED,

BOD YIG GI DPE RNYING DE DAG DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA'I GONG LA
SANGS RGYAS KYI GSUNG RAB BSGYUR RGYU DE GTZO

BOR BYAS SHING, DE NI BOD KYI BTZAN PO MES DBON RNAM GSUM GYI
DUS NAS 'GO TSUGS PA ZHIG RED, BTZAN PO

KHRI SRONG LDE BTZAN GYI SKABS SU BSGYUR ZIN PA'I GSUNG RAB
THAMS CAD DKAR CHAG TU BKOD PA 'PHANG THANG MA DANG,

MCHIMS PHU MA, LDAN DKAR MA GSUM YOD RUNG 'PHANG MCHIMS GNYIS
KYI DKAR CHAG 'THOR GYAR DU SONG BAS LDAN

DKAR MA TZAM LAS MA LUS PA DE NI BSTAN 'GYUR GYI SNA TSOGS
ZHES PA'I KHROD DU BZHUGS PA 'DI YIN, DKAR CHAG

'DI'I NANG BKA' BSTAN GNYIS SDE TSAN BCU DGUR PHYES TE THEG
CHEN DANG, THEG DMAN, MDO PHYOGS,

SNGAGS PHYOGS, SDE SNOD GSUM BCAS KYI GO RIM LTAR PHYE THOG
MDO SDE'I SDE SNOD NANG PHAR PHYIN DANG, PHAL CHEN,

DKON BRTZEGS, BSDUS PA CHEN PO BCAS KYI GO RIM LTAR BSGRIGS
'DUG DE NI GSUNG RAB SDE TSAN DBYE BA'I

SROL THOG MAR GTOD PA ZHIG RED,

BOD LA SANGS RGYAS CHOS LUGS DAR BA DANG CHAGS CIG CHOS LUGS
GRUB MTHA' 'DRA MIN 'GA' RE BYUNG BA'I

'GO TSUGS SHING, DUS RABS BCU GCIG PA TSUN TZAM LA GSUNG RAB
DE DAG GI DGONGS 'GREL DANG, LO RGYUS,

SKAD YIG RIG GNAS SKOR SOGS KYI RTZOM RIG JE MANG DU PHYIN TE
RTZOM RIG GI GLEGS BAM HA CANG MANG PO ZHIG DAR

BA RED, DE DAG NI BOD YIG GI DPE RNYING NANG GI GRUB CHA GAL
CHEN ZHIG RED, NANG DON MDOR BSDUS NA RIG

GNAS CHE BA LNGA STE BZO RIG PA DANG, GSO BA RIG PA, SGRA RIG
PA, GTAN TSIGS RIG PA, NANG DON RIG PA

BCAS DANG, RIG GNAS CHUNG BA LNGA STE SNYAN NGAG DANG, MNGON
BRJOD, SDEB SBYOR, ZLOS GAR, SKAR RTZIS

BCAS YOD PA RED, LHAG PAR DU LO RGYUS DANG RNAM THAR SKOR GYI
RTZOM RIG MANG TZAM ZHIG YOD PA DE'I NANG NAS

BSTAN RTZIS RE'U MIG DANG, RGYAL RABS, MI RIGS BAR GYI 'BREL
BA'I SKOR GYI LO RGYUS, CHOS 'BYUNG, GRUB

MTHA' SO SO'I BLA RGYUD, GDUNG RABS, RANG RNAM, GSANG BA'I

RNAM THAR SOGS DANG, GNAS YIG DANG,

DGON PA'I GDAN RABS SOGS YOD PAR MA ZAD, GZHAN YANG MGUR MA
DANG, LEGS BSHAD, BCAD LHUG

SPEL MA'I SNYAN NGAG GI GTAM RGYUD SOGS KYANG YOD LA, GNA' DUS
RGYA GAR GYI SKAD YIG SAm SKRi TA'I SGRA RIG PA DANG,

GTAN TSIGS RIG PA, SNYAN NGAG SOGS GSAL BSHAD BYED PA'I MCHAN
'GREL SKOR GYI RTZOM RIG YANG MI NYUNG BA ZHIG

YOD PA RED, DE DAG KHYON YONGS KYI GRANGS 'BOR JI TZAM YOD PA
NI RE RE BZHIN BRJOD KYIS MI LANG NGO, ,GONG

GSAL RIG GNAS SHUL BZHAG 'DI DAG NI BOD KYI SANGS RGYAS CHOS
LUGS DANG BOD RIGS KYI RIG GZHUNG LA BRTAG

DPYAD BYED RGYUR BLANGS NA RDZOGS RGYU MED PA DANG SPYAD NA
'DZAD MTHA' MED PA'I BANG MDZOD CIG YIN PAS RANG CAG

GIS BRTZI MTHONG CHEN PO BYED 'OS PA ZHIG RED,

@002 GSUNG 'BUM SKOR GYI RTZOM RIG NI BKA' BSTAN 'GYUR GYI
KHONGS SU MA GTOGS PA'I DPE RNYING RTZOM RIG GI GRUB

CHA GTZO BO ZHIG YIN LA BOD YIG DPE RNYING GI BCUD LTA BU RED,
DUS RABS BCO BRGYAD PA'I MJUG LA KLONG RDOL BLA

MA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG GIS <<BKA' GDAMS PA DANG DGE LUGS PA'I
BLA MA RAGS RIM GYI GSUNG 'BUM MTSAN THO>>

BSGRIGS PA DE'I NANG LA GSUNG 'BUM KHAG BZHI BCU TZAM LAS, BU
STON RIN CHEN GRUB DANG, RJE TZONG KHA PA

SOGS MKHAS DBANG KHA SHAS KYI GSUNG 'BUM LE TSAN DPE THO ZHIB
PHRA TZAM DANG, DE MIN MDOR BSDUS SHIG BKOD

'DUG CING, DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I DKYIL LA DRUNG CHEN SHES RAB
RGYA MTSOS <<DPE RGYUN DKON PA 'GA' ZHIG GI

THO YIG DON GNYER YID KYI KUN D'A BZHAD PA'I ZLA 'OD 'BUM GYI
SNYE MA>> ZHES PA BSGRIGS PA DE'I NANG SDE TSAN BCU

GNYIS SU PHYES TE GSUNG 'BUM KHAG DGU BCU'I MTSAN THO BKOD
'DUG 1959 LOR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU

SNUM PAR THOG BKOD PA'I <<BLA BRANG DGON PA'I DPE CHA SPYI'I
DKAR CHAG>> NANG LA SDE KHAG CHE BA BCU BDUN BGOS SHING,

GSUNG 'BUM SKOR LA MKHAS DBANG 174 YI DPE THO BKOD 'DUG

BOD RIGS KYI RIG GNAS BYA GZHAG SHUL 'DZIN DANG DAR SPEL BYED
RGYU DANG, MI RIGS KHAG GI RIG GNAS

BRJE RES BYED RGYU, THUN MONG DU DAR RGYAS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
YONG BAR SKUL SPEL GTONG RGYU, MI RIGS KYI TSAN

RIG ZHIB 'JUG GI BYA BA BYED RGYU, DNGOS PO DANG BSAM BLO'I
DPAL YON GNYIS KYI 'DZUGS SKRUN BYED RGYU BCAS LA

ZHABS 'DEGS ZHU BA'I CHED DU 'DI GA DPE MDZOD KHANG GI BOD YIG
DPE RNYING LEGS SGRIG BYED PA'I RMANG GZHI'I THOG

'DI GAR BZHUGS YOD PA'I BOD YIG DPE RNYING NANG GSUNG 'BUM
SKOR GYI DKAR CHAG ZHIB PHRA BSGRIGS NAS, THOG

MAR DEB 'DI BSGRIGS PA YIN, DEB 'DI'I NANG KHYON BSDOMS MKHAS
DBANG BRGYA DANG BRGYAD CU TZAM GYI GSUNG

'BUM 'DUS YOD CING, DEB GSUM DU BGOS TE RIM PAS PAR BSKRUN
BYED RGYU YIN, GSUNG 'BUM SKOR GYI

DKAR CHAG 'DI NI DPE CHA DANG DPYAD GZHI SOGS 'TSOL BDE CHED
BOD RGYA SKAD GNYIS SHAN SBYAR BYAS NAS BKOD YOD

PA'I LAG CHA LTA BU'I DEB CIG YIN, 'ON KYANG 'DI GA'I DPE
MDZOD KHANG DU YOD PA'I DPE CHA'I GNAS TSUL MTSON

PA TZAM ZHIG LAS, BOD YIG DPE RNYING NANG GSUNG 'BUM SKOR GYI
RTZOM RIG YOD DO COG GI RNAM PA YONGS SU MTSON

MI THUB,

BOD YIG DPE RNYING RNAMS LA DPE MING RGYAS PA DANG BSDUS PA
GNYIS YOD CING, DPE MING RGYAS PA DE DAG HA

CANG RING BAS BLOR NGES DKA' BA DANG, LHAG PAR DU THUN MONG MA
YIN PA'I KHYAD CHOS DMIGS BSAL RE YOD LA,

THA SNYAD DANG MNGON BRJOD RNAM GRANGS MANG BAS KLOG PA POS GO
DKA' BA ZHIG DANG, DPE MING KHA BYANG BSDUS PA DE

DAG NI MING 'DRA BA MANG BAS DKAR CHAG BZO DUS RNYOG 'DZING
YONG SLA BA ZHIG RED, DER BRTEN DPE CHA'I KHA BYANG

YONGS RDZOGS JI BZHIN BSHUS NAS DKAR CHAG BZOS YOD,

NGA TSOS CHED DMIGS KYIS RTZOM PA PO SO SO'I GNAS TSUL MDOR
BSDUS RE NGO SPROD ZHUS YOD, DE'I NANG RTZOM PA

PO 'GA' ZHIG GI RNAM THAR SOGS DPYAD GZHI 'DZOM PO ZHIG MA
RNYED STABS GSAN YIG DANG, MJUG BYANG, BLA

BRGYUD SOGS 'BREL YOD DPYAD GZHIR BRTEN NAS NGO SPROD BYAS
YOD, RTZOM PA PO 'GA' ZHIG LA DPYAD GZHI MA RNYED

STABS BAR STONG LA 'JOG DGOS BYUNG,

NGA TSOS BOD RGYA SHAN SBYAR GYI DKAR CHAG CHE GRAS 'DI 'DRA
ZHIG BSGRIGS PA THENGS DANG PO YIN PAS NYAMS MYONG

MI 'DANG BA DANG, MI SHUGS MI 'DANG BA, BOD KYI RIG GNAS KHYAB
KHONGS KYI YON TSAD DMA' BA BCAS LA

BRTEN SKYON DANG NOR 'KHRUL YOD NGES LA MKHAS DBANG RNAM PA
DANG, KLOG PA PO RNAMS KYIS MDZUB STON GNANG BA'I

RE 'DUN ZHU RGYU BCAS, ,

MI RIGS DPE MDZOD KHANG NAS,

1983 LO'I ZLA 9 PAR,

@003 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@004 [BLANK PAGE]

@005 DKAR CHAG SGRIG TSUL SKOR GYI GSAL BSHAD,

1 DKAR CHAG 'DI NI GSUNG 'BUM GYI RTZOM PA PO SO SO'I MTSAN
ZUR LAS DRAS PA'I KA KHA'I GO RIM LTAR BSGRIGS

YOD, GRUB MTHA'I BLA BRGYUD DANG SKU RABS GRAGS CHE BA RNAMS
DE'I GO RIM JI BZHIN MTSON PAR BYED CHED,

SPYI MING BKOD YOD PA DPER NA KARMA PA SKU PHRENG RIM BYON GYI
GSUNG 'BUM LA ``KA YIG'' DANG, T'A LA'I SKU PHRENG

RIM BYON GYI GSUNG 'BUM LA ``T'A YIG'' SA SKYA'I GONG MA
LNGA'I GSUNG 'BUM LA ``SA YIG'' BCAS GZHIR BZHAG

NAS KA MAD RIM PA LTAR BSGRIGS SHING, BLA BRGYUD DANG SKU RABS
SO SO'I NANG KHUL GYI RTZOM PA PO'I MTSAN NI SKU

PHRENG SNGA PHYI'I GO RIM LTAR BSGRIGS YOD,

2 GSUNG 'BUM TSAR RER PAR MA'AM BRIS MA GANG RUNG ZHIG LA CHA
BZHAG NAS, SNGON GYI GLEGS BAM DANG DPE TSAN

BSGRIGS TSUL SOR BZHAG THOG PAR GZHI GZHAN LA'ANG ZUR BLTAS
BYAS TE, MA TSANG BA RNAMS KHA SKONG BYAS

YOD, DPER NA DNGUL CHU DBYANGS CAN GRUB PA'I RDO RJE'I GSUNG
'BUM GA POD NANG AANG GRANGS

004524 RTAGS CAN RNAMS NI PAR GZHI GZHAN NAS DRANGS PA'I RTAGS
YIN, 'GA' ZHIG NI LOGS SU

BSGRIGS YOD,

3 PAR GZHI MI 'DRA BA'I NANG LA NANG DON 'DRA YANG KHA BYANG
MI 'DRA BA YOD PA DPER NA TZONG KHA PA'I GSUNG 'BUM

KHA POD NANG LA LHA SA'I PAR MAR LAM RIM LA <<SKYES BU GSUM
GYI NYAMS SU BLANGS PA'I BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA

BZHUGS SO>> ZHES 'KHOD PA DANG, SDE DGE'I PAR MAR <<RGYAL BA'I
GSUNG RAB THAMS CAD KYI SNYING PO'I GNAD

BSDUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA BZHUGS SO>>
ZER BA LTA BU KHA BYANG MI 'DRA BA RNAMS SO SOR

BKOD YOD, NANG DON MI 'DRA YANG KHA BYANG MTSUNGS PA DPER NA
<<KUN MKHYEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RIG 'DZIN

000541 RTAGS CAN NANG GI (38) (39) PAR GSAL BA DE RIGS KYANG SO
SOR BKOD YOD, NANG DON 'DRA

LA KHA BYANG YANG DE TZAM DBYE BA CHER MED PAS DBYE 'BYED SLA
TZAM YOD PA RNAMS GCIG GIS 'THUS PA BYAS YOD,

4 PO TI SO SO'I GDONG TSAL LA YOD PA'I AANG GRANGS DANG KHA
BSKONG DU DRANGS PA'I DPE TSAN SO SO'I GSHAM LA YOD

PA'I AANG GRANGS NI RANG RE'I DPE MDZOD KHANG GI POD GRANGS
MTSON BYED YIN, DPE TSAN GSHAM GYI ( )

RTAGS YOD PA 'DI NI PO TI DE'I NANG GI DPE TSAN GYI GO RIM
MTSON PA'I AANG GRANGS YIN, ( ) RTAGS KYI

RGYAB LA YOD PA'I AANG KI DE NI SHOG GRANGS MTSON BYED YIN,

@006 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@001 *, ,PHA BONG KHA PA BDE CHEN SNYING PO'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

003289 PAR MA, KA

KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG PHA BONG KHA PA DPAL BZANG PO'I
GSUNG 'BUM POD KA PA'I DKAR CHAG BZHUGS SO, , (1) 4

RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I NGO BO RJE PHA BONG
KHA PA'I GSAN YIG BSAM 'PHEL NOR BU'I DO SHAL LAS DBANG

RKYANG GI SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 16

RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I NGO BO RJE PHA BONG
KHA PA'I GSAN YIG BSAM 'PHEL NOR BU'I DO SHAL LAS DBANG

KHRID SBRAGS MA'I SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (3)
64

RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I NGO BO RJE PHA BONG
KHA PA'I GSAN YIG BSAM 'PHEL NOR BU'I DO SHAL LAS,

LUNG KHRID SNA TSOGS SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO,
,(4) 48

RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I NGO BO RJE PHA BONG
KHA PA'I GSAN YIG BSAM 'PHEL NOR BU'I DO SHAL LAS,

LUNG RKYANG GI SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (5)
232

003290 PAR MA, KHA

KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE 'CHANG PHA BONG KHA PA DPAL BZANG PO'I
GSUNG 'BUM POD KHA PA'I DKAR CHAG BZHUGS SO, , (1) 2

RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I NGO BO RJE PHA BONG
KHA PA'I GSAN YIG BSAM 'PHEL NOR BU'I DO SHAL LAS RJES

GNANG GI SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 33

RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG RDO RJE SEMS DPA'I NGO BO RJE PHA BONG
KHA PA'I GSAN YIG BSAM 'PHEL NOR BU'I DO SHAL LAS BE'U

BUM SKOR PHYOGS GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (3) 87

ZAB LAM BLA MA MCHOD PA BDE STONG DBYER MED MA DPAL 'KHOR LO
SDOM PA DANG 'BREL BA'I RNAL 'BYOR NYAMS SU LEN TSUL GYI

CHO GA NAG 'GROS SU BKOD PA ZHAR BYUNG DANG BCAS PA SNYAN
BRGYUD BDUD RTZI'I ZIL THIGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (4) 31

ZAB LAM BLA MA MCHOD PA 'JIGS BYED DANG 'BREL BAR NYAMS SU LEN
TSUL GYI 'DON CHOG NAG 'GROS SU BKOD PA SNYAN BRGYUD

@002 BDUD RTZI'I ZEGS MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (5) 20

SNYAN BRGYUD DBANG BZHI RGYAS PA LEN TSUL GYI, ,CHOG SGEG
THABS MKHAS 'PHRUL GYI DGA' STON BZHUGS, , (6) 7

ZAB LAM BLA MA MCHOD PA BDE STONG DBYER MED MA DANG GRUB RGYAL
LUGS KYI TSE SGRUB SBRAGS MA'I SGO NAS ZHING KHYAD PAR CAN LA

BRTAN BZHUGS 'BUL TSUL RTAG BRTAN RDO RJE'I RE KH'A ZHES BYA

RNAM SNANG MNGON BYANG GI THIG 'GREL SHER 'BYUNG DGONGS RGYAN
ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (3) 16

CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I SNYING PO BSDUS PA YON TAN GZHIR

GYUR MA'I ZAB KHRID GNANG SKABS KYI BRJED BYANG MDOR BSDUS SU
BKOD PA BLANG DOR LTA BA'I MIG RNAM PAR 'BYED PA ZHES

BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (4) 27

DANG LHAG MTHONG SKOR GYI MAN NGAG 'GA' ZHIG PHYAG ZIN DU

'DEBS PAR MDZAD PA GNAD KYI DON GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,

PA'I KHA SKONG ZHI BA'I SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL GYI 'DON CHOG

NAG 'GROS SU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (6) 15

MTSO'I ZIN BRIS MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, , (7) 14

DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I BDAG 'JUG MDOR BSDUS
DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA

BZHUGS SO, , (8) 18

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

PHA BONG KHA PA'I RIGS RGYUD NI 'GRO MGON CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA'I
NYE GNAS KUN DGA' 'BUM DANG, 'BA' RA BA RGYAL

MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO SOGS DAM PA MANG PO BYON PA'I RIGS, PHYIS
BOD SA GNAS SRID GZHUNG GI ZHABS SNER GTOGS PA GTZANG

PHYOGS G-YAS RU SHANGS KYI PHYOGS SGER CHAB SPEL BA ZHES PA DE
YIN, KHYIM GYI 'BYOR PA NI DBUL PHYUG GI MTHA' GNYIS SU MA LHUNG

BA'I 'BYOR BA RAN PA, YAB SHOD DRUNG TSE BRTAN RNAM RGYAL DANG
YUM DKON MCHOG SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA
PA'I

SA STAG (1878) BOD ZLA DRUG PA'I TSES BCU GSUM NYIN LHA LDAN
GTZUG LAG KHANG GI NUB PHYOGS G-YU THOG SHAR ZHES PA'I GNAS
TSANG

DU SKU BLTAMS, SHAR PA CHOS RJE BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS PHA
BONG KHA'I MKHAN PO BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'I YANG SRID YIN PAR
NGOS

'DZIN BYAS NA SER SMAD RGYAL RONG KHANG TSAN LA PHAN THOGS YONG
BA 'DUG GSUNGS PA LTAR, DGUNG LO BDUN PA'I THOG KHANG TSAN

GYIS NGOS 'DZIN BYAS, DON DNGOS GONG MA'I DBU BLA LCANG SKYA ROL
PA'I RDO RJE'I YANG SRID YIN LUGS YONGS SU GRAGS PA RED,

BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PO'I BLA BRANG SHIN TU DBUL YANG YUM GYIS
THUGS THAG BCAD NAS CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SKU CHAS ZHAN PAS SPRUL

SKU'I MTSAN GNAS BZHES MA THUB STABS GRVA RKYANG DKYUS MA'I GRAS
SU ZHUGS,

DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA'I THOG YONGS 'DZIN PHUR LCOG BYAMS PA RGYA
MTSO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, MTSAN

BYAMS PA BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO ZHES BSTZAL,

DGUNG LO BCU PA'I THOG MA YUM RANG NYID NAS ``NGA'I BU SPRUL SKU
YIN PAS GRVA RKYANG GI GNAS SU 'JOG PA SHIN TU MI RUNG''

GSUNGS TE YUM RANG LA 'KHOS KA CHER MED KYANG, THABS SHES GANG
DRAG MDZAD DE GTONG SGO BTANG BAS GRVA TSANG SPRUL SKU'I GRAS SU

TSUD, BLA BRANG 'BYOR PA ZHAN PAR BRTEN PHYAG DPE'I DGE RGAN
GTAN 'JAGS BYED MKHAN MA BYUNG BAS KHANG TSAN NAS DPE CHA DRAG

RIGS KHA SHAS LA DGE RGAN 'OS 'DZUGS GNANG RUNG SPRUL SKU'I DGE
RGAN DU SDOD 'DOD BYED MKHAN MA BYUNG STABS, MTHAR AA THI

@013 DGE BSHES SNYAN GRAGS ZHES PA MTSAN DON MTHUN PA'I DGE
BSHES DE RNYED PAS DGE RGAN GNANG RGYU'I ZHAL BZHES THOB,

DGUNG GRANGS BCU GCIG PAR CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS BSDUS GRVA NAS
BRTZAMS TE GSAN SBYONG LEGS PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA'I THOG RIG CHUNG TSOGS LANG MDZAD, SKU NA
PHRA YANG SPOBS PA MTHO BAS GRVA TSANG TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU

BSHAD PA GNANG SKABS GSUNG 'DAR BA SOGS GTAN NAS MED PAR LJAGS
BSHAD GNANG TSUL DANG GDANGS KYI NYAMS 'GYUR GCOD

MTSAMS TSUN SHIN TU DANG BA 'DREN PA BYUNG STE DER 'KHOD DGE
'DUN PHAL CHER DAD PA'I GNAS LA BKOD, SKU CHAS ZHAN PA'I

STABS KYIS RIG CHUNG GTONG SGO YANG YUM NAS SA BCAD MA STONG
TZAM MDZAD, GSOL CHAS DANG NA BZA'I MTHUN RKYEN GRVA PA'I 'GYED

PHOGS TZAM LA SNGAS BCOL NAS BZHUGS, RTZAM PA KHROM NAS tAM GA
RE GNYIS RES NYO SGRUB MDZAD, GSOL JA YANG BZANG JA MED

PAR 'JANG JA PA RIL ZHES PA'I NGAN JA ZHIG GIS CHOG PAR MDZAD,
MAR YANG LHA LDAN STONG MCHOD KYI DKAR RGYAN DANG, TSOGS

CHEN JA MA'I ZHUN MAR NANG GI MAR NYOS NAS BZHUGS PA'I 'TSO BA
NGAN NGON TZAM GYI THOG NAS MTSAN RTAGS MA RAN BAR CHOS GRVAR

PHEBS 'GRIM LA THUGS 'GRUS LHAG PAR DU CHE BA MDZAD,

DGUNG GRANGS BCU BZHI PAR PHEBS LO DER PHAR PHYIN GYI STON MO
BTANG, DGUNG GRANGS BCO LNGA PA'I THOG DBU MA'I RTZOD PA

DPYIS PHYIN PAR GNANG, GSUNG RAB KYI DPE CHA GZHAN SNA TSOGS LA
GZIGS RTOGS RGYUN MAR BSKYANGS PAS GZHUNG LUGS KYI GO BA

NYIN BZHIN 'PHEL, BKA' RTZOM LA SNGA BA RJE TZONG KHA PAR GSOL
'DEBS TSIG BCAD KA BSHAD KYI LAM NAS DRANGS PA DANG, SLOB

DPON PADMA'I SGRUB GNAS GTZANG PHYOGS SOG PA'I GNAS YIG SHOG
SGRIL CHE BA LNGA TZAM ZHIG DANG, SLOB DPON LA MCHOD BRJOD SHO
LO

KA BDUN LJAGS RTZOM MDZAD, LO DE'I NANG SHANGS DGA' LDAN CHOS
'KHOR DU PHEBS TE DGE 'DUN LNGA BRGYA SKOR LA, DGA' LDAN

LHA BRGYA MA'I BSHAD LUNG DANG, YANG SER SKYA NYIS STONG BRGAL
BAR GRUB RGYAL LUGS KYI TSE DBANG LJAGS BSHAD RGYAS PAR GNANG,

DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PA'I THOG RIG CHEN TSOGS LANG GI CHED DU NYIN
RER DPE RING SHOG BU LNGA RE THUGS 'DZIN GNANG, RIG

CHEN TSOGS LANG YANG LEGS RTZER SON, DE'I DGUN KHAR 'DUL BA'I
'DZIN GRVAR 'PHAR ZHING GSAN SBYONG PHUL PHYIN MDZAD,

DGUNG GRANGS BCO BRGYAD PA'I THOG GLING BSRE GTONG BA'I GRAB
MDZAD, DGUN GLING BZHES TE GTONG SGO YANG LEGS 'GRIG

BYUNG, GRVA SAR BZHUGS RING RNAM 'GREL DANG MDZOD KYI RTZOD PA
MA BYUNG BA LAS, PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA, 'DUL BA BCAS

GSAN BSAM MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA'I THOG RGYUD SMAD GRVA TSANG DU GRVA RKYANG
DKYUS MA'I KHONGS SU SGRIGS ZHUGS KYIS LO GSUM RING SNGAGS KYI
SKOR

GSAN BSAM MDZAD,

DGUNG GRANGS NYI SHU THOG PHUR LCOG YONGS 'DZIN BYAMS PA RGYA
MTSO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BZHES, RGYUN DU GRVA RKYANG
BYA

BRAL GYI TSUL MDZAD DE BRAG RI BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RNAM RGYAL
DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG MKHAN CHEN BSTAN PA CHOS 'PHEL SOGS

BLA MA TSAD LDAN BCU PHRAG LNGA'I ZHABS PAD BSTEN TE LUNG RGYUN
PO TI LNGA BRGYAR NYE BA DANG, RJES GNANG STONG PHRAG LA NYE BA,
KHRID

CHEN KHAG LNGA BCU BRGAL BA, DBANG CHEN BRGYA DANG BCU GNYIS
KYIS MTSON SA DGE RNYING MA SOGS RIS SU MA MCHIS PA'I MAN NGAG

RGYA MTSO LTA BUR GSAN BSAM DANG 'BREL YI DAM LHAG LHA'I LJAGS
BSNYEN YANG MANG PO ZHIG GNANG, RI SKU RIN PO CHE SOGS KYI DRUNG

NAS SKAR RTZIS SKOR LA GSAN SBYONG MTHAR PHYIN GNANG,

DGUNG LO SO GCIG TU PHEBS DUS, DVAGS PO'I PHYOGS SU CHIBS KHA
BSGYUR TE RJE 'DI'I RTZA BA'I BLA MA BAM CHOS 'JAM DPAL

LHUN GRUB RGYA MTSO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS LAM RIM CHE 'BRING CHUNG
GSUM GYI BSHAD LUNG, LAM RIM GSER ZHUN MA, LAM RIM 'JAM

DPAL ZHAL LUNG BCAS KYI BSHAD KHRID, LAM RIM BDE LAM DMAR KHRID
DANG MYUR LAM DMAR KHRID, LAM RIM LEGS GSUNG

NYING KHU SOGS LAM RIM GTZO BOR GYUR PA'I ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA
GSAN NAS DVAGS PO BLA MA RIN PO CHE 'JAM DPAL LHUN GRUB

KYIS NANG THUGS KYI SRAS GCIG POR RJES SU BZUNG ZHING, MDO
SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA YONGS RDZOGS DANG, LHAG PAR BYANG CHUB LAM

GYI RIM PA'I BSTAN PA'I BDAG POR DBANG BSKUR TE PHA LAS BU RDZIG
BU LAS TSA BO RDZIG TSA BO LAS YANG TSA RDZIG YANG TSA LAS

GSUM TSA RDZIG PA YONG ZHES LUNG BSTAN STZAL ZHING, DA NI CHOS
BDAG PO LA 'PHROD PA YIN PAS 'GYOD PA MED CES THUGS RANGS PA

MTHAR THUG TU GYUR PA'I GSUNG YANG DANG YANG DU BYON, DE NAS MDO
SNGAGS RIG GNAS GANG GI THOG NAS 'DUL BYA'I RE BA BSKANGS

PAS DBUS GTZANG GDAN SA CHEN PO BZHIS MTSON BOD LJONGS YONGS KYI
DGE LUGS DGON SGRUB SDE KHAG GI MKHAN PO BLA SPRUL, DGE

BSHES, 'DUS SDE BCAS PHAL CHE BA RJE NYID KYI SLOB MAR MA 'DUS
PA MED CING, YUL GRU SO SO'I SER SKYA DRAG ZHAN CHES MANG PO

DANG, LHO MON BAL 'BRUG RGYA SOG SOGS KYI 'DUL BYA YANG MTHA'
YAS SO, ,

@014 RJE 'DIS BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS KYI SGO NAS RGYAL BSTAN 'DZIN
SPEL GYI THUGS BSKYED KHO NA'I GZHAN DBANG DU GYUR TE, RANG GI

THOB GO SA DBANG GRAGS GANG LA'ANG DON GNYER MA MDZAD PAR, SKU
TSE HRIL PO GRVA TSANG SPRUL SKU CHUNG KHA'I MTSAN THOG TU
BZHUGS PA

LAS, RJE 'DI'I MKHYEN BRTZE NUS GSUM GYI CHA NAS CHE BA'I GO
GNAS GANG 'DRA ZHIG BZHES KYANG RANG DBANG DU BYUNG BA'I TSUL
NI,

T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU PHRENG BCU GSUM PA ZHI BAR GSHEGS PA'I RGYAL
TSAB GSAR BSKO'I SKABS KYANG RGYAL TSAB GNANG RGYUR THUGS MOS MA

GNANG BA DANG, SHIS KHANG LI'U KRU'U ZHIS KHAMS KHUL DU GDAN
'DREN ZHU YIG PHUL KYANG MA PHEBS PA, T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU PHRENG
BCU

BZHI PA'I YONGS 'DZIN GYI GO SA MA BZHES PA, SRID SKYONG RVA
SGRENG GIS BOD KYI BLA CHEN TSANG MA'I GRAL DBUR BZHUGS CHOG
PA'I GO

GNAS PHUL YANG DANG LEN MA MDZAD PA RED,

SKU TSE 'DI'I MDZAD PA'I MTHA' MA NI DVAGS PO BSHAD SGRUB GLING
DU RTZA BA'I BLA MA'I GDAN SAR LAM RIM GNANG BAR CHED PHEBS

THUGS BZHED LEGS GRUB RJES, PHYIR PHEBS LAM DU DVAGS PO BDE PO
PHYAG ZUR ZHES RJE NYID KYI RTZA BA'I BLA MA 'JAM DPAL LHUN

GRUB RGYA MTSO'I YON BDAG RNYING KHUNGS DE'I KHYIM DU BZHUGS,
ZHAG PAR BSNYUN BZHES KYIS RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I LCAGS SBRUL

(1941) ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES GCIG THO RANGS KYI DUS SU SKU
GSHEGS PA'O, ,

KU S'A LI'I TSOGS GSOG (36) 2

GTOR MA'I DE NYID BRGYAD PA, (37) 9

RNAL 'BYOR PAS ZAS BDUN BSTEN PA'I MAN NGAG (38) 1

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

PHAG MO GRU PA RDO RJE RGYAL PO NI MDO KHAMS LHO RGYUD 'BRI LUNG
RME SHOD DU YAB SBAS AA DAR DANG YUM 'BYE BZA' BTZUN NE GNYIS
KYI SRAS

SU RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I LCAGS STAG (1110) LOR SKU 'KHRUNGS,
KHONG BYIS PA'I SKABS SU YAB YUM GNYIS KA 'DAS, DGUNG LO

DGU LA SON SKABS BYA KHYI LHA KHANG DU MKHAN PO TSUL 'BAR GYI
DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN RDO RJE RGYAL POR GSOL, RIM
GYIS YI GE

'BRI KLOG DANG LHA RIS SOGS SBYANGS SHING, KHAMS SU YONGS 'DZIN
DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BCU DRUG GI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR BLANGS

TE MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LA GSAN BSAM MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS
LA DBUS PHYOGS SU PHEBS, DPAL GSANG PHU'I CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS TE, DGE BSHES STOD LUNG RGYA DMAR BA'I DRUNG DU PHAR
PHYIN DANG, TSAD MA, DBU MA RIGS TSOGS KYI SKOR LA SHIN TU

MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA LA BYA 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA
CHEN POS MKHAN PO DANG, STOD LUNG RGYA DMAR BAS SLOB DPON,

AAR GYIS GSANG STON MDZAD THOG DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG GI DBUS SU
BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS SHING, MKHAN SLOB DE DAG GI DRUNG DU

'DUL BA'I GZHUNG LUGS LA SHIN TU MKHAS PAR MDZAD, SNYAN GRAGS
PHYOGS KUN KHYAB, DE NAS DMAR CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG BYANG

SEMS ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN, DPAL CHEN RGA LO PA, SA CHEN KUN DGA'
SNYING PO, BU SGOM, JO MO LHA RJE SOGS LA GSANG SNGAGS RDO

RJE THEG PA'I CHOS SKOR MANG PO GSAN, RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I LCAGS
LUG (1151) LOR ZHANG DANG LHAN DU DVAGS LHA SGAM POR BYON,

ZHAG BZHI PAR MNYAM MED DVAGS PO RIN PO CHE MJAL, THUN MONG MA
YIN PA'I DAD SEMS LHAG PAR THUGS LA 'KHRUNGS, DER

KHONG RANG GI SNGAR GYI LO RGYUS DANG TING 'DZIN BZANG PO YOD
TSUL RNAMS ZHUS PAR, DVAGS PO RIN PO CHES, DE LA YON TAN DU

BRTZI'AM, DE BAS ZAN RDOG 'DI TZAM ZHIG MI DGA' RE ZHES PHYAG GI
BRDA DANG BCAS GSUNGS PAR SNGAR GYI TING NGE 'DZIN GYI NYAMS

THUG PO DE HRUL GYIS ZHIG DER DVAGS PO RIN PO CHES DA KHYOD RANG
RI PHA GIR SDOD LA SEMS MA BCOS PAR MNYAM PAR ZHOG

GSUNGS PAS, DE LTAR MNYAM PAR BZHAG MA THAG PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO'I
DON GYI YE SHES MNGON DU GYUR, SGAM POR LO GSUM BZHUGS

SKABS, RDO RJE RGYAL PO DANG, DUS GSUM MKHYEN PA, SGOM PA SHVA
STON GSUM LA GRUB THOB KHAMS PA MI GSUM ZHES DVAGS PO RIN

PO CHE'I SLOB MA'I NANG NAS MCHOG TU GYUR PA YIN, MNYAM MED
DVAGS PO RIN PO CHE DGONGS PA RDZOGS RJES DVAGS LHA SGAM POR LO

GCIG TZAM BZHUGS NAS DGONGS RDZOGS KYI ZHABS TOG MDZAD, DE NAS
BLA MAS LUNG BSTAN PA LTAR KUN TU BZANG PO'I NAGS

KHROD DAM PHAG MO GRU ZHES PA'I GNAS SU PHEBS, BRAG KHA BA'I
BTZAN POS SBYIN BDAG BGYIS TE GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL GYI PHAG MO

GRU'I DGON GNAS BTAB PAS, GDAN SA'I MING BLA MA LA CHAGS NAS
PHAG MO GRU PA RDO RJE RGYAL PO ZHES BRJOD, 'GRO DON DANG

'PHRIN LAS TSAD MED RGYAS, SLOB MA DBU GDUGS THOB PA LNGA BRGYA
'DUS, 'BRI GUNG DANG, STAG LUNG, 'BRUG PA, TSAL

PA, G-YA' BZANG, KHRO PHU, DMAR G-YEL SOGS BKA' BRGYUD THAMS CAD
KYI CHU 'GO LTA BUR GYUR TE DE NAS BZUNG PHAG GRU

BKA' BRGYUD SHIN TU DAR BAR GYUR, DGUNG LO ZHE DGU NAS BZUNG ZLA
BA YAR NGO LA SKU MTSAMS DANG, MAR NGO LA SNGA DRO SKU

MTSAMS DANG, PHYI DRO'I DUS ZAB PA DANG RGYA CHE BA'I CHOS KYI
'KHOR LO BSKOR TE SLOB MA SHIN TU MANG PO SPEL BAR MDZAD, PHAG
GRU

BKA' BRGYUD KYI SROL THOG MAR 'BYED PAR MDZAD DO, ,DE NAS DAD
LDAN SLOB MA RNAMS LA BSLAB BYA LEGS PAR GDAMS NAS RAB

SNYING PO DON GSUM NYUNG NGU GSAL BA BZHUGS SO, , (4) 7

RGYAL BA BYAMS PA'I THUGS RJE BSKUL BA'I GSOL 'DEBS SMON LAM
BZHUGS SO, , (5) 6

GSOL 'DEBS BSTOD TSOGS KYI RIM PA RNAMS BZHUGS SO, , (6) 43

'DOD GSOL SMON LAM GYI RIM PA BZHUGS SO, , (7) 20

ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS KYI RIM PA DANG SPRUL SKU MYUR 'BYON GSOL
'DEBS LE TSAN BCAS BZHUGS SO, , (8) 27

DKAR CHAG GI RIM PA DU MA DANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BZHENGS PA'I
SMON TSIG GI RIM PA BZHUGS SO, , (9) 111

@032 THANG SKU'I RGYAB YIG LE TSAN DANG MCHOD RDZAS GSAR BSKRUN
GYI 'DOD GSOL SMON LAM GYI RIM PA BZHUGS SO, , (10) 52

LAM 'KHRID 'JAM DPAL ZHAL LUNG GI STOD SMAD RNAMS SU BLO DMAN
RANG LA DOGS PA JI LTAR BYUNG BA RNAMS

BZHUGS SO, , (11) 9

GRVA SA CHEN PO BZHI DANG RGYUD PA STOD SMAD CHAGS TSUL PAD DKAR
'PHRENG BA BZHUGS SO, , (12) 62

GTOR 'BUL GYI RIM PA BZHUGS SO, , (13) 23

BCA' YIG GI RIM PA THAR BA'I THEM SKAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
(14) 22

PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA CHEN PO'I DOGS GCOD GSUNG LAN
BZHUGS SO, , (15) 20

BSNGO BA DON GNYIS PHUN TSOGS SOGS BZHUGS SO, , (16) 8

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

PHUR LCOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA NI, 'KHRUNGS YUL MDO STOD ZAL MO
SGANG GI CHAR GTOGS CHAB MDO DANG NYE BA'I YUL THAM KHA

GRONG SNO ROM ZHES PA DE YIN, RUS RGYUD NI CHOS RGYAL KHRI SRONG
LDE BTZAN GYI BLON PO RLANGS KHAMS PA GO CHA ZHES PA DE YI RIGS
RGYUD

RIM PAR BRGYUD PA LAS, SNE'U GDONG PA'I ZHAL NGO GDONG BRAG NAG
ZER BA, 'GRO MGON CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA'I ZHABS PHYIR

KHAMS PHYOGS SU BYON PA YUL DER CHAGS PA'I RIGS RGYUD LAS, RGYAL
MKHAR AA NU, SA SGANG SDE PA, DBYI MDA' SDE PA,

GNAS MDO SDE PA RNAMS BYUNG ZHING, GNAS MDO SDE BA'I RUS BRGYUD
LA, BRAG DMAR AA NU, MGON BRTAN, KLU MGON RGYAL,

LHA DBANG BCAS BYUNG, LHA DBANG GI SRAS LA, AA NU 'PHAGS PA
DANG, LHA 'BUM GNYIS BYUNG BA'I CHE BA AA NU 'PHAGS PA ZHES

BYA BA YON TAN DU MAS RGYUD PHYUG CING, DPA' MDZANGS RTUL PHOD
DANG LDAN PA DE NI RJE NYID KYI YAB RJER GYUR PA DANG, YUM NI

BKRA SHIS MTSO ZHES PA STE 'DI'ANG BUD MED SKYON DANG BRAL
ZHING, YON TAN DANG LDAN PA ZHIG STE, YAB YUM DE GNYIS LA SRAS

BDUN YOD PA'I NANG NAS RJE 'DI NI LNGA PA YIN LA, RAB BYUNG BCU
GCIG PA'I CHU KHYI LO (1682) LA SKU BLTAMS, YAB KYIS

BKA' RGYUD KYI BLA MA GRAGS PA PHUN TSOGS LA MTSAN GNANG BAR
ZHUS PAS, BDE MCHOG BSRUNG ZHES GSOL,

DGUNG LO BDUN (SA 'BRUG 1688) LA BABS PA'I TSE, DAM PA DE NYID
KYI KHU BO MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG CHOS SKYONG RGYAL ZHES

PA DE'I DRUNG DU YI GE'I KLOG SLOB PAR MDZAD, 'BAD RTZOL CHER
BSKYED BYAS TE SHIN TU BYANG BAR GYUR, DUS DE TZAM NYID NAS

SKABS 'GAR GRONG CHOG GI BYA BA'ANG 'GA' MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU GSUM (SHING PHO KHYI 1694) LOR KHU BO TSE DBANG
BKRA SHIS KYIS SNA DRANGS TE, TSES BCO LNGA NYIN CHAB MDO

BYAMS PA GLING DU PHEBS TE MDO KHAMS BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME 'PHAGS
PA LHA'I DRUNG DU KHYIM PA'I RTAGS THAMS CAD MCHIL MA'I THAL BA

BZHIN DOR NAS NA BZA' NGUR SMRIG GSOL TE, DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BZHES, NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL,

'KHRUNGS GZHIS NAS PHEBS KHAR YAB KYIS KYANG RANG RE THAM KHA
BA'I MIS, CHAB MDO PHO SKYES PA'I LO RGYUS MED PAS, KHYED KYANG

TSUL MTHUN MA BYUNG NA MIG GIS MTHONG SAR MA 'ONG ZHIG CES PA'I
MNGAGS CHA NAN CAN MDZAD PA'ANG THUGS LA BCANGS TE, GRVA

@033 TSANG DE'I 'DON CHA JI SNYED PA THAMS CAD DANG GAR 'CHAM
DBYANGS ROL LA SOGS PA THAMS CAD RING PO MA LON PAR THUGS SU
CHUD,

DUS GTOR SKABS GAR 'CHAM SOGS KYANG MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU BZHI (SHING PHAG 1694) PA'I DUS SU RAB 'BYAMS PA
BSAM GTAN GYIS THAL SKAD BZANG PO DANG BCAS TE BGRO

GLENG BYAS PAS GZIGS MA THAG SKU LUS KYI BA SPU THAMS CAD G-YOS,
CI NAS KYANG NGANG TSUL DE LTA BU RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB RGYA MTSO
LTA

BU'I PHA ROL TU SON PAR BYA'O SNYAM PA THUGS LA SHAR, DBUS
PHYOGS SU THON KHAR THON PHYAG LA BYON SKABS 'PHAGS PA LHAS
SNGAR LHA

THOG SBYIN PA ZER BA LEGS TSAD CIG YOD PA GRVA SAR SDUG BSRAN MA
THUB PAR BYANG DU GRONG CHOG LA SONG BAS CHOS 'GO TZAM YANG MA
THON,

DE 'DRA MA SONG BAR NYAM GANG CHUNG SDOD GANG TSUGS STENG NAS
SLOB GNYER MTHAR PHYIN PAR BYAS, SLAR YANG YUL DU 'ONG NAS MIG

RGYAN LA PHAN PA ZHIG GYIS ZHES BSLAB BYA BSTZAL, DE NAS GROGS
PO BDUN TZAM DANG LHAN DU DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PA'I (ME BYI 1696)

LOR DBUS SU PHEBS, SER BYES GRVA TSANG DU BZHUGS, MKHAS PA'I
DBANG PO NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO DANG YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES

GNYEN BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS BSDUS
GRVA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU DRUG (ME GLANG 1697) LO NAS PHAR PHYIN SBYONG BA'I
DBU TSUGS, BYA BRAL DGE BSHES BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL

BSTEN TE, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN LA RIGS CHUNG GI TSOGS LANGS SHIG
GNANG, RTZOD GRVAR 'BAD PA LAS 'TSO BA'I YO BYAD CHED DU

GNYER BA'I RTZOL BA CUNG ZAD TZAM YANG MED PAR DAM PA'I CHOS KYI
DON DU THOS BSAM LA NAN TAN KHO NA MDZAD, GSOL ZAS KYI

RIGS SHIN TU DKON PAR GYUR TE GSOL JA BSKOL BA SOGS KYI YO LANGS
LTA ZHOG GSOL RTZAM YANG GSOL RGYU MED PA'I NGANG NAS

PHYAG DPE LTA SBYONG MDZAD DE <<PHAR PHYIN GYI THAL PHRENG ZUR
BKOL BZHI>> DANG BCAS PA DANG <<DBU MA SKAL BZANG MGUL RGYAN>>
YONGS

RDZOGS THUGS LA BZUNG, GZHAN YANG PAn CHEN BDE LEGS NYI MA'I
<<'DUL BA GZHI STOD SMAD>> <<MDZOD RTZA>> KUN GZIGS

LNGA PA CHEN POS MDZAD PA'I <<CHOS MNGON RIN CHEN 'DREN PA'I
SHING RTA>> SOGS THUGS LA BZUNG, DE SKABS GSOL ZAS SKYA LA NA

BZA' HRUL BA BYED BZHIN BZHUGS PAS, GTZANG PA CHOS GRAGS ZER BA
DES SEMS KYIS MA BZOD NAS RJE 'DI SPYAN DRANGS, KHO

PA RANG LA CHA RKYEN BZANG PO MED MOD KYANG, GSOL JA YANG YANG
DRANGS PA DANG, LHO PA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG SBYIN PA ZER BA

CHAS KA DGA' RAB YOD PA DES KYANG GSOL JA YANG YANG DRANGS, SKU
SHAM SHIN TU HRUL BAR RGYAL BYED DGE SLONG RIG 'DZIN ZER BA

ZHIG GIS SHAM THABS RNYING SE BA ZHIG PHUL, DBU MA'I 'DZIN GRVAR
PHEBS SKABS DE YANG ZAD NAS BGRO GLENG MDZAD SKABS ZHABS

PUS GNYIS SNGO HRENG HRENG BYED PAR GYUR DUS BSAM BLO DKA' BCU
BA BSAM GTAN LHUN GRUB ZER BA'I MKHAS PA ZHIG GIS NANG DU

SPYAN DRANGS TE JA BZANG PO DANG SKU SHAM BCAS PHUL ZHING, RGYAL
BA TSANGS DBYANGS RGYA MTSO SE RAR PHEBS SKABS SER SMAD DGE

BSHES RGYA RONG DBON CHUNG DANG MNYAM DU BZHUGS GRAL CHEN MOR
TSOGS LANGS MDZAD PAS KUN GYIS BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD,

DGUNG GRANGS NYER GCIG (CHU PHO RTA 1702) LA GLING BSRE'I GRVA
SKOR MDZAD PAS THAMS CAD KYIS DGA' BA'I CA CO CI YANG SGROG

PAR GYUR TO, ,

DGUNG GRANGS NYER GSUM PAR GTZANG DU PHEBS TE SHING PHO SPREL LO
(1704) LA PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS MKHAN SLOB

ZUNG 'BREL DANG, MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO YONGS 'DZIN BSOD NAMS GRAGS
PAS GSANG STE STON PA'I SLOB DPON MDZAD CING,

KHA SKONG GI DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG BA'I DBUS SU DGE SLONG GI
SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR BZHES, SLAR YANG DBUS PHYOGS SU PHEBS NAS

THOS BSAM LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD DE RJE SGRUB KHANG PA'I BKA'
DGONGS LTAR, DGUNG GRANGS NYER LNGAR PHEBS DUS (ME KHYI 1706)

BOD ZLA DANG POR SMON LAM CHEN MOR GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DE SKABS DGE
'DUN TSANG MA MCHOG TU MOS SHING, DANG BA DANG, 'DUN

PA, SPRO BA RNAMS PHAN TSUN 'GRAN PA BZHIN DU GYUR,

SMON LAM GRVA SKOR ZIN RJES SGRUB KHANG PA LA YANG YANG DGONGS
SKOR ZHUS, MTHAR PHUR BU LCOG TU RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG

SBYIN PAS GROGS MDZAD DE CHOS 'DUL BA'I GZHUNG DANG MTHUN PA'I
SPYIL BU ZHIG BRTZIGS TE PHUR BU LCOG TU GTAN BZHUGS GNANG,

RJE SGRUB KHANG PA'I MDUN CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DGUNG LO
SO GCIG PA CHU 'BRUG LOR KHONG GI BLA MA SGRUB KHANG PA SKU

GSHEGS PAR THUGS SKYO BA TSAD MED NGANG GSHEGS CHOS ZAB RGYAS
BSGRUBS,

DGUNG LO SUM CU SO GSUM (SHING RTA 1714) NAS GZHAN LA GSUNG CHOS
GNANG BA'I 'GO BRTZAMS, DE NAS LO LTAR GSUNG

CHOS CHAG MED GNANG ZHING, DANG PO GSUNG CHOS GNANG SKABS SKYA
SER BZHI BCU TZAM, RJES NAS RIM GYIS 'PHEL RGYAS PHYIN TE

PHYIS SU GSUNG CHOS GNANG THENGS RE LA GSAN MKHAN GYI SLOB MA
STONG KHA SHAS RE 'DUS PA BYUNG YOD, KHONG DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE

BRGYAD LA PHEBS PA SA MO BYA LO (1729) LA, CHAB MDO 'PHAGS PA
LHA'I COD PAN BZHES PAR GDAN DRANGS, BSU BAR BYED

@034 MKHAN YANG LHA SAR 'BYOR BAR BRTEN CHAB MDOR PHEBS, ZLA BA
BCU PAR CHAB MDO BYAMS PA GLING DU 'BYOR, 'PHAGS PA LHA'I

COD PAN BZHES TE CHOS BKA' MANG PO GNANG, ZLA BA BDUN TZAM
BZHUGS RJES LCAGS KHYI LO (1730) ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES NYER 

GNYIS LA BYANG LAM BRGYUD DE DBUS LHA LDAN PHYOGS SU BTEG DGUNG
LO BRGYAD CUR PHEBS PA LCAGS SBRUL LO (1761) LA GONG MA

CHAN LUNG GIS T'A LA'I 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I YONGS 'DZIN DU
BSKOS,

SPYIR KHONG GI SLOB MA NI, LCANG SKYA ROL RDOR, PAN CHEN DPAL
LDAN YE SHES, ZHOG DON YOD MKHAS GRUB SOGS CHOS PHAN

TSUN GNANG RE BYED PA'I SLOB MA DANG, RGYAL TSAB DE MO SPRUL
SKU, 'JAM BZHAD SPRUL SKU, RGYAL SRAS SPRUL SKU SOGS BLA SPRUL
MANG

PO DANG DE MIN GYI SLOB MA MTHA' YAS PA YOD CING, SKABS DER,
GTZANG BKRAS LHUN DANG DBUS SE 'BRAS DGE GSUM BCAS SU

BKA' CHOS GNANG MKHAN GTZO BOR GYUR, GSER GYI BKA' 'GYUR BZHENGS
TE PHAL CHER GRUB, CHAB KYI SNYUN BZHES SKU LUS

SKRANGS, DBUGS 'TSANGS, SKU GZUGS LCI ZHING GSUNG YANG 'BYON
DKA' BAR GYUR, DGUNG LO BRGYAD BCU RTZA GCIG TU

PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU PHO RTA'I LO (1762) ZLA BA
BRGYAD PA'I TSES GNYIS PA'I MTSAN PHYED DU RANG SPYIL PHUR LCOG
RI

KHROD DU SKU GSHEGS SO, ,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BU STON KHA CHE'AM, BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB NI, GTZANG STOD KHRO
PHU'I PHYOGS KYI SHAB SMAD SGOM GNAS DGON PAR, YAB

RNYING MA'I BLA CHEN BRAG STON RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG DANG, YUM
BSOD NAMS 'BUM GNYIS KYI SRAS SU, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I

LCAGS PHO STAG GI LO (1290) ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES NYER BZHI LA
SKU BLTAMS, DGUNG LO DRUG PA TZAM LA YUM GYIS KLOG SLOB PA'I

DBU BTZUGS, YUN RING MA 'GOR BAR SBYOR KLOG MTHAR PHYIN CING DBU
MED KYANG BDE BLAG TU MKHYEN, BYIS PA MANG PO'I DBUS

SU BLO RNO ZHING KLOG LEGS PA 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA ZHIG BYUNG BAS,
KUN GYIS BYIS PA 'DI RANG GA BA ZHIG MA RED CES GLENG BA BYUNG,

DE NAS RIG PA'I GNAS LA MKHAS PA DPON RGYA SENG GE'I MDUN DU
RTZIS DANG YI GE'I RIG PA GSAN, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR KHRO PHU BA

CHEN PO BSOD NAMS SENG GE'I SPYAN SNGAR THEG PA CHEN PO BYANG
CHUB MCHOG GI SEMS BSKYED ZHUS, BDAG BAS GZHAN GCES KYI BYANG

SEMS THUGS LA 'KHRUNGS, GZHAN GYI SDUG BSNGAL SPYAN GYIS GZIGS
PA'AM, SNYAN LAM DU GSAN PA'I MOD LA SPYAN CHAB BSIL

ZHING SNYING RJE BAR MDZAD, CI MDZAD THAMS CAD SEMS CAN THAMS
CAD KYI DON KHO NAR DGONGS PAR BZHENGS, DGUNG LO

BRGYAD PA'I DUS SU, MA YUM GYI KHU BO RNYING MA'I BLA MA TSUL
KHRIMS DPAL BZANG GI SPYAN SNGAR GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA'I CHOS
SKOR MA

LUS PA ZHUS SHING, BZLAS BRJOD DANG, SGOM SGRUB SOGS LA THUGS
BRTZON CHEN PO MDZAD, RNYING MA'I CHOS LA MKHAS PAR GYUR

CING, CHO GA PHYAG LEN SOGS KYANG MTHAR PHYIN PAR MKHYEN STABS,
MES PO BLA MA'I SKU TSAB TU DBANG BSKUR CHOS BSHAD SOGS

KYANG LAN MANG MDZAD, GZHAN YANG GSO BA RIG PA'I SKOR GYI SMAN
DPYAD DANG, BZO RIG SKOR GYI THIG TSAD SOGS KYANG SBYANG

BRTZON LEGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PA ME LUG LOR, KHRO
PHU'I MKHAN CHEN YANG RTZE BA RIN CHEN SENG GES MKHAN PO

DANG, DGE BSHES BSOD NAMS MGON GYIS SLOB DPON MDZAD DE RAB BYUNG
DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR BLANGS, 'DUL

BA MDO RTZA DANG K'A RI KA SOGS KYI SDOM TSIG RNAMS THUGS LA
BZUNG STE TSUL KHRIMS MIG 'BRAS LTAR BSRUNGS,

SLOB DPON BSOD NAMS MGON GYI MDUN DU PHAR PHYIN THUGS SBYONG
MDZAD, LO GNYIS LHAG LA DKA' SPYAD TSAD MED MDZAD

DE, NYIN MO GSOL BA GSOL LONG DANG NA GZA' RAL BA 'TSEM LONG MED
CING, MTSAN MOR MNAL GZIM LONG MED PAR ZHUN

ME'I 'OG DPE CHA GZIGS PA BCAS MDZAD STABS, ZHAL RAS GNYER MAS
GANG ZHING, SKU LUS YONGS RDZOGS RID RID POR GYUR

@053 TE MI RNAMS KYIS MTHONG BA TZAM LA SNYING RJE BA'I YUL DU
GYUR, LO GNYIS SONG BA NA PHAR PHYIN GYI GZHUNG LUGS MA LUS PA
THUGS SU

CHUD, MKHAS DBANG DU MA 'DZOMS PA'I DBUS SU PHAR PHYIN GYI
BSHAD PA RGYA CHEN MDZAD, DE NAS LO GCIG LHAG GI RING LA 'DUL

BA DANG TSAD MA'I GZHUNG RNAMS GSAN, DE LTAR LO MANG POR 'BAD
BRTZON MDZAD PAS, GZHUNG LUGS RGYA MTSO'I PHA ROL TU SON,

DBUS DANG GTZANG GI CHOS GRVA GTZO BO RNAMS SU GRVA SKOR MDZAD
STABS, DBUS KYI MKHAS PA SH'AKA GZHON, BTZAN DGON PA, KHA

RAG PA BYANG GZHON SOGS DANG, GTZANG GI MKHAS PA DPAL LDAN
SENG GE DBU TSAD PA 'JAM SKYA SOGS MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA

CAN DAG KYANG NGA RGYAL DANG SPOBS PA ZHI STE, PHA STON PA LA
BU STON PA BYUNG 'DUG CES BSTOD BSNGAGS BYAS, LTA BA LOG PAR

'DZIN PA'I RGOL BA MA LUS PA LUNG DANG RIGS PAS SUN PHYUNG,
MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA DBUS GTZANG KUN TU KHYAB, DGUNG LO NYER

GSUM PAR, DKA' BZHI PA GRAGS PA GZHON NUS MKHAN PO DANG, SLOB
DPON BSOD NAMS GRAGS PAS LAS SLOB, 'DUL BA

'DZIN PA BSOD NAMS BZANG POS GSANG STE STON PA'I SLOB DPON
MDZAD DE, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHEN PO DKON MCHOG BZANG POS

THOG DRANGS DGE 'DUN NYI SHU RTZA GNYIS KYI DBUS SU, GTZANG
TSONG 'DU 'GUR MO'I BLA BRANG SHAR DU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM
PA YANG

DAG PAR MNOS, MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA GZHON NU DANG, SLOB DPON
BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA GNYIS KYI SPYAN SNGAR 'DUL BA DANG

BLO SBYONG GI SKOR GYI GZHUNG LUGS MA LUS PA GSAN, BLA MA'I
BZHED PA BSKONG BA DANG, DAD LDAN SLOB MA MANG PO'I RE BA
BSKONG

BA'I CHED DU, KHRO PHUR PHAR PHYIN, 'DUL BA, MNGON PA BCAS KYI
'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR MDZAD, SLOB MA MKHAS PA MANG PO

THON, DE NAS MI RING BAR SGRA DANG SNYAN NGAG SOGS THUN MONG
GI RIG GNAS SBYONG BA DANG, TSE GCIG LUS GCIG LA 'TSANG RGYA

BA'I RNAL 'BYOR BLA MED KYI GSANG SNGAGS ZAB MO'I MAN NGAG
RNAMS ZHU BA'I CHED DU, ZHANG YAM PA SOGS MCHED GROGS 'GA'
DANG

'GROGS TE, DBU ZHVA SNE LEB RTZE RING ZHIG GSOL, KHA TON PO TI
PHRA MO 'GA' 'KHYER, RI BO STAG LA BRGYUD DE THAR BA GLING DU

BYON, LO TZ'A CHEN PO THAR LO NYI MA RGYAL MTSAN SLOB DPON DU
BSTEN NAS, LEGS PAR SBYAR BA'I SGRA RIG PA'I GZHUNG TZAndA PA
DANG

KA L'A PA'I MDO 'GREL DANG BCAS PA, SNYAN NGAG SDEB SBYOR,
RGYA GAR SHAR NUB DANG, SENG GA LA'I GLING SOGS KYI YIG RIGS
SNA

TSOGS, MING GI MNGON BRJOD BCAS THA SNYAD RIG PA'I SKOR LA
THUGS SBYONG RNAL SMIN MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU GSANG SNGAGS BLA
MED

KYI CHOS SKOR DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG DANG BSGRUB MCHOD SOGS ZAB
CHOS MANG PO RTAGS THON PAR ZHUS, LO BZHI TZAM LA 'BAD PA LHOD

MED MDZAD PAS, 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA'I LO TZ'A BA ZHIG TU GYUR, 
BLA MA DPAL LDAN SENG GE BLA MA RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN, RNAL
'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG BE BHU TI D'AN SOGS GSANG SNGAGS KYI

BDAG POR GRAGS PA'I RDO RJE 'DZIN PA MANG PO'I SPYAN SNGAR
RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DBANG DANG BSHAD PA SOGS GSANG SNGAGS KYI
CHOS SKOR

MTHA' DAG GSAN, BKA' GDAMS PA'I BLA MA KU M'AR SING DHI LA
BKA' GDAMS PA'I MAN NGAG MANG PO GSAN, MDOR NA RIG

PAR BYA BA'I GNAS KUN LA SBYANGS PA MTHA' RU PHYIN CING, SDE
SNOD GSUM DANG RGYUD SDE BZHI'I GZHUNG LUGS MANG PO'I 'CHAD
NYAN

YANG YUN RING MDZAD DE MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA DBUS GTZANG YONGS
SU KHYAB, SLOB MA'ANG MANG DU BSKYANGS BAR BYAS SO, ,

KHONG DGUNG LO SO GCIG TU PHEBS PA NA, DPAL ZHVA LU GSER KHANG
GI BDAG PO LCE'I GDUNG RGYUD, SA SKYA 'GRO MGON PHYAG NA

SOGS KYI ZHANG PO'I RIGS LAS MCHED PA SKU ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN GYIS, DPAL ZHVA LU'I GTZUG LAG KHANG NYAMS GSO'I DBU

BTZUGS, LHO MON GYI YUL NAS SHING CHA TSAN CHEN DRANGS, SHAR
RGYA YI YUL NAS BZO BO MKHAS PA MANG PO BOS, RGYA PHIBS G-YU
CHU

CAN GSER GYI GAN JIR BTZUGS PA CHE BA BZHI, GLO 'BUR MIG MANG
RIS SU BRIS PA G-YU CHU'I BA GAM DANG LAN KAN GSER GYI TOG

GIS BRGYAN PA, GSER KHANG RGYA PHIBS SUM RTZEG GZHAN RNAMS LA
NYIS RTZEG G-YER DRIL GYI DRA BA BRES PA, NANG RTEN RIN CHEN

SNA TSOGS LAS BYAS PA'I LHA SKU MANG PO, TSON SNA BRGYA PHRAG
LAS GRUB PA'I LOGS RIS, GSER BTZOS MAS BZHENGS PA'I BKA'

'GYUR SOGS SKU GSUNG THUGS KYI RTEN RGYA CHEN BZHENGS, DGON
PA'I KHOR YUG TU LCAGS RIS BSKOR BA'I DBUS SU GNYUG MAR

GNAS PA'I DGE 'DUN RE RE LA GZIM SHAG RE BTAB NAS PHUL, DGE
'DUN PA'ANG MANG TZAM 'DUS, SKABS DER CHOS SDE CHEN

PO ZHVA LU GSER KHANG GI MKHAN PO GRAGS PA GZHON NU SKU GSHEGS
PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS GDUNG MCHOD RGYA CHER BSGRUBS SHING, RTEN

THUB PA'I DBANG PO'I GSER SKU CHEN PO'ANG BZHENGS GRUB STE,
SKU ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DGON 'DI'I GDAN SAR

BZHUGS PA'I MKHAN PO LA, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM 'DZOMS PA'I
DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB NYID GDAN

MI

@054 BO DONG CHOS SDINGS SU ZHAG BZHUGS MDZAD, DE NAS RIM

CHEN MOR

'BYOR, SKU ZHANG CHEN PO DANG GNYER ZHABS, DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN DGE 'DUN GRVA TSOGS BCAS SER SKYA MANG POS BSUS SHING,

MJAL PHYAG BKUR STI TSAD MED KYI SGO NAS BLA MCHOD KYI GTZO
BOR MNGA' GSOL, SKU ZHANG NAS STON PA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN NYE

GNAS CHEN PO DANG, GRAGS PA 'OD ZER GSOL JA PAR BSKOS, BLA
BRANG DANG MCHOD CHA, THAB CHAS, GDAN CHA, NA

GZA' SOGS MKHO BA'I YO BYAD GANG DGOS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA PHUL,
DA DUNG GSOL JA NAM 'DREN GYI DUS SU GSOL LCOG PHUD PHOR,

CHAB BUM, GSOL KHEBS SOGS BKUR STI TSAD MED BYAS, MI RING BAR
TSAD MA RNAM NGES, PHAR PHYIN, MNGON PA KUN BTUS

RE CHAG MED THOG MTSAN MOR YANG DAD LDAN MANG PO'I RE BA

KHYAB,

DUS RE ZHIG NA, ZHVA LU'I DGE BSHES BGRES GRAS 'GAS PHRAG DOG
GIS NGAN SMRAS DANG LOG SGRUB CI RIGS BYAS PA'I RKYEN GYIS,

BU STON GYI THUGS LA 'DIR 'CHAD NYAN BYAS PA'ANG CHAGS SDANG
GI RGYU RU 'GRO NYEN 'DUG DA NI SNYING LAS CHUNG NGUS NYAMS
LEN RNAM

DAG CIG BYED 'GRO NA DGA' DGONGS TE, SKU ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN LA NANG BRDA'I GSANG 'PHRIN TSIGS BCAD MA PHUL, SKU

ZHANG DANG SRAS MO 'DZOM 'BUM SOGS YON BDAG CHEN PO RNAMS
DANG, DKAR PHYOGS KYI BU SLOB KUN RTAB RTAB POR MDUN DU

LHAGS TE GSOL BA NAN CHER BTAB, LOG SGRUB BYED PO RNAMS KYANG
MGO BO SMAD DE 'GYOD BSHAGS PHUL, DE NAS RE ZHIG

BZHUGS PAR ZHAL GYIS BZHES NAS, SNGAGS DANG MTSAN NYID KYI
BSHAD GRVA CHEN PO BTZUGS, SNGON JO BO RJES ZHABS KYIS

BCAGS SHING THUGS DAM SA TSA BZHUGS PA'I ZHVA LU RI PHUG TU
GTZUG LAG KHANG DGE 'DUN SDE DANG BCAS PA GSAR DU BZHENGS,

DGE BSHES BSOD RIN PHO NYAR MNGAGS TE, SLOB DPON 'PHAGS PA RI
PHUG TU SPYAN DRANGS, GSANG SNGAGS BLA MED KYI DBANG

KHRID PHYAG LEN BCAS PA GSAN, SA SKYA'I BLA MA TI SHRI KUN
DGA' RGYAL MTSAN, BLA MA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN SOGS LA'ANG

DBANG LUNG MANG PO ZHUS, DBYAR DGUN GNYIS KYI PHAR PHYIN,
MNGON PA KUN BTUS, TSAD MA RNAM NGES, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA

SOGS KYI BSHAD PA DANG, STON DPYID GNYIS SU DUS 'KHOR, GSANG
'DUS, YO GA RDO RJE'I 'BYUNG BA SOGS KYI BSHAD PA

MDZAD, DBANG LUNG DANG MAN NGAG CHUNG BA RNAMS ZHAR CHOS KYI
TSUL DU GSUNGS, SKABS DE DAG TU GSANG SNGAGS SKOR GYI GSUNG

RAB MANG PO BRTZAMS PA MA ZAD CHOS RGYAL BSOD NAMS LDE LA
SPRINGS PA SOGS SPRINGS YIG GI TSOGS DANG, G-YAG SDE PAN CHEN

DANG, BLA MA RIN CHEN YE SHES LA SOGS PA'I DRIS LAN RNAMS
KYANG DE DUS MDZAD, SKU ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GSHEGS
RJES,

SRAS KUN DGA' DON GRUB RGYAL SAR 'KHOD, BU STON RJE'I ZHAL
BKOD 'OG GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG LHA SKU MANG PO GSAR DU BZHENGS,

KHYAD PAR DBUS GTZANG GI YIG MKHAN MKHAS DGU'I DBUS SU PHUL
BYUNG MANG PO BDAMS NAS DGONGS 'GREL GYI BSTAN BCOS

'GYUR RO COG GSAR DU BZHENGS, BU STON RIN PO CHES, SNAR THANG
GI BSTAN 'GYUR LA MA DAG PA BCOS, ZLOS PA RNAMS DOR,

CHOS TSAN CHIG STONG TZAM GSAR DU BSNAN TE, KHYON SDOM CHOS
TSAN SUM STONG SUM BRGYA GO GNYIS BSDUS, <<DKAR CHAG YID

BZHIN NOR BU DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I PHRENG BA>> BSGRIGS, BOD SNGA
RABS KYI MKHAS PA DAG GI GSUNG RAB KYANG PHAL CHE BA BZHENGS
NAS

ZHU DAG MDZAD, NYIN MOR 'CHAD NYAN DANG, MTSAN MOR RTZOM ZHU
SOGS LA THUGS BRTZON MDZAD, SKABS 'GAR MTSAN THOG

LU'I

BRGYA

RE TZAM 'DUS,

GRU RNAMS SU SKYE BO KHRI PHRAG MANG PO LA BYANG CHUB SEMS

@055 'DRI MDZAD,

DGUNG GRANGS NGA DRUG PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING SPREL LO
(1344) ZLA BA BCU PAR HOR GYI MI CHEN BHA DE TSEN DBEN DANG,
DZI

BHA LA TU SHRI GHON GYIS GTZOR BYAS PA'I GSER YIG PA 'BYOR NAS
RGYA NAG TU PHEBS DGOS PAR ZHUS, 'ON KYANG 'JIG RTEN GYI GO

GNAS SNYAN GRAGS TZAM LAS, BOD KYI RIG PA'I GNAS CHEN PO RNAMS
GONG DU SPEL BA LA DGOS PA CHEN PO MED PAR DGONGS TE,

DBEN PAR THUGS DAM ZAB MO MDZAD PA'I ZOL GYIS BYOL BA LA BRTEN
NAS RGYA NAG TU MA PHEBS, DBEN PAR SGRA DANG GSANG SNGAGS

KYI GZHUNG MANG PO 'PHRO BSGYUR DANG GZHI BSGYUR MDZAD, SGOM
CHEN DU RLOM PA 'GAS GRUB RTAGS BZHAG PA, MNGON SHES BSHAD PA,

RDZU 'PHRUL BSTAN PA ZER BA DE DAG LA THUGS GTAN NAS MI DGYES,
DE DAG NI BDUD KYI MTSAN MA YIN, SEMS RTOGS NA RTAGS

LA DGOS PA MED CES DGAG PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GNYIS PA LCAGS YOS LOR G-YA' PHAG GNYIS
KYI 'KHRUG PA BSDUM PA'I CHED DU DBUS KYI PHYOGS SU CHIBS KHA

BSGYUR, PHEBS LAM KUN TU DAM PA'I CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI BSTZAL,
DBUS KYI BSHAD GRVA DANG SGOM GRVA TSANG MAR GDAN DRANGS,

SNGAGS DANG MTSAN NYID KYI BSHAD PA SNGAR MED MANG PO SPEL,
DBUS KYI MKHAS PA YONGS KYIS BSTOD BSNGAGS RGYA CHEN MDZAD,

SKAL LDAN GYI SKYE BO MANG PO SMIN GROL GYI LAM LA BKOD, DGOS
DON YONGS SU GRUB STE RI PHUG TU TSUR BYON, KUN RIG SKOR GYI 
GSUNG RAB BRTZAMS SHING, SGRA GZHUNG 'GA' BSGYUR,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM PA CHU 'BRUG LOR, SKU NYID KYI MA YUM
DRIN CAN 'DAS MA'I PHYI RTEN LA DMIGS NAS, ZLA BA

GSUM PA'I TSES NYER GSUM NYIN BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN CHEN MO'I
RMANG BTING, MCHOD RTEN DE NI SO PHAG LAS BYAS SHING,

DPANGS SU KHRU DRUG CU RE DGU ZHENG DU KHRU NYER GSUM YOD PA,
RTZE MOR RDO BA CHEN PO HRIL PO GCIG LAS BYAS PA'I GDUGS CAN,

NANG NA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I RING SREL GYIS BYUR BUR GANG BA,
ZUR NA MYA NGAN MED PA'I MCHOD RTEN, LHA BABS MCHOD RTEN,

BDUD 'DUL MCHOD RTEN SOGS MCHOD RTEN BCUS BSKOR BA, PHYI NANG
TSANG MA'I ZHAL BKOD RJE RANG NYID KYIS MDZAD DE,

DBYIBS KYI BKOD PA NANG GI RTEN PHUN SUM TSOGS PA, ZLA BA BCU
GCIG PA'I TSES GSUM LA BZHENGS GRUB, TSES BDUN NYIN

PAR RAB TU GNAS PA'I CHO GA MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BZHI PA CHU MO SBRUL GYI LOR KHRO PHUR LO
TZ'A BA'I GDAN SA BZHES, DER BSHAD GRVA DANG SGOM GRVA BTZUGS,

SA SKYAR PHEBS NAS SA SKYA'I GDUNG RGYUD RNAMS ZAB CHOS KYIS
TSIM PAR MDZAD, LO GCIG LHAG GI RING LA BSTAN PA SPEL BA'I BYA
BA

RGYA CHEN MDZAD, DGUNG LO RE LNGA PA SHING RTA LOR ZHA LUR
TSUR BYON, DE'I PHYI LO SHING LUG LOR DPAL LDAN SA SKYAR BYON,
SA SKYA'I

LHA KHANG CHEN MOR DPAL RDO RJE DBYINGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR KHRU
BCU GNYIS CAN RIN THANG GZHAL DU MED PA'I RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS
LAS

GRUB PA, BKOD PA PHUL DU BYUNG BA BZHENGS, <<GZHAL YAS KHANG
GI RNAM BZHAG DE NYID GSAL BA>> LJAGS RTZOM MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BDUN DU PHEBS PA ME SPREL LO'I ZLA BA BCU
PAR, SKU ZHANG YE SHES KUN DGA' SKU MCHED SOGS, ZHVA

LU'I SER SKYA GROS LA DBANG BA TSANG MA 'DZOMS PA'I DBUS SU,
RJE'I ZHAL NAS GDAN SA BZUNG NAS LO SO BDUN SONG, DA NI NGA
YANG RGAS, GZHAN GYI MGO TA PHAR ZHOG RANG NYID 'GRO 'DUG TZAM
YANG DKA' 'DUG NGA'I TSAB TU GDAN SA 'DZIN MKHAN

ZHIG 'OS 'DEMS GYIS GSUNGS, RJE'I DGONGS BZHED DANG BSTUN TE
TSANG MAS GROS MTHUN THOG ME SPREL LO'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG

PA'I TSES LNGA NYIN, THUGS SRAS SGRA TSAD PA RIN CHEN RNAM
RGYAL ZHVA LU'I GDAN SAR BKOD, MCHOD YON CHE DGU 'DZOMS PA'I

DBUS SU RJE NYID KYIS, LUGS GNYIS KYI BSLAB BYA RGYAS PAR
GNANG RJES, MA SHI NA KHA TA YIN, SHI NA KHA CHEMS YIN, DA NGA

LA SUN PO BYED MA YONG, NGA DBEN PA'I GNAS SU SHI CHOS BSGRUB
'GRO RGYU YIN GSUNGS, THUGS SRAS SGRA TSAD PA LA DKAR YOL

KHYAD 'PHAGS DANG, DNGUL GYI JA BRA, NAS KHAL BRGYA BCAS
GNANG, ZHAL BSGO RGYAS PA MDZAD DE, RI PHUG TU BYON NAS

BZHUGS,

ME BYA LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PAR KHA CHE'I PAndI TA SU MA NA SHRI
RGYA NAG GONG MAS GDAN PA RI PHUG TU BYON, BU STON RJES KHONG
GI SPYAN

SNGAR DBANG DANG DKYIL CHOG RAB GNAS, SBYIN SREG BCAS KYI RGYA
GZHUNG MANG PO GSAN CING BOD SKAD DU BSGYUR, KHA CHE'I PAndI
TA

DANG, TA'I SI TU BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN, 'JAM DBYANGS SH'AKYA
RGYAL MTSAN, SLOB DPON KUN DGA' RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN

SOGS BLA CHEN MANG PO LA, DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BSHAD KHRID
DBANG DANG BCAS PA GNANG, CHU MIG DPAL GYI SDE CHEN DU

GONG MA'I GSER YIG PA, BLA MA KHU DBON, SI TU CHEN PO SOGS
DANG MJAL 'DZOM THOG GONG MAS GNANG BA'I 'JA' SA

BSGRAGS, RI PHUG TU 'DU KHANG DGE 'DUN STONG PHRAG SHONG BA
GSAR DU BTAB, MTHA' 'KHOR DU MCHOD RTEN MANG PO GSAR DU

@056 BZHENGS, GDAN SA GTAD NAS KYANG LO DGU TZAM LA 'CHAD NYAN
RGYUN MA CHAD PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON BZHI PA CHU MO YOS KYI LO MJUG TU SKU
MTSAMS DAM POR BCAD, NYIN MTSAN KHOR MO YUG TU TZOG

PU'I DAM BCA' MDZAD DE DBU SNGAS LA MI 'JOG PAR THUGS DAM KHO
NA MDZAD, MUN KHANG DU ZLA BA DRUG TZAM LA DKA' BA SPYAD,

SHING 'BRUG LO'I ZLA BA GSUM PA ZLA BSHOL BYUNG, ZLA BA GSUM
PA RJES MA'I TSES GCIG NAS SNYUNG CUNG ZAD BZHES, TSES BCU

DRUG LA SNYUNG DVANGS, ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES BRGYAD LA MTSAMS
GROL, 'DU KHANG DU SGRUB MCHOD CHEN MOR TSOGS LA PHEBS,

'BYON BZHUD KYANG SNGAR BZHIN YANG, ZLA BA LNGA PA'I TSES BCU
DRUG NAS SNYUN LOG PA'I TSUL BSTAN, BLA MA SKYOR LUNG PA SOGS
LHA

RJE MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS GSOL SMAN DRANGS, RIM GRO RGYA CHEN
BSGRUBS KYANG PHAN PA MA BYUNG BAS, DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON LNGAR

PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG GI LO (1364) ZLA
BA DRUG PA'I TSES NYI SHU NAS GSUNGS 'BYON RGYU MED PAR GYUR
TE TSES

NYER GCIG PA'I THO RANGS LA GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA YONGS SU BSDUS
SO, ,

GSHEGS NAS ZHAG BDUN PAR GDUNG SBYANGS TE ZLA BA GCIG GI BAR
GDUNG KHANG MA BSHIG PAR BZHAG BU SLOB YON BDAG

CHE DGU 'DZOMS NAS GDUNG MCHOD BYAS, DE NAS GDUNG KHANG KHA
PHYE STE RING BSREL RNAMS, RGYA GAR, RGYA NAG BAL PO,

BOD DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM BCAS KYI BU CHEN RNAMS KYIS DAD
RTEN DU BGOS,

NANG RTEN RNAM 'DREN BZHI PA'I GZUGS SKU RA SA GTZUG LAG KHANG
GI JO BO'I TSAD DANG MNYAM PA RGYAB YOL DANG BCAS PA,

GZIM KHANG DU RJE BU STON NYID DNGOS SU BZHUGS PA LTA BU'I
'DRA SKU BZHENGS, RING BSREL PHAL MO CHE RTEN DE DAG TU BZHUGS
SU

GSOL, BU CHEN DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN RNAMS KYIS RAB TU GNAS PA
RGYA CHEN MDZAD NAS KUN GYI DAD RTEN DU BZHAG GO ,

KHONG GI GSUNG CHOS NI, ZHVA LU DGON PAR SGRA TSAD PA RIN CHEN
RNAM RGYAL GYIS, RJE'I GSUNG MA 'DUS PA GCIG TU BSDUS

SHING, POD KA PA NAS SHA PA'I BAR PO TI NYER BDUN DU BGOS NAS,
RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING 'BRUG LO (1364) ZLA BA BZHI BA'I

TSES BCO LNGA LA BRIS GRUB, DKAR CHAG RIN CHEN LDE MIG CES PA
BRTZAMS, GSUNG RAB PHAL CHE BAR BU STON RANG NYID NAS ZHU

DAG MDZAD, 'ON KYANG BRIS MA MA GTOGS PAR MA DA DUNG BYUNG MI
'DUG DE NAS LO LNGA BRGYA DANG LNGA BCU NGA GSUM 'DAS PA

RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I ME SBRUL LO (1917) T'A LA'I BCU GSUM
PA'I BKA' BKOD 'OG LHA SA ZHOL GYI PAR KHANG GANGS CAN PHAN
BDE

GTER MDZOD GLING DU SHING PAR BZHENGS,

SDE PA GZHUNG GI BRIS MA DANG, ZHVA LU'I BRIS MAR GZHIR BZUNG
NAS MTSAN ZHABS PA BDE YANGS BSTAN 'DZIN 'PHRIN LAS,

MDO SMAD PA KLU 'BUM LHA RAMS DGE BSHES SHES RAB RGYA MTSO
GNYIS KYIS ZHU DAG MDZAD DE LO GSUM LA BRKOS GRUB, DE NAS

BZUNG BU STON GYI GSUNG RAB PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB, ZHOL GYI MAR BU
STON GYI GSUNG KA NAS LA'I BAR POD NYER DRUG SGRA TSAD 

PA'I GSUNG SHA NAS SA'I BAR POD GNYIS, KHYON POD NYER BRGYAD DU
BYAS SO, ,

ZHVA LU BLO GSAL BSTAN SKYONG GIS, BU STON GSANG SNGAGS KYI
SKOR CHOS TSAN NYIS BRGYA BCO BRGYAD, MDO'I SKOR NYER LNGA,

THUN MONG RIG GNAS KYI SKOR LNGA BCU NGA LNGA STE KHYON SDOM
NYIS BRGYA GO BRGYAD YOD PAR BSHAD, DGE SLONG RIN CHEN SENG
GES

BRTZAMS PA'I BU STON RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR GTAM GYI ROL MO LAS,
PO TI SUM CU SO GSUM YOD PAR BSHAD,

NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU, BU STON GSUNG PAR MA POD CHA TSANG
TSAR GCIG DANG, BRIS MA TSAR GCIG BZHUGS YOD,

RMI LAM BRTAG PA BZHUGS SO, , (26) 3

MKHAS SHING GRUB BRNYES MTHA' DAG GI RIGS KYI COD PAn DU GYUR PA
THAMS CAD MKHYEN DNGOS BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB

YAB SRAS KYI BKA' 'BUM CHA TSANG BA 'DZAD MED PAR GYI DGA' STON
DU SPEL BA'I 'DOD DON SMON PA'I TSIGS SU

BCAD PA PHAN BDE'I LANG TSO GSAR DU 'CHAR BA THAR 'DOD CI DGAR
'JUG PA'I LHA YI KHRUS RDZING ZHES BYA BA

BZHUGS SO, , (27) 5

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I THUGS KYI SRAS GCIG PUR GYUR PA
SGRA TSAD PA RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL NI, GTZANG NAG MO PHU'I

DGA' LDAN DGON PA'I NYE 'GRAM DU, YUM SKU ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN GYI BTZUN MO'I ZHAL TA MA JO MO LO NYER GSUM LON PA ZHIG

DANG, YAB SGOM CHEN PA SMON LAM 'PHEL ZHES PA'I BLA RGAN ZHIG
YIN PAR GRAGS PA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU, RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SA PHO

RTA'I LO (1318) ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCU NYIN PAR SKU BLTAMS,

ZHVA LUR DPON MO NAS ZHAL TA MAR BU SKYES YOD PA GSAN NAS ZAS
GOS SOGS YO BYAD BZANG PO YANG YANG GNANG, DGUNG

LO GSUM BZHES PA NA, MES PO BLA MAS GU RU DRAG PO DANG, RTA
MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I DBANG SOGS DANG LUNG YANG MANG PO

GNANG, KHRO PHU BLA MA YANG RTZE BA DER PHEBS PA MJAL ZHING, DGE
BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS, DGUNG LO LNGA PAR MES PO BLA MA'I

MDUN NAS 'JIGS BYED RVA LUGS KYI DBANG SOGS DBANG LUNG MANG PO
ZHUS, DE NAS BZUNG PHAL CHE BA MES PO'I ZLA LA BZHUGS TE,

YI GE 'BRI KLOG SBYONG BA'I DBU TSUGS, RING PO MA 'GOR BAR 'BRI
KLOG THOGS MED GYUR CING, LANYDZA DANG WARTU YANG 'BRI SHES

PAR GYUR, SKABS DER YUM LHA SAR MJAL SKOR DU 'GRO BA'I ZOL GYIS,
RONG AE DMAR DU BYIS PA'I YAB YIN PAR GRAGS PA'I

SLOB DPON SMON LAM 'PHEL MJAL BAR PHYIN, BU SKYES PA'I GNAS TSUL
ZHUS PAS, SLOB DPON SHIN TU THUGS DGYES PA CHEN PO

MDZAD, YUM YAR BYON NAS YUN RING MA SONG BAR SLOB DPON SMON LAM
'PHEL SKU GSHEGS, KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN BZHES PA

YUM LO SUM CU SO GCIG LON PA NA MA YUM DRIN CAN NAD KYIS GZIR,
YUN MI RING BAR MA YUM 'DAS, KHONG DGUNG GRANGS

BDUN PA NAS DVA PHRUG TU LUS, MES PO BLA MAS BSKYANG DGOS BSAM
YANG ZHVA LU'I DPON MO DBANG CHE BAS KHONG GIS BDAG TU

BZUNG, DPON MOS BU RDZI ZHIG BSKOS TE GSO SKYONG MDZAD, SBYOR
KLOG RNAMS MU MTHUD NAS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR BU

STON RIN CHEN GRUB KYIS MKHAN PO MDZAD, DGE BSHES DAR MA BYANG
CHUB KYIS SLOB DPON MDZAD THOG DGE 'DUN BCU PHRAG

PHYED GSUM GYI DBUS SU, DPAL ZHVA LU'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU RAB
BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR BLANGS, MTSAN RIN

@063 CHEN RNAM RGYAL ZHES BTAGS SO, ,SKABS DER SKU ZHANG GRAGS
PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG BTZUN MO GNYIS THUGS CUNG MA MTHUN PAR BRTEN

BTZUN MO DBUS SU PHEBS, SLOB DPON DAR BYANG PA LA MGO 'DON BCUG
STE, PHAR PHYIN THUGS SBYONG GI DBU BTZUGS, DGUNG

LO BCU BZHIR PHEBS PA NA PHAR PHYIN THUGS SBYONG LEGS PAR GRUB,
ZHVA LU DANG SNAR THANG GNYIS SU GRVA SKOR MDZAD, DGUNG NA

GZHON LA SHES RAB CHE BAS KUN GYIS BSTOD, DE NAS NYI KHRI SNANG
BA, BRGYAD STONG 'GREL PA, SA SDE LNGA SOGS RGYA 'GREL RNAMS

SBYANGS, RJE BU STON RIN PO CHE'I MDUN NAS, SMON 'JUG BYANG CHUB
KYI SEMS SDOM BLANGS, TSAD MA RNAM NGES, RIGS THIGS,

RNAM 'GREL SOGS LA GZIGS RTOG MDZAD, KUN MKHYEN BU STON MDUN NAS
SGRA TZAN DRA PA'I SA RIS BCAS LEGS PAR SBYANGS,

SNYAN NGAG KYANG GSAN, DE'I DUS SU RGYA GAR NUB PHYOGS NAS PAndI
TA SU MA KIRTI ZHES PA'I MKHAS DBANG ZHIG SOG PO GONG MA THO GAN

NAS RGYA NAG TU GDAN DRANGS PA, GTZANG TSONG 'DUS SU PHEBS,
KHONG BU STON RIN PO CHE'I SKU TSAB MDZAD NAS PAndI TA MJAL BAR

TSONG 'DUS SU BYON, PAndI TA DER GSANG SNGAGS SKOR DANG SGRA,
'DUL BA'I SKOR BCAS KYI DKA' GNAD MANG PO'I DRI BA ZHUS,

DOGS PA MANG PO BSAL, PAndI TA ZHVA LUR PHEBS MA THUB KYANG,
SGRA TSAD PAS DRIS LAN RNAMS BU STON LA ZHUS PAS HA CANG THUGS

DGYES DGYES MDZAD, PAndI TA DES BOD KYI MA H'A PAndI TA BU STON
LO TZ'A DANG 'JAL 'PHRAD MA THUB PA 'DI SHIN TU SEMS PHAM PO
BYUNG

GSUNGS SHING, 'PHRIN YIG BSTOD PA DANG BCAS PA ZHIG DANG, DUS
'KHOR GYI BUM RDZAS CHA TSANG ZHIG BSKUR BA BU STON PHYAG TU

PHUL, 'PHRIN YIG 'DI LO TZ'A BAS BSGYUR NAS ZHVA LU'I BSTAN
'GYUR KHROD DU BZHUGS BCUG 'DUG DE NAS YUN MI RING BAR ZHVA

LU'I DGON DU MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB KYIS MKHAN
PO MDZAD, DGE BSHES SKYABS MCHOG DPAL GYIS LAS SLOB,

DGE BSHES DAR MA BYANG CHUB KYIS GSANG STON, DGE BSHES BZANG PO
DPAL BAS GROGS DAN, DE MIN DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN

CHEN PO RGYAL THANG PA DANG, DGE BSHES CHEN PO DHARMA SHRI RNAMS
GTZOR BYAS, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG GSUM 'DZOM PA'I DGE 'DUN

NYER LNGA'I DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA
YANG DAG PAR MNOS, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA, ME TOG PHRENG RGYUD, SO

SOR THAR PA'I MDO SOGS RGYA GZHUNG DANG, BU STON CHOS RJE'I 'DUL
BA'I SKOR GYI YIG CHA TSANG MA LEGS PAR GSAN SBYONG MDZAD

CING, SDOM PA MIG 'BRAS LTAR BSRUNGS, TSE GCIG LUS GCIG LA SANGS
RGYA BAR BYED PA'I RDO RJE THEG PA'I LAM LA 'JUG PAR

BYED PA LA, BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB KYI MDUN NAS DPAL GSANG BA
'DUS PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU DBANG BZHI YONGS

SU RDZOGS PAR ZHUS NAS, RIG PA 'DZIN PA GSANG SNGAGS KYI SDOM PA
MNOS, RGYUD SDE BZHIS BSDUS PA'I GSANG SNGAGS LA MKHAS

PA'I PHUL DU PHYIN, MNGON PA KUN LAS BTUS PA MKHYEN RAB DBANG
PHYUG GI 'GREL PA'I STENG NAS GSAN SBYONG MDZAD CING RGYA 'GREL

RNAMS KYANG GSAN, MNGON PA MDZOD ZHOR GZIGS MDZAD, ZHI BA LHA'I
SPYOD 'JUG SLOB DPON KLU SGRUB KYI RTZA BA SHES RAB

SOGS RIGS TSOGS LNGA DANG, DPAL LDAN ZLA BA'I DBU MA 'JUG PA
SOGS DBU MA'I SKOR RNAMS LA GZIGS RTOG RGYA CHER MDZAD,

GZHUNG 'DI DAG PHAL CHER MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG GI DRUNG DU
GSAN, GZHAN YANG SKYABS MCHOG DPAL, SLOB DPON DAR MA

BYANG CHUB, GRUB THOB SGO MO BA SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN
PO DU MA'I DRUNG NAS, RI CHOS SKOR DANG PHYAG CHEN SKOR, SMAN

GYI RGYUD BZHI GSAN ZHING PHYI MA RGYUD LA LAG KHRID KYANG
MDZAD, MKHAN CHEN SANGS RGYAS DPAL GYI MDUN NAS, BKA' GDAMS KYI

CHOS TSAN MANG PO GSAN, BLA MA MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG GI ZHAL TA
MDZAD NAS, THIG TSAD SOGS BZO'I SKOR SBYANGS TE RIG PA'I

GNAS KUN THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD, GDANGS DBYANGS ROL TSIGS, CHO
GA PHYAG LEN, GAR DANG BCAS PA LEGS PAR

BSLABS NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI BSHAD PA DANG LAG LEN TSANG MAR THOGS
PA MED PAR GYUR, DGUNG GRANGS SUM CU PAR BLA MA MKHYEN

RAB DBANG PHYUG GI ZHABS PHYIR DBUS SU BYON, SNYE THANG DANG
BSAM YAS SOGS SU PHEBS, YUN MI RING BAR YAR BYON NAS SLOB

DPON CHEN PO DAR MA BYANG CHUB KYI GO SAR BZHUGS TE MDO SNGAGS
KYI DAM CHOS TSANG MA BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I YIG CHA'I
STENG

NAS 'CHAD CING, RAB BYUNG DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SLOB DPON DANG
GROGS DAN PA, DUS 'KHOR DANG SGRA'I SA RIS SOGS MDZAD

PAR MA TSAD, MKHYEN RAB DBANG PHYUG GI GSUNG RTZOM 'GA'I YI GE
PA'ANG MDZAD DO, ,

KHONG DGUNG LO SO DGU BZHES PA'I DUS SU, BU STON THAMS CAD
MKHYEN PAS SKU ZHANG PAS GTZOS ZHVA LU PA'I SER SKYA GROS DBANG

PA TSANG MA 'DZOMS PA'I DBUS SU ``NGA YANG NA SO RGAS, GDAN SA
YANG LO SUM CU SO BDUN GYI BAR BZUNG, DA GZHAN GYI MGO TA

YANG MI NUS, RANG YANG 'CHI CHOS RE SGRUBS RAN 'DUG DA LTA NGA
RANG YOD DUS NAS GDAN SA PA ZHIG BSKOS NA RJES SU RTZOD

GZHI CHUNG BAS, 'OS 'THUS GYIS'' GSUNGS, DE NAS SER SKYA GROS LA
DBANG BA RNAMS KYIS BLA MA'I BZHED PA DANG BSTUN NAS,

RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME PHO SPREL LO (1356) ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I
TSES LNGA'I SNGA DROR SGRA TSAD PA RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL ZHVA LU'I
GDAN SAR

BKOD, BU STON RIN PO CHES THUGS DGYES PA CHEN POS BKRA SHIS
BRJOD CING ME TOG GTOR, YON MCHOD KUN LA CHOS 'JIG

@064 RTEN GNYIS KYI BKA' YIG ZHIB CHA GNANG, SGRA TSAD PAR BKA'
BSLAB ZHAL TA LEGS PAR GNANG, DE NAS BU STON RIN PO CHE RI

PHUG TU BZHUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN KHO NAS SKU TSE 'DA' BAR MDZAD,
ZHVA LU'I BYA BA YONGS RDZOGS SGRA TSAD PA GCIG PO'I PHRAG PAR

BABS SO, ,

DE NAS BLA MA'I BKA' BZHIN BU STON RIN PO CHE DGONGS PA MA
RDZOGS BAR DBANG BSKUR GTAN NAS MA MDZAD CING, MDO

SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG 'CHAD NYAN DANG DGON PA'I SGRIG LAM DANG RTEN
BZHENGS SOGS KYI 'GAN KHUR BZHES, BU STON GYIS RANG NYID KYI

ZHAL TA BA DGE SLONG BSOD NAMS GRUB SGRA TSAD PA'I NYE GNAS SU
BSKOS, LO GCIG LHAG RING NYE GNAS MDZAD, BLA MA BSOD

NAMS RGYAL MTSAN PAS BU STON YAB SRAS 'BRAS YUL DU GDAN DRANGS,
DPON SLOB SUM CU TZAM BYAS TE 'BRAS YUL DU PHEBS,

BU STON RIN PO CHES DUS 'KHOR DANG GSANG 'DUS RIGS LNGA'I KHRID
SOGS MDZAD, KHONG GIS BLA MA'I ZHABS PHYI PA BSHES GNYEN NYI

SHU SKOR LA 'DUL BA RGYAS PA ZHIG GSUNGS, DER ZLA BA GSUM TZAM
'GOR RJES, BLA MA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN PA DBUS SU BYON,

KHONG DPON SLOB SKU 'KHOR BCAS RI PHUG TU PHEBS, LO DGU LHAG
RING BU STON RIN PO CHES DBANG BSKUR SOGS GTZO BOR MDZAD

CING, SGRA TSAD PAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG RNAMS SNGAR SROL LTAR
'CHAD NYAN MDZAD DE BLA SLOB THUGS SNANG GSHIN PO'I NGANG
BZHUGS,

SGRA TSAD PA GDAN SAR BZHUGS NAS LO BCU SONG BA DGUNG LO ZHE DGU
LA PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG GI LOR

(1364) BU STON RIN PO CHE DGONGS PA RDZOGS PAR BRTEN, KHONG
THUGS SKYO BA TSAD MED NGANG NAS, GDUNG 'BUL DGONGS

RDZOGS BCAS KYI BYA BA MTHAR PHYIN BSGRUBS, BLA MA BZHUGS DUS
LTAR MDO SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN DANG, DBANG BSKUR KHRID LUNG

SOGS MDZAD CING, SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN MANG PO BZHENGS, KHYAD PAR
BU STON GYI GSUNG 'BUM TSANG MA GCIG TU BSDUS TE

BKA' 'BUM PO TI BCU GSUM GZAB BRIS 'BRIR BCUG DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN MKHAS PA MANG PO GDAN DRANGS NAS ZHU DAG

MDZAD, SKU ZHABS RANG NYID KYIS RAB TU GNAS PA LEGS PAR MDZAD
RJES, BU STON RIN PO CHE'I BZHUGS GNAS RI PHUG GI

GZIM KHANG DU BZHUGS SU GSOL,

SNOD LDAN GYI SLOB MA NI, SA SKYA 'KHON GYI GDUNG RGYUD BLA CHEN
BZHI THOG PAS THOG DRANGS G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL,

SLOB DPON BYAMS CHOS PA, RED MDA' BA GZHON NU BLO GROS, TZONG
KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA, DBUS PA BLO GSAL, SA

BZANG 'PHAGS PA, STAG TSANG PA SKYABS MCHOG DPAL BZANG, KARMA
DKON MCHOG GZHON NU, MKHAN CHEN GRAGS RGYAL BA,

TSOGS PA SDE BZHI'I MKHAN PO LA SOGS PA MDOR NA SKABS DER GTZANG
DANG, DBUS, MDO STOD SMAD KUN TU GRUB MTHA' RIS

MED KYI MKHAS DBANG PHAL MO CHER, GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD SDE SO SO'I
DBANG DANG LUNG MAN NGAG SOGS CHOS RJE BU STON NAS BRGYUD PA

RNAMS SLOB MA RANG RANG GI 'DOD PA LTAR BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL
DU GNANG,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BZHI BZHES PA'I DUS SU SKU KHAMS MNYEL BAR
BRTEN, KHONG GIS ``NGA RANG YOD RING LA ZHVA LU'I YON

MCHOD RNAMS GROS BYAS NAS GDAN SA PA ZHIG BSKOS NA BSTAN PA LA
PHAN ZHING, ZHVA LU RANG LA'ANG PHAN PA CHEN PO YOD KYANG DON

THOG TU KHEL MA SONG, DA NI NA SO RGAS SHING MIG KYANG MI GSAL''
ZHES GSUNGS PAR BLTAS NA SKU LUS NYAMS ZHAN DU SONG BAR

GSAL YANG BSTAN PA DANG 'GRO BA'I DON LA DGONGS NAS, DA DUNG MU
MTHUD LO DRUG LHAG GI BAR 'CHAD NYAN DANG DBANG BSKUR

LUNG KHRID MA CHAD PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON GCIG BZHES
PA'I DBYAR CHOS MJUG BSDU BA'I DUS SU, SA BZANG PA'I

BLA MA 'PHAGS PA, DBUS PA BLA MA BLO GSAL, SNAR THANG PA SLOB
DPON RGYAL MTSAN GRAGS, LO TZ'A BA DON BZANG SOGS DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN NYIS BRGYA LHAG LA, RDO RJE DBYINGS 'GREL LUGS
KYI DBANG, DE NYID BSDUS PA SOGS KYI LUNG, ZHI BYED RGYUD

PHYI MA'I SKOR RNAMS MA LUS PA GNANG NAS, ``'O DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN CHEN PO RNAMS LA CHOS BSHAD PA'I THA MA DE TZAM YIN PA

'DRA'' GSUNGS NAS 'CHAD NYAN GYI MJUG BSDUS, MI RING BAR RI PHUG
TU BYON NAS BZHUGS, STON CHOS KYANG MA GSUNGS,

KHONG GIS SNGA TZAM NAS RANG NYID KYI TSAB TU GDAN SA PA ZHIG
SKOS SHOG CES YANG YANG GSUNGS KYANG, ZHVA LU'I 'GO PA RNAMS
'DOD

TSUL MI GCIG PA'I DBANG GIS DON THOG MA KHEL BAR LUS, ZLA BA DGU
PA'I TSES 'GO TZAM NAS SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS, KHYAD PAR

TSES NYI SHU BRGYAD KYI NYIN NAS SKU SNYUNG BA'I TSUL MDZAD DE
BUG SGO BRTZIGS TE MTSAMS SHIN TU DAM POR BCAD, BTZUN CHUNG BSOD

NAMS GRUB DANG, DPAL BZANG, SH'AKYA DPAL GSUM KHO NA NYE SKOR LA
SDOD DU BCUG RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA PHO 'BRUG LO'I

(1388) ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES GNYIS NYIN PAR MTSAMS GROL NAS,
SH'AKYA DPAL GYIS PHYAG LA BZUNG ZHING BSKYOR TE GZIMS CHUNG

DU BYON, BZHUGS GDAN DU BZHUGS NAS PHYAG GNYIS THAL MO SBYAR,
SPYAN NAM MKHA' LA GZIGS SHING, ``CHOS RJE THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHE LA SKYABS SU MCHI'' GSUNGS NAS
SKU'I BKOD PA CHOS DBYINGS SU BSDUS SO, ,

@065 KHONG GI GSUNG CHOS KYI RNAM GRANGS NI, BU STON RNAM THAR
