@068 LAS GTZANG GI YUL GRU LHO PHYOGS DPAL GYI RI BO'I NYE
'GRAM, LAG PA GONG ZHES PA'I RI PHRAN ZHIG GI NYE LOGS, DBYIG GU
ZHES

PA'I SAR 'BROG PA'I SBRA KHYIM ZHIG TU RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME
PHO 'BRUG GI LO (1376) STON 'BRU BCUD YONGS SU SMIN PA'I DUS SU
SKU

BLTAMS SO, ,

YAB NI ZHA MA LO TZ'A BA SENG GE RGYAL PO SOGS MKHAS GRUB SHA
STAG BYON PA'I RUS LAS BYUNG BA, BZO DANG GSO BA, RTZIS DANG

SNYAN NGAG SOGS RIG PA'I GNAS KUN LA THOGS PA MED PA'I MKHYEN
RAB DANG LDAN PA STON PA CHOS DBYINGS RGYAL MTSAN ZHES PA DANG,

YUM NI RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG LO CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MO'I
GCUNG GI SRAS MO, BDAG NYID CHEN PO GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI
LCAM MO

BYANG CHUB SGRON ZHES BYA'O, ,YAB YUM DE GNYIS KYIS SRAS BLTAMS
MA THAG TU MTSAN MKHAN LA BSTAN PAS, BSNGAGS BRJOD DANG

BCAS G-YUNG DRUNG SANGS RGYAS SKYID CES BTAGS, GCES PAR BSKYANGS
NAS DGUNG GRANGS LNGAR PHEBS PA NA, MKHAS GRUB DU

MA'I BSTI GNAS GYAM BSAM GTAN GLING GI DGON PAR KLOG PA THOS
BSAM GYI BYA BAR ZHUGS, KLOG SBYONG LA THOGS PA MED PA'I SHES

RAB KYI RTZAL BRDOL BAS, HOR DKA' BZHI PA SENG GE RGYAL MTSAN
DANG, DGE BSHES SGRUB PA DPAL SOGS MKHAS DBANG MANG

POS BSTOD BSNGAGS KYI ME TOG LAN BRGYAR GTOR,

DGUNG LO BDUN PAR PHEBS PA NA, GYAM BSAM GTAN GLING GI DGON PAR
PHEBS, ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DRUNG DU

GTZUG PHUD PHUL TE RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA
BLANGS, MTSAN SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN GSOL, SKABS DER BSTAN

PA'I SBYIN BDAG SI TU CHOS KYI RIN CHEN GYIS KHONG DBON ZHANG
GNYIS SHEL DKAR GYI KHAB TU GDAN DRANGS, BYIS PAR NYAMS SAD

PA'I SLAD DU SI TU PAS DBON PO SGOM ZHIG MDZOD DANG ZHES BSKUL
BA NA, DBON POS RAS RKYANG GI CHOS GOS SRAB PO GCIG PU LAS

MA BSNAMS PAR ZHABS DKYIL MO DKRUNGS BCAS TE BSAM GTAN LA MNYAM
PAR BZHAG PAS, DGUN GYI GRANG NGAR SHIN TU CHE BA

LA'ANG JI MI SNYAM PAR RAB TU ZHI BA'I SPYOD PA DES, SI TU PA HA
LAS SHING DER GNAS PA'I SKYE BO KUN DAD PA'I SPU LONG G-YO, DE

NAS DPAL AE'I DGON PAR BYON NAS, ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
DRUNG NAS DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS, MTSAN CHOS KYI RGYAL

MTSAN ZHES PA GNANG, CHOS SDE DE NYID DU TSAD MA SMRA BA LA ZLA
DANG BRAL BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHOS KYI RDO RJE SLOB DPON DU BSTEN
NAS,

TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL SBYONG BA'I DBU BTZUGS, DPANG t'IKA CHEN MO
DANG, LO CHEN GRAGS PA'I t'IKA CHEN YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR

THUGS SU CHUD CING, SLOB DPON GYI ZHAL LAS THOS PA'I MKHAS DBANG
GZHAN DAG GI LEGS BSHAD DAG GIS KYANG MGRIN PA BRGYAN

PAR MDZAD, YUN MI RING BAR TSAD MA'I RIG PA MTHAR PHYIN PAR
GYUR,

DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR DPAL SA SKYA'I GDAN SA CHEN POR BYON NAS
TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL GYI GRVA SKOR MDZAD, RIGS SMRA MANG

PO'I YID DBANG 'PHROG CING, SNYAN GRAGS KYI BA DAN KUN TU G-YO,
SHES RAB KYI LHA LA GSOL BA BTAB PAS, LHA MO DBYANGS

CAN MAS RJES SU BZUNG, MTSAN DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA ZHES GRAGS, KHA
BA'I LJONGS KYI SNYAN DNGAGS SMRA BA KUN GYI RTZER SON,

THUB PA'I DBANG PO LA MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS KYI SGO NAS BSTOD PA,
'JAM DBYANGS BSTOD PA BRGYA PA, GZHON NU NOR BZANG GI

RTOGS BRJOD SOGS SNYAN DNGAGS KYI BSTAN BCOS MANG PO BRTZAMS,
DGUNG NA GZHON DUS YIN YANG RNAM PAR G-YENG BA'I GO

SKABS NAM YANG MED PAR RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB MCHIS SO COG GI
DGONGS PA MA LUS THUGS SU CHUD PA'I THUGS MDUN RGYUN DU

BCANGS TE, DPAL AE'I CHOS SDER DPANG LO CHEN PO'I GZIM KHANG DU
SKU MTSAMS DAM PAR BCAD, RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB

MTHA' DAG GI DKA' BA'I GNAD KUN LA DPYAD PA ZHIB TU MDZAD, THOG
MAR DBU MA'I GZHUNG LUGS YONGS KYI GTZO BO, SLOB

DPON KLU SGRUB KYI GSUNG DBU MA RTZA BA SHES RAB KYI DBU LTEBS
GNYIS LA NYIN ZHAG BRGYAD KYI BAR DU GZIGS ZHIB MDZAD, DE NAS

RIM GYIS GZHUNG CHA TSANG YUN RING BAR GZIGS PAS, DPAL MGON
'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB KYI DGONGS PA ZAB MO, RGYAL BA RDZOGS

PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYI BZHED PA MA NOR BA KHONG DU CHUD, SLOB DPON
KLU SGRUB KYI DGONGS 'GREL MKHAN PO SANGS RGYAS BSKYANGS DANG,

DPAL LDAN ZLA BA GRAGS PA RJES 'BRANGS DANG BCAS PA'I DBU MA
THAL 'GYUR BA'I SLOB DPON SO SO'I BSTAN BCOS RNAMS DANG,

SLOB DPON LEGS LDAN 'BYED DANG, YE SHES SNYING PO SOGS RANG
RGYUD PA'I SLOB DPON RJES 'BRANGS DANG BCAS PA'I 'GREL PA MA

LUS PAR GZIGS SHING KHONG DU CHUD, GZHAN YANG LHA DBANG BLO,
SH'AKYA BLO, CHOS MCHOG SOGS KYI 'GREL BA RNAMS KYANG ZHIB TU

GZIGS TE, TSAD MA'I GZHUNG LUGS MTHA' DAG LA ZHIB DPYOD MDZAD,
RGYA BOD KYI MKHAS DBANG RNAMS KYI DGONGS PA MI 'DRA

BA RE RE BZHIN ZHIB BSDUR DBYE ZHIB MDZAD CING, LTA BA RIS SU
MIt 'DZIN PAR, 'JIGS BRAL DBU MA'I GDENG THOB, TSAD

MA'I BSTAN BCOS KUN LA SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN, RIG PAR BYA BA'I
GNAS MTHA' DAG LA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA TSAD

MED SKYES TE, DBUS PHYOGS KYI RTZE THANG DANG GSANG PHU SOGS
GDAN SA CHEN PO RNAMS SU GRVA SKOR LA 'GRO BA'I 'DUN PA DRAG PO

@069 'KHRUNGS, BLA MA LO CHEN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI MDUN DU
DBUS PHYOGS SU GZHUNG BCU GSUM GYI GRVA SKOR LA 'GRO RGYU YIN
PAS

GNANG BA STZAL DU GSOL ZHUS, BLA MAS THUGS DOGS DANG BCAS DRI BA
MDZAD RGYUR KHYOD KYIS GZHUNG BCU GSUM GYI GRVA SKOR BYED PA

LA, DBU PHAR TSAD MA SOGS KYI RGYA BOD KYI DGONGS 'GREL GANG
DANG GANG LA BLTAS PA YIN GSUNGS, KHONG GIS BLA MA LA GUS PA

DANG BCAS TE GSOL BA, BRAG CA LTAR GZHAN ZER KHO NA ZLOS PAR
BYED PA DANG, RGYA BOD KYI 'GREL BA DAG KHA TON DU 'DON PAR

BYED PA NI SNYING PO MED PAR MTHONG STE, RGYA BOD KYI GZHUNG SO
SO'I RTZOM PA PO RNAMS KYI DGONGS PA 'DI DANG 'DI 'DRA CES BSHAD

CING, GZHUNG SHIN TU PHRA BA RNAMS LA YANG RNAM GRANGS DU MAR
BSHAD DE, DON GYI GNAD SHIN TU DKA' BA'I GRUB MTHA' THUN

MONG DANG THUN MONG MIN PA'I GNAD RNAMS KYANG SHIN TU GSAL BAR
PHYE NAS RANG STOBS KHO NAS BSHAD PA RGYAS PAR ZHUS PA DANG,

GANGS RI'I KHROD KYI MKHAS PA DAG GIS GSUNGS TSUL NOR BA DANG MA
NOR BA'I KHYAD PAR 'DI DANG 'DI'O ZHES RNAM PAR PHYE STE ZHUS

PAS, ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS THUGS DGYES PA CHEN POS,
BOD DU SNGAR MA GRAGS PA'I LEGS BSHAD PHUL BYUNG 'DI DAG

DBUS GTZANG GI MKHAS DBANG RNAMS KYI SNYAN LAM DU SONG NA CI MA
RUNG DGONGS NAS, DBUS SU GRVA SKOR LA 'GRO CHOG PA'I GNANG BA

BSTZAL TO, ,DE NAS DPAL AE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG CHEN POR YAB SRAS
GNYIS PO ZHAG BDUN GYI BAR SKU MTSAMS BCAD DE, RGYA

BOD KYI GZHUNG LUGS YONGS LA DRI BA DRIS LAN MANG DU BYAS MTHAR,
GZHON NU NYID SHEL DKAR DU PHEBS TE ZLA BA GSUM GYI BAR

DPE MTSAMS BZHUGS, SLAR YANG RGYA GZHUNG RNAMS LA ZHIB TU GZIGS,
DE NAS GYAM BSAM GTAN GLING DU ZLA BA BDUN GYI BAR

DPE MTSAMS BCAD, DE NAS DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR SLOB MA BCO LNGA
TZAM GYI 'KHOR DANG BCAS DBUS KYI PHYOGS SU GRVA SKOR LA

PHEBS, DE DUS KHONG GI MTSAN GZHUNG LUGS 'BUM PHRAG BRGYA PA
ZHES GRAGS, (<<RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR RGYA MTSO>> BRIS MAR DGUNG

LO NYI SHU DBUS SU GRVA SKOR LA PHEBS PAR BSHAD) DBUS SU PHEBS
PA'I LAM GYI RIM PA RNAMS SU NYIN MO DPYOD LDAN GYI MKHAS PA

DAG LA 'BEL BA'I BKA' MCHID MDZAD CING, GANG DANG GANG DU PHEBS
PA DE DANG DER NYAMS 'GYUR SNA TSOGS LDAN PA'I SNYAN

DNGAGS BRIS NAS ME LONG MA'I BRJOD BYA MTHA' DAG GSAL BAR STON
PA'I BSTAN BCOS YID KYI SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA BRTZAMS, DE

NAS THOG MAR DPAL RTZE THANG GI CHOS GRVA CHEN POR PHEBS PAR NYE
BA NA, DPANG LO CHEN PO'I YANG DBON, BYIS PA'I DUS NAS

RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB MTHA' DAG LA RANG STOBS KYIS RNAM PAR DPYAD
PA'I SPOBS PA THOGS PA MED PA ZHIG GRVA SKOR LA LHAGS SO ZHES

PA'I SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB, DER 'DUS SDE RGYA MTSO LTA BUS BSU
BA DANG BCAS RTZE THANG GI GDAN SA CHEN POR PHEBS, DE'I SANG

NYIN PAR GDAN SA PA CHEN PO BYANG CHUB RDO RJES THOG DRANGS, DGE
BA'I BSHES GNYEN STONG PHRAG MANG PO 'DUS PA'I DBUS SU,

BAG TSA BA DANG ZHUM PA MED PAR RIG PA'I GNAS KUN LA BSHAD PA
MDZAD PA'I DBU BTZUGS, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL DANG, PHAR

PHYIN, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA, MNGON PA KUN LAS BTUS SOGS NAS RIG GTER
DANG DBU MA RGYAN GNYIS BCAS GZHUNG POD BCO

LNGA'I BSHAD PA MDZAD, RTZE THANG GI GDAN SA PAS GTZOS DGE BA'I
BSHES GNYEN KUN GYIS DGYES PA CHEN POS BSNGAGS BRJOD

MDZAD, DE NAS YAR KLUNGS KYI GNAS KHYAD 'PHAGS KHRA 'BRUG DANG
DGON THANG 'BUM MO CHE SOGS SU GNAS MJAL MDZAD CING,

GNAS BSTOD KYI TSIGS SU BCAD PA SNYAN NGAG GI LAM NAS DRANGS PA
PHUL, GDAN SA THEL DU YANG MJAL BAR PHEBS, GDAN SA

CHEN PO DPAL LDAN GSANG PHU RU 'BYOR NYE BA NA, SLOB DPON KONG
PO DPON SLOB LNGA BCU LHAG GIS GSANG LA'I RTZE MO NAS SPOS PHOR

GYIS BSUS TE SPYAN DRANGS, DE'I TSE GANGS RI'I KHROD KYI RIGS
SMRA'I GTZUG RGYAN G-YAG MI PHAM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DPON SLOB
RNAMS

KYANG SNGAR NAS GSANG PHUR PHEBS ZIN PA DANG KHEL, G-YAG GIS
GSANG PHU'I GDAN SA PA GNYIS DANG, KHONG DPON SLOB SPYAN DRANGS

NAS GSOL JA ZHIG PHUL BA'I SKABS SU, DA NI SLOB DPON DPON PO PA
'DI, DGUNG GRANGS DANG PO TI GRANGS MNYAM ZER

CHOG PA 'DUG NGED DPAL LDAN SA SKYA LA DGE BSHES MKHAS PA 'DI
'DRA YONG BA NI, SHIN TU NGO MTSAR RO ZHES BSNGAGS PAR

MDZAD CING, TSAD MA RIGS GTER GYI SKOR LA DRI BA DRIS LAN MANG
DU MDZAD, RANG RIG LA YUL YOD MED DANG, KA BUM RTAG

PA YIN MIN SOGS LA RTZOD PA MDZAD, PHYOGS RGYAL PAS THAL BA LDOG
TU MED PA 'PHANGS PAS, GSANG PHU'I DGE BA'I BSHES

GNYEN TSANG MA HA LAS PAR GYUR, DE NAS BDE BA CAN DANG CHOS
'KHOR GLING GI CHOS SDE RNAMS SU BYON NAS BSHAD PA RGYA CHER
MDZAD,

GZHUNG BCU PHRAG GI GRVA SKOR BYED PA'I SROL THOG MAR BTZUGS,
RIM GYIS BTEG 'PHAN YUL BRGYUD STAG LUNG THANG DU BYON, STAG

LUNG BKRA SHIS DPAL BRTZEGS MJAL, NA RO CHOS DRUG DANG DO HA
SKOR GSUM SOGS GDAMS NGAG KHYAD PAR CAN MANG PO ZHUS,

DER STAG LUNG LO TZ'A BA SH'AKYA BZANG POS KHONG NYID KYI GZIM
SPYIL DU GDAN DRANGS, LO TZ'A BA SKU NA SHIN TU SMIN YANG,
BZHUGS

GDAN LAS BZHENGS TE, G-YAS G-YON DU GZHAN GYIS BSKYOR BAR BRTEN
NAS BSU BA'I BKOD PA MDZAD, BU STON RIN PO CHE'I

DNGOS SLOB LO TZ'A BA DE'I SPYAN SNGAR RNAM SRAS KYI RJES GNANG
SOGS ZHUS PAR MA TSAD, LEGS BSHAD KYI 'BREL MCHID MANG DU MDZAD,

@070 SKABS DE DAG TU BAR BAR RNAMS SU SNYAN DNGAGS KYI BSTAN
BCOS PADMA DKAR PO'I CHUN PO, DON RGYAN GSAL BA'I ME LONG BCAS

RGYA BOD DU SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB PA RNAMS BRTZAMS, DE NAS DBUS
KYI GRVA SKOR MTHAR PHYIN NAS YAR BTEG DPAL SHEL DKAR

GYI CHOS GRVA CHEN POR ZHANG GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MKHAN PO
MDZAD, RED MDA' BA GZHON NU BLO GROS KYIS LAS SLOB MDZAD, BLA

MA BSAM RIN PAS GSANG STE STON PA'I SLOB DPON MDZAD DE DGE 'DUN
GRANGS TSANG DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR

MNOS, 'GRO BA LHA DANG BCAS PA'I MCHOD GNAS SU GYUR, ZHANG GRAGS
PA'I SPYAN SNGAR RGYA BOD KYI BSTAN BCOS SNGAR MA GSAN PA

MANG PO GSAN, LO CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MO'I SLOB MA SKAD GNYIS
SMRA BA NAM MKHA' BZANG PO DANG, LO TZ'A BA SHES RAB DPAL LAS

BRDA SPROD RIG PA'I GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO KA L'A PA DANG TZANDRA
PA CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA GSAN, RGYAL BA'I SRAS PO THOGS MED ZHABS

KYI SRAS KYI THU BO RGYA MA PA YON TAN 'OD LAS THEG PA CHEN PO'I
BLO SBYONG NYAMS KHRID RNAMS GSAN TE MDO SDE'I PHYOGS KYI BKA'
BSTAN

RAB 'BYAMS LA GSAN PA YONGS SU RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, RTZA BA'I BLA
MA LO CHEN GRAGS PA'I ZHAL BKOD LTAR, DPAL AE'I GDAN

SA CHEN POR SENG GE'I KHRIR MNGA' GSOL, MDO SDE RIG GNAS BCAD
PA'I 'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER MDZAD, MNGON PA BA CHEN PO

GZAD PA BLO RGYAM DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' CHEN PO GZHON NU
RGYAL MCHOG DMAR KHAM PA CHEN PO GRAGS PA BZANG PO SOGS

MKHAS DBANG MANG PO PHYOGS MTHA' DAG NAS DER 'DUS TE MCHOG GI
GSUNG RAB KYIS MGRIN PA 'GENGS PAR MDZAD, LO GSUM

RING BZHUGS TE, MNGON PA KUN BTUS, PHAR PHYIN, TSAD MA, BSTOD
TSOGS, 'DUL BA, DBU MA BCAS KYI GZHUNG

'GREL BCU PHRAG LHAG BRTZAMS, BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG TA'I SI TU
CHOS KYI RIN CHEN GYIS SPYAN DRANGS TE, SHEL DKAR GYI CHOS SDE

CHEN PO'I GDAN KHRI PHUL, LO GCIG LHAG RING DKA' BCU PA BRGYAD
TZAM DANG DKA' BZHI PA DU MA, PHAR TSAD SMRA BA MANG PO SPEL,

MNGA' RIS SU LHA SRAS KHRI RGYAL BSOD NAMS LDES SPYAN DRANGS NAS
GUNG THANG GI GDAN SA PHUL, DAM PA'I CHOS KYI CHAR CHEN PHAB,

DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG DU SPEL, TA'I SI TU LHA BTZAN SKYABS
KYIS GSOL BA BTAB PA'I NGOR, RJE BTZUN DAM PA SANGS RGYAS

KYI GDAN SA DPAL BLA 'KHOR <GLANG SKOR> GYI SENG GE'I KHRIR
PHEBS TE, ZHI BYED KYI GLEGS BAM RNAMS LA THUGS DPYAD MDZAD
CING,

DKA' BZHI PA NAM MKHA' 'OD ZER MDUN ZHI BYED KYI CHOS MA LUS PA
ZHUS, GRUB CHEN DAM PA SANGS RGYAS KYI DGONGS PA DPYIS

PHYIN PAR THUGS SU CHUD, ZHI BYED KYI SKOR LA 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD
DE SLOB MA MANG PO SPEL, MDOR NA, BO DONG AE'I GDAN SA,

BLA 'KHOR RAM GLANG SKOR, GUNG THANG, SHEL DKAR, GYAM PHU RU
BCAS KYI GDAN KHRIR BZHUGS RING RGYA BOD KYI GZHUNG LUGS

TSANG MA LA DAD PA KHO NAS GZHAN ZER LAD ZLOS BYED PA MIN PAR
BLO GROS DANG SPOBS PA TSAD MED SGO NAS LEGS NYES BLANG DOR
MDZAD

DE BSHAD PA MDZAD, GZUR GNAS MKHAS DBANG KUN GYIS BSTOD BSNGAGS
MDZAD PA MA TSAD, DBUS GTZANG GI YON TAN LA

DON GNYER CAN TSANG MA KHONG GI BSHAD GRVAR 'DUS, MKHAS GRUB
GNYIS LDAN GYI SLOB BU GRANGS MED SPEL, BKA' BSTAN MANG

PO'I 'GREL BA BCU PHRAG MANG PO BRTZAMS TE SNGON CHAD MDUD RGYA
MA BKROL BA'I DKA' GNAD MANG PO THUB PA'I DGONGS LTAR BKRAL,

GSANG SNGAGS KYI SKOR LA GSAN BSAM MDZAD TSUL NI, SLOB DPON GTZO
BO MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GTZOS BLA MA'I

MCHED GROGS HOR DKA' BZHI PA SENGGE RGYAL MTSAN DANG, DE MIN SA
SKYA PA YAB SRAS, SA SKYA'I DBON BSOD NAMS YON TAN,

LAM 'BRAS PA BLO BZANG DKAR MO SOGS MKHAS GRUB KYI BLA MA RNAMS
BSTEN NAS, SA SKYA'I CHOS LAM 'BRAS DANG BCAS PA DANG,

BU STON NAS BRGYUD PA'I BKA' LUNG MAN NGAG YONGS RDZOGS GSAN, LO
CHEN NAM MKHA' BZANG PO, RGYA MA PA YON TAN 'OD

BCAS LA GZUNGS SNGAGS SKOR TSANG MA GSAN, MNYAM MED STAG PHU PA,
STAG LUNG THANG PA BKRA SHIS DPAL BRTZEGS BCAS LA

BKA' BRGYUD PA'I CHOS SKOR TSANG MA GSAN, GZHAN YANG TSANGS PA
DANG KHYAB 'JUG DBANG PHYUG GROG MKHAR BA, SER SKYA,

RKANG MIG 'UG PA'I BU SOGS MU STEGS PA'I GRUB MTHA' KUN LA MKHAS
PAR SBYANGS, MDOR NA RGYA BOD DU DAR SROL COG GI GRUB

MTHA' RIS MED LA DPYAD PA ZHIB TU MDZAD DE GANG LA'ANG CHAGS
THOGS MED PAR MDZAD,

RIG GNAS THUN MONG BA'I SKOR LA, THOG MAR RTA'I BANG RTZAL DANG,
SENG GE'I MCHONG RTZAL, GYAD KYI 'DZIN STANGS SOGS

LUS KYI BSLAB PAR BYA BA'I SGYU RTZAL SNA TSOGS SBYANGS, RGYA
GAR GYI YI GE DANG, BAL PO, MONG GOR SOGS MI RIGS GZHAN DAG

GI YI GE DANG BOD YIG 'BRU MA DBU CAN SOGS YIG RIGS MANG PO'I
KLOG 'BRI THOGS PA MED PAR MDZAD, RGYAN GYI BSTAN BCOS

<<ME LONG MA>> DANG, SNYAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS SLOB DPON DPA' BOS
MDZAD PA'I <<SKYES RABS SO BZHI PA>> DGE BA'I DBANG PO

SRAS DANG BCAS PAS BRTZAMS PA'I <<RTOGS BRJOD DPAG BSAM 'KHRI
SHING>> DPAL RDO RJE LHAS BRTZAMS PA'I <<'JIG RTEN

DBANG PHYUG GI BSTOD PA BRGYA PA>> NAG MO KHOL GYIS BRTZAMS PA'I
<<SPRIN GYI PHO NYA>> SOGS RGYA BOD KYI SNYAN NGAG GRAGS CHE BA
TSANG

MAR GZIGS TE GANGS RI'I KHROD KYI SNYAN NGAG SMRA BA KUN GYI
GTZUG RGYAN DU GYUR, RNAM RGYAL GRAGS PA BZANG POS BSKUL BA'I
NGOR

@071 SPRIN GYI PHO NYA LA MCHAN 'GREL YANG BRTZAMS, SDEB SBYOR
SKOR DMAR SER CAN DANG, RGYAL BA'I SDES BRTZAMS PA'I SDEB SBYOR
GYI

GZHUNG DANG, RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS ZHI BAS BRTZAMS PA'I <<SDEB
SBYOR RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS>> SLOB DPON RIN SHES DPAL

GYIS BRTZAMS PA'I <<SDEB SBYOR PHRENG BA'I BSTOD PA>> SOGS SDEB
SBYOR GYI GZHUNG LUGS MTHA' DAG GZIGS SHING KHONG DU CHUD, ZLOS

GAR DANG ROL MO'I BSTAN BCOS KYANG GANG NA JI YOD TSANG MA LA
THUGS DPYAD MDZAD DE <<DBYANGS CAN MGUL RGYAN>> DANG,

<<ROL RNYED MA'I ZLOS GAR>> SOGS GANGS CAN DU ZLA DANG BRAL BA'I
ZLOS GAR GYI BSTAN BCOS BRTZAMS, LUGS KYI BSTAN BCOS

SLOB DPON KLU SGRUB KYI RIN CHEN PHRENG BA SOGS NAS, NYI MA SBAS
PA DANG, BRAM ZE MCHOG SRED KYI BSTAN BCOS, BOD KYI SA SKYA

LEGS BSHAD SOGS RGYA BOD KYI BSTAN BCOS TSANG MAR ZHIB DPYAD
MDZAD NAS, LUGS KYI BSTAN BCOS KYANG MCHOG TU GYUR PA

BRTZAMS, GSO BA RIG PA LA MKHAS PA'I RTZER SON PAS, SMAN PA CHEN
PO CHAG DGE BSNYEN DANG GSO RIG SKOR 'BEL MCHID

MDZAD SKABS, CHAG LO CHEN PO HA LAS TE BSTOD BSNGAGS RGYA CHEN
MDZAD, SGRA RIG SMRA BA LA THOGS PA MED CING BRTAG PA SNA

TSOGS LA'ANG SHIN TU MKHAS, MDOR NA RGYA BOD KYI GZHUNG LUGS
TSANG MAR GZIGS PA MA TSAD, BSTAN BCOS NYE TSE BA MCHIS

DGU LA'ANG MKHYEN PA THOGS MED GYUR, MTSAN YANG 'BUM PHRAG BRGYA
PA ZHES GRAGS SO, SA KAR RNYING GSUM GYI MKHAS GRUB DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN PHAL CHE BAR BSTEN PAS, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS
MTHA' DAG LA MKHAS PA'I MTHAR SON, 'TSO BA NGAN NGON

LA BRTEN CING BSLAB SDOM MIG 'BRAS LTAR BSRUNGS, RGYA BOD KYI
SNGON BYON MKHAS DBANG DAG GI GSUNG RAB RNAMS KYANG, MA

BRTAG MA DPYAD PAR NGAG SKYOR LAD ZLOS KHO NA BYED PA'AM, YANG
NA GYA TSOM DU TSANG MAR ZUR ZA BYED PA DE DRA MIN PAR, TSIG

DON RE RE BZHIN ZHIB TU DPYAD DE, MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG DANG BCAS
PA LAS GZHAN DU GYUR PA RNAMS 'GOG PA NA, MI SHES SHES

RLOM BYED PA DANG, DON LA MI RTON TSIG LA RTON PA, RANG PHYOGS
MED PAR PHA ROL LA RGOL BA, GZHAN SUN 'BYIN KHO NA'I CHED

DU RTZOD PA SOGS CHAGS SDANG PHYOGS LTUNG GI RNAM PA RGYANG DU
BSRINGS TE, NOR BA'I CHA RNAMS BKAG CING, YANG DAG PA RNAMS

DANG LEN THOG GONG DU SPEL BA ZUNG 'BREL MDZAD NAS, MTHA' GNYIS
SU MI LTUNG BA'I DAM PA YA RABS KYI SPYOD PA KHO NA MDZAD,

SA SKYA'I MKHAN CHEN G-YAG PHRUG DANG THEG GSUM RNAM BZHAG DANG
YUM RGYAS 'BRING BSDUS BCAS KYI SKOR RTZOD PA DANG, NGAM RINGS

KYI RIGS PA SMRA BA BSOD NAMS SKYABS DANG RIG GTER SKOR GYI
RTZOD PA, DKA' BCU PA DGE LEGS DPAL BA DANG, BDEN

GNYIS RNAM BZHAG SKOR GYI RTZOD GLENG, RONG STON SHES BYA KUN
RIG DANG, DPAL LDAN ZLA BA GRAGS PA'I GSUNG NOR YOD MED

RTZOD PA, NGOR CHEN DANG RDO RJE SNYING PO'I RGYAN SOGS KYI
DBANG LUNG BOD 'DIR GNANG 'OS MIN SKOR GYI RTZOD PA SOGS DBUS
GTZANG

GI MKHAS CHEN RNAMS DANG GLENG MOL MDZAD PA TSANG MA BSTAN PA LA
BYI DOR KHO NA'I DON DU YIN PAS MTHAR RTZOD PA TSANG MA CHOS
PHYOGS

SU ZHI NAS KUN GYIS KHONG GI DGONGS PAR RJES SU YID RANGS DANG,
BSNGAGS BRJOD TSAD MED BYAS, KHONG NI BOD SNGA RABS KYI

MKHAS DBANG NANG NAS RTZOM CHOS MANG SHOS YIN LA, 'DZAM GLING
KHYON LA BSHAD NA'ANG RTZOM CHOS MANG SHOS KYI GRAS SHIG YIN,

GSUNG RAB RTZOM PA'I TSE, YI GE PA NYI SHU TZAM RE RANG RANG GI
GNAS MI 'CHOL BAR SO SOR GNAS BCUG THOG CHU BO 'BAB PA LTAR

RIG PA'I GNAS KUN RGYUN MI CHAD PAR BSHAD CING GSUNG RAB SNA
MANG PO ZHIG DUS GCIG LA MNYAM DU GRUB PAR MDZAD, KHONG GI 

GSUNG RAB POD CI TZAM YOD PA NI TSAD NGES CAN ZHIG SUS KYANG DE
SNGA BSHAD MED KYANG, GSUNG 'GA'I PAR BYANG NANG DU PO TI BRGYA

PHRAG DE SNYED KYI, ZER BA SOGS PO TI BRGYA PHRAG BRGAL BA YOD
PAR 'KHOD PA DANG, BOD KYI MKHAS PA GONG MA'I GSUNG RAB

'GAR MTSAN DANG DPE BYAD KYI GRANGS DANG MNYAM PA'I PO TI
BRTZAMS YOD PAR BSHAD PAR BLTAS NA POD BRGYA DANG BCU GNYIS SU

GYUR, KHYAD PAR DENG DUS SPYI LO 1981 LOR RGYA GAR RDI LI GSAR
PAR BSKRUN PA'I DKAR CHAG <<BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO'I DO

SHAL>> DU DENG SANG PHYI RGYAL DU PAR BSKRUN BYAS PA'I BO DONG
PAN CHEN GYI GSUNG PO TI CHIG BRGYA SO BDUN YOD PAR BSHAD, DKAR

CHAG DE NI BRJOD BYA'I SGO NAS SA BCAD KYI RNAM PA'I DKAR CHAG
CIG RED 'DUG MDOR NA BRTZAMS CHOS KHONG LAS MANG BA BOD NA

BYUNG MA MYONG BAR MKHAS DBANG TSANG MAS ZHAL GYIS BZHES, <<RNAM
THAR NGO MTSAR DGA' STON>> GYI LDEBS CHIG BRGYA RE DGU PA'I

YIG PHRENG DANG POR, GZHAN YANG NYID KYI RIN CHEN SMYUG GU'I
RTZES, ,MA BRIS MDO RGYUD BSTAN BCOS GANG ZHIG YOD, ,DE PHYIR
KHYOD

KYIS RTZOM PA GCIG PUS KYANG, ,THUB BSTAN DKAR PO NYID DU RAB TU
MDZAD, ,CES DANG, BYANG PA RNAM RGYAL GRAGS BZANG SOGS

MKHAS GRUB DU MAS, BOD LA SNGA PHYI BAR GSUM DU MKHAS GRUB MCHOG
TU GYUR PA GSUM BYON YOD DE SNGON GYI MKHAS GRUB SA PAn,

BAR GYI MKHAS GRUB BU STON, PHYIS KYI MKHAS GRUB BO DONG PHYOGS
LAS RNAM RGYAL YIN NO ZHES DANG, STON PA MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS

NAS DA BAR RGYAL BA'I GSUNG RAB RIG GNAS CHE PHRA MTHA' DAG
'CHAD NYAN MDZAD CING, 'GREL PA BRTZAMS PA 'DI 'DRA KHONG MA

GTOGS SU BYON MA MYONG BA YIN ZER, KHONG GIS SA KAR RNYING GSUM
GYI MKHAS GRUB TSANG MA SLOB DPON DU BSTEN YANG, GRUB

@072 MTHA' GZHAN DAG LA RGOL BA'I PHYOGS RIS GTAN NAS MED CING,
RGYA BOD KYI SNGAR YOD GZHUNG LUGS DAG KYANG DGAG SGRUB KYIS

'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA MA GTOGS, BZANG NA BZANG MTHAR 'DZIN PA
DANG, ZHAN NA ZHAN MTHAR 'DZIN PA'I MTHA' GNYIS SU

LHUNG BA'I LTA BA YE NAS MI 'DZIN, GSUNG RTZOM CHE PHRA TSANG MA
TSIG SNYAN ZHING 'JEBS PA DANG DON GSAL LA GO BDE BA THUN MONG
MA

YIN PA'I KHYAD CHOS LDAN PA SHA STAG RED, DE 'DRA SKU TSE HRIL
POR 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI BYA BAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DE,

DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON DRUG TU PHEBS PA, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I
LCAGS MO LUG GI LO (1451) ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES SUM CU'I

DGONG MOR BSAM SDINGS GZIM SPYIL GSANG SNGAGS BDE CHEN GLING DU
DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU BSDUS SO, ,DE NAS NYI MA BZHI

SONG BA ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES PA BZHI NYIN PAR, DBON BLA 'KHOR
GYI GDAN KHRI PA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS

DPA' RGYAL MTSAN DKON MCHOG RDO RJE'I RNAL 'BYOR MA CHOS KYI
SGRON ME BCAS KYIS SKU GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL MDZAD, GDUNG KHANG

NYI MA BDUN TZAM KHA BCAD DE BZHAG GDUNG KHANG KHA PHYE RJES
SLOB MA BU CHEN RNAMS LA GDUNG SKAL RE BGOS, 'PHRO MA RNAMS BO

DONG SGRUB PA PO DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO LA BLA MA'I 'DRA SKU SHANGS
KHRAG LAS BZHENGS PA MKHYID GANG BA ZHIG YOD PA DE DANG LHAN CIG

CHOS SDINGS NAS AE'I CHOS SDER GDAN DRANGS TE TSANG MA'I PHYAG
RTEN DU BZHUGS SU BCUG BLA MA'I GDAN KHRIR BKOD NAS PHYAG

MCHOD TSAD MED PHUL LO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG LAS SKYES PA'I SLOB MA NI, MNGA' RIS KYI PIR
THOGS RGYAL PO BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO, GSO RIG BKA' BAB

BYANG PA RNAM RGYAL GRAGS BZANG, SNYAN NGAG MKHAS CHEN DKA' BCU
PA DPAL LDAN BZANG PO, TSAD MA'I BKA' BAB STAG LUNG

DKA' BZHI PA 'JAM DBYANGS, MNGON PA'I BKA' BAB GSANG PHU BA GZAD
PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO, RGYUD SDE BZHI'I BKA' BAB STAG

LUNG THANG PA NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA SOGS BKA' BAB KYI SLOB MA BU
CHEN NYER GSUM, SA SKYA BDAG CHEN GRAGS PA BLO GROS SOGS

'KHON GYI GDUNG RGYUD GSUM DANG, LO CHEN BSOD NAMS BZANG PO DANG
LO CHEN RDO RJE RGYAL MTSAN SOGS LO CHEN DU MA, DKA'

BCU PA DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG, GSANG PHU'I DKA' BCU PA PADMA BZANG
PO, SHANGS KYI DKA' BCU PA SHES RAB RIN CHEN

SOGS DKA' BCU PA STONG PHRAG 'BRAS SPUNGS DKA' BZHI PA BLA MA MU
SRAD, TSOGS CHEN DKA' BZHI PA BYANG CHUB SENG GE SOGS

DKA' BZHI PA NYIS STONG LHAG GZHAN YANG DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN

006649 BRIS MA

YAN LAG BRGYAD PA THAMS CAD KYI SNYING PO BTUS PA YID BZHIN GYI
NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 321

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BYANG PA RNAM RGYAL GRAGS PA BZANG PO'I RUS RGYUS NI, <<BYANG
PA'I GDUNG RABS>> LTAR NA, G-YAS RU BYANG PA NI MI NYAG

RGYAL RGOD KYI DBON RIGS TSO SHOG CIG GTZANG MNGA' RIS SU YONG
STE RING ZHIG SONG RJES, RA SA RGAD PO LUNG NAS YUL SPOS TE,

STAG SDE SENG GE LUNG DU YUL BZUNG NAS BSDAD, SKABS DER KHONG
TSE'I RIGS LA MI NYAG RGYAL PO LHA BTZAN LEGS PA ZER, DE

NAS RGYAL RABS GSUM SONG BA NA, SA SKYA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN
DANG SA PAn KHU DBON GYI YON BDAG TU GYUR, GTZANG RA LUNG DU

BSDAD DE YUL BZUNG, RJES SU BYANG PA'I RIGS KYI SRAS MO KUN DGA'
NAM MKHA'I RGYAN, BDAG CHEN BZANG PO DPAL GYIS KHAB

TU BZHES PA NAS BZUNG, SA SKYA 'KHON GYI RIGS DANG GNYEN NYE'I
'BREL BA BYUNG STE, DPAL LDAN SA SKYA DANG MCHOD YON GCIG

TU GYUR PA YIN NO, ,

@078 KHONG GI YAB YON RGYAL POS TA YI SI TU DANG, MING RGYAL
RABS DUS SU GU'I GUNG GI GO GNAS THOB PA'I BYANG KHRI SKOR GYI
DPON

PO GU'I GUNG CHOS GRAGS DPAL BZANG DANG, YUM TA'I SI TU CHOS KYI
RIN CHEN GYI SRAS MO 'BUM SKYONG GNYIS KYI SRAS SU, RAB

BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING MO PHAG LO (1395) LA NGAM RINGS STAG SDE
SENG GE LUNG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, LCAM SRING DRUG YOD PA'I NANG RNAM

RGYAL GRAGS PA BZANG PO NI BZHI PA YIN, DGUNG LO BZHI LNGA TZAM
LA, LO CHEN BYANG CHUB RTZE MO DANG MKHAS GRUB BSTAN PA'I RGYAL

MTSAN SOGS LA DAM PA'I CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI MYONG ZHING, 'BRI KLOG
SOGS YON TAN GYI RMANG GZHIR SLOB PA'I DBU BTZUGS, DER

YOD KYI BON PO MO MA 'GAS RDZUN G-YO'I RKYEN GYIS, LHO YI NAGS
MTHA'I DBEN KHANG DU BSKYOD DGOS BYUNG YANG RING MIN YAB YUM

BZHUGS GNAS BYANG PA'I PHO BRANG DU TSUR BYON TE BDE BA'I NGANG
NAS BZHUGS, SKABS DER MKHAS CHEN PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL NGAM

RINGS KYI CHOS GRVAR GDAN DRANGS TE DAM PA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON
SPEL BAR, YAB YUM DANG LHAN CIG NYAMS SU MYANGS, DE NAS

RIG PA'I GNAS CHE PHRA TSANG MAR GSAN SBYONG LEGS PAR MDZAD DE
MKHAS PA'I RTZER SON, LHAG PAR RTZIS KYI GTZUG LAG RNAMS LA

SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD CING BSTAN BCOS KYANG BRTZAMS,
KHONG DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD DU SON PA CHU PHO 'BRUG GI LO (1412)

LA, 'KHON STON KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS RGYA NAG TU BYON NAS T'A MING
GONG MA MJAL, THEG CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO ZHES PA'I CHO LO

BSTZAL, SA SKYAR TSUR PHEBS NAS YUN MI RING BAR, RNAM RGYAL
GRAGS BZANG LA T'A MING NAS GNANG BA'I GU'I GUNG GI CHO LO DANG

DNGUL GYI DAM KHA BSTZAL ZHING, RNAM RGYAL GRAGS BZANG DGUNG LO
NYI SHU PAR T'A YI SI TU'I DNGUL GYI DAM KHA BSTZAL, DBANG RNAM

SRAS RGYAL MTSAN GYI SRAS MO KHAB TU BZHES PA LA SRAS NAM MKHA'
BKRA SHIS 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR, RGYA GAR RDO RJE

GDAN GYI MKHAN PO MA H'A PAndI TA SH'A RI PU tA DANG, GRUB CHEN
B'I RU PAKshA SOGS LA BOD DU MA BSGYUR BA'I ZAB CHOS MANG PO
GSAN,

GZHAN YANG MKHAS GRUB DU MA'I ZHAL LA 'KHRUL 'KHOR RLUNG SBYOR
SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS, KHYAD PAR BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL

DUS DANG GNAS SKABS THAMS CAD DU SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS MDO
SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PA GSAN CING, NGAM RINGS

KYI PHO BRANG DANG, LHUN GRUB SDINGS, PHO BRANG RTZE SOGS SU
YANG YANG GDAN DRANGS, PHYOGS RGYAL PA'I THUGS KYI BZHES PA MA
LUS

BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL GYIS ZHUS, KHONG GI PHO BRANG DU PHYOGS
RGYAL PA DANG RONG STON CHEN PO GNYIS RTZOD PA'I 'BEL GTAM RGYA
CHER

MDZAD PA BCAS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI BGRO GLENG LA THUGS SHIN TU
DGYES PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO GCIG PAR SI TU BSOD NAMS

DPAL GYI DBON MO NAM MKHA' DPAL 'BUM KHAB TU BZHES, SRAS MO RDO
RJE TSE RING BLTAMS, SRAS MO DE NAR SON TE RIN SPUNGS

PA'I DRUNG NOR BU BZANG PO'I BTZUN MOR GYUR, DGUNG LO BZHI BCUR
PHEBS PA'I LO LA, DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I BLOS BLANGS

RIN PO CHE SNA TSOGS LAS GRUB PA 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA BZHENGS TE
NGAM RINGS KYI CHOS SDE'I GTZUG RGYAN DU MDZAD, BYAMS SKU CHEN
PO

BZHENGS TE GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG BCAS PA GSAR DU BTAB, DGE 'DUN
BDUN BRGYA TZAM DU 'PHEL, BYAMS SKU DER RGYA GAR GYI

PAn CHEN NAGS KYI RIN CHEN SOGS RGYA BOD KYI BLA MA SKYES CHEN
DAM PA MANG POS RAB GNAS MDZAD, 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI BYA

BA RGYA CHER MDZAD DE, SLOB DPON DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG DANG JO
NANG 'JAM DBYANGS NAM MKHA' CHOS SKYONG SOGS BLA CHEN KHAG GI

SLOB MA MANG PO SPEL ZHING, TSA SNA BA BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO SOGS
NYAMS RTOGS CAN GYI RNAL 'BYOR PA'I SLOB MA YANG MANG DU SPEL,

KHYAD PAR GTZUG LAG RTZIS KYI RIG PA'I SLOB MA NI MTHA' YAS SO,
,KHONG NI MKHAS CHEN BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL GYI SLOB MA
YIN

PAS, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS GANG LA YANG THOGS PA MED PA ZHIG YIN
ZHING, GSUNG RTZOM MANG PO ZHIG YOD PA'I NANG RTZIS KYI

SKOR LA MKHAS PA RTZER SON PAS, DE'I SKOR GYI GSUNG SNA KHA BZHI
BCU LHAG YOD 'DUG CING, DE MIN SNYAN NGAG DANG SGRA'I SKOR GYI

GSUNG YANG 'GA' ZHIG YOD, DA DUNG SNGAGS KYI SKOR DANG MDO
SNGAGS PHYOGS KYI BRGAL LAN YANG MANG PO BRTZAMS YOD PAS,

GSUNG RAB POD MANG TZAM YOD 'DRA ZHING, NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU
BRIS MA POD CHEN BZHI BZHUGS YOD, KHONG GIS SNGA PHYIR SKU

ZLA GSUM TZAM KHAB TU BZHES NAS SRAS SRAS MO MANG PO 'KHRUNGS
KYANG, 'GA' ZHIG NA GZHON SKABS NAS 'DAS PA DANG 'GA' ZHIG

RAB TU BYUNG ZHING, SRAS MO RNAMS YUL DE'I DPON PO RNAMS KYI
BTZUN MOR GYUR TE BRGYUD PA MANG POR 'PHEL BAR GYUR, DGUNG

LO BRGYAD CU GYA GCIG TU SON PA, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING LUG
LO (1475) ZLA BA LNGA PA'I TSES DRUG NYIN DGONGS PA RDZOGS

SO, ,

@079 [CHINES LANGUAGE]

@080 *, ,BYAMS GLING PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS RNAM RGYAL GYI GSUNG
'BUM, ,

001231 PAR MA, KA

GSANG SNGAGS RDO RJE THEG PA'I 'DUL BA KUN LAS BTUS PA RTZA BA'I
MDO BZHUGS SO, , (1) 32

SNGAGS KYI 'DUL BA RNAM PAR 'BYED PA'I GZHUNG LUGS RDO RJE THEG
PA LA SGRUB PA PO'I RGYUD SNOD DU BYA BA'I BSLAB PA KUN LAS

BTUS PA DRI MA MED PA'I SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA DAM TSIG GSUM BKOD
PA'I RGYAL PO BZHUGS SO, , (2) 509

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BYAMS PA GLING PA'I YAB DRUNG CHEN TSUL KHRIMS RGYAL MTSAN NI,
THOG MAR GDAN SA THEL DU SPYAN SNGA BDUN PA GRAGS PA SHES

RAB KYI ZHABS LA GTUGS NAS GZIM G-YOG TU GYUR, DE NAS SNE'U
GDONG DU SDE SRID GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN NAS KHONG LA G-YON RU'I

LAS CHEN DANG YAR RGYAB DPON GYI GO GNAS STZAL, YUL DE'I DPON
RIGS KYI SRAS MO GZUGS BYAD PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING LANG TSO

DAR LA BAB PA 'DZOM PA ZHES BYA BA ZHIG BTZUN MOR BSDUS TE GNAS
SO, ,DE NAS MI RING BAR KHONG YAB YUM LA SRAS GNYIS 'KHRUNGS

PA LAS, GCEN PO'I MTSAN LA LHUN GRUB BKRA SHIS ZER, SPYAN SNGA
BCU PA DPAL LDAN BZANG PO DANG SDE SRID GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN

GYI ZHABS LA GTUGS, SKU GZHON NU'I DUS NAS SDE SRID KYI GSOL
DPON DU GYUR, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR YAR RGYAB DPON GYI GO

GNAS THOB, GRA THANG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG ZHIG GSOS DANG BYAMS PA
GLING GI DGON SDE GSAR DU BTAB, DE NAS BZUNG BYAMS PA

GLING ZHES PA'I DGON PA GSAR DU DAR,

SRAS GNYIS PA NI BYAMS PA GLING PA BSOD NAMS RNAM RGYAL YIN LA,
KHONG NI BOD RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG LO'I

(1400) ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES LNGA'I THO RANGS KYI DUS SU, BOD
RANG SKYONG LJONGS KYI LHO RGYUD YAR LUNG GTZANG PO'I NYER 'GRAM
GRA NANG

ZHES PA'I YUL GRU CHEN MOR GRONG KHYER BDE LEGS GLING ZHES BYA
BAR SKU BLTAMS SO, ,MKHAN CHEN BSOD NAMS DPAL RIN PAS SKU LA

BAR CHAD SEL BA'I RIM GRO BSGRUBS, SKU GZHON NU'I DUS NAS YAB
GSHEGS KYANG KHU BO DANG NANG SO SOGS KYIS GCES PAR

BSKYANGS, YI GE'I PHYI MO 'BRI KLOG SBYOR SDEBS SOGS SLOB BCUG
DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR KARMA PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA GRA

MDA'I YANG KHA GTZO BO GRONG DU PHEBS PA MJAL ZHING, 'PHAGS PA
THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I YI GE DRUG PA'I SGOM BZLAS SOGS CHOS

'GA' GSAN, DE NI BLA MAR CHOS GSAN PA'I THOG MA YIN, DE NAS KHU
BO DANG NANG SO BCAS NAS RAB TU BYUNG DGOS PA'I

BSKUL MA YANG YANG BYAS PAR BRTEN, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PAR SPYAN
SNGA BSOD NAMS BZANG POS KHRI 'DZIN PA'I DUS SU, DGE

BA'I BSHES GNYEN RGYAL MTSAN BZANG PO PAS MKHAN PO DANG KUN DGA'
RGYAL MTSAN PAS SLOB DPON MDZAD DE, DGE 'DUN

GRANGS TSANG DBUS SU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BLANGS, MTSAN BSOD NAMS RNAM RGYAL GSOL, GDAN SA DE NYID DU

RAB STON RGYA CHER MDZAD DE, SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE GTZOS DGE
'DUN 'DUS PA RNAMS LA 'GYED MANG JA PHUL, SPYAN SNGA'I DRUNG DU
NA

RO CHOS DRUG GI KHRID YONGS RDZOGS GSAN PAR MA TSAD, MKHAN PO'I
SPYAN SNGAR MGON PO PHYAG BZHI PA DANG GUR MGON SOGS KYI RJES

GNANG ZHUS, DE RJES RTZE THANG DU PHEBS TE BLO GROS 'PHEL BA'I
MDUN TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL DANG PHAR PHYIN GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU

DRUG PAR TZONG KHA PA'I DRUNG DU BYANG CHUB LAM RIM DANG DBU MA
RTZA BA SHES RAB SOGS GSAN, SLOB DPON 'DUL BA GRAGS PA RGYAL

MTSAN PA LA 'DUL BA GSAN, MI NYAG RTOGS LDAN RIN CHEN RGYAL
MTSAN LA ZHI BYED KYI CHOS SKOR GSAN, BZO RIG GI SKOR LA'ANG

@081 MTHAR PHYIN PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR DPAL RTZE
THANG GI CHOS GRVA CHEN MOR PHAR TSAD, 'DUL MDZOD, DBU MA

'JUG PA DANG RGYAN TE GZHUNG POD DRUG LA BSHAD PA MDZAD PAS,
MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA THOB, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR RONG

STON SH'AKYA RGYAL MTSAN PA'I MDUN, MDO SDE RGYAN MA GTOGS PA'I
BYAMS CHOS SDE BZHI DANG, TSAD MA, SGRA, DBU MA'I SKOR

DANG SNGAGS KYI SKOR SOGS LEGS PAR GSAN, SGO MO BZANG PO DPAL BA
LA GUR DRAG GI DBANG DANG NA RO CHOS DRUG GI KHRID BCAS

ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR SKYID SHOD DANG GSANG PHUG NE'U
THOG TU GRVA SKOR LA PHEBS, BYAMS CHOS, MNGON PA, DBU

MA SOGS KYI GZHUNG POD BCU BDUN GYI BSHAD PA MDZAD, GSANG PHU BA
NAS GDAN KHRI SHIN TU MTHON POR BZHUGS SU BCUG NAS

BSTOD SNGAGS RGYA CHER BYAS, DBUS GTZANG KUN TU MKHAS GRAGS KYIS
KHYAB, DE NAS RJE TZONG KHA PA'I SRAS KYI THU BO RGYAL TSAB DAR

MA RIN CHEN GYIS MKHAN PO DANG RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GSANG
STON MDZAD DE, DGE 'DUN SUM CU TZAM GYI DBUS SU GSANG

SNGAGS MKHAR GYI CHOS GRVAR BSNYEN RDZOGS DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA
ZHUS, GDAN SA RI BO DGA' LDAN DU PHEBS NAS 'GYED MANG JA DANG

GTAN BZHAG SOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, PHYI LO'I STON KHAR RGYAL
TSAB RJE'I MDUN TSAD MA DANG, BYAMS CHOS, DBU MA, LAM

RIM CHE CHUNG SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR BO DONG LO TZ'A
BA THUGS RJE DPAL SPYAN DRANGS TE SGRA DANG, SNYAN NGAG SDEB

SBYOR BCAS LA GSAN SBYONG MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD DE, SGRA DANG SNYAN
NGAG GI SKOR GYI GSUNG RAB MANG PO BRTZAMS, LO BZHI TZAM BAR

TSAD MA RIG PAR ZHIB 'JUG DANG 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD CING GZHAN YANG
SNYAN NGAG SGRA SOGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN YANG MDZAD, DE'I SKABS

SU YAR 'BROG GI CHAB TSAN LA PHEBS, LAM ZHOR MU TIG TU GRUB THOB
CHEN PO SMON LAM MTHA' YAS LA GSUNG CHOS KYI 'BREL BA ZHUS

SHING ZHABS TOG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA ZHUS, GSER SKU SOGS 'BUL BA
LEGS PAR PHUL, DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA GCIG PAR RGYAL

CHEN GLING GI RNAM RGYAL MCHOD RTEN DANG GSER GYI 'BUM, MDO
BSKAL PA BZANG PO SOGS GSAR BZHENGS LA ZHUS DAG MDZAD,

DKAR CHAG CHEN MO BRTZAMS, DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA GNYIS PAR ZHU LU
RIN PO CHE GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DPON SLOB GONG DKAR RIGS

LNGA LHA KHANG DU GDAN DRANGS TE GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG PO'I
SKOR GYI DBANG LUNG ZHUS PA DANG, CHO GA PHYAG LEN, GDANGS

DBYANGS ROL TSIGS SOGS KYANG SBYANGS, SLOB DPON DON GRUB KUN
DGA'I MDUN NAS DUS 'KHOR GYI SKOR YONGS RDZOGS DANG KHYAD

PAR RTZIS KYI SKOR CHA TSANG GSAN, DGUNG LO SUM CU RTZA DRUG PAR
PAn CHEN NAGS KYI RIN CHEN GONG DKAR LA PHEBS PA'I DRUNG DU,

BDE MCHOG L'U YI PA SOGS KYI DBANG ZHUS, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR
BYAMS PA GLING DU 'DUL BA DANG, PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA

BCAS KYI BSHAD PA MDZAD, LO DER BYAMS PA GLING GI GDAN SAR
BZHUGS, DGON PA'I GANG CIR THUGS KHUR DANG 'CHAD RTZOD

RTZOM GSUM GYI SGO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, SDE SRID GRAGS PA
'BYUNG GNAS KYIS KYANG PHO BRANG DU GDAN DRANGS TE ZAB CHOS MANG

PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU RTZA GCIG PAR YAR 'BROG SNA DKAR
RTZER BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL MJAL ZHING, ZLA PHYED RING

BO DONG PAn CHEN MDUN ZAB CHOS ZHUS SHING DOGS SEL MANG PO
MDZAD, DOL DU PHEBS NAS YUN RING BZHUGS TE SGRUB DKYIL CHO

GA'I SKOR GYI GSUNG RAB MANG PO BRTZAMS, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN PAR
ZLA BA BZHI PA'I DUS SU NANG SO LO BDUN CU DON LNGAR PHEBS PA

'DAS, RJES SU DGE RDZOGS LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU
RTZA BZHI PAR 'GOS LO GZHON NU DPAL BYAMS GLING DU

GDAN DRANGS NAS ZHABS TOG PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BYAS SHING RDO RJE
PHAG MO'I BYIN RLABS SOGS CHOS 'BREL ZHUS, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU

RTZA LNGA PAR RTZE GDUNG DU PAn CHEN NAGS KYI RIN CHEN MDUN
SNGAR MA THOB PA'I CHOS TSAN MANG PO ZHUS, BYAMS GLING DU GDAN
DRANGS

TE NYIN GSUM BZHUGS RJES LHUN GRUB LHA RTZER PHEBS NAS ZLA PHYED
TZAM LHAN CIG TU BZHUGS TE, KLU SGRUB LUGS KYI SEMS BSKYED

SOGS CHOS DPE 'GA' ZHIG BSGYUR, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG PAR
GONG DKAR DPON GRA LNGA RGYAL PO NAS, KHONG DGA' LDAN LHA

RTZER GDAN DRANGS TE DPON PO BSTAN PA'I SGOR ZHUGS, RAB TU BYUNG
BA'I MTSAN KUN DGA' RNAM RGYAL BZANG PO ZHES PA GNANG,

PHO BRANG DER ZHAG BCU LHAG BZHUGS NAS GSUNG CHOS GNANG, DPON
CHEN GYIS GOS CHEN YUG DANG JA SOGS 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL,

SKABS DER BYAMS GLING DU NANG SO RIN CHEN BZANG PO'I THUGS KHUR
'OG BSAM GTAN GLING GI GZIM KHANG GI MKHAR LAS PHAL

CHER GRUB NAS, NANG GI MKHO CHAS CHA TSANG DANG BOGS KHAL SUM
BRGYA TZAM GYI SA ZHING YANG PHUL TE, DE NAS BZUNG DBYAR KHAR

PHAL CHER BZHUGS GNAS DER MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GNYIS PAR
GZHIS KA GONG DKAR DU DPON KUN DGA' RNAM RGYAL PAS

GDAN DRANGS TE 'DUL BA'I SKOR GYI BSHAD PA MDZAD, DNGUL GYI
MCHOD CHA DANG RTEN KHEBS BLA BRES SOGS KYI MCHOD RDZAS, NA

BZA' BZANG PO DANG BOGS KHAL BRGYA PHRAG GI MCHOD ZHING BCAS
PHUL, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE LNGA PAR GDAN SA THEL GYI MKHAN PO

MDZAD, THEL GYI DPON SLOB DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN KUN GYIS BKUR STI
TSAD MED MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BRGYAD PAR RGYA

GAR PAn CHEN LO KOTTA RA BOD DU PHEBS PA DANG LHAN CIG TU ZLA BA
GNYIS GSUM BZHUGS RING, BDE MCHOG RTZA RGYUD KYI 'GYUR

@082 BCOS DANG, LDEBS RIS DANG SGRUB DKYIL MANG POR ZHAL BKOD,
SHI BA LA PHAN GDAGS PA'I CHO GA SOGS BRTZAMS, DGUNG

LO BDUN CU PAR RGYA GAR GYI PAndI TA AA LANGKA RA ZHES PA ZHIG
PHEBS PA MJAL NAS, GTZUG TOR GDUGS DKAR MO PHYIR ZLOG CHEN MO

LA 'GYUR BCOS SOGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON GSUM NAS MCHOD
RTEN CHEN PO DANG BAL PO'I LHA BZO DGU GDAN DRANGS

TE BYAMS SKU CHE LEGS BZHENGS, DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON LNGA PAR
MCHOD RTEN BYAMS SKU BCAS BZHENGS GRUB CING, RGYAL RTZE

DPAL 'KHOR MCHOD RTEN DANG PHAL CHER 'DRA BA'I MCHOD RTEN CHEN
PO BZHENGS NAS MTSAN THOS GROL MCHOD RTEN ZHES GSOL,

RAB GNAS RGYAS PA MDZAD, MDOR NA KHONG GIS BOD KYI RIG GNAS CHE
CHUNG TSANG MAR SBYANGS NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS KUN LA

MKHAS PA'I RTZE MOR SON CING 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM DANG, DPANG
LUNG KHRID GSUM MA CHAD PA MDZAD PA DANG GSUNG RAB DANG LHA

SKU BRIS 'BUR MANG PO BZHENGS PA, KHYAD PAR THOS GROL MCHOD RTEN
CHEN MO DANG BYAMS SKU CHEN PO BZHENGS PA, MKHAS GRUB KYI

SLOB BU MANG PO SPEL BA SOGS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI MDZAD PA 'PHRIN
LAS RGYA CHE BA BSGRUBS TE, DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON DRUG TU PHEBS

PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING MO LUG GI LO (1475) ZLA PA DRUG
PA'I TSES BRGYAD KYI NYI MA NUB PA DANG MNYAM DU SKU'I BKOD PA
BSDUS

@085 RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BRA TI DGE BSHES RIN CHEN DON GRUB NI BOD RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA
NAS BCU GSUM PA'I BAR GYI MI STE, SPYI LO'I DUS

RABS BCO BRGYAD PA'I DUS KYI MI YIN ZHING, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON
DUS NAS DBUS SE RA THEG CHEN GLING GI DGON PA'I CHOS GRVAR

ZHUGS TE SLOB GNYER MDZAD, MDO'I SKOR PHAR PHYIN DANG DBU MA
SOGS GZHUNG CHEN LNGA DANG, SNGAGS GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS LA

GSAN BSAM MDZAD PAR MA ZAD, TSAD MA RIG PA DANG BOD KYI BRDA
SPROD RIG PA, SNYAN NGAG YI GE'I RIG PA SOGS LA'ANG

GSAN BSAM NAN SMIN MDZAD DE MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR, MKHAS PA'I
DBANG PO TSOGS PA STONG GI DBUS SU DGE BSHES DKA'

BCU PA'I MTSAN RTAGS BZHES, MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG SBYIN PA'I
SPYAN SNGAR DGE TSUL SLONG GI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR MNOS TE,

BSLAB SDOM MIG 'BRAS LTAR BSRUNGS, KHONG SE RA DGON PAR BZHUGS
RING, PHYOGS MTHA' DAG GI MKHAS DBANG SKYES CHEN

DAM PA MANG POS PHAR PHYIN DANG DBU MA SOGS KYI DKA' GNAD 'DRI
BA DANG, TSAD MA'I SKOR GYI DOGS GNAS 'DRI BA SOGS TSANG

MA'I DGE RGAN LTAR GYUR CING, CHAB MDO 'PHAGS PA LHA SOGS BLA
SPRUL CHE KHAG RNAMS NAS KYANG BRTZI BKUR SHIN TU CHEN PO MDZAD,

KHONG NI BOD KYI BRDA SPROD RIG PAR ZHIB 'JUG ZAB SMIN MDZAD
MYONG BA ZHIG YIN PAS, KHONG GI SUM RTAGS 'GREL PA 'DI BOD

PHYIS RABS KYI MKHAS PA MANG POS TSAD MAR BZUNG ZHING, RTAGS
'JUG GI DKA' GNAD RNAMS LA KHONG GIS DGONGS GZHI THUN

MONG MIN PA 'GA' BTON YOD STABS, DENG SANG SUM RTAGS GI DON LA
ZHIB 'JUG BYED PO RNAMS LA DPYAD GZHI PHUN SUM TSOGS

PA ZHIG YIN,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI SPYIR MANG PO ZHIG YOD PAR NGES KYANG, NGED
DPE MDZOD KHANG 'DIR, SUM RTAGS RNAM BSHAD DANG,

BYAMS CHEN CHOS RJE'I RNAM THAR, CHAB SHOG DANG DRIS LAN SKOR,
TSAD MA DANG GTAM TSOGS SKOR BCAS POD BRIS MA CHE LEGS

SHIG BZHUGS YOD,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BLA KHO 'JIGS MED 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO NI, MDO KHAMS SMAD KYI SA
YI THIG LER AA MDO KHUL DU BOD RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I

BGRANG BYA DRUG CU PA ME PHO STAG GI LOR (1866) SKU BLTAMS, YAB
YUM GYIS GCES PAR BSKYANGS NAS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR

PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I BGRANG BYA DRUG PA CHU PHO
SPREL LO (1872) LA STAG GE SLOB DPON NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO'I MDUN
DU KLOG

SBYONG BA'I 'GO BTZUGS, BOD YIG GI PHYI MO NAS BZUNG CHOS SPYOD
SKOR GYI BLOR 'DZIN DGOS PA RNAMS THUGS SU CHUD, DGUNG LO

DGU PA SHING PHO KHYI LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES PA GSUM NYIN
PAR RJE SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'I SPYAN SNGAR BAR MA RAB BYUNG DANG
TSIGS SNGA MA

@093 DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA LEGS PAR MNOS SHING BSRUNG BYA MTHA'
DAG MIG 'BRAS LTAR BSRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PA SHING MO BYA
LO'I ZLA

BA DRUG PA'I TSES DRUG LA, MKHAN PO BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA
MTSO'I MDUN NAS DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR BLANGS, THUN

MONG GI RIG PA'I GNAS RNAMS LA THUGS SBYONG MDZAD PA'I SKOR
LA, BRDA SPROD PA SGRA YI GZHUNG KA TZAN GNYIS PO BDE THANG
MKHAN

CHEN 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO LA GSAN CING, DBYANGS
CAN SGRA MDO RTZA 'GREL DANG BCAS PA NI 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS

DAR GYI MDUN NAS GSAN, SUM RTAGS KYI RTZA BA 'JAM DBYANGS THUB
BSTAN RGYA MTSO LA GSAN PA'I RJES SU, BRA STI RIN CHEN DON

GRUB KYIS BRTZAMS PA'I SUM RTAGS 'GREL PA STAG GE BA'I MDUN
NAS GSAN, SNYAN NAG ME LONG MA'I RTZA BA DANG 'GREL PA DBYANGS

CAN DGYES GLU'I BSHAD KHRID MU TO BA GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO'I
SPYAN SNGAR GSAN ZHING, SDEBS SBYOR SKOR GYI BSTAN BCOS RNAMS
'JAM

DBYANGS CHOS DAR GYI MDUN NAS GSAN SBYONG MDZAD, GSO BA RIG
PA'I SKOR GYI RGYUD BZHI RTZA 'GREL CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA NI,

MKHAN CHEN 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO'I MDUN NAS LUNG
TZAM MA GTOGS BSHAD KHRID ZAB RGYAS GSAN RGYU MA BYUNG BA
'DRA,

KHONG GIS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN SHES RAB RGYA MTSO DANG, 'JAM
DBYANGS THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO, NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO,
 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA BZHI PA BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG
PHYUG SOGS BCU PHRAG LHAG TZAM LA MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG DANG,

RIG GNAS CHE PHRA TSANG MAR GSAN SBYONG MDZAD DE MKHAS PAR
GYUR, SKU TSE HRIL POR 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI SGO NAS DUS
'DA'

BAR MDZAD, RGYA TIG DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL GYIS RAB BYUNG BCU
BZHI PA'I LCAGS SPREL LOR (1860) BTAB PA'I ZAB LUNG BKRA

SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGON PAR YUN RING BZHUGS, NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG
BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BTAB PA'I L'A MO BDE CHEN CHOS

'KHOR GLING GI DGON PAR KHONG GIS ZHAL BKOD THUGS BZHES LA
BRTEN NAS RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I ME BYI LOR (1936) RGYUD PA
GRVA

TSANG BTZUGS, RDO SBIS MCHOD RTEN THUB BSTAN RNAM RGYAL GLING
GSAR DU BZHENGS, PAn CHEN DGU PA CHOS KYI NYI MA'I YONGS

'DZIN MDZAD MYONG SKAD DANG, DA LTA'I PAn CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL
MTSAN THOG MAR NGOS 'DZIN DANG DBUS SU GDAN ZHU SOGS LA YANG

THUGS 'KHUR BZHES MKHAN GTZO BO YIN PAR MNGON, KHONG NI SKABS
DER AA MDO'I YUL GRUR MKHAS SHING BTZUN PA DANG,

'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GANG LA'ANG THOGS PA MED PA'I SNYAN
GRAGS CAN ZHIG YIN, BOD RAB BYUNG BCU DRUG PA'I BGRANG BYA NYI
SHU PA

ME MO PHAG GI LOR (1947) DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU GYA GNYIS LA PHEBS
PA NA SKU GSHEGS SO, ,

BLA MA ZHANG GI GSUNG MGUR, (1) 44

RI CHOS YON TAN KUN 'BYUNG NGO, , (2) 133

RI CHOS CHA LAG BZHUGS SO, , (3) 66

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

GUNG THANG BLA MA ZHANG BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS PA NI, 'KHRUNGS YUL
TSA BA GRU, YAB SNGAGS PA RDO RJE SEMS DPA' DANG, YUM

MANG SKYID BYA BA GNYIS SU RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I CHU MO YOS
(1123) LA 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BDUN LA PHEBS SKABS MA YUM DANG

GCEN POS KLOG YIG BSLABS, DGUNG GRANGS DGU LA PHEBS SKABS BYE'U
STON PA LAS SDUD PA DANG MNGON RTOGS RGYAN SOGS

GSAN, DGUNG GRANGS BCU LA PHEBS SKABS SLOB DPON GSHEN GYI MDUN
LAS 'JAM DPAL MTSAN BRJOD GSAN, DGUNG

GRANGS BCU GCIG TU PHEBS SKABS RNGOG MDO SDE'I SPYAN SNGAR DGYES
RDOR SOGS GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS SKOR GSAN ZHING RANG NYID NAS

'JAM DPAL GSANG LDAN GYI GZHUNG LA BSHAD PA YANG MDZAD, DGUNG
GRANGS NYER DRUG TU PHEBS SKABS, MKHAN PO DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN MKHAR SGO BA DANG, SLOB DPON GRAGS MKHAR BA, GSANG
STON GZUNG LJANG MDO BA RNAMS LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,

MTSAN BRTZON 'GRUS GRAGS SU BTAGS, DGUNG GRANGS SO GSUM DU PHEBS
SKABS DVAGS SGOM TSUL KHRIMS SNYING PO MJAL, CHOS

BKA' MANG DU GSAN, RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I ME LUG (1187) LA TSAL
GUNG THANG GI DGON PA BTAB NAS LHA CHEN BZHENGS, KHONG

GI BLA MA DVAGS SGOM TSUL KHRIMS SNYING POS LHA LDAN 'PHRUL
SNANG GTZUG LAG KHANG NYAMS GSO DANG 'BREL JO BO SH'AKYA MU NER
MCHOD SPRIN

RGYA CHER PHUL CING, BLA MA ZHANG LA'ANG DE LTAR DGOS PA'I ZHAL
BKOD GNANG BA LTAR, LHA SA'I NYE 'DABS TSAL GUNG THANG DU

GNAS GZHI MDZAD NAS LHA LDAN JO SH'AKA RNAM GNYIS KYI DBUS RTEN
GSUM KHAG LA MCHOD 'BUL RGYA CHE RGYUN DU 'BUL BAR MDZAD,

KHONG GI SKU DUS NAS TSAL PA BKA' BRGYUD KYI CHOS BRGYUD DAR
ZHING, KHONG GIS PHYAG BTAB PA'I TSAL GUNG THANG GI DGON PA NI,

SNGON DUS DBUS GTZANG DU CHOS SDE CHEN PO DRUG YOD PA'I NANG
TSAN ZHIG YIN, DGUNG GRANGS BDUN CU DON GCIG LA PHEBS PA,

RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I CHU MO GLANG (1193) LA TSAL GUNG THANG DU
SKU MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS SO, ,

@104 KHONG GI GSUNG NI, BLA MA RGYUD PA'I RNAM THAR DANG, BDEN
GNYIS ZUNG 'BREL GYI BSHAD PA, GSANG RNAM MI 'DRA BA DU MA

BCAS CHOS TSAN BRGYA PHRAG 'GA' YOD PA PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS TE
BRIS MA POD LNGA RU BYAS PA CHA TSANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU

003829 PAR MA,

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG 'BUM GYI

TSUL BSHAD PA RTZOM 'PHRO CAN BZHUGS SO, , (2) 15

BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS NOR BU 'DREN PA'I SHING RTA DANG
TSOGS MCHOD BCAS BZHUGS SO, , (3) 7

MNGON RTOGS RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON SA BCAD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
(4) 9

t'IKA CHEN DGONGS PA RAB GSAL LAS GSUNGS PA'I RTZA BA'I SA BCAD
RNAMS ZUR DU BKOL BA BZHUGS SO, , (5) 16

THEG PA CHEN PO'I SEMS BSKYED LEN PA'I CHO GA'I NGAG 'DON SOGS
BZHUGS SO, , (6) 7

LAM RIM CHE CHUNG GNYIS KA'I BRGYUD 'DEBS BZHUGS SO, , (7) 6

SDOM PA NYI SHU PA, BLA MA LNGA BCU PA, RTZA LTUNG SBOM PO'I
SDOM BCAS BZHUGS SO, , (8) 9

DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I 'DON BSGRIGS BZHUGS SO, , (9) 7

RJE BTZUN BKA' 'GYUR BA CHEN PO BLO BZANG DON LDAN GYIS BKA'
'DRI PHEBS LAN SOGS BZHUGS SO, , (10) 16

RI KHROD DGE 'PHEL BSAM GTAN GLING GI GSUNG RGYUN LTAR SBYOR

SPRIN GYI 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BI HAR TI SMA, (13) 13

@106 THIG RTZA'I RIM PA 'PHRENG BA SOGS LAS BTUS TE BKOD PA
BZHUGS SO, , (14) 21

PHYAG RDOR DRAG PO GSUM BSGRIL GYI SGOM BZLAS DANG RJES GNANG
BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, , (15) 6

MYUR BYON DANG ZHABS BRTAN GSOL 'DEBS CHOS DUNG DKAR PO'I RANG
SGRA ZHES BYA BA BI HAR TI SMA, (16) 3

DEB KYI MGO RGYAN BZHUGS SO, , (17) 2

DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LA BRTEN PA'I SBYANG CHOG BSDUS PA
BZHUGS SO, , (18) 10

BYAMS GLING MCHOD RTEN CHEN MO THOS PAS RNAM GROL LA ZHIG GSOS
JI LTAR BGYIS PA'I DKAR CHAG MI PHAM BLA MA

DGYES PA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BI HAR TI SMA, , (19) 12

'JIGS BYED BSKYED RIM SA BCAD DANG DRIS LAN SNA TSOGS PHYOGS
GCIG TU BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (20) 16

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'BUL SDUD PA BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI
'KHRUNGS YUL NI, DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM LAS KHAMS DAR

RTZE MDOR YAB BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN DANG YUM DPAL 'DZOMS SGROL
MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PAR 'KHRUNGS, YAB YUM

GYIS BSKYED BSRING STE NAR SON PA NA LNGA MCHOD DGON PA'I SGRIG
LA ZHUGS, YI GE 'BRI KLOG SOGS LA 'BAD DE YON TAN THAMS

CAD KYI GZHI LEGS PAR GTING, MI RING BAR MKHAN CHEN BSTAN PA
CHOS 'PHEL GYIS RJES SU BZUNG, YAB BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN

DANG LHAN DU LHA LDAN DU PHEBS, 'BRAS SPUNGS DGON GYIS SGO MANG
'BUL SDUD BLA MA THAR PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI YANG SRID DU NGOS BZUNG

NAS CHOS KYI KHRI LA MNGA' GSOL, DE NAS BZUNG BKRA SHIS SGO MANG
GI CHOS SGOR ZHUGS, MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO BLO BZANG DON LDAN

SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU MA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS, BCU PHRAG RIG PA'I GNAS
LA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I MKHYEN PA RGYAS,

MKHAS MANG RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I DBUS SU MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG
BCAS PA LA BRGAL BRTAG MDZAD, KHYAD PAR SA DGE BKA' RNYING

JO NANG PA'I LUGS SOGS SO SO'I 'DOD TSUL PHRA MO TSUN LA THUGS
SBYONG MDZAD, GRUB MTHA'I CHAGS SDANG SOGS SPYOD PA NGAN PA RING

DU DOR, KUN LA BCOS MIN GYIS DAG SNANG DANG BSTAN PA SPEL BAR
THUGS KHUR BZHES, THUGS RGYUD LA YON TAN JI LTAR CHE YANG

NGA RGYAL KHENGS DREGS KYI SPYOD NGAN MED PAR ZHI DUL BAG YOD
KYI BRTUL ZHUGS 'DZIN, SLAR YANG NOR BU GLING KHAR GDAN SA GSUM

GYI MKHAS MANG GI YANG RTZE RNAMS DANG, GZHUNG BKA' POD LNGA LA
SOGS PA'I DON LA DAM BCA' GNANG BAS, GDAN SA DE DAG

NAS BYON PA'I DGE BSHES MKHAS PA RNAMS KYANG COL CHUNG BYIS PA'I
GNAS SU BKOD, DE NAS BZUNG GANGS CAN LJONGS SU MKHAS

PA'I SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SKU PHRENG
BZHI PA SKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG SOGS MKHAS GRUB DU

MAS BSNGAGS PA'I ME TOG 'THOR, SKABS SHIG LA CHAB MDO DGA' LDAN
BYAMS PA GLING GIS GDAN 'DREN PA BYUNG BAS DER LAN

'GAR PHEBS, DAD LDAN RNAMS KYIS PHUL BA'I ZANG ZING GI DNGOS PO
RGYA CHER BYUNG, DE NAS RTA TSAG RJE DRUNG NGAG DBANG THUB

BSTAN BSKAL BZANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I BKA' DANG, RANG NYID
KYANG PAn CHEN BYAMS PA GLING PA LA DAD PAS MTSAMS SBYAR TE,

PAn CHEN BYAMS GLING PA'I THUGS DAM GYI SNYING PO MCHOD RTEN
CHEN MO DUS YUN RING POR SONG STABS SHIN TU NYAMS GOG TU GYUR,

@107 DBU TOG KYANG SA LA LHUNG DU NYE BAR BRTEN NYAMS GSO GNANG
RGYU'I SNYING STOBS PHRAG PAR BZHES, RTA TSAG NGAG DBANG THUB
BSTAN

SKAL BZANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME DANG, DZA SAG BSTAN PA 'BYUNG
GNAS GNYIS LA THUGS KHUR BZHES DGOS PA'I GSOL BA BTAB,

MA ZAD YAB GZHIS BSAM 'GRUB PHO BRANG DANG BYAMS GLING GRVA
TSANG RIN PO CHE SOGS LA'ANG DE LTAR GSOL BA BTAB, RJE 'DI PA LA

DAD LDAN RNAMS KYIS DNGOS PO 'BUL RO COG DAM PA'I CHOS DANG BOD
KYI RIG RTZAL GONG 'PHEL CHED DU DMIGS NAS, YOD DGU

RTZAL SPRUGS KYIS MCHOD RTEN NYAMS GSO MDZAD, MI RING BAR MCHOD
RTEN BANG RIM BZHI PA BANG RIM RE LA LHA KHANG BKOD MDZES NYI

SHU RE STE LHA KHANG BRGYAD CU THAM PA, PHYI NANG GI LDEBS RIS
DANG DBU TOG MAN CHAD GSER ZANGS SOGS PHAL CHE GSAR BRJE MDZAD,

SHING BZO DANG, LCAGS BZO, BRTZIG BZO, LHA RIS PA SOGS MI RIGS
RANG GIS KHYAD CHOS BLA NA MED PAS BKOD LEGS THOG

RGYA DKAR NAG DANG BAL PO SOGS KYI LEGS CHA'I YON TAN DU MA
BLANGS TE, SKYE DGU'I YID KYI BDUD RTZI DANG MIG GI DGA' STON

NYID DU BKOD, SLAR YANG PHYIS 'BYUNG NYAMS GSO'I THAD LA DNGUL
SRANG tAm CHIG STONG DRUG BRGYA SKOR SBYOR 'JAGS GNANG,

MCHOD ME RGYUN MCHOD KYI GZHI RTZA DANG, BYAMS GLING GRVA TSANG
DANG RI BO RNAM RGYAL BCAS TSOGS PA SDE GNYIS PO BYAMS KHANG DU
BYAMS

SMON CHAG MED 'DON RGYU'I RGYUN MCHOD BTZUGS, KUN BDE GLING DANG
CHOS SDINGS DGON GYI BLA GRVA DANG, KHYAD PAR RJE BKA'

'GYUR BA BLO BZANG DON LDAN ZHABS DANG SMIN GLING GTER SRAS RIN
PO CHE SOGS RIS MED KYI SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS KYIS RAB GNAS

LEGS PAR MDZAD, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I SA LUG (1919) LO MCHOD
RTEN CHEN PO YONGS SU GRUB ZIN NAS DKAR CHAG MDZAD,

SLAR YANG MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PA LA 'CHAD NYAN DANG
SGOM SGRUB GNANG, SKU TSE HRIL POR MTHON PO'I NGO SRUNG DANG

DMAN RNAMS YI GA MI GCOD, MNYAM LA 'GRAN SEMS DANG RANG NYID
GCES 'DZIN MED PAR LAM BSLAB PA GSUM MIG GI 'BRAS

BU BZHIN DU BSRUNG, RE ZHING LTOS PA'I MCHOG DMAN BAR MA'I 'GRO
BA SU YIN RUNG, BLO DANG MTHUN PAR GNAS SKABS DANG

MTHAR THUG GI RE BA BSKONG BAR MDZAD,

ZHAL SLOB KYANG SNYIGS DUS KYI MKHAS PA CHEN PO RJE BTZUN SHES
RAB RGYA MTSO SOGS MANG DU SPEL, KHONG NAM GSHEGS PA NI

DPYAD GZHI KHUNGS THUB MA MTHONG BAS ZHU THABS BRAL,

GSUNG RTZOM CHOS TSAN NYER GCIG CAN SHOG GRANGS CHIG BRGYA GO
GCIG YOD PA'I POD CHUNG GCIG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU

BZHUGS YOD,

@108 *, ,'BRUG RGYAL DBANG KUN DGA' DPAL 'BYOR GYI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

BDUD RTZI'I THIGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 25

BSTOD TSOGS, (3) 18

ZHAL GDAMS RIN CHEN PHRENG BA TSIGS SU BCAD PA NYUNG NGU'I RIM
PA BZHUGS SO, , (4) 15

ZHAL GDAMS DRIS LAN DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, , (5) 40

DPAL BRTAG PA GNYIS PA'I RGYUD KYI ZIN BRIS BZHUGS SO, , (6) 25

GSUNG NGAG NOR BU RIM PAR BRGYUS PA DUM BU KHRIGS SU BKOD PA
BZHUGS SO, , (7) 36

RNAL 'BYOR BZHI'I ZHAL GDAMS GSANG CHEN GRUB PA'I KLONG YANGS
ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (8) 21

BZHI CHOS ZHAL GDAMS BZHUGS SO, , (9) 20

ZAB DON DGONGS PA'I GTER MDZOD GRUB PA'I SHING RTA ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (10) 36

DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG GI SNGON DKYIL BZHUGS SO, , (11) 18

RDO RJE RNAL 'BYOR MA SGRUB CING MCHOD PA'I CHO GA BZHUGS SO, ,
(12) 5

BLA MA MOS GUS KYI KHRID YIG BZHUGS SO, , (13) 14

PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO LHAN CIG SKYES SBYOR GYI KHRID YIG BZHUGS SO,
, (14) 7

@109 DPAL LDAN N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI KHRID YIG MCHOG GI GRU CHEN
DANG GSANG SPYOD ZLOG SGOM GYI KHRID YIG ZIL GNON SENG GE'I

NGA RO BZHUGS SO, , (15) 18

DAG SNANG ZHING SBYONG GI KHRID YIG SKU GSUM NGO SPROD BZHUGS
SO, , (16) 11

CHOS BRGYAD MGO SNYOMS KYI KHRID YIG BDE CHEN ROL PA'I CHU GTER
BZHUGS SO, , (17) 7

BYAMS SNYING RJE BYANG CHUB KYI SEMS KHRID BZHUGS SO, , (18) 3

RGYU 'BRAS RTEN 'BREL GYI KHRID YIG BDE CHEN MNYAM PA'I ME LONG
BZHUGS SO, , (19) 10

'BRUG PA RIN PO CHE'I KHRID CHUNG BRGYAD KYI GDAMS PA KUN LA MED
PA'I KHYAD CHOS BZHUGS SO, , (20) 9

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'BRUG RGYAL DBANG KUN DGA' DPAL 'BYOR NI, 'GRO BA'I MGON PO'I
GDUNG RABS BCU GSUM PA DPON SHES RAB BZANG

PO'I SRAS YIN LA, YUM NI DPON MO KUN DGA' 'DZOM ZHES PA YON TAN
DANG LDAN ZHING RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I SNYING PO YI GE BCU PA

RGYUN DU ZHAL 'DON MDZAD MKHAN ZHIG YIN, KHONG YAB YUM GYI SRAS
SU RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SA SPREL LO (1428) LA 'BRUG RA LUNG

GI CHAR GTOGS PA'I YUL GRU STAG TSANG KHAR SKU BLTAMS SO, ,BTZAS
STON GZAB RGYAS ZIN 'PHRAL GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA'I SLOB DPON

RDO RJE GRAGS PA LA GTAD DE BYIN RLABS ZHUS RJES, YAB KYIS RDO
RJE NAG PO CHEN PO'I RJES GNANG DANG BYIN RLABS MDZAD CING,

KHYE'UR RGYAL DBANG DPAL BZANG ZHES PA'I MING BTAGS, BYIS PA
SPYANG GRUNG 'DZOM ZHING SPYOD PA ZHI BA, RDO RJE DRIL BU SOGS
BLA

MA'I PHYAG MTSAN DAG LA THUGS SHIN TU DGYES PAS, YAB DGA' SPRO
TSAD MED 'PHEL, YAB KYIS JA GRAL DU GLEGS SHING STENG DU YI

GE'I GZUGS BRNYAN 'BRIR BCUG STE BSTAN PAS BRDA BSTAN PA TZAM LA
SHES PAR GYUR, SLOB DPON DKON RDOR GYI MDUN DU SBYOR

KLOG SBYONG BCUG RING MIN YI GE SBYOR KLOG THOGS MED DU GYUR,
DGUNG LO BDUN PA NAS RTZA RGYUD BRTAG PA GNYIS PA'I TSIG BLOR

'DZIN DANG YAB KYIS BSHAD PA MDZAD, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR DGE 'DUN
TSOGS PA RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I DBUS SU TSIG DAG LA GSAL

BA'I SGO NAS KLOG GSUNGS PAS DER YOD KYI SKYE BO TSANG MAS
BSNGAGS PAR BYAS, LO DER MKHAN PO KUN DGA' DPAL BA'I SPYAN SNGAR

RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, MTSAN KUN DGA'
DPAL 'BYOR ZHES GNANG, DGE TSUL GYI TSIG LE'UR BYAS PA

DANG JO BO RJE NAS BRGYUD PA'I BYANG CHUB SEMS BSKYED KYI CHO GA
SOGS GSAN, 'KHRUNGS YUL 'BROG PAR SONG BAS YUL MI RNAMS SHA

CHANG LA GTZO BOR SPYOD KYANG, SKU NYID GZHON NU NAS SHA CHANG
GI DRI TZAM YANG BZHES PAR MI MDZAD, SKABS DER YAB YUM GYIS

KHONG LA SDE SNOD PO TI 'GA' BLOR 'DZIN BYED DU BCUG MNGA' RIS
PA YON TAN SENG GE'I MDUN SA SDE LNGA SOGS BYAMS PA'I CHOS

SDE RNAMS DANG BKA' GDAMS KYI CHOS SKOR RNAMS GSAN, 'GRO MGON
DBANG PHYUG BLO GROS MDUN SGRUB THABS DANG MDO MANG GI

LUNG, 'BRUG PA'I PHYAG LEN SKOR RNAMS GSAN, DE NAS MI RING BAR
YUM 'DAS, RTEN BZHENGS PA SOGS BYA BA MANG POR

THUGS G-YENGS PAR GYUR, TSE 'DI'I BYA BA SPANGS NAS SGRUB PA
SNYING POR BYA RGYU'I DGONGS PA THUGS LA 'KHRUNGS, 'BRUG RA LUNG

DANG NYE BA'I RI KHROD RNAMS SU BYON NAS NYAMS LEN MDZAD CING
PHAR PHYIN DANG, TSAD MA, MNGON PA, 'DUL BA BCAS KYI

GZHUNG LA GZIGS SHING ZHAL 'DON MDZAD, RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG
PHYUG 'KHRUL ZHIG GU NA BHA TR'A GDAN DRANGS NAS GSANG SNGAGS
KYI

CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, BKA' BRGYUD PA'I ZAB CHOS N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI
NYAMS LEN RTAGS THON PAR MDZAD, GSUNG MGUR YANG

'GA' ZHIG BRTZAMS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGAR PHEBS PA NA BU SLOB YON
BDAG RNAMS KYIS DBUS PHYOGS SU GDAN DRANGS, JO BO

@110 RIN PO CHE MJAL, 'BRAS SPUNGS CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS DPAL LDAN
SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO DANG CHOS 'BREL GYI GTAM

MDZAD, KUN GYIS BSNGAGS PAR BYAS, DE NAS TSUR 'BRUG TU PHEBS,
SKU CUNG ZAD BSNYUNG YANG RING MIN DVANGS, RA LUNG DU

SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR SNA PHU CHOS LUNG NAS
LHA KHANG ZHIG BZHENGS GRUB PA'I RAB GNAS LA GDAN DRANGS,

LHA KHANG RTEN DANG BCAS PAR RAB GNAS MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DGU
PAR YAR 'BROG CHOS RDZONG DU PHEBS, YAR 'BROG PA

RNAMS KYIS 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL, STON KHAR RONG LA PHEBS, RIN
SPUNGS NOR BZANG PAS SNE LEN BYAS NAS ZLA SHAS BZHUGS,

DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR DPYID KYI DUS SU SPREL ZHING DU PHEBS,
RNGOG RIN CHEN BDUN BRGYUD KYI THA MA BYANG CHUB DPAL BA DGUNG
LO BRGYA

ZIN PA MJAL, RNGOG LUGS KYI ZAB CHOS 'GA' ZHUS, RNGOG PA'I ZHAL
NAS DA NGA YUN RING MI SDOD PAS, NGA'I DGE RDZOGS BSNGO

BA SOGS KHYED KYIS MDZAD DGOS GSUNGS, YUN MI RING BAR RNGOG
BYANG CHUB DPAL GSHEGS, DGE RDZOGS LA PHEBS, RNGOG

PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO LA CHOS GNANG BAS BLA SLOB KYI
'BREL BA LEGS PAR GYUR, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR LHO KHA

PHYOGS KYI BU SLOB RNAMS KYIS GDAN DRANGS NAS LHO KHAR PHEBS,
ZLA BA BZHI TZAM BZHUGS, RTA BDUN CU THAM PA SOGS 'BUL BA

RGYA CHEN PO BYUNG, TSUR RA LUNG DU PHEBS NAS 'BROG PA RNAMS LA
ZANG ZING GI SKU SKYES LEGS PAR GNANG, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM

PAR KHU BO SKU GSHEGS, GSHEGS BRDZANG LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO
NYER LNGA PA'I DGUNG SKAG LA YAB KYI BKA' LTAR RDZA

DKAR RTZE DANG KLONG RDOL RI KHROD SOGS SU BYA BRAL MDZAD NAS
MTSAMS LO GNYIS TZAM BZHUGS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR LHO BRAG

MKHAR CHU SOGS GNAS CHEN RNAMS SU BYON, YON TAN BZANG PO'I MDUN
NAS BKA' BRGYUD PA'I CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, RONG

BYAMS CHEN DU PHEBS NAS PAn CHEN NAGS KYI RIN CHEN MJAL BAR
BYON, ZLA BA PHYED GNYIS TZAM BSTEN NAS SGRA DANG RGYUD 'GA'I

DBANG KHRID GSAN, DUS 'KHOR GYI DKA' BA'I GNAS MANG PO'I SGRO
'DOGS KYANG CHOD, LHO BRAG TU ZLA BA PHYED GNYIS BZHUGS TE

GTZUG LAG KHANG ZHIG GSOS MDZAD RJES SPA GRO LJONGS LA PHEBS,
'BA' RA BA NAM MKHA' RIN CHEN SOGS SLOB MA CHIG BRGYA LNGA BCU

TZAM LA N'A RO CHOS DRUG SOGS BKA' BRGYUD PA'I ZAB CHOS MANG PO
BSHAD NAS LO GSUM BZHUGS, 'BA' RA BA NAM MKHA' RGYAL

MTSAN LA 'BA' RA BA'I CHOS SKOR TSANG MA ZHUS, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS
PAR DBUS SU PHEBS TE CHOS RJE AA MO GHA SHRI 'BRUG TU GDAN

DRANGS TE SGRA DANG SNYAN DNGAGS GSAN, CHOS RJE LHAN DU SNYE
THANG DU PHEBS NAS SGRA'I GSAN SBYONG DANG, DER GDAN SA PA CHOS
RJE

SGRA PA SOGS LA RI CHOS SKOR GYI DAM CHOS 'CHAD, DGUNG LO SO
GSUM PAR CHOS RJE GTZANG CHEN PAS LHA SAR GDAN DRANGS NAS

GSER GYI 'KHOR LOS GTZOS PA'I 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL ZHING TZA
RI LA PHEBS DGOS PA'I BSKUL MA GTONG, GRA BYAMS PA GLING DU

BSOD NAMS RNAM RGYAL MDUN ZAB CHOS MANG PO GSAN, DE NAS THEL
DANG RTZE THANG DU PHEBS, MKHAN PO DON GRUB DPAL BA DANG

LAS SLOB BYANG GRAGS PA, GSANG STON SLOB DPON NGAG DBANG PA, DGE
'DUN GRANGS TSANG DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHUS SHING

'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR TZA RIR PHEBS, GDAN
SA THEL DU ZHAG BZHUGS MDZAD DE DGE 'DUN BRGYAD

BRGYA TZAM LA CHOS 'BREL GNANG, TZA RI'I GNAS CHEN TSANG MAR
BYON ZHING TSOGS 'KHOR BSKOR BA DAN GSUNG MGUR GSUNGS PA

SOGS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I TSOGS RGYA CHER BSAGS PAR MDZAD, LO GCIG
TZAM 'GOR RJES RA LUNG DU TSUR BYON NAS SKU SKYES KYIS

YON BDAG BU SLOB THAMS CAD TSIM PAR MDZAD, RIN SPUNGS DANG MON
YUL SOGS SU CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR, 'BRUG GI GTZUG

LAG KHANG ZHIG GSOS MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PAR DVAGS LHA SGAM
PO'I GDAN SAR BZHUGS DGOS PA'I BSKUL MA BYAS, ZLA

BA BCU PA'I TSES BCO LNGA NYIN DVAGS PO ZLA 'OD GZHON NU'I GDAN
KHRIR BZHUGS, DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA NYIS STONG TZAM LA CHOS KYI

SBYIN PA RGYA CHEN PO DANG MANG JA 'GYED BCAS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
GNANG, DE RJES GDAN SA THEL SOGS BKA' BRGYUD PA'I GDAN

SA MANG POR CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO BSKOR, MGUR MANG PO GSUNGS, TZA RI
DANG DVAGS KONG STOD SMAD KYI BSGRUB GNAS RNAMS SU SGRUB

KHANG NYI SHU RTZA GRANGS BRTZIGS, SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA ZHUGS
PA'I SLOB MA NYAMS RTOGS CAN MANG PO BYUNG, TZA RI'I GNAS CHEN

RNAMS SU YANG YANG PHEBS, KARMA PA'I DGON GNAS NAG PHU'I DGON
PAR PHEBS, BU CHU'I GNAS SGO PHYE, DER YUN RING TZAM

BZHUGS NAS GSUNG 'BUM THA THOR RNAMS LEGS SGRIG BYAS TE ZHU DAG
MDZAD, DE NAS DVAGS PO DANG RA LUNG BCAS SU TSUR PHEBS

NAS RTEN BZHENGS CHOS 'CHAD SOGS DKAR PO DGE BA'I PHYAG LAS KHO
NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR,

CHOS RJE BYAMS PA GLING PA SKU GSHEGS PA'I GTAM GSAN, SPYAN CHAB
MANG PO GSIL ZHING THUGS SKYO NGAL SHIN TU CHE BAR MDZAD, DE

NAS BZUNG THUGS SNA YANG JE THUNG LTA BUR GYUR, BYAMS PA GLING
PA'I GZIM KHANG GZIGS PA TZAM LA PHYAG 'TSAL ZHING, SPYAN CHAB

GSIL BZHIN PAR SMON LAM MANG PO BTAB, MI RING BAR DVAGS LA SGAM
POR PHEBS, DVAGS PO'I DBON PO GDAN PAR BKOD,

DE MIN DGON PA'I LAS SNE RNAMS KYANG BSKOS, SGAM PO'I YON MCHOD
RNAMS LA SPYI DGOS KYI BKA' LUNG GNANG, DE NAS TZA RIR

@111 THENGS THA MA PHEBS, BYAMS PA GLING PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS LA
DMIGS PA'I MCHOD PA RGYA CHEN PHUL, TSUR BYON NAS BYAMS GLING,

DVAGS LA SGAM POR LUNG BCAS SU PHEBS NAS CHOS 'CHAD MDZAD, MTHAR
GTZANG GI BU SLOB RNAMS KYI RE BA LTAR SPOS SKYA GZIMS

KHANG DU BZHUGS, DE NAS MI RING BAR DGUNG LO ZHE DGU LA PHEBS PA
RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I ME PHO SPREL LO (1476) ZLA BA BCU PA'I

TSES BCO LNGA LA 'BRUM NAD BZHES TE ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I GNAM
GANG NYIN PA'I MTSAN MOR DGONGS PA RDZOGS,

KHONG GI GSUNG CHOS TSAN KA PA NAS ZA PA'I BAR NYER GSUM YOD
PA'I POD CHEN ZHIG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD,

@112 *, ,'BRUG PA KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

RNAL 'BYOR PA'I MING CAN KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I RNAM THAR BYUNG TSUL
LHUG PAR SMRAS PA ZHIB MO'I RTZING MO HA LE HO LE

SNA ZIN SPU ZIN NAS BKOD PA CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 169

RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I RNAM THAR
GSUNG 'BUM RGYA MTSO LAS DAD PA'I KU SHAS CHU THIGS

TZAM BLANGS PA NGO MTSAR BDUD RTZI'I ZIL MNGAR CES BYA BA BZHUGS
SO, , (2) 81

RNAL 'BYOR PA'I MING CAN KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I NYAMS LA SHAR BA'I
PHRAL GYI CHOS SPYOD 'DRA DANG NYAMS 'CHAR CI BYUNG

MA BYUNG BRIS PA SKYAG GTAD GANG YANG MED PA DGA' ZHIG BZHUGS
SO, , (3) 74

RNAL 'BYOR GYI DBANG PHYUG KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I GSUNG 'BUM THOR BU
BZHUGS SO, , (4) 29

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'BRUG PA KUN LEGS ZHES MTSAN NYI ZLA LTAR GRAGS PA 'DI NYID SKU
'KHRUNGS PA'I YUL NI SKYID SHOD DU YIN ZHING, DE YANG

DPAL LDAN 'BRUG PA'I GDUNG LAS YAB NANG SO RIN CHEN BZANG PO
DANG, YUM DPON MO MGON MO SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS RGAN PA'I

GRAS SU RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHAG (1455) LOR BLTAMS,
MTSAN TSE DBANG RGYAL POR GSOL, KHONG DGUNG LO BCU GSUM

LA SON SKABS SNEL PA BA'I PHYOGS KYIS YAB BKRONGS STABS, KHONG
AA NE'I ZLA BO GONG DKAR DPON GYI GSOL JA BA BZANG PO ZHES

PAS 'KHRID NAS, GZHIS KA RIN SPUNGS PA'I MI DBANG KUN TU BZANG
PO'I PHYAG PHYIR SLEBS, DER LO DRUG TZAM BZHUGS, DE

NAS DBUS SU PHEBS SKABS RIN SPUNGS KUN TU BZANG POS KHONG LA
GNANG BA'I SPOS SHEL GYI PHRENG BA DANG RNA G-YU LEGS PO ZHIG
YOD

PA DE SRING MO RGAN PAR GNANG, RTA NGANG PA LEGS PO ZHIG YOD PA
GSOL JA BA BZANG PO LA SBYIN NAS KHONG GNAS NGES MED DU BSKOR

BAR PHEBS, DE'I SKABS RVA LUNG RIN PO CHES 'TSO RKYEN GNANG NAS
SPOS SKYAR SDOD CES GSUNGS, DER RGYUD BRTAG GNYIS

GSAN SBYANG MDZAD DE ZLA BA BRGYAD TZAM BZHUGS, RTOGS LDAN CHEN
PO LHA BTZUN PA RVA LUNG DU PHEBS PA MJAL, BRDA RTZA DANG SNYING

PO'I SKOR SOGS MANG ZHIG ZHUS, RONG BRAG DKAR CHOS SDINGS SU
PHEBS, DGE SLONG CHEN PO BSOD NAMS MCHOG LDAN PA'I DRUNG

DU PHYAG CHEN DANG RO SNYOMS KYI KHRID CHA TSANG ZHUS NAS ZLA BA
DRUG TZAM BZHUGS, BSOD NAMS BZANG PO LA'ANG RNYING MA'I CHOS
SKOR

'GA' ZHUS, GNAS RNYING DGON DU PHEBS, GNAS RNYING CHOS RJE'I
DRUNG NAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS,

KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I DPAL 'BYOR BZANG PO ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL,
ZHVA LU RJE MKHYEN RAB MDUN DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA BLANGS,

GNAS RNYING CHOS RJE DANG ZHVA LU MKHYEN RAB GNYIS KYI SPYAN
SNGAR 'DUL BA DANG, PHAR PHYIN, DGYES RDOR, BRTAG GNYIS BCAS

MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN, KHYAD PAR KONG PO'I PHYOGS
SU BYON TE RGYAL DBANG KARMA PA BDUN PA CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO'I

ZHABS DRUNG DU GSANG SNGAGS ZAB MO'I NYING BCUD, TSE GCIG SANGS
RGYAS 'GRUB PA'I MYUR LAM MTHAR THUG ZAB MO NANG DON DANG

@113 RLUNG SEMS DBYER MED SKOR GYI KHRID GSAN CING NYAMS LEN
YANG LEGS PAR MDZAD, GZHAN YANG STAG LUNG PA, GRAM PA DKA'

BCU PA, RTOGS LDAN LHA BTZUN PA, BSOD NAMS BZANG PO SOGS MKHAS
GRUB GNYIS LDAN GYI BLA MA MANG PO BSTEN, THUN MONG

DANG THUN MONG MIN PA'I RIG GNAS MTHA' DAG LA MKHAS PA'I MTHAR
SON, CHOS DANG 'JIG RTEN GANG THAD NAS GZHAN DRING MI

'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA RGYUD LA 'KHRUNGS, MON YUL DU PHEBS NAS MON
SRIBS LHA KHANG BTAB, MON BTZUN SUM CU TZAM BSDUS,

KHONG GI YAB DGRA ZLAS BKRONGS PA'I RJES SU, YUM DRIN CHEN DE
YANG YUN MI RING BAR 'DAS, KHONG MING SRING GSUM YOD PA YANG

PHYOGS SO SOR GYES PAS SKYO BA TSAD MED 'KHRUNGS, GZHIS 'DZIN
RGYU'I DGONGS 'DUN RTZA BA NAS THOR, KHONG GI RANG RNAM LDEBS

BRGYAD CU GYA GNYIS PA'I MDUN GYI YIG PHRENG BZHI PA'I MJUG TU
``PHA RIN CHEN BZANG PO DE NI 'DAS SONG, MA RGAN MGON MO SKYID

DE YANG 'DAS, KUN LEGS PHA BU GNAM SA LUNG SKYOG MO LA YONG BA'I
KHO THAG DE CHAD SONG, RGYAL KHAMS GANG LA 'GRO RUNG BAR

CHAD LAS SRUNGS SHIG 'BRUG PA'I CHOS SKYONG'' ZHES GSUNGS, RANG
GI GZHIS 'KHOR BA DOR NAS DBUS GTZANG GI SA CHA, LHO MON,

MNGA' RIS, DVAGS KONG, LHA SA, GZHIS RTZE, GZHAN YANG DBEN PA'I
RI KHROD SOGS GNAS NGES MED DU BYON, SKU CHAS

KYANG SKYA SER PHO MO SOGS NGES PA MED PA'I TSUL KHO NA MDZAD,
SKABS DER MI MANG CHE BAS KHONG GRUB THOB RED ZER GUS PA CHEN PO

BYAS, MI 'GAS SMYON PA RED ZER SMAD RA BYAS, KHONG GIS RIG MA
ZHIG BZHES PA DER TSE DBANG 'DZOM ZER, SRAS GCIG KYANG

'KHRUNGS PA LA ZHING SKYONG 'BRUG GRAGS ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL,
SNE GDONG DPON GYIS KHANG PA DANG SA ZHING CUNG ZAD GNANG NAS

BAR SKABS SHIG DER BZHUGS, 'ON KYANG KHONG NI 'JIG RTEN THA MAL
PA LTAR GNAS SA GCIG TU BSDAD DE LTO GOS 'DZOM PA TZAM

GYIS YID TSIM PA ZHIG MIN PAR, YUL KUN TU BYON NAS CHOS 'JIG
RTEN KUN LA ZHIB 'JUG ZAB MO MDZAD, KHONG GANG DU BYON

PA'I YUL PHYOGS SU BLA SPRUL DANG, DGE BSHES, SNGAGS PA SOGS
STON PA SH'AKYA THUB PA'I RJES 'JUG TU KHAS 'CHE BA 'GAS,

DPON TSUGS 'DZIN PA, DKOR NAG ZA BA, NOR PHYIR CHOS 'TSONG BA,
GRUB MTHA' PHYOGS RIS KYI RTZOD PA BYAS TE, THA NA

SER DMAG BSDUS NAS DMAG 'KHRUG RGYAG PA SOGS CHOS MIN GYI BYA BA
NGAN PA MANG PO GZIGS PAS ZHEN PA GTING NAS LOG KHONG

GI GSUNG THOR BU BA'I LDEBS DGU PA'I MDUN NGO'I PHRENG THA MAR
``DKA' THUB SDUG SGUR 'DZUGS PA'I CHOS PA DKON, ,DKOR NAG

RAB 'BRING THA GSUM ZA BA MANG, ,CHOS PAR MING BTAGS CHOS MIN
RKYANG PA SPYOD, ,BLA MAR MING BTAGS DPON TSUGS RKYANG PA

'DZIN, ,SGOM CHEN MING BTAGS LKOG NYAL BTZUN MA'I KHYO, ,RTOGS
LDAN MING BTAGS THO CO'I HAR SPYOD BYED'' SOGS DON GSAL LA

TSIG RNO BAS MTSANG BRTOL DANG DGAG PA NAN SMIN MDZAD, GRVA SA
'GA' ZHIG TU THUB PA'I DGONGS DON NYAMS LEN MI BYED PAR,

TSIG GI ROL RTZED KHO NAS MI TSE GRON PAR BYED PA DAG LA ZUR
ZA'I TSIG 'DI LTAR GSUNG STE, KHONG GI RNAM THAR KHA PA'I LDEBS
DRUG CU

PA'I YIG PHRENG DRUG PAR, ``YANG CIG MTSAN NYID PA'I GRVA SAR
PHYIN, TSIG GI RKYAL GOG 'KHUR NAS YONGS, DON GYI RTZAM PA PHO

NAS YONGS, KUN LA KHYAD GSOD BYED KYIN YONGS, CHOS SPONG RTA LA
ZHON NAS YONGS, DON STOR STONG RGYUGS BYED NAS YONGS''

SOGS BSHAD,

SLOB DPON 'GAS CHOS 'CHAD PA NI, SANGS RYAS KYI BSTAN PA SPEL BA
DANG SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU MA YIN PAR,

RANG NYID LA GO SA DANG SNYAN GRAGS RGYU NOR SOGS 'THOB CHED YIN
PA DE DAG LA 'DI LTAR, RNAM THAR LDEBS DGU PA'I YIG PHRENG LNGA

PAR, ``DA LTA CHOS 'CHAD PA 'DI KUN, CHOS NOR PHYIR 'TSONG, PHAN
SEMS MED PA'I LTO GOS KYI PHYIR CHOS SHOD PA LA, SH'AKYA

THUB PAS TSE PHYI MAR BKA' CHAD BKA' DRIN SKYONG BAR ZHU LAGS''
GSUNGS NAS DMOD PA BOR, MDOR NA KHONG GANG DU BYON PA'I SA

GNAS KUN TU CHOS PA'I MING KHYER NAS 'JIG RTEN KHO NA SGRUB PA,
SPYI DON LA BSNYAD BTAGS NAS RANG DON SGRUB PA, LAS 'BRAS

LA MI BRTZI BA, KHA BSHAD DANG LAG LEN 'GAL BA, PHAN TSUN MGO
BSKOR DANG G-YO SGYU BYED PA SOGS MI DANG MI'I BAR GYI 'BREL

BA'I THOG TSUL DANG MI MTHUN PA'I BYA SPYOD NGAN PA ZHIG GNAS PA
DER THUGS MA RANGS PAR, KHONG GIS SKU TSE HRIL POR GNAS TSUL

DE DAG LA DGAG PA BRGYAB PA DANG MTSANG BRTOL BYED PA KHO NAS
DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM RNAMS NI RGYA GZHUNG

RNAMS LA LAD MO BYAS NAS, THOG MAR MCHOD BRJOD, DE NAS BRTZAM
PAR DAM BCA' BA, GZHUNG DNGOS LA'ANG LE'U DANG SA

BCAD MANG PO BKOD PA, MJUG BSNGO BA DANG MDZAD BYANG SOGS BKOD
NAS, NANG DON CHUNG NGU RE LA YANG TSIG TSOGS MANG THAG

CHOD PA BRIS NAS GLEGS BAM MANG POR LONG BAR BYAS TE MKHAS NYAMS
DANG CHER RLOM BYAS PA MA YIN PAR, DE LAS LDOG STE MGUR 

MA DANG, GLU RTA, BRO, BON PO'I 'DON RTA, KA BSHAD, 'PHRIN YIG
SGRUNG THUNG SOGS BOD RANG GI GOMS SROL GYI RNAM PA

LTAR BRIS SHING, TSIG KYANG PHAL SKAD THOG NAS BRIS YOD STABS
TSANG MAS GO SLA BA DANG, NANG DON YANG SKABS DE'I 'TSO BA

DNGOS DANG SBREL ZHING, MIG MTHONG LAG ZIN DU BYUNG BA'I TSUL
MIN GYI BYA NGAN MTHA' DAG LA DGAG PA BRGYAB YOD PAS, KUN

@114 GYIS BKUR BAR BYAS SHING GSUNG MANG PO ZHIG MANG TSOGS KYI
NGAG RGYUN DU DA BAR KHYAB YOD PA RED, KHONG GI RANG RNAM KA PA
DANG KHA

PA CHOS TSAN GNYIS YOD PA LAS, RANG RNAM KA PA'I LDEBS GNYIS
PA'I RGYAB NGO'I YIG PHRENG BZHI PAR, ``RANG GI RNAM THAR RANG

GIS BRIS PA 'DI, TSUR MTHONG SKYE BO'I YA MTSAN MIN NA YANG,
GZHAN GYIS BDAG GI SKYON YON MI RTOGS PAS, SKYON BTON

YON TAN SBED PA'I BYUNG TSUL BSHAD'' CES GSUNGS NAS, RANG SKYON
'DON PA'I ZOL GYIS SPYI TSOGS THOG GI DRANG BDEN MIN PA

DANG TSUL MTHUN MIN PA'I BYA BA SNA TSOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR CHOS
PA TSOS CHOS PA'I MING GI THOG NAS CHOS 'GAL GYI BYA SPYOD NGAN
PA

BYAS PA RNAMS LA ZUR ZA DANG DGAG RGYAG KHO NA MDZAD,

SKABS DER DBUS GTZANG GI GNAS TSUL NI GTZANG GI SKU DRAG RIN
SPUNGS PAS RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA PHO RTA LOR (1498)

GTZANG DMAG LA BRTEN NAS DBUS DBANG 'OG TU BSDUS TE, RAB BYUNG
DGU PA'I ME GLANG LO'I (1517) BAR LO NYI SHU TZAM DBUS

GTZANG GNYIS SU DBANG BSGYUR ZHING, PHAG GRU SDE SRID KYIS DBUS
DMAG LA BRTEN NAS GTZANG DMAG MTHA' BSKRAD BTANG STE ME

GLANG LO NAS DBUS GTZANG GI SA CHA RIN SPUNGS PA DANG PHAG GRU
SDE SRID GNYIS KYIS BCAD BZUNG BYAS, DBUS GTZANG GNYIS KYI BAR

DMAG 'KHRUG CHE CHUNG THENGS MANG BYUNG BAS, MNGA' 'BANGS LA BDE
'JAGS MED PA DANG KHYAD PAR NANG PA'I GRUB MTHA' SO SOS

KYANG DPON PO RE LA BSKYAB BCOL NAS, NANG KHUL 'KHRUG RTZOD BYED
PAR BRTEN, BOD MI RIGS 'DI MTHUN SGRIL MED STENG DUS

ZING GI ME 'OBS SU LHUNG BAR GYUR TO, GNAS TSUL 'DI 'DRA'I 'OG
SA GNAS DANG GRUB MTHA' GANG GI PHYOGS SU YANG MA LHUNG BAR,

BOD 'BANGS SPYI'I PHYOGS SU LANGS TE, SPYI TSOGS KYI LAM LUGS
NGAN PA MTHA' DAG DANG 'THAB RTZOD BYAS NAS SKU TSE 'DA' BAR

BYED MKHAN GYI DPA' BO 'BRUG PA KUN LEGS LTA BU NI BOD KYI CHOS
PA'I NANG SHIN TU RNYED DKA' BAS KHONG LA BSTOD BSNGAGS BYED

'OS PAR MA ZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG RNAMS LA GO RIM LDAN PAR BRTAG
DPYAD BYAS NA, SKABS DE'I DBUS GTZANG GI SPYI TSOGS

GNAS TSUL GANG 'DRA YIN PA'ANG GSAL POR RTOGS THUB,

KHONG DGUNG GRANGS DON BZHIR PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I SA PHO
BYI BA LOR (1528) 'DAS PA YIN NAM SNYAM YANG RNAM THAR

DU DUS NAM 'DAS PA GSAL POR 'KHOD MED PAS THUGS DPYAD LEGS PAR
MDZAD GRUB ZHU, 'DAS RJES SRAS ZHING SKYONG 'BRUG

GRAGS NAS GDUNG RUS STOD LUNG LAM 'PHAR DGON GYI DNGUL GYI MCHOD
RTEN DU DRANGS NAS BZHUGS SU GSOL LO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI MI RNAMS KYI NGAG NAS BRGYUD PA DANG SGER GYI
LAG TU THOR BA SOGS MANG PO ZHIG YOD PAR GRAGS KYANG,

PHYOGS BSGRIGS BYAS NAS PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I RIGS LA NGED DPE
MDZOD KHANG DU CHOS TSAN RNAMS KA KHA'I GO RIM BSGRIGS PA'I
GLEGS

BAM CHE LEGS GCIG BZHUGS YOD,

@115 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@116 *, ,'BRUG PA PADMA DKAR PO'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

003 659 PAR MA, KA

ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 34

'CHANG GI DGONGS PA GSAL BAR BYED PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS

SO, , (15) 204

BSRE 'PHO'I LAM SKOR GYI THOG MAR LAM DBYE BSDU SOGS NANG GSES
MANG BA BZHUGS SO, , (16) 126

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'BRUG PA PAD MA DKAR PO NI RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME PHAG LO (1527)
LA KONG PO'I YUL GYI BYE BRAG MCHIMS STOD, GTZANG

SHOD DGON ZHES PAR YAB JO SRAS KLU'I DBANG PO DANG, YUM CHOS
SKYONG SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG GRANGS GSUM

PAR CHOS RJE YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DBU SKRA BLANGS, MTSAN LA
RGYAL DBANG LHUN GRUB CES GSOL, DGUNG LO BZHIR PHEBS PA

NAS BDUN MA LON PAR GRUM BU'I SNYUNG GZHI BZHES PAR BRTEN CHOS
RJES MTSAN SPOS TE BDUD LAS RNAM RGYAL ZHES GSOL, YANG

SMAD 'BRUG PA'I BLA MA BGRES PO ZHIG GIS THAR PA RGYAL MTSAN DU
GSOL,

ME SPREL LOR 'BRUG RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG CHOS KYI RGYAL PO DANG
SKU SKYE GONG MA'I GCUNG PAndI TA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GONG MA'I

@134 DNGOS SLOB KUN SPANGS SHES RAB RGYA MTSO BCAS KYIS 'BRUG
PA'I SKU PHRENG GSUM PA 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS KYI GRAGS PA'I SPRUL
SKU YIN

PAR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG STE LO DE'I ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES GCIG LA
'BRUG RA LUNG GI CHOS GRVAR GSER KHRI LA MNGA' GSOL, DE NAS

BZUNG SLOB DPON SHES RAB GO CHA SOGS LA YI GE'I PHYI MO SOGS
'PHRAL MKHO SNA TSOGS BSLABS, BYA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL MDUN

DBANG CHOS THOG MAR GSAN, SE BA BYANG CHUB GLING DU PHEBS NAS
'BRUG BYANG CHUB CHEN PO'I MDUN GTZUG PHUD PHUL NAS DGE

BSNYEN DANG BYANG SDOM BZHES, MTSAN 'GYUR MED NGAG DBANG NOR BU
BTAGS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR LHA LDAN DU JO SH'AK

RNAM GNYIS SOGS LA MCHOD 'BUL THENGS DANG POR PHEBS, SLAR GDAN
SAR PHYIR BYON TE RJE MTHU STOBS ZHABS LA RGYAL BA'I

BKA' 'GYUR CHEN MO'I LUNG DANG RGYAL BA BKA' BRGYUD PA'I MAN
NGAG MTHA' DAG GSAN, KHYAD PAR MYANG RAM PA'I MDUN BSDUS

GRVA SOGS TSAD MA SDE BDUN MDO DANG BCAS PA LA SLOB GNYER CHER
GNANG BAS SHES BYA MTHA' YAS PA'I DON MYUR DU RIG PAS GTAN

LA 'BEBS PA'I RIGS LAM BDUD RTZI BZANG POS THUGS KYI BUM BZANG
LEGS PAR GTAMS, LCAGS BYI LO (1540) RJE 'BRUG PA

SKU GSHEGS PAS DGONGS RDZOGS SU 'BRUG PA'I GRVA NYIS STONG GI
TSOGS DBUR PHEBS, 'DAS MCHOD SOGS THUGS DGONGS RDZOGS

PA'I BYA BA RNAMS BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PHEBS PAR GSER
GLING MKHAN PO DKON MCHOG RIN CHEN GYIS MKHAN PO DANG,

SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYI GSANG STON PA, MYANG RAM PAS GRIB TSOD
PA MDZAD DE, DAD PA'I DGE SLONG BCU TSOGS KYI DBUS SU BSNYEN

PAR RDZOGS, BLA MA DE DAG GI MDUN 'DUL BA'I SKOR LA GSAN BSAM
GNANG BAS GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I MKHYEN PA BRDOL,

DE NAS BZUNG NYES BYAS PHRA MO'I TSUN LA BAG YOD GNANG BA MA ZAD
GDAN GCIG KHO NA'I SKU TSE 'DA',

BYA YUL DU 'BRUG LO TZ'A BA NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA LA SNYAN NGAG
DANG MNGON BRJOD LEGS SBYAR GYI SKAD DOD SOGS THUN MONG RIG

PA'I GNAS LA THUGS SBYONG MDZAD, PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I SKU YON GYIS
NA SMIN PAS SNYAN 'GREL SOGS GZHUNG DU MA'I TSIG 'GREL DANG

DKA' 'GREL SPYI DON MTHA' DPYOD BCAS LEGS BSHAD RMAD DU BYUNG BA
RIM PAR BRTZAMS, KHYAD PAR BYON BZHUGS KYI SGAR

DU'ANG GSO SBYONG GI LAG LEN BTZUGS, DE NAS TZA RI STOD SMAD KUN
LA PHEBS, DER ZLA BA GCIG SKU MTSAMS SU BZHUGS,

YANG LHO KHA PHYOGS DANG KONG PO STAG RTZE SOGS SU ZHABS KYIS
BCAGS, MDOR NA 'BRUG LO TZ'A BA DANG SLOB DPON RTA TSAG PA SOGS

MKHAS GRUB KYI YONGS 'DZIN BZHI BCU LHAG BSTEN, MDO SNGAGS RIG
GNAS BCAS PA LA MKHYEN RTZAL SHIN TU CHE BAS GANGS CAN

MKHAS PA YONGS KYI GTZUG RGYAN DU GYUR, GZHAN YANG SA SKYA DANG
KARMA BKA' BRGYUD 'BRUG PA BKA' BRGYUD GSUM GYI BAR GRUB

MTHA'I ZING CHA BYUNG BAR LHING 'JAGS DANG DGON SDE KHAG DANG
DPON RIGS RNAMS KYIS MNGA' 'BANGS THOB SHOR LA RTZOD PAS

G-YUL 'KHRUGS SOGS KYIS MI DANG DUD 'GRO BCAS PA'I SDUG BSNGAL
LA THUGS KYIS MA BZOD NAS, SKU DNGOS SAM BRGYUD NAS

THABS ZHI DRAG SNA TSOGS KYIS 'KHRUGS PA ZHI BA DANG, 'KHON
RTZOD RNAMS BSDUMS PAR MDZAD, SKABS SKABS SU LHAG PA'I LHA

MCHOG DU MA'I BSNYEN SGRUB DANG GZHUNG LUGS DU MA THUGS 'DZIN
GNANG, GZHI BYE KUN TU SGRUB THABS RGYA MTSO DANG LAM RIM THAR

PA RIN CHEN RGYAN DBU PHAR 'DUL MDZOD SOGS DBANG DANG BSHAD
KHRID BSTAR CHAGS SU MDZAD, GSER MDOG CAN PA 'BUM

RAB 'BYAMS PA DANG, DGA' GDONG 'BUM RAB 'BYAMS PA DGE LEGS
'BYUNG GNAS, ZHVA LU RAB 'BYAMS PA SHES RAB

BZANG PO GZHIS RTZE BA'I MKHAS PA DU MAS 'DRI RTZOD DANG DOGS
GNAS SLONG BA KUN LA SO SOR MA 'DRES SHING ZHAL GSAL BA KHUNGS

THUB PA RIG PAS GNOD PA MED PA'I LAN BTAB, DE'I RKYEN GYIS PHAS
KYI RGOL BA KUN DBANG PO'I GZHU LTAR LHAG MED DU YAL,

THOG MTHA' BAR GSUM PHYAG RDZAS BYUNG NGO COG SGER GYIS LONGS
SPYOD MA GNANG BAR SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR RGYAS

YUN GNAS KYI CHED DU THA NA KHAB DANG SKUD PA YAN CHAD BSDU NYAR
MDZAD, CHU GLANG LO NAS BKRA SHIS MTHONG SMON GYI GTZUG LAG
KHANG

GSAR BZHENGS DANG SHING BYI LOR RGYAL BYED TSAL DU GTZUG LAG
KHANG GSAR BZHENGS SOGS KYIS MTSON RTEN BRTEN PAR BCAS LO

GSUM RE'I NANG GSAR BZHENGS RE LEGS PAR GRUB, DGON GNAS DE DAG
DANG 'BRUG RA LUNG SOGS DGON KHAG DU MA LA SGRUB SDE,

CHOS GRVA MANG PO GSAR 'DZUGS GNANG, 'TSO BA'I CHA RKYEN DANG
RIG GNAS SLOB PA'I MTHUN RKYEN YANG YANG SBYAR,

PHYIS LHO KHA SA KHUL GYI LHUN RTZE RDZONG DANG NYE BAR GSANG
SNGAGS CHOS GLING GSAR 'DEBS GNANG, BZHUGS YUL GTZO BO 'BRUG

RA LUNG DANG RGYAL BYED TSAL GSANG SNGAGS CHOS GLING BCAS SU
BYED, DGE TSUL SLONG YANG STONG PHRAG LNGA NYE BAR BSGRUBS,
MTSAN

NYID KYI BSHAD GRVA SNGAGS GRVA COG GRVA SOGS DGE 'DUN GYI SDE
SNGAR MED GSAR 'DZUGS, NYAMS PA SLAR GSO DANG MI NYAMS GONG SPEL

RGYA CHER MDZAD, KHYAD PAR TZA RI DANG GANGS TI SE SOGS LA
MTSAMS SGRUB BYED MKHAN BRGYA PHRAG DU MA BYUNG ZHING RGYAL BA
BKA'

BRGYUD PA'I CHOS SKOR MAR PAS BSGYUR, MES RNGOG MTSUR GSUM GYIS
'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, MI LAS SGOM NYAMS LAN MDZAD NAS

GDUL BYA YONGS RDZOGS MAN NGAG GIS SMIN PAR MDZAD DE TSE GCIG
LUS GCIG LA SANGS RGYAS KYI GO 'PHANG LA BKRI BAR GNANG,

@135 MA ZAD SNE GDONG BKA' 'GYUR LA MA PHYI BYAS TE GSER DNGUL
GYIS BKA' 'GYUR GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, LHA LDAN DU THENGS GNYIS

PAR PHEBS, MAR KHAL SUM STONG GIS JO SH'AKA RNAM GNYIS MDUN
MCHOD ME PHUL, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG LA RTEN BZHENGS SU ZANGS

KHAL BZHI BCU BSTZAL, RIS MED KYI GDAN SA SO SO'I DGE 'DUN RNAMS
LA SKU 'GYED DANG, NYAMS THAG RNAMS LA SBYIN PA'I BGO

SKAL RGYA CHER BSTZAL, SPYIR YANG SKU GZHON DUS NAS MTHONG THOS
THAMS CAD LA DPYAD PA GTAN NAS MI GNANG BAR DE KA YIN PAR

MI SEMS PAR, BYA BA CHE PHRA KUN LA LEGS NYES KYI GNAD GSANG
DANG DNGOS DE'I GNAS TSUL JI 'DRA YIN LEGS PAR BRTAGS NAS

'JUG PAR GNANG ZHING, MTHON PO'I NGO SRUNG DANG, BTZAN POS GLAGS
BLTA BA RNAMS LA SNYING STOBS CHEN POS YANG YANG RGOL,

DE LTAR GZHAN GNOD SPONG ZHING GZHAN PHAN SGRUB PA'I NYAMS BZHES
THOG BSHAD SGRUB LAS GSUM GYIS RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE

SKYONG BAR MDZAD, DGON PA GSAR BTAB BCU PHRAG NYE BA DANG RGYA
BSKYED GTONG BA DANG NYAMS PA SLAR GSO BCAS BCU PHRAG GNYIS

MA ZIN TZAM YOD, GDUL BYA SLOB MA STONG PHRAG DRUG TU NYE BAR
BYUNG, CHOS 'BREL TZAM THOB PA SHIN TU MANG, BKA' RTZOM YANG

NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU PAR MA DPE 'BRING KA NAS THA BAR POD BCU
BZHUGS YOD,

DE LTAR MDZAD PA RNAMS MTHAR PHYIN NAS RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU
'BRUG LO (1592) GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS, DAD 

LDAN SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS GDUNG MCHOD DANG GSER GDUNG SOGS LEGS
PAR BSGRUBS, ,

@136 *, ,'BRONG RTZE BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

000796 PAR MA,

RTOGS PA BRJOD PA DAD LDAN RE SKONG NOR BU'I DO SHAL

ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS, , (1) 36

SO, , (2) 9

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG
