PHYAG CHEN GYI KHRID, GSANG GCOD DANG GTUM MO'I SKOR BCAS BZHUGS
SO, , (5) 58

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG
PO'I GSUNG LAS SGRUB THABS DANG BSNYEN YIG STA GON

LHAN THABS, DGA' LDAN LHA BRGYA MA'I KHRID, SNGAGS BTU, GTOR
BSHAD, DZAm LA'I CHU SBYIN, BYAD 'GROL,

RDOR SEMS RJES GNANG, TSOGS MCHOD LHAN THABS, JA MCHOD 'GREL PA
SOGS KYI SKOR BZHUGS SO, , (6) 99

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG
LAS SHER SNYING DANG BAR DO 'PHRANG SGROL GYI GSOL

'DEBS 'JIGS SGROL GYI DPA' BO, BZANG SPYOD, PHUNG PO GSUM PA'I
MDO, GSANG 'DUS SMON LAM KUN

RIG SMON LAM RNAMS KYI 'GREL PA BZHUGS SO, , (7) 55

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG
PO'I GSUNG LAS 'DUL BA'I LAS CHOG LAG LEN SNYING

POR SGRIL BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (8) 27

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG
PO'I GSUNG LAS RGYAN DRUG MCHOG GNYIS KYI RNAM THAR

DANG GRUB MTHA' BZHI SO SO'I LUGS KYI GZHI LAM 'BRAS GSUM GYI
RNAM GZHAG LE TSAN CHOS 'BYUNG, RIGS LDAN DRAG PO

@137 'BYON DUS, BYA SPYOD GNYIS KYI LAM RIM MDOR BSDUS, GZHUNG
BSGYUR LE TSAN BCAS BZHUGS SO, , (9) 61

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG
PO'I GSUNG LAS BYA BTANG YO BYAD d'A MA RU DANG,

GRA PHAD, 'KHOL ME, COG BU, RKANG GLING RNAMS KYI BSHAD PA, BKRA
SHIS LHUN PO'I GNAS BSTOD, GNAS MCHOG

MGAR MO CHOS RDZONG GI BSTOD PA, DBEN SA CHOS KYI PHO BRANG GI
GNAS BSTOD BCAS BZHUGS SO, , (10) 12

YONGS 'DZIN DAM PA RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG
PO'I GSUNG LAM MTSAN BSTOD DANG CHOS SRUNG SOGS

'DOD LHA GZHI BDAG RNAMS KYI MCHOD 'PHRIN, RTEN GSAR BZHENGS KYI
RGYAB YIG SMON TSIG DRIS LAN, PHYAG CHEN

BRGYUD 'DEBS KYI SRUB 'JUG RDZA RTZIG GI GTAM RGYUD SOGS KYI
SKOR BZHUGS SO, , (11) 27

DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA YONGS 'DZIN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RJE BTZUN
BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL BZANG PO DE NYID KYI DGONGS

RDZOGS SU CHOS GZUGS KYI SNANG BRNYAN LE TSAN BZHENGS PA'I DKAR
CHAG DGE, , (12) 5

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

DANG PO YUL GANG DU 'KHRUNGS PA NI, DBUS GTZANG CHOS KYI CHOL
KHA LAS, GTZANG G-YAS RU NYANG STOD 'BRONG DKAR RTZE YI

YAN LAG GRAM BU ZHES BYA BAR, YAB DPA' BRTAN SRID CHOD DANG, YUM
MCHOG SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I

SA GLANG LOR (1769) SKU BLTAMS,

GNYIS PA BSTAN PA LA ZHUGS TE THOS PA BTZAL BA'I TSUL NI, YAB
YUM GYIS BSKYED BSRINGS TE DGUNG GRANGS BCUR PHEBS

PAR 'BRONG RTZE CHOS SDE'I MKHAN PO RIN CHEN MDUN RAB TU BYUNG,
MTSAN LA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS GSOL, KLOG SLOB CING MI RING

BAR CHOS SPYOD KYI RIM PA RNAMS THUGS CHUD MDZAD, DE NAS CHOS
SDE CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PHEBS, TSOGS CHEN GYI DUNG BRDA

BTANG BA DANG DUS MTSUNGS PAS RTEN 'BREL LEGS PAR 'GRIG GRVA
TSANG THOS BSAM GLING DU BZHUGS, MKHAN CHEN BLO BZANG

BKRA SHIS KYI DRUNG DU DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, PAn CHEN DPAL
LDAN YE SHES KYI MDUN NAS CHOS KYI DGA' STON LA THOG MAR

LONGS SU SPYOD, CHOS GRVA LA RIG PA'I SGO 'BYED, BSDUS GZHUNG
NAS BZUNG PHAR PHYIN DBU TSAD 'DUL MDZOD DANG BCAS GZHUNG

BKA' POD LNGA LA TSIG 'KHRI TZAM MIN PAR GZHUNG GI DGONGS DON JI
BZHIN RTOGS PA'I CHED DU, NYIN MTSAN KHOR YUG TU 'BAD

BRTZON GNANG, SKABS DER NANG GI DGE RGAN BKA' BTZAN PA DANG,
PHYI MI LAS SNE DBANG BTZAN ZHING GTUM PA SOGS KYIS NYIN

MTSAN MED PAR BDE BA'I GO SKABS DANG BRAL, LTO GOS SOGS HA CANG
SKYO BAS SA STENG LA 'DI LAS NYAMS THAG PA MED DO SNYAM PA

LTAR SNANG YANG KHONG GI THUGS RGYUD LA GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS KYI
GO DON LEGS PAR BZHUGS PAS GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BA'I SPRO NYAMS

CHEN PO YOD, DE LTAR DGUNG LO BCO LNGA NAS SUM CU'I BAR MKHAS PA
DU MA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS, TSA GRANG DANG BKRES SKOM KHYAD

DU BSAD DE SLOB GNYER LA SNYING RUS GNANG BA'I 'BRAS BUR SHES
BYA'I DON RTOGS LA, 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM LA MKHAS PAS KUN

GYI YID DBANG 'PHROG DGUNG GRANGS SUM CU PA SA RTA (1798) LOR
PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI DRUNG DU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM

PA ZHUS, BCAD MTSAMS PHRA MO TSUN MIG GI 'BRAS BU BZHIN DU
BSRUNGS, SKABS DER SNYUN DRAG PO BYUNG YANG GSOL SMAN LEGS

PO GSOL BAS SNYUNG LAS GROL, RGYUN DU GZHUNG CHEN PO RNAMS LA
THOS BSAM BYED PA DANG MNYAM DU LAM RIM DANG PHYAG CHEN GYI DON

RNAMS LA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, SKABS SHIG NA LO CHEN SPRUL PA'I SKU
NAS DA LTA KHYOD KYI NYAMS LEN GANG LA BYED KYIN YOD CES PHEBS

PA LA, PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO SOGS BSTAN 'GRO LA PHAN PA RE BRTZON
KHUL DU LAGS ZHUS, RJE 'DI PA'I THUGS LA THOS BSAM BYED PA'I

@138 'BRAS BUR DBEN PA'I RI LA SGRUB PA SNYING POR BYAS NAS
MTHA' YAS PA'I SEMS CAN LA PHAN PA SGRUB PA'I RE MDUN KHO NA YOD
KYANG,

GROGS GZHAN GYIS BSKUL BA DANG YUL DE GA'I LUGS SROL DANG BSTUN
NAS BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'DUL GZHUNG GI DAM BCA' BZHAG

PAS DKA' CHEN GYI MTSAN RTAGS BZHES PA DANG, DPAL 'KHOR BDE CHEN
DU PO TI LNGA'I DAM BCA' BZHAG PAS RAB 'BYAMS PA'I

MTSAN RTAGS BZHES, DE NAS PHYOGS KUN TU MKHAS PA'I RGYAL RNGA
BRDUNG, SKABS DER PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER BSNYUN GYI BABS LCI

BA BYUNG BAS, MI CHEN BLA GRAGS GZHAN RNAMS ZHAL MJAL TZAM YANG
GNANG DKA' BA'I GNAS SU GYUR KYANG, DAM PA 'DI RTAG

PAR GZIGS LAM DU TSUD, GZHAN YANG BSAM SBYOR GNYIS KAS TSUL
BZHIN DU PAn CHEN RIN PO CHER BSHES GNYEN BSTEN,

DAM TSIG GSUM BKOD DANG GDUGS DKAR SOGS BLA MED KYI DBANG DANG,
BSKYED RDZOGS KYI ZAB KHRID, SKYES RABS SO BZHI

PA'I BSHAD LUNG SOGS DU MA GSAN, GZHAN YANG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD
PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO SOGS MKHAS

GRUB KYI YONGS 'DZIN DU MA LA MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PA
GSAN PAS THOS PA RGYA MTSO'I PHA ROL TU SON,

GSUM PA THOS DON NYAMS SU LEN PA'I TSUL NI, GANG THOS PA'I CHOS
RNAMS KHA SHAGS DANG PHA ROL SMRA 'BEBS BYED PA'I TSIG

SKAM DU MA SONG BAR, SNGAGS GRVA LO GSUM 'GRIMS RJES GSANG STABS
KYIS BROS NAS 'BRUG YUL DU DBEN PA'I RI LA NYAMS LEN

MDZAD, GZHAN YANG DBEN DGON GZIM PHUG DANG BRAG RGYA RDO RJE PHO
BRANG SOGS DBEN GNAS DU MA LA ZHABS KYIS BCAGS,

MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM YONGS RDZOGS LA DPYAD PA ZHIB MOR MDZAD, MI
RING BAR PAn CHEN DRUG PA DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS RJE 'DI RGYUD
PA GRVA TSANG GI RDO RJE SLOB DPON GYI GO SAR MNGA' GSOL,

BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I DGE 'DUN DANG PHYOGS GZHAN NAS 'ONGS PA'I
GDUL BYA RNAMS LA ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI GDAMS PA BUM PA GANG BYO'I

TSUL DU BSTZAL, PAn CHEN DRUG PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS DANG, PAn CHEN
BDUN PA'I 'KHRUNGS STON SOGS DGOS GAL CHE BA RNAMS

THUGS KHUR BZHES SHING, SHING 'BRUG LOR PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE GDAN
SAR BKOD,

GONG MA CHAN LUNG GIS KHONG PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I YONGS 'DZIN DU
MNGA' GSOL GZENGS BSTOD GNANG, MGON PO GANG GI

THUGS KYI DPAL BAR BZHUGS PA'I ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI BDUD RTZIS PAn
CHEN RIN PO CHE'I THUGS KYI BUM PAR YONGS SU BKANG, DE

NAS RGYU RKYEN SNA TSOGS LA BRTEN YONGS 'DZIN DGONGS PA ZHUS,
BZHAD SHANGS MTSAR SOGS NAS GDAN 'DREN PA MANG DU BYUNG

YANG, THOG MAR LEGS BSHAD CHOS GLING DU PHEBS, LHA KHANG DANG
MGON KHANG SOGS LA SNYAN DAR DANG DGE 'DUN PA RNAMS LA

MANG JA DANG SKU 'GYED, SDE 'BANGS BRO GZHAS PA RNAMS LA BYA
DGA' SOGS KYIS TSIM PAR MDZAD, DER SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS,

BAR MTSAMS RNAMS SU LEGS BSHAD CHOS GLING PA RNAMS DANG, BKRA
SHIS LHUN PO SOGS PHYOGS GZHAN NAS YONG BA'I DAD LDAN GYI

SLOB MA RNAMS LA RANG RANG GI 'DOD MOS LTAR, THUN MONG DANG THUN
MIN GYI RIG GNAS DPE 'KHYUD MED PAR KHRID, DE YANG

DBYANGS DANG GAR STABS, RIG GNAS SO SO'I DKA' GNAD JI LTAR LAG
TU BLANGS TSUL SOGS LA TSIG 'KHRI DANG BSHAD YAM TZAM

MIN PAR GO SLA LA STABS BDE BA DPE RIS DANG BCAS PA BSTAN PAS
GDUL BYA'I RGYUD KYI THE TSOM DANG RMONGS PA'I GO SKABS MA LUS
PA

'PHROG

SKABS SHIG TU BZHUGS GNAS SA KHA MTHO BA DANG CHU GRANG BA SKU
NA 'GRES PA GSUM GYIS ZHABS CUNG ZAD SNYUNG, DE'I STABS

KYIS LEGS BSHAD CHOS GLING PAS SPYOD LAM BZHI SHON BA'I KHANG
CHUNG ZHIG SA DMA' SHOS SHIG TU BRGYAB STE DER BZHUGS, DAD LDAN

YON BDAG RNAMS KYIS PHUL BA'I DNGOS PO RNAMS LEGS BSHAD CHOS
GLING DU 'CHAM GOS SOGS MCHOD RDZAS DU MA GSAR BSKRUN

BGYIS, BOD KYI MDZES RTZAL THAD YUL LJONGS DANG GCAN GZAN SNA
TSOGS 'BRI BA'I LAM SROL BTZUGS, BYA LO'I LO GSAR SHAR

SKABS BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PAn CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYE MA MJAL BAR
PHEBS, PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE LA BSTAN 'GRO'I DON RLABS CHEN

MDZAD DGOS PA'I GSOL BA SNYING NAS 'DEBS, DE HAR GDONG 'DU KHANG
DU SENG CHEN SPRUL SKU SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BRGYA

PHRAG BRGAL BA LA 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA'I DBANG STA GON
DANG BCAS PAR GNANG, GZIMS SHAG TU GCOD DBANG DANG

'PHO KHRID, GTUM MO'I KHRID LUNG SOGS KYI BKA' CHOS DANG TSAD MA
RNAM 'GREL DANG DUS 'KHOR BSKYED RDZOGS KYI KHRID LUNG BSTZAL,

PHEBS KHAR BZHAD MO'I TSUL DU, ``NGAS BKRA SHIS LHUN PO MTHONG
MI YONG, 'TSO BA'I CHA RKYEN MED'' SOGS GSUNGS, RGYU MTSAN

DE DAG LA BRTEN NAS RANG NYID SGOM CHEN GYI GZUGS SU BKOD NAS
<<RDZA RTZIG GI GTAM BRGYUD>> LJAGS RTZOM GNANG, DE NAS

LEGS BSHAD CHOS GLING DU PHEBS, SKU TSE HRIL PO 'CHAD NYAN SGOM
SGRUB KYIS SKU TSE 'DA' BAR MDZAD,

BZHI PA GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDU TSUL NI, LHA SA DANG, BKRA SHIS
LHUN PO LEGS BSHAD CHOS GLING SOGS SU GSER

GNANG BA RED, RJE 'DI PA'I GSUNG RTZOM CHOS TSAN KA NAS

PA RNAM BZHI'I CHAR 'BEB STE BYANG CHUB SEMS KYI DGA'

TSAL RNAM PAR BZHAD PAR BYED PA RDZOGS LDAN GYI SPRIN ZHES BYA
BA BZHUGS SO, , (56) 9

GOS KYI SMON LAM DANG GOS LA GDAB RGYU'I SNGAGS DANG, GOS
BRGYA 'THOB PA'I SNGAGS GOS PHUL BA'I PHAN YON DANG GOS

KYI BSKYED TSUL RAB GNAS YO BYAD BYIN BRLAB TSUL LAM BKRA SHIS
PAR BYED TSUL STE MI RTAG SOGS DRUG GI NYAMS LEN DANG

'DUL GRANGS, (58) 12

BZHUGS SO, , (59) 16

ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (60) 13

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

ME RGE MKHAN PO TSE SPEL DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE NI CHEN PO HOR
GYI YUL DU YAB THA'I JI PHYAN RDOR TSE DBANG DANG, YUM SGROL
MA SKYABS

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME SPREL LOR (1836)
ZLA BA LNGA PA'I NANG SKU BLTAMS,

NYIN SHAS RJES BTZAS STON BYAS SHING, DKA' CHEN BDE MCHOG
RGYAL MTSAN GYIS TSE SPEL DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE ZHES PA'I MTSAN

GSOL, SKU NA PHRA DUS NAS DKA' CHEN BDE MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN GYI
MDUN DU DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, MI RING BAR RJE BTZUN

DAM PA BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS ME RGE
CHOS RJE BLO BZANG BSAM GRUB RDO RJE'I YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN

MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DRUG PA GLANG LO'I ZLA BA BDUN PAR RANG DGON DGA'
LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING DU DGE 'DUN BRGYA PHRAG MANG PO'I SER

SBRENGS KYIS BSU BA DANG BCAS PHEBS, SKU GONG MA'I GDAN KHRIR
MNGA' GSOL TE DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG SHES RAB DGE RGAN DU

BSKOS NAS YI GE'I PHYI MO NAS BLOR 'DZIN DGOS RIGS TSANG MAR
GSAN SBYONG GI DBU BTZUGS, MKHAN CHEN NO MENG HAN DANG

CHINGS SU DZUG THU NO MENG HAN GNYIS KYI DGON PAR MJAL SKOR DU
PHEBS, BAR SKABS RNAMS SU DBANG RJES GNANG DANG LUNG

BCAS DKA' CHEN MDUN NAS YANG YANG ZHUS,

DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR YONGS 'DZIN BLA MA BRAG RI BA DGON PAR
GDAN DRANGS, MA GCIG GRUB RGYAL LUGS KYI TSE DBANG

SOGS DBANG DANG LUNG MANG PO ZHUS, MTSAN NYID KYI GRA TSANG
GSAR DU BTZUGS, BSDUS GRVA SOGS TSAD MA SBYONG BA'I MGO TSUGS,

@145 DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG SHES RAB MDUN RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA
BLANGS, GONG MA'I YONGS 'DZIN RIN PO CHE NAS DGE BSHES TSE
SPEL RGYAL

MTSAN YONGS 'DZIN DU BSKOS NAS YON TAN MA LUS PA BUM PA GANG
BYO'I TSUL GYIS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PAR MKHAN PO BLO

BZANG RDO RJE'I MDUN DGE TSUL GYI BSLAB SDOM BZHES, DE NAS MI
RING BAR MKHAN PO BLO BZANG RDO RJE'I SPYAN SNGAR BSNYEN
RDZOGS KYI

SDOM PA BLANGS, BLA SPRUL MKHAS PA BCO LNGA TZAM BSTEN NAS
PHAR PHYIN DBU MA 'DUL BA BCAS KYI GZHUNG DANG, GSO BA RIG PA

SOGS LA GSAN BSAM YUN RING MDZAD PAS SOG YUL DU MKHAS PA'I
GRAGS PA THOB, RBI SHR'I THU PAndI TA ZHES PA'I MTSAN NI SKU 

RABS GNYIS PAR PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES NAS GNANG BA YIN LA,
KHONG GI SKU PHRENG DANG PO NI MI NYAG GI RUS BRGYUD RGA LO
TZ'A BA

YIN PAR GRAGS, KHONG NI SKU RABS BZHI PA YIN NO, ,DGUNG LO ZHE
GCIG PA NAS GSUNG RAB RTZOM PA'I DBU BTZUGS, KHONG GI

GSUNG NI NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU PO TI CHEN PO GCIG LAS MED
KYANG CHOS TSAN SNA TSOGS DRUG CU THAM PA YOD CING, SGRUB
THABS

SKOR MANG SHOS RED, <<'DUL BA'I GLENG 'BUM GYI MING BTUS>>
DANG PHYUGS NAD BCOS THABS KYI CHOS TSAN PHAL CHE BA BOD SOG

SKAD GNYIS SHAN SBYAR YIN ZHING DE'I NANG 'DUL BA'I GLING 'BUM
KYI MING BTUS NI MGO NAS MJUG BAR TSANG MA BOD SOG SHAN SBYAR

SHA STAG 'DUG PAS BOD SOG SKAD YIG BSDUR NAS ZHIB 'JUG BYED PO
RNAMS LA DPYAD GZHI LEGS PO 'DUG KHONG GI GSUNG LA

KHYAD CHOS THUN MONG MA YIN PA ZHIG YOD PA DE NI SOG YUL 'BROG
PA'I 'TSO BA DNGOS DANG SBYAR BA DE RED, DPER NA RNGA MONG GI

G-YANG 'GUGS G-YANG LEN DANG, RNGA MONG 'PHEL BA'I GZUNGS SOGS
DANG, PHYUGS 'TSO BA'I RDZI BO LA PHAN PA'I CHO GA SNA TSOGS

YOD PA, RNGA MONG BZHON PA'I GZHI BDAG MCHOD PA'I CHO GA SOGS
LTA BU 'DI DAG BLA MA GZHAN GYI GSUNG DU PHAL CHER MTHONG RGYU

DKON PA SHA STAG RED, SKABS DER SOG PO'I YUL 'GAR GOMS SROL
NGAN PA'I LAM LUGS 'GA' ZHIG YOD PA BCOS SGYUR GTONG

'DOD KYI DGONGS PA 'KHRUNGS NAS MTHIL 'DON BYED, DPER NA RNGA
MONG GSON PO'I LUS KYI PAGS PA DRAS NAS GZHU RGYUD BYED

CING, PAGS PA MA ZAD BAR RIM GYIS DRAS NAS NYIN MANG POR RNGA
MONG LUS PO KHRAG GIS SBAGS PA SHI MA GSON DU BZHAG PA DANG,

RNGA MONG GSON PO ME 'OBS SU MER BSROS TE RIM GYIS BSREGS NAS
ZA BA, BA GLANG GSON PO LCAGS LEB STENG BZHAG STE 'OG TU ME

BTANG NAS SHA TSOS RJES ZA BA SOGS ZHIB GSAL BKOD NAS DE 'DRA
BYAS NA TSE 'DIR RNAM SMIN MTHONG CHOS SU MYONG BA'AM YANG NA
SHI

MA THAG TSA DMYAL DU SKYES NAS SDUG BSNGAL MYONG DGOS PA SOGS
LAS 'BRAS BSHAD PA'I SGO NAS GOMS SROL NGAN PA DGAG THABS

MDZAD 'DUG MDOR NA KHONG GI GSUNG DU GZHUNG 'GREL CHEN PO DANG
RIG PA'I GNAS KYI SGO MTHA' DAG LA DPYAD PA'I GSUNG MED

KYANG, 'DUL BA DANG PHAR PHYIN SKOR DANG GSO RIG SKOR CUNG ZAD
YOD PA PHUD, DE MIN TSANG MA CHO GA'I DPE CHA SHA STAG YIN PAS

BLA SPRUL DKOR ZAS LA RNGAMS PA RNAMS LA MED DU MI RUNG BA
MANG PO 'DUG GO ,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

MANG THOS KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO NI GANGS CAN BOD KYI YUL LJONGS
LA SNGON STOD SMAD BAR GSUM MAM DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM DU

DBYE BA'I YA GYAL GTZANG GI YUL DU RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I CHU MO
LUG GI LOR (1523) SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGAR PHEBS PA NA

'BUM PHRAG GSUM PAS BTAB PA'I GNYAN YOD BYA RGOD GSHONGS KYI
GDAN SA PA PAn GRUB BZANG PO BKRA SHIS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTEN,

GNYAN YOD KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU BLA MA DE NYID KYI SPYAN
SNGAR RAB TU BYUNG, SNGON GYI MING KLU RGYAL NOR BU ZHES PA DE
KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO

ZHES PAR BSGYUR, DE NAS BZUNG KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES PA'I
MTSAN RGYUN 'JAGS SU GYUR, BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SOGS DAM PA'I

CHOS KYI DGA' STON LA THOG MAR ROL, BLA MA BZANG PO BKRA SHIS
RTZA BA'I BLA MAR BSTEN NAS LO NYER BDUN RING 'BRAL BA MED PAR

RJES SU 'BRANGS, SBYOR KLOG THUGS 'DZIN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG
GNAS DANG BCAS BLA MA'I THUGS LA BZHUGS DGU BUM PA GANG

BYO'I TSUL DU SBYANGS, BLA MAS KYANG DGYES PA CHEN POS
BSKYANGS, KHONG DGUNG LO ZHE GNYIS PA SHING BYI LOR (1564) BLA
MA BZANG

@150 PO BKRA SHIS DAG ZHING DU GSHEGS, DGONGS RDZOGS LEGS PAR
BSGRUBS SHING BLA MA'I SHUL 'DZIN MDZAD NAS 'CHAD NYAN SGOM

SGRUB LA THUGS BRTZON LHOD MED MDZAD, DE NAS SKYID GSHONGS PA
BLO GROS RNAM RGYAL DANG KUN DGA' GROL MCHOG GNYIS KYIS GTZOS

RIS MED KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO BSTEN NAS RIG PA'I
GNAS MA LUS PAR SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD, LHAG PAR DU

TSAD MA DANG RTZIS KYI RIG PA LA MKHAS PA'I YANG RTZER SON,
SKYID GSHONGS PA BLO GROS RNAM RGYAL MDUN NAS TSAD MA RIG PA'I
GZHUNG

LUGS MTHIL PHYIN SBYANGS, SA PAn GYI RIG GTER LA 'GREL PA
<<LEGS BSHAD NYI MA'I 'OD ZER>> BRTZAMS NAS DKA' BA'I GNAD

RNAMS RE RE BZHIN DGAG BZHAG SPONG GSUM GYIS GTAN LA PHAB,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

MI NYAG BLO GROS RIN CHEN GYI MTSAN GYI RNAM GRANGS NI MI NYAG
RTOGS LDAN BLO GROS RIN CHEN DANG, RMA SE BLO GROS RIN CHEN,

RMA SE RTOGS LDAN SOGS MANG YANG YONGS GRAGS KYI MTSAN MI NYAG
BLO GROS RIN CHEN ZER,

KHONG GI GDUNG RIGS NI, RAB STONG TSAR SGANG GI MI NYAG GI RGYAL
RIGS SU GTOGS PA RMA SE STE MI NYAG MKHAS PA MI LNGA'I NANG

@153 GI RMA SE STON PA RIN CHEN BZANG PO DANG RIGS GCIG PA YIN
LA, YAB RMA SE RGYA GAR DANG, YUM GLING BZA' BSOD NAMS SGROL

MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME STAG LOR (1386) MDO
KHAMS KARMA DGON DANG NYE BAR GYAM SHER DU SKU BLTAMS, KARMA

PA SKU PHRENG LNGA PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA KARMA DGON DU BYON PA'I
DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG, MTSAN BLO GROS RIN CHEN ZHES PA BSTZAL,

SEMS BSKYED KYI SDOM PA GNANG, YER PA GZHON NU SANGS RGYAS DANG
SKYES MCHOG YON TAN RGYAL MTSAN BCAS LA RDZOGS CHEN BI MA

SNYING THIG DANG MKHA' 'GRO SNYING THIG SOGS RNYING MA'I CHOS
SKOR ZHUS TE NYAMS LEN MDZAD, PHYAG RGYA MA ZHIG BRTEN PAS SRAS
NAM

MKHA' ZHES PA 'KHRUNGS, SRAS DES ZUR MANG GNAS DRUG GI DPON BYAS
NAS LUGS GNYIS KYI 'PHRIN LAS RGYA CHER SPEL,

KHONG DGUNG LO NYER BZHI'I BAR SNGAGS 'CHANG GI TSUL GYIS RANG
YUL DU 'GRO DON RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO NYER LNGAR

PHEBS PA'I DUS SU DBUS LHA LDAN GYI ZHING DU KARMA PA'I GDAN SA
CHEN PO STOD LUNG MTSUR PHUR BYON, PO TA LA'I PHO BRANG DU RJE
DE

BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I SPYAN SNGAR DGE SLONG GI BSLAB SDOM MNOS, BKA'
BRGYUD PA'I CHOS SKOR YONGS RDZOGS DANG KHYAD PAR KARMA

SNYAN BRGYUD KYI ZAB CHOS MA LUS PA BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU
ZHUS, KARMA PAS LUNG BSTAN PA LTAR KHONG 'BUM RDZONG DU BZHUGS

SKABS, GLE YOS NA YOD PA'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS DGON GNAS PHUL TE
BKRA SHIS ZUR MANG SNAR DGON PA BTAB, ZAB CHOS NA RO

CHOS DRUG GI 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, BKA' BRGYUD GONG MA RNAMS KYI
PHYAG RGYUN TSUL BZHIN BSGRUBS, 'BUM RDZONG THANG DKAR PHUG

BRAG YER PA, RAB SGANG GI PHAG GDONG RI, JO MO GANGS SOGS GNAS
NGES MED RNAMS SU BZHUGS NAS NYAMS LEN SNYING POR

BYAS, KHONG GI SKYE PHRENG DRUNG PA LEGS BSHAD NI MDO SNGAGS
SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR DBU MA GZHAN STONG LA THUGS SHIN TU MNYES
PAS DE'I

SKOR GYI 'CHAD NYAN DAR BAR MDZAD, DE NAS BZUNG ZUR MANG DGON DU
BSTAN 'DZIN SPRUL SKU NA RIMS DANG GAR DBANG SPRUL SKU NA

RIMS SOGS SKYES CHEN MANG PO BYON ZHING, BKA' RNYING ZUNG 'BREL
GYI ZUR MANG BKA' BRGYUD CES PA 'DI BYUNG BA YIN,

KHONG GI SLOB MA NI SHIN TU MANG PO YOD KYANG GTZO BO NI RTOGS
LDAN YA BRGYAD DANG, 'JA' MO MI GSUM SOGS YIN TE, DE

LA RTOGS LDAN YA BRGYAD NI DBON CHOS DPAL YE SHES, RDZIS BSOD
NAMS YE SHES, MI NYAG DKON MCHOG BZANG PO, RTOGS

LDAN BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN, LHA YAG CHOS DPAL RIN CHEN, BRA BO
KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN, RTZVA SPYIL BSOD NAMS DPAL GRUB,

CHU GSOL 'OD ZER BZANG PO DANG BRGYAD, 'JA' MO MI GSUM NI BZHAG
SHES RAB BZANG PO, RDZIS DGYES RDO RJE BA, CHOS SKU

'OD ZER DANG GSUM MO, GZHAN YANG BYAMS PA DPAL, MI NYAG MU GU
DGE BSHES, GRAGS PA BZANG PO SOGS MKHAS SHING

GRUB PA BRNYES PA'I SLOB MA MANG NGO, ,

KHONG NI ZUR MANG DU SKU GSHEGS NAS ZHUGS LA PHUL BAR GSAL YANG
DUS TSOD NAM 'DAS PA NI DPYAD GZHI MA MTHONG BAS KHA

TSON GCOD THABS BRAL, GONG GSAL NI <<CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA'
STON>> DANG, SI TU CHOS 'BYUNG GSUNG <<BKA' BRGYUD

GSER PHRENG>> KARMA PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I DNGOS SLOB RTA TSAGS
TSE DBANG RGYAL GYIS BSGRIGS PA'I <<RTA TSAGS CHOS 'BYUNG>> BCAS

LA GZHIR BZUNG THOG BLA MA RANG NYID KYI GSUNG LA'ANG ZHIB TU
BLTAS NAS BRIS PA YIN,

GSUNG RTZOM SKOR LA SGOM SGRUB NYAMS LEN GYI SKOR SOGS MANG PO
ZHIG YOD PAR MNGON YANG 'DIR NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BDE

MCHOG NOR BU'I PHRENG BA DANG RJE BTZUN RNAL 'BYOR MA'I DBANG GI
SKOR, GSUNG MGUR SNA TSOGS BCAS CHOS TSAN NYER DRUG YOD

PA'I PO TI BRIS MA ZHIG BZHUGS YOD,

@154 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@155 *, ,RJE TZONG KHA PA'I GSUNG 'BUM,

DPAL 'KHOR LO SDOM PA LA BRTEN PA'I RDZOGS PA'I RIM PA'I ZIN
BRIS BZHUGS SO, , (4) 14

RDZOGS RIM GYI SPYI DON DPYID KYI THIG LE'I DMIGS RNAM SKYONG
BA'I ZIN BRIS BZHUGS SO, , (5) 40

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RJE TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA NI, MDO SMAD TZONG CHU
KHAR YAB KLU 'BUM DGE DANG YUM SHING ZA AA CHOS GNYIS LA SRAS
DRUG

'KHRUNGS PA LAS BZHI PA YIN LA, KHONG NI RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I
ME BYI SPYI LO (1357) ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCU LA SKU BLTAMS,

DGUNG LO GSUM BZHES PA'I TSE KARMA PA ROL PA'I RDO RJES YONGS
RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN DU BSGRUBS NAS MTSAN KUN DGA' SNYING POR

GSOL, CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN GYIS YAB LA RTA LUG SOGS
DNGOS PO MANG PO STER NAS BU 'DI NGA LA BYIN GSUNGS, YAB

KYIS SPRO BZHIN DU PHUL, DE NAS DGUNG LO BDUN PAR PHEBS PA
DANG CHOS RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN GYIS RAB BYUNG BSGRUB BCUG NAS

MTSAN BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL ZHES GSOL, RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED
DANG BDE MCHOG SOGS KYI DBANG GIS SMIN PAR MDZAD,

GSANG MTSAN
DON YOD RDO RJE ZHES GSOL, SHIN TU GCES PAR BZUNG, CHU BYI LO
(1372) MDO SMAD NAS CHOS RJE DON GRUB

RIN CHEN GYIS ZHAL TA DANG BRDZANG BA BZANG PO DANG BCAS
BTEGS, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN BZHES PA'I TSE DBUS SU BYON NAS 'BRI

GUNG SPYAN SNGA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO LA SEMS BSKYED DANG PHYAG
CHEN LNGA LDAN SOGS KYI ZAB CHOS GSAN, LHA RJE DKON MCHOG
SKYABS LA SMAN

SKOR GSAN CING GSO DPYAD YAN LAG BRGYAD PA THUGS LA BZUNG,
SNYE THANG BDE BA CAN DU RIN PO CHE BKRA SHIS SENG GE DANG,

SLOB DPON YON TAN RGYA MTSO, AU RGYAN PA SOGS LA MNGON RTOGS
RGYAN RTZA BA 'GREL BA DON GSAL SOGS GSAN SBYONG MDZAD,

ZHAG BCO BRGYAD LA GZHUNG TSIG MTHA' DAG SHIN TU BYANG BAR
THUGS SU CHUD, BLA MA 'JAM DBYANGS RIN CHEN LA BYAMS CHOS
GSAN,

LO GNYIS KYI NANG DU BYAMS CHOS LA MKHAS PA'I PHA ROL TU SON,
NYANG STOD RTZE CHEN DU MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO NYA DBON KUN DGA'

DPAL BA'I SPYAN SNGAR PHAR PHYIN MDO RGYAN SBYAR BA SOGS 'GREL
PA NYER GCIG LA SO SO'I BZHED PA DGAG SGRUB DANG BCAS PA'I
GZAB

BSHAD TSAR GCIG GSAN, RED MDA' BA LA MDZOD GSAN SKABS GZHUNG
TSIG BLO SBYANGS TZAM MA YIN PAR BSTAN BCOS KYI LUS

YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I DON GYI KHOG LEGS PAR RTOGS CHED DKA'
BA'I GNAS RNAMS LA 'DRI GTUGS YANG YANG MDZAD, KUN

BTUS SOGS ZLA BA BCU GCIG GI BAR DU NGOMS PA MED PAR ZHUS,
SLAR YANG NGOM RING DU DBYAR DPYID GNYIS KYI BAR DU RNAM

'GREL RANG 'GREL DANG BCAS PA GSAN PAS TSIG DON MTHA' DAG
THUGS SU CHUD, DBU TSAD KYI RIG PA'I SGO DANG PO RJE 'DI NYID

LAS RNYED PAS 'GRAN ZLA MED PA'I BLA MA GTZO BO'ANG 'DI NYID
GYUR TO, YAR KLUNG RNAM RGYAL DU RTZE TSOGS PA'I MKHAN PO TSUL
KHRIMS

RIN CHEN GYIS MKHAN PO DANG, SHES RAB MGON POS LAS SLOB, BSOD
NAMS RDO RJES GSANG STON MDZAD NAS TSOGS PA GNYIS

KYI GRANGS TSANG BA'I DGE 'DUN GYI DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS,
DKA' BZHI PA BLO GSAL BAR BSTEN NAS 'DUL BA'I BSHAD SROL

@168 THAMS CAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN, NYIN RE BZHIN
SHOG LDEB BCU BDUN RE THUGS ZIN GNANG, BCAD MTSAMS PHRA

MO'I TSUN YANG PHYAG LEN LA THEBS PAR MDZAD, BO DONG AE'I CHOS
GRAR RED MDA' BA LA RTZA 'JUG BZHI GSUM BCAS ZHIB TU GSAN,

SKYID SHOD DU BLA MA DBU MA PA LA 'JAM DBYANGS ZHI DRAG SKOR
DANG DGA' BA GDONG DU BLA MA DBU MA PAS LO TZ'A MDZAD NAS RJE
BTZUN

'JAM DPAL DBYANGS LA MDO SNGAGS KYI DKA' GNAD MTHA' YAS ZHUS,
ZHA LU RI SBUG TU KHYUNG PO LHAS PA LA BSAM SBYOR GNYIS KYIS

GUS PAS BSTEN, BOD NA YOD PA'I DBANG GI CHU BO RGYUN MA NUB
PAR RNAM PAR DAG PA PHAL CHER ZHUS, BLA MA'I ZHAL NAS DA NI

CHOS BDAG PO LA 'PHROD PA YIN PAS 'GYOD PA MED, DBANG RE'I
MTSAMS SU NGA LA BLA MA 'DI ZHES BYA BAS DGYES BZHIN DU GNANG

BA YIN ZHES NGES CAN DU GSUNGS, NYANG STOD BDE CHEN DU DBYAR
STON GNYIS LA CHOS KYI DPAL BA LA DBANG CHEN ZHE GNYIS DANG,

DE DAG GI BSHAD KHRID GAR THIG DBYANGS GSUM PHYAG LEN DANG
BCAS PA THUGS KYI DPAL BE'UR GTAMS, YO GA BA MGON BZANG

ZHES PA LA DPAL MCHOG RTZE MO SOGS KYI DKYIL 'KHOR CHEN PO
RNAMS KYI GAR THIG DBYANGS DANG PHYAG RGYA 'CHING BA SOGS SHIN
TU

LEGS PAR SBYANGS, SA SKYA PA BLA MA RDO RJE RIN CHEN LA RTZA
RGYUD BRTAG GNYIS DANG BU STON GYIS MDZAD PA'I RTZA RGYUD RNAM
BSHAD DANG,

SPYAN SNGA GRAGS PA BYANG CHUB LA SNYAN RGYUD TSAD MA BZHI
LDAN GYI KHRID YONGS RDZOGS ZHUS, SLAR YANG CHOS KYI DPAL BA
LA DUS 'KHOR

DBANG KHRID SOGS GSAN NAS STON DGUN DPYID GSUM TZAM BZHUGS,
RTOGS LDAN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN DPAL LA 'GREL CHEN DRI

MED 'OD DANG SKAR RTZIS LAG LEN, JO MO NANG DU KUN MKHYEN
PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL BA'I DRUNG DU SBYOR BA YAN LAG DRUG GI
KHRID,

LO CHEN NAM MKHA' BZANG PO LA SGRA K'A LA PA DANG TZANDRA PA
SNYAN NGAG ME LONG MA'I BSHAD RGYUGS PHUL, SA BZANG MA TI PAn
CHEN LA SNYAN

NGAG DANG, SDEB SBYOR, BZO'I BSTAN BCOS LAS 'BYUNG BA'I GSER
'GYUR, SPOS SBYOR LHA'I PHYAG TSAD, DBYANGS ROL MO

GAR SOGS LA LUNG TZAM MA YIN PAR PHYAG LEN THEBS NGES SU
SBYANGS BRTZON MDZAD, LHO BRAG BRA BO DGON DU LHO BRAG GRUB
CHEN LAS

KYI RDO RJE LA BRGYUD PA GNYIS LDAN GYI BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM
PA'I KHRID ZLA BA BDUN DU ZHUS, GSANG PHU SOGS MKHAS PA BRGYA
PHRAG

'DUS PA'I DBUS SU GRVA SKOR LAN DU MAR BYON, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG
BA'I SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB, SPYI LO (1388) TSAL GUNG

THANG DU BKA' 'GYUR RO COG LA ZHIB GZIGS GNANG NAS 'PHAGS BOD
GNYIS KYI BSHAD SROL THAMS CAD GCIG TU BSDUS PA LEGS

BSHAD GSER PHRENG LJAGS RTZOM GNANG, DGON GSAR DU PHYAG PHEBS
NAS BLO GROS LDAN PA DU MA LA RNAM 'GREL GYI GZHUNG NYAMS LEN

DANG SBYAR NAS LAM GYI RIM PA MA NOR BA RIGS PA'I LAM DU
DRANGS TE BSHAD SROL KHYAD PAR CAN GSAR BTOD GNANG, RAB BYUNG

BDUN PA'I CHU RTA SPYI LO (1402) LA RVA SGRENG DU LAM RIM CHEN
MO BRTZAMS,

DGUNG LO SO DRUG PAR DPON SLOB DGUS 'OL KHA CHOS LUNG DU
BSGRUBS PA MDZAD, LTUNG BSHAGS DANG SBREL BA'I PHYAG MDZAD

PAS ZHABS PHYAG GI SOR MO RNAMS SER KHAR SONG, RDO LEB LA
MAndAL MDZAD PA'I RDO SHIN TU 'JAM POR GYUR PA DENG SANG GI
BAR DU

MJAL DU YOD, LHO BRAG DANG, GNYAL, LHA SDINGS SOGS SU RTZE
GCIG TU NYAMS LEN LA 'BAD PAS THOS PA'I CHOS THAMS CAD

GDAMS NGAG TU GO RGYUN DU GSUNG RAB KYI DON LA DPYOD PA'I TSE,
SKU MDUN DU MI GZHAN GYIS LAS JI LTAR BYAS KYANG DE DAG LA

THUGS PHRA MO TZAM YANG MI 'PHRO, LTA BA'I KHYAD CHOS SNGAR
MED DANG LDAN PA'I 'JUG tIK DANG RTZA SHER tIKA CHEN MDZAD,

SHING BYA (1405) LOR SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO BRTZAMS, RAB BYUNG
BDUN PA'I CHU BYA (1393) LOR 'OL KHAR RDZING PHYI'I BYAMS

PA RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA ZHIG GSO MDZAD, ME BYI (1396)
LOR GNYAL GYI LUNG RAR CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR, RAB BYUNG

BDUN PA'I SA GLANG (1409) LOR LHA LDAN DU CHO 'PHRUL CHEN PO'I
SMON LAM BTZUGS, DGA' LDAN DU SGRUB MCHOD SPEL BA BCAS

MDZAD CHEN MANG POS BSTAN 'GRO LA SMAN PA RLABS PO CHE MDZAD,
DGA' LDAN SOGS SU MKHAS GRUB RIG PA'I MCHE SDER CAN MANG PO

LA MDO SNGAGS KYI BKA' CHOS DU MA GNANG, RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA
RIN PO CHE YUL DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR MDZAD, RJE

'DIS 'BROG RI BO DGA' LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING BTAB NAS
DER BRTAN CHAGS PA LA BRTEN NAS GDAN SA'I MING GIS DGA'

LDAN PA'I LUGS ZHES MING CHAGS, RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I BGRANG BYA
SO BZHI PA SA PHAG (1419) LOR DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM PA

HOR ZLA BCU PA'I NANG CUNG ZAD SKU BSNYEL BAR BYUNG BA DANG,
RJES KYI BYA BA RNAMS DRUNG 'KHOD PA DAG LA ZHAL TA ZHIB PAR
MDZAD,

NYER BZHI'I NYIN BDE MCHOG GI MCHOD PA RGYAS PAR MDZAD, NYER
LNGA'I NYI SHAR TZAM LA GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS, DAD LDAN

SLOB MA'I TSOGS KYIS DNGUL BRE CHEN BCO BRGYAD LAS GRUB PA RIN
CHEN SNA TSOGS KYIS PHRA BTAB PA'I GDUNG RTEN LA SKU MA NYAMS
PA

THEG MCHOG SNGAGS KYI PHO BRANG CHEN POR BYA SPYOD RNAL 'BYOR
GSUM LAS SPYOD RGYUD RIGS GSUM GYI SKABS KYI BKOD YIG

BZHUGS SO, , (17) 48

THEG MCHOG PHO BRANG GI LHO BRAR SGROL MA BRGYA RTZA'I LHA
TSOGS KYI BKOD YIG (18) 8

MTHU STOBS RTZE SOGS KYI BKOD YIG BZHUGS SO, , (19) 2

THEG MCHOG PHO BRANG GI BAR SGO SHAR NUB KYI NANG LOGS LA RTA
MGRIN LUGS GNYIS DANG SME BRTZEGS GZHAN GZUNGS PHRAN

MANG ZHIG BZHUGS PA'I BKOD YIG (20) 8

MTHU STOBS GLING DU CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYI BKOD YIG (21) 8

@173 SRID 'KHOR DANG THAR 'KHOR GYI RTEN BSHAD BZHUGS SO, ,
(22) 5

SRID 'KHOR DANG THAR 'KHOR GYI BKOD YIG BZHUGS SO, , (23) 5

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA NI LHA SA SNYE THANG GI SGANG RGYUD DU,
GDUNG RUS GNYAGS KYI RIGS YAB BLA MA DAR DANG, YUM LAM RNYED

SGROL MA'I SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING BYI (1504) LOR
SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO LNGA PHEBS PAR CHU 'BRUG LOR (1508) DGE

BSNYEN CHA LUNG PAS DPA' BO CHOS DBANG LHUN GRUB KYI SKU
PHRENG GNYIS PAR NGOS 'DZIN ZHUS TE BKA' BRGYUD YONGS KYI CHU
'GO LHO BRO BO

LUNG GI GDAN SAR BKOD,

DE NAS BLA MA RTOGS LDAN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO LA BOD YIG 'BRI
KLOG SOGS 'PHRAL MKHO KUN LA MKHAS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO

DGU PAR KARMA PA ZHVA DMAR BZHI PA DPAL CHOS GRAGS YE SHES
PA'I DRUNG NAS DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, MTSAN LA MI
PHAM

CHOS KYI RGYAL PO ZHES GSOL, BLA MA DE DANG DVAGS PO PAndI TA
CHOS RGYAL BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, DBUS SMYON HE RU KA RNAMS
LA

GSANG SNGAGS GSAR RNYING GI CHOS SKOR RGYA CHER GSAN, KHYAD
PAR SNYIGS DUS KYI THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA KARMA PHRIN LAS PA CHEN
PO

DGUNG LO DGU NAS NYER BRGYAD BAR DU BSTEN NAS MDO RGYUD MAN
NGAG GI CHOS RGYUN DU MA BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU GSAN, DE
NAS

CHOS GRVA CHEN PO LEGS BSHAD GLING DU PHEBS, BKA' CHEN BZHI LA
SOGS PA MKHAS MANG GI DBUS SU BGRO GLENG GIS GTAN LA

'BEBS, NYIN LTAR GZHUNG CHEN RNAMS THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO
NYER GSUM PAR ZHVA LU CHOS SKYONG BZANG POS MKHAN PO

DANG, MKHAN CHEN CHOS GRUB SENG GES LAS SLOB NAM MKHA' DPAL
LDAN GYIS GSANG STON BYAS TE DAD PA'I DGE SLONG BDUN TSOGS

LAS BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR KONG POR PHEBS
SKABS ZING PO 'BUM PA SGANG DU KARMA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE MJAL,

DGON GNAS 'KHOR LONGS SPYOD THAMS CAD PHUL NAS BCU PHRAG RIG
PA'I GNAS LA GSAN SBYANGS MDZAD, LHOD PA MED PA'I

BRTZON 'GRUS KYI GO CHA BRTAN PA DANG, PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I RNAM
DPYOD ZUNG DU 'JUG PA'I MTHUS RAB 'BYAMS SHES BYA KUN LA

BSREGS BCAD BRDAR BA'I GSER BZHIN MI 'PHROG PA'I MKHYEN RAB
RGYAS, DE'I PHYIR KARMA PAS MTSAN LA DPAL GTZUG LAG PHRENG

BA ZHES BTAGS,

DGUNG LO SO BDUN PA NAS BZUNG TZA RI'I GNAS NANG DANG, MKHA'
RO'I GSANG PHUG MTSO DKAR KHYUNG RDZONG GI GNAS RNAMS

SU LO GSUM DANG ZLA BA PHYED DGU'I BAR SGRUB PA LA BZHUGS,
GANG THOS PA'I DON RNAMS NYAMS BZHES SU GNANG BAS TSIG 'KHRI'I

RTZOD PA DANG GO BA 'OL SPYI TZAM MA YIN PAR, RANG RGYUD KYI
NYON MONGS 'DUL BA'I GNYEN PO DANG RGYA CHEN 'GRO BA YONGS LA
PHAN

BDE'I RTZA BA RU RTOGS,

LHO GRO BO LUNG GI MKHAR LAS ZHIG GSOS DANG, SRAS MKHAR LA
RGYA PHIBS GTZANG KHANG DU SANGS RGYAS RAB BDUN KUN DGA' BO

PHYAG RDOR KHRO BO, MAR PA'I SKU SOGS BKA' BRGYUD GSER PHRENG
RNAMS LEGS PAR BZHENGS, KARMA SGRUB TSOGS SDE BZHI'I DGE

'DUN GYI SDE BTZUGS, KARMA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE LHO KHA YAR LUNG
STOD RA MOR DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU THIM PA LA SKU GDUNG
ZHUGS

'BUL DANG, KHONG GI RGYAL TSAB TU ZHVA DMAR LNGA PA GSER KHRIR
MNGA' GSOL SOGS MDZAD, RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I SHING SBRUL

(1545) LO NAS CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON BRTZAMS 'GO TSUGS
TE MTHAR SHING BYI (1564) LO'I BAR LO NGO NYI SHU RTZA GCIG

RING LEGS PAR ZHIB 'JUG GNANG STE BRTZAMS GRUB PAR MDZAD, ZHVA
DMAR LNGA PA DANG RGYAL TSAB GRAGS PA DON GRUB GNYIS MDO

KHAMS SU KARMA PA SKU PHRENG DGU PA GDAN 'DREN DU PHEBS RING
LA, ZHVA DMAR NAG GI RGYAL TSAB MDZAD, DBUS GTZANG DVAGS KONG

SOGS BOD YUL PHAL CHER ZHABS KYIS BCAGS, GANG LA GANG 'TSAMS
KYIS DBANG LUNG RGYA CHER BSTZAL, MI RING BAR KARMA PA

DGU PA DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE MTSUR PHUR GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL
MDZAD, NYIN RE BZHIN THUGS KYI BUM PAR BZHUGS PA'I RGYAL BA

BKA' BRGYUD PA'I ZAB CHOS RGYA MTSO LTA BU RNAMS RGYAL BA ZHVA
DMAR NAG DANG DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM SOGS NAS RIG GNAS DON

@174 DU GNYER BA BYUNG NGO COG LA DPE 'KHYUD MED PAR TSIG DON
GO SLA LA 'BREL CHAGS PA'I BGO SKAL 'GYED, DE'I MTHU LAS GDUL
BYA

SLOB MA RNAMS KYANG RIG GNAS GANG CIR MKHYEN SPYAN YANGS PA
SHA STAG BYUNG, LONGS SPYOD KYI DNGOS PO BYUNG NGO COG LTO
SROG 'TSO

TZAM DANG NA BZA' RGYAB DROS TZAM LAS, DE MIN TSANG MA DGE
'DUN GYI SDE DANG RTEN BZHENGS KHO NA'I CHED DU 'BUL, TSE 'DI

PA'I CHED DU THOB THANG DANG SNYAN GRAGS DON DU MI GNYER, CHOS
LUGS DANG LO RGYUS SOGS BRTZAMS CHOS KUN YIN LUGS BZHIN

BRIS PA LAS, 'KHYOG BSHAD DANG RANG MTHONG GI CHE GTAM SOGS
MED PAR GZU BO'I BLO LDAN DGYES PA'I LEGS BSHAD KHO NA 
BRTZAMS,

MTHAR DGUNG LO RE GSUM PA RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME STAG (1566)
LO'I ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCU DRUG GI THO RANGS SU RE ZHIG
GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS SO, ,

SLOB MA'I GTZO BO KARMA PA DGU PA DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE DANG
ZHVA DMAR LNGA PA DKON MCHOG YAN LAG RGYAL TSAB SPRUL SKU SOGS

MKHAS SHING BTZUN PA'I SLOB BU MANG DU SPEL,

BSTAN BCOS KYANG PHAG MO'I RNAM BSHAD CHEN MO CHOS 'BYUNG CHEN
MO MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON, RTZIS KUN BSDUS PA'I 'GREL

PA RIN CHEN GTER MDZOD SOGS POD MANG DU MCHIS PA LAS NGED DPE
MDZOD KHANG DU CHOS 'BYUNG MKHAS PA'I DGA' STON SOGS POD

GSUM BZHUGS SO, ,
 
@175 *, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS KYI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

003784 PAR MA, KA

DKAR CHAG NOR BU'I PHRENG BA LAS, GLEGS BAM RIN CHEN DANG PO
DANG GNYIS PA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 2

003789 PAR MA, NGA

GLEGS BAM BZHI PA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 304

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

DZA YA PAndI TA NI SOG PO'I YUL KHAL KHA HANG KA'I HANG GI MNGA'
'OG HU CHIR THU ZHES PA'I SA GNAS SU YAB GZUNGS THAR DANG

YUM DKON MCHOG LA DAD PA LHAG PAR CHE BA DE GNYIS KYI SRAS SU
RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO (1642) ZLA BA BZHI PA'I
TSES

BCO LNGA'I SNGA MOR 'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG LO BZHI PA'I DUS SU RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO GROS RGYA MTSO LA
DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, DGUNG LO LNGA PA NAS YI GE 'BRI

KLOG SBYONG BA'I 'GO BRTZAMS TE DBU MDZAD SHES RIN PA'I DRUNG
NAS 'JIGS BYED KYI CHO GA SOGS BLOR 'DZIN GYI DBU BTZUGS,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR SOG SPRUL BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN MJAL TSE DBANG SOGS ZAB CHOS 'GA' ZHUS RJES KHONG LA NO

YON HU THUG THU ZHES PA'I MTSAN BSTZAL, LUGS GNYIS KYI SGO NAS
SPYAN BSKYANG CHEN PO MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PA ME MO BYA LOR DGE 'DUN BSOD NAMS DANG LHAN
CIG TU RJE BTZUN DAM PA MJAL BAR BYON, TSE DBANG

DANG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SOGS ZHUS, BYIN RTEN MANG PO GNANG, BLO
BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN

MANG POR BRTEN NAS RIG GNAS SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR LO TZ'A SLOB
PA'I DBU BTZUGS TE RNAM 'JOMS BYA BA KHRUS CHO GA SOG SKAD DU
BSGYUR,

RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I GSOL 'DEBS SHIG GSUNG RTZOM GYI THOG MA'I
RTZOM PHUD DU MDZAD,

@178 DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA LCAGS BYI LO'I STON KHAR RANG YUL NAS
THON TE DBUS PHEBS KYI 'GO BRTZAMS, MTSO SNGON SKU 'BUM

DGON DU PHEBS, SKU 'BUM SMON LAM CHEN MO'I TSOGS SU GDAN DRANGS
TE G-YAS GRAL GYI MGOR BZHUGS, SKU 'BUM TSOGS

PAR MANG JA DANG 'GYED LEGS PAR PHUL, SKABS DE'I SKU 'BUM GYI
KHRI PAS MTHONG HA CANG CHEN PO MDZAD, DE NAS CO NE DGON

SOGS BRGYUD DBUS LHA LDAN DU BYON, ZLA BA DGU PAR LHA SAR 'BYOR,
GTZUG LAG DANG, JO SHAKA RNAM GNYIS, SE 'BRAS

BCAS MJAL ZHING, LNGA PA CHEN PO'I SPYAN SNGAR RAB BYUNG DGE
TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS, LHA SAR ZLA BA GNYIS TZAM 'GOR RJES STOD

LUNG SOGS BYANG LAM NAS GTZANG BKRAS LHUN LA PHEBS, ZLA BA BCU
GCIG PA'I TSES BRGYAD NYIN, PAn CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS RGYAN

SKU NA SHIN TU SMIN PA DE MJAL ZHING CHOS 'BREL 'GA' ZHUS, DE
NAS YUL GCIG PA'I SLOB GROGS 'GAS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN BKRA

SHIS LHUN POR GSAN SBYONG MDZAD RGYU'I THUGS THAG BCAD, DKA'
CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA DGE RGAN BSTEN NAS GZHUNG POD

LNGA LA SBYANGS PA NAN SMIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PA SHING
'BRUG LOR DPYID ZLA GSUM PAR PHO BRANG PO TA LAR GZIM CHUNG NYI

'OD 'KHYIL BA'I NANG RGYAL DBANG LNGA PAS MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA
DANG RJE BYAMS PA RIN CHEN GYIS GSANG STON MDZAD, DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN GRANGS TSANG TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA
YANG DAG PAR BLANGS, LNGA PA CHEN POS BYAMS CHOS LNGA'I LUNG

SOGS DAM CHOS 'GA' YANG GNANG, DE NAS DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR LNGA
PA CHEN PO'I SPYAN SNGAR DGE BSNYEN NAS BZUNG DGE TSUL

SLONG GI SDOM PA BSKYAR BSGRUBS MDZAD, SLAR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR
BYON NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA GSAN

SBYONG YUN RING MDZAD PAR MA ZAD SMAN DANG RTZIS SOGS THUN MONG
RIG GNAS DAG LA'ANG SBYANGS PA MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD, DE NAS

DBUS LHA LDAN DU BYON TE PHA BONG KHAR BZHUGS NAS RDO RJE 'DZIN
PA 'JAM DBYANGS GRAGS PA'I DRUNG DU GSANG SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MA

LUS PA GSAN, DE NAS GTZANG DU PHEBS SHING SLAD MAR GTZANG DANG
DBUS BAR LAN MANG PHEBS BZHUD MDZAD CING KHRID LUNG ZHU BA

DANG RTEN MJAL SOGS THENGS MANG MDZAD, MDOR NA DBUS GTZANG DU
RGYAL BA PAn CHEN GNYIS KYI GTZOS MKHAS DBANG DGE BA'I

BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BRTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS BCAS LA
SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN NAS DGUNG LO SO BRGYAD PA SA MO LUG GI

LOR BYANG PHYOGS HOR GYI YUL DU CHIBS KHA BSGYUR, ZLA BA LNGA
PA'I TSES PA BCU GCIG NYIN LHA SA NAS BTEG BYANG LAM BRGYUD NAG

CHUR ZHAG BCU TZAM MAL GSO MDZAD DE 'BRI CHU BRGAL TE ZLA BA
BRGYAD PA'I TSES GCIG LA MTSO SNGON POR 'BYOR, SKU 'BUM BCAS

LA MJAL KHA PHEBS ZIN RJES SOG PO'I DPON BLA BSU MI MANG PO
'BYOR BA DANG LHAN CIG TU RIM GYIS BTEG STE ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES

GSUM NYIN PAR RANG YUL DU 'BYOR NAS DRIN CAN GYI YAB YUM GNYIS
KYI ZHAL MJAL ZHING THUGS SNANG SKYID PA'I BGRO GLENG BYAS TE

NYIN GSUM TZAM BZHUGS, DE NAS PHYOGS DE'I DGON KHAG RNAMS SU
PHEBS SHING BLA MA DANG DPON KHAG RNAMS KYIS 'BUL CHEN

STOBS SHING DGA' BSU RGYA CHEN BYAS, BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES GSUM
NYIN PAR RANG DGON DU 'BYOR, RJE BTZUN DAM PA SOGS BLA

CHEN RNAMS MJAL ZHING 'BUL SKYES RGYA CHEN PHUL, GRVA MANG LA
MANG 'GYED DANG YON BDAG RNAMS LA SKYES PHUN SUM TSOGS PA
BSTZAL,

LNGA PA CHEN PO'I BKA' LTAR SOG PO'I YUL DU SMYUNG GNAS SRUNG
BA'I SROL RGYA CHER SPEL, RJE BTZUN DAM PA RI BO DGE RGYAS GLING
GI

DGON PAR PHEBS SKABS KHONG PHYAG PHYIR PHEBS, RJE BTZUN DAM PAS
GSER SRANG BCU DANG RTA SUM CUS GTZOS PA'I GNANG SBYIN

SPOM MTHO BA BSTZAL,

ME MO STAG GI LOR (1686) DGA' LDAN KHRI THOG ZHE BZHI PA NGAG
DBANG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO SOG YUL DU HA LA HA AO'I DUS ZING GI

BAR 'DUM LA PHEBS PA KHU RING PIL CHIR DU ZHAL MJAL ZHING CHOS
'GA' GSAN, CHOS RJE AA CHI THUS KHONG MKHAR SNGON POR GDAN

DRANGS DER GDUL BYA MANG PO SMIN GROL GYI LAM LA BKOD,

LCAGS LUG LOR (1691) GONG MAR 'TSAMS ZHU MDZAD PA'I CHED DU GONG
MA'I PHO BRANG DU PHEBS, GONG MAS DZA SAG GI GO

GNAS GNANG, LO DE'I PHYI LOR YANG GONG MAR 'TSAMS ZHUR PHEBS NAS
RJE BTZUN DAM PA DANG MNYAM DU GONG MA'I YUM THE HU'I

RTEN RNAMS LA RAB GNAS MDZAD, GONG MA'I SPYAN SNGAR MKHAS DBANG
'GA' DANG RTZOD GLENG MDZAD PAS KHONG GI RNAM DPYOD LA GONG

MAS BSTOD BSNGAGS MDZAD, DE NAS TSUR PHEBS TE MKHAR SNGON DU
DGON PA'I KHRIR BZHUGS TE 'CHAD NYAN YUN RING MDZAD,

LO DE'I STON KHAR DGA' LDAN KHRI NYER BZHI PA BYAMS PA RGYA
MTSO'I YANG SRID SOG YUL DU 'KHRUNGS, SPRUL SKU DE'I GTZUG PHUD
BZHES

TE RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BSTZAL, MDOR NA SOG YUL GYI
DGON SDE TSANG MAR ZHABS KYIS BCAGS TE 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD CING

SLOB MA MANG PO SPEL, SKABS DER KHONG GIS SOG SKAD THOG NAS CHOS
BSHAD PA YIN PAS, NYON MKHAN SHIN TU MANG PO YOD,

SHING PHAG LO (1695) LA GONG MA'I PHO BRANG DU PHEBS NAS LO GSAR
BTANG, BOD CHOS LHA KHANG DU DAM CHOS 'CHAD, TSUR RANG

DGON DU PHEBS SHING ME BYI'I LO GSAR DGYES STON DANG SMON LAM
CHEN MO 'TSOGS, LO DER GONG MA'I DMAG GIS SBO SHO THU'I DPUNG

@179 TSOGS LHAG MED DU BCOM, GONG MA MKHAR SNGON DU PHEBS PA
MJAL ZHING, GONG MA CHEN PO KHONG GI BZHUGS KHANG DU BYON, SGROL

MA'I SKU ZHIG GONG MAR PHUL TE ZHO DRANGS PAS GONG MAS DGYES
BZHIN BZHES TE BSNGAGS BRJOD MDZAD, KHONG GI DBON BLO BZANG

DAR RGYAS LA DZA SAG GI GO SA GNANG, DE NA DGON PA GSAR BZHENGS
DANG RGYA BSKYED, SLOB MA MANG POR CHOS 'CHAD NYAN,

DGON PA'I RTEN BKA' 'GYUR BZHENGS PA SOGS MDZAD, LCAGS PHO 'BRUG
GI LOR YAB DGONGS PA RDZOGS NAS DGONGS RDZOGS

ZAB RGYAS BSGRUBS, DE NAS SLOB MA'I GTZO BO MKHAR SNGON RAB
'BYAMS PA DANG BKA' 'GYUR BA MER GEN BKA' BCU PA SOGS LA

'CHAD NYAN YUN RING MDZAD PA DANG, DGE TSUL DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA
MANG PO GNANG BA, AO RONG RAB BRTAN WANG DANG BKRA SHIS

WANG SOGS WANG MANG POR ZAB CHOS GNANG BA DGE 'DUN SHIN TU MANG
POR BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG SOGS DBANG LUNG MANG PO GNANG,

GONG MA'I MDUN SNGA PHYIR LAN MANG BCAR ZHING GONG MAS DGYES
GZIGS BDAG SKYONG TSAD MED GNANG BA BCAS DANG, DBUS LHA

LDAN DU THENGS GNYIS PA PHEBS 'DUN YOD KYANG DGUNG NA SMIN PA'I
RKYEN GYIS RE BA MA GRUB, RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING MO

LUG GI LO (1715) ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES NYI SHU NYIN PAR DGONGS
PA RDZOGS SO, ,

BRTZAMS PA'I RNAM THAR TSIGS BCAD MA <<RNAM

BKA' 'BUM RIN PO CHE'I PAR BYANG SMON TSIG BZHUGS SO, , (15) 3

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'JIGS MED DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO NI MDO SMAD REB GONG GI YUL GYI BYE
BRAG LAM MDANGS ZHES PA'I SA CHAR YAB SNGAGS 'CHANG DGE

'DUN BSOD NAMS DANG YUM SGROL MA SKYID GNYIS LA SRAS MING SRING
BRGYAD YOD PA'I NANG GI THA CHUNG YIN LA, RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA

PA'I SA PHO KHYI'I LO (1898) ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES NYER
LNGA LA 'KHRUNGS SO, ,

DGUNG LO LNGA PAR YAB YUM DANG SDEBS TE RONG BOR PHEBS, SHAR BLO
BZANG SKAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MJAL, LO

TSAD DANG MING 'BROG PA'I GNAS TSUL SOGS BKA' 'DRI GNANG BA'I
LAN THOGS MED PHUL BAS BLA MA SHIN TU THUGS DGYES,

KHYE'U'I MING LA GU RU DBANG CHEN SKYABS ZER, DE NAS MI RING BAR
SHAR BLO BZANG SKAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYIS RDZONG DKAR

'JIGS MED BSAM GTAN GYI YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD, GDAN SA'I
KHRIR BKOD DE DUNG DKAR BLA RGAN MDUN NAS KA KHA

SOGS KLOG SBYONG BA'I 'GO TSUGS, ZHVA DMAR RIN PO CHE'I ZHAL
BKOD LTAR SPYAN SNGA DKON MCHOG PHUN TSOGS KLOG GI SLOB DPON

BKUR, 'BRI KLOG SBYOR SDEBS BLOR 'DZIN BCAS LEGS PAR SBYANGS,
DGUNG LO BDUN PA'I THOG LDI TSAR PHEBS NAS ZHVA DMAR

DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO MJAL, GSER SRANG GANG GIS GTZOS
PA'I 'BUL BA GYA NOM PA PHUL ZHING, MKHAN PO DE NYID KYI

MDUN NAS RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA MNOS, 'JIGS MED DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO
ZHES PA'I MTSAN GNANG, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR ZHVA

DMAR RIN PO CHER 'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG ZHUS GSANG MTSAN RIN CHEN
RDO RJE BSTZAL, KHRI RGAN 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO

DANG BDE YANGS RIN PO CHE SOGS LA'ANG DBANG LUNG CI RIGS ZHUS,
DGUNG LO DGU PAR SKU 'BUM DU BYON, T'A LA'I BCU GSUM

PA DER PHEBS PA DANG STABS 'GRIGS PA MJAL ZHING, DNGOS 'BUL
MDZAD NAS PHYAG DBANG ZHUS, SKU 'BUM GYI GSER GDUNG

CHEN MO SOGS RTEN RNAMS MJAL, BCO LNGA'I DGONG MOR MCHOD PA'I
MAR RGYAN RGYAS SPROS RNAMS LA LTAD MO GZIGS, DGUNG LO

BCU GCIG PAR BYA KHYUNG BRGYUD LDI TSAR BYON, BLA MA'I MDUN ZAB
CHOS MU MTHUD ZHUS, MTHU DGON DANG 'DAN MA, DAN TIG

RGYA ZHUR SOGS SU PHEBS, SKABS DER GTZANG STON BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS
'PHEL SHEL DGON DU BZHUGS PA MJAL BAR BYON NAS

BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM DANG, THU'U BKVAN GSUNG 'BUM, AA ROL BLO
BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM LUNG SOGS

BKA' CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR LDI TSA BKRA SHIS
CHOS SDINGS SU BYON NAS SLOB DPON MDZOD DGE TSUL KHRIMS

DANG BLA MA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN RNAM GNYIS KYI MDUN DU DPE KHRID
KYI DBU BTZUGS, RVA STOD BSDUS GRVA NAS MGO BRTZAMS TE TSAD

MA'I GZHUNG RNAMS GSAN, LDI TSA DGON DU BZHUGS SHAG GSAR PA ZHIG
BTAB NAS BZHUGS, RIM BZHIN TSAD MA GTZOR BZUNG

THOG DAG YIG BCAS SBYONG BA DANG, BAR BAR RNAMS SU DBANG LUNG
SOGS KYANG MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PA CHU BYI LOR

KHONG GI BLA MA ZHVA DMAR BA 'DAS, THUGS SKYO BA CHEN PO MDZAD,
DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR NAGS KLONG DGE LEGS CHOS RDZONG DU

@190 PHEBS NAS 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA'I MDUN KUN BTUS DANG MDZOD
SOGS DPE KHRID GSAN, SKABS DER YAB 'DAS NAS RANG YUL

DU YUM GYI THUGS GSO'I PHYIR PHEBS, DE NAS SGRA DANG SDEB SBYOR
SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA ME 'BRUG LOR 'JAM DBYANGS

THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS MKHAN PO DANG YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DPAL
BAS GSANG STON SOGS DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG DBUS SU DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA MNOS, 'DUL BA MDO RTZA SOGS 'DUL BA'I SKOR GYI
GZHUNG RNAMS LEGS PAR GSAN, SKABS DER REB GONG DU

DUS MA BDE BAR BRTEN SHEL DGON DU PHEBS NAS YONGS 'DZIN BLO
BZANG DPAL BA'I DRUNG NAS SNGAGS RIM GYI KHRID GSAN PA'I DBU

BTZUGS, RDZONG DKAR DU GZHI PHAB STE SNGAGS RIM CHEN MOR GSAN
SBYONG MDZAD CING, BRJED BYANG YANG BTAB, DE NAS RIM

BZHIN DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU MA'I SPYAN SNGAR KHRID LUNG MTHA'
YAS PA GSAN, RONG BOR 'JIGS MED TSANG DANG STAG LUNG SPRUL

SKU SOGS LAS SGRA RIG DANG LANYDZA'I YIG GZUGS SOGS SBYANGS,
RTZIS KYI RIG PA YANG MTHAR PHYIN PAR SBYANGS, YONGS 'DZIN

MCHOG GI MDUN NAS SNYAN NGAG GI GZHUNG ME LONG MA 'GREL PA BCAS
GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN

MDUN DBU MA'I GZHUNG 'JUG PA BCAS KYI DPE KHRID ZHUS, GSER KHA
'JIGS MED SKAL BZANG DANG LUM RA SPRUL SKU SOGS LA

BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BSTZAL, DGUNG LO SUM CU PAR SHAR SKAL
LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GDAN SA RONG BO DGON DU PHEBS NAS SHAR SKU

PHRENG BDUN PA SKAL BZANG 'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSOR DAM PA'I CHOS
KYI DGA' STON BSTZAL ZHING GSER KHRID BKOD, SPRUL SKU DE'I RIGS

KYI COD PAN DU BKUR, SPRUL SKU DE LA DBANG LUNG BSHAD KHRID SOGS
YUN RING PHUL, DGUNG LO SO GCIG PAR RNGA BA'I YUL DU

BYON NAS KI RTI DGON SOGS SU DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA CHOS CHAR PHAB,
RONG CHEN KI RTI SPRUL SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN DU GYUR, DGUNG LO

SO BDUN PA SHING KHYI LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PAR PAn CHEN DGU PA BLO
BZANG THUB BSTAN CHOS KYI NYI MA DBUS SA GNAS SRID GZHUNG DANG
'GAL

ZLA BYUNG BAS RGYA HOR YUL GRUR PHEBS LAM SKU 'BUM DU BRGYUD PA
MJAL BAR BYON, PAn CHEN NAS 'CHAD NYAN SGOM SGRUB SGO NAS

RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA SPEL DGOS TSUL SOGS KYI BKA' LUNG LHUG PAR
BSTZAL, CHE SHOS SPRUL SKU DANG AA GYA SPRUL SKU SOGS MJAL
ZHING,

GSOL STON DANG GSUNG MCHID LEGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN PA
SHING SPREL LOR YONGS 'DZIN 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA SKU

GSHEGS, DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR
SPYAN SNGA DKON MCHOG PHUN TSOGS DGUNG GRANGS GYA GSUM

DU PHEBS PA DES SKU MA 'DAS SNGON DGONGS RDZOGS SNGON DU SGRUB
DGOS DGONGS TE KHONG LA ZHAL BKOD MDZAD PA LTAR DGON SDE DANG

SPRUL SKU KHAG LA BSNGO RTEN DANG 'BUL 'GYED SGOR MO CHIG KHRI
LHAG BSTAN NAS YONGS 'DZIN SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE'I DGE SGRUB
RGYA CHE BA

MDZAD CING YONGS 'DZIN SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHES THUGS DGYES PA
CHEN PO MDZAD, MDOR NA MDO SMAD KYI RMA KLUNG CHEN PO'I LHO
BYANG GI

DGON SDE RONG BO DANG, STAG TSANG LHA MO, KA RING, BYA KHYUNG
SOGS DANG RNGA KHOG GI DGON GSAR SOGS DGE LDAN PA'I DGON

SDE RNAMS SU THENGS MANG PHEBS TE LUNG KHRID 'CHAD NYAN DANG DGE
TSUL DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA GNANG BA SOGS CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BA
MANG PO

MDZAD CING, LAN KRO'U GRONG KHYER DU NAD 'CHOS LA THENGS SHIG
BYON MYONG BA BCAS, YONGS 'DZIN GTZO BO ZHVA DMAR DGE 'DUN

BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO DANG, 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA BLO BZANG DPAL
LDAN, KHRI RGAN 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO GTZOS

PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DGU TZAM BSTEN NAS SHES PAR BYA BA'I
GNAS KUN LA MKHAS PAR MDZAD, SGO MANG LHA RAMS PA SHES

RAB RGYA MTSO DANG DAM PA'I CHOS KYI RTZOD PA MDZAD DE RGOL BA
BRGAL LAN GYI GSUNG RAB MANG PO BRTZAMS, SLOB MA'I MCHOG NI ZHVA

DMAR SPRUL PA'I SKU DANG RDZONG DKAR GYI SKU ZHABS RNAM GNYIS
TSE TAN ZHABS DRUNG SOGS BLA SPRUL MKHAS SHING GRUB PA THOB PA'I
SKYES BU

MANG DU SPEL, KHONG NI MDO SMAD BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS MA
MYONG BA MA GTOGS DE MIN GYI MDO SMAD DGON SDE TSANG MAR PHEBS
TE

DBANG RJES GNANG LUNG KHRID SOGS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI PHYAG LAS
RGYA CHEN MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE BDUN DU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU
DRUG

PA'I ME PHO KHYI'I LOR (1946) SKU GSHEGS SO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG RAB NI NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU PO TI BCU BZHI
BZHUGS YOD,

@191 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@192 *, ,RDZONG DKAR 'JIGS MED BSAM GTAN GYI GSUNG 'BUM,

DNGOS GRUB KYI RDZAS SGRUB SKABS KYI 'DOD GSOL YAB RJE GSER
KHANG PAS MDZAD PA, , (31) 2

'JIG RTEN PA'I ME LHA THAB TU 'GUGS PA'I BSNYEN PA BYED TSUL
DANG DE'I BCU CHA'I SBYIN SREG 'BUL TSUL GYI 'DON BSGRIGS

DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (32) 6

@198 DRUG CU PA'I 'DON BSGRIGS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA
BA BZHUGS SO, , (33) 5

RJE BTZUN MKHA' SPYOD DBANG MO'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS GSANG
CHEN BCUD KYI YANG SNYING ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (34) 6

MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO KHYAB BDAG STAG PHU RIN PO CHES GSUNGS PA'I
RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I BDAG 'JUG MKHAS GRUB DAM PA'I

ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (35) 17

RGYAL KUN YUM GCIG 'PHRIN LAS LHA MO RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I
MNGON RTOGS KYI DMIGS RIM MDOR BSDUS DANG BSNYEN PA

GTONG TSUL DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS
SO, , (36) 7

KHYAB BDAG STAG PHU'I DAG SNANG RJE BTZUN SGROL MA'I ME LHA'I
BSNYEN PA DANG BSNYEN SGRUB SBRAGS MA BCU CHA'I SBYIN SREG
RNAMS KYI

THO TZAM BKOD PA DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (37) 8

BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI SGO NAS YE SHES KYI
KHRO BO BCU'I GTOR BZLOG BYA TSUL DGRA BGEGS BYAD MA

'JOMS PA'I SPU GRI STONG GI 'KHOR LO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
(38) 27

DAM CAN SKYES BU CHEN PO RDO RJE LEGS PA'I LAS MTHA' GNAM
LCAGS THOG CHEN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (39) 9

DAM CAN RDO RJE LEGS PA'I BSKANG CHOG DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING
ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (40) 13

'JAM MGON SNYAN RGYUD KYI GDAMS PA DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED
DPA' BO GCIG PA DANG 'JAM DBYANGS DKAR PO

GNYIS SBRAGS SGRUB PA BYED THABS SKU GSUNG THUGS GSUM PHYI
NANG GSANG GSUM DANG BCAS GCIG TU SGRUB TSUL BDER GSHEGS

SHES RAB SGRUB TSUL LAM PO CHE ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (41) 6

LCAGS MKHAR GYI LING SGRUB TSUL BZHUGS SO, , (42) 3

ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (43) 7

'PHRUL 'KHOR LAS DGE 'DUN 'DUS 'KHOR SGRUB CHOG

RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL BZHAD BA'I NYIN BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS
SO, , (44) 5

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'JIGS MED BSAM GTAN NI, MDO SMAD REB GONG GI YUL GYI BYE BRAG
LHA ZHOL LTE THANG DU YAB RTIS TSANG MGO RGAS MKHAR

BYAMS DANG YUM SNGAGS 'CHANG GI RIGS LAS BYUNG BA SNYID MO
SKYID GNYIS LA SRAS SRAS MO BZHI YOD PA LAS SRAS GNYIS PA YIN 

@199 BOD RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING KHYI LO'I (1814) ZLA BA
LNGA PAR SKU BLTAMS,

DGUNG LO BZHI LNGA TZAM BZHES PA NA DGE RGAN GTZANG DGE NAS
'DON CHA 'GA' ZHIG SLOB 'GO TSUGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR

BDE CHEN DGON PAR BSKYAL NAS BLOR 'DZIN SBYANGS, DE NAS MI
RING BAR RDZONG DKAR DGON PA'I CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SMON LAM

RNAM LNGA SOGS CHOS SPYOD RNAMS 'BAD PAS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU
PAR SHAR SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I BU CHEN 'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS

RGYA MTSO'I MDUN NAS RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA YANG DAG
PAR MNOS, TSOGS PA MANG PO'I DBUS SU CHOS SKYONG BSKANG GSOL

SOGS TSOGS 'DON GYI RGYUGS LEGS PAR PHUL, RDZONG CHUNG DU
MKHAN PO LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO'I DGON PAR BYON NAS MKHAN PO'I

ZHABS TOG YUN RING BSGRUBS SHING ZAB CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI MA LUS
BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL GYIS MNOS, LTA BA DANG NYAMS LEN SKOR

GYI DKA' GNAD DANG DOGS DPYOD MTHA' DAG LA ZHIB BSHAD KYI
MDZUB KHRID ZHUS, SGRO 'DOGS THAMS CAD CHOD DE MKHAS PA'I

GRAL DU SLEBS, LNGA RIG DBANG PO RONG BO BLO BZANG CHOS DAR
MDUN SUM RTAGS MDZUB KHRID DANG DAG YIG RGYAS BSDUS DU MA'I

DOGS GCOD, SNYAN NGAG ME LONG RTZA 'GREL, SGRA DANG SDEB SBYOR
RTZIS RIG PA'I GZHUNG CHE PHRA TSANG MA DANG SMAN YANG RAGS
RIM ZHIG

GSAN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR MKHAN CHEN LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOS
MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA MDZAD DE DAD PA'I DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG

DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR MNOS, NYES PA
PHRA MOS MA GOS PAR MDZAD DE TSUL KHRIMS MIG 'BRAS LTAR

BSRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR RDZONG CHUNG DGON PA'I BSHAD
GRVAR HOR GYA RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG NYI MA'I MDUN NAS

BSDUS GRVA DANG BLO RIG SOGS KYI DPE KHRID ZHUS, MKHAN PO
'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO LA MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MANG
PO

ZHUS SHING YUN RING BAR SLOB DPON GTZO BOR BSTEN, AA ROL SPRUL
SKU DANG BSE KHRI RGAN BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS RONG BO'I KHRI RGAN
BLO

BZANG MKHYEN RAB SOGS LA YANG LUNG RJES GNANG MANG DU ZHUS,
DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR GSER KHANG PA CHEN PO RONG BOR PHEBS

PA MJAL ZHING YUN RING ZHABS PHYIR BSNYEGS TE DBANG LUNG MANG
PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PAR LA MO BLO BZANG DON GRUB LA

'JIGS BYED KYI 'PHRUL 'KHOR SBYANGS TSUL DANG 'KHOR LO DANG
SBYIN SREG GI THAB THIG BCAS SBYANGS, GSER KHANG YAB SRAS LA
SNYAN

BRGYUD ZAB MO'I CHOS SKOR ZHUS, LO GNYIS TZAM RING GNAS DBEN
PA RNAMS SU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, BYA BRAL BA'I CHAS

BZHES NAS 'TSO BA NGAN NGO TZAM BSTEN, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR
BLA MA GSER KHANG PA SLOB DPON ZHVA DMAR PA RI KHROD PA BSTAN

'DZIN RGYA MTSO SOGS LA MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MANG DU GSAN,
SGRA PA KARMA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO LA SGRA'I RI MO SBYONG BA
DANG DOGS

GCOD MANG PO MDZAD, DE NAS LO BDUN BRGYAD RING 'TSO BA DKA'
SPYAD LA BRTEN NAS MTSAMS BSNYEN SGRUB DANG DBANG KHRID ZHU BA

SOGS LA 'BAD, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PA'I STON MJUG LA BLA MA GSER
KHANG PA DBUS PHEBS KYI GTAM GSAN NAS SKU 'BUM DGON

PAR GSER KHANG PA MJAL BAR PHEBS, TSE RABS KUN TU RJES SU
'DZIN PA'I SKYABS 'JUG ZHUS, TSO LNGA'I RI KHROD DAG TU

MTSAMS BZHUGS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU DPAL MANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DANG DRUNG CHEN
SHES

RAB RGYA MTSO'I MDUN 'JIGS BYED SKOR DANG LCANG SKYA'I GSUNG
'BUM GYI LUNG ZHUS, DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PA ME SBRUL LO'I ZLA BA
DRUG

PAR KHONG GI SKU MCHED 'DAS PAR BRTEN DGONGS RDZOGS DANG GDUNG
ZHUGS 'BUL BCAS MDZAD, DE NAS MGON GYA SPRUL SKU BLO

BZANG TSUL KHRIMS BSAM GTAN DANG HOR LDANG SGOM CHEN GYI YANG
SPRUL SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POS GSOL BA BTAB PA

LTAR MCHOD RTEN RKED DGON RNYING DU TZONG KHA PA'I GSUNG 'BUM
YONGS RDZOGS KYI LUNG DANG 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS SKOR GYI RJES
GNANG

SOGS BSTZAL, DGUNG LO ZHE LNGA PAR RDZONG CHUNG RIN PO CHE NAS
KHONG RANG GI GDAN SAR BKOD DE DGONGS GZHI CAN GYI BKA' BSLAB

MANG PO GNANG, DE NAS BZUNG DBEN PA KHO NAR MI BZHUGS PAR
BSHAD SGRUB ZUNG 'BREL GYIS BSTAN PA SKYONG BAR MDZAD,

GSUNG RAB KYANG 'GA' ZHIG BRTZAMS, LO DER KHONG GI BLA MA
'JIGS MED LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO SKU GSHEGS, GDUNG ZHUGS

'BUL RTEN BZHENGS SOGS KYI ZHAL BKOD MDZAD, DE RJES LO MANG
RING DBYAR KHAR 'BROG PHYOGS DANG DGUN KHAR RONG PHYOGS SU

PHEBS NAS DGON GNAS RNAMS SU DBANG LUNG GNANG BA SDOM PA 'BOG
PA SOGS MDZAD, YON BDAG DANG DAD LDAN BU SLOB

RNAMS KYIS PHUL BA'I DNGOS PO TSANG MA DGON PA DANG GRVA MANG
LA PHAN PA'I PHYOGS SU PHUL, DGUNG LO DRUG CU PAR T'A LA'I BCU

GSUM PA'I YONGS 'DZIN ZHVA DMAR DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO
NAS KYANG KHONG LA TZONG KHA PA'I ZHAL SHES SNYAN BRGYUD KYI
GDAMS

NGAG DANG DGE LDAN MAN NGAG RNAM GSUM GYI KHRID BCAS ZHUS,
KHONG NI DGUNG LO SHIN TU MTHON POR BZHUGS SHING SKU TSE HRIL
POR

DBANG LUNG KHRID SOGS MDZAD PA DANG DGE TSUL DANG DGE SLONG GI
SDOM PA GNANG BA SGRUB CHEN MANG PO'I RDO RJE SLOB DPON MDZAD
PA

SOGS MDZAD NAS DUS 'DA' ZHING RTEN BZHENGS DGON ZHIG GSO SOGS
KYANG 'GA' ZHIG MDZAD, ZHVA DMAR DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO

DANG CHE SHOS SPRUL SKU SPYAN SNGA DKON MCHOG PHUN TSOGS SOGS
SLOB MA GRAGS CHEN MANG PO SPEL,

@200 DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU GYA BZHIR PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA
PA'I ME MO BYA LO (1897) ZLA BA BDUN PA'I TSES GCIG NYIN PA'I
SROD

KYI DUS SU DGONGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,

DE NAS KHONG GI NYE GNAS DKON MCHOG PHUN TSOGS DANG SLOB MA
NGAG DBANG BSTAN DAR GNYIS KYIS DGONGS RDZOGS LEGS

MCHOD RTEN GSAR DU BZHENGS PA DANG GSER ZANGS 'DRA SKU SOGS

KYANG GSAR DU BZHENGS PA RED,

GSANG SNGAGS KYI SA LAM BGROD TSUL LEGS PAR BSHAD PA NGAG GI
SNANG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (11) 77

RTZOM PA PA'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

ZHVANG STON BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO'I 'KHRUNGS YUL NI, MDO DBUS
KHAMS GSUM LAS DENG SANG MDO SMAD CES GRAGS PA'I AA MDO

RMA CHU'I 'GRAM NGOGS DANG NYE BA RTZE GZHUNG GI YUL GYI BYE
BRAG KHEB THI ZHES PA DE YIN, RIGS RUS NI SNGON MES DBON RNAM
GSUM GYI

DUS SU LHA MCHOD DANG SRI GNON SOGS BYED PAS ZHANG LHA RIGS
DKAR PO ZHES GRAGS PA GSANG SNGAGS RNYING MA DANG SGRUB RGYUD
KARMA

DPAL LDAN SA SKYA SOGS GRUB MTHA' RIS MED KYI MKHAS GRUB MANG
PO BYON PA'I RIGS LAS BRGYUD PA ZHANG SNYING KHAR 'BUM ZHES PA
NI

KHONG GI YAB DANG YUM AA RIG BZA' TSE RING SGROL MA STE YAB YUM
DE GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING MO BYA LO'I (

1825) ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES BCU GSUM GYI ZHOGS NYI MA SHAR BA
DANG LHAN CIG TU SKU BLTAMS, SKYES NAS YUN RING MA PHYIN PAR

THU'U BKVAN RIN PO CHE'I PHYAG MDUD MGUL DU 'CHANG RGYU BYUNG
BAS YAB YUM SHIN TU DGYES, AA KHU GCOD RGAN GYIS BKA' BSGO

MDZAD RJES MTSAN PADMA 'BUM DU BTAGS, DGUNG LO LNGA TZAM LA YI
GE 'BRI KLOG SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR RJE DKON MCHOG

RGYA MTSO'I MDUN RAB TU BYUNG ZHING MTSAN DKON MCHOG THABS
MKHAS ZHES BTAGS, DE DUS NAS YI GE DKAR NAG THOGS MED DU

KLOG THUB, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
MJAL BAR PHYIN DE NAS MI RING BAR 'JAM BZHAD BLO BZANG THUB

BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO YUL DER PHEBS PA MJAL, DGUNG LO BCU
GSUM PAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BYON NAS BSDUS GRVA SOGS

THUGS 'DZIN GNANG, DGUNG LO BCU BZHIR PHEBS PA NA KHU BOR
GTOGS PA ZHANG LHA'I DGE SLONG BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO DGE RGAN DU

BSTEN NAS GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS LA THOS BSAM BYED PA'I DBU
TSUGS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PAR DPAL MANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL

MTSAN MJAL, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR BSDUS GRVA'I TSOGS GLING
DANG DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR RTAGS RIGS KYI TSOGS GLENG

GNANG, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR PHAR PHYIN SKABS DANG PO NAS GSUM
PA'I BAR TSOGS RGYUGS PHUL, 'DZIN GRVAR AANG DANG PO'I

GRAS SU SLEBS, DGUNG GRANGS NYER GCIG PA SHING SBRUL LOR 'JAM
DBYANGS BZHAD PA BLO BZANG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS 

DGE BSNYEN NAS RAB BYUNG BAR BSKYAR SGRUB DANG DGE TSUL DANG
DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR MNOS, MTSAN BSTAN PA RGYA
MTSO

ZHES PA BSTZAL, DPAL MANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN DANG AA KHU
BSTAN 'DZIN SOGS LA ZAB CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, DBYAR CHOS LA

GLING BSRE DKA' BCU PA MDZAD, DGUNG GRANGS NYER BZHI PAR RANG
YUL DU THENGS SHIG PHEBS, PHYUGS NAD SEL BA'I RIM GRO RGYA

CHEN MDZAD CING DBU MA'I SKOR GYI RTZA 'GREL MANG PO BLOR
'DZIN GNANG, SLAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS RJES TSOGS RGYUGS
LEGS

PAR PHUL, DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PA NAS BZUNG MDZOD KYI RTZA 'GREL
THUGS 'DZIN DANG MCHIMS MDZOD SOGS RGYA BOD KYI MDZOD

'GREL MANG POR ZHIB GZIGS MDZAD, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS GLING
SPRUL SKU 'JIGS MED BLO GROS RGYA MTSO'I DGE RGAN DU

BSKOS, DGUNG GRANGS SUM CU PA SHING STAG LOR RJE DPAL MANG SKU
GSHEGS PAS SKYO BA CHEN PO MDZAD, SKU GDUNG GDAN SAR SPYAN 

@207 DRANGS NAS PHYAG MCHOD PHUL, DE SKABS 'JAM BZHAD PAS KHONG
LA THU'U BKVAN SPRUL SKU'I YONGS 'DZIN DU PHEBS DGOS PA'I

BKA' SHOG BSTZAL, MI RING BAR DGON LUNG DU THU'U BKVAN SPRUL
SKU'I DGE RGAN DU BYON, THU'U BKVAN MCHOG SPRUL DANG LHAN CIG

SHING STAG LOR (1854) RGYA NAG PE CING DU PHEBS, TZAN DAN JO BO
DANG YUNG HO GUNG GI RTEN RNAMS MJAL, DE NAS SHING YOS

LOR NANG SOG TU HAR CHEN WANG GIS GDAN DRANGS NAS DER PHEBS TE
ZAB CHOS GNANG, YAB SRAS RIM BZHIN CHA HAR TZONG SU

NYID SOGS BRGYUD LO MJUG DGON LUNG DU 'BYOR, LO DE'I STON KHAR
'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SKU GSHEGS PAR BRTEN DGUNG LO

SO GNYIS PA ME 'BRUG LO'I ZLA BA DANG POR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
BYON NAS GDUNG MJAL DANG GDUNG MCHOD MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO

GSUM PA ME SBRUL LOR DGON LUNG DU PHEBS NAS THU'U BKVAN MCHOG
SPRUL LA ZAB CHOS MA LUS PA BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU BSTZAL,

DGUNG GRANGS SO DRUG PA LCAGS SPREL LOR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU 'JAM
BZHAD SKU PHRENG BZHI PA GDAN KHRIR MNGA' GSOL BA'I DGA' STON

DU ZHUGS SHING BRAG DGON PA BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS KYIS ZHAL BKOD
GNANG BA LTAR MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO DANG
KHONG

GNYIS KYIS TSOGS GLENG GNANG BAS MKHAS DGU'I YID DBANG 'PHROG DE
NAS DUS TSOD MANG CHE BA DGON LUNG DU THU'U BKVAN SPRUL

SKUR DBANG LUNG KHRID BCAS PHUL NAS BZHUGS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU PA
SHING BYI LOR THU'U BKVAN MCHOG SPRUL RGYA NAG TU PHEBS PAR

ZHAL BSGO LEGS PAR MDZAD CING PHEBS SKYEL ZHUS, DE RJES BKRA
SHIS 'KHYIL DU YUN RING BZHUGS NAS SDE KHRI SPRUL SKU GDAN SAR

BKOD CING ZAB CHOS MANG PO PHUL, ZHVA DMAR SPRUL SKU DGE 'DUN
BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOR DBANG LUNG KHRID BCAS MANG PO GNANG,

RTEN RNAMS LA PHYAG MCHOD SOGS RNAM DKAR GYI MDZAD PA KHO NAS
DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA GCIG PA SHING PHAG LOR

'JAM BZHAD SPRUL SKU DBUS SU PHEBS LA NYE BAR RTEN 'BREL CHED DU
KHONG DAM BCA' BZHUGS NAS 'JAM BZHAD MCHOG SPRUL PAS

RTZOD PA MDZAD, 'JAM BZHAD MCHOG SPRUL KHONG GI GZIM SHAG TU
GDAN DRANGS NAS PHEBS RDZONGS SU DNGUL SRANG LNGA BCU SOGS

'BUL BA'I RNAM GRANGS BRGYA PHRAG PHUL, DE NAS SOG PO'I YON BDAG
RNAMS KYIS GDAN DRANGS NAS DER ZAB CHOS MANG PO BSTZAL,

DGUNG LO NGA BZHI PA SA STAG LOR 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA LHA LDAN
NAS MAR CHIBS BSGYUR MDZAD PA PHEBS BSUR BSANG GZHUNG BAR

BYON, DGUNG LO NGA DGU PA CHU LUG LOR DGON LUNG NAS GDAN 'DREN
PA SNGA PHYIR THENGS MANG BYUNG ZHING THU'U BKVAN BLA BRANG GI
BSU

BA'I PHEBS BYAMS BCAS 'BYOR, DGON LUNG DU LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL
LA DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA PHUL CING GDAN KHRIR BKOD,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU PA SHING SPREL LOR LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL LA
RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA PHUL, MTSAN BLO BZANG YE
SHES RGYA

MTSOR GSOL, DER LO 'GAR BZHUGS NAS LCANG SKYA SPRUL SKUR ZAB
CHOS MANG PO PHUL BA DANG DAD LDAN MANG PO RAB BYUNG DANG DGE

TSUL GYI SDOM PA GNANG BA SOGS MDZAD, DE NAS SOG PO'I YUL GRU
'GAR YON BDAG RNAMS LA DBANG LUNG RIM GRO BCAS BSGRUBS

RJES BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU TSUR LOG SKABS DER BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL DU SPRUL SKU KHAG DANG BLA MA DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN TSANG
MAR

DBANG LUNG GNANG BA DANG RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
'BOGS PA BCAS LA KHONG NI BLA MA GTZO BOR GYUR STABS LO MANG
RING

SLOB MA SHIN TU MANG PO SPEL ZHING BAR BAR RNAMS SU BSNYEN
MTSAMS KYANG MI NYUNG BA MDZAD, DGUNG GRANGS RE BDUN PA LCAGS
YOS

LOR DGON LUNG DU CHIBS KHA BSGYUR, TSUR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
PHEBS RJES SKU MTSAMS MANG TZAM BZHUGS, DE MIN GYI DUS

SKABS PHAL CHE BAR CHOS GNANG BA DANG RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS
SGRUB PA GSUNG RTZOM 'GA' ZHIG BRTZAMS PA SOGS MDZAD, DGUNG

LO BDUN CUR PHEBS NAS BZUNG MANG CHE BA'I DUS TSOD SKU MTSAMS
BCAD DE 'DA' BAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO DON GSUM PA ME MO BYA LOR ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES LNGA
DRUG NAS RIM GYIS SNYUN JE LCIR SONG, ZLA BA BZHI PAR SNYUN JE

ZHAN DU SONG NAS RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I ME MO BYA LO'I (1895)
ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES BCU BDUN GYI SNGA DROR DGONGS PA CHOS
DBYINGS

SU THIM, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA DANG DPAL MANG MCHOG SPRUL 'PHRAL
DU BYON NAS GANG CIR ZHAL BKOD MDZAD, 'JAM BZHAD

PA'I ZHAL BSLAB LTAR TSES NYER GNYIS NYIN RGYAS RI'I RTZER GDUNG
BYA GTOR BYED CING GDUNG RUS RNAMS ZHUGS LA PHUL TE DAD LDAN

SLOB MA RNAMS LA GDUNG SKAL DU BGOS SO, ,

KHONG GI SLOB MA 'JAM BZHAD SPRUL PA'I SKU DANG THU'U BKVAN
SPRUL SKU ZHVA DMAR SPRUL SKU SOGS SPRUL SKU DANG BLA CHEN MANG
DU SPEL,

KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU KA NAS NGA'I BAR POD
BZHI BZHUGS YOD CING SGRUB THABS DANG NYAMS LEN GYI SKOR MANG

SHOS YIN LA RNAM THAR GYI SKOR YANG 'GA' YOD PA PHAL CHER TSIGS
SU BCAD PA YIN NO, ,

@208 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@209 *, ,ZHANG ZHUNG PA CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

006133 BRIS MA,

RJE'I DNGOS SLOB ZHANG ZHUNG PA CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA'I GSUNG THOR
BU, (1) 152

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RJE TZONG KHA PA'I DNGOS SLOB ZHANG ZHUNG PA CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA
NI RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I SHING SPREL LOR (1404) 'KHRUNGS SHING,

DGUNG LO RE BRGYAD PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I LCAGS YOS LOR (1471)
'DAS, KHONG DGUNG NA GZHON PA'I DUS NAS DBUS GTZANG

DU YON TAN SLOB PAR BYON TE RJE TZONG KHA PA YAB SRAS GTZOS DGE
BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG POR BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS 

BCAS PA'I SHES BYA KUN LA MKHAS PAR GYUR, KHYAD PAR SNYAN NGAG
GI RGYAN GYI BSTAN BCOS LA MKHAS PA'I PHUL DU GYUR CING <<R'A
M'A

nA'I RTOGS BRJOD>> SOGS SNYAN NGAG GI RGYAN THUN MONG MA YIN PAS
BRGYAN PA'I SNYAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA 'GA'

BRTZAMS, SNGON TZONG KHA PA'I SPYAN SNGAR THOS BSAM MDZAD SKABS
RIG PA RNO ZHING GANG LA'ANG THOGS PA MED PA'I RNAM DPYOD CAN

YIN STABS MU SRAD PA DANG KHONG GNYIS LA RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU
BYUNG BA'I SLOB MA ZUNG ZHES GRAGS, KHONG MDO KHAMS SU THOG MAR

BYON SKABS GUR PHUB NAS SGAR TSUGS KYI RNAM PA KHO NA BZUNG BA
DANG SPRANG PO NGAN SLONG TSANG MAR RGYUN DU 'TSO BA SBYAR BAS
KHONG GI

GZIM GUR DU SPRANG POS GANG ZHING SPRANG PO 'TSO STOBS ZHAN SHOS
LA LHAG PAR BRTZE BAS BSKYANGS, DE'I PHYIR TZONG KHA PA'I DNGOS
SLOB

BDE THANG BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DANG KHONG GNYIS LA BYANG SEMS
RNAM GNYIS ZHES KYANG GRAGS, KHONG MDO KHAMS SU CHAB MDO BYAMS
PA

GLING GI MKHAN RABS GNYIS PA'I GDAN KHRIR BZHUGS TE ZAB CHOS
SPEL ZHING CHAB MDO'I MNGA' KHONGS SU GLANG LING DGON DANG WEG

CHOS RDZONG DGON SOGS DGON SDE 'GA' ZHIG BTAB, 'ON KYANG KHONG
GI DGON PA GTZO BO NI NAGS SHOD KYI DGON PA SPRUL MDA'

RNAM RGYAL DPAL 'BAR GLING YIN ZHING YUN RING BZHUGS GNAS DANG
SKU GSHEGS PA'I YUL YANG DGON DER YIN PAS KHAMS KYI

MKHAS PA TSOS KHONG LA NAGS SHOD PA CHOS DBANG GRAGS PA ZER,
KHONG SKU GSHEGS PA'I RJES SU DGON DE'I GDAN SA 'DZIN MKHAN

NI DBON KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN SOGS YIN NO,

KHONG GI GSUNG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU <<SBYOR BA YAN LAG DRUG
GI RNAM BZHAG>> DANG <<DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I DBANG GI

RNAM BZHAG>> SGRUB THABS LE'U'I RNAM BSHAD SOGS DUS 'KHOR GYI
LE'U SO SO'I RNAM BSHAD CHOS TSAN BCO LNGA YOD PA'I POD CHEN
BRIS

MA ZHIG BZHUGS YOD CING DA DUNG R'A M'A nA'I RTOGS BRJOD SOGS
CHOS TSAN 'GA' ZHIG KYANG BZHUGS YOD, SPYIR KHONG GI GSUNG NI

LO CHEN RIN CHEN BZANG PO'I RNAM THAR TSIGS BCAD MA DANG RJE
TZONG KHA PA'I BSTOD TSIG RBA RLABS KYI PHRENG BA SOGS SNYAN
'JEBS

LDAN PA'I SNYAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS DANG PHAR PHYIN SKOR MNGON
RTOGS RGYAN GYI LTA BA THAL 'GYUR DU 'GREL TSUL, GZHUNG 'GREL
SKOR

DUS 'KHOR GYI BSHAD PA DANG RTEN 'BREL BSTOD PA'I 'GREL PA, SA
LAM GYI RIM PA'I SKOR LAM RIM BLO SBYONG, BRGAL LAN GYI

SKOR SMRA BA NGAN PA RNAM PAR 'THAG PA'I BSTAN BCOS SOGS GSUNG
RAB LEGS PA MANG TZAM YOD PAR MNGON YANG RGYU RKYEN SNA TSOGS

KYI DBANG GIS DENG SANG SHIN TU DKON PAR GYUR CING CUNG ZAD YOD
PA RNAMS KYANG BRIS MA MANG SHOS YIN NO, ,

PA'I DGONGS PA RAB TU GSAL BA LAS GCES PA THOR BUR

BLANG PA BZHUGS SO, , (11) 32

000759 PAR MA, PHA

DUS GSUM RGYAL BA'I YUM GCIG DBYANGS CAN LHA MO LA BSTOD PA
DBYANGS CAN DGYES PA SKYED BYED BSTOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO'I

TSIG DON RNAM PAR BSHAD PA SGRA DBYANGS LHA MO'I SKU GSUNG THUGS
KYI GSANG BA MCHOG GI NGO MTSAR LTA BA'I MIG 'BYED CES BYA

BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 209

SNYAN NGAG ME LONG GI ZIN THO DRAN PA'I GSAL 'DEBS ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (2) 177

SNYAN NGAG ME LONG GI LUS DANG RGYAN GYI MTSAN NYID DANG DBYE BA
DPER BRJOD RNAMS DRAN THOR BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, , (3) 40

YI GE'I SNGON 'JUG RJES 'JUG SOGS KYI RNAM DBYE SBYAR TSUL
BZHUGS SO, , (4) 19

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG RDO RJE'I MTSAN, BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL GYI DKAR CHAG DANG PHYI RGYAL NAS BKOD PA'I DKAR CHAG
RNAMS

SU CHOS RJE NGAG DBANG TSE RING ZHES 'KHOD KYANG KHONG GI
GSUNG 'BUM GYI CHOS TSAN RNAMS KYI MJUG BYANG DU NGAG DBANG
RDO RJE KHO NA BYUNG

BAS 'DIR KHONG GI MTSAN LA NGAG DBANG RDO RJE ZHES BRIS PA
YIN, KHONG NAM 'KHRUNGS PA'I SKOR LA DPYAD GZHI KHA GSAL MA
RNYED

KYANG, KHAL KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN LA CHOS ZHU MYONG BA'I GNAS TSUL LA BLTAS NAS DPAG NA,
SPYI

LO'I DUS RABS BCO BRGYAD PA'I LO RABS DANG PO TZAM LA SKU
BLTAMS PA YIN NAM SNYAM, KHONG DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU LHAG TZAM

BZHUGS YOD PAR SNANG BAS KHONG GI SKU TSE HRIL PO'I RING KHAL
KHA RJE BTZUN DAM PA SKU PHRENG DANG PO BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I
RGYAL MTSAN

NAS SKU PHRENG GSUM PA YE SHES BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I BAR SKU
RABS GSUM BRGYUD YOD CING, SKU PHRENG DANG PO 'DAS DUS (1723)

KHONG DGUNG LO SHIN TU GZHON PA YIN LA SKU PHRENG GNYIS PA BLO
BZANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME (1724-1757) DGUNG LO SO BZHI DANG
SKU

@226 PHRENG GSUM PA YE SHES BSTAN PA'I NYI MA (1758-1773)
DGUNG LO BCU DRUG MA GTOGS BZHUGS MED PAS KHONG GI BLA MA GTZO
BO SKU

PHRENG GNYIS PA YIN PAR MNGON, KHONG GI SDOM PA ZHU YUL DANG
DPE CHA'I DGE RGAN NI NGAG DBANG MKHAS GRUB DANG NGAG DBANG
BLO

GROS SOGS YIN NO, KHONG GI SKU TSE PHAL MO CHE GUR DU BZHUGS
NAS SGAR TSUGS KYI RNAM PA'I SGO NAS 'CHAD NYAN DANG DBANG
SKUR

SOGS CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD CING SLOB MA
YANG BKA' BCU BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN DANG KHAL KHA DAM TSIG RDO
RJE

SOGS MKHAS PA MANG DU BYUNG, KHONG DBUS GTZANG GI DGON SDE
RNAMS SU BYON MA MYONG YANG BOD KYI RIG GNAS PHAL CHE BAR SLOB

GNYER ZHIB 'JUG BYAS NAS MKHAS PAR GYUR CING, SGRUB THABS SKOR
GYI GSUNG PHAL MO CHE SA SKYA BSOD NAMS RTZE MO DANG KUN

DGA' SNYING PO, GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN BCAS KYI GSUNG LA TSAD
MAR BZUNG NAS BRTZAMS YOD PAS MA TSAD GSANG SNGAGS SKOR LA BU

STON KHA CHE DANG BO DONG PAn CHEN BCAS KYI GSUNG LA DPYAD
GZHIR MDZAD PA LA BLTAS NA GRUB MTHA'I PHYOGS ZHEN YANG CHUNG
TZAM ZHIG

YIN PAR MNGON,

KHONG NAM SKU GSHEGS PA'I SKOR LA DPYAD GZHI GSAL PO MA MTHONG
YANG GSUNG 'BUM KHA PA'I CHOS TSAN BCU GCIG PA <<RGYAL

DANG RGYAL SRAS RNAMS LA LAM GYI YON TAN THOB TSUL GYI SGO NAS
BSTOD PA'I RAB DBYE NYI SHU PA>> RTZOM 'PHRO CAN DER KHA SKONG
BYED PO'I

MJUG BYANG DU <<RTZOM 'PHROR LUS NAS LO DRUG CUR SONG BA RAB
TSES BAG YOD LOR GSUNG YONGS RDZOGS PAR DU BSKRUN>> ZHES 'KHOD

'DUG PAR BLTAS NA KHONG GI BAG YOD CES PA YIG NOR YIN PAS BAG
MED LO LA CHA BZHAG NA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU MO GLANG LA

(1853) KHEL 'DUG DE'I GONG DU LO DRUG CUR SONG BA'I DBANG DU
BTANG NA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU PHO BYI BA LO (1792)

LA 'DAS PA YIN NAM SNYAM PA RGYUS YOD RNAMS KYIS THUGS DPYAD
MDZAD GRUB ZHU,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI, GSOL 'DEBS SNA TSOGS DANG BSTOD TSOGS SKOR
DBANG DANG RJES GNANG CHO GA PHYAG LEN SKOR MDO

SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS KYI PHYOGS BTUS DANG ZIN THO SNA
TSOGS KHYAD PAR 'DUL BA'I 'GREL BSHAD ZHIB CING PHRA BA SNYAN
NGAG

'GREL PA DANG YI GE RIG PA'I SKOR BCAS KYI GSUNG KHYON SDOM PO
TI BCU BZHI PHYI SOG KHU RE CHEN POR SHING PAR BSKRUN YOD
KYANG DENG

SANG YOD MED MA NGES LA, NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU PO TI DA PA
DANG PA PA CHAD 'DUG PAS DE MIN KHU RE CHEN MO'I PAR MA PO TI
BCU

GNYIS BZHUGS SO, ,

@227 *, ,ZHU CHEN TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN GYI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

000410 PAR MA, KA

DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS LAS DAM PA'I CHOS THOS PA'I YI
GE DON GNYER GDENGS CAN ROL BA'I CHU GTER ZHES

BYA BA LAS GLEGS BAM DANG PO BZHUGS SO, , (1) 343

000411 PAR MA, KHA

GE DON GNYER GDENGS CAN ROL BA'I CHU GTER ZHES BYA

BA LAS GLEGS BAM GNYIS PA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 280

SH'AKYA'I BANDE TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN GYIS RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM
CHED DU NYER MKHO SUG BRIS BYAS PA RNAMS PHYOGS SU BSDEBS

PA'I TSAN GRANGS GSER MIG 'DRID PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (16) 25

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

KHONG NI DKAR MDZES KHUL GYI LDAN PA DKAR BSAM GRUB GLING GI
NYE 'DABS YAB LHA BZO NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL GYIS YUM SNGA PHYI

GNYIS BZHES PA LAS PHYI MA BU MO BU CHOG CES BYA BA'I SRAS SU
CHE BA MKHA' 'GRO SKYABS DANG CHUNG BA ZHU CHEN TSUL KHRIMS
RIN CHEN GNYIS

'KHRUNGS, ZHU CHEN NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I ME GLANG LOR
(1697) SKU BLTAMS, SKU CHUNG DUS MTSAN LA RTA MGRIN GZUNG ZHES

GSOL, DGUNG LO BDUN DU PHEBS PAR KHU BO LA YI GE THAMS CAD KYI
GZHI MA GZAB GSHAR GYI YIG KLOG BSLAB, SLAR YANG BON

PO KHRO BO LHA MGON DANG KUN DGA' BSAM GRUB GNYIS KYI MDUN
SNGAGS KLOG DANG, YAB LAS SKU GZUGS KYI CHA TSAD GZUGS RIS

SNA TSOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PA ME PHAG LOR
(1707) DRUNG PA KUN DGA' RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG DU DGE BSNYEN GYI

SDOM PA BZHES, MTSAN KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS ZHES GSOL, DGUNG LO
BCU GSUM PAR RAG CHU RNAM RGYAL DGON PA'I BLA MA

KUN DGA' BSTAN 'DZIN GYI MDUN BDE MCHOG GI DBANG CHEN SOGS DBANG
LUNG DU MA DANG KARMA BSTAN 'PHEL DANG RAB 'BYAMS PA

BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN MDUN SUM RTAGS DAG GSUM DPE BRJOD BCAS
LEGS PAR SBYANGS, SANGS RGYAS CHOS 'PHEL MDUN BZO

RIG BRIS 'BUR DANG MNGA' RIS RIN CHEN CHOS SKYONG LA RTZIS
DKAR NAG 'TSO BYED KARMA NGAG DBANG LA SMAN SKOR BCAS ZHIB
KHRID ZHUS,

TSE BHR'Um DGON KARMA MTHU STOBS NI MDO KHAMS KYI PHYOGS 'DIR
BCU PHRAG RIG GNAS LA MKHAS PA KUN GYIS THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA
GNYIS

PA LTA BUR BSNGAGS PAS DER BSHES GNYEN DU BSTEN PA'I RTEN
'BREL LEGS PAR 'GRIGS, SGRA KA L'A PA DANG TZANDRA PA SOGS
KARMA MI

BSKYOD RDO RJE'I RGYAS 'GREL THOG NAS GSAN, SDEB SBYOR RIN
'BYUNG SNYAN 'GREL DBYANGS CAN DGYES GLU SOGS LA RI MO'I THOG
NAS

RTZOM RGYUGS PHUL, RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS BRTAN PA LA BSDUS
GRVA RNAM 'GREL SOGS TSAD MA'I SKOR GSAN PAS THUN MONG

RIG PA'I GNAS KUN LA GO BA GTING TSUGS PA RNYED PAS GZHAN
DRING MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA SKYES, MDO KHAMS SU MKHAS PA'I

GRAGS PA THOB,

SPYI LO (1725) DGUNG GRANGS NYER DGUR SON PA'I DUS SU SA
SKYA'I 'BUL SDUD PA DANG LHAN DU ZLA BA BZHI PA NAS BTEG STE
SA

SKYAR NANG DON RIG PA SLOB GNYER DU PHEBS, NGOR MKHAN CHEN
TSUL KHRIMS LHUN GRUB DANG MKHAN RNYING BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB
SOGS KYI

MDUN NI GU CHOS DRUG DANG KYE RDOR LAM DBANG RGYUD DBANG GSUNG
NGAG LAM 'BRAS SOGS GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG PA'I DBANG LUNG
MAN

NGAG YAN LAG DANG BCAS PA ZHIB CING PHRA BA GSAN PAS, RGYUD
SDE RGYA MTSO LTA BU LA MNGA' DBANG 'BYOR, DER SE RA RAB

@241 'BYAMS PA SOGS LA SUM RTAGS DAG GSUM DANG LNGA BSDUS KEG
RTZIS SDEB SBYOR SKOR BSHAD KHRID GNANG, NGOR DU LO GNYIS KYI
RING

LA KHANG GSAR MKHAN CHEN GYI DRUNG YIG MDZAD RMER DGON PA NGAG
DBANG KUN DGA' LHUN GRUB DANG CHOS 'BREL BZHAG LHA LDAN DU

MJAL PHYAG DANG MCHOD 'BUL STOBS TE ME LUG ZLA BA BZHI PAR LHA
LDAN NAS SDE DGER BYON, LHA BRIS SGRA KA TZAN SNYAN NGAG SOGS

SLOB BU RNAMS KYI DGOS 'DOD BSKANGS, MKHAN CHEN BKRA SHIS LHUN
GRUB DANG CHOS RGYAL BSTAN PA TSE RING ZUNG GIS BSKUL TE SA

SKYA'I GONG MA RNAM LNGA'I BKA' 'BUM ZHU DAG BYED SAR PHEBS,
DE YANG BKA' 'BUM PAR MI 'DRA BA CHA TSANG LNGA DANG THOR BU
DPE

KHUNGS DAG BRIS MA 'GA' BSAGS TE BRJOD BYA'I DON LA RGYUD DANG
RGYA GZHUNG GI DGONGS PA DANG RJOD BYED TSIG LA MKHAS MCHOG
THU

MI'I DGONGS PA DANG MI 'GAL BAR ZHU DAG LEGS PAR MDZAD, SLAR
YANG ME SBRUL, (1737) LOR PAR BRKOS GRUB NAS CHOS RGYAL

BSTAN PA TSE RING GI BKA' LTAR BSTAN 'GYUR PAR GSAR SKRUN
MDZAD PA'I ZHU DAG PA GNANG, DE DUS MKHAS PA MANG PO'I KHROD 

NAS BDAMS PA YIG MKHAN BCU DRUG DANG LHA BRIS MKHAS PA GCIG
PAR BRKOS BTUS MI BRGYA DANG LNGA BCU BKRABS TE LAS GRVA PA

PHUN SUM TSOGS PAR BSGRIGS, PAR GZHI MA PHYI YANG RGYAL PO SAD
NA LEGS MJING YON GYI SKU RING LA BZHENGS PA'I DKAR CHAG

'PHANG THANG MA DANG LDAN DKAR MA SOGS BCU PHRAG GCIG LHAG MA
DPE BSDUR BA'I SKABS, KUN MKHYEN SI TU CHOS KYI 'BYUNG GNAS

KYIS DBUS SU BZHENGS PA DE NYID CHA TSANG ZHING RGYAS LA LEGS
CHA MANG BAR MTHONG NAS GTZO BOR BZUNG TSIG SNGA PHYI'I KHYAD
PAR YOD PA

DANG TSIG ZLOS PA GONG 'OG 'KHRUGS PA SOGS LA RGYAL BA'I BKA'
DANG DGONGS 'GREL SO SO'I GZHUNG DANG BSTUN NAS RNAM DPYOD

ZHIB MOS DPYAD DE 'THOR BA RNAMS SDUD, 'KHRUGS PA BLDEBS NOR
BA BCOS SNGAGS KYI TSIG 'BRU RNAMS LA LEGS SBYAR YIN NGES

RNAMS LAS GZHAN DOGS SEL KUN RTAGS DANG MCHAN PAR GNANG, ZUR
CHAG GI SKAD DANG RANG BZHIN PA'I SKAD SHA ZA'I SKAD

RNAMS BCOS LHAD MED PAR SOR BZHAG MDZAD, SKABS DER MDUN BYON
RMONGS PA 'GAS ZHU DAG LA BAR CHAD BYAS PA'I RKYEN GYIS

SKYE RAB DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING LA ZHU DAG MTHAR PHYIN MA THUB,
LDAN YUL NAS MA YUM GSHEGS, GZHIS DGON DANG DAM PA'I

SKYES BU RNAMS LA LAM STON SMON LAM ZHUS, MI RING BAR CHOS
RGYAL BSTAN PA TSE RING DANG MKHAN CHEN BKRA SHIS LHUN GRUB
GNYIS

KYANG DGONGS PA RDZOGS,

RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA LUG (1739) MDO PHYOGS DANG RIG
GNAS SKOR GYI BSTAN BCOS GLEGS BAM BRGYA DANG NYER

BRGYAD ZHU DAG DANG PAR DU BKOD SNGAGS PHYOGS RNAMS RAB BYUNG
BCU GNYIS PA'I CHU PHAG (1743) GSAR TSES NYIN LEGS PAR GRUB,

SDE DGE SA SKYONG BLA MAS BSKUL TE BSTAN 'GYUR DKAR CHAG
BRTZAMS, SA SKYONG BLA MA DANG KUN GZIGS SI TU CHOS KYI 'BYUNG
GNAS

LA GZIGS 'BUL ZHUS PAS LEGS BRJOD KYIS ME TOG 'THOR,

'PHAGS PA'I GNAS BRTAN BCU DRUG GI RTOGS BRJOD SNGAR BRKOS KYI
SHING DPE GZHIR BZHAG STENG CUNG ZAD BZO BCOS DANG

DER MED PA'I DGE BSNYEN DHARMA T'A DANG HA SHANG GI BKOD PA
GSAR BRIS MDZAD, DE NAS BZUNG DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM DU

GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I PAndITA ZHU CHEN TSUL KHRIMS RIN CHEN ZHES
MTSAN SNYAN PHYOGS BCU BU MO'I RNA BAR SPUD,

LDAN SHOD DPON GYIS BSKUL BA LTAR CHOS RGYAL DGE DBANG YAB
SRAS KYIS MDZAD PA'I SKYES RABS DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING GI SKYA

RIS MDZAD, KHAMS PHYOGS KYI BLA SPRUL PHAL MO CHE DANG KHYAD
PAR SA SKYA'I GRUB MTHA' DZIN PA KUN LA GSUNG NGAG RIN PO CHE
LAM

'BRAS BU DANG BCAS PA'I DBANG LUNG KHRID RGYAB CHOS DANG BCAS
PA 'CHAD SPEL GNANG, RIS MED KYI MKHAS PA DANG DAD MDUN

CAN GYI SLOB MA BTZUN PA MI DPON SOGS LA SGRA KA TZAN DBYANGS
GSUM DANG SNYAN NGAG SUM RTAGS DAG GSUM GSO RIG DANG KHYAD

PAR BZO RIG BRIS 'BUR SOGS RGYUD DANG GZHUNG GI DGONGS PA MA
NOR BA DPYAD GSUM GYIS DAG PAR MDZAD DE BZO RIG GI LAG

RTZAL RMAD DU BYUNG BA GSAR DU SPEL, DBU CAN DANG DBU MED
LANYDZA WARTU LA SOGS YIG GZUGS LEGS PAR 'BRI BA'I SROL DAR
SPEL

MDZAD, BOD PHYI RABS PA DAG LA PHAN PA'I DON DU RTZOM 'JOG
KYANG BSTOD TSOGS DANG GTAM TSOGS CHAB SHOG BSLAB BYA LO

RGYUS SOGS KYANG SDEB SBYOR LEGS SHING TSIGS BCAD LHUG GANG
LA'ANG RANG SHUGS KYIS SNYAN NGAG NYID DU 'CHAR BA KHO NA DANG
DON GYI

CHA LA DPYAD PA GSUM GYIS NONGS PA MED PAS MKHAS PA RNAMS MGU
BA SKYED THUB SHA STAG YIN NO, ,

KHONG NI SKU TSE'I SMAD KYI DUS PHAL MO CHE SDE DGER BZHUGS
SHING SDE DGE PAR KHANG CHOS MDZOD CHEN MOR ZHU DAG MKHAN PO
YUN

RING MDZAD PAS ZHU CHEN PA'I MTSAN SNYAN THOB, BOD KYI RIG
GNAS SPYI'I DON KHO NAR DGONGS PA BZHES PA LAS GRUB MTHA'I
PHYOGS

ZHEN GTAN NAS MED PAR BRTEN, DENG SANG SDE DGE PAR KHANG DU
GRUB MTHA' RIS MED KYI MKHAS DBANG MANG PO'I GSUNG RAB DANG

BOD KYI RIG GNAS CHE PHRA TSANG MA'I PAR SHING KHRI BCU PHRAG
GSUM LA NYE BAR BZHUGS SHING 'DZAM GLING DU SNYAN GRAGS KYIS
KHYAB PA 'DI

YANG KHONG GI MDZAD SPYOD BZANG PO DANG 'BRAL THABS MED PA
YIN, LHAG PAR SA SKYA BKA' 'BUM DANG BSTAN 'GYUR GYI PAR SHING

@242 TSIG DAG LA YIG GZUGS LEGS PA CHAD LHAG MED PA 'DI DAG
KHONG GI DRIN YIN PAR MA TSAD BSTAN 'GYUR GYI DKAR CHAG ZHIB
CING

GSAL BA MTHONG NA DGA' BA DE'ANG KHONG GIS THUGS RTZOL MDZAD
PA'I 'BRAS BU RED, DE'I PHYIR NGA TSOS KHONG GI BKA' DRIN NAM

YANG BRJED MI RUNG,

RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING RTA LO (1774) ZLA BA BDUN PA'I
TSES BCO LNGA LA SDE DGE MI DBANG CHEN PO DANG ZHAL SLOB KUN
LA

PHYIS 'BYUNG GI SKOR ZHAL CHEMS LEGS PAR GNANG SKU DKYIL DRANG
POR BSRANGS TE ZHI DBYINGS SU MNAL BA'I TSUL MDZAD DO, ,

DAD LDAN GYI GRVA SLOB KUN GYIS SKU GDUNG RIN PO CHE ZHUGS
CHEN 'BUL, RIN CHEN GNYIS PA SOGS KYIS MCHOD RTEN MI CHUNG BA

GCIG DAD RTEN DU BSKRUN,

SLOB MA'ANG RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS RAB BRTAN SOGS RI BO DGE
LDAN PA DANG NGAG DBANG DGE LEGS LHUN GRUB SOGS

DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA SDE DGE SA SKYONG BLA MA SOGS MI DPON
DANG GZHAN YANG RIS MED KYI MKHAS GRUB DU MA SPEL,

GSUNG CHOS KYANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU SDE DGE'I PAR MA POD
BCU PO CHA TSANG BZHUGS YOD LA LDEB RING SHOG GRANGS

33611 YOD,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BLA MA DON YOD MKHAS GRUB NI, 'KHRUNGS YUL DBUS STOD 'PHAN PO
ZHOG SKU GZHON DUS ZHOG GUR SMON GYI GRVA PA GNANG,

BLA MA DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I MDUN 'BRI KLOG SBYANGS, PAn CHEN
BLO BZANG YE SHES MDUN RAB TU BYUNG ZHING SDOM PA MNOS, GDAN

SA DGA' LDAN DU PHEBS NAS BYANG RTZE GRVA TSANG GI SGRIG
KHONGS SU ZHUGS, TSAD MA DANG, PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA BCAS KYI
GZHUNG LA

GSAN SBYONG GNANG, PHYIS DGA' LDAN DU MA BZHUGS PAR MDO SNGAGS
KYI GZHUNG LA GSAN SBYONG RGYA CHER GNANG ZHING BYA BRAL MDZAD
DE

ZHOG GUR SMON RI KHROD SOGS SU SGRUB PA NYAMS BZHES GTZO BOR
GNANG, PHO LHA MI DBANG BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAS KYIS SBYIN BDAG

GNANG NAS DBUS KHUL LAM RIM SOGS KYI CHOS BKA' RGYA CHEN
GNANG, T'A LA'I BDUN PAR LTA BA'I SKOR GYI DRIS LAN PHUL,

DGA' LDAN TSOGS CHEN DU YOD PA'I 'JAM MGON TZONG KHA PA CHEN
PO'I GSER KHRI KHANG GI STENG GSER ZANGS KYI RGYA PHIBS BSGRON
DGOS

LUGS KHONG GIS BSKUL MA MDZAD PAR BRTEN, PHO LHA MI DBANG BSOD
NAMS STOBS RGYAS KYIS DGA' LDAN TSOGS CHEN GYI RGYA PHIBS

GSAR BSGRON 'BUL SBYOR GNANG,

KHONG GIS ZHOG GUR SMON DGON PAR YANG RTEN GSAR BZHENGS RGYA
CHEN MDZAD, DE RAB TU GNAS PA SOGS KYANG SKU NGO MAS

MDZAD, RTEN DE DAG GI DKAR CHAG KYANG BRTZAMS, SPYIR KHONG GIS
BYA BRAL BA'I TSUL GYIS ZHOG GUR SMON DU YUN RING BZHUGS TE

SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN DANG 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM PA KHO NAS DUS 'DA'
BAR MNGON ZHING, RNAM THAR MA MJAL BAS 'KHRUNGS 'DAS KYI LO

RTA SOGS NI 'GOD THABS BRAL, KHONG GI GSUNG NI BLA MA'I RNAL
'BYOR DANG, 'JIGS BYED RDZOGS RIM, GSUNG MGUR SNA

TSOGS, DRIS LAN SOGS CHOS TSAN PO TI GCIG YOD PA'I POD GCIG

ZLA BA BDUN PAR PAR SHING BZHENGS NAS ZHOL DU BZHUGS BCUG
