@260 SGAm POR SKU 'DRA RIN PO CHE LA DBU ZHVA PHUL DUS KYI SMON
LAM BZHUGS SO, , (7) 9

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

ZHVA DMAR SKU PHRENG BZHI PA CHOS GRAGS YE SHES NI, KHAMS DKAR
MDZES KHANG DMAR DU YAB LDONG GI RUS RGYUD DGON PO SKYABS

DANG YUM DBRA BZA' TSE RING SGROL MA GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG
BRGYAD PA'I CHU MO BYA LO'I (1453) ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES GSUM
GYI

SNGA DROR SKU BLTAMS,

DGUNG NA ZLA BA BDUN LON PA NA ZHVA DMAR SKU PHRENG GSUM PA CHOS
DPAL YE SHES KYI SKYE PHRENG DU NGOS 'DZIN NAS KHANG DMAR

DGON PAR GDAN DRANGS, DER SBYOR KLOG BLOR 'DZIN BCAS SBYONG BA'I
DBU BTZUGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR SKU 'KHOR DANG BCAS

MI NYAG DAR MDO'I PHYOGS SU BYON, MI NYAG MKHAS PA MI LNGA'I
DGON KHAG RNAMS SU PHEBS, KHYAD PAR DAR MDOR LHA MO RTZE'I

DGON PAR BYON NAS DAR MDO'I SKYA SER RNAMS LA CHOS BSHAD MDZAD,
LO DE'I ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES BCO LNGA LA GO SHRI DPAL

'BYOR DON GRUB LA DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, DE NAS DKAR MDZES
NAS BTEG SDE DGE'I YID LHUNG DANG 'DAN KLONG THANG BRGYUD

'BRI CHU BRGAL TE ZUR MANG DGON DU PHEBS, RJE KARMA PA CHOS
GRAGS RGYA MTSO MJAL ZHING GTZUG PHUD PHUL, MTSAN CHOS GRAGS YE

SHES BSTZAL, ZHVA DMAR GYI COD PAN DANG THAM GA BCAS GNANG, GO
SHRI DPAL 'BYOR DON GRUB KYIS MKHAN PO DANG BLA MA 'JAM

DPAL BZANG POS SLOB DPON MDZAD DE RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BLANGS, MKHAN SLOB GNYIS LA RJES GNANG SOGS ZAB CHOS

MANG PO GSAN, DE NAS KARMA DGON RI BO CHE SOGS BRGYUD KONG PO
NAS KAR DGON DGA' LDAN MA MOR PHEBS, SKU MTSAMS ZLA BA

DRUG TZAM BZHUGS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PA SHING BYA LOR CHAB NAG
DGON DU TSOGS PA'I DBUR BZHUGS MDZAD, TZA RIR

PHEBS NAS PADMA BKOD DANG MTSO DKAR SOGS GNAS KHYAD PAR CAN KUN
TU BYON NAS LO GCIG LHAG 'GOR RJES GDAN SA YANGS PA

CAN DU TSUR PHEBS, BLA MA RGYAL MTSAN LA BKA' BRGYUD PA'I CHOS
SKOR MANG PO ZHUS, SLOB DPON 'JAM DPAL BZANG PO LA'ANG

ZAB KHRID SHIN TU MANG PO GSAN, SGAM POR PHEBS NAS DVAGS PO RIN
PO CHE'I CHOS KHRIR BZHUGS NAS ZAB CHOS GSUNGS, ZLA BA

DGU TZAM DER SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD, TSUR GDAN SAR BYON 'GOS
LO GZHON NU DPAL SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO

LA CHOS 'CHAD CING 'GOS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR <<PHAR PHYIN DON
BSDUS TSIGS BCAD BRGYAD MA>> BRTZAMS, MI RING BAR MDO

KHAMS SU 'BYON RGYU'I DGONGS PA 'KHRUNGS, KONG PO NAS KHAMS 'DAN
MA BRGYUD BE RI'I YUL NAS MDO SMAD SHAR GYI PHYOGS SU MTSO

KHRI GSHOG RGYAL MO'I 'GRAM BSDAD, ZI LING DANG NYE BA'I TZONG
KHA'I SKYE BO MANG POR ZAB CHOS SPEL ZHING SKYA SER MANG POS
BKUR STE

TSAD MED BYAS, DER LHA NGA SPREL RDZONG DU ZHABS RJES BZHAG YA
ZI THANG DU HOR GYI SDE DPON DANG BCAS PA'I SKYE BO BRGYA STONG
MANG

POS BKUR STI BYED CING DE DAG DAM PA'I CHOS LA BKOD, DGUNG LO
NYER GNYIS PA SHING RTA LOR RMA CHU'I 'GRAM NAS TSUR LOG STE

DAR DANG RDO SOGS KYI YUL GRUR BRGYUD DKAR MDZES KHANG DMAR DGON
DU 'BYOR, KARMA PA BDUN PA CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO DER

PHEBS PA MJAL ZHING GSUNG CHOS MANG DU ZHUS TE RE ZHIG PHYAG
PHYIR BZHUGS, MKHAN PO DPAL 'BYOR DON GRUB DANG SLOB DPON

'JAM DPAL BZANG PO'I MDUN ZAB MO NANG DON GYI KHRID DANG GCOD
KYI SKOR RJE MTHONG BA DON LDAN GYI GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG SOGS

GSAN, DE NAS DBUS SU BTEG SDE DGE YID LHUNG NAS GLING TSANG 'DAN
MA SOGS BRGYUD CHAB MDO NAS RIM GYIS GDAN SA

THEL DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO NYER BZHI PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I ME
SPREL LO'I (1476) ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES BZHI'I SNGA DROR 'GOS
LO

GZHON NU DPAL BAS MKHAN PO DANG DGE 'DUN SGANG PA'I CHOS RJE RAB
'BYOR SENG GES SLOB DPON, NAM MKHA' BLO GROS KYIS

GSANG STON, GZHAN YANG SLOB DPON GZHON NU DBANG PHYUG GNAS BRTAN
SMON LAM GRAGS PA BCAS DGE 'DUN LNGA TSOGS DBUS

SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA LEGS PAR MNOS, MKHAN SLOB GNYIS LA
ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, GNAS NANG DU BYAMS SKU

DANG DGA' LDAN MA MOR THUB SKU CHEN MO BZHENGS, YUM DRIN CHEN
DUS KYI CHOS NYID DU GYUR PA'I RJES SU DGE RDZOGS RGYA CHEN

BSGRUBS, CHOS RDZONG DU BYON NAS SPYAN SNGA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN
LA KARMA PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE DANG MKHA' SPYOD DBANG PO'I BKA'
'BUM

GYI LUNG PHUL, DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PA SA KHYI LOR LHA SAR BYON,
ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCU'I NYIN JO BO RIN PO CHE'I GZHAL MED
KHANG

LA KA BA SPRAS, RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS RNAMS LA NA BZA' SOGS MCHOD
SPRIN RGYA CHEN SPROS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PA SA PHAG LOR MAR

@261 PA'I MKHAR GRO BO LUNG BRGYUD PHAM MTHING GTZUG LAG KHANG
DANG MKHAR CHU'I GNAS RNAMS MJAL, LHA LUNG DU SGRUB KHANG
BRTZIGS

NAS LO GCIG RING MTSAMS BZHUGS, ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR RANG GI PHYAG
G-YAS PA SA LA LHUNG BA'I MNAL LTAS NGAN PA BYUNG, MTSUR

PHU'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GI PHYOGS GCIG 'GYEL NAS, LHA CHEN GYI
PHYAG LA GRUM SKYON ZHUGS YOD PAR GSAN, DE DAG GSO BA'I

MTHUN RKYEN DU YO BYAD RGYA CHE BA BSKUR, LHA LUNG DU BYANG CHUB
MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, LCAGS BYI LO'I ZLA BA GSUM PAR LHA LUNG NAS

BTEG STE LHO KHA'I DGON GNAS PHAL MO CHER PHEBS, SKYA SER MANG
POR ZAB CHOS BSTZAL, ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES BCO LNGA NAS DBU

BTZUGS TE LHUN GRUB CHOS SDE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG GSAR DU BZHENGS,
DGUNG LO NYER DGU PA LCAGS GLANG LOR (1481) PHO BRANG NE'U

GDONG DU BYON, SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE ZLA BA DGU PA'I TSES GCIG
LA RGYAL THABS KYI GSER KHRIR PHEBS PA'I KHRI STON GYI SHIS
BRJOD

MDZAD, RTZA BA'I BLA MA 'GOS LO GZHON NU DPAL DGUNG LO DGU BCUR
PHEBS PA ZHI DBYINGS SU MNAL BAR BRTEN GSHEGS RDZOGS

RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS SHING RTZE THANG DGON PAR DGE 'DUN BZHI STONG
LHAG LA DGONGS RDZOGS CHED DU 'GYED MANG JA PHUL, DGUNG LO SUM

CU PA CHU STAG LOR 'PHYONG RGYAS STAG RTZER PHEBS, SBYIN BDAG BU
SLOB RNAMS LA N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI BSHAD PA MDZAD, STOD LUNG

MTSUR PHUR KARMA PA CHOS GRAGS RGYA MTSO DANG BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR
DON GRUB KHAMS NAS TSUR PHEBS PA MJAL BAR BYON, 'BUL BA

SPOM MTHO BA PHUL, DE NAS DBUS LHA SAR PHEBS RJES MON YUL GYI
DGON SDE RNAMS SU BYON, NE'U GDONG DU BLA MA DPAL 'BYOR

DON GRUB GSHEGS NAS DGONGS RDZOGS BSGRUBS, RTZE THANG DGON PAR
DGE 'DUN LNGA STONG TZAM LA DAM PA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON

BSTZAL, LHUN GRUB LHA RTZER BLA MA LO CHEN BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO
'DAS PAR GDUNG MCHOD SOGS MDZAD, LHUN GRUB CHOS SDE'I

GTZUG LAG KHANG ZHIG GSO DANG RTZA BA'I BLA MA RNAM GSUM GYI
GDUNG RTEN DU MCHOD RTEN BKRA SHIS SGO MANG LHA TSOGS DANG BCAS
PA

GSER ZANGS DANG NOR BU SNA TSOGS TZANDAN DKAR DMAR SOGS LAS
BSGRUBS, LO MJUG MON YUL NAS RANG GI GDAN SAR LOG

SHING PHO 'BRUG LO'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG PAR GTZANG BYANG RGYUD 'U
YUG PHU DKAR DU KARMA PA MJAL BAR BYON, KARMA SGAR CHEN DU RGYAL

DBANG PA'I DBON PO DANG SKU MCHED SOGS LA CHOS DRUG GTUM MO'I
KHRID MDZAD, ME RTA LOR ZLA BA LNGA PA'I NYER GCIG NYIN NYANG

PO'I LCAGS ZAM GSAR BSKRUN LA RAB GNAS DANG BKRA SHIS BRJOD,
SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHE DANG KUN SPANGS CHEN PO GNYIS LA RAB BYUNG

GI SDOM PA GNANG, MTSUR PHU NAS KARMA PA'I BKA' SHOG 'BYOR BAR
BRTEN ZLA BA BDUN PAR BTEG MTSUR PHUR GU SHRI'I MCHED

DANG SPA RA BA MI MTHUN PA'I 'GAL BA BSDUMS, ZLA BA BCU GCIG
PA'I TSES BZHI LA KARMA PA MJAL, KARMA PAS GU SHRI'I ZHAL 

CHEMS LTAR KHONG GU'I GUNG PA'I GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL YANG BSHOL
TE 'BRONG BU GO SHRI LA GU'I GUNG GI GO SA GNANG, ME MO LUG

LOR SPYAN SNGA RIN PO CHER MJAL 'PHRAD GNANG ZHING 'BUL NOR RGYA
CHEN BSTABS, LHUN GRUB LHA RTZER BYAMS SKU MTHO TSAD BCU PA

GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, GNAS NANG MCHOD KHANG GSAR BZHENGS GRUB
PA LA RAB GNAS MDZAD, THUB SKU MTHO TSAD SUM CU

CAN GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, KONG STOD DUNG DKAR BRAG RI LA MCHOD
KHANG GSAR 'DEBS KYI RMANG BTING, SA PHO SPREL LOR

KONG YUL DU LO HRIL POR 'GRO DON MDZAD, SA MO BYA LOR TZA RI
TRA'I GNAS YIG BRTZAMS, DGUNG LO SO BDUN DU PHEBS PA'I

DGUNG SKEG SEL BA'I RIM GRO BSGRUBS, ZHVA LU LO TZ'A BA ZHABS
PHYIR BZHUGS YOD PA LA BKA' PHAB NAS <<MDZOD 'GREL GNAM

LCAGS THOG GZER>> BOD YIG TU SGYUR BCUG LCAGS KHYI LOR GTZUG LAG
KHANG KHYAMS BCAS LEGS PAR GRUB, LCAGS MO PHAG

LOR RGYA GAR SHAR PHYOGS KYI DGE SLONG DZNY'A NA MANGGAS BSKUL
BA'I NGOR MA H'A BO DHI LA BSTOD PA LEGS SBYAR SKAD DU BRTZAMS,
SPYAN SNGA BLO

GROS RGYAL MTSAN SKU GSHEGS PAS BDE YANGS TSOMS SU GDUNG MCHOD
DANG DGE RDZOGS BSGRUBS, CHU BYI LOR RTZA BA'I BLA MA 'GOS LO

GZHON NU DPAL BA'I GDUNG ZHUGS LA PHUL TE GDUNG RUS KONG POR
GDAN DRANGS, DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PA RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I CHU

MO GLANG GI LOR (1493) GDAN SA THEL GYI GDAN SAR BZHUGS TE PHAG
GRU PA'I LUGS GNYIS KYI 'PHRIN LAS MDZAD, SHING YOS

LOR KARMA 'PHRIN LAS PA SOGS BLA SPRUL CHE KHAG MANG PO LA DBANG
LUNG KHRID SOGS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON SPEL, DGA' LDAN

MA MOR GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN DANG BRTEN PA BCAS YONGS SU GRUB PAR
RAB GNAS MDZAD CING KONG PO KAR SRID SOGS KYI SKYA SER KHRI

PHRAG 'DZOMS PA LA DGYES STON ZLA BA GCIG RING MDZAD, ME 'BRUG
LOR YANGS PA CAN DU RIN SPUNGS PAS GTZOS YON BDAG CHE

CHUNG TSANG MAS GDAN SAR BZHUGS PA'I RTEN 'BREL DU 'BUL NOR RGYA
CHE BA PHUL, 'PHAN YUL DBUS DANG GTZANG DU PHEBS TE,

DGON GNAS KUN TU MCHOD PA PHUL ZHING SKYA SER MANG POR CHOS CHAR
PHAB, ME SPRUL LOR AE WAm MTHO BTZUN CHEN PO GSHEGS PA'I

DGONGS RDZOGS KYI TSOGS DBUR PHEBS NAS BSNGO SMON ZAB RGYAS
MDZAD, SA RTA LOR GNAS NANG GSER 'BUM LA CHAB KHEBS TOG

BCAS PHUL, STAG RTZE DPON TSE BRTAN RDO RJE 'DAS PAR DGONGS
RDZOGS KYI TSOGS DBU MDZAD, SA LUG LO'I ZLA BA DANG POR NE'U

GDONG DPON KHRIR BKOD NAS DVAGS PO BKA' 'BUM GYI LUNG BSTZAL,
ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR GTZANG DU PHEBS NAS MTHO BTZUN SPRUL SKU

@262 BSOD NAMS 'BYUNG GNAS BCAS LA RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS, RIN SPUNGS
SU PHEBS NAS SA SKYONG KHU DBON LA RDZOGS CHEN RDO RJE ZAM PA

SOGS KYI ZAB CHOS PHUL GTZANG GI DGON SDE DANG BSAM 'GRUB RTZE
SOGS PHO BRANG RNAMS SU BLA DPON SER SKYA MANG POR ZAB CHOS

GNANG ZHING BSNYEN BKUR TSAD MED THOB, SLAR DBUS SU BYON, YAR
'BROG DPON GYIS 'BUL CHEN BSTABS, LHUN RTZER

PHEBS NAS PHAG GRU'I GDAN SA 'DZIN, GNAS NANG DANG DGA' LDAN MA
MOR GDAN SA PA GSAR DU BSKOS, LCAGS BYA LOR THAR

PA DGON DU 'OD DPAG MED KYI SKU MTHO TSAD BCO BRGYAD PA GSER
ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, M'A Y'A'I SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB SNYE MA

BRTZAMS, CHU KHYI ZLA BA DANG POR SKYID MOS TSAL DU SKU MTSAMS
BZHUGS, ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR NE'U GDONG NAS SNE GDONG DPON DANG

LHAN CIG 'PHYONG RGYAS SU PHEBS TE DBANG BSKUR SOGS MDZAD, DE
NAS PHAG GRU STAG LUNG THAR PA DGON SOGS SU BYON NAS RAB

BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS SGRUB PA BCAS 'GRO DON RGYA CHEN MDZAD,
DGUNG LO NGA GCIG PA CHU MO PHAG GI LOR GNYAN CHEN THANG LHA'I
SHAR GYI

PHYOGS RI BO 'BRANG RGYAS KYI NGOGS BDE CHEN DU GTZUG LAG KHANG
KA BA BDUN CU CAN DANG BLA BRANG SKOR LAM GRVA SHAG BRGYA DANG
BDUN CU

BCAS KYI RMANG GSAR DU BTING, SNE GDONG DPON GYI ZHAL BSGOS KYIS
DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI LAS MI MANG PO BSKUL NAS LO

GCIG LHAG TZAM LA PHAL CHER GRUB PAR MDZAD, KUN SPANGS CHEN PO
SOGS LA ZAB CHOS BSTZAL, DGUNG LO NGA GNYIS PA CHU PHO BYI

BA LOR GLO BO BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GANG SA TI SE DANG GANGS
CAN MA DROS PA DANG MA PHAM G-YU MTSO GCIG YIN MIN DRIS PA'I LAN

<<DRIS LAN MKHAS PA'I RNA RGYAN>> BRTZAMS, MON DGON DU BYAMS SKU
MTHO TSAD DRUG LDAN GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, RIN

SPUNGS PA DANG LHO STOD PA'I BAR GYI 'KHRUG PA BSDUMS, MDO KHAMS
STOD NAS RGYA STON DBON PO NAM MKHA' LEGS PA'I RGYAL MTSAN

DER SLEBS, THAR RGYAN DANG MI LA'I MGUR 'BUM BCAS GSUNGS, DGUNG
LO NGA GSUM PA SHING MO GLANG LOR ZLA BA BCU GCIG

PAR SNE GDONG DPON CHEN PO DANG BCAS YON MCHOD LHAN CIG DBUS PO
TA LAR PHEBS, JO SH'AKA RNAM GNYIS SOGS RTEN KHYAD

'PHAGS RNAMS LA PHYAG MCHOD PHUL, SLAR YANGS PA CAN DU TSUR
BYON, SKABS DER GTZUG LAG KHANG SPEN BAD KYI BAR YONGS SU 

GRUB STE RI MO SHING RTZI SOGS KYI DBU BTZUGS, GRUB MTHA' RIS
MED KYI DAD LDAN 'DUS PA MANG PO LA ZAB CHOS GANG 'DOD BSTZAL,

DGUNG LO NGA BZHI PA ME STAG LO (1506) LA RANG RNAM TSIGS BCAD
MA AUTPA LA'I DO SHAL GYI MJUG BSDUS PAR MDZAD, DE NAS RIM

BZHIN LHA KHANG TSANG MAR RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD
CING, ZHVA DMAR COD PAN 'DZIN PA NA RIM GYI SKU SKU TSAD MA

GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS PA DANG MGON KHANG DU KAR LUGS DANG THEL
PA'I CHOS SKYONG RNAMS KYI SKU SOGS BZHENGS, DGON STENG

'OG KUN TU SMAN THANG PA SMAN BLA DON GRUB YAB SRAS GTZOS LHA
RIS MKHAS PA GDAN DRANGS TE RI MO'I BKOD PA NGO MTSAR BA BRIR

BCUG GTZUG LAG KHANG PHYI NANG THAMS CAD LHAN CIG TU LEGS PAR
GRUB, GOS SKU CHEN PO BZHENGS PA'I DUS SU MDUN GYI NE'U

THANG YANGS PAR GOS SKU'I TSAD DANG LDAN PA'I RAS GZHI BKRAM
PA'I STENG DU SMAN THANG PA 'JAM DBYANGS PAS ZA 'OG GI LHAM GON,

SOL PIR YU RING CAN BZUNG NAS THUB CHEN GYI SKU BRIS TE TSON YIG
BTAB, DE LA GZHIR BZUNG STE GOS CAN KHA DOG SO SO DRAS NAS

BSGRIGS PAS SPO LEN SOGS GANG YANG MA DGOS PAR THENGS GCIG LA
LEGS PAR GRUB, DGUNG LO DRUG CU PA SPREL LOR DPA' BO

GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA'I GTZUG PHUD BZHES TE RAB TU BYUNG, SNE
GDONG SA SKYONG DON RDOR 'DAS, BSNGO SMON SOGS DUS THA'I CHO GA

MDZAD, SLAR YANGS PA CAN DU BYAMS KHANG CHEN MO RUNG KHANG BCAS
KA BA BRGYA LHAG YOD PA BZHENGS, LHA GTZO GZIM LTAS SU THUB

PA CHOS 'CHAD CAN BAB PAS THUB SKU SHIN TU CHE BA 'KHOR DANG
BCAS PA GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, GONG MA'I GDUNG BRGYUD SKU

GZHON PA DGE TSUL BSGRUBS NAS THEL GYI GDAN SAR BSKOS, LHA SAR
JO BO RIN PO CHER BZHUGS KHRI LEGS PA PHUL, KARMA PA MI

BSKYOD RDO RJE GDAN 'DREN PAR DBON CHOS SKYONG MNGAGS KYANG GDAN
DRANG MA THUB, DGUNG LO DON GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I

SHING PHO SPREL LOR (1524) SKU GSHEGS, SKU GDUNG DNGUL GYI MCHOD
RTEN RMAD DU BYUNG BA BZHENGS NAS DE'I NANG BZHUGS SU GSOL,

KHONG GI SLOB MA SPYAN SNGA BCU GCIG PA DANG BCU GSUM PA KUN
SPANGS PA CHEN PO GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA KARMA PHRIN LAS PA SOGS

BKA' BRGYUD PA'I BLA SPRUL CHEN PO RNAMS DANG GZHAN YANG SA DGE
RNYING GSUM GYI BLA SPRUL YANG MANG PO LA DBANG LUNG GNANG MYONG
BA

RED,

GSUNG RAB NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU MTHING SHOG LA GSER ZHUN KYIS
BRIS PA'I POD CHEN BCU GNYIS BZHUGS YOD,

RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA'I DKYIL CHOG BZHUGS SO, , (39) 14

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

ZHVA DMAR LNGA PA DKON MCHOG YAN LAG NI, KONG PO STOD KYI PHYOGS
SU GNAS CHEN TZA RI TRA'I NYE 'DABS RJE SGAM PO PA'I

TSEMS KYI MCHOD RTEN GYI 'GRAM RKYEN ZHOL MO CHER DGA' LDAN
KHANG GSAR DU YAB RGYAL PO MTSAN LDAN DANG YUM BSOD NAMS SGROL
MA

GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I SHING MO BYA LO'I (1525)
ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCU NYIN PA'I THO RANGS LA SKU BLTAMS,

BLTAMS MA THAG MAR ME LA GZIGS TE ZHAL 'DZUM PA MDZAD, ZHAG
GNYIS GSUM RJES YAB YUM MA NOR BAR MKHYEN CING SHA

CHANG GI DRI TSOR BA LA MI DGYES PA'I RNAM 'GYUR BSTAN PA SOGS
BYIS PA GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BA ZHIG YOD STABS YAB YUM NAS BYIS PA

'DI RJE KARMA PA LA PHUL TE CHOS BYED DU 'JUG RGYUR THAG BCAD,
MTSAN ZLA BA CHOS SKYES SU BTAGS, DGUNG LO GCIG MA ZIN

TZAM LA KARMA PA MI BSKYOD RDO RJE KONG PO TZA RIR GNAS GZIGS LA
PHEBS, YAB RGYAL POS BYIS PA PANG DU BLANGS NAS KARMA PA MJAL

BAR SONG, BYIS PAS MIG GZHAN DU MI YOL BAR RJE KARMA PA'I ZHAL
LA GZIGS, KARMA PAS BU 'DI GZHAN DANG MI 'DRA BA ZHIG

YIN ZHES MTSAN DKON MCHOG YAN LAG CES PA BSTZAL, GTZUG PHUD
BZHES TE SKYABS 'GRO DANG THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I SGOM BZLAS

KYANG GNANG, BYIS PA LO GNYIS PA'I MGO ZIN TZAM NA KARMA PA'I
BKA' SHOG DANG MI SNA BCAS 'BYOR BA DANG BSTUN TE YAB YUM SKU

'KHOR BCAS KARMA'I SGAR CHEN DU PHEBS, RJE KARMA PA MI BSKYOD
RDO RJES BRTAN PA SNA TSOGS MDZAD DE ZHVA DMAR BZHI PA CHOS
GRAGS

YE SHES KYI SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO BZHIR SON PA
NA K'A RI KA LNGA BCU PA DANG ZAB MO NANG DON GYI RTZA BA SUM
RTAGS

KYI RTZA BA SOGS BLOR 'DZIN GYI DBU BTZUGS,

DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA LA RJE MI BSKYOD RDO RJE'I SPYAN SNGAR YONGS
RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, MTSAN DKON MCHOG

'BANGS ZHES PA BSTZAL, LO BRGYAD DGU RING KARMA SGAR CHEN DU RJE
MI BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG 'BRAL MED DU 'GROGS TE 'BRI KHUNG RIN

CHEN RNAM RGYAL DANG DPA' BO GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA SOGS SPRUL SKU
MANG PO DANG LHAN CIG TU ZAB CHOS RGYA MTSO LTA BU ZHUS, RA
SGRENG DANG

@268 STAG LUNG SOGS KYI DGON GNAS RNAMS MJAL, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM
PAR MTSUR PHUR PHEBS, GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA'I MDUN

NAS RDO RJE PHRENG BA DANG SGRUB THABS RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI DBANG
RJES GNANG DU MA GSAN, YANG DBEN THEG CHEN RTZER RJE KARMA MI
BSKYOD

RDO RJES MKHAN PO DANG 'PHRIN LAS PAS LAS SLOB GTZUG LAG PHRENG
BAS DUS BSGO BA MDZAD DE DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PA KHYI LO'I DBYAR

KHAR DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA LEGS PAR MNOS, DGUNG LO BCO LNGA PAR
GTZANG DU BYON, LO TZ'A BA KUN DGA' CHOS BZANG LA SGRA DANG

SNYAN NGAG GSAN, RJE KARMA PA DANG MNYAM DU YANGS PA CAN GYI
CHOS GRVAR SPYAN DRANGS, RJE MI BSKYOD RDO RJES KHONG ZHVA DMAR
PA'I

GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PA CHU PHO STAG
GI LO'I (1542) DPYID KAR CHU BZANG LUNG TSA RAG PHU LA RJE

MI BSKYOD RDO RJES MKHAN PO DANG GTZUG LAG PHRENG BAS LAS SLOB
MDZAD DE DGE 'DUN TSAD LDAN GRANGS TSANG GI DBUS SU BSNYEN
RDZOGS

KYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR MNOS, LO DI'I DBYAR KHAR RGYAL DBANG
KARMA PA'I BKA' BZHIN ZHVA DMAR PA'I GDAN SA YANGS PA CAN

DGA' LDAN MA MOR 'BYOR RJES MKHAS DBANG RNAM RGYAL GRAGS PA KLOG
GI SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS SDE SNOD KUN LA GSAN PA RGYA CHER

MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR TZA TI RA GSAR MA'I GNAS RNAMS SU
GNAS GZIGS LA PHEBS, RIN PHUG TU MNGON RTOGS

RGYAN DANG ZAB MO NANG DON GYI 'GREL PA BRTZAMS, GTZUG LAG
PHRENG BA MTSO DKAR NAS SPYAN DRANGS TE, BKA' 'GYUR GYI LUNG

'PHRO DANG DBANG KHRID DU MA GSAN, KONG LJONGS KUN TU PHEBS NAS
RIS SU MA CHAD PA'I BLA SPRUL RNAMS LA CHOS KYI BKA' DRIN

BSTZAL, YUL GYI SKYE BO MTHA' DAG LA SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI CHOS
SKOR GNANG, YUM DANG DBON 'DAS PA'I RJES SU RJE KARMA PA'I

MDUN BSNGO RTEN PHUL ZHING YUM 'DAS DON DU DGA' LDAN MA MOR RDO
RJE 'CHANG GI SKU GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, DBON PO 'DAS

PA'I CHED DU RJE KARMA PA'I DRUNG DU THUB SKU ZANGS THANG MAR
GRAGS PA'I RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS DE PHUL, RING PO MA LON PAR RJE
KARMA PAS

SGAR CHEN DU PHEBS DGOS PA'I BKA' SHOG BSTZAL, DGA' LDAN MA MO'I
MDZOD DU BDOG PA'I DNGOS PO BZANG DGU KHYER NAS

DVAGS PO SOGS BRGYUD DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PA LCAGS PHO KHYI LO'I
ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR KARMA'I SGAR CHEN DU PHEBS, RGYAL DBANG KARMA
PA'I

DRUNG DU 'BUL NOR SPOM MTHO BA PHUL, GDAN SA THEL DU SPYAN SNGA
RIN PO CHE MJAL ZHING CHOS 'BREL ZHUS SA SKYONG BSOD NAMS DAR

RGYAS PAS 'PHYONG RGYAS SU GDAN DRANGS NAS 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN
PHUL, SLAR TZA RI TRAR MTSO DKAR DU PHEBS NAS RJE KARMA PA'I
DRUNG DU

RJE'I GSUNG 'BUM YONGS RDZOGS KYI BYIN RLABS DANG DBANG KHRID
GZHAN DAG MANG DU ZHUS, DVAGS KONG 'KHRUG ZING 'JAGS CHED

RJE SKU 'KHOR BCAS BAR 'DUM LA PHEBS, RJE KARMA PA SKU MNYEL
BA'I SKABS YIN PAS MTSO DGAR DU BZHUGS NAS DBYAR GNAS

MDZAD, DE NAS BSHAD SGRUB GLING SOGS BRGYUD YAR STOD SHAM PA'I
GANGS ZHOL DU ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I TSES NYER GSUM LA RGYAL DBANG

KARMA PAS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS, DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI RIS
MED DGON SDE YONGS LA MANG 'GYED DANG RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS

RNAMS LA MCHOD 'BUL SOGS DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHER BSGRUBS, DGUNG
LO SO GCIG PA SHING MO YOS LOR (1555) DPA' BO

GTZUG LAG PHRENG BA SOGS RJE RGYAL DBANG PA'I SLOB MA GTZO BO
RNAMS DANG RIN SPUNGS PA SOGS YON BDAG CHEN PO MANG POS GSOL

BA NAN GYIS BTAB PA'I NGOR GDAN SA MTSUR PHU'I GSER KHRIR BZHUGS
TE RGYAL DBANG PA'I RGYAL TSAB DAM PAR MNGA' GSOL, RTA

LOR DGE 'DUN YANG RI BA YANG KHAMS SU KARMA PA'I SPRUL SKU'I
ZHABS RIM DU BRDZANGS, DE NAS MI RING BAR RJE DPA' BO GTZUG

PHRENG GI DRUNG DU LHO BRAG TU PHEBS NAS KHAMS NAS SPRUL SKU
SPYAN DRANGS NAS SLAR 'DIR MA 'BYOR GYI BAR GTZANG DBUS DVAGS
KONG GI

BRTAN SRID MA LUS SPYAN GYIS 'TSO DGOS PA SOGS KYI ZHU BA PHUL,
RJE DPA' BOS KYANG ZHAL BZHES THOG SPRUL SKU MYUR DU SPYAN DRANG

DGOS PA'I ZHAL BKOD GNANG, DE NAS YANGS PA CAN DU DGA' LDAN MA
MOR LCAGS SPREL LO'I LO GSAR BTANG, ZLA BA LNGA PAR

BYANG LAM BRGYUD DE MDO KHAMS SU BTEGS, SI TU RIN PO CHE DANG
MJAL, ZUR MANG SPRUL SKU BLO GROS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING BSNYEN

PAR RDZOGS TE MING KARMA LEGS BSHAD SGRA DBYANGS ZHES PA BSTZAL,
'BRI CHU'I RGYUD AA LA SDONG GRU KHAR LCAGS BYA LO'I LO GSAR
MDZAD,

DE NAS KHAMS DKAR MDZES PHYOGS SU BTEGS, DGUNG LO SUM CU SO BDUN
PA LCAGS BYA LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS PAR DGUNG LO DRUG TU

PHEBS PA'I RJE KARMA PA MI BSKYOD ZHABS KYI YANG SRID SPRUL SKU
MJAL, MI RING BAR GTZUG PHUD BZHES TE YONGS RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN
GYI

SDOM PA PHUL, MTSAN DPAL LDAN MI PHAM CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG CES
PA BSTZAL, LO DE'I DGUN KHAR LHUN RTZER BZHUGS, KHYI LO'I

LO GSAR MDZAD, ZLA BA DGU PAR 'DZAM THANG DGON PAR PHEBS, DGON
DE'I GRVA PA NYIS STONG NYE BA LA RAB BYUNG DANG BSNYEN

RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA GNANG, DGUN KHAR MGO LOG GSER THAR PHYOGS SU
CHOS SBYIN BSTZAL, SLAR SHEL KHOG TU TSUR LOG SKABS DER

DAR MDO'I MI CHEN GRAGS RGYAL SOGS DPON KHAG DANG MI NYAG MKHAS
PA MI LNGA'I SDE RNAMS KYIS SPYAN 'DREN PA 'BYOR, DGUNG LO

SUM CU SO DGU PA PHAG LO'I ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES NYER BDUN LA
DAR MDOR 'BYOR, MI NYAG MKHAS PA MI LNGA'I DGON KHAG TU PHEBS

NAS GRVA PA BRGYA PHRAG MANG POR RAB BYUNG DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS
BSGRUBS, BYI BA LO'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES GSUM LA DBUS SU

@269 CHIBS BSGYUR MDZAD, GLANG LO'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG PAR YANGS PA
CAN DU 'BYOR, ZLA DE'I TSES PA BCU TZAM LA GDAN SA MTSUR

PHUR PHEBS, DGUNG LO BCU LA PHEBS PA'I SPRUL SKU RIN PO CHE RJE
KARMA PA'I GDAN SAR BKOD, STAG LO'I LO GSAR BTANG RJES ZLA

BA BZHI PA'I TSES BCU DGU'I NYIN KHONG GIS MKHAN PO DANG DPA' BO
GTZUG PHRENG GIS LAS SLOB GZHAN YANG DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG

DBUS SU KARMA PA'I MCHOG SPRUL LA RAB BYUNG DANG DGE TSUL GYI
SDOM PA PHUL, ZLA BA BCU PAR LHA PHU BAS GTZANG DU GDAN DRANGS,

SHANGS RNAM GLING DU YOS LO'I LO GSAR SMON LAM MDZAD, DBUS KYI
DUS ZINGS 'JAGS CHED GONG DKAR DANG SKYID SHONGS SU

PHEBS DMAG TSANG MA SO SOR GYES BCUG DER 'BRUG LO'I LO GSAR
MDZAD, TSAL MIG DANG, KHRA 'BRUG YUM BU BLA MKHAR,

SNE'U GDONG, BSAM YAS, YANGS PA CAN SOGS SU BYON NAS ZAB RGYAS
CHOS KYI DGA' STON CI RIGS SPEL, YANGS PA CAN DU

DGUN BZHUGS SKABS SPO BO DANG KONG PO'I KAR SRID PA KUN GYIS RTA
'BUL SOGS BZHES, DER SBRUL LO'I LO GSAR RJES MCHOG

SPRUL LA N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI DPE CHA DANG DUS MKHYEN BKA' 'BUM
BKA' BRGYUD GSER PHRENG SOGS KYI LUNG PHUL, YANGS PA CAN GYI

GDAN SAR COG GRVA BLA MA BSKOS, BCA' YIG ZHIB BKOD MDZAD, DPA'
BO GTZUG PHRENG BA'I SPRUL SKU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD, NA

KHA SBUG TU BZHUGS RING MCHOG SPRUL LA KARMA PA KshI'I GSUNG
'BUM YONGS RDZOGS KYI LUNG PHUL, RJE DPA' BO'I DNGUL GDUNG LA
RAB

GNAS DANG GTZUG PHRENG GI SPRUL SKU GSER KHRIR BKOD, LCAGS PHO
RTA LO'I ZLA BA BCU PAR TZA RIR PHEBS NAS GNAS GZIGS MDZAD,

LCAGS LUG LO'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG PAR RANG GI GDAN SA DGA' LDAN MA
MOR PHEBS, 'JANG RGYAL BLON GYI 'BUL SKYEL GTOS CHER

'BYOR, KONG STOD SMAD KYI MI DPON TSANG MA 'DUS PA LA ZAB CHOS
GNANG, RTZE SGANG ZHOL THANG DU CHU BYA LO'I LO GSAR SMON LAM

SHIN TU RGYAS PA MDZAD, DE'I RGYU MTSAN NI KHONG DGUNG LO ZHE
DGUR PHEBS PA'I DGUNG SKEG KHEL BA'I DBANG GIS MDO KHAMS STOD

SMAD 'JANG RGYAL BLON BCAS YON BDAG CHE BA KUN GYI 'BUL SKYEL
RGYA CHE BA 'BYOR ZHING KONG PO BA SOGS SKYE BO STONG PHRAG MANG
POS NYIN

MTSAN MED PAR BSKOR BA DANG YIG DRUG 'DREN PA SOGS DGE LAS KHO
NAS DUS 'DA' BAR BYED, KARMA PAS KYANG SKU SKYOS SPAM MTHO

BA GNANG, DBUS NAS SDE PA DPON DANG SLOB MA BCAS NAS ZHVA DMAR
GONG MA'I RGYUN LUGS LTAR KUN BZANG NAGS KHROD KYI GDAN

SA 'DZIN DGOS PAR BSKUL, DGYES BZHIN DU BDAG GIR BZHES, DGA'
LDAN MA MOR SLOB MA'I TSOGS LA SHANGS CHOS YONGS

RDZOGS KYI LUNG GNANG, SHING PHAG LO'I ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR DBUS SU
PHEBS DPA' BO GTZUG PHRENG GI SPRUL SKUR RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS

MTSAN GTZUG LAG RGYA MTSO DGA' BA'I DBYANGS ZHES BSTZAL, YAR
KLUNG DU BYON NAS RTZE DANG 'PHYONG RGYAS BAR CHINGS 'JAGS

MDZAD, ME BYI LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PAR PHAG GRUR BYON, TSES BCU GSUM
NYIN PHAG GRU'I GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL, STON KHAR

BSAM YAS MCHIMS PHU SOGS KYI GNAS MJAL DANG LHA SAR JO SH'AKA
RNAM GNYIS MJAL ZHING SE 'BRAS DGON KHAG LA 'GYED MANG JA

PHUL, ME GLANG LO'I LO GSAR RJES YANGS PA CAN GYI MKHAN PO DANG
GNAS NANG GRVA TSANG GI SLOB DPON GSAR PA BSKO BZHAG MDZAD,

SA SKYONG RIN SPUNGS PAS SPYAN DRANGS TE GTZANG DU BYON, STAG
LO'I LO GSAR ZIN RJES BSAM RTZER BZHUGS SKABS SDE PA SNAR THANG

PAS CHOS GRVA CHEN PO SNAR THANG DU GDAN DRANGS TE DGE BSNYEN
GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, JO MO GANGS SOGS LA GNAS GZIGS DANG GTZANG

GI DGON GNAS MANG POR ZHABS KYIS BCAGS, LO MJUG MTSUR PHUR PHEBS
NAS SA MO YOS KYI LO GSAR SMON LAM MDZAD,

MTSUR PHU'I 'DU KHANG CHEN MOR KARMA PA'I MCHOG SPRUL LA BSNYEN
RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA PHUL, ZLA BA BRGYAD PAR BYANG GNAM MTSOR GNAS

GZIGS PHEBS, LCAGS PHO 'BRUG GI LO ZLA BA GNYIS PAR KARMA PA'I
MCHOG SPRUL LA AO RGYAN BSNYEN SGRUB SKOR GYI LUNG PHUL,

HOR STOD SMAD KYI DPON RNAMS KYIS GDAN ZHUS LTAR ZLA BA BDUN PAR
BYANG DU BTEG DPON KHAG GIS 'BUL CHEN PHUL,

TSUR PHEBS RJES MCHOG SPRUL GDAN DRANGS NAS GNAS NANG BYAMS
KHANG GI SGO KHANG LOGS RIS BCAS LA RAB GNAS MDZAD, ZLA BA

BCU GNYIS PAR THEL DU PHEBS NAS LCAGS MO SPRUL LO'I LO GSAR SMON
LAM MDZAD, DPA' BO SPRUL SKU DPON SLOB LA BKA' 'GYUR

GYI LUNG 'PHRO SOGS ZAB CHOS SMAR BA GNANG, MTSUR PHUR CHU PHO
RTA LO'I LO GSAR SMON LAM THOG MTSUR PHU'I MCHOD GONG STENG SHOD

KYI RTEN BRTEN PA GSAR BZHENGS GRUB PA RNAMS LA RAB GNAS RGYAS
PA MDZAD, ZLA BA BCU PAR MON YUL DU PHEBS SHING DGON

GNAS RNAMS SU MJAL GZIGS SU PHEBS, LHA LUNG DU SGAR PHAB NAS CHU
MO LUG LO'I LO GSAR MDZAD, SKU MNYEL CUNG BYUNG BAS

'PHROD BSTEN CHED DU SKU MTSAMS ZLA SHAS BZHUGS, SNYUN RIM GYIS
JE LCIR SONG, RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU PHO RTA LO (1583) ZLA BA

BDUN PA'I TSES NYER GSUM LA SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS SO, SLOB MA'I
GTZO BO KARMA PA DGU PA DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE, RGYAL TSAB SPRUL
SKU

GRAGS PA DON GRUB, SI TU'I SPRUL SKU CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, DPA'
PO'I SPRUL SKU GTZUG LAG RGYA MTSO SOGS DANG SA SKYA RTZE GDONG

BDAG CHEN, STAG LUNG KUN DGA' BKRA SHIS BCAS RIS MED KYI BLA
DPON DGE BSHES SHIN TU MANG PO SPEL,

GSUNG 'BUM KHYON PO TI BRGYAD TZAM YOD PAR GRAGS KYANG NGED DPE
MDZOD KHANG DU DBU MED BRIS MA POD KA PA GCIG LAS

PHAR PHYIN ZUR BKOL LAS DGE 'DUN NYI SHU, RTEN 'BREL, DRANG NGES

DKA' GNAD GSAL BA'I RIN CHEN SGRON ME BZHUGS SO, , (4) 83

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

ZHVA DMAR DGE 'DUN BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSO NI MTSO SNGON ZHING
CHEN GYI SA'I BYE BRAG MDA' BZHI RU SDE'AM DKAR THANG MAR KHU'I

MTSO MO ZHES PA'I YUL DU, YAB BAN SMUG DANG YUM MA CIG GNYIS KYI
SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU BYI LOR (1852) 'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA'I DUS SU MKHAN CHEN DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO'I MDUN
NAS RAB TU BYUNG, GSANG SNGAGS SKOR GYI DBANG 'GA' ZHIG

ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR LA MO BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DGON DU
CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DGUNG LO BCU BZHI NAS BZUNG AA KHU SHES

RAB RGYA MTSO DANG TSUL KHRIMS DPAL LDAN SOGS KYI SPYAN SNGAR
RIG PA'I GNAS RNAMS LA SBYONG BA'I SGO THOG MAR PHYE, LO BCO
LNGA'I

STON DUS SU AA ROL BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO MJAL ZHING DAM
CHOS MANG PO ZHUS NAS LO GSUM BZHI TZAM LA SLOB DPON DU BSTEN,

DGUNG GRANGS BCU DGU PAR BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BYON NAS
AA KHU SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS GTZOS NGAG DBANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO

THU'U BKVAN YONGS 'DZIN BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO SOGS KYI MDUN NAS MDO
SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DE DUS NAS

BZUNG RTZA BA'I BLA MA LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO'I ZHAL BKOD LTAR RI
KHROD PA'I TSUL BZUNG NAS 'JIG RTEN PHAL PA'I BYA BZHAG RING DU
DOR,

RIG GNAS MKHAS PA TSANGS SRAS DGYES PA'I BLO LDAN DANG, 'JAM
DBYANGS TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO BCAS LAS SGRA DANG SNYAN NGAG

SDEBS SBYOR BCAS THUN MONG RIG PA'I GNAS KUN LEGS PAR SBYANGS,
RI KHROD PA DKYUS MA'I TSUL GYIS BZHUGS SHING SKABS DER

LTO GOS 'GRIG TZAM LAS MED MOD, PHYIS SU 'BUL NOR RGYA CHEN
BYUNG BAR BRTEN, RI KHROD PA RNAMS LA 'GYED DANG MANG JA SOGS

RGYA CHEN PHUL BAR MA ZAD, SGO DMAR DGON GYI 'DU KHANG DU THUB
PA'I SKU BRNYAN MTHO TSAD MA CHIG STONG LA GSER PHUL NAS SBYOR

'JAGS MDZAD PA SOGS RNAM DKAR GYI PHYAG LAS RGYA CHEN MDZAD,
DGUNG LO SO LNGAR PHEBS PA NA RTZA BA'I BLA MA SMON LAM BZANG PO

ZHING GZHAN DU GSHEGS PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, BLA
MAS SNGAR NAS ZHAL BKOD GNANG BA DANG DU BLANGS TE

DGUNG LO SO DRUG NAS BYA KHYUNG DGON PA DANG NYE BA'I RI KHROD
RNAMS SU BZHUGS TE DGE SBYOR LA 'BAD, DER RI KHROD PA RNAMS DANG

MNYAM DU BYA KHYUNG GSER GDUNG CHEN MO'I MDUN DU MCHOD ME KHRI
LNGA LHAG 'BUL BA SOGS RNAM DKAR GYI DGE TSOGS BSGRUBS, DE

NAS BZUNG RMA CHU'I NYI SRIB DANG SGO ME STOD SMAD KYI RI KHROD
PA RNAMS LHAN CIG TSOGS NAS MCHOD 'BUL RGYA CHEN BYED PA'I SROL

BTZUGS, RI KHROD PA KUN GYIS BLA MAR BKUR ZHING DE DAG LA ZAB
CHOS MANG PO BSTZAL, RI KHROD PA SUM BRGYA LHAG TU 'PHEL BAR

MA ZAD NYE 'KHOR GYI GRVA MANG TSANG MA'ANG SLOB MAR 'DUS, DE
DAG LA GZHUNG POD LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD CING, DUS TSIGS SO

SO'I DUS MCHOD KYI RTEN RTZA BZHAG BYA KHYUNG DGON PAR TSOGS
CHEN DU MANG 'GYED DANG MCHOD THEBS KYI RTZA BA RGYA PHIBS LA
GSER

TSOS KYI ZHAL 'DEBS SOGS DNGOS DNGUL RGYA CHEN PHUL, RANG DGON
BDE CHEN CHOS GLING DU MCHOD RDZAS DANG MCHOD CHA RTEN RTZA

SOGS DNGUL SRANG BDUN STONG LHAG GI YON PHUL, CHU SBRUL LOR SKU
'BUM DU PHYAG BTEG GRVA MANG LA SNGA PHYIR 'GYED THENGS BRGYAD
TZAM

BTANG, ME BYA LOR RNGA BA'I SANGS RGYAS STONG SKUR GSER TSOS
PHUL BA DANG MI NYAG MCHOD RTEN DKAR PO SOGS LA NYAMS GSO

@276 MDZAD, MDO SMAD KYI DGON KHAG KUN TU PHEBS TE, MANG 'GYED
BTANG BA SOGS DGE BA'I LAS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, BLA MA'I

DRIN GZO BA'I PHYIR ME PHAG LO NAS LO NYER LNGA'I RING MCHOD ME
KHRI PHRAG LNGA RE LO LTAR CHAG MED DU PHUL, ME RTA LOR LDE TSA
DGON BKRA

SHIS CHOS GLING GSAR 'DEBS KYI DBU BTZUGS, LO BZHIR YONGS SU
GRUB, 'DU KHANG DANG GSER KHANG LI MA'I LHA KHANG SOGS

GTZUG LAG KHANG RGYA PHIBS BCAS DANG THUB PA GTZO 'KHOR CHE LEGS
DANG THUB SKU KHRU TSAD MA STONG PHRAG SGROL MA'I SKU BRNYAN
SOGS

GSER ZANGS LAS BSGRUBS PA DANG, CHOS CHA MCHOD RDZAS BCAS PHUN
SUM TSOGS PA BSGRUBS, DGON DER PHYIS SU TSOGS PA LNGA

BRGYA TZAM 'DUS, T'A LA'I SKU PHRENG BCU GSUM PA THUB BSTAN RGYA
MTSO'I YONGS 'DZIN MDZAD PAR BRTEN SNYAN GRAGS KUN TU KHYAB,

RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I CHU PHO BYI BA'I LO (1912) DGUNG LO RE
GCIG PAR KHONG GI RTZA BA'I BLA MA SMON LAM BZANG PO'I BSGRUB
GNAS RI

BO BKRA SHIS RTZER SKU GSHEGS, GDUNG RUS DNGUL GYI MCHOD RTEN DU
DRANGS NAS BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING DGON DU BZHUGS SU GSOL BA

YIN NO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG POD GSUM TZAM YOD PAR GRAGS KYANG NGED DPE MDZOD
KHANG DU POD KHA PA KHO NA LAS MED, ,

@277 *, ,ZHVA LU BLO GSAL BSTAN SKYONG GI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

000792 PAR MA,

BU STON THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I RNAM THAR GSOL 'DEBS LO TZ'A NYER
GCIG PA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 6

BA'I GLU DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 17

TSIG TZAM ZHIG BZHUGS SO, , (3) 10

1

BZHUGS SO, , (5) 103

BZHUGS SO, , (6) 47

NGOGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (7) 236

DKAR G-YAS SU 'KHYIL BA'I SGRA DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
(19) 26

RJE BTZUN BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA SGROL DKAR YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I CHO
GA 'CHI MED TSE'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS

GZUNGS GRVA LNGA'I LAG LEN GYI CHO GA NAG PO 'GRO SHES SU BKOD
PA MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN TZINTA MA nI'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA

BZHUGS SO, , (21) 65

BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (22) 29

BSHAD 'DOD RGU 'BYUNG BA'I DPAG BSAM SNYE MA ZHES

BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (24) 87

@279 BCOM LDAN 'DAS RDO RJE MI 'KHRUGS PA LHA BCU GSUM GYI CHOG
BSGRIGS GZHAN PHAN THUGS RJE'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS

SO, , (29) 72

DPAL 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG L'U AI PA'I LUGS KYI DBANG GI MTSAMS
SBYOR SNYING PO RAB GSAL BZHUGS SO, , (30) 39

DUS 'KHOR BSNYEN YIG RIGS LDAN ZHAL LUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,
, (31) 9

SLOB DPON GYI GSOL 'DEBS LE MTSAN BZHUGS SO, , (32) 6

DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE 'GRO BZANG LUGS KYI BSNYEN THABS MDOR
BSDUS BZHUGS SO, , (33) 7

TSE BSGRUB BU STON GONG KHUGS MA'I DBANG CHOG RDO RJE'I TSE SROG
DPAL STER ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (34) 18

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

ZHVA LU BLO GSAL BSTAN SKYONG NI, GTZANG NYANG STOD RIG PA'I
'BYUNG GNAS KYI SA CHA SKYID SBUG CES PA'I YUL DU YAB TSANGS PA

DKAR PO DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PA DANG YUM DGE SKYED BU KHRID DGUNG
NA SO BRGYAD PA GNYIS LAS RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO BYI

BA'I (1804) ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES NYI SHU'I NYIN THO RANGS LA
SKU BLTAMS, KHYE'U 'KHRUNGS NAS NYIN ZHAG GNYIS TZAM LA YUM DRIN

CAN 'DAS PAR BRTEN ZLA BA CHOS 'DZOMS ZER BA ZHIG LA MA MA BCOL
NAS GSOS KYANG, ZLA BA CHOS 'DZOMS RANG LA BU YOD PAS

BU GNYIS GSO BAR NU MAS MA 'DANG NAS RMO RMO RNAM RGYAL BZANG
MOS JA 'DUR RTZAM THUG SOGS KYIS GSOS, DGUNG LO BZHI PAR

SA SKYA BDAG CHEN DBANG SDUD SNYING POS ZHVA LU BLO GSAL BSTAN
RGYAS KYI SPRUL SKU YIN PAR LUNG BSTAN, MTSAN BLO GSAL BSTAN
SKYONG

ZHES PA'ANG DE DUS BTAGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR
BYON NAS PAn CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I DRUNG DU GTZUG PHUD

PHUL TE RAB TU BYUNG, YI GE'I PHYI MO KA KHA SOGS SBYONG BA'I
'GO BTZUGS, DGUNG LO DGU PAR ZHVA LU RI PHUG TU BLA MA SMAN
KHANG PA

BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL MDUN NAS LAM RIM GSOL 'DEBS SOGS DGE LDAN
PA'I BLOR 'DZIN SKOR DANG BU STON GYI GSOL 'DEBS

BCAS BLOR 'DZIN MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU PAR RI PHUG GI TSOGS SU
ZHUGS SHING, RIN CHEN LHUN GRUB KYIS BYANG GLING BLA BRANG DU

GDAN DRANGS GSOL JA DRANGS, LO DE'I ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES NYI
SHU GCIG NYIN PAR BYANG GLING BLA BRANG DU MKHAN PO BYAMS PA RIN

CHEN LHUN GRUB KYI SPYAN SNGAR DGE BSNYEN NAS BZUNG TSIGS SNGA
MA DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, DBYAR KHAR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR BYON

NAS PAn CHEN LA CHOS MANG PO GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PA SHING
KHYI LOR MONG GOL BLA MA MKHAN CHEN NO MI HAN RI PHUG TU 'BYOR

NAS BLA MA YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR DANG BYAMS PA RIN CHEN LHUN GRUB
GNYIS LA DBANG CHOS MANG PO ZHU BA DANG MNYAM DU LUNG MANG PO
ZHUS,

DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR SMAN KHANG PA'I PHYAG PHYIR 'BRANGS, SMAN
KHANG PA ZHVA LU RI PHUG TU GRUB MTHA'I ZHEN SOGS KYIS MA 'GRIGS

NAS RTZE THANG PHYOGS SU PHEBS, KHONG YANG BLA MA MNYAM DU RTZE
THANG DU BYON, DE NAS KHONG GI KHYIM NAS GDAN 'DREN PA BYUNG NAS

TSUR RANG YUL DU LOG DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PA NAS GSO RIG SBYONG
'DOD PA'I DGONGS PA 'KHRUNGS, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR SMAN

RAMS PA DKA' CHEN BLO BZANG DON YOD DANG BLA SMAN BLO BZANG TSUL
KHRIMS LA GSO RIG SBYANGS, RGYUD BZHI'I RTZA BA BLOR 'DZIN DANG

BOD 'GREL MANG PO LA GSAN BSAM MDZAD, RTZA BA'I BLA MA SMAN
KHANG PA DANG 'BRAL MED BYAS TE SMAN KHANG PA DANG LHAN CIG RTZE
THANG

DGON PAR GOS SKU CHEN PO GSAR BZHENGS SOGS LA ROGS MDZAD, DGUNG
LO BCU BDUN PA LCAGS 'BRUG LOR ZLA BA BCU PA'I

TSES BCU'I NYIN KHONG GI BLA MA SMAN KHANG PA SKU GSHEGS, GDUNG
LA SVATZTSA 'DEBS PA DANG MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS PA BCAS MDZAD,

BLA MA SKU GSHEGS PAR THUGS SKYO NAS LO GSUM SKU MTSAMS DAM POR
BCAD, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PAn

@280 CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I MDUN DGE SLONG
GI SDOM PA BLANGS, DE NAS SA SKYA DANG NGOR DGON GYI RTEN BRTEN
PA

RNAMS MJAL, SNAR THANG KHRO PHU SOGS KYANG MJAL BAR BYON, BLA MA
DAM PA YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR LA SA NGOR TSAR GSUM GYI CHOS

MANG DU ZHUS, DE NAS BZUNG BU STON GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG DANG
GZHAN YANG DBANG RJES GNANG SOGS BLA MA YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR GYI

THUGS LA ZAB CHOS BZHUGS DGU BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL GYIS ZHUS,
DE NAS MI RING BAR ZHABS PHYI DON GRUB DANG DGE SLONG BKRA

SHIS DPAL 'BYOR GNYIS KYIS KHRES PO KHYER, KHONG GIS CHOS GOS
SNAM SBYAR BSNAMS PHYAG TU SBA 'KHAR 'DZIN ZHING DBUS SU PHEBS,

DBUS KYI SDE DGON GNAS CHEN TSANG MAR PHEBS TE PHYAG MCHOD PHUL,
T'A LA'I BCU PA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO DGUNG LO BCU GCIG TU

PHEBS PA MJAL, DE NAS RIM GYIS ZHVA LU RI PHUG TU TSUR BYON,
DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PA SHING KHYI LOR RTZA BA'I BLA MA YE SHES
DPAL

'BYOR LA ZAB CHOS SHIN TU MANG PO ZHUS, LO DE'I ZLA BA GNYIS
PA'I TSES BCU GNYIS LA BLA MA DE YANG SKU GSHEGS, BLA MA'I GDUNG

ME MCHOD 'BUL BA DANG DGONGS RDZOGS BCAS BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO NYER
GSUM PAR ZHVA LU'I MCHOD RTEN MTHONG GROL CHEN MO'I

GSER ZANGS KYI DBU GDUGS ZHIG GSO DANG BYANG CHUB MCHOD RTEN GYI
GSER ZANGS GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD, DNGUL CHU CHOS BZANG

LA CHOS ZHU SAR PHEBS, SGRA DANG SNYAN NGAG BRDA SPROD RIG PA
BCAS RIG GNAS MANG POR SLOB SBYONG MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PA

NAS BZUNG CHOS 'CHAD DANG SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I MKHAN PO BCAS MDZAD
PA'I DBU BTZUGS, DGONGS SKEG ZLOG CHED SKU MTSAMS

KYANG ZLA SHAS BZHUGS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR RI PHUG GI 'DU
KHANG LHO BYANG GI THUG DANG RGYAL MTSAN TSANG MA GSAR DU
BZHENGS,

BU STON GYI 'DRA SKUR SKU BER DANG DBU ZHVA GSAR PA PHUL, DGUNG
LO NYER BRGYAD PAR SHANGS SU PHEBS NAS SHANGS PA BKA' BRGYUD

KYI CHOS SKOR ZHUS, JO NANG DU'ANG MJAL PAR PHEBS, BAR BAR RNAMS
SU BSNYEN SGRUB CI RIGS MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS

PAR SENG CHEN SPRUL SKU'I BSKUL MA'I 'OG <<ZHVA LU'I SKYES BU
DAM PA RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR LO RGYUS NGO MTSAR DAD PA'I 'JUG
NGOGS>>

BRTZAMS, DE NAS RIM BZHIN ZHVA LUR GSER ZANGS KYI LHA SKU DANG
RGYAL MTSAN SOGS GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD, SA SKYAR THENGS

'GAR CHOS ZHU BAR PHEBS, BKRAS LHUN DGON PAR THENGS MANG BYON TE
BKA' CHOS ZHU BA DANG, PHAR DBANG LUNG GNANG BA

SOGS CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BA MDZAD, SO DGU PAR LO HRIL POR MTSAMS
BZHUGS, DE NAS BKRAS LHUN RGYUD SMAD DGE BSHES NGAG

DBANG DAR RGYAS DANG BRAG DGON SPRUL SKU SOGS LA BKA' CHOS MANG
PO GNANG, DGUNG LO ZHE GNYIS PA SHING MO SBRUL LOR (1845)

TSE SMON GLING DANG BKA' BLON BSHAD SGRA DBANG PHYUG RGYAL POR
GONG MA'I BKA' NYES PHOG LHA SAR SDOD MKHAN GONG MA'I MI SNA CHI
KRONG

THANG NAS TSE SMON GLING GI RGYU NOR GZHUNG BZHES THOG GONG MA'I
BKA' LTAR BOD KYI DGON SDE NYAMS GSO'I THEBS SU GNANG, ZHVA LU

DGON PA LA'ANG RGYA DNGUL SRANG CHIG STONG BDUN BRGYA THOB PA
DES DGON NYAMS GSO RGYA CHEN MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PAR
KHONG

GI BLA MA DNGUL CHU CHOS BZANG GSHEGS, THUGS SKYO BA CHEN PO
MDZAD, 'JAM DBYANGS MKHYEN BRTZE KHAMS LA BYON PA'I LAM ZHOR

KHONG MJAL BAR PHEBS, DBANG LUNG GI CHOS MANG PO BSTZAL ZHING
PHEBS BRDZANG MDZAD, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU PA CHU MO GLANG GI LOR

(1853) PAn CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA SKU GSHEGS, NYE GNAS BKRA SHIS
LHUN POR MNGAGS NAS DNGUL GDUNG BZHENGS PA'I ZHAL

'DEBS SU RGYA DNGUL RTA RMIG MA GCIG DANG BOD DNGUL SRANG LNGA
BCU SOGS PHUL, DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA LNGA PAR ZHVA LU MTHIL GYI
PAR

SHING NYAMS CHAG CHE ZHING 'DZINGS PA RNAMS RI PHUG TU GDAN
DRANGS NAS LEGS SGRIG THOG PAR KHANG LEGS PAR BZHENGS, RJES

NAS BDE MCHOG BSTOD 'GREL MJUG MA TSANG BA RNAMS PHUN GLING DU
PAR GSAR PA BRKOS, NGAM RING NAS KUN DGA' GROL MCHOG

GI GSUNG YONGS RDZOGS DGA' LDAN PHUN TSOGS GLING PAR KHANG DU
GDAN DRANGS, T'A RA N'A THA'I GSUNG 'BUM RNAMS LA DKAR CHAG

CHA TSANG LEGS PAR BSGRIGS, ZHVA LU'I GSER KHANG DU TSE LHA RNAM
GSUM THUB SKU CHE LEGS SOGS GSER ZANGS DANG DNGUL DKAR

LAS BZHENGS PA'I RTEN MANG PO DANG CHAB MDO'I BKA' 'GYUR SOGS
GSUNG RAB MANG PO BLUS NAS GTAN BZHAG MDZAD, MDOR

NA DGUNG LO NGA BDUN YAN BLA MA SUM CU SO BDUN TZAM LA CHOS
'BREL ZHUS, CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DANG DBANG LUNG GI ZAB CHOS MANG PO

STZAL, RTEN GSAR BZHENGS DGON ZHIG GSO BCAS KYI RNAM DKAR DGE
TSOGS KYANG RGYA CHEN PO BSGRUBS, 'ON KYANG KHONG NI DGE

LDAN LA ZHEN CHE BA YIN STABS ZHVA LU'I BLA DPON KHAG DANG MTHUN
PO RANG MA BYUNG BA'I ZOL 'DUG KHONG DGUNG LO NGA BDUN PA

LCAGS SPREL LO'I ZLA BA BDUN PA'I TSES BRGYAD KYI DGONG MOR GRIB
KHA'I SNYUN BZHES NAS GZIM MAL DU NYAL BA MA GTOGS PHYAG LAS

GANG YANG MDZAD MI THUB PAR GYUR, DGE PHRUR RI ZUR NAS DANG DGE
SLONG RIN CHEN SMON LAM GNYIS KYIS GANG THAD NAS ZHABS PHYI

ZHUS, DE 'DRA LO SHAS SONG BA DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG PA SHING
PHO BYI BA'I LOR (1864) RANG RNAM GYI MJUG BSDUS 'DUG PAS

RING MIN SKU GSHEGS PA YIN NAM SNYAM MO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI ZHVA LU'I GDAN RABS DANG RANG RNAM SOGS CHOS
TSAN SUM CU SO BZHI YOD PA'I POD CHEN LDEBS GRANGS CHIG

@281 STONG CHIG BRGYA BCO LNGA YOD PA ZHIG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG
DU BZHUGS YOD, ,

000896 PAR MA, KA

YI GE'I THOB THANG BLO MIG RAB GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
(17) 2

'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG BSTAN PA'I MDZES RGYAN CES
BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (18) 26

000897 PAR MA, KHA

BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED LHA BCU GSUM MA'I DKYIL
'KHOR BSGRUB CING MCHOD PA DANG DBANG BLANG

ZHING BSKUR BA'I RIM PA GSAL BAR BKOD PA DNGOS GRUB RIN CHEN
'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 267

SNGAGS KYI SDOM LDAN GYI BSRUNG BYA'I GTZO BO'I NGOS 'DZIN THO
TZAM DU BKOD PA'I YIG CHUNG BZHUGS SO, , (2) 8

SBYANG CHOG BYA TSUL GZHAN PHAN MYUR LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS

SO, , (3) 26

CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (7) 10

RJE BTZUN SGROL MA 'GRO BA 'GUGS SHING 'PHONGS SEL MA LA MAndAL

TU 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, , (9) 12

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

GZHUNG LAS PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO NI CHEN PO HOR GYI YUL DU BOD
RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I DBU TZAM STE SPYI LO'I DUS RABS

BCU DGU PA'I THOG MA'I DUS SU SOG PO'I RIGS RGYUD CIG TU
'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG NA GZHON DUS NAS SOG PO BLA MA DAM TSIG RDO RJE'I RJES SU
BZUNG STE, BOD SOG GI YI GE SBYOR KLOG NAS SUM RTAGS

DAG YIG SOGS BRDA SPROD RIG PA'I GZHUNG RNAMS KYANG LEGS PAR
SBYANGS, BLA MA DAM TSIG RDO RJE YUN RING BSTEN PA'I DUS TSOD LA

DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG BLA MA'I THUGS LA YOD TSAD BUM PA GANG
BYO'I TSUL GYIS ZHUS PAS MA TSAD DPAL MANG DKON MCHOG RGYAL
MTSAN

@284 DANG, 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, TSE SPEL RDO RJE,
THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BCU PHRAG

ZUNG TZAM BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS MANG POR GSAN
BSAM DANG, BZO DANG GSO BA RTZIS KYI RIG GNAS SOGS

LA'ANG SBYANGS PA RGYA CHER MDZAD, KHYAD PAR RTZA BA'I BLA MA
DAM TSIG RDO RJE'I SPYAN SNGAR DGE BSNYEN NAS RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL
DANG DGE

SLONG GI SDOM PA RNAMS RIM PAR MNOS, BLA MA DAM TSIG RDO RJE
DANG, GZHUNG LAS PA YAR 'PHEL TSANG GIS YUN RING BSLAB STON

MDZAD PA LA BRTEN NAS CHOS DANG 'JIG RTEN GYI BYA BZHAG KUN LA
NANG BYAN CHUD PAR GYUR TE GZHUNG LAS PA'I LAS GNAS 'DZIN,

DE NAS BZUNG MDO DANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG MANG POR RANG STOBS KYIS
DPYAD PA LA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I MKHYEN STOBS RGYAS SHING

GZHUNG 'GREL DANG DGAG LAN GYI GSUNG RAB MANG PO BRTZAMS, LAM
RIM CHE 'BRING CHUNG GSUM DANG SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO SOGS

RJE'I GSUNG THUN MONG MA YIN PA RNAMS DANG, BSTAN 'GYUR KHROD
KYI GZHUNG MANG PO'I BSHAD PA MDZAD CING, ME RGE CHOS RJE TSE

SPEL DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE SOGS SLOB MA MANG PO SPEL,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI RANG GI GSUNG TSE SPEL DBANG PHYUG RDO RJE'I
RNAM THAR DU 'KHOD PAR BLTAS NA, POD KA PA NAS JA PA'I BAR

POD BDUN TZAM KHONG MA 'DAS GONG NAS ME RGE CHOS RJES MTHUN
RKYEN SBYAR NAS PAR DU BSKRUN ZIN 'DUG CING DE MIN GSUNG RTZOM

GZHAN YOD MED MA NGES LA NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU KA POD NAS KHA
POD BAR PO TI GNYIS LAS BZHUGS MED CING POD GNYIS PO SOG

PO'I PAR MA YIN NO, ,

@285 *, ,'OL KHA BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

003919 BRIS MA,

RJE BTZUN BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO'I GSUNG 'BUM DKAR CHAG
BZHUGS SO, , (1) 5

BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO'I RNAM THAR MTHONG BA DON LDAN BZHUGS
SO, , (2) 29

BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS, RGYA NAG LHA BZOS BSGRUB PA'I
ZHAL THANG GI YI GE BKOD PA, , (3) 14

BDE MCHOG DRIL BU LHA LNGA'I LAG MCHOD MDUN BSKYED MCHOD PHRENG
SMON LAM SHIS BRJOD BCAS BZHUGS SO, , (4) 9

BDE MCHOG DRIL BU'I LHA LNGA'I DKYIL 'KHOR DU 'JUG PA'I CHO GA
BZHUGS SO, , (5) 16

BSTAN PA SPYI DGOS LA DAG SNANG DANG YID CHES KYI DAD PA BSKYED
TSUL MDOR BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, , (6) 21

LAM YIG YID BZHIN NOR BU'I PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
(7) 16

LI THANG DU THUB BSTAN BYAMS CHEN CHOS 'KHOR PHYOGS THAMS CAD
LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA BTAB STE THUB CHEN KHAMS GSUM

ZIL GNON BZHENGS BA'I NANG BZHUGS PHUL BA'I DKAR CHAGS SU BKOD
KHRA BZHUGS SO, , (8) 29

MYUR MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I BSNYEN BSGRUB LAS
GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG DNGOS GRUB 'BYUNG GNAS BZHUGS

SO, , (9) 16

MDO SNGAGS KYI LAM GYI SGO 'BYED LTA BA'I SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (10) 62

KHA 'BAR MA'I GTOR CHOG GZHAN PHAN BDUD SDE 'JOMS PA BZHUGS SO,
, (11) 28

GCOD KYI DMIGS RIM MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, , (12) 24

DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO'I SGRUB THABS BZHUGS SO, , (20) 18

@286 RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'OL KHA BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG PO NI BOD DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM
LAS DBUS KYI YUL GRU'I BYE BRAG STOD LUNG GI SA CHAR

RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME PHO 'BRUG GI LO (1556) LA SKU BLTAMS,
KHONG GI YUM NI CHOS LA DAD PA CHE ZHING RGYUN DU YIG DRUG GI
ZHAL

'DON MDZAD MKHAN DANG, CHOS SRUNG DPAL LDAN LHA MO'I THUGS KYI
SPRUL PA LAS MKHAN 'BUM ME ZHES PA SNYING DU BRLABS NAS LUNG

BSTAN SNA TSOGS GSUNG MKHAN ZHIG KYANG YIN, KHONG DGUNG NA BZHI
PA'I BAR MA DE'I RTZAR SKYE BSRINGS BYAS, BAR DER YUM DANG

BYIS PA'I SKAD CHA 'GA' LA BRTEN MI RNAMS KYIS BYIS PA DE SPRUL
SKU ZHIG YIN PA'I GTAM KUN TU BRJOD, GTAM DE 'BRAS SPUNGS

SU TSOR BAS, BLA MA GONG MA BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA'I GSOL DPON CHOS
GRAGS DER BYIS PA DE SPRUL SKU YIN MIN BRTAG PAR YONG,

SPRUL SKU YIN PAR YID CHES NAS T'A LA'I SPRUL SKU BSOD NAMS RGYA
MTSOR SNYAN SENG PHUL, T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS SLOB DPON

LHA BTZUN PA MNGAGS NAS BRTAG BCUG RJES, PAn CHEN BSOD NAMS
GRAGS PA'I YANG SRID YIN PAR THAG BCAD, DGUNG LO

BZHI PA'I DUS SU LHA BTZUN PA GTZOS BSU MI RTA PA SUM CU TZAM
STOD LUNG DU YONG NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS DGON DU GDAN DRANGS, CHOS

GRVA CHEN PO SKYOR MO LUNG DU ZHAG MAL MDZAD, DER DGE 'DUN PA
RNAMS KYIS SER SBRENG ZAB RGYAS KYIS BSUS SHING BSNYEN BSKUR

LEGS PAR BYAS, DE NAS KHRI ZAM KHAR PHEBS 'BYOR SKABS SU 'BRAS
SPUNGS KYI DPON SLOB DGE 'DUN MANG POS BSU BAR 'BYOR,

DGON PAR 'BYOR LA NYE BA NA GDUGS RGYAL MTSAN DANG ROL CHA SNA
TSOGS THOGS PA'I SER SBRENG GIS BSDUS, DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU

PHEBS SKABS T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS GDAN LAS BZHENGS TE
GUS PA'I TSUL GYIS BSU BAR MDZAD, DE'I RGYU MTSAN NI PAn

CHEN BSOD GRAGS T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I BLA MA YIN LA
BYIS PA 'DI BLA MA'I SPRUL SKU YIN STABS DE BZHIN MDZAD PA RED,

DE NAS MI RING BAR T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I SPYAN SNGAR
SKRA PHUD PHUL TE RAB TU BYUNG, MTSAN BSOD NAMS YE SHES DBANG

POR BTAGS, DE NAS BZUNG KA KHA SOGS SBYOR SDEB LEGS PAR SBYANGS
RJES KLOG GI THOG MA MDO SDE GSER 'OD DAM PA NAS DBU

BTZUGS, SNGAGS KYI KLOG THABS SOGS GSAN CING YUN MI RING BAR
KLOG THOGS MED DU MKHYEN, RTZA BA'I YONGS 'DZIN BSOD

NAMS RGYA MTSO LA TSE DPAG MED GRUB RGYAL MA DANG MGON PO PHYAG
DRUG PA'I RJES GNANG SOGS ZHUS, 'JIGS BYED DANG PHYAG DRUG

PA'I MNGON RTOGS SOGS BLOR 'DZIN DGOS PA'I RIGS RNAMS SBYANGS,
MNGON RTOGS RGYAN DANG RTZA BA SHES RAB TSAD MA RNAM

'GREL SOGS BLOR CHUD, DGUNG LO DGU PAR DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG DU
DGE LEGS DPAL BZANG GIS MKHAN PO DANG DGE 'DUN

BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS KYIS SLOB DPON LHA BTZUN PAS DUS BGO BA MDZAD
DE DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, DE DANG DUS MTSUNGS SU T'A

LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG
LO BCU PAR SKYOR MO LUNG GI DGON PAR SKYA SER MANG PO LA

BSNGO BA'I YON BSHAD DANG SMON LAM SOGS BGYIS SHING DGUNG NA
CHUNG YANG 'JIGS ZHUM MED PAR SPOBS PA CHEN POS CHAD LHAG DANG

TSIG LDAB SKYON SOGS GTAN NAS MED, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR BYANG
RVA SGRENG DU CHA DKAR GRVA TSANG DU THOS BSAM LA PHEBS, BLA

MA DAM CHOS DPAL 'BAR YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS BKA' GDAMS PHA
CHOS BU CHOS SOGS GSAN, GZHAN YANG LO RGYUS SOGS

MANG PO SBYANGS, LO DE'I STON KHAR 'BRAS SPUNGS SU TSUR PHEBS
NAS RJE NA RO PA DANG MAR PA MI LA SOGS KYI RNAM THAR LA GZIGS

PAS, CHOS PHYIR DKA' BA SPYAD PA RNAMS MTHONG BA DES THUGS 'GYUR
BA CHEN PO BYUNG STE NGA RGYAL DANG CHER RLOM SOGS CHOS DANG

RGYAB 'GAL YIN PAS SPONG DGOS 'DUG SNYAM PA DANG RANG GI BLA MA
LA MOS GUS RTZE GCIG BYED RGYU NI DAM CHOS KYI RTZA BA RED SNYAM
NAS

RANG GI YONGS 'DZIN RNAMS LA DAD PA LHAG PAR 'PHEL, RVA SGRENG
GI CHOS GRVA DER DMANGS DKYUS MA'I KHYUR ZHUGS TE SLOB GNYER

BYAS, BSDUS GRVA LEGS PAR MKHYEN PAS SKYOR DPON MDZAD, DE'I
DBYAR KHA NAS PHAR PHYIN SBYONG BA'I 'GO TSUGS, DE NAS

'JAM DBYANGS 'BYUNG GNAS RGYUN GYI YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS TSAD
MA'I GZHUNG CHEN RNAMS SBYANGS, DE NAS MI RING BAR RGYU

RKYEN 'GA'I DBANG GIS YONGS 'DZIN 'JAM DBYANGS 'BYUNG GNAS PA
CHOS 'CHAD 'JOG DGOS BYUNG BAR BRTEN YONGS 'DZIN DAM

CHOS DPAL 'BAR MDUN LA MU MTHUD NAS SLOB GNYER MDZAD, PHYIS SU
YONGS 'DZIN DAM CHOS DPAL 'BAR RVA SGRENG GI GDAN

SAR PHEBS PA'I PHYAG PHYIR 'BRANGS, DE NAS YONGS 'DZIN DAM CHOS
DPAL 'BAR GYI BKA' LTAR RVA SGRENG DU CHA DKAR GRVA TSANG GI

'GAN KHUR PA BSKOS, T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS MKHAN SLOB
SBRAG MA DANG LHA BTZUN PAS GSANG STON, DGE 'DUN GRANGS

TSANG DBUS SU SER THEG CHEN GLING GI GZIM CHUNG DU BSNYEN RDZOGS
KYI SDOM PA MNOS, GRVA TSANG GI GDAN SA MDZAD RING RNAM SRAS KYI

THANG SKU CHE LEGS SOGS RTEN BZHENGS DANG DGE 'DUN PA'I PHOGS
DANG MANG JA BCAS KYANG 'BAD MED LHUN GRUB TU BYUNG DBU PHAR

@287 'DUL MDZOD SOGS 'CHAD NYAN LEGS PAR MDZAD, CHOS MTSAMS
RNAMS SU BKA' GDAMS GLEGS BAM PHA CHOS BU CHOS CHA LAG

BCAS PA DANG, DPE CHOS RIN CHEN SPUNGS PA BCAS BSHAD CING GRVA
TSANG NYE SKOR SHING GI RA BSKOR BTZUGS PA, RTEN GSUM

GSAR BZHENGS RNYING PA ZHIG GSO SOGS BYAS TE GRVA TSANG DE NYID
'PHEL RGYAS SU BTANG, KHONG DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS SU PHEBS PA ME

GLANG LOR T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO SOG AALTHAN RGYAL POS
BYANG PHYOGS SU GDAN DRANGS, KHONG YANG T'A LA'I YI PHYAG PHYIR
BYANG

PHYOGS SU PHEBS RGYUR THAG BCAD, GRVA TSANG GI 'DUN TSOGS LA
RJES GNANG GI RIM PA 'GA' GNANG ZHOR MYUR DU TSUR SLEBS YONG

BA'I SMON LAM SOGS KUN GYI BLO KHA RDZOGS PAR MDZAD, TSOGS PAS
KYANG 'PHEN YUL SRAS KHANG BAR DU SKYEL MA MDZAD, SA STAG

LO'I LO 'GOR MDO SMAD BYANG PHYOGS SU BTEGS SO, 'BRI CHU BRGAL
TE MDO SMAD CHAB CHA LHA KHANG DU AALTHAN RGYAL PO DANG MCHOD
YON

ZHAL 'DZOM BYUNG BA DANG T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSOS NGO SBYOR
GNANG BAR BRTEN RGYAL PO NAS KHONG LA'ANG GO MING DANG THAM GA

DNGOS 'BUL SOGS LEGS PAR GNANG, LO DE'I STON KHAR T'A LA'I BYANG
GAM CHU'I PHO BRANG DU HU DU HU ZHES PAS GDAN DRANGS,

KHONG GIS GRVA TSANG GSUM DANG SKU RIM PA BCAS PA'I SGAR GYI MGO
'DREN PA BYAS TE MTSO SNGON SKU 'BUM DGON DU PHEBS, LO DE'I LO

GSAR SKABS CHAB CHA LHA KHANG DU MCHOD YON LHAN RGYAS PA'I DRUNG
DU 'BYOR, T'A LA'I DGUNG LO SO BDUN LA PHEBS PA SA MO YOS KHONG

DGUNG GRANGS NYER BZHI PAR MDO SMAD NAS KHAMS LI THANG PHYOGS LA
BTEG 'DAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING SOGS BRGYUD LI THANG LA

'BYOR, DER YUN RING TZAM BZHUGS TE LI THANG DGON CHEN THUB BSTAN
BYAMS CHEN PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I SDE

BTAB, DGON PA'I THIG 'DEBS DANG RMANG 'DING GI ZHABS BKOD SOGS
PHAL CHE BA KHONG GIS MDZAD, ZLA BA GSUM TZAM T'A

LA'I SKU MTSAMS BZHUGS, SKABS DE DAG TU BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO LA
DBANG LUNG SOGS SHIN TU MANG PO ZHUS, MI RING BAR GO BO

DBON PO SGAR KHAG GSUM GYIS GDAN 'DREN TSA NAN ZHUS PAR BRTEN
RIM PAR 'BRI CHU BRGAL TE SMAR KHAMS SGANG PHYOGS SU PHEBS,

TZONG KHA PA'I DNGOS SLOB BA SO CHOS RJE'I SPRUL SKU RU GRAGS
PA'I LHA DBANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN DPON SLOB KYIS NAN CHEN GSOL
BA

BTAB PAR BRTEN CHAB MDO BYAMS PA GLING DU PHEBS, GOS SKU CHEN MO
BZHENGS PA'I BKOD PA GNANG, DGE 'DUN BSTAN PA RGYA

MTSOS T'A LA'I MDUN BSNYEN RDZOGS ZHU BAR KHONG GIS GSANG STON
MDZAD, DE NAS T'A LA'I NAS LI THANG GI LHA CHEN BZHENGS PA DANG

GRVA KHANG RNAMS 'DEBS PA'I DON LA 'GRO DGOS PA'I BKA' PHEBS PA
DANG DU BLANGS TE SLAR LI THANG LA LOG NAS 'BAD PA CHEN POS

RTEN BZHENGS DANG DGON PA'I LHA KHANG PHYI NANG GI LAS KA TSANG
MAR BKOD PA MDZAD, LO GSUM GYI BAR DU LI THANG DU BZHUGS TE

DGON PA'I 'GAN KHUR MDZAD CING BAR LAM 'DAB SOGS SU PHEBS NAS
ZAB CHOS SPEL, LAM BAR 'BUL NOR BYUNG BA RNAMS DE

GA'I DGON PA'I PHYOGS SU BTANG, DE NAS 'DAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING
SOGS BRGYUD SLAR RTZA BA'I BLA MA YAB SRAS MJAL BAR BYANG

PHYOGS MDO SMAD DU PHEBS, SKABS DER BLA MA MJAL ZHING LI THANG
DGON PA'I GNAS TSUL ZHUS PAS SHIN TU THUGS DGYES, MDZO

MO MKHAR DER LHA KHANG GSAR BZHENGS LA MING BDE CHEN YE SHES PHO
BRANG ZHES BTAGS, T'A LA'I SKU BSTOD SNYAN NGAG GI LAM NAS

DRANGS PA DANG BYAMS CHEN SKU BSTOD RANG GI RNAM THAR MDOR BSDUS
BCAS BRTZAMS, CO NE PHYOGS NAS GDAN ZHU'I YI GE DANG MI SNA

RIM PAR BYUNG BAS RIM GYIS CO NE PHYOGS SU PHEBS NAS DBANG LUNG
RJES GNANG DANG RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS SGRUB PA SOGS RNAM

DKAR GYI BYA BAR 'GRUS PAR MDZAD DE YUN RING TZAM BZHUGS, MDOR
NA KHONG MDO KHAMS STOD SMAD KUN TU T'A LA'I BSOD NAMS

RGYA MTSO'I PHYAG PHYIR PHEBS TE SOG YUL DU T'A LA'I NAS THEG
CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DGON PA GSAR BZHENGS DANG MDO SMAD SKU
'BUM

DGON GSAR BZHENGS KHYAD PAR LI THANG DGON GSAR BZHENGS LA KHONG
GIS GTZO 'GAN BZHES TE RTEN BRTEN PA TSANG MA LEGS PAR

BZHENGS SHING LI THANG DGON PA'I GDAN SA PA THOG MA'ANG KHONG
YIN LA DGE LDAN PA'I BSTAN PA SOG PO DANG MDO STOD SMAD DU GONG

NAS GONG DU SPEL BA LA MDZAD RJES CHEN PO BZHAG PA YIN NO,
,MTHAR DBUS SU LOG NAS 'OL DGA' STAG RTZE'I GZIM CHUNG DU 'CHAD

RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI BYA BA KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, BOD RAB
BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU 'BRUG LO (1592) LA SKU GSHEGS SO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG RAB NI, KHONG SKU GSHEGS MA THAG TU PHYAG MDZOD
BSOD NAMS DON GRUB KYIS PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS TE BRIS

SHING DKAR CHAG LEGS PA ZHIG KYANG BRTZAMS 'DUG DKAR CHAG DER
GZHIR BZUNG NA KA KHA SUM CU'I STENG KYI NAS AI'I BAR AI

LDAN SUM CU STE BSDOMS PAS DRUG CU, DE'I THOG KU NAS JU'I BAR AU
LDAN BDUN BCAS KHYON BSDOMS PA'I CHOS TSAN DRUG CU RE

BDUN DKAR CHAG DANG BCAS PA DRUG CU RE BRGYAD YOD PA'I POD GCIG
YOD 'DUG CING NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU SGRUB THABS KYI CHOS

TSAN 'GA' CHAD PA'I PO TI BRIS MA LEGS PA GCIG BZHUGS YOD,

@288 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

BDAG NYID CHEN PO SLOB DPON SENG GE BZANG PO LA BSNGAGS PA'I RAB

@291 BZHUGS SO, , (4) 35

SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS MNGON
PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON ZHIB TU BKOD PA

SHER PHYIN MDZOD BRGYA 'BYED PA'I LDE MIG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,
, (5) 47

DKAR CHAG BZHUGS SO, , (1) 1

BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA'I SNYING PO BZHUGS SO, , (2) 4

THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG GI KHRID YIG BLO BZANG DGONGS
RGYAN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (3) 408

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RJE 'DI'I YAB NI BOD KYI CHOS RGYAL RNAMS MNGA' RIS STOD DU
CHAGS NAS, RGYAL RABS 'GA' ZHIG 'DAS PA NA KHRI KUN

BZANG NYI ZLA ZHES PA BYUNG ZHING, DER SRAS GNYIS YOD PA'I
NANG GCIG RTA NAG PHUD DU BZHUGS, PHYIS SU KHYIM TSANG DER SA
PHUD

NANG PA ZHES PA'I MING THOB, DE RJES GZHUNG SA'I SKU DRAG TU
GYUR TE RGYAL PO LHA BZANG ZHABS SDOD PA DBANG DRAG BYA BA
LUNG KUN LA BLO

GROS RGYAS SHING, DRAG PO'I LAS LA DPA' BA ZHIG YOD, DE LA
SRAS GNYIS YOD PA LAS TSANGS PA DKAR PO BYA BA DE RJE 'DI'I
YAB

RJE DAM PA'O, ,'JIG RTEN GYI CHEN PO TSANGS PA LTA BU YOD PAS
NA DE LTAR GRAGS, DES NA RUS NI CHOS RGYAL GYI GDUNG RGYUD DRI
MA

MED PA'O, ,YUM NI NGO TSA KHREL YOD KYI GOS KYIS KLUBS SHING,
DAD PA DANG GTONG BA'I MTHU PHUL DU PHYIN PA TSE RING DPAL
'DZOMS

ZHES BYA BA NYID DO, ,YAB YUM DE GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG
BCU GNYIS PA'I CHU SBRUL LOR (1713) SKU BLTAMS, TING NGE 'DZIN

LA MNGA' BRNYES PA'I RNAL 'BYOR PA BZANG PO ZHIG LA PHAS MING
ZHUS PAS, AO RGYAN TSE 'PHEL ZHES GSOL, RJES SU THOS BSAM

GLING CHOS RJE TSE BRTAN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS AO RGYAN CHOS 'PHEL
GSOL BA DANG CHABS GCIG SKRA PHUD BZHES, BKA' DRIN CAN AA nI
TSE

DBANG ZHES PA DES BU CHOS BYED NA KA KHA KLOG DGOS ZER NAS
KLOG RNAMS AA nIS BSLABS NAS, RING POR MA LON PAR KLOG RAB

TU PHYIN PA SHES, DE NAS PHAS KHRID NAS BKRAS LHUN DRUNG RAMS
PA KUN DGA' ZER BAR DGE RGAN BSTEN, KHONG GIS CHOS SPYOD

@302 'DZIN SKYOR GYI SKUL MA MDZAD PAS, CHOS SPYOD BLO 'DZIN
GYIS RANG LO BCU PA CHU PHO STAG (1722) LOR RGYUGS PHUL, LO
DER PAn

CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES DRUNG RAB TU BYUNG NAS DGE TSUL GYI
SDOM PA BZHES, MTSAN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN GSOL, DANG PO GSUNG
RAB

KYI DON LA THOS PA MANG DU BTZAL, DE NAS THOS PA'I DON LA NGES
SHES BSKYED CING, JI LTAR NGES PA'I DON RNAMS RGYUD LA SBYAR
TE

BSGOMS PA LAS YANG DAG PA'I DON JI BZHIN NGES PA'I RTOG PA
KHYAD PAR CAN RGYUD LA SKYE ZHES GSUNGS PA LA NGES SHES
'KHRUNGS TE,

DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN TSE BRTAN RGYAL MTSAN BSTEN NAS BSDUS
GRVA NAS RNAM 'GREL GYI GZHUNG BCAS LA BRTZON PAR MDZAD, SKYID

GRONG GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL GYIS RNAM
'GREL RTZA BA DANG, DBU MA 'JUG PA GNYIS KYI LUNG DANG BKA'
KHRID

GNANG BA RNAMS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU DGU SKABS PHUR LCOG NGAG
DBANG BYAMS PA RIN PO CHES GSUNG CHOS GNANG BA RNAMS

GSAN THOG DBU MA PHAR PHYIN MDZOD 'DUL BA RNAM 'GREL BCAS POD
LNGA'I RTZA BA RNAMS BLO 'DZIN GNANG, DE DAG GI RTZA 'GREL

RNAMS DKA' CHEN YE SHES THOGS MED DANG TSE BRTAN RGYAL MTSAN
GRUB DBANG BLO BZANG RNAM RGYAL RNAMS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DU

BSTEN NAS GSAN SBYONG MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU RTZA GSUM SHING
YOS (1735) LOR DBEN PA'I RI KHROD DU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN

MDZAD RGYUR THUGS THAG BCAD DE BOD ZLA 8 TSES 25 GRUB DBANG
RIN PO CHE'I RI KHROD DU PHEBS, ZLA DE'I TSES NYER BDUN NYIN
GRUB

DBANG RIN PO CHES MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA DANG RDZONG DKAR 'PHEL
RGYAS GLING GI DBU MDZAD 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA CHEN PO BLO BZANG
BSOD

NAMS KYIS GSANG STON PA, MANG THOS 'DUL 'DZIN PA DGE 'DUN
RGYAL MTSAN GYIS DUS GO BA, KHA SKONG GI DGE 'DUN BCU

TSOGS KYI DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS TE, DGE SLONG GI BSLAB
SDOM BZHES, DGUNG LO NYER GSUM NAS BZHI BCU ZHE GCIG PAR

DBEN PA'I RI KHROD DU BZHUGS NAS SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN GTZO BOR
MDZAD, BAR SKABS SHIG NAS PHUR LCOG RIN PO CHER GSUNG CHOS

ZHU SAR PHEBS NAS JO BOR 'BYOR SKABS JO BO'I MDUN GTZANG DGE
BSHES YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR DANG, BKRAS LHUN DKA' TSES

BZANG PO BCAS NAS DUNG DKAR PO DRI MA MED PA ZHIG PHUL TE, LAM
RIM BDE LAM GYI KHRID CIG DGOS TSUL NAN CHER GSOL BAS

BYAMS MGON RIN PO CHE'I BKA' BCAS LA BRTEN 'BRAS SPUS GTZANG
BA'I SPYI KHANG DU DGE BSHES SUM CU SKOR LA BDE LAM GYI BKA'

'KHRID ZHAG NYI SHU SKOR GNANG BA'I MJUG TU SEMS BSKYED MCHOD
PA RGYAS PA ZHIG BYAS, DE NI LAM RIM GYI 'KHRID GNANG BA'I
THOG

MA RED 'DUG DGA' BZHI GUNG PAndI TA'I THUGS BZHED LTAR KHONG
DANG LCANG BDE LDAN SGRON MA SKU ZHANG SKYES NYUG CHOS MDZAD
'BRAS

GTZANG DGE BSHES DPAL 'BYOR GYIS DGE BSHES BRGYA TZAM LA BLA
MCHOD KYI 'KHRID CIG KYANG GNANG, DE NAS DKAR GYI MKHA'

'GRO'I GSANG PHUG TU PHEBS NAS SGRUB PA SNGAR BZHIN MDZAD, DE
NAS GANGS KHUR MO'I MGUL DANG MKHA' 'GRO MA BYE BA 'BUM SDE'I

TSOGS KHANG, RDO AA RU RA'I PHUG SOGS SU GSANG STABS KYIS
PHEBS NAS GNAS DER TING NGE 'DZIN SHIN TU 'PHEL BAR GYUR,

PHYIS GNAS DER SEMS BSKYED SGANG DU GRAGS, DE RJES BAL YUL DU
PHEBS NAS ZLA BA BDUN BZHUGS TE, SNGAR GYI BZHUGS

GNAS DKAR MKHA' 'GRO'I GSANG PHUG TU TSUR BYON, DE NAS DUS RE
ZHIG NA SNGAGS RAMS PA YE SHES SKAL LDAN SNYUN GYIS ZIN,

KHONG NI BLA MA GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG GI SRAS KYI THU BO DANG
RJE RANG NYID NAS KYANG CHOS GSAN PA'I BLA MA SONG GSHIS CHU
SPREL ZLA BCU

GNYIS PA'I NANG MA nI LA KHAR PHEBS, SNGAGS RAMS PA YE SHES
SKAL LDAN GYIS RTEN 'BREL KYANG BSGRIGS, DE NAS RJE RANG NYID
SA

PAn LA 'JAM DBYANGS ZHAL GZIGS PA'I GNAS SPANG SHING GI LHA
LNGA PHUG DANG, RJE RED 'DA' BA'I SGRUB GNAS ME TOG MDANGS

CHEN RJE MI LA'I SGRUB GNAS RA MA BYANG CHUB RDZONG, BRAG DKAR
RTA SO DBU MA RDZONG SOGS SU PHEBS SGRUB PA LA RTZE GCIG TU
GZHOL BAR

MDZAD, DE NAS CHU BYA (1753) LOR MA nI LA KHAR PHEBS, SNGON
'BUL BA RNAMS MI BZHES KYANG, 'DI NAS BZUNG 'BUL

SBYOR BYUNG BA TSANG MA BZHES NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I DON DU SBYOR
BAR MDZAD, 'DI NAS PHUR LCOG RIN PO CHE SOGS KYI BKA' BZHIN

GZHAN LA GSUNG CHOS GNANG BA GTZO BOR MDZAD DE, GZHAN LA DGE
BA'I BAG CHAGS CI THEBS MDZAD, SLOB MA YANG GSUNG CHOS

GNANG THENGS RER STONG LHAG TZAM RE 'DUS PAS SKU TSE 'DI LA
SLOB MA CHIG 'BUM LHAG TZAM BYUNG YOD,

CHU STAG (1782) LOR T'A LA'I BLA MA SKU PHRENG BRGYAD PA'I
YONGS 'DZIN GNANG DGOS PHEBS KYANG RJE 'DI NI CHEN PO'I GO SA
LA

GTAN NAS MI DGYES PAS DGONGS PA ZHUS KYANG DGONGS PA MA 'KHROL
BAS LO BCU GNYIS BAR T'A LA'I BRGYAD PA'I YONGS 'DZIN

GNANG DGOS BYUNG, T'A LA'I YONGS 'DZIN GNANG BAR GONG MA CHAN
LUNG SHIN TU DGYES TE, LEGS SO'I RTEN DANG BCAS GSER

GYI BKA' LUNG PHEBS PA NI 'DI LTAR, TSE RING GNAM GYI SHE MONG
BTZAN POS 'DZAM GLING YANGS PA'I SA CHEN POR STOBS KYI 'KHOR

LOS BSGYUR BA HVANG DI'I BKA', DKA' CHEN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN
LA PHAB PA, DA CHA T'A LA'I BLA MA'I MDUN DU CHOS STON PA'I
BLA MA

'OS PA'I RGYU MTSAN BOD NA YOD PA'I AAM BAN NAS ZHUS BYUNG BA
NGED KYANG THOS MA THAG SPRO BA RGYA CHER 'PHEL, KHYED NI CHOS
LA GZHOL

BA'I RTOGS LDAN GYI BLA MA CHEN PO SLOB GNYER LA HUR THAG
BSKYED PA'I GRAGS PA SNGAR MOR LCANG SKYA HO THOG THU'U NAS
ZHUS BYUNG BA NGED KYI 

@303 BLO LA YOD, DA LAM BDAG RKYEN BSTZAL NAS T'A LA'I BLA MA'I
DGE RGAN DU BSKOS TE PAndI TA'I CHO LO GNANG BA YIN, CHO LO
GNANG

BA'I RTEN 'BREL GYI BKA'I GSER YIG PA DANG GSOL RAS SU RIN PO
CHE'I PHRENG BA GCIG GOS CHEN YUG BCO LNGA KHA BTAGS CHE BA

SUM CU BCAS GNANG YOD, DKA' CHEN YE SHES RGYAL MTSAN KHYED NAS
BDAG RKYEN BYED PA DANG DU BLANGS NAS, NGED KYI DGONGS

PA MTHAR THUG DANG MTHUN PAR T'A LA'I BLA MA LA CHOS STON PA'I
DGE RGAN YAG PO GYIS 'BAD BRTZON MA LHOD PAR GYIS ZHES CHED DU

BKA' PHAB PA YIN, ZHES PA'I TSIG GIS NGES PA DON GYI PAndI TA
CHEN POR DBANG BSKUR BAR GYUR TO, ,RJE 'DIS BKA' GDAMS

GONG MA RNAMS KYI RNAM THAR BDAG GIR BZHES TE SANGS RGYAS BSTAN
PA SPEL BA'I 'PHRIN LAS RGYA CHER MDZAD PA RNAMS YIG TSOGS MANG

BAS 'JIGS NAS ZHIB PHRAR MA BKOD, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU
GLANG LOR (1793) DGUNG GRANGS BRGYAD CUR PHEBS PA NA

DGONGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

G-YAG SDE PAn CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS DAR RGYAS NI GTZANG G-YAG SDE
BYE MA LUNG GI YUL DU, YAB DKON MCHOG DPAL DANG,

YUM CHOS SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU, BOD RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I SA MO
PHAG GI LO (1299) LA SKU BLTAMS, YUM GYIS GCES PAR

BSKYANGS NAS DGUNG LO LNGA PAR PHEBS PA NA CHOS KHRI SGANG DU
'BAN PO CHOS DBANG PA'I SPYAN SNGAR NGAN SONG SBYONG BA'I RGYUD
KYI CHOS THUN

GCIG ZHUS PA DE NI, CHOS THOS PA'I THOG MA YIN, DE NAS RIM BZHIN
RTOGS LDAN RIN SMON PA'I MDUN NAS BOD YIG MA PHYI KA

KHA SOGS SBYONG BA'I 'GO TSUGS, JO GDAN PA DAR BRTZON GYI MDUN
DU BOD YIG SBYOR SDEB DANG, 'JAM DPAL MTSAN BRJOD,

'JAM DBYANGS BSTOD PA, GTOR MA BRGYA RTZA SOGS SBYANGS PAR MA
ZAD, 'DUL MDZOD KYI GZHUNG RNAMS KYANG CI RIGS SHIG

THOS, MKHAN CHEN 'OD 'BYUNG GI SPYAN SNGAR KHRI CHEN RIN 'BYUNG
GIS LAS SLOB DANG, LUNG KRIG PAS GSANG STON, DE MIN DGE

'DUN GRANGS TSANG DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PA DGE SLONG GI SDOM
PA LEGS PAR MNOS TE, BSRUNG BYA MTHA' DAG MIG 'BRAS

LTAR BSRUNGS, MKHAN CHEN DE NYID KYI MDUN MI G-YO BA DKAR PO'I
SGRUB THABS DANG, 'DUL BA'I SKOR BCAS ZAB CHOS MANG PO

ZHUS, GZHAN YANG BRAG RTZA TSUL RIN DANG, GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN,
JO GDAN GZHON TSUL SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BCU

PHRAG 'GAR BRTEN NAS MNGON PA GONG 'OG BYANG CHUB SEMS PA'I
SPYOD 'JUG PHAR PHYIN, DBU MA'I BSTAN BCOS SOGS

MDO'I SKOR MANG PO GSAN CING, GSANG SNGAGS SKOR YANG, BYIN RLABS
'PHO BA, MKHA' 'GRO RTO'I BCUD LEN, GU RU RTA

MGRIN DBANG BSKUR SOGS DBANG LUNG KHRID MTHA' YAS PA ZHUS, KHYAD
PAR DU KARMA PA GSUM PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE NI KHONG GI BLA MA

GTZO BO YIN ZHING, RJE RANG BYUNG RDO RJE'I BSTOD PA SNYAN NGAG
GIS BRGYAN PA TSIGS BCAD SHIN TU SNYAN PA DANG, RANG BYUNG RDO
RJE'I

SGRUB THABS DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO ZHES PA BRTZAMS, KHONG GI SPYAN
SNGAR BKA' BRGYUD PA'I ZAB CHOS, RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO, PHAG MO

BDE MCHOG DANG RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED, N'A RO CHOS DRUG DANG, PHYAG
CHEN LHAN CIG SKYES SBYOR SOGS KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID CHA TSANG

ZHUS SHING, BLA MA'I THUGS KYI YON TAN BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL
GYIS MNOS, DA RUNG BRDA DON RAD NA LA RNYING MA'I CHOS SKOR
DANG,

RAD NA SING HA'I MDUN SA SKYA BA'I CHOS SKOR, RGYA SGOM RI PA'I
MDUN GCOD KYI SKOR BCAS ZHUS PAR MA TSAD, KHONG DGUNG NA

@307 MTHON POR PHEBS YOD KYANG GRUB MTHA' RIS MED KYI CHOS GSAN
PA'I CHED DU BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DANG, RJE BLO BZANG

GRAGS PA BCAS LA'ANG, CHOS 'BREL 'GA' GSAN, MDOR NA DE DUS KYI
BOD NA MKHAS DBANG MCHIS DGU'I ZHABS PAD

BRTEN TE, SNYAN NGAG GSO RIG TSAD MA, RTZIS DANG SGRA BCAS RIG
GNAS KUN LA SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN TE MKHAS PA'I YANG

RTZER SON, DBUS GTZANG KHAMS KUN TU MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PAS KHYAB,
SPYIR KHONG DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I RING LUGS 'DZIN PA ZHIG

YIN YANG NYAMS LEN NI GTZO BOR BKA' BRGYUD DANG RNYING MA SHUGS
CHER MDZAD DO, ,KHONG NI DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU THAM PA BZHUGS

YOD KYANG, GTZO BOR 'CHAD NYAN NYAMS LEN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR
MDZAD DE, DBUS GTZANG GI GNAS CHEN DPAL BSAM

YAS DANG, GSANG PHU SOGS SU BYON MYONG BA MA GTOGS DE MIN THAG
RING LA MA PHEBS PAR MNGON, SKABS DER RDZOGS CHEN PA

KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS, JO NANG PA DOL PO SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN,
KHRO PHU BA BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB, DGE LDAN PA'I SROL GTOD

PA PO TZONG KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA, BO DONG PA PHYOGS LAS
RNAM RGYAL SOGS GRUB MTHA' SO SO'I MKHAS DBANG SNYAN GRAGS CAN

SHIN TU MANG ZHING, KHONG NI DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA ZHIG YIN YANG,
KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM DU GRUB MTHA'I RTZOD PA SOGS KYI GNAS

TSUL GTAN NAS 'KHOD MED CING, GONG GSAL MKHAS DBANG PHAL CHE
BA'I MDUN NAS CHOS 'BREL ZHUS YOD PA SOGS LA BLTAS NA

GRUB MTHA' RIS MED LA DAG SNANG MDZAD MKHAN ZHIG LAS PHYOGS RIS
CAN RTZOD NYOG SHA STAG GIS NYI MA 'KHYOL THABS MDZAD MKHAN

ZHIG GTAN NAS MIN PAR GSAL LO, ,DGUNG LO BRGYAD CUR SON PA RAB
BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA RTA LO (1378) LA THUGS KYI DGONGS PA

CHOS KYI DBYINGS SU BSDUS SO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI RNAM THAR DANG, ZHAL GDAMS, SNYAN NGAG GI LAM
NAS DRANGS PA'I BSTOD PA SNA TSOGS, MGUR, DRI

BA DANG DRIS LAN SNA TSOGS, CHAB SHOG SGRUB THABS, BSNGO SMON
SOGS CHOS TSAN CHIG BRGYA BDUN CU LHAG YOD PA'I PO TI DBU

MED BRIS MA CHE LEGS SHIG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD
CING CHOS TSAN TSANG MA TSIG NYUNG LA DON GSAL BA, SNYAN CHA
PHUN

NYUNG BA, SUS BLTAS KYANG GO SLA BA SHA STAG GO ,

000512 PAR MA, NYA

SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I MAN NGAG GI BSTAN BCOS MNGON
PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI 'GREL BA MDO DANG RTZA BA DANG

'GREL PA SO SOR SBYAR BA'I GSAL BYED NYI MA'I 'OD ZER ZHES BYA
BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 339

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

MKHAS PA CHEN PO G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL NI RAB BYUNG DRUG
PA'I LCAGS PHO STAG GI LOR (1350) 'KHRUNGS SHING RAB BYUNG

BDUN PA'I SHING PHO RTA'I LOR (1414) SKU GSHEGS, DGUNG GRANGS
DRUG CU RE DRUG BZHUGS, KHONG SKU BLTAMS NAS DGUNG

GRANGS LNGAR PHEBS PA NA BOD CHOS SRID ZUNG 'BREL GYI DBANG CHA
CHEN PO DE SA SKYA'I LAG NAS PHAG GRU'I LAG TU SHOR, DE NAS
BZUNG

SA SKYA LA SRID KYI DBANG CHA CHEN PO MED KYANG DPAL LDAN SA
SKYA'I CHOS LUGS NI DBUS DANG GTZANG MDO STOD SMAD SOG PO'I YUL
BCAS

KUN TU KHYAB YOD, KHYAD PAR SA SKYA'I GDAN SA LA BOD KYI RDO RJE
GDAN ZHES PA'I MTSAN SNYAN THOB CING RGYAL KHAB PHYI NANG GI
MKHAS PA

TSANG MAS GRVA SKOR BYED SA DANG MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS ZHU YUL
GTZO BO ZHIG TU GYUR, G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL NI SKABS DER

DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I MDO YI SKOR GYI GZHUNG LUGS SMRA BA'I MKHAS
PA'I KHYU MCHOG CHEN PO ZHIG STE, DRIS LAN 'DEBS PA DANG PHAS
KYI

RGOL BA DAG LA RGOL LAN SPRAD PA 'CHAD NYAN SOGS TSANG MA GTZO
BOR KHONG GIS MDZAD, DE'I PHYIR SKABS DER DPAL LDAN SA SKYA LA

MDO LA MKHAS PA G-YAG RONG RNAM GNYIS, ZHES RLUNG LTAR GRAGS SO,
,SPYIR DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I DUS SU BOD LA MKHAS

DBANG SKYES CHEN DAM PA MANG PO BYON TE, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS
DANG BCAS PA'I BOD KYI RIG GNAS KUN LA ZHIB 'JUG BYED PA'I

RLABS 'PHRENG MTHON PO 'PHYAR ZHING BOD RANG GIS BRTZAMS PA'I
RIG GNAS CHE PHRA KUN GYI RIGS PA'I GZHUNG LUGS KYI GSUNG RAB

KYANG GRANGS MED PA THON TE, SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA NYI MA LTAR
GSAL BAR GYUR CING BOD KYI RIG GNAS KYANG DBYAR MTSO RGYAS PA

LTAR 'PHEL RGYAS 'GRO BA'I SKABS YIN, DPER NA MKHAS DBANG DAM PA
BU STON RIN CHEN GRUB DANG, KLONG CHEN RAB 'BYAMS PA,

KARMA PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE, BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL, NYA
DBON KUN DGA' DANG, RED MDA' BA GZHON NU BLO GROS, TZONG

@310 KHA PA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA, DOL PO PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN,
G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL RNAMS PHAL CHER DUS MNYAM YIN,

KHONG NI MKHAS DBANG SKYES CHEN DAM PA 'DI 'DRA MANG PO'I DBUS
SU SNYAN GRAGS THOB PA'I MKHAS PA CHEN PO ZHIG YIN, SKABS DER

MKHAS DBANG DAM PA DE DAG GIS BOD KYI RIG PA'I GNAS KUN LA ZHIB
'JUG DANG 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA'I GO RIM NANG SO SO'I

MKHAS BRGYUD MI GCIG PA DANG ZHIB 'JUG MDZAD THABS MI 'DRA BA
RNAM DPYOD KYI MTHU RTZAL MI 'DRA BA SOGS LA BRTEN NAS,

RIGS PA'I GZHUNG LUGS MANG PO ZHIG LA THUGS KYI BZHED PHYOGS MI
MTHUN PA 'GA' ZHIG BYUNG BA'I DBANG GIS PHYIS SU LUGS MI 'DRA

BA 'GA' BYUNG BA DPER NA BU STON NAS BRGYUD PA LA BU LUGS DANG,
BO DONG PHYOGS RGYAL NAS BRGYUD PA LA BO DONG LUGS, KLONG

CHEN PA NAS BRGYUD PA LA RDZOGS CHEN LUGS, DOL PO PA NAS BRGYUD
PA LA JO NANG LUGS, TZONG KHA PA NAS BRGYUD PA LA DGE LDAN

PA'I LUGS LA SOGS PA LTA BU'O, ,LUGS DE DAG LA RIGS PA'I GZHUNG
LUGS KYI RMANG GZHI MI 'DRA BA DANG LTA BA MI 'DRA BA RE YOD PA

RNAMS KYANG DE DUS BYUNG BA YIN, JO NANG PA'I LUGS NI RNAL 'BYOR
SPYOD PA'I DBU MA PA YIN PA PHUD DE MIN GYI LUGS TSANG MA DBU

MA THAL 'GYUR BA YIN 'ON KYANG RJE TZONG KHA PAS SKU TSE'I SMAD
LA THA SNYAD BDEN PA'I RNAM BZHAG CUNG MI 'DRA BA ZHIG BZHED
YOD,

GZHAN YANG RED MDA' BA SOGS KYIS DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RGYUD YANG
DAG MIN PAR 'DOD PA DANG RONG STON SOGS CHA PA CHOS SENG GI

RJES SU 'BRANGS NAS DPAL LDAN ZLA BA GRAGS PAR DGAG PA RGYAB PA
SOGS RANG DBANG DU NANG DON RIG PAR ZHIB 'JUG BYED PA'I

BYA BA SHIN TU ZAB RGYAS SU PHYIN, G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL
GYIS KYANG SKU TSE HRIL POR NANG DON RIG PAR ZHIB 'JUG LHUR LEN

MDZAD THOG GTZO BOR PHAR PHYIN GYI GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS LA THUGS
DPYAD YUN RING MDZAD NAS G-YAG tIKA CHEN MO ZHES KUN GYIS

TSAD MAR 'DZIN PA'I SHER PHYIN 'GREL CHEN PO TI CHEN PO BRGYAD
BRTZAMS TE DPAL LDAN SA SKYA LA PHAR PHYIN SKOR GYI RIGS PA'I
GZHUNG

LUGS KYI RMANG GZHI BRTAN POR BTZUGS, DER MTHUD DE KHONG GI SLOB
MA RONG STON GYIS KYANG PHAR PHYIN GYI GZHUNG BRTZAMS PA DANG

'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA SOGS LA BRTEN PHAR PHYIN GYI GZHUNG LUGS
SHIN TU RGYA CHER 'PHEL BAR GYUR, G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL

NI SKU GZHON NU DGUNG LO BCU GSUM NAS GSANG PHU RU TSAD MA'I
SKOR LA RTZOD PA BYED PA'I 'GO TSUGS, DGUNG GRANGS NYI SHU NAS

MKHAS PA'I GRAS SU TSUD DE YAR LUNG THANG CHEN RGYAL BA'I KHANG
BZANG DANG DPAL LDAN GSANG PHU SOGS LA MDO'I SKOR GYI 'CHAD NYAN

YUN RING MDZAD CING, LUNG RIGS SMRA BA'I SLOB MA KHRI PHRAG BZHI
TZAM BYUNG, MKHAS PA CHEN PO RED MDA' BAS KYANG KHONG LA

BSTOD SNGAGS RGYA CHEN MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM NI SDE DGE'I
PAR MA POD CHEN BRGYAD YOD PA CHA TSANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU

BZHUGS YOD, ,

CHOS MI SPONG BA'I THABS, 004546(24) 2

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

KHONG NI DPAL LDAN SA SKYA DGON PA DANG NYE BAR RED MDA' KHAB
SOR GRAGS PA DER MGAR STONG BTZAN YUL SRUNGS KYI BRGYUD PA,

YAB RED MDA'I BLON CHEN BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN DANG YUM YE SHES
MKHA' 'GRO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I SA GLANG LO

(1349) LA 'KHRUNGS, MI RING BAR YAB YUM GNYIS KA GSHEGS, KHONG
GI AA NI BKRA SHIS 'BUM GYIS KHONG LA GZHON NU'I DUS

NAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR MA GYUR GYI BAR DU ZHABS TOG PHUL DU
PHYIN PA PHUL, SKABS SHIG TU KHONG GIS AA NE LA ``NGAS SA SKYA
DPON

CHEN GYI LAG RTAGS BLANGS NAS BOD KHAMS BDE BA LA BKOD, YANG
NA SANGS RGYAS BSTAN PA'I SGOR ZHUGS NAS BSTAN PA NYIN MO

LTAR GSAL BA BYED DGOS'' ZHES GSUNGS, MI RING BAR YON TAN KUN
GYI GZHI MA 'BRI KLOG LEGS PAR BSLABS, THUGS DAM

PA'I CHOS LA PHYOGS TE DGUNG GRANGS BCO BRGYAD PAR GANGS CAN
MKHAS PA'I GTZUG RGYAN SA BZANG PAn CHEN GYI DRUNG DU RAB
BYUNG DRUG

PA'I ME RTA LOR (1366) RAB TU BYUNG NAS NGUR SMRIG GI RGYAL
MTSAN SKU LA BZHES, MTSAN GZHON NU BLO GROS ZHES GSOL, BKA'

SPYI'I DGONGS 'GREL RGYAS PA'I BSTAN BCOS TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL
SOGS NYA DBON KUN DGA' DANG MKHAN CHEN SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL

GNYIS KYI ZHABS LA BTUG STE LEGS PAR GSAN, DE DUS DGONGS PA LA
BLA MA'I ZHAL RGYUN KHO NA LA LTOS PA'I THABS DE NI LEGS PA

MIN PAR MKHYEN NAS SA SKYAR DPE MTSAMS BZHUGS, SDE BDUN DGONGS
'GREL DANG BCAS PA'I DON PHYIN CI MA LOG PAR THUGS

SU CHUD, CHOS GRVA RNAMS SU GRVA SKOR GNANG BAS MKHAS BTZUN
BZANG GSUM GYI GRAGS PA PHYOGS KUN KHYAB, RNAM 'GREL LA 'GREL

BA CHE CHUNG GNYIS SPYI DON DANG BCAS PA MDZAD SKABS DER RGYAL
SRAS THOGS MED BZANG PO'I MTSAN THOS PA TZAM GYIS DAD PA'I BA
SPU

G-YO ZHING MIG NAS MCHI MA LHUNG BA SOGS BYUNG STE MYUR DU
DNGUL CHU CHOS RDZONG DU BYON, BSAM SBYOR DAG PAS BLA MAR
BSTEN, BLA

MA'I MDUN NAS SMON SEMS KYI SDOM PA DANG THEG CHEN GYI CHOS
SKOR MANG DAG ZHUS, RGYAL SRAS KYI SPYOD PA RLABS PO CHE LA
SLOB PA'I

NYAMS LEN GYI GNAD GSANG MA LUS PA MKHYEN, DE NAS BLA MA DAM
PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYI ZHABS LA GTUGS, NYIN RE

BZHIN BAM PO PHYED RE THUGS LA ZIN, PHAR PHYIN GYI BSHAD PA
GSAN, 'PHAGS SENG GNYIS KYI DGONGS PA PHYIN CI MA LOG PA

RTOGS, NYI KHRI SNANG BA SOGS RGYA 'GREL DANG 'BRE AAR GYI
'GREL BA SOGS BOD 'GREL RNAMS GZIGS PAS TSIG SPYI TZAM DANG
TSIG GI

GO BA TZAM MIN PAR SKABS BRGYAD DON BDUN CU'I DGONGS PA RMA
MED PAR RTOGS, PHAR PHYIN GYI 'GREL BA DON BDUN CU PA MDZAD,

MNGON PA GONG 'OG NI BYANG CHUB RTZE MO'I ZHABS LA GTUGS TE
ZHUS, BRGAL BRTAG GIS GTAN LA PHABS 'GREL BA BSDUS DON DANG

BCAS PA MDZAD, GNAS BRTAN DGRA BCOM PA CHEN PO KUN DGA' DPAL
BZANG PO SOGS MKHAN SLOB DGE 'DUN DANG BCAS

PA'I SPYAN SNGAR BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA MNOS, DAM PA'I CHOS
'DUL BA GSAN CING 'DUL BA'I SKOR LA 'BAD PA DRAG POS DKA'

GNAD KUN LA 'DRI RTOGS MDZAD, BLA MA'I ZHAL NAS KHYOD 'DUL BA
MKHAS PA GCIG BYUNG 'DUG CHOS BDAG PO LA 'PHROD PA

@317 YIN PAS 'DI LA 'GREL PA MDZOD LA STOD 'DUL GYI SDOM RGYUD
MA CHAD PAR MDZOD CES BKA' PHEBS,

MI RING BAR MDO RTZA'I 'GREL PA DANG LAS CHOG GNYIS MDZAD, DE
NAS BZUNG 'CHAD NYAN GANG GI SKABS SU YANG GSO SBYONG

DGAG DBYE SOGS MA CHAG PAR MDZAD, SKABS DER GANGS CAN LJONGS SU
DBU MA'I DON LA 'CHAD NYAN GYI GTAN LA 'BEBS PA

DANG DE DON NYAMS SU LEN PA'I SROL HA CANG NYAMS PAS RJE 'DIS
SNYING STOBS BLA NA MED PAS CHOS RJE BYANG SEMS PA LA BSAM SBYOR

GUS PAS BSTEN NAS RIG TSOGS LNGA DANG BZHI BRGYA PA 'JUG PA
SOGS DBU MA'I SKOR GSAN, NYIN MTSAN KUN 'BAD PA DRAG POS

LHA DANG BLA MAR GSOL BA GDAB CING MCHOD PA 'BUL BA DANG BLO
GROS ZHIB MOS YANG YANG DPYAD PAS SBYANGS BRTZON GYI MTHUS KLU
SGRUB

YAB SRAS KYI DGONGS PA PHYIN CI MA LOG PAR RTOGS, SLOB MA
RNAMS KYIS YANG YANG BSKUL BAS RTZA 'JUG BZHI GSUM DANG TSIG

GSAL GYI STONG THUN GYI 'GREL BA RNAMS MDZAD, SLOB MA YANG
SLOB DANG BCAS PAR 'CHAD SPEL GNANG BAS GANGS CAN LJONGS KUN

TU DBU MA THAL 'GYUR BA'I LTA BA DAR RGYAS MDZAD, DE YANG 'DI
LTAR GRAGS TE KARMA DKON MCHOG GZHON NU NAS DENG SANG GANGS

RI'I KHROD NA MKHAS PA DANG BLUN PO KUN GYIS KHA DBU MA SNA
DBU MA ZER BA 'DI RED MDA' BA'I DRIN YIN, DE'I GONG DU THANG
SAG NA

DBU MA SHI RO GCIG 'DUG ZER, GZHAN DBU MA YOD PA'I SKAD CHA MA
TSOR GSUNGS, RJE 'DI BAS KYANG NGAS DANG POR SLOB GNYER

BYED DUS SA SKYA SOGS NA DBU MA'I DPE CHA GCIG 'DUG ZER NA MI
TSOS BRTZI MTHONG CHEN PO MI BYED, DENG SANG DBU MA'I DPE CHA
LA

GCES SPRAS BYED PA 'DI'ANG BDAG GIS BSTAN PA LA BYA BA BYAS
PA'I 'BRAS BU YIN GSUNGS, RJE 'DI DBU MA'I GZHUNG LUGS SMRA BA
 LA SA DGE BKA' RNYING GI MKHAS MANG KUN GYIS MGRIN GCIG TU
DBU MA RED MDA' LA THUG CES RGYAL MTSAN GYI TOG LTAR BKUR,

YONGS 'DZIN MKHAS PA BCU PHRAG GNYIS LHAG BSTEN NAS BDE DGYES
GSANG GSUM DANG LAM 'BRAS MAN NGAG DANG BCAS NYAMS

LEN MDZAD, BCAD MTSAMS SO SO'I THAD SKU SROG LAS KYANG GCES
PAR BSRUNG, GANGS RI'I KHROD KYI SUM LDAN RDO RJE 'DZIN PA

RNAMS KYI DED DPON DU GYUR GNAM RTZE LDING GI GTZUG LAG KHANG
DU CHOS RJE LO TZ'A BA SKYABS MCHOG DPAL BZANG DANG RJE 'DI PA
YAB

SRAS GNYIS KYIS GTZOR MDZAD DBYAR GNAS PA DGE 'DUN LNGA BRGYA
DANG BUL RONG DU SNGA PHYI LO BCU GNYIS SU BZHUGS PA'I TSE
CHOS KYI

'KHOR LO RGYA CHEN BSKOR, SLAR YANG RVA SGRENG DU YAB SRAS SKU
MTSAMS BZHUGS ZHOR DU GZHIS BYES KYI TSOGS PA DRUG BRGYA TZAM
LA

CHOS SBYIN BSTZAL, GZHAN YANG GZHAN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I THABS
LA MKHAS PAS THEG PA CHE CHUNG GI GDUL BYA RNAMS RANG RANG GI
SKAL

BA JI LTA BA BZHIN DU, SOR BYANG SNGAGS GSUM GYIS SDOM PA
BSTZAL, SMIN GROL GYI LAM LA BKOD, MA RTOG PA DANG LOG RTOGS

DANG THE TSOM GYI SGRO 'DOGS THAMS CAD GCOD PA'I GANGS CAN
MKHAS GRUB YONGS KYI STON PA GNYIS PA LTA BUR GYUR, DNGOS SU
ZHAL

NAS GSUNGS PA DANG CHAB SHOG DANG ZHAL GDAMS DRIS LAN SOGS
GSUNG RAB MANG PO BRTZAMS, KHONG NI RNAM KUN DMAN LA

THUGS SHIN TU BRTZE BAS GNAS GANG DU BZHUGS PA'I SA DE GA'I
NYAMS THAG TSO SKYONGS SHING PHYAG RDZAS CI MCHIS SER SNA MED
PAR

BTANG NAS YON TAN SLOB PAR BSKUL, DUS SKAD CIG KYANG CHUD ZOS
SU MI GTONG BAR MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG RNAMS LA ZHAL GSAL

ZHING TSIG TSOGS NYUNG BA SDEB LEGS PAS RNA BAR SNYAN PA'I
'GREL PA POD BCU PHRAG GCIG LHAG LJAGS RTZOM GNANG, RVA SGRENG
DU

CHOS RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PAS RJE 'DI MKHAS BTZUN BZANG BA TZAM
DU MA ZAD SA SKYA NAS PHRAG DOG CAN 'GAS 'CHAD NYAN LA BSHOL

CHEN PO BYUNG BA DANG, BUL RONG DU NYE 'KHOR BAS NGO LOG BYAS
NAS DUS DA LTA'I BAR KHONG KHRO CUNG ZAD CIG KYANG THUGS RGYUD
LA MA

SKYES PA 'DI NGO MTSAR, 'DI RMAD DU BYUNG ZHES GSUNGS, RJE
BTZUN RED MDA' BA NI RTAG TU GZHAN PHAN 'BA' ZHIG LHUR LEN

LAS G-YO SGYU DANG GNOD SEMS MI MNGA', THOB GO GNAS KYI 'DUN
PA DANG KHA GSAG GZHOG SLONG GI GSUNG MI PHEBS, MNGA'

RIS MANG YUL GUNG THANG SOGS SU BYON, DGE TSUL SLONG DU MA
BSGRUBS, MNGA' BDAG YUM SRAS LA BSTAN 'GYUR BZHENGS PA'I

BSKUL MA DANG ZHABS 'DEGS GNANG, 'JAM DBYANGS NAM MKHA' RIN
CHEN DANG KHRI RGYAL BSOD NAMS SDE PA YAB YUM SOGS

DBUS GTZANG YONGS KYI MCHOD GNAS SU GYUR PA MA ZAD RGYA NAG TA
MING RGYAL POS GAN GOS BZANG PO PHYI NANG LNGA SNAM SBYAR SKU
'GAG

BER THUL SOGS GYA NOM PA'I 'BUL CHEN DANG GU GE RGYAL POS KHA
CHE GUR GUM ZHO LNGA BCU'I GTZOR BYAS 'BUL NOR MANG DU BYUNG,

DNGOS RDZAS DE DAG KYANG 'CHAD NYAN GYI THEBS RTZA DANG GSUNG
RAB RTEN BZHENGS SOGS LA BTANG NAS CHUD MI ZA BAR MDZAD, DE

LTAR DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA LNGA'I BAR BSHAD SGRUB LAS GSUM
GYIS RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE BSKYANGS, THUGS KYI DPAL BE'UR
BZHUGS

PA'I MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PA'I ZAB RGYAS KYI CHOS MA
LUS PA RJES 'JUG RNAMS LA LEGS PAR BSTZAL, ZHAL NAS CHOS

DANG CHOS MIN GYI BYA BA 'DI DANG 'DI BZHIN GYIS SHIG CES
GDAMS TE RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I CHU 'BRUG LO (1412) ZLA BA BCU
PA'I

NYER DGU'I NYI SHAR LA GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS SO, SLOB MA
RNAMS KYIS GDUNG MCHOD LEGS PAR PHUL TE GDUNG KHANG ZHAL PHYE

BA'I TSE ZHAL PHYAG GI GDUNG RUS 'GA' MA TSANG BAR GRAGS, LHAG
MA RNAMS CHOS RJE BLO BZANG GRAGS PAS GTZOR MDZAD GDUL BYA

@318 RNAMS LA DAD RTEN DU BGOS, GTZO BO MANG YUL 'PHAGS PA'I
GTZUG LAG KHANG DU 'PHAGS PA'I SKU TSAD DANG MNYAM PA'I RJE
BTZUN

'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU GSER ZANGS LAS GRUB PA KHRI RGYAB YOL
DANG BCAS PA 'GRO BA'I BSOD NAMS KYI RTEN DU BZHUGS SU GSOL,

ZHAL SLOB KYANG KUN MKHYEN 'OD ZER, RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS
PA SOGS GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA MKHAS PA'I BSHES GNYEN

DU MA DANG BKA' BZHIN SMRA BA'I DBANG PHYUG DBUS GTZANG DU
KHYAB PA BYUNG, SPYIR DE DUS GANGS CAN MKHAS PA YOD DO COG RJE

'DI'I ZHABS LA MA GTUGS PA MED PA LTA BU YIN,

BKA' RTZOM YANG NGED MI RIGS DPE MDZOD KHANG DU GSUNG THOR BU
POD GCIG BZHUGS YOD,
