RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

REB TZA BKA' 'GYUR BA NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG NYI MA NI SMAD MDO
KHAMS LA MDO STOD SMAD GNYIS SU PHYE BA'I NANG TSAN MDO SMAD

AA MDO'I YUL DU SKU 'KHRUNGS, BYIS PA'I DUS NAS BOD YIG SBYOR
SDEB DANG KLOG BLOR 'DZIN BCAS LA 'BAD DE CHO GA PHYAG LEN

TSANG MAR MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD, RING PO MA LON PAR 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PA'I SLOB MA MKHAS GRUB SHES RAB SENG GE'I YANG SRID

NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GTZOS BLA MA DPAL BZANG RGYA
MTSO DANG, BLO GROS RGYA MTSO SOGS MKHAS GRUB KYI BLA MA MANG
POR

BSTEN NAS RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL DANG BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI
BSLAB SDOM LEGS PAR MNOS, KHYAD PAR RTZA BA'I BLA MA NGAG DBANG

BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MDUN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS MANG
PO'I ZAB KHRID YUN RING GSAN PAR MA TSAD DBANG RJES GNANG

DANG LUNG MAN NGAG MANG PO ZHUS SHING BLA MA'I THUGS LA ZAB CHOS
BZHUGS DGU BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL GYIS MNOS, CHOS ZHUS TSAD

MI BRJED PA'I DON DU ZIN BRIS BKOD DE LHAG BSAM BZANG POS RJES
RABS RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I CHA RKYEN BSKRUN, KHONG NI THOS LO

TZAM DANG TSE HRIL POR RTZOD PA KHO NA'I NGANG NAS MGO 'KHOR TE
DUS GRON PAR BYED PA ZHIG MIN PAR THOS DON NYAMS SU LEN PA'I BYA
BA

LA 'BAD BRTZON MDZAD DE KHONG GI BZHUGS GNAS DGE LDAN DAR RGYAS
GLING GI RI KHROD DU DUS PHAL MO CHER BCAD RGYA MDZAD NAS

NYAMS LEN KHO NA LHUR LEN MDZAD, RANG GI NYE BAR GNAS PA'I RI
KHROD PA DAG LA NYAMS LEN SKOR GYI ZAB KHRID DANG GDAMS NGAG

GNANG BA SOGS CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BA MANG PO MDZAD CING SNOD LDAN
GYI SLOB MA MANG PO SMIN PAR MDZAD, DBEN GNAS BKRA SHIS CHOS

@322 GLING GI DGON PA'I SGRIG LAM DAG THER DANG BCA' YIG THAR
PA'I SGO 'BYED BRTZAMS, RI KHROD PA RNAMS LA RGYUN DU SGRIB
SBYONG GI

NYAMS LEN DANG TSOGS BSAGS LA 'BAD DGOS PA LAS DON MED RNAM
G-YENG DANG DKOR ZAS LA RNGAM PA SOGS MI RUNG ZHES BSLAB

BYA RTAG PAR GNANG, RTZA BA'I BLA MA NGAG DBANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL
MTSAN DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU THIM PAS THUGS SKYO BA TSAD

MED NGANG <<BLA MA DRAN DRUG GI GDUNG DBYANGS SKAL LDAN SNYING
GI THUR MA>> BRTZAMS, KHONG NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU DGU PA'I
DUS

'BYED BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG>> GI 'JUG BYANG DU ``RANG NA TSOD
CHER

@324 RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RONG STON SHES BYA KUN RIG GAM MTSAN DNGOS RONG STON SH'AKYA
RGYAL MTSAN ZHES PA DE NYID NI BOD LA DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM

LAS KHAMS KYI SA CHA SNGON LO TZ'A CHEN PO BEE RO TZA NA BYON
NAS YUN RING DU BZHUGS PA'I GNAS MCHOG MDO STOD SMAD GNYIS KYI
BAR

MTSAMS SU SHAR RGYAL MO RONG ZHES PA'I YUL LJONGS DGE MTSAN LDAN
PA ZHIG YOD PA DER, BON LA MKHAS SHING, RGA'I RUS LAS

MCHED PA'I YAB GE GOD RGYAL PO DANG, YUM RGYA GAR SMAN GNYIS KYI
SRAS SU, RAB BYUNG DRUG PA'I ME MO LUG GI LO (1367) LA SKU

BLTAMS, SKU MCHED GSUM YOD PA LAS KHONG NI BAR PA YIN LA, BYIS
PA'I DUS NAS SPYANG GRUNG LDAN PAS, YAB KYIS YI GE'I

SBYOR SDEB 'BRI KLOG BCAS BSLABS NAS RAB TU BYUNG BCUG CING,
MTSAN SHES RAB 'OD ZER BYA BA BTAGS, CHO GA PHYAG LEN

SOGS CHOS PHYOGS KYI YON TAN MANG PO SBYANGS PA DANG, RIG GNAS
DPE CHA 'GA' LA'ANG SLOB SBYONG MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCO

BRGYAD PAR DBUS GTZANG DU SLOB GNYER LA BYON, THOG MAR DPAL LDAN
GSANG PHU NE'U THOG GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, GLING STOD KYI

GDAN SA PA RIN CHEN RNAM RGYAL GYI DRUNG DU BYANG SEMS KYI SDOM
PA BLANGS, KONG STOD BLO GROS DBANG PHYUG GI SPYAN SNGAR MNGON
RTOGS

RGYAN 'GREL DANG, TSAD MA RNAM NGES SOGS GSAN, LO BZHI'I RING
SLOB GNYER MDZAD PAS, MKHAS PAR GYUR TE, DGUNG LO

NYER GNYIS PAR TSAD MA RNAM NGES KYI 'GREL PA BRTZAMS, SKABS DE
NAS GZHAN LA 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA'I DBU BTZUGS, SLOB

DPON RONG STON ZHES PA'I MTSAN YANG DE DUS NAS BYUNG, DE NAS
'PHAN YUL MTHONG SMON GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU MKHAS BTZUN KUN

DGA' RGYAL POS MKHAN PO DANG, DMAR STON GYIS LAS SLOB, 'DUL
'DZIN 'OD BZANG PAS GSANG STON, GZHAN YANG DAD

PA'I DGE 'DUN BCU PHRAG 'DZOM PA'I DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI
SDOM PA ZHUS, MTSAN SH'AKYA RGYAL MTSAN ZHES PA GSOL, DE NAS

MU MTHUD DE DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN G-YAG PHRUG SANGS RGYAS DPAL
SOGS MKHAS GRAGS CAN MANG POR BSTEN NAS, 'DUL BA,

PHAR PHYIN, MNGON PA, DBU MA, TSAD MA SOGS TSANG MA LA SLOB
GNYER MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD DE MKHAS PA'I YANG RTZER SON,

SNYAN GRAGS DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM DU KHYAB, 'JAM DBYANGS KHA
CHE'I DRUNG DU SNYAN NGAG ME LONG MA DANG, MNGON BRJOD,

SDEB SBYOR BCAS KYI BSTAN BCOS GSAN, KARMA DKON MCHOG GZHON NU
DANG, 'TSAL MIG PA BSOD NAMS BZANG PO SOGS LA

GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG DU GSAN, KHONG DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS
PAR GSANG PHU NE'U THOG TU RNGOG LO CHEN PO'I GDAN SAR SLOB

DPON BLO GROS CHOS SKYONG SOGS SHES RAB CAN LNGA LA TSAD MA RNAM
NGES 'CHAD PA NAS BZUNG, DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU RTZA GSUM GYI BAR

'CHAD NYAN RGYUN MI CHAD PAR MDZAD CING, BZHUGS GNAS GTZO BO
GSANG PHU NE'U THOG GI CHOS GRVA YIN PA DANG, GZHAN YANG

SHAR PHYOGS SU PHAG MO GRU DANG 'BRI GUNG THIL NUB PHYOGS SU LA
STOD DING RI GLANG 'KHOR DANG NGAM RING, LHO PHYOGS SU YAR
KLUNGS

G-YA' BZANG DANG, YAR 'BROG SNA DKAR RTZE, BYANG PHYOGS SU BYANG
RVA SGRENG DANG, GNAM RTZE LDING GI GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS

DGON GNAS MANG POR 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN CUR PHEBS PA
ME PHO 'BRUG LO (1436) LA DPAL N'A LENDRA'I GTZUG

LAG KHANG GI 'GRAM BTING, DGON BTAB MA THAG TU DGE 'DUN CHIG
STONG LNGA BRGYA TZAM 'TSOGS, 'CHAD NYAN GYI SGRIG LAM DANG

RNAM BZHAG THAMS CAD SA RNGOG GNYIS KA'I LUGS DANG MTHUN PAR
MDZAD, GDAN SA DE NYID DU SKU MA 'DAS BAR LO BCU BZHI'I

RING 'PHRIN LAS BSKYANGS SO, ,KHONG GI SNYAN PA'I GRAGS PA RGYA
NAG TU T'A MING RGYAL PO'I SNYAN LAM DU SON TE, MI CHEN HU THAL
RGYAM

SOGS BOD DU CHED MNGAGS THOG SMAN LHA'I GSER SKU KHRU GANG BA
GCIG DANG 'JAM DPAL MTSAN BRJOD SGRIG GOS DANG BCAS PA

RNAM RGYAL MCHOD RTEN NGO MTSAR CAN GCIG TZAN DAN DKAR PO KHRU
GANG BA SOGS DNGOS PO GNANG SBYIN RGYA CHEN BSTZAL BAR MA TSAD,

<<BSTAN PA'I KHUR CHEN PO KHYER ZHIG>> ZHES PA'I 'JA' SA YANG
GNANG, KHONG GIS GZHUNG LUGS CHEN MO RNAMS LA SLOB GNYER

MDZAD DUS, TSIG DON GANG THAD RANG GI BLOS ZHIB MOR DPYAD NAS
SBYONG BA MA GTOGS, GZHAN GYI LAD MO MI MDZAD CING,

RTZOM PA PO RGYA BOD SU YIN LA MI LTOS PAR, DE'I GSUNG RAB KYI
TSIG DON LA NANG 'GAL SOGS SKYON MTHONG NA DGAG PA NAN SMIN

MDZAD, DPER NA, DPAL LDAN ZLA BA GRAGS PA'I GSUNG DBU MA 'JUG
PA'I TSIG DON 'GAR DGAG PA RGYAB PA DANG, SLOB

DPON SENG GE BZANG PO'I YUM GYI BSHAD PA 'GA' LA DGAG PA RGYAB
PA LTA BU STE, BOD KYI MKHAS PA PHAL CHE BAS RGYA GAR GYI GZHUNG

ZHIG YIN NA KHYUR MID BTANG RKYANG BYED PA LAS LEGS NYES BLANG
DOR MI BYED CING, KHYAD PAR DPAL LDAN ZLA BAR DGAG PA RGYAG

MKHAN NI CHA PA CHOS SENG DANG KHONG GNYIS LAS BYUNG MA MYONG BA
RED, KHONG DBUS PO TA LAR TZONG KHA PA DANG MJAL 'PHRAD MDZAD

@325 DUS PHAR PHYIN SKOR LA RTZOD GLENG BYAS PAS, RJE TZONG KHA
PAS BSTOD BSNGAGS MDZAD CING, GOS CHEN LCANG NAG YUG GCIG PHUL,

BO DONG PAn CHEN DANG 'DUL BA'I SKOR GYI RTZOD PA MDZAD PAS,
MTHAR RTZOD PA CHOS PHYOGS SU ZHI NAS GNYIS KA THUGS DBYINGS

GCIG TU 'DRES, MDOR NA DE DUS DBUS GTZANG DU LUNG RIGS SMRA BA'I
KHYU MCHOG TU GYUR CING RTZOD PA LA 'GRAN PA'I ZLA THAMS

CAD DANG BRAL BA'O, ,DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU GYA GSUM DU PHEBS PA RAB
BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SA MO SBRUL GYI LO'I (1449) ZLA BA BCU GNYIS

PA'I TSES BCU GSUM PA'I THO RENGS LA RANG GI GZIMS SHAG TU
DGONGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,

KHONG GI SLOB MA NI SEMS DPA' GZHON NU RGYAL MCHOG DANG, SPYAN
SNGA TSUL KHRIMS DAR MA, KARMA PA MTHONG BA DON LDAN,

SNAR THANG PAn CHEN SAm GHA SHR'I, PAn CHEN SH'AKYA MCHOG LDAN
SOGS GRUB MTHA' RIS MED KYI MKHAS DBANG SHIN TU MANG ZHING, DA

DUNG KHAMS NAS GLING DPON CHEN SOGS DANG, KHROM KHRI DPON, 'PHAN
YUL NAS SDE PA CHEN PO RGYA BYA GNYIS SOGS DPON PO'I

RIGS KYI SLOB MA YANG MANG DU YOD PAS, SKABS DER MKHAS CHEN DANG
DPON CHEN PHAL CHE BA KHONG GI SLOB MAR GYUR TE, KHONG GI

MTSAN YANG RONG STON SMRA BA'I SENG GE ZHES KUN GYIS BSTOD
BSNGAGS BYAS SO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI SH'AKYA MCHOG LDAN GYIS RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I
SHING PHO RTA LOR (1474) RONG STON 'DAS NAS LO NYER DRUG PAR

BRTZAMS PA'I <<RNAM THAR NGO MTSAR DAD PA'I ROL MTSO>> LTAR NA,
DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS NAS DGUNG LO BDUN CU'I BAR, YUM

STONG PHRAG BRGYA PA'I RNAM BSHAD RGYAS BSDUS DANG, S'A LU
LJANGS PA'I MDO 'GREL, GSANG 'DUS RGYUD 'GREL, TSAD MA'I RNAM

BSHAD SOGS GZHUNG CHEN MO BZHI BCU ZHE GCIG GI 'GREL PA BRTZAMS
YOD PA DANG, DGUNG LO BDUN CU NAS GYA GSUM BAR GYI

DUS PHAL MO CHER 'CHAD NYAN DANG SGOM SGRUB GTZO BOR MDZAD CING,
GSUNG CHOS KYANG BSTOD PA DANG MAN NGAG SOGS THOR BU MA

GTOGS GZHUNG CHEN GYI 'GREL PA RNAMS DGUNG LO BDUN CU YAN LA
TSAR BAR BSHAD, DA LTA NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU KHONG GI GSUNG

PHAR PHYIN DANG DBU MA'I 'GREL PA DANG MTHA' DPYAD SOGS SDE
DGE'I PAR MA POD CHEN GNYIS DANG, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I LCAGS

PHO STAG LOR BRIS PA'I GSUNG THOR BU BA POD GCIG BCAS KHYON SDOM
PO TI GSUM BZHUGS YOD CING, GSUNG THOR BU BA'I NANG

BSTOD TSOGS DANG, SGOM RIM, SGOM PA'I KHRID YIG BSHES SPRING GI
'GREL PA SOGS CHOS TSAN CHIG BRGYA ZHE DRUG TZAM YOD CING,

BSOD NAMS BLO GROS KYIS DKAR CHAG CIG KYANG GSAL BAR BKOD 'DUG

@226 (CHINESE LANGUAGE)
@327 *, ,RONG THA BLO BZANG DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

004526 PAR MA, KHA

DKAR CHAG BZHUGS SO, , (1) 3

RTOGS BRJOD RIN PO CHE DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING GI DON NYUNG NGUR
GLENG BA NGO MTSAR SNANG BA'I THIG LE DANG GUS PADMA

BZHAD PA'I GNYEN GCIG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 62

GU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (3) 11

(4) 21

PA'I GNAS TSAD BCAS LEGS PAR BSHAD PA BLO LDAN RNA BAR

BZHUGS SO, , (7) 11

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RONG THA BLO BZANG DAM CHOS RGYA MTSO NI, MDO KHAMS LDAN MA'I
YUL GYI BYE BRAG SGA LUNG GI SA CHAR, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I SHING GLANG LOR (1805) 'KHRUNGS, KHONG DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I
DUS NAS RONG THA SPRUL SKU YIN PAR NGOS 'DZIN BYAS NAS BLA MA

BLO BZANG CHOS 'BYOR LHUN GRUB DANG, BSTAN 'DZIN THUB STOBS,
CHOS DBANG RNAMS RGYAL SOGS RIG PA'I GNAS LNGA LA MKHAS

PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO BSTEN NAS, MDO'I SKOR GYI PHAR
PHYIN, MNGON PA, DBU MA, 'DUL BA SOGS DANG,

SNGAGS KYI SKOR BYA SPYOD RNAL 'BYOR RGYUD SOGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS
RNAMS SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD CING, TSAD MA'I GZHUNG DANG,

RTZIS DANG, SNYAN NGAG SOGS THUN MONG GI RIG GNAS RNAMS KYANG
MKHAS PAR MDZAD, KHYAD PAR GSANG SNGAGS KYI DBANG LUNG

SBYIN SREG SKOR DANG 'DON CHOG ROL DBYANGS BCAS PA MKHAS PAR
SBYANGS PA MA TSAD BSNYEN SGRUB SOGS LA YANG SHIN TU 'BAD BRTZON

MDZAD, KHONG GIS SKU TSE HRIL POR DBEN PAR MTSAMS BSNYEN SGRUB
GTZO BOR MDZAD CING 'CHAD NYAN DANG DBANG LUNG GNANG BA

SOGS KYANG MI NYUNG BA ZHIG MDZAD DE SLOB MA MANG PO SPEL, KHONG
GI DGON PA DER RVA NYAG THEG CHEN GLING ZER ZHING KHONG RGYUN DU

BZHUGS SA'I GZIMS SHAG LA DBEN GNAS CHOS KYI PHO BRANG NGAM DBEN
GNAS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING ZER, KHONG DUS TSOD

PHAL CHE BA DBEN GNAS DER BZHUGS NAS 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYIS
DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM RNAMS

KYANG GNAS DER BRTZAMS PA SHA STAG RED 'DUG DBEN GNAS DE'I NYE
SKOR NA YOD PA'I RI KHROD PA RNAMS LA 'GYED MANG BA DANG

CHOS 'CHAD NYAN SOGS BKA' DRIN CHE BA'I BLA MA GTZO BO YIN PAR
MA TSAD RVA NYAG DGON PA'I DGON BDAG KYANG KHONG YIN PAS DER

DGE LDAN PA'I BLA MA'I NANG NAS MKHAS GRAGS CHE BA ZHIG YIN 'DUG
KHONG NAM SKU GSHEGS PA'I SKOR LA DPYAD GZHI YID RTON RUNG

BA MA RNYED PAS KHA TSON GCOD MA SPOBS KYANG MKHAS PA 'GAS
(1900) LOR 'DAS PAR BZHED PA LTAR NA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA PA'I

LCAGS PHO BYI BA LOR KHEL BAS DGUNG LO DGU BCU GO DRUG BZHUGS
YOD PA LTA BUR 'DUG PAS DPYAD PAR MDZOD CIG

KHONG GI GSUNG NI, MNGON PA MDZOD DANG, PHAR PHYIN GYI GZHUNG
'GREL, DAM CHOS 'DUL BA'I 'BRU 'GREL DANG BRDA

BKROL BLA MA'I RNAM THAR TSIGS BCAD MA, DBANG DANG CHO GA'I SKOR
GYI SGRUB THABS, RTZIS KYI SKOR MANG PO DANG, DRIS LAN,

THIG TSAD DANG, THOD PA BRTAG PA SOGS POD CHEN GSUM YOD KYANG,
NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU POD KHA PA DANG GA PA GNYIS LAS

BZHUGS MED DO, ,

DON GSAL BA DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I DGONGS 'GREL

LEGS BSHAD KYI RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (27) 18

KHRI CHEN BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS GSUNG 'BUM POD GNYIS PA'I DKAR CHAG
BZHUGS SO, , 003805(1) 3

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

KHRI CHEN BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS NI, BOD YUL LA SMAD MDO KHAMS SGANG
DRUG TU GRAGS PA'I NANG TSAN SPO 'BOR SGANG GI KHONGS LI

THANG GI YUL DU YAB LDONG GI RIGS LAS MCHED PA LI THANG GI DPON
AA 'BUM GYI GNYER DPON BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS DANG YUM SGROL

MA MTSO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA MO YOS LO'I
(1759) ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES BCO LNGA NYIN PAR YAB YUM GYI

BZHUGS GNAS SU BDE BAR BLTAMS, ZLA BA BDUN TZAM SONG BA NA LI
THANG DGON NAS BLA MA NYAMS RTOGS MTHO BA GRUB THOB YIN

PA'I GRAGS PA CAN ZHIG KHYIM DU GDAN DRANGS NAS BYIS PAR KHRUS
DANG BGEGS BSKRAD SOGS ZHUS PAS BLA MA DES BYIS PA 'DI GZHAN

DANG MI 'DRA BA ZHIG 'DUG PAS MTSAN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN GYIS
GSUNGS, DE NAS KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOG LDAN GYI MTSAN

DANG GCIG PAR GYUR PAS KUN GYI KHRI CHEN PA'I SPRUL SKU YIN PAR
'DUG CES GLENG, DGUNG LO GNYIS TZAM BZHES PA NA LI THANG

MKHAN CHEN PHUN TSOGS RGYA MTSO'I MDUN BYA BA KHRUS ZHU BAR
BYON, MKHAN CHEN NAS YAB YUM GNYIS LA GTZANG SBRA LEGS PA DANG
RAB

BYUNG GI CHA LUGS BYED DGOS PA'I BKA' BSLAB DANG MTSAN BLO BZANG
DAR RGYAS ZHES PA BSTZAL CING, DUNG DKAR DANG PHYAG DRIL

PHYAG dAm SOGS KYANG GNANG, DE NAS BZUNG MKHAN CHEN PAS DBU BLA
MDZAD NAS ZLA RE BZHIN BYAB KHRUS SOGS CHAG MED MDZAD, GRONG MI
KHYIM MTSES DANG GNYEN NYE BA TSANG MAS BYIS PA 'DI SPRUL SKU
ZHIG YIN PAR 'DUG CES GLENG BA DANG, LI THANG GI GRVA RIGS

YON TAN LDAN PA DAG GIS BYIS PA 'DI KHRI CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG GI
YANG SRID MIN NAM ZER BA'I GTAM KUN TU BSGRAGS PAS DBUS SU KHRI

CHEN GONG MA'I DBON RVA SGRENG PHYAG MDZOD PA'I SNYAN LAM DU
SON, PHYAG MDZOD DES PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DANG RGYAL
TSAB DE

MO NO MON HAN GNYIS LA THUGS BRTAG ZHUS PAS BKA' LUNG GSAL POR
BYUNG BA BCAS LA BRTEN RVA SGRENG PHYAG MDZOD 'KHOR NYUNG ZAD

DANG BCAS LI THANG DU SPRUL SKU NGOS 'DZIN DU BYON, PHYAG
MDZOD DPON 'KHOR RNAMS NAS BRTAG PA ZHIB CING PHRA BAR BYAS
PAS KHRI

CHEN GONG MA'I SPRUL SKU 'KHRUL MED YIN PA'I NGES SHES BRNYES,
PE CING NAS LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE'I BKA' MNGAGS LTAR AA
KYA HO

THOG THU DBUS PHEBS SKABS LHA DANG BLA MA DU MAR LUNG BSTAN
ZHU ZHING MAR BYON PA NA CHED DU LI THANG LA PHEBS NAS SPRUL
SKU NGOS 'DZIN

DANG BRTAG PA LAN MANG MDZAD DE PE CING DU LCANG SKYAR SNYAN
SENG ZHUS PAS KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG MCHOD LDAN GYI SPRUL SKU
YIN PAR THAG

BCAD NAS GONG MA CHEN PO DANG LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE BCAS
NAS SPRUL SKUR ZHVA GOS MCHOD CHAS CHA TSANG DANG YAB YUM
GNYIS LA

DNGOS PO GYA NOMS PA'I GNANG SBYIN BSTZAL CING RGYAL TSAB DE
MO SOGS LA'ANG NGOS 'DZIN LEGS PO BYUNG BAR LEGS SO'I GNANG
SKYES

GTOS CHEN BSTZAL, PHYAG MDZOD DBON DPON G-YOG RNAMS MYUR BAR
DBUS LHA LDAN DU LOG STE SPRUL SKU GDAN ZHU'I GRA SGRIG BYED 

CING RGYAL TSAB DE MO RIN PO CHE LA SPRUL SKU RIN MIN GDAN ZHU
BYA RTZIS KYI SNYAN ZHU PHUL DON BZHIN BYIS PA DGUNG NA DRUG TU
SON PA SHING

SPREL LO'I ZLA BA LNGA PAR DBUS NAS SDE PA GZHUNG GI SKU TSAB
RTZE GZIM 'GAG NGO G-YOG DANG RVA SGRENG GI BLA BRANG ZHABS GRAS
PA NGAG DBANG
@343 YON TAN DPON G-YOG BCAS LI THANG PHYOGS SU BSU MAR
BRDZANGS, LAM BAR DU NYE ZHO MED PAR LI THANG DU BDE BAR
'BYOR, LO

DE'I ZLA BA DGU PA'I ZLA SMAD DU LI THANG NAS BTEGS, GONG MA
CHEN POS THUGS KHUR ZAB BZHES 'OG GONG MA'I DMAG MI BCU PHRAG

LNGA LHA LDAN DU MA PHEBS BAR SRUNG MAR MNGAGS, LHO LAM BRGYUD
ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I ZLA SMAD LA DBUS BKRA SHIS THANG DU
ZHABS

SOR 'KHOD, SHING MO BYA LO'I GNAM LO GSAR DU BZHAD PA'I DUS
DANG LHAN CIG GDAN SA RVA SGRENG DANG YANG DGON RTZE GNYER
SOGS

BLA SPRUL LAS SNE DANG DGE 'DUN DANG MI SER GTZO RGAN BCAS
KYIS THAB BSU CHIBS BSU DE MIN DGE 'DUN MANG MAS GZAB 'CHOS

BCAS MCHOD RDZAS SNA TSOGS THOGS TE SER SBRENG ZAB RGYAS KYIS
BSUS TE RVA SGRENG DPAL GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU KHRI CHEN GONG
MA'I

GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL BAR MDZAD, GZHUNG SA DGA' LDAN PHO BRANG
DANG RGYAL TSAB DE MO RIN PO CHES GTZOS PA'I DBUS KYI BLA

DPON CHE KHAG DANG GDAN SA GSUM GYI MKHAN SPRUL CHE CHUNG DE
MIN GYI SER SKYA MCHOG DMAN SHIN TU MANG POS KHRIR PHEBS KYI
LEGS

'BUL SHIN TU GTOS CHE BA MDZAD, SPRUL SKU DGUNG NA PHRA YANG
TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU BAG TSA BRAL ZHING BZHIN 'DZUM PA DANG BCAS

KUN LA PHYAG DBANG GNANG, DE NAS MI RING BAR LHA LDAN GYI RTEN
GTZO RNAMS DANG T'A LA'I SPRUL SKU 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DANG
PAn

CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES SOGS BLA DPON KHAG MJAL 'PHRAD DU RVA
SGRENG NAS CHIBS KYI KHA LO BSGYUR, SKABS DER T'A LA'I LA RAB

BYUNG GI SDOM PA 'BUL BA'I CHED DU PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES
KYANG PO TA LAR PHEBS YOD PA DANG STABS 'GRIGS, SDE PA GZHUNG

GI BLA DPON CHE KHAG NAS MNGAGS PA'I DRUNG 'KHOR SOGS KYI
CHIBS BSU DANG GDAN SA CHEN PO RNAMS KYI LAS SNE'I BSU MA GTOS
CHE

DANG BCAS LHA LDAN DU 'BYOR RJES GZHUNG KHANG MON GRONG DU
BZHUGS, DE 'PHRAL T'A LA'I DANG PAn CHEN RGYAL TSAB DE MO
SPRUL SKU

YONGS 'DZIN KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS BCAS MJAL ZHING
DNGOS 'BUL RGYA CHE BA PHUL, YONGS 'DZIN NGAG DBANG CHOS

GRAGS NAS PHYAG DPE LA BRTZON PAR BYA DGOS PA SOGS KYI BSLAB
STON GNANG, DE NAS JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS KYIS MTSON RTEN DANG

GNAS CHEN KHAG LA MCHOD MJAL MDZAD RJES PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE
SHES KYIS MKHAN PO MDZAD 'OG SLOB DPON DANG DGE 'DUN

GRANGS TSANG DBUS SU DGE TSUL GYI BSLAB SDOM YANG DAG PAR
MNOS, SKABS DER KHONG DGUNG LO BDUN PAR PHEBS YOD CING T'A

LA'I 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO KHONG LAS DGUNG LO GCIG CHE 'O, ,DE
SKABS LHA SAR BZHUGS RING PAn CHEN LA GRUB RGYAL LUGS KYI TSE

DBANG SOGS GSUNG CHOS 'GA' YANG ZHUS, LHA SA NAS RIM GYIS GDAN
SA RVA SGRENG DU TSUR PHEBS TE YI GE PHYI MO'I 'BRI KLOG
SBYONG

BA'I DBU TSUGS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA ME KHYI LO'I LO GSAR GYI
DGYES STON RGYAS PAR ROL, RVA DGON MDZOD PA SOGS LAS SNE GROS

MTHUN GYIS SNGAGS RAM PA NGAG DBANG BSAM 'GRUB DGE RGAN DU
BSKOS, SBYOR KLOG NAS ZHAL 'DON CHOS SPYOD KYI RIGS DANG MDO

SNGAGS GZHUNG CHEN DAG GI RTZA 'GREL BLOR 'DZIN BCAS 'BAD PAS
SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU PA SA BYI LOR YAB DRIN CAN BSOD

NAMS DAR RGYAS SKU GSHEGS PA'I STENG SKU MCHED KYANG SNYUNG
GZHI GLO BUR BA ZHIG GIS LNGA LAM DU GSHEGS, RGYAL TSAB DE MO
RIN PO CHE

RVA SGRENG DU PHEBS NAS KHONG LA THUGS GSO DANG YUM SGROL MA
MTSOR LO RE BZHIN 'BRU KHAL NYIS BRGYA THAM PA GNANG RGYU'I
BKA' SHOG

BSTZAL, YAB DANG SKU MCHED 'DAS PA'I RJES KYI DGONGS RDZOGS
RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PA LCAGS STAG LOR LO

GSAR DGYES STON ZIN NAS MI RING BAR PE CING NAS GONG MA CHEN
POS CHO LO BSTZAL BA BZHES PAR MYUR DU LHA LDAN DU PHEBS DGOS

ZHES GZHUNG NAS BKA' SHOG BSTZAL BA DANG DU BLANGS TE RVA
SGRENG NAS LHA SAR PHEBS, GTZUG LAG KHANG GI NYE 'DABS DPAL
RAB

KHANG GSAR DU BZHUGS, T'A LA'I DANG RGYAL TSAB DE MO MJAL
ZHING JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS SOGS RTEN GTZO RNAMS LA SNYAN SHAL
MCHOD

'BUL RJES GONG MA CHEN PO'I BKAS MNGAGS AAM BAN GNYIS NAS AA
CHI THU NO MON HAN ZHES PA'I CHO LO GSER YIG DANG CHAB GCIG

GNANG SKYES GYA NOM PA DAG LEGS PAR BZHES, PAn CHEN LHA LDAN
DU PHEBS PA'I SPYAN SNGAR ZAB CHOS GDAMS NGAG MANG PO ZHUS,

DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PA CHU 'BRUG LOR GZHUNG LUGS RAB 'BYAMS LA
THOS BSAM RGYA CHER MDZAD PA'I CHED DU RVA SGRENG NAS BTEGS TE

LHA SAR BYON, BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BYOR DU BZHUGS PAR MDZAD, RGYAL
TSAB DE MO NAS GANG CIR BKA' BKOD GNANG BA LTAR,

TSA BA RAB 'BYAMS PA RGYA MTSO MTHA' YAS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSKOS,
ZLA BA LNGA PAR PHEBS BSU ZAB RGYAS DANG BCAS SE RA BYES GRVA

TSANG DU PHEBS NAS THOS BSAM LA 'JUG GO ,DE NAS BSDUS GRVA NAS
BZUNG TSAD MA'I SKOR GSAN SBYONG DANG BAR BAR RNAMS SU

DBANG LUNG KHRID SNA TSOGS RGYUN CHAD MED PAR ZHUS, RE ZHIG NA
YONGS 'DZIN RGYA MTSO MTHA' YAS PA PO TA LAR T'A LA'I 'JAM

DPAL RGYA MTSO'I MTSAN ZHABS MKHAN POS PHEBS DGOS PA KHEL NAS
MKHAN ZUR BYAMS PA SMON LAM YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN,

TSAD MA 'DUL MDZOD SOGS GSUNG RAB KUN LA RANG BYAN CHUD PA'I
'DZIN SKYOR GNANG, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA ME BYA LO'I GNAM

LO GSAR TSES SKABS PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES T'A LA'I BSNYEN
RDZOGS BSGRUB PA'I PHYIR DU LHA SAR PHEBS PA MJAL ZHING LO
DE'I ZLA

BA BZHI PA'I TSES BRGYAD NYIN PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAS
MKHAN PO DANG BKRA SHIS LHUN POR YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG CHOS
'PHEL

@344 GYIS LAS SLOB DE MIN SLOB DPON DGE 'DUN GRANGS LHAG DANG
BCAS PA'I DBUS SU PO TA LA'I PHO BRANG DU BSNYEN RDZOGS DGE
SLONG GI

SDOM PA LEGS PAR BLANGS, BSLAB SDOM MTHA' DAG TSUL BZHIN
BSRUNGS, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PA SA PHAG LOR PAn CHEN RGYA

NAG LA PHEBS PA'I LAM ZHOR RVA SGRENG DU GDAN DRANGS NAS PHEBS
BRDZANGS KYI DNGOS 'BUL RGYA CHEN MDZAD CING SKU TSE YUN DU
BRTAN

PA'I ZHABS BRTAN DANG BOD LJONGS SU MYUR BAR PHEBS PA'I GSOL
'DEBS MDZAD, DE NAS MYUR BAR SE RA CHOS SDE CHEN POR LOG

PHEBS TE SNGAR BZHIN THOS BSAM LA THUGS BRTZON MDZAD, DGUNG LO
NYER GNYIS PA LCAGS BYI LO'I SMON LAM CHEN MOR SMON RAMS

PA'I DAM BCA' 'JOG PAR MDZAD, MKHAS PA STONG PHRAG 'DUS PA'I
DBUS SU MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA THOB STE RAB 'BYAMS PA'I

MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, T'A LA'I 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO SOGS KYIS LEGS
SO'I DBUGS DBYUNG DANG GZENGS BSTOD TSAD MED

GNANG, SDE PA GZHUNG NAS KYANG NA BZA' YO CHAS SOGS SNGAR SROL
BZHIN BSTZAL, GSANG SNGAGS KYI SKOR LA GSAN BSAM DANG

DBANG KHRID SOGS ZHU BA'I CHED DU SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZLA
SHAS BZHUGS TE GSAN SBYANGS RJES GDAN SA RVA SGRENG DU TSUR
PHEBS,

MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG LUGS KUN LA THOS BSAM MTHAR PHYIN NAS SGRUB
PA NYAMS LEN GYI DON LA 'BAD PA LHOD MED MDZAD MUS LA LCAGS

GLANG LOR GLO BUR DU PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE RGYA NAG PE CING DU SKU
GSHEGS PA'I GNAS TSUL 'BYOR BAS THUGS MYA NGAN GYIS NON BZHIN

PAR DGONGS RDZOGS SOGS KYI BYA BA RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, PAn CHEN
GYI SKU GDUNG RGYA NAG NAS BYANG LAM BRGYUD DE GTZANG DU GDAN

DRANGS PA NA KHONG RVA SGRENG NAS 'DAM AO RA HA'I BAR DU BSU
BAR BYON NAS THUGS MYA NGAN GYIS GDUNG BAS SPYAN CHAB SIL
BZHIN PAR

GDUNG MCHOD RGYA CHEN PHUL, MCHOG SPRUL MYUR 'BYON GYI GSOL
'DEBS DANG SMON LAM TSAD MED BTAB, DE NAS MU MTHUD DE RVA

SGRENG DU LO BDUN GYI BAR RTZE GCIG TU SGRUB PA KHO NA LHUR
LEN MDZAD, LO 'DI DAG TU YONGS 'DZIN RGYA MTSO MTHA' YAS RVA
SGRENG DU

THENGS MANG GDAN DRANGS NAS ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA ZHUS, DGUNG
LO NYER BRGYAD PA ME PHO RTA'I LOR YONGS 'DZIN YE SHES RGYAL

MTSAN NAS T'A LA'I 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSOR MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS
ZAB CING RGYA CHE BA'I BSHAD LUNG DANG DBANG KHRID 'BUL BA'I
DUS LA

BAB CING T'A LA'I NAS KHONG LA YANG PHEBS DGOS PA'I BKA' SHOG
SON PAR BRTEN RVA SGRENG NAS LHA LDAN GRU 'DZIN GNYIS PA'I PHO
BRANG

DU PHEBS TE T'A LA'I DANG LHAN CIG CHOS KYI DGA' STON LA ROL,
LO DE'I STON KHAR PE CING NAS GONG MAS GNANG BA'I BKA' LUNG

DANG DNGOS SKYES GYA NOM PA BSTZAL BA DGYES BZHES MDZAD, GDAN
SA GSUM DANG DGON SDE KHAG GI BLA SPRUL DGE 'DUN MANG PO LA

ZAB CHOS MANG DU GNANG ZHING SLOB MA BRGYA STONG DU MA SPEL,
LCAGS KHYI LOR (1790) RGYA NAG GONG MA CHEN PO DGUNG LO BRGYAD
CUR

PHEBS PA'I DGA' STON CHEN MO'I THOG LHA LDAN GTZUG LAG KHANG
DU PHEBS TE RTEN 'BREL MDZAD SGO RLABS CHEN BSGRUBS, SKABS

DER BAL PO'I GOR DMAG GTZANG DU 'DZUL ZHING LO DE'I ZLA BA
BDUN PAR GOR DMAG BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'DZUL BA BCAS KYIS DBUS

GTZANG GI 'BANGS RNAMS SDUG LA SBYOR BAR BRTEN RGYA NAG GONG
MA BDAG PO CHEN POS DMAG DPUNG GTOS CHEN BOD DU BRDZANGS PA

BYANG LAM BRGYUD NAS PHEBS SKAD GSAN 'PHRAL KHONG 'DAM GYI BAR
DU BSU BAR BYON, DMAG DPON CHEN PO HU SI KRUNG THANG DANG

MJAL 'PHRAD THOG LEGS SKYES GYA NOM PA 'BUL BA DGYES BZHES
MDZAD, DE NAS RVA SGRENG DU LO MJUG GI DUS GTOR SOGS MDZAD,

BYI BA'I LOR NA TSOD MTHO BA'I MA YUM 'DAS PAR BRTEN THUGS
SKYO NGAL TSAD MED DANG BCAS DGE RDZOGS RGYA CHER BSGRUBS, LO
DE'I

ZLA BA BCU PAR GONG MA'I DMAG G-YUL LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I
NGANG NAS LHA LDAN DU PHEBS SKAD GSAN NAS DE 'PHRAL RVA SGRENG
NAS SNYE

THANG BAR BYON TE CHIBS BSU MDZAD THOG DMAG GI DPON 'KHOR
RNAMS DANG PHAN TSUN DGYES PA'I GSUNG MOL YUN RING MDZAD,

CHU GLANG LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS PAR GONG MAS BKAS MNGAGS DMAG DPON
CHEN PO HU SI KUNG THANG 'KHOR BCAS RGYA NAG TU LOG PHEBS

SKABS T'A LA'I DANG LHAN CIG ZUR KHANG G-YUL KHA'I BAR DU
SKYEL MA MDZAD, JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS MDUN PHYAG MCHOD SOGS
MDZAD

RJES GDAN SA RVA SGRENG DU PHEBS TE LO PHYI MA SHING STAG LO'I
BAR SNGAR BZHIN THUGS DAM BCAD RGYA MDZAD NAS BZHUGS, DE NAS

DBUS KYI JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS SOGS KYI RTEN GTZO RNAMS DANG
DPAL BSAM YAS DANG BRAG YER PA SOGS GNAS CHEN RNAMS SU MJAL

SKOR PHEBS TE DGUNG SKEG ZHI BA'I ZHABS BRTAN RIM GRO LA 'BAD
PAR MDZAD, LO DER RVA SGRENG GSUNG RAB LHA KHANG DU BYAMS SKU

CHEN PO GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS, T'A LA'I BKA' LTAR SE 'BRAS
DGE GSUM GI DGE 'DUN DANG DE MIN SER SKYA KHRI LHAG LA DGA'

LDAN BSAM GTAN GLING GI GRVA KHANG CHEN MOR BYANG CHUB LAM RIM
GYI BSHAD LUNG NYIN ZHAG BCO BRGYAD BAR BSTZAL, KHONG DGUNG LO
SO

DGU PA ME SBRUL LO'I ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES LNGA LA YONGS 'DZIN
MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG CHOS 'BYOR SKU GSHEGS PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS
RGYA

CHEN BSGRUBS, GDUNG RAS BZHUGS PA'I DNGUL GYI MCHOD RTEN THOG
SO PHYED GNYIS YOD PA GSAR DU BZHENGS SHING YONGS 'DZIN

DE NYID KYI 'DRA SKU MI TSAD TZAM GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS,
SNYUNG GZHI BZHES NAS SKU GSHEGS PA'I BAR BLA MAR SANGS RGYAS
DNGOS

KYI 'DU SHES KYIS KHONG SKU NGO MAS NAD G-YOG SOGS ZHABS ZHU
LEGS PAR MDZAD, LO DE'I ZLA BRGYAD PAR LHA LDAN DU BYON NAS

@345 DGA' LDAN BSAM GTAN GLING DU BLA SPRUL DU MA DANG GRVA SA
GDAN SA GSUM DANG RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG RI KHROD PA BCAS DGE
'DUN PA STONG

PHRAG MANG PO LA ZLA BA GCIG RING LAM RIM CHUNG BA'I BSHAD
LUNG GNANG, SDE PA GZHUNG NAS KYANG DGE 'DUN RNAMS LA MANG JA
DANG

'GYED SOGS GNANG, DER MTHUD DE RDO GCAL CHEN MOR DBU GUR PHUBS
TE SER SKYA KHRI PHRAG NYE BAR SMAN LHA BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD

KYI RJES GNANG DANG LTUNG BSHAGS SOGS KYI LUNG BSTZAL, DGUNG
LO BZHI BCU PAR PHYAG MDZOD BKRA SHIS 'BYUNG GNAS PAS GTZO

'GAN BZHES 'OG RGYUN GYI AAR LAS PA SUM BRGYA LHAG NAS RVA
SGRENG DGON ZHIG GSO'I AAR LAS DBU TSUGS, DGON PHYI NANG TSANG
MA

ZHIG GSO DANG RGYA BSKYED MDZAD, DE NAS DBANG LUNG GNANG BA
BCAD MTSAMS BZHUGS PA DGE TSUL SLONG GI SDOM PA BSTZAL BA

SOGS CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BAS DUS 'DA' ZHING DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PA
SA MO LUG LOR (1799) GONG MA LHA SKYONG CHEN PO GNAM DU GSHEGS

PAR DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, SKABS DER RVA SGRENG
GTZUG LAG KHANG GI YANG STENG DU GZIM CHUNG NYI 'OD GSAR RGYAG
GI AAR

LAS 'GO BTZUGS PAR BRTEN, SE RA DGON PAR PHEBS NAS 'DUS SDER
ZAB CHOS RGYA CHER GNANG, ZLA BA DRUG PAR GZIM CHUNG

GSAR PA DGA' LDAN BLTA NA SDUG PA'I PHO BRANG DU PHEBS SHING
THUGS KYI BZHES PA LTAR BYUNG BAS SHIN TU DGYES PA CHEN PO
MDZAD,

MI RING BAR RDO RING BKA' ZUR LA TSE DBANG BRGYA RTZA GNANG
BAR PHEBS, ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PAR PO TA LAR GONG MA'I 'DRA THANG
CHEN

MO'I MDUN LO 'KHOR GYI DGONGS RDZOGS KYI TSOGS DBUS SU BYON TE
DGONGS RDZOGS SMON LAM GYI RIM PA RGYA CHEN MDZAD, LCAGS

SPREL LOR LHA LDAN SMON LAM CHEN POR TSOGS PHEBS DANG DGE 'DUN
STONG PHRAG MANG POR DBANG LUNG BSTZAL BA RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS

RNAMS LA MCHOD PA SOGS LO LO LHAR DANG RDO RING GI YUM RIN
CHEN SKYID 'DZOM LO RE GCIG PA'I SKEG THOG TU 'DAS PAR BSNGO
SMON

GNAD SMIN MDZAD, RVA SGRENG DU PHEBS 'PHRAL SMAN LHA BDE
GSHEGS BRGYAD KYIS GTZOS GSER ZANGS KYI LHA SKU GSAR BZHENGS

RNAMS DANG BDE GSHEGS LHA KHANG GI RGYA PHIBS GSER ZANGS LAS
BZHENGS PA SOGS YONGS SU GRUB PA RNAMS LA GZUNGS 'BUL RAB

GNAS MDZAD, PAn CHEN SPRUL SKU PO TA LAR T'A LA'I MDUN SDOM PA
BZHES PA'I DGYES STON DU KHONG PHEBS TE MCHOD SPRIN MTHA' YAS

PA PHUL ZHING ZLA BA LNGA PA'I TSES BCU BDUN NYIN PAn CHEN
GTZANG PHYOGS SU PHYIR PHEBS PA LA PHEBS SKYEL DANG BSTAN
'GROR SMAN PA'I

MDZAD PA LHUR LEN DGOS TSUL SOGS KYI BSLAB DON ZHUS, LCANG
SKYA MCHOG SPRUL LHA LDAN DU PHEBS NAS KHONG LA 'BUL BA GTOS
CHEN

PHUL ZHING SGROL DKAR DANG RME BRTZEGS MA'I RJES GNANG BSTZAL,
DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PA CHU KHYI LOR T'A LA'I BLA MAR LO GSAR
MJAL

DAR LEGS SKYES 'BUL BAR PHEBS SHING TSE DBANG GRANGS MANG
PHUL, PHYI LOR PHA BONG KHA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG LE LAG BCAS PA
NYAMS

GSO RGYA CHEN MDZAD, SOG RJE BTZUN DAM PA LHA LDAN DU PHEBS PA
LA DBANG LUNG KHRID BCAS THUGS RE LTAR PHUL, DGUNG LO ZHE

DRUG PAR LHA LDAN DU LO GSAR DGYES STON LA ROL BA SOGS SNGAR
BZHIN DANG LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL SEMS SPRUL RIN PO CHE SOGS
LA LO

SHAS RING ZAB CHOS MANG DU GNANG, T'A LA'I NAS LCANG SKYA
MCHOG SPRUL KYI YONGS 'DZIN BYED DGOS PA'I BKA' PHEBS PA DANG
DU

BLANGS NAS 'BRAS SPUNGS SU BYON NAS LCANG SKYAR GZHUNG LUGS
RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD DE RE ZHIG 'BRAS SPUNGS SU
BZHUGS,

ZLA BA DGU PAR LCANG SKYA DANG LHAN CIG DPON SLOB PHA BONG
KHAR BCAD RGYA MDZAD MUS SKABS ZLA BA BCU PA'I TSES BCO BRGYAD
NYIN PA'I

NUB MOR T'A LA'I 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO ZHI DBYINGS SU MNAL BAR
BRTEN GDUNG 'BUL DANG DGONGS RDZOGS SOGS GRUB RJES SNGAR

BZHIN PHA BONG KHAR BCAD RGYA MDZAD, ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PAR BCAD
RGYA BKROL TE SHING GLANG GSAR TSES KYI DGYES STON LA ROL BA

SOGS MDZAD, BSAM 'GRUB PHO BRANG DU YUN RING TZAM BZHUGS NAS
ZAB CHOS GSUNGS, ME STAG LOR KHONG GIS MKHAN PO

MDZAD DE LCANG SKYA LA BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA PHUL, ZLA BA
GSUM PA'I TSES GSUM NYIN LCANG SKYA MCHOG SPRUL RGYA NAG TU
PHEBS PAR

PHEBS SKYEL SOGS RGYA CHER MDZAD THOG GANG CIR BSLAB STON BKA'
SLOB MANG PO MDZAD, DE 'PHRAL PHA BONG KHAR BYON NAS BSNYEN

MTSAMS ZLA BA DGU PA'I BAR BZHUGS, DE NAS SER BYES GRVA TSANG
DU LO MJUG BAR NYAMS LEN KHO NAS DUS 'DA' BAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO ZHE DGU PA ME YOS LOR T'A LA'I 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO'I
MCHOG SPRUL NGOS 'DZIN PA'I DON DU PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG
LHAN

CIG GUNG THANG DU PHEBS NAS NGOS 'DZIN GYI RIM PA TSANG MAR
ZHUGS, DE NAS ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I BAR BCAD RGYA BZHUGS,

DGUNG LO LNGA BCU PA SA 'BRUG LOR ZLA BA DGU PA'I NANG T'A
LA'I SPRUL SKU LUNG RTOGS RGYA MTSO DGUNG LO BZHIR PHEBS PA DE
NYID PO TA

LAR CHIBS KYI KHA LO BSGYUR BAR CHIBS BSUR PHEBS, ZLA DE'I
TSES BCO LNGA NYIN PAR T'A LA'I LUNG RTOGS RGYA MTSO PO TA LAR
PHEBS

NAS SENG KHRIR BZHUGS PAR KHRIR PHEBS KYI LEGS SKYES DNGOS
'BUL RGYA CHEN MDZAD, DGUNG LO NGA BDUN DU PHEBS PA SHING PHAG

LOR ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES BCU DRUG NYIN T'A LA'I LUNG RTOGS
RGYA MTSO DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PA ZHI BAR GSHEGS PAR BRTEN DGONGS

RDZOGS DANG SPRUL SKU MYUR 'BYON SOGS GANG CIR BSLAB STON BCAS
LA 'BAD CING SKABS DER SPYAN MI GSAL BA SOGS SKU GZUGS

THANG PO RANG MED THOG T'A LA'I GSHEGS PAR SKYO NGAL TSAD MED
NGANG NAS SKU'I 'PHROD BZHES SOGS LA 'BAD BZHIN PA'I SKABS DER
DE

@346 MO NO MIN HAN GONG MAS T'A LA'I RGYAL TSAB TU DBANG BSKUR
ZHING DE MO RIN PO CHE'I THUGS KHUR 'OG LCANG SKYAS 'BAD
BRTZON BYAS PAR

BRTEN GONG MA CHEN POS RVA SGRENG DGON PAR ``RVA SGRENG DGE
'PHEL GLING'' ZHES PA'I GSER GYI PAn DANG PHYAG MDZOD BKRA
SHIS 'BYUNG

GNAS LA ``JA PHU T'A BLA MA'' ZHES PA'I CHO LO GNANG BA 'BYOR,
PO TA LAR BYON NAS DE MO NO MIN HAN DANG AAM BAN SOGS CHE DGU

'DZOM PA'I DBUS SU MTSAN SNYAN GO MING DGYES BZHES GNANG,
DGUNG LO NGA BRGYAD DU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME PHO
BYI

BA LO'I ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES BRGYAD NAS BZUNG SNYUN JE ZHAN
DU GYUR TE TSES NYER DRUG GI SNGA DROR ZHI BA MYANG 'DAS KYI
GNAS SU GSHEGS

RJE MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I

RJE BTZUN BLA MA RIN PO CHE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG LAS
MTHA' BRAL DBU MA'I LTA 'KHRID RTEN 'BREL RIGS PA'I YANG
SNYING

RDO RJE'I GZEGS MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 6

MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG RJE BLA MA SKAL LDAN RGYA
MTSO'I GSUNG LAS BSTAN BCOS MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI

GCOD KHRID BZHUGS SO, , (21) 1

RJE SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG LAS DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I YUL
LHA GNYAN CHEN PO SE GU BYA KHYUNG LA BSANG MCHOD 'BUL TSUL

BZHUGS SO, , (22) 2

001052 PAR MA, CA

SHAR SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG MGUR BZHUGS SO, , (1) 210

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RONG BO'I SPRUL SKU SHAR SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO NI, MDO SMAD MTSO
SNGON PO'I PHYOGS SU KA RONG DANG YA RONG SOGS RONG DGU'I CHU

PHRAN RNAMS GCIG TU 'DRES NAS BRGYUD PA'I SA REB KONG GSER
LJONGS SU GRAGS PA'I YUL DU, YAB RONG BO MKHAR 'BUM RGYAL LA

SRAS SPUN MCHED BZHI'I GSUM PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME MO LUG LOR
(1607) BLTAMS, MGAR RTZE SHES RAB NYI MA'I SPRUL SKU YIN

PAR GRAGS, BYIS PA LO BZHI LNGA TZAM NAS SKU MCHED CHOS PA RIN
PO CHE'I MDUN NAS YI GE'I PHYI MO SBYOR KLOG GI DBU BTZUGS DGUNG

LO BDUN PAR DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, DGUNG LO BCU PAR RAB
TU BYUNG, MTSAN SKAL LDAN TSOGS GNYIS GSOL,

DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PA ME SBRUL LOR YAB SRAS LHAN RGYAS DBUS
GTZANG DU PHEBS, DGA' LDAN DGON PAR STAG LUNG BRAG PA MJAL

ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSOR GSOL,
DGUN KHAR BYANG RTZE'I CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, RJE TSUL KHRIMS CHOS

'PHEL DANG GTZANG PA DKA' CHEN BLO GROS RNAM RGYAL GNYIS KYI
MDUN NAS LO GSUM GYI BAR TSAD MA DANG BSDUS GRVA SBYANGS, RGYAL
RONG

MKHAS GRUB BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS BLA MAR BSTEN NAS LO BDUN GYI BAR
DBU MA DANG, 'DUL BA, MDZOD, TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL

ZUR BKOL DANG BCAS PAR NAN TAN GYIS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PA
ME STAG LOR DPAL LDAN GSANG PHUR DKA' BCU'I GRVA SKOR

MDZAD, LO DER LHA SA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU PAn CHEN BLO BZANG
CHOS RGYAN GYI SPYAN SNGAR BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA ZHUS, KHRI
TSUL

KHRIMS CHOS 'PHEL DANG, DVAGS PO BSOD NAMS NYI MA SOGS BLA MA
MANG PO BSTEN NAS CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS PA ZHUS, DGUNG

LO NYER GCIG PA ME YOS LOR RANG YUL DU 'BYON LA NYE BA NA KHONG
GI BSHES GNYEN GTZO BO RGYAL RONG MKHAS GRUB BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS

NAS ``SOG YUL DU MA 'GRO RANG YUL GYI DGON PAR SONG'' ZHES
GDAMS, DE NAS MKHAS GRUB SANGS RGYAS YE SHES KYI SPRUL SKU SOG

YUL DU 'BYON PA DANG 'GROGS TE BYANG LAM BRGYUD MDO SMAD DU LOG
RANG YUL RONG BO'I DGON PAR GCEN PO CHOS PA RIN PO CHE

@353 BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN MJAL ZHING THUGS SNANG
GSHIN PA'I ZHAL MOL MDZAD, RONG BO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGON PAR

PHEBS, KO'U PA CHOS RGYA MTSO'I MDUN GSANG 'DUS KYI DBANG KHRID
SOGS GSAN, GZHAN YANG SDE PA BSTAN 'DZIN BLO BZANG RGYA

MTSO DANG 'DAN MA TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO SOGS DGE BA'I BSHES
GNYEN SUM CU SO GSUM TZAM BSTEN NAS THUN MONG DANG THUN MIN GYI

ZAB CHOS MANG PO GSAN, MDO SMAD KHUL GYI DGON RNYING DANG GNAS
KHYAD PAR CAN DBEN GNAS BYIN RLABS CAN SOGS DGON

GNAS BRGYA PHRAG DU MAR ZHABS KYIS BCAGS TE RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTZON
PAR MDZAD, DGON CHEN MANG POR BSHAD GRVA GSAR

'DZUGS DANG RONG BO BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU DGUNG LO ZHE GNYIS PAR
SGRUB SDE GSAR DU BTZUGS, DGUNG LO ZHE DRUG PA CHU 'BRUG LO
(1652) LA T'A LA'I LNGA PA RGYA NAG TU PHEBS LAM MTSO KHRI GSHOG
RGYAL MO DANG NYE BAR PHO RO CHU 'GAG LA BYON PA MJAL ZHING DER
YUN

RING TZAM BZHUGS PA'I MDUN ZAB CHOS GSAN CING 'BUL BA RGYA CHE
PHUL, DGUNG LO NGA DRUG PA CHU STAG LOR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG

CHOS RGYAN DGONGS PA RDZOGS PAR GSAN PAS SKYO NGAL CHEN POS
DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHE BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO RE GCIG PA ME LUG LOR

DGON PAR TSE DPAG MED KYI LHA SKU STONG BZHENGS PA DANG RTEN
GZHAN DAG KYANG RGYA CHEN PO BZHENGS, DPON JU NANG PAS KHONG GI

MDUN CHOS BKA' MANG PO ZHUS NAS YON BDAG GTZO BOR GYUR, JU NANG
PA'I MA YUM 'DAS MA'I DGONGS RDZOGS LA DMIGS TE GRVA

PA BRGYA THAM PA PHUL, DGON PAR RTEN DANG BRTEN PA GSAR SKRUN
SOGS LA ROGS RAM SHIN TU RGYA CHEN PO GNANG, SPYIR RONG BO

DGON 'DI SNGON RJE DON GRUB RIN CHEN GYI DNGOS SLOB BSAM GTAN
RIN CHEN GYIS GSAR DU BTAB PA YIN YANG DGON RGYA BSKYED DANG

BSHAD GRVA DANG SGRUB GRVA GSAR 'DZUGS RTEN GSAR BZHENGS SOGS
PHAL CHE BA KHONG GI DUS NAS 'PHEL RGYAS BYUNG BA YIN ZHING
SKABS

DER MDO SMAD KHUL GYI DGON PA CHE SHOS KYI GRAS SHIG YIN, DE DUS
BCAD RGYA BYAS NAS MTSAMS BZHUGS MKHAN YANG MANG DUS NYIS

BRGYA RE TZAM YOD PA DANG DE DAG LA KHONG GIS DBANG LUNG KHRID
DANG ZAB CHOS MAN NGAG GNANG BA SOGS CHOS LDAN GYI BYA BA SHA
STAG

MDZAD, LO MANG RING BSHAD GRVA GSAR BTZUGS RNAMS SU 'CHAD NYAN
YUN RING MDZAD DE SLOB MA MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN DPER NA

RGYAL TSAB BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS, BYA BTANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO,
MA nI BA BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO SOGS MANG DU SPEL, T'A LA'I

BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO SA STAG LOR (1578) AA MDOR PHEBS NAS BZUNG
RI BO DGE LDAN PA'I BSTAN PA MDO SMAD DU DBYAR MTSO LTAR

'PHEL BA'I DBU TSUGS, MI RING BAR RGYAL SRAS DON YOD CHOS RGYA
MTSOS SHING 'BRUG LOR (1604) DGON LUNG DGON BTAB PA

DANG DE 'BREL CHU BYI LOR (1612) SKU 'BUM DU CHOS RJE 'OD ZER
RGYA MTSOS GRVA TSANG BTZUGS PA SOGS MDO SMAD YUL GRU MANG POS
DGE

DGON GSAR BTAB DANG BSHAD GRVA GSAR 'DZUGS BYAS SHING KHONG NI
DE'I NANG NUS PA CHEN PO THON MKHAN ZHIG YIN, DE LTAR

BSHAD SGRUB GNYIS KYI SGO NAS BSTAN PA SPEL BA'I BYA BA RGYA
CHEN MDZAD DE DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BZHI PA LCAGS KHYI LO NAS
BZUNG RONG BO

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU SKU MTSAMS DAM POR BCAD, DGUNG LO DON GCIG
PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I ME MO SBRUL GYI LO'I (1677)

ZLA BA BDUN PA'I TSES DRUG GI SKYA RENGS SHAR BA NA GZUGS SKU'I
BKOD PA CHOS DBYINGS SU BSDUS SO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI AA MDO PHYOGS KYI MKHAS PA GONG MA DAG GI RNAM
THAR SNA TSOGS DANG MDO SMAD DU DAM CHOS DAR BA'I LO RGYUS

SDOM PA GSUM GYI RTZA BA DANG YAN LAG GI NYES PA RNAMS KYI 'GREL
BSHAD SOGS POD KA PA NAS NGA PA'I BAR PO TI BZHI NGED DPE MDZOD

KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD CING TSANG MA RONG BO BDE CHEN CHOS 'KHOR
GLING GI PAR MA RED 'DUG

@382 SNYAN SGRON YI GE NGO MTSAR SNANG GSAL BZHUGS SO, , (77)

ZHAL DRO LHA KHANG DGE LEGS RGYA MTSO'I 'BYUNG GNAS BZHUGS SO,
, (79) 2

DKAR CHAG (80) 12

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

KUN DGA' BLO GROS NI, BDAG CHEN NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RIN CHEN
DANG YUM BSOD NAMS DPAL GYI DBANG MO GNYIS

KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA BYA LO (1729) ZLA BA
BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BCU GCIG GI NYI SHAR LA SA SKYA RU SKU
BLTAMS,

MTSAN NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA BLO GROS DU GSOL,
DGUNG GRANGS BDUN PAR YAB LAS YI GE'I PHYI MO 'BRI

KLOG BSLABS, GSUNG NGAG RIN PO CHE LAM 'BRAS BU DANG BCAS PA'I
SMIN GROL DBANG GI DGA' STON THOG MAR MYONG, DGUNG LO

DGUR PHEBS PA ME SBRUL LO PHYAG RDOR 'BYUNG PO 'DUL BYED KYI
GRANGS BSNYEN ZLA BA GCIG BZHUGS SO, , DE LO GCUNG MTHU STOBS

DBANG PHYUG PHYI RGYAL DU PHEBS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PHEBS PA
LCAGS BYA (1741) HOR ZLA DANG PO'I TSES GCIG NAS CHOS GRVA
ZUNG

GI LAS KYI SNE MO BA DANG SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA DU MA'I GTZO BOR
MDZAD, GZHUNG SA CHEN PO SOGS PHYOGS KUN NAS KHRI 'DON KYI LEGS

SKYES 'BUL MKHAN SER SKYA DU MA DANG GZHAN YANG DAD 'DUS KYI
SKYE BO KHRI PHRAG LA NYE BA'I TSOGS KYI DBUS SU GSER KHRI
CHEN POR PHEBS

SKU NA SHIN TU PHRA YANG THUGS ZHUM PA DANG BAG TSA BA'I RNAM
PA GTAN NAS MI MNGA' BA'I NGANG BSTAN BCOS THUB PA DGONGS GSAL

TSANG LA MA NOR BA GSAL DAG SNYAN GSUM GYIS LEGS PAR BSTZAL
BAS SKYE BO DER 'DUS PA RNAMS DGA' SPRO'I GNAS LA SBYAR, DE

NAS MKHAS GRUB BLA MA DAM PA GNAS GSAR RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG
THAR RTZE NAM MKHA' BSAM 'GRUB SOGS SNGA PHYI YONGS 'DZIN BZHI
BCU

KHA LHAG GUS PAS LEGS PAR BSTEN TE GSANG CHEN RDO RJE THEG
PA'I MAN NGAG LAM 'BRAS BU DANG BCAS PA DANG DPAL SA SKYA PA'I

LCAGS RI LAS MI 'DA' BA'I BLA MED DANG 'BREL BA'I GSER CHOS
BCU GSUM CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA NAS 'DUL BA K'A RI KA BAR MDO

SNGAGS KYI LAM YONGS RDZOGS GSAN BZHES GNANG, GZHAN YANG BKA'
BRGYUD RNYING MA DGE LDAN SOGS RIS MED KYI CHOS RGYUN

DBANG GI CHU BO MA NUB CING BYIN RLABS KYI BRGYUD PA MA NYAMS
PAR BRGYUD PA DANG MAN NGAG GI GO RIM MA 'CHOL BAR PHAL CHE BA
GSAN,

RGYAL BA'I BKA' 'GYUR CHEN MO'I LUNG DANG DBU PHAR 'DUL MDZOD
TSAD MA STE BKA' POD LNGA DANG DE'I STENG DU SDOM GSUM BSNAN
PA'I

SA PHYOGS LA POD CHEN RNAM DRUG TU GRAGS PA'I RTZA 'GREL MTHA'
DPYOD SOGS LA SLOB GNYER BGYIS, DA DUNG RNAM THAR LO RGYUS DEB

THER SGRA PA nI PA GSO RIGS RGYUD BZHI SOGS THUN MONG BA'I RIG
GNAS RNAMS LA'ANG GSAN SBYONG MDZAD, THAR RTZE RDO RJE 'CHANG
NAM

MKHA' BSAM 'GRUB LA DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
BZHES, MTSAN NGAG GI DBANG PHYUG KUN DGA' BLO GROS BSTAN PA'I

RGYAL MTSAN GSOL, NYES BYAS PHRA MO TSUN LA BAG YOD KYIS SRUNG
BAR MDZAD, DGUNG GRANGS BCO LNGA PAR CHU PHAG LO DBUS PHEBS

SKABS PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES MJAL 'PHRAD GNANG, SER CAN
DGON DU BZHUGS ZHAG SKABS SDE PAS YAB CHOS DMAR PO

SKOR GSUM GYI BE BUM PO TI SOGS RTEN 'BREL LE'U MTSAN CHE BA'I
'BUL NOR RGYA CHER PHUL, BOD GZHUNG NAS CHIBS BSU BCAS ZLA

BA BCU PA'I TSES GSUM NYIN PO TA LAR GZIM CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL
PAR RGYAL MCHOG BDUN PA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I MDUN DU MJAL

PHYAG PHEBS, PHAN TSUN THUGS SNANG HA CANG GSHIN PAR GYUR,
DE'I SKABS MI DBANG BSOD NAMS STOBS RGYAS DANG D'A LAS YAB

SRAS SOGS SKU DRAG RNAMS LA TSE DBANG BSKUR, GDAN SA CHEN PO
RTZE GDONG RTEN BRTEN PAR BCAS PHYAG TU SON, GSANG PHU NE'U

THOG TSOGS KHANG GSAR BZHES LA PHYAG NAS DANG, 'DUS SDER
BSNYEN BKUR GYA NOM PA BSTAR TE, RTZE SHOD PHEBS SKYEL BA
RNAMS

DANG BCAS LHA LDAN NAS CHIBS BSGYUR GYIS YER LA BRGYUD NA
LENDRA DANG YUM BU BLA MKHAR BCAS SU PHEBS, ZLA LNGA PA'I NANG
GDAN

SAR PHYAG PHEBS TE SPRUL PA'I LHA KHANG CHEN PO'I SHAR NUB
BYANG GSUM GYI SPEN BAD SOGS NYAMS GSO LEGS PAR MDZAD, MI RING

@383 BAR GDAN SA LUGS ZUNG GI MDZAD SGO RNAMS GCUNG MTHU STOBS
DBANG PHYUG LA PHUL, RJE 'DI PA SNGA PHYI KYE RDOR GZHI BSNYEN
ZUNG DU

BZHUGS SHING PHUR PA KUN RIG PHYAG RDOR SOGS LHA MCHOG DU MA'I
BSNYEN BSGRUB MDZAD, 'BUM THANG GTZUG LAG KHANG RTEN BRTEN

PA BCAS NYAMS GSOS DANG GNAM SA BAR GSUM DU MDZES BYED KYI MCHOD
RDZAS DU MA GSAR BSKRUN MDZAD, KHAMS HOR KHOG KHANG

GSAR DPON G-YOG SOGS PHYOGS 'DUS KYI SKYA SER KUN LA DBANG CHOS
'DOD MOS LTAR BSTZAL, THAR RTZE NAM MKHA' BSAM

'GRUB KYI DGONGS RDZOGS BSGRUBS, DGUNG GRANGS NYER BDUN PA SHING
PHAG (1755) LO DBUS SU CHIBS BSKYOD THENGS GNYIS PA

PHEBS, RGYAL BA BSKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO MCHOG DANG BKA' MDA' RTZIS
GSUM SOGS LA TSE DBANG DANG MKHA' SPYOD MA'I BYIN RLABS

SOGS BKA' DBANG CI RIGS BSTZAL, LHA LDAN SPRUL PA'I GTZUG LAG
KHANG CHEN PO DANG BSAM YAS SOGS GNAS GZHI DAM PA

RNAMS LA MCHOD MJAL DANG RAB GNAS SGRUB MCHOD, DBANG CHOS SOGS
SPYI SGER GYI BYA BA RLABS CHEN BSKRUN, RTZE THANG 'BRAS

GLING BRGYUD NAS RIM PAR NGOR AE WAm CHOS LDAN DU PHEBS, CHOS
RGYAL 'PHAGS PA'I THUGS DAM GYI RTEN DNGUL SKU KHYAD 'PHAGS SHIG

'BUL NOD BYUNG BAR YAB KYI GDUNG RTEN NANG GZUNGS SU PHUL, DGUNG
GRANGS NYER DGUR PHEBS PAR RGYAL MCHOG BDUN PA CHEN

PO DANG GCUNG MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG ZHI BAR GSHEGS PAR DGONGS
RDZOGS RGYA CHER BSGRUBS, LCANG SKYA ROL PA'I RDO RJE DANG GNAS

GSAR RDO RJE 'CHANG SOGS MKHYEN LDAN DU MAS GSOL BA BTAB NGOR
DGE TSUL GYI BSLAB PA PHUL TE GOS DKAR LCANG LO CAN GYI RTUL

ZHUGS BZHES, 'DZOM THOG CHOS LUNG RGYAL PO'I SRAS MO GZHON PA
PHUN TSOGS TSE RING GSANG YUM DU BZHES, SPRUL PA'I LHA KHANG

CHEN MO'I LHA CHEN KHYAMS STOD DU GSER DNGUL SOGS RIN CHEN DU MA
LAS GRUB PA'I MCHOD SDONG 'DZAM GLING 'OD GSAL DANG RDO RJE

'CHANG GI GSER SKU SMAN 'DAM LAS GRUB PA'I LHA SKU DU MA PHYOGS
BZHI MCHOD RTEN CHEN PO BZHI, LHA KHANG CHEN MO 'DIS THOG DRANGS

GTZUG LAG KHANG DU MA NYAMS GSO DANG BLA BRE DANG SKU THANG
MCHOD CHAS SKOR SOGS MKHO DGU MA TSANG BA MED PAR SBYOR 'JAGS
MDZAD,

YAB KYI GZIM KHANG RGYA BSKYED DANG DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI
DGON SDE THAMS CAD LA BSNYEN BKUR PHUL, GDUNG SRAS MYUR DU

BYON PA'I RIM GRO BSGRUBS, CHOS LUNG RGYAL PO BSOD NAMS DON GRUB
SRAS DANG BCAS PA MJAL PHYAG BYUNG BAR BKA' DBANG CI

RIGS GNANG RJES RGYAL PO LA ``BOD 'BANGS RNAMS LA GNAS SKABS
DANG MTHAR THUG GI PHAN PA'I THABS KHO NA PHYAG LEN MDZAD

DGOS PA LAS, KHRAL NGAN DANG MNAR GCOD GTAN NAS MA MDZAD'' CES
PHEBS, MTSO KHA NAS GU SHRI RGYAL BRGYUD WANG BSOD

NAMS BSTAN 'DZIN YAB SRAS BTZUN MO SKU TSA BCAS MJAL PHYAG BYUNG
BA LA'ANG SNGAR BZHIN ZHAL BKOD MDZAD SKABS DPON G-YOG

RNAMS DAD PA CHE NAS SMON LAM YANG YANG 'DEBS BZHIN DU LOG

DGUNG GRANGS SO LNGA PAR GSANG YUM PHYI MA SKAL BZANG BDE SKYID
BU KHRID LA GDUNG SRAS 'KHRUNGS PAR BKRA SHIS MNGA' GSOL

MDZAD, GDUNG SRAS PHEBS PA'I GTAM SNYAN PHYOGS KYI BU MO'I RNA
BA LEGS PA RGYAN PA DANG CHAB GCIG GZA' SKAR SHIN TU DGE BA'I

NYIN SRAS KYI MTSAN LA DPAL LDAN CHOS SKYONG DBANG SDUD SNYING
POR GSOL, GSANG YUM PHYI MA LA YANG RJE 'DI DGUNG LO DGU PHEBS

DUS GDUNG SRAS CHUNG BA 'KHRUNGS, DE'I SKABS STOD LA DVAGS RGYAL
PO'I MDZAD PA MI LEGS PAR GSAN PAS LA DVAGS RGYAL BLON

RNAMS LA SNGAR GYI CHOS RGYAL BZHIN BTZAN PO GNYA' NAS GNON
ZHING NYAMS CHUNG MTHA' NAS SKYONG BYA BA LEGS NYES DRANG PO'I
THIG LA

DRANGS TE BDEN PAS PHUGS 'KHYOL BA BYED DGOS RGYU DANG SDE
'BANGS KYI NOR LA HAM ZOS LKOG RNGAN DANG KHRIMS SROL NGAN PAS
MI

SER MNAR GCOD BYAS NA SDE PA SPRANG NA DPON PO PHYUG PAS PHAN PA
MED TSUL SOGS KYI BKA' SHOG LEGS PAR BSTZAL, NANG PO'I

MGON KHANG GSAR BSKRUN DANG BSE MGON YID BZHIN NOR BUR NYAMS GSO
SKABS LAS GRVA PA 'GA' KHANG PA RDIB PA'I RKYEN GYIS SHI

RMAS BYUNG BAR DGE SGRUB DANG SHUL MI THAMS CAD LA CHOS DANG
ZANG ZING GI BDAG RKYEN JI SRID SA SKYA'I BSTAN PA GNAS KYI BAR
DU SBYOR

'JAGS KYI BKA' PHEBS, DGUNG GRANGS BZHI BCU PAR RAB BYUNG BCU
GSUM PA'I SA BYI (1768) GOR shA'I BLON PO SOGS BYUNG

NAS GOR shA RGYAL PO'I YI GE DANG RTEN BCAS 'BYOR BA'I DON,
SNGAR BAL YUL RGYAL KHAMS SU RGYAL KHAG MANG POS BOD KYI RGYAL
BA

YAB SRAS SOGS CHE GNYEN DU MA'I PHYAG MDZOD RNAMS MA RUNGS PAR
BYAS 'DUG KHYAD PAR BAL YUL DU G-YUL 'KHRUGS KHO NA

BGYIS PAS THUGS SUN PA RANG BYUNG SONG, DA CHA GOR shAS BAL YUL
YONGS RDZOGS DBANG DU BSKUR BA LAGS SHING BOD DANG SNGAR

BZHIN LUGS MTHUN YIN PA BZHIN SLAD NAS tAm 'JAL 'U DNGUL SOGS
CHAD MED 'DI BZHIN 'DON RGYU LAGS PAS RGYAL BA YAB SRAS

SOGS LA RGYU MTSAN ZHU RGYU DANG 'DI NAS KYANG 'GRUL PA PHAN
TSUN CHU 'DON 'PHRANG SGROL SOGS BKA' DRIN SKYONG DGOS ZHES
BSHAD,

RJE 'DIS ``NGA RANG GDAN SA GO MTHO BA LAS RGYAL KHAMS GZHAN LA
BKOD PA THUB MKHAN MIN YANG SNYAN 'BUL ZHU 'OS DANG RGYAL KHAMS

BDE THABS LA MI SU YIN RUNG 'GAN RANG BABS YIN PAS HUR BRTZON
BYED RGYU, KHYOD RGYAL BLON RNAMS NAS KYANG DA CHA LUNG PA

THAMS CAD LA G-YUL 'KHRUGS KYI 'O RGYAL MI 'BYUNG ZHING SDE
'BANGS BDE SKYID KYI 'TSO GNAS THUB PA ZHIG MDZOD DANG CHOS SRID
GNYIS

@384 KA'I LAS DON PHUL DU PHYIN PA YIN PAS DE BZHIN DGONGS 'JAGS
MDZOD'' CES BKA' PHEBS, DE NAS MKHAS DBANG ZHE CHEN

DRUNG YIG GDAN DRANGS TE SA SKYA RIG GNAS SLOB GRVA BTZUGS, THOG
MAR SLOB GRVA BA MI BCU DRUG DANG RJES SU DNGOS ZHUGS ZUR

ZHUGS SOGS JE MANG DU SONG, DE DUS GTZANG PHYOGS KYI RIG GNAS
KYI LTE BA LTA BUR GYUR, BAL YUL MCHOD RTEN BYA RUNG KHA SHOR

LA 'DOGS RGYU DRIL CHEN ZHAL BYANG BCAS PA BSKUR, DBUS DANG
KHAMS PHYOGS SU 'BRUM BU'I NAD BYUNG BAR DE DAG SEL BA'I CHED

SMAN DANG MYONG GROL BCAS THABS SNA TSOGS KYIS 'GRO KHAMS BDE
THABS LA BRTZON PA LHUR BZHES GNANG, DE'I SKABS CHAR RLUNG

SOGS GNAM GSHIS SHIN TU GRANG YANG SKU SROG LA MA LTOS PAR SMAN
SGRUB SBYONG KHRUS SOGS NYIN LTAR THOG KHANG DU CHAG MED GNANG

STABS DBUS GTZANG SOGS LA NAD RIMS ZHI BA'I PHAN NUS CHEN PO
BYUNG, 'BRUG CHOS 'KHOR BSOD NAMS PHO BRANG GI RTEN SOGS

LA GZUNGS BZHUGS DANG KHYAD PAR PHYI NANG GI DNGOS PO CHE PHRA
KUN LA SNGAR TSAGS DGOS TSUL PHEBS KYANG, DE DON MA 'GRUB BAR

'BRUG PHYOGS SU ME SKYON CHEN PO BYUNG STE RTEN GAL CHE RNAMS
LHAG MED DU GYUR, DE NAS SPRUL PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU DNGOS
RGYU DANG

BZO KHYAD PHUL DU BYUNG BA'I GSER KHRI GSAR BZHENGS GNANG, GSER
LJANG BRDUNG GI BUM PA DNGUL GYI MAndAL DANG RDZAS BRGYAD SNA

BDUN SOGS MCHOD CHAS SNA TSOGS GSAR BSKRUN GYIS CHOS LUGS LAS
SGO'I THAD LA MDZAD RJES ZLA MED BZHAG 'DI LOR 'BRUG

SDE SRID RNYING PA BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB BOD DU BROS, MTSO SNGON
DZA SAG DGA' LDAN AERWA D'A CHING DANG 'JAM MGON RDO RJE NO MIN

HAN SOGS SOG BOD KYI DPON CHEN MJAL BCAR BYUNG RIGS LA TSE DBANG
SOGS LUGS GNYIS KYI BSLAB BYA LEGS PAR 'DON,

DGUNG GRANGS NGA GCIG PAR LHA SAR THENGS GSUM PA PHEBS, RGYAL
MCHOG SKU PHRENG BRGYAD PAR MJAL PHYAG PHUL, ZLA BA PHYED

GNYIS LHA SAR BZHUGS SO, , LHA SA SPRUL PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG
SOGS MCHOD MJAL DANG DER PHYOGS KYI SKYA SER GYIS BZHED PA

LEGS PA BKANG STE GTZANG DU CHIBS BSGYUR GNANG, PAn CHEN DPAL
LDAN YE SHES ZHING BRJES PAS MCHOG SPRUL MYUR BYON GYI GSOL

'DEBS MDZAD, DE LTAR SKU TSE HRIL POR RIS MED 'GRO BA KUN LA
PHAN BDE SPEL BA'I THABS KHO NA LHUR BZHES MDZAD, RGYUN DU

SDE 'BANGS MIG DANG RNA BA NGAG NAD CAN SOGS MTHONG TZAM NYID
NAS PHYAG GIS REG RGYU MTSAN 'DRI LJAGS SNGAGS DANG SMAN SNA
SOGS

SBYOR BSDEBS KYIS PHAN PAR MDZAD, SKABS 'GAR 'KHYAGS LTOG GIS
MNAR BA'I MI MTHONG SKABS, NGA RANG KHRI MTHON POR ZAS

GOS GYA NOM PA LA LONGS SPYAD NAS BSDAD PA 'DI KAS SEMS CAN LA
PHAN PA MI 'DUG NGAS KHO TSO LA DNGOS SU PHAN PA ZHIG BYED

DGOS GSUNGS TE ZAS GOS DANG SDOD GNAS KYI THABS PHUL BYUNG
MDZAD, CHOS SRID LUGS ZUNG GI GZHI MA RIG GNAS KYI SLOB GRVA

BTZUGS, 'GRO BA'I GNAS SKABS KYI BDE SKYID NI DPON CHEN KHAG GIS
DMANGS LA PHAN GNOD CI BYED LA RAG LAS PAR MKHYEN

NAS DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI 'GO BYED CHE 'BRING CHUNG GSUM
DANG CHOS PHYOGS KYI SA SKYA'I GDAN SA CHEN PO CHOS LUGS KYI
'GAN

KHUR PA RNAMS LA LEGS SPEL NYES 'GOG GI BKA' SLOB YANG YANG
BSTZAL, PHYIN CHAD JI LTAR BYA BA'I BCA' YIG SNA TSOGS SPEL,

SKU TSE HRIL POR 'CHAD NYAN SGOM SGRUB SOGS 'KHOR LO GSUM GYIS
DUS 'DA' BAR GNANG STE GDAN SA CHEN PO SA SKYAR PHYI NANG GI YO

BYAD KUN LA 'DZUGS SKRUN CHEN PO MDZAD THUB MKHAN 'DI 'DRA SNGON
CHAD MA BYUNG BA 'DRA'O, ,

MTHAR DGUNG GRANGS NGA LNGA PAR RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I CHU YOS
(1783) LO ZLA BA LNGA PA'I TSES GNYIS KYI SNGA DROR GZUGS

SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS,

ZHAL SLOB KYANG GDUNG SRAS MCHOG GNYIS DANG THAR RTZE BYAMS PA
KUN DGA' BSTAN 'DZIN DANG SDE DGE SA SKYONG BLA MA 'JAM

DBYANGS MKHYEN BRTZE SOGS MTHA' YAS,

GSUNG CHOS KYANG BRIS MA POD BCU GSUM YOD PAR GRAGS KYANG NGED
DPE MDZOD KHANG LA BCA' YIG DANG SGRUB CHOG NYAMS LEN

SKOR SOGS DRIS MA DPE THUNG POD LNGA BZHUGS YOD, ,

BZHUGS SO, , (6) 41

SAm PU dA'I RGYUD PHYI MA'I RNAM BSHAD,

NAG PO DKYIL CHOG GI THO YIG BZHUGS SO, , (10) 16

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SA CHEN KUN DGA' SNYING PO NI GTZANG STOD GROM PA'I YUL GYI STOD
DU 'KHON DKON MCHOG RGYAL PO'I BTZUN MO CHUNG BA MA GCIG

ZHANG MO'I SRAS SU RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I CHU PHO SPREL LO (1092)
LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, MI RING BAR SKU SKYED SHIN TU MGYOGS SHING, KUN

GYIS MTHONG NA DGA' BAS MTSAN LA KUN DGA' SNYING POR GSOL, NAR
SON PA NA YAB KYI MDUN YI GE SBYOR KLOG DANG, SMAN

RTZIS, SGRA DANG SNYAN NGAG SOGS LA SLOB GNYER GNANG, DGUNG LO
BCU GCIG TU PHEBS PA NA YAB GSHEGS, YUM GYI ZHAL NAS

``NYID KYI YAB KYANG LO TZ'A BA DANG 'BREL BA CHE, KHYOD RANG
YANG LO TZ'A BA GCIG BSTEN NAS CHOS SLOB DGOS, DA LTA KHYOD LO
CHUNG

BAS 'O CAG GI DGON PA MI LCOGS, GDAN SA 'DI BA RI LO TZ'A BA LA
GTAD NA DRAG'' GSUNGS, DE NAS YUM GYI BKA' BZHIN DU

BA RI LO TZ'A BA SPYAN DRANGS TE 'PHRANG DANG BRAG DMAR GNYIS
KYI SDE PA BSDUS NAS, CHOS 'CHAD PA, DGON PA'I 'GRAM 'DING BA,

BA RI BA GDAN SAR BKOD PA RNAMS NYIN GCIG TU GRUB PAR MDZAD, BA
RI LO TZ'A BAS ``KHYOD PHA JO SRAS KYI BU YIN PAS SLOB GNYER

BYED DGOS PA YIN, SLOB GNYER BYED PA LA SHES RAB DGOS, SHES RAB
CAN GYI LHA 'JAM DBYANGS LA BSTEN DGOS'' GSUNGS

TE AA RA PA TZA'I SGRUB THABS GSUNGS, KHONG GIS ZLA BA DRUG TU
BSNYEN MTSAMS LEGS PAR GNANG BAS 'DOD DON GEGS MED DU

GRUB, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR SU RONG LA NGUR SMIG TU BYON,
BZHUGS GNAS BRAG PHUG TU MDZAD DE, DGE BSHES BRANG RI'I

SKU MDUN TU CHOS MNGON PA GSAN, DE'I TSE KHANG MTSES NA YAR
'BROG PA'I GRVA PA GCIG LA 'BRUM NAD BYUNG BA LA, RJE 'DI PA'I

THUGS KYIS MA BZOD NAS NAD G-YOG MDZAD PAS, 'BRUM NAD 'GOS TE
SNYUN GZHI CHEN PO BYUNG, DER MA GCIG ZHANG MOS

GSER LA SOGS PA KHYER NAS SKU MDUN DU PHEBS SKABS, SKU NA GZHON
PA DANG, THAG RING DU SNYUN GZHI THEBS SKABS KYIS

BSHUMS PAS, YUM GYIS ``PHA JO SRAS KYI BU LA SNYING RUS DGOS,
KHYED DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I DBUS SU CHOS LA SLOB GNYER

GNANG NAS SHI NA LEGS PA LAS SEMS PHONGS PA CI YOD'' CES GSUNGS,
DES BSKUL MA CHEN PO BYUNG STE, SA SDE LNGA DANG SDOM RNAM

GNYIS SOGS CHOS BKA' RGYA CHER GSAN PA LA THUGS RUS BLA NA MED
PAR MDZAD, SA SKYAR PHEBS NAS BLA MA BA RI LO TZ'A BA'I MDUN

PHAR PHYIN THEG PA'I SKOR SOGS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS BKA' DU MA
GSAN, RGYA GAR DANG BAL BOD KYI RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS DU MA BSAGS

@391 TE SA SKYAR RNAM RGYAL MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, DE NAS GROM PA
G-YU RTZE SOGS MKHAS GRUB DU MA'I MDUN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB
CHOS

MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, SKABS DER SA SKYA PA'I GROS LA DBANG BA RNAMS
'TSOGS TE, KHONG PHA CHOS SLOB DGOS PA'I GROS BTON

THOG MYUR BAR PU HRANG PA'I SKU MDUN DU PHEBS KYANG, PU HRANG PA
GSHEGS ZIN LA, DE'I SLOB MA 'KHON SGYID CHU BA DGRA LHA

'BAR 'DI MKHAS PAR YANG GRAGS, RUS KYANG GCIG PAS KHONG GI MDUN
LA PHEBS RGYUR TSANG MAS GROS THAG BCAD, DER KYEE RDO

RJE SOGS BKA' LUNG DU MA GSAN, KHONG LA SLOB MA MKHAS GRAS
BRGYAD CU YOD PA'I NANG NAS RJE 'DI YON TAN PHUL DU BYUNG ZHING
ZHI

DUL BAG YOD LDAN PA, SNYING RUS LHAG PAR CHE BA SOGS KYIS THUGS
GTZIGS CHEN PO MDZAD, MAR PA'I SLOB MA MES STON TSON PO

DANG BLA MA SE PA'I ZHABS LA GTUGS, RGYUD BZHI'I BSHAD PA DANG,
LAM 'BRAS SKOR SOGS GSAN, BA RI LO TZ'A BAS GDAN SA

LO BRGYAD MDZAD NAS KHONG LA GDAN SA GTAD DE LO TZ'A BA BAR PHUG
TU SKU GSHEGS SO, RJE 'DI PAS DUS DE NAS SPYIR SANGS RGYAS KYI

BSTAN PA DANG KHYAD PAR SA SKYA PA'I BSTAN PA SPEL BA'I PHYIR DU
GDAN SAR BZHUGS NAS MDO RGYUD KYI 'CHAD NYAN RGYUN MI CHAD PAR

MDZAD, GZHAN YANG RANG NYID KYIS DAM CHOS 'CHAD SPEL GNANG BA MA
ZAD, GRUB MTHA' GZHAN DANG, SA CHA GZHAN DU

BZHUGS PA'I MKHAS GRUB MANG DAG CIG SA SKYAR GDAN DRANGS TE,
'CHAD NYAN GNANG DU BCUG NAS RIG PA'I GNAS LNGA'I GZHI RTZA

TSUGS PAR MDZAD, SKABS SHIG TU BLA MA SGYI CHU BA GDAN 'DREN
DGOS DGONGS KYANG, SGYI CHU BA SKU GSHEGS NAS GDAN DRANGS MA

THUB, BLA MA DE'I ZHAL CHEMS SU ``KHYED RAB TU BYUNG LA 'KHON
TSO'I SDE 'DI SKYONGS'' ZHES GSUNGS 'DUG KYANG, GNAM KHA'U PAS

RAB TU BYUNG MA BCUG YIN NA'ANG 'KHON TSO'I DPON GYI KHUR BZHES
GNANG, PHYIS BLA MA MAL GYI MDUN BYON NAS GSER SRANG

BCU BDUN PHUL BAS, BLA MAS MGON PO'I SGRUB THABS RJES GNANG MAN
NGAG BCAS PA GNANG BAR MA ZAD, MGON PO'I SGRUB

RTEN DAR NAG DANG, LCAGS KYI RDO RJE RTZE DGU PA GCIG BSE 'BAG
NAG PO 'PHUR SHES SOGS GNANG, DE DAG BSNAMS NAS

SA SKYAR TSUR PHEBS, LHO STOD KYI BLA MA PU HRANG LO CHUNG BAS
BRAM ZE MCHOG SRED KYI PUR SOL LA RANG BYON DU 'KHRUNGS PA'I
SENG MGON

YID BZHIN NOR BU'ANG RJE 'DI LA GNANG, RTEN 'DI GNYIS NI PHYIS
SU DPAL SA SKYA DGON GYI NANG RTEN GAL CHE SHOS SU GYUR, DE

NAS BLA MA SE'I SLOB MA ZHANG STON GYI SKU MDUN DU PHEBS, KHRAB
GCIG PHYAG RTEN DU PHUL NAS GSUNG NGAG RIN PO CHE LAM 'BRAS BU

DANG BCAS PA DBYAR DGUN BZHI LHAG TZAM DU ZHUS, GDAMS NGAG MA
LUS PA THUGS KYI BUM PAR BYON, MTHAR MI LO BCO BRGYAD BAR

GZHAN DU BSGRAGS MI CHOG PA'I BKA' RGYAS BSDAMS, LO BCO BRGYAD
SONG BA DANG, BLA MA AA SENG GI LAM 'BRAS KHUNGS CHOD NAS

RJE SA CHEN LA GSUNG NGAG RIN PO CHE GSUNG BAR GSOL BA BTAB,
RTEN 'BREL LEGS PAR 'GRIGS STABS, TSE GCIG LA 'TSANG

RGYA BA'I GDAMS MCHOG GSUNG NGAG RIN PO CHE LAM 'BRAS BU DANG
BCAS PA'I CHOS KYI SGO THOG MAR PHYES TE, LAM 'BRAS DON BSDUS

MA ZHES PA DE YI GE'I THOG TU BKOD PAR MDZAD, DE NAS RIM BZHIN
JE MANG DU SPEL, RJE 'DI PAS SNGA PHYI LAM 'BRAS LA 'GREL PA

RGYAS BSDUS BCU GCIG MDZAD, GUNG THANG DU BYON PA'I TSE SKU LA
SNYUN BYUNG YANG SMAN GSOL PAS DVANGS, G-YAS RU GRONG CHUNG

DGON SAR BYON SKABS NAD RO LANGS NAS ZLA BA GNYIS TZAM RING
BSNYUNG BAS CHOS THAMS CAD BRJED, 'DRI SAR GROGS PO YANG

MED, RGYA GAR DU PHYIN BSAM YANG JI 'DRA YIN CHA RGYUS MED
STABS, SA SKYAR BYON NAS BZHUGS SHAG RNYING PA'I NANG SKU MTSAMS

BZHUGS SO, , RIM PAR THABS DU MAR BRTEN NAS SNGAR BZHIN MDO
SNGAGS KYI DON MA LUS PA SLAR YANG GSAL BAR MKHYEN,

SKABS SHIG NA BLA CHEN STAG TSA DANG BON NAG RE BA 'DZU GU GNYIS
KYIS PHRAG DOG GI BSAM PAS, RJE 'DI PA'I SKU SROG LA GNOD PA

BYED MKHAN KHAMS 'DAN MA NAS 'ONG BA'I MI RDO RJE RGYAL ZER BA
MNGAGS, DES RJE ZHAL MJAL DUS 'DI SKAD SMRAS, ``BDAG SKYES SA

KHAMS NAS YIN, STOD PHYOGS SU PHYIN NAS LO DU MA SONG, DA LAM
KHYOD KYI SNYAN PA THOS NAS MJAL DU 'ONGS PA LAGS SO'' ZHES

RDZUN SMRAS NAS, RE ZHIG SKU 'KHOR GYI TSUL DU BSDAD KHUL BYAS
TE RJE SA CHEN DGRONG RGYU'I ZHE NGAN 'CHANG, SA CHEN GYI SKU
YON DANG

MDZAD SPYOD BZANG PO LA BZLOG TU MED PA'I DAD PA SKYES NAS, BSAM
NGAN GYI BYA BA LA 'GYOD BSHAGS PHUL, DE NAS PHYIR LOG

NAS STAG TSA DANG BON NAG GNYIS LA RJE SA CHEN BKRONGS ZIN PA'I
GTAM BSHAD DE, KHO TSO'I NYE GNAS BYAS, ZLA BA GCIG KHA MA

LONGS PAR NYER DGU'I NUB MOR MI NGAN GNYIS KA BSAD DE, SLAR YANG
SA CHEN GYI SKU MDUN DU PHYIN NAS ZHABS ZHU BSGRUBS, BLA

MA CHEN PO 'DI NYID LA GDUNG SRAS BSOD NAMS RTZE MO SKU MCHED
RNAMS PHEBS, SKU TSE HRIL POR 'CHAD NYAN SGOM SGRUB KYIS DUS

'DA', DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN NYI SHU KHA LHAG BSTEN, GANGS RI'I
KHROD DU DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA ZHES SNYAN PA'I BA DAN PHYOGS

BCUR G-YO BA YANG, RJE 'DI NYID KYI BKA' DRIN LAS BYUNG, GZHAN
YANG SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN DANG GTZUG LAG KHANG MANG PO

BZHENGS, DGUNG LO NYI SHU RAB BYUNG GNYIS PA'I LCAGS YOS LO
(1111) NAS DRUG CU RTZA BDUN PA RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SA PHO STAG

LO'I BAR GDAN SAR LO ZHE BRGYAD BZHUGS SO, , CHOS LUGS KYI BYED
SGO RGYA CHER SPEL BAR BRTEN, GSUNG CHOS KYANG SDE DGE'I

@392 PAR MA LDEB RING POD GNYIS YOD PA CHA TSANG 'DIR BZHUGS
YOD, CHOS DANG RIGS KYI SRAS SU GYUR PA DPAL LDAN BSOD NAMS RTZE

MO DANG, YUL GRU GZHAN NAS BYON PA'I SENGGA LA'I AA TZA RA SOGS
MKHAS GRUB KYI SLOB MA MANG DU SPEL, DE LTAR BSHAD SGRUB LAS
GSUM

GYIS BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'DZIN MA'I KHYON KUN TU SPEL TE, RAB
BYUNG GSUM PA'I SA PHO STAG GI LO (1158) ZLA BA DGU PA'I TSES

BCU BZHI LA GZUGS SKU ZHI DBYINGS SU MNAL BA'I TSUL MDZAD DO, ,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SA CHEN BSOD NAMS RTZE MO NI YAB SA CHEN KUN DGA' SNYING POS YUM
GNYIS KHAB TU BZHES PAR CHE BA MA GCIG 'OD LDAN LA

SRAS GSUM 'KHRUNGS PA'I CHE BA YIN, KHONG NI RAB BYUNG GNYIS
PA'I CHU KHYI LO (1142) YAB DGUNG LO NGA GCIG PAR PHEBS SKABS

DPAL LDAN SA SKYAR SKU 'KHRUNGS, DGUNG LO GSUM LA PHEBS PAR YAB
LAS RDO RJE THEG PA'I RGYUD 'GREL SOGS BKA' DBANG CI

RIGS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR SPYI LO (1159) RAB BYUNG GSUM
PA'I SA MO YOS KYI LO'I BAR MDO SNGAGS RIGS GNAS

DANG BCAS PA GSAN SBYANGS GNANG BAS MKHAS PA'I GO 'PHANG BRNYES,
RGYUD SDE SNOD BCU BZHI THUGS THOGS NAS GSUNGS STABS,

CHU BO GANGGA TSUN CHAD RDO RJE THEG PA MTHA' DAG LA MKHAS PA'I
SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB, SLAR YANG GNON PA'I KHUR RANG GI GCUNG
RJE

BTZUN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PHEBS PA LA GTAD
NAS ``KHYOD SA SKYAR SDOD LA YAB CHOS KYI BSHAD PA GYIS''

GSUNGS NAS, RANG NYID DBUS PHYOGS GSANG PHU NE'U THOG TU CHA PA
CHOS KYI SENG GE'I MDUN LO BCU GCIG MA ZIN TZAM DU BZHUGS

SO, ,PHAR PHYIN DANG TSAD MA SOGS CHOS BKA' RGYA CHEN GSAN BZHES
GNANG, MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS PA LA GZHAN

DRING MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA THOB, GSER GYI GAN JI RA DANG YUM
RGYAS PA SOGS BLA MA LA DNGOS PO RGYA CHER PHUL, CHA PA'I SLOB

MA'I GRAS SENG CHEN BRGYAD DANG SENG 'DRA BRGYAD JO SRAS BZHI
ZHES GRAGS PA'I NANG NAS 'KHON JO SRAS RTZE MO ZHES SLOB DPON
DANG

MCHED GROGS KUN GYIS MGRIN GCIG TU BKUR ZHING RTZIS CHE BAR
MDZAD, DE NAS DGUNG LO NYER DRUG BZHES PA ME MO PHAG GI LOR

(1167) NA LA RTZE'I GNAS PO CHE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU CHOS LA
'JUG PA'I SGO ZHES BYA BA'I BSTAN BCOS MDZAD, DE'I NANG DU

BSTAN PA'I RTZIS KYI RNAM GZHAG KYANG ZHAL GSAL MDZAD, DGUNG LO
NYER BRGYAD BZHES PA'I TSE GZIMS KHANG RNYING MAR LAM 'BRAS

DANG SLOB TSOGS DU MA LA ZAB CHOS GANG LA GANG DGOS KYIS BZHED
PA SKONG BAR GNANG, DE'I DUS GSANG PHU NA NA BZA' PHU DUNG 

CAN BZHES PA LA LUNG RIGS 'DI BAS MKHAS SHING RTZOD PA BZANG BA
MED PAR GRAGS SO, ,

LEGS BSHAD RTZOM PA'I CHOS KYI RNAM GRANGS YANG BSTOD PA SPRING
YIG RGYUD SDE SPYI'I RNAM GZHAG SOGS MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG

'GREL CHOS TSAN SO GNYIS DANG, BRDA SPROD SKOR BYIS PA BDE 'JUG
SOGS TSIG DON SDEB SBYOR BRLING LA GO BDE BA KHUNGS THUB PA

YIN PAR MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS YI RANGS 'BUL BA'I GNAS SU BZHUGS
YOD, MDOR NA MKHAS PA'I BYA BA RNAM GSUM GYIS BSTAN

PA DANG BOD KYI RIG GNAS RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I PHYAG LEN GNANG,
GDAN SA LO GSUM MDZAD, DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PHEBS PA RAB

BYUNG GSUM PA'I CHU STAG LO (1182) ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BCU
GCIG LA GZUGS SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS SO, ,

ZHAL SLOB KYI GTZO BO GCUNG RJE BTZUN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN DANG
RMOG STON SOGS DU MA SPEL LO, ,

GDUNG THAL LAS GRUB PA'I MCHOD RTEN SOGS 'GRO BA'I DAD RTEN DU
BZHUGS SHING, KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM YANG SDE DGE PAR MA

POD GSUM CHA TSANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD, ,

@397 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@398 *, ,SA SKYA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

000349 PAR MA, CHA

DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA THAMS CAD KYI GSUNG GI GSANG BA 'DZIN PA RJE

YE SHES RDO RJE LA GNANG BA'I NYAMS DBYANGS BZHUGS SO, ,

SGRUB PA NYAMS SU LEN TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,

RANG LA RANG GIS BSKUL BA BZHUGS SO, ,

NYAMS DBYANGS CHEN MO BZHUGS SO, ,

@409 GSO DPYAD RGYAL PO'I DKOR MDZOD BZHUGS SO, , (13) 84

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SA SKYA GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN NI YAB SA CHEN KUN DGA' SNYING PO
DANG, YUM MA GCIG 'OD SGRON GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG

GSUM PA'I ME YOS (1147) LO ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BCO BRGYAD
LA SKU BLTAMS, DGUNG LO BRGYAD NAS BCU GNYIS BAR YAB

KYI DRUNG DU GSAN SBYONG GNANG, DGUNG GRANGS BRGYAD KYI DUS
BYANG SEMS ZLA BA RGYAL MTSAN MDUN NAS TSANGS SPYOD DGE BSNYEN
GYI

SDOM PA BZHES, DGUNG LO BCUR SON SKABS SDOM PA NYI SHU PA DANG,
SGRUB THABS MTSO SKYES GSAN CHUD MDZAD PA MA ZAD, BCU

GNYIS PAR SON PA DANG GDUL BYA GZHAN LA 'CHAD SPEL GNANG BAS,
KUN GYIS <<BLO GROS CHEN PO>> ZHES MTSAN BTAGS, DGUNG

LO BCU GNYIS PA'I MJUG LA YAB GSHEGS, BCU GSUM PHEBS PA'I DUS SU
RANG GI GCEN BSOD NAMS RTZE MOS SA SKYA'I GDAN

SAR BSKO BZHAG BSTZAL, DE NAS BZUNG SLOB DPON BSOD NAMS RTZE MO
SOGS MKHAS GRUB KYI DAM PA DU MAR GUS PAS BSTEN TE,

KYE RDO RJE RTZA RGYUD SOGS MDO SNGAGS KYI DBANG LUNG DU MA GSAN
BSAM MDZAD, KHONG SKU CHUNG DUS NAS BZUNG DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN

DE DAG LA GUS PAS NYE BAR BSTEN, CI GSUNGS BKA' BZHIN BSGRUBS,
THA NA KYAL KA'I PHYIR YANG GSUNG MI BZLOG DE LTAR

DAM PA DE DAG LA BSTEN NAS NYIN MTSAN DBYER MED DU SHES BYA'I
GNAS LA SBYONG BA LHUR BZHES GNANG, NYE 'KHOR GRVA SLOB RNAMS

KYIS MTHONG TSUL LA'ANG, YANG NA THUGS DAM MDZAD, YANG NA GZHUNG
LUGS LA GZIGS, YANG NA CHOS 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD PA

LAS RNAM G-YENGS DANG DON MED DU BZHUGS PA SUS KYANG MTHONG MA
MYONG BAR GRAGS, DE NAS MI RING BAR GZHUNG LUGS RAB

'BYAMS KUN LA DPYIS PHYIN PA'I GO BA TSUGS, ZHAL NAS 'DI LTAR
GSUNGS PAR GRAGS TE, ``NGA THOS RGYA CAN MA YIN YANG,

MTHONG RGYA CAN YIN, BKA' SDE SNOD KYI CHOS LA MA BLTAS PA MED''
GSUNGS SO, ,SKU TSE PHAL CHE BAR LOG PAR SMRA BA'I PHYOGS RNAMS

CHOS DANG MTHUN PA'I SGO NAS TSAR BCAD, GDUL BYA SLOB MA RNAMS
LA GANG LA GANG 'DOD KYI MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS DANG BCAS

PA'I GDAMS PA RGYA CHER BSTZAL, GANG GSUNGS PA'I CHOS DE DAG
KYANG TSIG DAG PA DON GSAL BA GSUNG SNYAN PAS KHRID SKABS,

SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS DON DKA' TSEGS MED PAR RTOGS PA NI RJE 'DI
PA'I KHYAD CHOS BLA NA MED PA YIN, DE LTAR 'CHAD NYAN BGYIS

PAS DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM DU MKHAS PA'I SNYAN GRAGS KYIS KHYAB
BO, ,ZHAL SLOB GCUNG PO BGUG SHI JO 'BUM, MI NYAG RGYAL

RGOD KYI BLA MCHOD LA MNGAGS, BLA BRE SHA BA MA SOGS 'BUL NOR
RGYA CHER BYUNG, DBU RTZE RNYING MAR GRAGS PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG

CHEN PO BZHENGS, MKHON DKON MCHOG RGYAL PO'I NANG RTEN GSER GYI
GDUNG KHANG DANG, RJE SA CHEN GYI NANG RTEN BKRA SHIS SGO

MANG, GCUNG GI NANG RTEN GSER SKU RNAMS KHYAD 'PHAGS GSAR
BZHENGS MDZAD, DE DAG GI DRUNG DU MCHOD ME MTSAN THUB BRGYA

RTZA DANG, GDUGS RGYAL MTSAN SOGS YO BYAD DU MAS BKANG, PHUL DU
PHYIN PA'I GSER GYIS BRIS PA'I BKA' 'GYUR CHEN MO

BZHENGS, GSER DNGUL LAS BZHENGS PA'I 'BUM CHA SUM BRGYA LHAG PA
BYUNG BA LA, CHA BRGYA LHAG GTZUG LAG KHANG DU BZHAG

'PHROS RNAMS BSTAN PA RGYAS PA'I PHYIR DU RIS MED KYI DGON SDE
DANG DGE BSHES RNAMS KYI PHYAG TU 'BUL, SA SKYA LA DGE 'DUN

BRGYA PHRAG RE'I SGRUB MCHOD BTZUGS, PHYAG TU NOR GANG BYUNG BA
DES RTEN BZHENGS DANG DBUL PHONGS RNAMS LA SBYIN GTONG MDZAD,

SKU GSHEGS DUS NA BZA' PHRUGS GCIG LAS GSER TIL 'BRU TZAM DANG,
YO BYAD BRE GANG RI BA MA BZUNG BAR GZHAN PHAN KHO NA

LHUR BZHES GNANG BA 'DIS BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' YIN PAR MNGON SUM
DU MTSON THUB, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PAR PHEBS DUS

GCEN BSOD NAMS RTZE MO SKU GSHEGS, DGONGS RDZOGS SOGS LEGS PAR
PHUL, SKU TSE HRIL POR 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM DANG

THOS BSAM SGOM GSUM GYIS SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA DANG BOD MI
DMANGS KYI LA NYE LA GZIGS TE, DPAL SA SKYA'I GDAN SA DGUNG

GRANGS BCU GSUM NAS BDUN CU'I BAR LO LNGA BCU RTZA BDUN BAR DU
MDZAD PA DANG, YANG GDUNG RABS 'GA' ZHIG NA DGUNG LO

NYER DRUG PA NAS BDUN CU'I BAR LO ZHE LNGA GDAN SA MDZAD PAR
YANG 'KHOD 'DUG GANG LTAR YANG CHOS DANG SRID KYI BYA BA GANG

THAD NAS PHAN PA LHUR BZHES GNANG, LUNG RTOGS KYI BSTAN PA NYAMS
PA SOR CHUD DANG MI NYAMS GONG 'PHEL CHED DU RLABS CHEN

GYIS BOD 'DIR MDZAD RJES BLA NA MED PA BZHAG YOD, MTHAR DGUNG LO
BDUN CU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I ME PHO BYI BA'I LO

@410 (1216) ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES BCU GNYIS LA RE ZHIG ZHING
'DIR SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS SO, ,

LEGS PAR BSHAD PA'I BSTAN BCOS BRTZAMS PA YANG, THUN MONG MA YIN
PAR LAM 'BRAS BRGYUD PA'I GSOL 'DEBS

DANG, BRTAG GNYIS 'GREL PA SOGS DU MA DANG, THUN MONG BA SPYOD
'JUG GI SA BCAD, SMAN DPYAD RGYAL PO'I DKOR MDZOD,

SMRA SGO MTSON CHA'I MCHAN 'GREL, 'JAM DPAL DPA' BO GCIG SGRUB
KYI DPE BRIS SOGS CHOS TSAN BRGYA DANG BCU BZHI LHAG MDZAD,

GSUNG RTZOM DE DAG KYANG TSIG GI SDEB SBYOR LHUR BZHES MA GNANG
BAR DON GSAL BAR BSHAD PA KHO NA LHUR BZHES STABS, GO BDE

ZHING GO RIM MA 'CHOL BAS MKHAS PA RNAMS KYI YID DBANG MED DU
'PHROG PA'I BSTAN BCOS SHA STAG YIN,

THUGS SRAS KYI SLOB BU YANG, SA SKYA PAndI TA KUN DGA' RGYAL
MTSAN DANG DBANG PHYUG GRAGS PA SOGS MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN

DANG, RGYA BOD NA SKAD GRAGS CHE BA'I SLOB MA MANG DU SPEL,

GSUNG RTZOM YANG KHYON SDE DGE'I PAR MA LDEBS RING POD BZHI CHA
TSANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD,

@411 *, ,SA SKYA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN GYI GSUNG 'BUM, ,

000353 PAR MA, THA

PHYOGS THAMS CAD LAS RNAM PAR RGYAL BA CHEN PO 'JAM MGON SA SKYA
PA PAndI TA KUN DGA' RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO'I

RAB TU GSAL BA ZHES BYA BA'I BSTAN BCOS

DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PAndI TA CHEN PO'I RNAM PAR THAR PA BZHUGS SO,
, (12) 12

BRTAG PA GNYIS PA'I BSDUS DON RJE BTZUN GYIS MDZAD PA LA SA PAn
GYIS CUNG ZAD BCOS PA BZHUGS SO, , (13) 18

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

DRI MED 'KHON GYI RIGS RGYUD GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GYI GCUNG DPAL
CHEN 'OD PO LA MA GCIG GAR PHU MA NYI KHRI LCAM KHAB TU

BZHES PA LA SRAS GNYIS 'KHRUNGS PA'I CHE BA SA PAn KUN DGA'
RGYAL MTSAN YIN, YAB DGUNG LO SO GSUM PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG

GSUM PA'I CHU PHO STAG GI LO (1182) ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES NYER
DRUG LA SKU BLTAMS, MTSAN DPAL LDAN DON GRUB GSOL, SKU

SHIN TU GZHON PA'I DUS NAS YAB KYI DRUNG DU 'BRI KLOG DANG GSANG
SNGAGS KYI DBANG KHRID MAN NGAG DU MA ZHUS SHING GSO BYED KYI
GZHUNG

MAN NGAG 'GA' ZHIG KYANG GSAN, SHES BYA'I GNAS KUN LA THOGS MED
DU 'JUG PA'I MKHYEN RAB KYI GTER BRDOL, GTZO BOR

@419 RJE BTZUN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS
SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MTHA' DAG BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL GYIS GSAN
CING GSO

BYED SKOR YANG YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I RTZA 'GREL SOGS GSAN, RTEN
DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS, MTSAN KUN DGA' RGYAL

MTSAN ZHES PA GNANG, DGUNG GRANGS BCO LNGAR PHEBS PA'I DUS SU
YAB MES KYI CHOS MA LUS PA THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN KHU STON MDUN BYAMS
CHOS SDE LNGA DANG TSAD MA KUN BTUS SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO

NYI SHU PAR GTZANG NYANG STOD RKYANG THUR DU PHEBS NAS MTSUR
STON GZHON NU SENG GE LA TSAD MA RNAM NGES KYI BSTAN BCOS CHA
TSANG GSAN,

DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR GTZANG CHU MIG RING MOR KHA CHE'I PAn
CHEN SH'AKYA SHRI MJAL, DGYES GUS CHEN POS TSAD MA CHOS MCHOG

GSAN, YAB SNYUN GYIS ZIN PAR BRTEN CHU MIG RING MO NAS YAR SA
SKYAR BYON, SKABS DER YAB DPAL CHEN 'OD PO DGUNG LO NGA

BZHIR PHEBS PA CHU PHAG LO (1203) ZLA BA LNGA PA'I TSES GCIG
NYIN DUS KYI CHOS NYID DU GSHEGS, YAB DRIN CAN SKU GSHEGS PA LA

THUGS SKYO BA TSAD MED MDZAD, YAB KYI RJES SU DGE RDZOGS KYI BYA
BA RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, LO DER DBYAR CHOS PA MANG DU BYUNG BA

RNAMS LA RNAM NGES DBU NAS CHOS MTHUN GCIG DANG, GZHAN DON LE'U
NAS CHOS MTHUN GCIG BTZUGS TE NYIN RE LA CHOS THUN

GNYIS RE BSHAD PAS ZLA BA GCIG LA RNAM NGES TSAR GCIG GSUNGS,

DGUNG GRANGS NYER LNGAR PHEBS PA NA LO STON RDO RJE DBANG PHYUG
GIS BZHENGS PA'I NYANG SMAD RGYAN GONG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU PAn

CHEN SH'AKYA SHRIS MKHAN PO MDZAD SPYI BO LHAS PAS LAS SLOB DON
MO RI PAS GSANG STON MDZAD DE DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSO LTA BU'I DBUS
SU

BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS PAR MDZAD DO, ,LO DER SLOB DPON DE'I MDUN DU
SGRA'I BSTAN BCOS SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I STOD DANG TSAD MA RNAM

'GREL TSAD MA KUN BTUS SOGS TSAD MA'I SKOR DANG 'DUL BA DANG
PHAR PHYIN SOGS MDO CHOS MANG PO GSAN, MDOR NA KHA CHE PAn

CHEN SH'AKYA SHRI NI KHONG GI SLOB DPON GTZO BO YIN PAS PAndI TA
RAB BYUNG GSUM PA'I SHING BYI LO (1204) LA BOD DU BYON NAS RAB
BYUNG

BZHI PA'I SHING KHYI LO (1214) BAR BOD DU LO BCU GCIG BZHUGS
RING SGRA DANG TSAD MA 'DUL MNGON MDO SDE'I SKOR GYI ZAB CHOS

RNAMS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL GYIS GSAN TE SGRA TSAD MDO CHOS KUN
LA MKHAS PA'I RTZER SON, BAL PO'I PAndI TA SAM BHA SHRI'I MDUN

DU SGRA K'A TZAN DBYANGS GSUM SNYAN NGAG ME LONG MA SDEB SBYOR
DANG MNGON BRJOD GTAN TSIGS RIG PA SOGS THUN MONG GI RIG GNAS

MANG PO GSAN CING BOD SKAD DU'ANG 'GA' ZHIG BSGYUR, RI MO DANG
LHA SKU'I CHAG TSAD DANG, YIG GZUGS SNA TSOGS, NOR BU

DANG SA BRTAG PA SOGS BRTAG PA SNA TSOGS BCAS BZO YI GNAS KUN LA
MKHYEN PA RAB TU RGYAS SHING SA CHEN KUN DGA' SNYING PO'I

NANG RTEN DBU RTZE RNYING MA NANG BZHUGS PA'I 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS
KYI SKU GZUGS LA RU SHING DANG SPRA BZO SOGS RANG NYID SKU NGO
MAS

MDZAD PAR MA TSAD RTZA RGYUD NAS BSHAD PA'I BRIS SKU'I BKOD PA
CHA TSANG DAR DKAR PO'I NGOS LA BRIS PA DANG DPAL BSAM YAS KYI

GTZUG LAG KHANG GI BYANG NGOS SU 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU BRNYAN NGO
MTSAR CAN PHYAG BRIS MDZAD PA SOGS PHYAG RJES MANG DU BZHAG CING

CHAG TSAD KYI BSTAN BCOS KYANG BRTZAMS,

TSAD MA'I BSTAN BCOS RGYA GZHUNG YOD TSAD GZIGS TE ZHIB DPYAD
MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD CING, DE DAG GI SNYING PO MA LUS PA

GCIG TU BSDUS TE DON RTOGS SLA LA TSIG SDEB LEGS PA BOD RANG GI
KHYAD CHOS DANG LDAN PA'I TSAD MA'I BSTAN BCOS <<TSAD MA RIG

GTER>> RANG 'GREL DANG BCAS PA BRTZAMS, RGYA GAR NAS BOD DU YONG
NAS NANG PA'I BSTAN PA LA RGOL BAR BYED PA'I MU STEGS

PA'I STON PA 'PHROG BYED DGA' BO SOGS RTZOD PA'I SGO NAS SUN
PHYUNG STE NANG PA'I BSTAN PAR BKOD, RGYA BOD KUN TU MA H'A
PAndI

TA'I MTSAN SNYAN THOB, DBU GDUGS BCU GSUM THOB PAR GRAGS,

RIG GNAS CHUNG BAR GRAGS PA'I SKOR LA SNYAN NGAG <<MKHAS PA'I
KHA RGYAN>> MNGON BRJOD <<TSIG GI GTER>> SDEB SBYOR <<ME TOG

CHUN PO>> ZLOS GAR <<RAB DGA'I 'JUG PA>><<ROL MO'I BSTAN BCOS>>
SOGS TSIG SNYAN 'JEBS LDAN LA DON SNYING BCUD BSDUS PA

MANG PO BRTZAMS SHING 'CHAD SPEL YANG MDZAD DE SKABS DER RIG
GNAS PA SHIN TU DKON PA'I DUS SU BOD KYI RIG GNAS SPYI'I RMANG

GZHI GSAR DU BTING, KHYAD PAR LUGS GNYIS KYI BLANG DOR TSUL
BZHIN 'BYED PA'I BSTAN BCOS <<LEGS BSHAD RIN PO CHE'I

GTER>> ZHES BYA BA DENG SANG 'DZAM GLING YONGS SU SNYAN GRAGS
KYIS KHYAB PA DE BRTZAMS PAS BOD KYI CHOS SRID KYI BYA BAR LEGS
NYES

'BYED PA'I BLO MIG GSAR DU PHYE ZHING MI RNAMS JI LTAR 'TSO BA'I
SKOR LA SLOB STON BYED PA'I SLOB DPON DANG MED THABS MED PA'I

'TSO BA'I SLOB DEB GCIG TU GYUR, DPAL BSAM YAS KYI BTZAN PO
SH'AKYA MGON GYIS KHONG GDAN DRANGS TE BSAM YAS KYI GDAN

SAR BZHUGS SU GSOL, K'A MA LA SH'I LA'I GSER KHRIR BZHUGS NAS
'CHAD NYAN RGYA CHER MDZAD CING BSTAN PAR BYI DOR DANG,

GYANG LDEBS NGOS SU 'JAM DBYANGS KYI SKU BRNYAN PHYAG BRIS
MDZAD, SNGON GYI CHOS RGYAL RNAMS LA BSNGAGS PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD
PA

BRTZAMS, DE NAS BZUNG BSAM YAS KYI GDAN SA SA SKYA NAS 'DZIN PA
ZHIG BYUNG BAR MNGON, DGUNG LO RE GCIG PA CHU STAG LOR

@420 (1242) BLA MA'I BKA' LTAR SNGON 'GRO'I CHOS 'KHOR CHEN PO
BSKOR, RE GNYIS PA CHU YOS LOR (1243) HOR RGYAL GO DAN GYIS

KHONG GDAN 'DREN GYI YI GE DANG DNGOS 'BUL SPOM CHEN BCAS KHYER
BA'I PHO NYA MNGAGS PA 'BYOR, GDAN ZHU'I YI GER 'JIGS

SLONG GI TSIG 'DI LTAR ``NGAS MTHA' YI KHRIMS RA BLANGS, DMAG
DPUNG CHEN POS BRDA DED BYAS NAS SEMS CAN MANG PO LA GNOD

PA BYAS NA MI SKRAG PA AE YIN, DES NA SANGS RGYAS KYI BSTAN PA
DANG SEMS CAN MANG PO LA SOMS LA KHYOD MGYOGS PAR SHOG'' CES

'KHOD, DE LTAR 'JIGS SKUL DANG BYA DGA' ZUNG 'BREL SGO NAS HOR
YUL DU YONG DGOS PAR BTZAN BKA' GNANG, SKABS

DER SA PAn GYIS THUGS DGONGS 'DI LTAR BZHED DE RANG RE BOD 'DI
SIL BUR THOR NAS BZUNG NANG 'KHRUG KHO NAS DUS 'DA' ZHING

DENG SANG YANG CHOS LUGS GRUB MTHA' SO SO'I BLA DPON DANG SA
GNAS KYI 'GO PA KHAG GIS RANG RANG GI CHOS GZHIS MNGA' 'BANGS

RTZOD RES DANG RANG RANG GI GRUB MTHA' DANG MNGA' RIS LA PHAN PA
KHO NA DON DU GNYER NAS BOD SPYI PA'I BSAM PA MED PAR BRTEN,

DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM DU HOR DMAG 'DZUL NAS BSREGS GSOD PHROGS
GSUM GYI KHRAG GI KHA LO BSGYUR BA LA PHAR RGOL GYI NUS PA

MED PAR GCIG RJES GNYIS MTHUD DU MGO BTAGS ZHUS PAR BLTAS NA
'GOG RGOL BYED PA NI GNAS SKABS GNAS MA YIN PAS

'JAM PO'I THABS LA BRTEN NAS DAM PA'I CHOS KYI ZHAGS PA BRTAN PO
DES HOR GYI DMAG NGAN 'BRONG RGOD DE'I RKANG LAG BCING THUB

NA BOD DANG SKYE 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PA BLA NA MED PA ZHIG 'BYUNG
BAR NGES SO DGONGS NAS NA TSOD SHIN TU SMIN YANG SKU SROG LA
PHANGS

PA MED PAR HOR YUL DU 'BYON RGYUR THUGS THAG BCAD, DE NAS RIM
GYIS SA SKYA NAS KHRO PHU DANG SNAR THANG BSAM 'GRUB RTZE RIN

SPUNGS SOGS SU BYON NAS CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR, ZUL PHU RU 'GRO MGON
CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA DGUNG LO BCUR PHEBS PA DE'I GTZUG

PHUD BZHES NAS KHONG DANG MNYAM DU KHRID, GSANG PHU NE'U THOG
DANG 'BRI KHUNG BCAS SU BYON, 'BRI KHUNG SKYOBS PA 'JIG RTEN

GSUM MGON GYIS BSU BA RGYA CHER BYAS TE 'BRI KHUNG LA SHED MONG
BZANG PO STZOL CIG CES GSOL BA BTAB, DE NAS RIM GYIS

KHAMS SU BYON, KA:THOG DBU 'OD YE SHES 'BUM GYIS RAB GNAS KYI
CHO GA MDZAD PAR GSOL BA BTAB PAS ZHAL GYIS BZHES

BGEGS SKROD PA DE NGED RNYING MA BAS BYED YE SHES PA BZHUGS PA
LA KHYED GSAR MA PAS MDZAD CES ZHUS PAR BRTEN RAB GNAS KYI

BKA' DRIN BSTZAL, 'BA' THANG BRGYUD LI THANG NAS NYAG CHU BSGRAL
TE RAB SGANG DU BYON, ZHAG RA LHA RTZER BRGYUD NAS DAR RTZE

MDOR PHEBS, MGU THOM YUL GYI SKAD RIGS MI GCIG PA'I MI MANG PO
YANG SANGS RGYAS PA LA BTZUD, HA KA LING RTZER BRGYUD SHIN

TU R'U DANG GLANG CHEN 'GYING RI DANG KONG TZE 'PHRUL RGYAL GYIS
BZHENGS PA'I RGYAL BA'I SKU MJAL NAS NYIN ZHAG BCU 'DAS PA'I
MTSAMS

BLON PO MGAR BYON MYONG BA'I RKYANG SI NAS 'BAB PA'I CHU BO
BRGAL TE RI BO RTZE LNGA NAS YUL BYANG NGOS KYI MI NYAG TU BYON,
DE TSE MDO

KHAMS STON PA BLO GROS RAB GSAL SOGS KYI CHOS KYI DRIS LAN BI JI
RI CHEN GRAGS KYI GLING KHAR BRIS, DE NAS DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA
LNGA

BZHES PA ME PHO RTA'I LO (1246) ZLA BA BRGYAD PA LA HOR RGYAL
PO'I RGYAL SA LANG GRUR GDAN PHEBS TE RGYAL PO GO DAN GO YUG GAN
RGYAL

SAR BZHUGS PA LA HOR YUL DU BZHUD NAS TSUR BYON PA DANG ME LUG
ZLA BA DANG POR MJAL, SPYI LO (1247) RGYAL PO DANG CHOS DANG

'JIG RTEN LUGS KYI GSUNGS GLENG MANG DU MDZAD NAS RGYAL PO MNYES
TE DENG PHAN CHAD GRAL GYI MGOR BLA MA CHOS RJE BA BZHUGS LA,

SMON LAM THOB CIG CES LUNG PHEBS, DE NAS HOR GYI RGYAL KHAMS SU
RAB TU BYUNG BA'I DBU 'PHANGS DGUNG DU BSTOD, SKABS

SHIG NA RGYAL PO LA MDZE NAD BYUNG BAS CHAB GTOR 'JAM DPAL MA
DANG 'PHAGS PA SENGGE SGRA'I CHO GA MDZAD PAS RGYAL PO NAD LAS
THAR

BAS SHIN TU DAD, THEG CHEN SEMS BSKYED LA SOGS ZAB PA DANG RGYA
CHE BA'I CHOS DU MA ZHUS MCHOD GNAS KYI PHUD DU BKUR,

SKAD RIGS MI GCIG PA'I 'GRO BA CHOS LA MI DAD PA RNAMS CHOS LAM
DU TSUD PAR GNANG, DE NAS BOD DU 'BYON PA BAS BOD KYI

BSTAN SRID LA PHAN CHE BAR GZIGS NAS BOD KYI GRVA SLOB RNAMS LA
GNANG SBYIN MANG PO DANG CHOS KYI SKYES SU BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I

LAM LA 'JUG PA'I RIM PA THUB PA'I DGONGS PA GSAL BA ZHES BYA BA
BSKUR, TSOGS CHOS 'DI DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM DU NGAS

THAMS CAD LA BSHAD PA YIN PAS YI GE 'DI LTOS LA SHOD, 'DI BZHIN
NYAMS SU LONGS ZHES BKA' BSTZAL, DE LTAR CHOS RJE

'DIS RGYA BOD HOR GSUM LA LUGS GNYIS KAR LEGS NYES 'BYED PA'I
BLO GROS KYI SNANG BA DAM PA BSTZAL, YUL DUS KUN TU DAM

PA'I BYA BA KHO NA LA BRTZON PAR GNANG, GZHAN YANG ZHING 'DI'I
'GRO DON RE ZHIG RDZOGS PA'I TSUL LA 'PHAGS PA DGUNG LO BCU

BDUN DU PHEBS PAR BSTAN PA'I KHUR BZHES 'JUG PAR DGONGS NAS CHOS
DUNG DANG LHUNG GZED LA SOGS PA GNANG ZHING SLOB MA'I

TSOGS RNAMS GTAD NAS BSTAN PA DANG SEMS CAN GYI DON GYIS SHIG
CES BKA' BSGOS NAS BSTAN PA GTAD, MTHAR LANG GRU'U

SPRUL BA'I SDE ZHES BYA BA'I DGON PAR RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I LCAGS
PHAG LO (1251) ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BCU BZHI NYIN GYI SKYA

RENGS SHAR BA'I TSE RDOR DRIL THUGS KAR BSNOL THABS SU 'DZIN NAS
YONGS SU MYA NGAN LAS 'DA' BAR MDZAD DO, ,

BDAG NYID CHEN PO 'DI YI GDAN SA CHE BA DPAL LDAN SA SKYA BYANG
PHYOGS LING CHUR RTZER KHAB BAR BSAM YAS NYANG STOD RKYANG

@421 THUR SHANGS SREGS SHING CHUNG BA SOGS DBUS KHAMS GTZANG
GSUM NA SHIN TU MANG BAR BDAG GNYER MDZAD NAS SPYIR MDO SNGAGS

KHYAD PAR RNAM 'GREL SOGS MTSAN NYID KYI BSHAD SROL HA CANG DAR
RGYAS BYUNG, BSTAN RGYUN 'DZIN PA'I SLOB BU YANG THUGS SRAS

'GRO MGON CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS PA, MTSAN NYID KYI TSOGS DPON 'U YUG
PA RIG PA'I SENG GE SNGAGS KYI TSOGS DPON ZHANG BTZUN

MDO SDE DPAL SPYI DPON TE NYE GNAS SU DGE BSHES SH'AKYA BZANG PO
SOGS RGYA BOD HOR GSUM DU MKHAS DANG GRUB PA'I SLOB MA MANG DU

'PHEL, BKA' 'BUM DA LTA NGED MI RIGS PHO BRANG DU KHYON LDEB
RING POD GSUM SNA KHA BRGYA DANG BDUN SHOG GRANGS DGU BRGYA DANG

DRUG YOD PA'I SDE DGE'I PAR MA CHA TSANG BZHUGS YOD,
