GUR MGON LCAM DRAL GYI RJES GNANG BZHUGS SO, , (12) 22

GUR MGON GYI RJES GNANG,

RGYAL PO GO PE LA SRAS DANG BTZUN MOR BCAS LA SHING MO YOS SOGS
LA GNANG BA'I TSIGS BCAD RNAMS BZHUGS SO, ,

DPAL SA SKYA'I RJE BTZUN GONG MA LNGA'I GSUNG RAB RIN PO CHE'I
PAR GYI SGO 'PHAR 'BYED PA'I DKAR CHAG 'PHRUL GYI LDE MIG

CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (13) 66

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SA SKYA 'PHAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN NI, GTZANG G-YAS RU NGAM
RING GI KLU KHUNG ZHES PA'I YUL DU, YAB CHOS RJE SA PAn GYI

GCUNG ZANGS TSA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN DANG YUM MA GCIG KUN DGA'
SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BZHI PA'I SHING MO LUG GI

LOR (1235) ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES DRUG LA SKU BLTAMS, DGUNG LO
CHUNG DUS NAS YI GE 'BRI KLOG SOGS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO

BRGYAD PA LA TSOGS PAR GTAM BSHAD DANG CHOS 'CHAD LEGS PAR MDZAD
PAS KUN GYIS BSTOD BSNGAGS BYED, DGUNG LO BCU PA

LA CHOS RJE SA SKYA PAndI TA HOR RGYAL PO GO DAN GYIS GDAN ZHUS
LTAR PHEBS PA'I PHYAG PHYIR BYON, LAM BAR CHOS RJE SA PAn GYIS
MKHAN

PO DANG ZUR PHU BAS SLOB DPON MDZAD DE RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE
TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, MTSAN LA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DPAL

BZANG POR GSOL, SKYOR MO LUNG PA'I MKHAN PO SHES RAB SENG GE LA
DGE TSUL GYI BSLAB BYA GSAN, DE NAS DGUNG LO BCU BDUN

PA LCAGS PHAG LOR SA PAn SKU GSHEGS KHAR RANG NYID KYI CHOS
BRGYUD 'DZIN PA'I BDAG POR BSKOS, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA CHU MO

GLANG LOR (1254) HOR SE CHEN HAN GYIS GDAN DRANGS PA LTAR GONG
MA'I PHO BRANG DU PHEBS NAS RGYAL BLON MI NYI SHU RTZA LNGA LA
DPAL KYEE

RDO RJE'I DBANG BSKUR, DBANG YON DU BOD KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM PHUL
CING TI SHRI'I GO SA GNANG, G-YANG tI LAS BYAS PA'I THAM KA

DANG RIN PO CHE SOGS DNGOS 'BUL MTHA' YAS PA PHUL, DBANG THENGS
GNYIS PA ZHUS PA'I DBANG YON DU CHOS DUNG DKAR MO RGYANG

GRAGS DANG, BOD CHOL KHA GSUM GYI SRID DBANG YONGS SU RDZOGS PA
PHUL, SLAR YANG GSANG SNGAGS KYI DBANG THENGS GSUM PA

ZHUS PA'I DBANG YON DU RGYA YI MI YUL CHEN MO PHUL BAS BLA MA
'PHAGS PA YANG THUGS SHIN TU MNYES SO, ,YANG SKABS CIG RGYAL POS

BLA MA LA BOD DU SA SKYA PA'I CHOS MA GTOGS GZHAN BYED MI CHOG
PA'I BKA' LUNG 'BEBS DGOS GSUNGS PA LA CHOS RGYAL 'PHAGS

PAS DE LTAR BYAS NA BSTAN SRID LA PHAN THOGS MED PAS RANG RANG
'DOD MOS LTAR CI NAS KYANG SKYONG DU 'JUG DGOS GSUNGS PAS

RGYAL POS KYANG DE LTAR BKA' PHAB, DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PA SHING
MO YOS KYI LO (1255) LA KHAMS BYANG NGOS SU PHEBS NAS SNAR

THANG MKHAN CHEN GRAGS PA SENG GE GDAN DRANGS TE MKHAN PO DANG
JO GDAN BYANG PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS SLOB DPON,

YAR LUNG PA BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS GSANG STON, DAD DGE CHOS
RJE DBU RGAN, MAD RA BA MKHAN PO SPRO DANG GNAM PHAR BA

@444 TSUL RIN LA SOGS PA DGE SLONG NYI SHU'I DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR
RDZOGS, GZHAN YANG MKHAN PO GRAGS SENG MDUN PHAR PHYIN TSIG

GSAL DANG SLOB DPON LA 'DUL BA MDO RTZA GSANG STON YAR LUNG PA
BYANG CHUB RGYAL MTSAN LA TSAD MA SDE BDUN MDO DANG BCAS PA

SOGS MANG DU GSAN TE DPYIS PHYIN PAR MDZAD RJES SLAR YANG GONG
MA'I PHO BRANG DU PHYIR PHEBS, RGYAL POS BKAS BSKUL TE MU

STEGS ZIN SHING GI CHOS LUGS MKHAS PA RNAMS RTZOD PAS PHAM PAR
MDZAD NAS NANG PA SANGS RGYAS PA'I CHOS SGOR BCUG HOR LA YI

GE MED PA LA BOD YIG LA GZHIR BCAS NAS HOR YIG GSAR DU BRTZAMS,
DGUNG LO SO GCIG PA SHING MO GLANG GI LOR (1265) SA

SKYAR PHEBS, GSER THOG CHEN MO'I NANG GI MCHOD RTEN BKRA SHIS
SGO MANG NANG DU RDOR DBYINGS KYI LHA TSOGS BZHENGS PA DANG, RJE

BTZUN GONG MA RNAMS KYI SKU 'BUM BDUN LA GDUGS DANG CHOS 'KHOR
GSER ZANGS LAS BZHENGS PA DANG MDO RGYUD DANG SHER PHYIN

SOGS RGYAL BA'I BKA' POD NYIS BRGYA LHAG GSER GYIS BRIS, BOD DU
LO GSUM BZHUGS RING KHA CHE'I PAndI TA SHRI TA TH'A GA TA BHA
DRA

DANG, GLO BO LO TZ'A BA SHES RAB RIN CHEN SNAR THANG MKHAN CHEN
MCHIMS NAM MKHA' GRAGS SOGS BSHES GNYEN MANG DU BSTEN NAS

RIG PA'I GNAS THUN MONG DANG NANG DON RIG PA'I SKOR DANG RGYUD
SDE BZHI DBANG KHRID MAN NGAG DANG BCAS PA GSAN BZHES MTHAR

PHYIN PAR GNANG, DE NAS DGUNG LO SO GSUM PA RAB BYUNG LNGA BA'I
'GOR ME MO YOS LO (1267) LA HOR RGYAL POS MNGAGS PA'I

GDAN 'DREN GYI GSER YIG PA 'BYOR, HOR YUL DU PHEBS SKABS GSOL
GZIMS MCHOD GSUM DANG MJAL YIG MDZOD GSUM

THAB 'DREN GDAN GSUM SKYA RTA GNYIS MDZO KHYI GNYIS TE LAS TSAN
BCU GSUM GYI RGYAS SPROS DANG BCAS TE PHEBS, LAM BAR BKA'

GDAMS NAM MKHA' 'BUM DANG MJAL ZHING CHOS KYI BGRO GLENG MANG DU
GNANG, BKA' GDAMS PA THUGS MNYES NAS BYANG CHUB

SEMS BSKYED SOGS CHOS DU MA ZHUS, DE NAS RIM GYIS BYON PA'I LAM
BAR DU YANG SEMS CAN GYI DON KHO NA SGRUB BZHIN PAR HOR

GYI RGYAL KHAMS SU SLEBS PA NA, RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I SRAS KYI THU
BO JIM GYIM ZHES BYA BAS GTZOS BTZUN MO DANG BLON PO'I TSOGS
KYIS

GLANG CHEN LA RIN PO CHE'I DRA BAS SPRAS PA'I KHRI DANG GDUGS
DANG RGYAL MTSAN ROL MO'I TSOGS SOGS KYI BSU BA RGYA CHEN PO
DANG BCAS

PHO BRANG DU GDAN DRANGS NAS RGYAL BLON SOGS KYIS ZAB CHOS DU MA
ZHUS, DE'I PHYI LO SA SBRUL (1269) LO LA DPON CHEN SH'AKYA BZANG

POS SA SKYA LHA KHANG CHEN MO'I 'GRAM BTING, DPON CHEN KUN DGA'
BZANG PO DANG MNYAM SBREL GYIS BOD KHRI SKOR BCU GSUM BSKUL

TE BLA BRANG GSUM PO DANG BCAS PA YONGS SU GRUB,

DGUNG LO SO DRUG PA RAB BYUNG LNGA PA'I LCAGS PHO RTA LO (1270)
LA SLAR YANG RGYAL POS GSANG SNGAGS KYI DBANG ZHUS PA'I TSE

DBANG YON DU MI NYAG RGYAL PO RGYAL RGOD KYI SHEL DAM LA BCOS
BYAS PA'I SHEL DAM GLING DRUG MA DANG ``GNAM GYI 'OG SA'I STENG
NA RGYA

GAR LHA'I SRAS PO SPRUL BA'I SANGS RGYAS YI GE RTZOM MI RGYAL
KHAMS 'JAGS SU 'JUG PA PO GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I PAndI TA 'PHAGS PA
TI

SHRI'' ZHES PA'I 'JA' SA DANG DNGUL BRE CHEN STONG PHRAG GOS DAR
LNGA KHRI DGU STONG SOGS DNGOS PO BGRANG DU MED PA PHUL, DE NAS

HOR YUL DU DAM PA'I CHOS KYI SROL BZANG PO CHE CHER SPEL NAS
SLAR YANG BOD DU PHYIR BYON PAR ZHAL GYIS BZHES, RGYAL POS

BZHUGS DGOS PAR ZHUS KYANG DANG DU MA BLANGS PAR PHEBS PA'I TSE
RGYAL POS DPUNG DMAG MANG PO'I DPUNG DANG BCAS TE ZLA BA MANG

PO'I LAM BAR DU SKYEL MA ZHUS SHING, DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PA ME BYI
LO LA (1276) GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN SA SKYAR PHYAG PHEBS

TE, LO DE'I NANG DBUS GTZANG GI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHOS DON DU
GNYER BA DU MA DANG YUL SDE SOGS KYI DPON PO DANG GZHAN

YANG 'PHAGS YUL DANG KHA CHE SOGS NAS KYANG PAndI TA MANG DU
BYUNG ZHING DE DAG LA GANG LA GANG 'DOD KYI ZAB RGYAS KYI CHOS
BGRANG BA

LAS 'DAS PA GNANG, PHYI LO ME GLANG LO'I ZLA BA DANG POR RGYAL
PO JIM GYIM ZHES BYA BAS SBYIN BDAG MDZAD NAS GTZANG CHU MIG
RING

MOR DGE 'DUN KHRI PHRAG BDUN LHAG LONGS PA LA BKA' CHOS GNANG BA
MA TSAD 'KHOR 'DUS PA DE DAG RE RE BZHIN GSER ZHO RE DANG

SUM SNAM RE'I 'GYED MDZAD, GZHAN YANG SKYE BO PHAL PA KHRI PHRAG
DU MA LA YANG BYANG CHUB SEMS BSKYED SOGS CHOS KYI 'KHOR LO RGYA

CHEN PO ZHAG BCU BZHI'I BAR DU BSKOR BA DE LA GTZANG CHU MIG
CHOS 'KHOR ZHES GRAGS, CHOS 'KHOR RDZOGS PA'I NYIN 'DUS PA RGYA

MTSO'I DBUS SU BYON TE BSNGO BA'I YON BSHAD CHEN MO MDZAD, DE
NAS GDAN SAR SA PAn GYI NANG RTEN GSER GYI SGO MANG MCHOD

RTEN DANG DE'I BZHUGS GNAS GTZUG LAG KHANG GI STENG GSER THOG
CHE BA RNAMS BZHENGS SHING GZHAN YANG STAG THOG GZHIS MO CHER

MDO MANG PO TI BZHI BCU LHAG GSER LAS BZHENGS PAS GTZOS GSER
CHOS NYIS STONG CHIG BRGYA NGA BDUN BCAS BZHENGS NAS,

'BUL BA'I DNGOS PO RNAMS RANG DON DU TIL 'BRU TZAM YANG MI SPYOD
PAR DKON MCHOG LA MCHOD PA PHUL BA DBUL PHONGS LA SBYIN PA

GTONG BA SKU GSUNG THUGS RTEN BZHENGS PA SOGS YA RABS DAM PA'I
LUGS LAS MI 'DA' BAR MDZAD, DE NAS LO LNGA'I BAR SA

SKYA'I GDAN SA BSKYANGS SHING PHYI NANG GI RTEN BZHENGS DANG
'KHOR SLOB MA SKYONG BA GZHAN YANG 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI
SGO NAS BSTAN

PA'I RGYAL MTSAN CHE CHER BSGRENG, KHONG LA SLOB MA YANG ZHANG
DKON MCHOG DPAL DANG DGE SLONG KUN BLO SOGS SHIN TU MANG PO YOD,

@445 DGUNG LO ZHE DRUG PA RAB BYUNG LNGA BA'I LCAGS PHO 'BRUG GI
LO (1280) ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES NYER GNYIS KYI SNGA DRO'I
CHA LA LHA KHANG

BLA BRANG DU DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU BSTIM PA'I TSUL BSTAN TO,
,

KHONG GI GSUNG RTZOM SKOR LA THUN MONG RIG GNAS SKOR NYUNG ZHING
BSTOD PA DANG GSOL 'DEBS SPRINGS YIG SOGS CHOS TSAN

SUM BRGYA SO GNYIS YOD PA'I SDE DGE'I PAR MA POD GSUM NGED DPE
MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD,

DPE BZHUGS SO, , (20) 20

DPAL SA SKYA PA'I CHOS SKYONG RDO RJE NAG PO CHEN PO GUR GYI
MGON PO'I LAS TSOGS, GTOR MA LA BRTEN NAS DGRA BSAD

PA'I MAN NGAG THUN MONG MA YIN PA DRUG CU PA'I CHO GA DGRA BGEGS
GNAD GCOD KYI SPU GRI ZHES BYA BA LA SNGAGS 'CHANG CHEN

PO'I MCHAN BU GNANG BA BZHUGS SO, , (21) 12

DPAL LDAN DMAG ZOR RGYAL MO'I GTOR BSNGO DANG BSKANG GSO BZHUGS
SO, , (22) 17

DKAR BDUD KYI BSKANG GSO BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, , (23) 3

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SA SKYA NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' RIN CHEN NI, 'KHON DUS MCHOD BLA
BRANG GI GDUNG RABS YAB 'JAM DBYANGS TSE BRTAN BKRA

SHIS KYIS YUM YANG 'BROG MA LHA GCIG BU 'DREN SKYID KHAB TU
BZHES PA LA SRAS SKU MCHED GNYIS 'KHRUNGS PA'I NANG GI CHUNG BA
YIN LA

RAB BYUNG DGU PA'I ME MO GLANG GI LOR (1517) GDAN SA CHEN PO
RTZE GDUNG BLA BRANG DU SKU BLTAMS, BYIS PA CHUNG NGU NAS YAB
SOGS

KYI MDUN YI GE'I SBYOR KLOG DANG CHOS SPYOD SKOR GSAN SBYONG
MDZAD, DGUNG LO DGUR PHEBS SKABS SA LO 'JAM DBYANGS KUN

DGA' BSOD NAMS KYI SPYAN SNGAR DGE BSNYEN DANG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM
PA ZHUS, MTSAN 'JAM DBYANGS NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' RIN

CHEN ZHES PA BSTZAL, DE'I DRUNG DU THEG CHEN DBU MA LUGS KYI
SEMS BSKYED KYANG GSAN, SKABS DER DGUNG LO DGU LAS SON

MED KYANG SA SKYA 'KHON GYI GDUNG BRGYUD 'KHRUL MED YIN PAR MA
ZAD BYIS PA'I DUS NAS SPYANG GRUNG 'DZOM PA ZHIG YIN STABS DPAL

LDAN SA SKYA'I GDAN SA CHEN POR MNGA' GSOL TE BLA MA SLOB DPON
DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN KUN GYI GTZUG GI NOR BU LTAR GYUR, DE

NAS DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PA CHU SBRUL LO'I BAR SA LO CHEN PO DANG
'BRAL MED DU 'GROGS TE DBANG LUNG KHRID SOGS BLA MA'I THUGS LA

BZHUGS TSAD BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU MNOS, DBANG RJES GNANG
SOGS LA MCHOD G-YOG DANG, SGRUB MCHOD DANG GTOR ZLOG

SOGS LA'ANG PHYAG PHYIR RGYUN MAR BYON NAS DBYANGS ROL GAR
'CHAMS TSUN CHAD BLO LA NGES PAR MDZAD, CHU SBRUL LOR (1533) SA

LO GSHEGS LA NYE BA NA SA LOS SPYAN CHEN POS KHONG LA GZIGS NAS
``NGAG GI DBANG PO LAGS SA SKYA'I BSTAN PA CHAGS 'JIG KHYOD LA

RAG LAS PAS BYIS PA'I SNANG BA MA BYED AANG'' GSUNGS, DE NAS SA
LO CHEN PO GSHEGS PA'I RJES SU THUGS SHIN TU GDUNGS,

BYAS 'GYUR RDO RJE BRAG RDZONG DU PHYAG MCHOD BSNYEN SGRUB MDZAD
DE RE ZHIG BZHUGS SO, , RJES SU DPAL LDAN BKRA SHIS DANG DKON

MCHOG LHUN GRUB NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS SOGS MKHAS DBANG SKYES BU
DAM PA MANG PO GTZUG GI RGYAN DU BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS KYI ZAB

CHOS CHE PHRA TSANG MA GSAN PAR MA TSAD LAM 'BRAS GTZOS PA'I SA
SKYA'I ZAB CHOS THUN MONG MIN PA RNAMS KYANG LHAG LUS MED PAR

GSAN CING KHONG DU CHUD, YI DAM CHOS SRUNG RNAMS KYI BSNYEN PA
YANG MTHAR PHYIN, DGUNG LO NYI SHU RTZA GRANGS LA PHEBS PA NA
RTZA

BA'I BLA MA SA LO CHEN PO'I ZHAL CHEMS LTAR DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I
BSTAN PA RMANG NAS GSO BA'I 'DUN PA DRAG PO THUGS LA 'KHRUNGS
KYANG

SKABS DER SDE PA LHA KHANG PA DANG LHA SA RDZONG PA SKYED
'PHRANG PA GSUM NGAN 'BREL THOG SA SKYA'I RTEN GTZO BSE 'BAG NAG
PO 'PHUR SHES

BZHUGS PA'I DRA SGOR KHONG GSUM GYI THEL GSUM 'BYAR BYAS NAS SU
LA'ANG MJAL DBANG MED PAR BYED PA SOGS SPYOD NGAN MANG PO

BYUNG RKYEN KHONG THUGS BDE BA MED PA'I GNAS TSUL CUNG ZAD
BYUNG, RING MIN RIN SPUNGS PA DPON BLON GYIS SDE PA LHA KHANG PA
YUL

PHYOGS GZHAN DU BRDZANGS SHING LHA KHANG CHEN MO SOGS KHONG LA
PHUL, DE NAS DBUS KYI SA SKYONG CHEN PO RNAMS KYIS GDAN 'DREN
PA'I

PHO NYA 'BYOR NAS DBUS SU PHEBS, DPAL BSAM YAS DANG GONG DKAR
SOGS SU PHEBS NAS 'GRO DON MDZAD RJES RIM GYIS SA

SKYAR TSUR PHEBS, RE ZHIG SHAB DGE SDINGS SU SKU MTSAMS DAM POR
BCAD NAS BZHUGS PA'I SKABS SU LHA SA RDZONG PA DANG GNAS PA

MGO SKYA BA GNYIS KYIS NGAN GROS BYAS NAS KHONG BKRONG RTZIS
BYAS PA DANG LHA KHANG CHEN MO BSLUS NAS RAB 'BYAMS PA KUN DGA'
TSE

@450 BRTAN BKRONGS SHING 'PHAN NAG MI KHUR GCIG DANG CHOS DUNG
DKAR PO RGYANG GRAGS KYANG KHYER SONG BA SOGS SA SKYA'I BSTAN PA
LA BAR

CHAD CHEN PO BYUNG BAS KHONG HA CANG THUGS SKYO ZHING DA SA
SKYA'I BSTAN PA DAR RGYAS SU GTONG DKA' BAR 'DUG PAS BYA BRAL
BYAS NAS SA

DBEN PA ZHIG TU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN LA 'GRO NA DGA' 'DUG SNYAM
BYANG SE MO DOR PHEBS PAR BRTZAMS PA NA, SA SKYA'I DGON KHAG

GI BLA MA SLOB DPON RNAMS KYIS BSHOL 'DEBS ZHUS, KHYAD PAR BYANG
PA DPON NAM MKHA' TSE DBANG RDO RJE DANG SHAR KHA SDE SRID

NAM MKHA' LHUN GRUB GNYIS KYIS LHA SA RDZONG PA SOGS BSKRAD DE
GDAN SA CHOS GZHIS DANG BCAS PA THAMS CAD KHONG GI PHYAG TU PHUL

THUB PA'I DAM BCA' ZHUS NAS BSHOL 'DEBS PAS SNGAR BZHIN SA
SKYA'I BSTAN PA SKYONG BAR ZHAL BZHES GNANG YANG RE ZHIG DUS BDE

MED PA'I DBANG GIS DBUS SU GSANG STABS KYIS PHEBS NAS N'A LEN
DRA DANG BYANG RVA SGRENG SOGS SU 'GRO DON MDZAD, DER YUN MI

RING BAR BYANG PA DPON DANG RGYAL RTZE BA GNYIS KYIS SPYAN 'DREN
GYI MI SNA MNGAGS PA 'BYOR BAS THUGS SHIN TU DGYES TE DE 'PHRAL

GTZANG PHYOGS GDAN SA CHEN POR BYON, G-YAS RU BYANG PA'I DPON
DANG RGYAL RTZE DPON RIN SPUNGS PA GSUM GYIS GDAN SA CHEN

PO'I MCHOD GZHIS RNYING PA GANG YOD KYI THOG LHA SA GZHUNG LA
GTOGS PA RNAMS DANG MANG MKHAR GZHUNG LA GTOGS PA SHAB SMAD DU

GTOGS PA BCAS GZHIS KA KHAL CHE BA MCHOD GZHIS SU PHUL NAS SA
SKYA 'PHEL RGYAS SU 'GRO BA'I MTHUN RKYEN BSKRUN, KHONG DGUNG LO

SUM CU LHAG TZAM LA PHEBS PA NAS GDAN SA CHEN POR ZHIG GSO DANG
GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG LHA SKU MANG PO GSAR BZHENGS KYI 'GO

BTZUGS, DE SNGON RGYU RKYEN SNA TSOGS PA'I DBANG GIS SA SKYA'I
GDAN SA 'DI NYID KYI GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG MGON KHANG PHAL CHE BA

ZHIG BGRES SU GYUR CING NANG GI RTEN RNAMS KYANG 'GA' ZHIG THOR
ZHING 'GA' ZHIG NYAMS GOG TU GYUR PA SOGS SA SKYA'I BSTAN PA

NYAG PHRA BAR GYUR PA DE DAG BLA MA 'DIS RMANG NAS GSO BA'I 'GO
TSUGS TE LHA KHANG CHE CHUNG TSANG MA NYAMS GSO MDZAD CING, BDE

MCHOG PHO BRANG DANG LHUN GRUB PHO BRANG SOGS BZO BKOD NGO MTSAR
CHE BA MANG PO GSAR BZHENGS DANG NANG RTEN LHA SKU RTEN GSUM
DANG

MCHOD RDZAS DANG MCHOD CHA SOGS BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA MANG PO
GSAR DU BSKRUN, KHONG NI SA SKYA'I GDUNG RABS NANG NAS BSTAN

PA'I ME RO SLAR GSO MDZAD PO GTZO BO ZHIG TU GYUR TE KUN GYIS
BSNGAGS PA'I GNAS SU GYUR, 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM GYI SGO NAS

BSTAN PA RGYAS PAR MDZAD CING CHOS GRVA CHEN PO THUB BSTAN LHA
CHE ZHES PA GSAR DU 'DEBS PAR MDZAD NAS MDO PHYOGS KYI BSTAN PA

DBYAR MTSO LTAR 'PHEL BAR MDZAD, SNGAGS KYI SKOR GSANG SNGAGS
BDE CHEN GLING GSAR DU BTAB, CHOS GRVA DE DAG GI SGRIG LAM

KUN SPYOD TSANG MA YIG LAM DU BKOD PA'I BCA' YIG BRTZAMS, DPAL
BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG KHANG DU YANG RAB BYUNG GI SDE CHEN PO

BTZUGS PA SOGS DBUS GTZANG GI SA CHA MA LUS PAR SA SKYA'I DGON
SDES KHYAB PAR MDZAD, KHONG GIS SNGA PHYIR BTZUN MO GSUM KHAB

TU BZHES, SRAS SKU MCHED GNYIS TE GCEN 'JAM DBYANGS BSOD NAMS
DBANG PO DANG GCUNG GRAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN

GNYIS 'KHRUNGS, RIGS SRAS GNYIS LA KHONG GI THUGS LA BZHUGS
DGU'I ZAB CHOS RNAMS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU BSTZAL,

SKABS SHIG BSAM YAS KYI SA SKYONG TSE DBANG RDO RJE DGONGS PA
RDZOGS PAR BRTEN KHONG GSHEGS BRDZANG LA GDAN DRANGS, KHONG

GDUNG SRAS 'JAM DBYANGS BSOD NAMS DBANG PO BCAS DBUS SU BYON, LO
DGON DU SPYAN SNGA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS MDUN

SRAS 'JAM DBYANGS BSOD NAMS DBANG PO RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL
GYI SDOM PA ZHUS, KHONG GIS KYANG ZAB CHOS 'GA' GSAN,

YAB SRAS GNYIS PO LHA SAR JO BO RIN PO CHE SOGS RTEN KHYAD
'PHAGS RNAMS MJAL, SKYID SHOD PAS GDAN DRANGS TE GZHIS DGA'

BDE CHEN DU PHEBS, DER GTER STON ZHIG PO GLING PAR GTER CHOS
'GA' GSAN, BSAM YAS SU PHEBS TE KHONG GI GCEN PO

BDAG CHEN KUN DGA' BSAM GRUB DANG LHAN CIG BSAM YAS GTZUG LAG
KHANG DANG MCHOD RTEN RNAMS LA ZHIG GSOS DANG RAB

GNAS MDZAD, DER GTER STON SHES RAB 'OD ZER LA GTER CHOS MANG PO
GSAN, DE NAS SLAR GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN SA

SKYAR PHEBS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA BCU TZAM LA PHEBS PA NA GDUNG
SRAS SKU MCHED GNYIS RANG GI RGYAL TSAB TU MNGA' GSOL TE SA SKYA

PA'I SPYI BYE BRAG GI BYA BA KUN SGRUB TU BCUG DE RJES YAR RGYAB
SDE PA ZHING GZHAN DU GSHEGS PA'I DGONGS RDZOGS LA GDAN 'DREN

PA SLEBS NAS GDUNG SRAS 'JAM DBYANGS PA PHYAG PHYIR 'BRANGS NAS
SLAR YANG DBUS SU PHEBS, ZHING GSHEGS DE NYID KYI

DGONGS RDZOGS GRUB RJES DPAL BSAM YAS SU BYON NAS BSAM YAS DBU
RTZE CHEN MOR ZHIG GSO MDZAD, LCOG GSAR MANG PO

BTZUGS, DPAL BSAM YAS KYI LHA MI TSANG MA YI RANG BAR MDZAD DE
GTZANG SA SKYAR TSUR BYON, GDAN SA CHEN POR GDUNG SRAS

GNYIS KYI GTZOS DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO LA DBANG DANG RJES
GNANG LUNG KHRID BCAS MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG BSTZAL, MDO

SNGAGS KYI 'CHAD NYAN YUN RING MDZAD DE SKAL LDAN GYI SLOB MA
YANG GDUNG SRAS BDAG CHEN GNYIS DANG, MNGA' RIS GUNG THANG CHOS

RGYAL KHRI BSAM GRUB SDE RTZE GDONG BDAG CHEN KUN DGA' LEGS PA'I
'BYUNG GNAS SOGS DPON CHEN RNAMS DANG, NGOR MKHAN

CHEN SANGS RGYAS SENG GE ,GLING KHA BDE BA CAN GYI MKHAN CHEN
DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO, GSANG SNGAGS BDE CHEN GLING GI MKHAN CHEN

@451 DPAL LDAN BZANG PO SOGS MKHAN CHEN MANG PO GZHAN YANG MKHAN
SLOB PAndI TA GTER STON SOGS RIS MED KYI SLOB MA MKHAS DBANG

MANG PO SPEL, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG CU RTZA BRGYAD DU PHEBS PA RAB
BYUNG BCU PA'I SHING PHO SPREL LO'I (1584) ZLA BA BDUN PA'I TSES

BCU GNYIS LA LHUN GRUB PHO BRANG DU SKU ZHI BA'I DBYINGS SU
GSHEGS SO, ,

GSUNG 'BUM SKOR GSANG SNGAGS KYI DBANG CHOG DANG SGRUB THABS SNA
TSOGS SA LO'I BSTOD PA SOGS BSTOD TSOGS SKOR BCA'

YIG DANG NYAMS MGUR DRIS LEN GSOL 'DEBS 'PHRIN YIG BCAS PO TI
GSUM YOD TSOD KYANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BRIS MA POD

GNYIS KHO NA BZHUGS YOD,

@454 000621 PAR MA,

BOD KYI MKHAS PA SNGA PHYI DAG GI GRUB MTHA'I SHAN 'BYED MTHA'
DPYOD DANG BCAS PA'I 'BEL BA'I GTAM SKYES DPYOD LDAN

MKHAS PA'I LUS RGYAN RIN CHEN MDZES PA'I PHRA TSOM BKOD PA BCAS
BZHUGS SO, , (1) 94

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS NI GTZANG DPAL LDAN SA SKYA'I NUB BYANG GI
PHYOGS SU LE DBAR BCU GNYIS TZAM GYI SAR SEMS CHER ZHES

BYA BA'I YUL DU YAB GSO BA RIG PA SOGS LUGS GNYIS LA MKHYEN
SPYAN YANGS PA SMAN PA PHUN TSOGS ZHES PA DANG, YUM PHAN

THOGS SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU SPREL LO'I
(1572) ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PAR 'KHRUNGS, BYIS PA'I DUS KLOG SBYOR

SOGS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR YAB DANG LHAN CIG CHOS 'KHOR
LHUN POR LO GCIG TZAM BZHUGS RING BSHES GNYEN

MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA'I MDUN CHOS 'GA' ZHUS, SKU ZHANG
DRIN CHEN ZHIG YOD PA DES GROGS MDZAD DE THUB BSTAN YANGS

PA CAN GYI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SPYAN SNGA DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO'I
DRUNG DU DGE TSUL BSGRUBS, MTSAN NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS ZHES PA

BSTZAL, SPYAN SNGA BGRES PA NGAG DBANG CHOS GRAGS LA KYE RDO RJE
SOGS KYI DBANG ZHUS, THUB BSTAN TSOGS CHEN GYI SLOB DPON

DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG DGE RGAN GYI GTZO BOR BSTEN NAS, PHAR
TSAD, DBU MA, 'DUL MDZOD, BSHES SPRINGS, SPYOD

'JUG SOGS GZHUNG LUGS MANG POR THOS BSAM MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD,
DGUNG LO BCO BRGYAD PAR DPAL LDAN SA SKYAR TSAD MA RIG

GTER RANG 'GREL GYI RGYUGS PHUL, KUN GYIS LEGS SO'I ME TOG GTER,
DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR, GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL

LDAN SA SKYA DANG, NGAM RING CHOS SDE SOGS SU RAB 'BYAMS GRVA
SKOR LA BYON, SNGA NA MED PA'I LEGS BSHAD KYI DGA' STON RGYA
CHER

SPEL BAS MKHAS PA'I GRAGS PA DBUS GTZANG KUN TU KHYAB, MANG
MKHAR RI BOR SLOB BSHAD NOR BU GLING GI DBEN GNAS SU BYON TE,

MKHAS DBANG KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO'I ZHABS PAD YUN RING BSTEN NAS,
GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS RGYA CHER GSAN CING, KHYAD PAR DPAL

LDAN SA SKYA'I YAB CHOS MAN NGAG DANG BCAS PA RDZOGS PAR GSAN,
KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO NI KHONG GI BKA' CHOS ZHU YUL GYI BLA MA
GTZO BO

ZHIG TU GYUR, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR, KARMA PA ZHVA DMAR SPRUL
PA'I SKU CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG 'KHOR TSOGS RGYA MTSO LTA BU DANG

BCAS GTZANG NGAM RING CHOS SDE CHEN POR CHIBS KYI KHA LO BSGYUR
BA NA, BYANG PA RGYAL PO MCHOD YON BKA' BGROS TE, NGAG CHOS

DGUNG NA GZHON YANG SKU YON CHE BAS LAS CHEN SLOB DPON DU BSKOS
SHING, KARMA PAR SNE LEN DANG CHOS KYI BGROS GLENG YANG MDZAD,

ZHVA DMAR SPRUL SKUS THUGS DGYES PA CHEN POS BSTOD MNGAGS MDZAD,
DE NAS SA SKYA SNGAGS 'CHANG MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG BSOD

NAMS CHOS 'PHEL GYI ZHABS DRUNG DU DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG BCAS
GSANG SNGAGS KYI ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN, DGUNG LO SUM

CU PAR MKHAN CHEN LUNG RIGS DBANG PHYUG LA LAM 'BRAS CHA TSANG
GSAN, DGUNG LO SO LNGA PA ME PHO RTA LOR BSAM 'GRUB DGON

GSAR DU SKYES CHEN BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYI GDAN SAR BZHUGS SO,
,DE NAS BZUNG SKU MA 'DAS BAR DGON DE'I BDAG PO

MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO DGU PA LCAGS KHYI LOR DBYAR CHOS SKABS BYANG
PA DPON NAS KHONG THUB BSTAN YANGS PA CAN GYI CHOS GRVAR MUS

PA RAB 'BYAMS PA THUGS RJE DPAL GYI GDAN KHRIR BSKO BZHAG GNANG,
LO DRUG RING DER 'CHAD NYAN RGYUN MI CHAD PAR MDZAD,

CHOS LUGS RIS MED KYI SLOB MA MKHAS PA MANG PO SPEL, DGUNG LO
ZHE GSUM PA SHING STAG LOR, MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO 'GYUR MED

BDE CHEN ZHABS DRUNG DU BYON NAS, DPAL LDAN SHANGS PA DKA'
BRGYUD KYI ZAB CHOS, NE GU CHOS DRUG DANG, PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO,

LAM KHYER RNAM GSUM SOGS BKA' LUNG YONGS RDZOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO
LNGA BCU PAR RTZE GDONG DPON GYIS RTZE GDONG DU GDAN

DRANGS NAS, RTZE GDONG DPON GDUNG BRGYUD BCAS PAR ZAB CHOS RGYA
CHER GNANG ZHING, SNGA PHYIR RTZE GDONG DU THENGS GSUM ZAB

CHOS STZAL BAR PHEBS, DGUNG LO RE DGU PA LCAGS 'BRUG LOR TSAR
CHEN GYI GDAN KHRIR PHEBS, MDOR NA SKABS DE'I SA SKYA PA'I

DPON CHEN DANG MKHAN PO, KHYAD PAR GDUNG BRGYUD KUN DGA' BSOD
NAMS LHUN GRUB SKU MCHED SOGS CHE DGU'I DBU BLAR

BZHES TE LAM 'BRAS TSAR MANG PO DANG, SA SKYA'I ZAB CHOS YUN
RING GNANG BA DANG, DGE TSUL DANG DGE SLONG GI BSLAB SDOM

MANG PO BSTZAL BA SOGS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I TSOGS RGYA CHER SPEL
ZHING, BAR BAR RNAMS SU BCAD RGYA MDZAD NAS GSANG SNGAGS

@455 ZAB MO'I NYAMS LEN YANG LAN MANG MDZAD, DGUNG LO BDUN CU
PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS MO SBRUL LO'I (1641) ZLA BA

GNYIS PA'I NANG BLA BRANG RDZONG NAS GRANG MO CHER LHA KHANG
GSAR BZHENGS KYI ZHAL BKOD CHED DU PHEBS, BLA BRANG RDZONG GI
PHYI SGO NAS

GZIMS SPYIL LA GZIGS TE ``KHANG PA KHYED KYI NANG LA SDOD RGYU
SKYID PO BYUNG, CHOS KYANG MANG PO BSHAD RGYU BYUNG, SGOM
NYAMS LEN

YANG DGA' MO BYUNG, KHANG PA KHYED GA LER BZHUGS SHIG'' GSUNGS
KYANG, PHYAG G-YOG RNAMS LA DOGS PA GTAN NAS MA BYUNG

'DUG DE NAS GRANG CHEN DU PHEBS TE PHYAG MDZOD LA ``DA LO
MKHAR LAS BYAS STABS KHYED LA DKA' NGAL YONG RGYU RED'' GSUNG,

DE NAS CUNG ZAD BSNYEL BA'I TSUL BSTAN NAS ZLA BA BZHI PA'I
TSES BRGYAD NYIN PAR ZHAL 'DON GSUNG BZHIN PAR ZHING KHAMS
GZHAN

DU GSHEGS, TSES BCU GNYIS NYIN PAR, BSHES GNYEN MKHAN PO MTHA'
YAS DANG, THUGS SRAS DKAR LEB SLOB DPON

BCAS KYIS SKU GDUNG ME MCHOD PHUL ZHING, LHA KHANG GSAR PA'I
NANG SKU 'DRA GZI 'OD 'BAR BA ZHIG KYANG BZHENGS SO, DGUNG LO

SUM CU NAS BDUN CU'I BAR LO BZHI BCU'I RING DAM PA'I CHOS
'CHAD NYAN KHO NA LA THUGS BRTZON MDZAD PAS, DAD LDAN GYI SLOB

MA DPAL SA SKYA PA SNGAGS 'CHANG 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA' BSOD
NAMS DANG, SPYAN SNGA TSUL KHRIMS 'BAR GYI RNAM 'PHRUL RGYAL

SRAS KUN DGA' DON GRUB, SA SKYA PA 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA' BSOD
NAMS LHUN GRUB, BKA' BRGYUD KYI MNGA' BDAG SGAM

PO PHYAG NA RDO RJE NOR BU, RJE DBON MGON PO BSOD NAMS MCHOG
LDAN, DRUNG RAMS PA CHOS DKAR RNAM RGYAL SOGS MKHAN SLOB

GDAN SA PA SHIN TU MANG PO DANG, BYANG BDAG PO KUN DGA' BSOD
NAMS SOGS DPON RIGS MKHAS PA'ANG MANG PO BYUNG NGO, ,

RJES RABS RNAMS LA PHAN PA'I DON DU GSUNG RTZOM MDZAD PA'I
SKOR LA KHONG GI SLOB MA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN

GYIS KHONG 'DAS NAS LO GSUM 'DAS PA CHU LUG LOR BRTZAMS PA'I
RNAM THAR <<BYIN RLABS CHU RGYUN>> LTAR NA, TSAD MA RIG GTER

GYI RNAM BSHAD SHOG GRANGS NYIS BRGYA LHAG YOD PA DANG, PHAR
PHYIN GYI SPYI DON DGONGS PA RAB GSAL, DBU MA 'JUG PA'I SPYI
DON

THEG MCHOG SNANG GSAL, 'DUL BA'I SPYI DON CHEN MO THUB BSTAN
RGYAS PA'I NYIN BYED, MNGON PA MDZOD KYI SPYI DON SHES BYA'I

GSAL BYED SOGS MDO'I SKOR SHIN TU MANG PO YOD PA DANG, SNGAGS
KYI SKOR, BRTAG PA GNYIS PA'I 'GREL PA DANG, KYE RDO RJE

DANG BDE MCHOG RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED GSANG 'DUS SOGS KYI RNAM
BSHAD, LAM 'BRAS KHRID YIG SOGS MANG PO DANG, THUGS RJE

DPAL GYI RNAM THAR DANG, MKHAN CHEN DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG GI
RNAM THAR SOGS GSUNG KHYON SDOM PO TI BCUR LONG BA YOD PAR

BSHAD, NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BRIS MA POD GSUM DANG, PAR MA
POD GCIG BCAS KHYON SDOM POD BZHI BZHUGS SO, ,

@456 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BLA MA DAM PA BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN NI, YAB BDAG NYID CHEN PO
BZANG PO DPAL DGUNG LO LNGA BCU RTZA GCIG BZHES PA'I

DUS SU SKU ZHANG MGON PO DPAL GYI SRAS MO MA GCIG GZHON NU
'BUM MA LUG SKYES ZHES BYA BA GONG MA RGYAL PO'I LUNG GIS PHUD
PA'I

BTZUN MO DRUG PA LA SRAS GSUM GYI THA CHUNG DU RAB BYUNG LNGA
PA'I CHU MO BYI BA'I LOR (1312) ZHA LU KHANG GSAR DU SKU
BLTAMS SO, ,GAL

@460 TE RMAN RTZE'I YUL DU RGYA MO GCIG BZHES PA DE NAS BRTZIS
NA BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I BTZUN MO LUG SKYES 'DI BTZUN MO BDUN PA
YIN NO,

KHONG BYIS PA CHUNG NGU'I DUS SU NYAN PO BA BSOD NAMS BSTAN PA
DANG RONG PA SHES RAB SENG GE SOGS LA DBANG 'GA' ZHUS,

DGUNG LO DRUG BDUN BZHES PA NA BLA MA RIN CHEN DPAL BZANG LA
RGYUD BRTAG PA GNYIS PA GSAN SBYONG MDZAD PAS RING MIN THUGS

SU CHUD, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PAR RIN CHEN SGANG DU SDE SNOD 'DZIN
PA MANG PO'I DBUS SU BRTAG GNYIS KYI BSHAD PA MDZAD, KUN

GYIS KHONG GI THUGS RIG LA BSTOD BSNGAGS BYAS, DE NAS LO GNYIS
KYI BAR MU MTHUD NAS KYE RDOR DANG JO NANG LUGS KYI DUS

'KHOR MAN NGAG BCAS PA, 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG DGYES PA RDO RJE
SOGS GSANG SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG POR GSAN SBYONG MDZAD,

DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PAR BLA CHEN KUN DGA' BLO GROS KYI SPYAN
SNGAR DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS SHING THEG CHEN SEMS BSKYED
DANG

DBANG RJES GNANG SOGS CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR
BLA MA DPAL LDAN SENG GE LA TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL SOGS TSAD

MA'I SKOR DANG GSANG SNGAGS LAM 'BRAS KYI KHRID RGYUD 'BUM KYI
LUNG SOGS GSAN CING THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU

BDUN PAR JO GDAN MKHAN PO BSOD NAMS GRAGS PAS MKHAN PO DANG
DPAL LDAN SENG GES SLOB DPON, BLA MA BZANG POS GRIB

TSOD PA BYAS TE RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, MTSAN
BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN ZHES PA GSOL, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PAR BO

DONG BYA RGOD GSHONG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU SNGON GYI MKHAN
SLOB GNYIS KYIS GTZOS DGE 'DUN BCU BDUN GYI DBUS SU BSNYEN
RDZOGS KYI

BSLAB SDOM YANG DAG PAR BLANGS, MKHAN CHEN BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA
DANG BSOD NAMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYI DRUNG DU 'DUL BA

MDO RTZA SOGS 'DUL BA'I SKOR LA GSAN PA MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD,
SNGON DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR DPANG LO BLO GROS BRTAN PA'I MDUN

GCEN 'JAM DBYANGS DON YOD RGYAL MTSAN DANG LHAN CIG TU MNGON
PA KUN BTUS DANG KLU SGRUB KYI BSTOD TSOGS BCAS GSAN,

DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PAR RIN CHEN SGANG BLA BRANG DU DPANG LO'I
MDUN DBU MA RTZA BA SHES RAB DANG DE'I 'GREL PA TSIG GSAL DBU
MA

MJUG PA DBU MA BZHI BRGYA PA BCAS DANG 'KHOR LO BDE MCHOG DANG
GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI SKOR SOGS GSANG SNGAGS SKOR BCAS MANG DU

GSAN, LO MANG RING DPANG LO CHEN PO DANG RGYAL BA BRAG PHUG PA
BSOD NAMS DPAL SOGS LA MDO SNGAGS ZAB CHOS SPYI DANG KHYAD

PAR SA SKYA'I THUN MIN GYI CHOS MA LUS PA GSAN, BU STON RIN PO
CHE YANG SA SKYA DANG BO DONG 'BRAS YUL SOGS SU GDAN DRANGS
NAS

CHOS MANG PO ZHUS,

DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR LO GCIG GI NANG HOR GYI GDAN 'DREN PA
THENGS GSUM BYUNG ZHING GDAN 'DREN PA'I GSER YIG PA

RNAMS DANG LHAN CIG TU LHA SAR BYON, JO BO RIN PO CHER GSER
CHAB GSOL, GSER YIG PA RNAMS BRDZANGS RJES GUNG THANG DU 

PHEBS NAS ZLA BA DRUG TZAM BZHUGS, BSAM YAS SU PHEBS NAS BO
DHI SA TVA'I DBU THOD SOGS RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS RNAMS LA

GZUNGS 'BUL MDZAD CING BSTOD PA YANG BRTZAMS, THABS SNA TSOGS
KYIS HOR DU BYON MI DGOS PAR GYUR, KHONG NI GTZANG SA

SKYA DANG BO DONG SOGS NAS MNGA' RIS GUNG THANG DBUS BSAM YAS
DANG SNYE THANG BCAS DGON SDE MANG POR 'CHAD NYAN YUN RING

MDZAD CING BO DONG PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DANG SKAD GNYIS SMRA
BA'I DBANG PO BYANG CHUB RTZE MO SOGS MKHAS DBANG ZLA BRAL
MANG PO KYANG

KHONG LA ZAB CHOS ZHUS, RGYA GAR DANG BAL PO GU GE MNGA' RIS
HOR DANG RGYA NAG MDO STOD SMAD TSANG MAR SNYAN GRAGS KYIS
KHYAB,

RGYA GAR NAS YONGS PA'I PHYI ROL PA'I MKHAS PA 'GAS KYANG
KHONG LA DAD DE RAB TU BYUNG BAR MDZAD, KHONG GI RTZA BA'I BLA
MA NYAN CHEN

BSOD NAMS BRTAN PA, RONG PA SHES RAB SENG GE DPANG LO BLO GROS
BRTAN PA, GCEN PO 'JAM DBYANGS DON YOD RGYAL

MTSAN, YAB BDAG NYID CHEN PO BZANG PO DPAL LNGA PO NI GTZO BO
YIN LA DE MIN SPYIR BTANG GI CHOS 'BREL TZAM YOD PA'I BLA MA
NI

SHIN TU MANG NGO, ,DGUNG LO NGA BZHI PA SA PHO SPREL LO NAS SA
MO BYA LO'I BAR LO GCIG LHAG GI RING DPAL BSAM YAS KYI GTZUG
LAG

KHANG ZHIG GSO DANG DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN BZHI GSAR
BZHENGS LA RAB GNAS GZUNGS 'JUG SOGS MDZAD CING DER

'DUS PA'I SER SKYA BRGYA STONG MANG POR MANG JA DANG 'GYED
BCAS GNANG, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG PA CHU GLANG LOR BO DONG
AER

CHOS 'KHOR RGYA CHEN PO BSKOR BA DANG DGUNG LO RE GNYIS PA
SHING STAG LOR DPAL BSAM YAS LHUN GYIS GRUB PA'I GNAS MCHOG TU

CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA DE GNYIS SNGA NA MED PA'I CHOS 'KHOR LEGS
SHING RGYA CHEN PO GNYIS YIN LA CHOS 'KHOR BSKOR BA RTING
MA'ANG

YIN,

DGUNG LO RE GNYIS PA SHING STAG LO'I ZLA BA DGU PAR TSAL PAS
RA GA BRAG TU GDAN DRANGS TE CHOS 'GA' GNANG RJES CHOS RDZONG

DU TSUR 'BYON PA'I LAM BAR GSANG PHU RU PHEBS NAS CHA PA CHOS
SENG GI SKU 'BUM MJAL, CHOS RDZONG DU PHEBS NAS ZLA GCIG TZAM

BZHUGS, SLOB MA RNAMS LA ``DA LO MANG PO SONG RIM GRO YANG
GANG DGOS BTANG ZIN, SA SKYA'I BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI SKU
'BUM

TSOR ZHIG GSO ZHIG BYED SNYAM YANG GRUB MA SONG, DE MA GTOGS
GZHAN BLO'I LHAG MA LUS PA MED'' GSUNGS, ZLA BA BCU GCIG

@461 PAR 'JANG GI LHA KHANG DU ZHAG DGU LA SGRUB MCHOD MDZAD
RJES THUGS SHIN TU DGYES PA'I NGANG NAS ``DA NI BYA BA THAMS
CAD RDZOGS PA

YIN'' GSUNGS, DGUNG LO RE BZHI RU PHEBS PA SHING MO YOS LO'I
(1375) ZLA BA GSUM PAR DBUS KYI SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS GDAN

ZHUS LTAR DBUS SU BYON, SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA CHEN PO DANG DGE
BSHES MANG PO LA DUS 'KHOR GYI DBANG GNANG, SKABS DER SKU

CUNG ZAD SNYUNG BAS SNYE THANG DU BYON NAS JO BO'I SKU 'BUM LA
PHYAG MCHOD MANG PO MDZAD, LAM DU 'O SHANG RDO'I GTZUG LAG
KHANG NANG

LA'ANG PHYAG MCHOD PHUL, LAM BAR RNAMS SU DGE BSHES 'GA' ZHIG
LA MI LCOGS BZHIN DU PHAR PHYIN GYI 'GREL PA'I LUNG GNANG,

DE NAS BSAM YAS SU BYON NAS MKHAN PO BO DHI SA TVA'I DBU THOD
KYI DRUNG DU PHYAG MCHOD DANG SMON LAM 'DEBS PA SOGS NYIN RE

BZHIN MDZAD, ZLA SHAS RING SMAN GSOL BA DANG RIM GRO SOGS JI
LTAR BYAS KYANG MA PHAN PAR DGUNG LO RE BZHIR PHEBS PA RAB

BYUNG DRUG PA'I SHING MO YOS KYI LO'I (1375) ZLA BA DRUG PA'I
TSES NYER LNGA LA DGONGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,

KHONG GI GSUNG NI, MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG CHEN PHAL CHE BA'I
'GREL PA RGYAS BSDUS MANG PO YOD PAR MA TSAD SGRA YI BSTAN
BCOS

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SA LO 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS NI, DRI MED 'KHON GYI RIGS
YAB DBANG NAM MKHA' BKRA SHIS RGYAL MTSAN

DANG YUM HOR MO TSE BRTAN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BRGYAD
PA'I SHING MO SBRUL GYI LO (1485) ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES BRGYAD
NYIN SKU

BLTAMS, ZHAG GRANGS 'GA' 'DAS PA DANG MI NYAG PAndITA GRAGS PA
RDO RJES MJAL, GZIGS MA THAG TU NAD MED PAR GYUR

CIG CES GSUNGS NAS SKU PANG DU BZHES, SA SKYA PA'I BSTAN PA'I
RTZA BA ZIN PA 'DUG GSUNGS, MTSAN LA RDO RJE RGYA SOG BKRA

SHIS RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POR GSOL, BLA MA LEGS PA BZANG PO LA
YON TAN THAMS CAD KYI PHYI MO 'BRI KLOG BSLABS, BOD

YIG MI THE BA'I RGYA GAR SOGS KYI YIG RIGS DRUG DANG, MKHA'
'GRO'I YI GE HOR YIG GSAR PA SOGS YIG RIGS MANG TZAM

SBYANGS,

@467 DGUNG LO DRUG BZHES PA'I TSE MI NYAG PAndITA DANG RGYA GAR
SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN DRUNG DU DGES PA RDO RJE'I DBANG SOGS DBANG

LUNG SNA TSOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU GCIG PA SHING YOS LO'I ZLA BA
BCU PA'I DKAR PHYOGS LA MKHAN CHEN BSOD NAMS LHUN GRUB

LAS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, THUB PA DGONGS GSAL SOGS BKA'
CHOS DU MA GSAN, NGOR AE WAm CHOS LDAN DU RJE BTZUN RDO

RJE 'CHANG DKON MCHOG 'PHEL BAS MKHAN PO DANG GLO BO MKHAN CHEN
PAS SLOB DPON MDZAD NAS DGE TSUL DANG RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA

BZHES, MTSAN 'JAM DBYANGS KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS GRAGS PA RGYAL
MTSAN ZHES GSOL, BSLAB BYA PHRA MO TSUN LA'ANG KHA NA

MA THO BA'I DRI MAS MA GOS PAR BTZUN PA'I MCHOG TU GYUR, DGUNG
LO BCU GNYIS PA ME PHO 'BRUG GI LOR MKHAN CHEN DKON MCHOG

'PHEL DANG LHAN CIG TU SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA'I 'KHOR DU MA DANG BCAS
TE CHOS RJE SA SKYA PAndI TA CHEN PO'I CHOS KYI KHRI LA PHEBS,
BSTAN

BCOS CHEN PO THUB PA'I DGONGS GSAL NYIN GSUM BAR LEGS PAR BSHAD
PAS 'KHOR SLOB KUN DGA' BA'I DPAL LA BKOD,

DGUNG GRANGS BCU BZHI PA SA PHO RTA'I LOR BZHI THOG BLA BRANG GI
GDAN SAR MNGA' GSOL, BCO LNGA PAR DGES RDOR DANG PHUR PA

GUR MGON SOGS KYI BSNYEN BSGRUB SBYIN SREG BCAS RGYUD KYI DGONGS
PA LTAR LEGS PAR MDZAD, DBON YON TAN 'BYUNG GNAS

KYI MDUN 'DUL BA MDO RTZA RNAM 'GREL SDOM GSUM RAB DBYE SOGS SDE
SNOD DU MA LA GSAN BSAM DANG 'BEL GTAM GYIS GTAN LA

'BEBS, NYIN LTAR JA YUN RE LA SHOG BU MDA' TSAD MA BDUN RE THUGS
'DZIN GNANG, RAB BYUNG BRGYAD PA'I SHING PHO BYI BA LO

(1504) DGUNG GRANGS NYI SHU PAR, MKHAN PO DKON MCHOG 'PHEL BA
DANG LAS SLOB SANGS RGYAS RIN CHEN GSANG STON RVA STOD

YON TAN 'BYUNG GNAS DGE 'DUN BCU PHRAG PHYED KYI DBUS SU BSNYEN
PAR RDZOGS, BSLAB BYA PHRA MO TSUN LA'ANG BAG YOD MDZAD

PAS GANGS LJONGS 'DUL 'DZIN KUN GYIS GTZUG TU BKUR, YONGS 'DZIN
DKON MCHOG 'PHEL BA'I DRUNG DU SLAR YANG DBU MA

LUGS KYI SEMS BSKYED DANG LAM 'BRAS SOGS DBANG LUNG KHRID GSUM
RGYA MTSO LTA BU GSAN, ZHA LU LO TZ'A BA RIN CHEN CHOS SKYONG

BZANG PO LA SGRA KA TZAN GYI 'GREL BA YAN LAG DANG BCAS PA SNYAN
NGAG ME LONG MA DANG SDEB SBYOR MNGON BRJOD SOGS THUN MONG RIG

GNAS SKOR GSAN BSAM LEGS PAR MDZAD, SLAR YANG CHAG LO SOGS MKHAS
GRUB DU MA LA YANG SGRA TSAD BZO GSO SDEB SBYOR MNGON

BRJOD SOGS THUN MONG RIG GNAS YAN LAG DANG BCAS PA GSAN TE, TSIG
DON MTHA' DAG LEGS PAR THUGS SU CHUD, PHYI

NANG GI RIG PA'I GNAS GANG LA'ANG THOGS PA MED PA'I PAndI TA
CHEN POR GYUR, RANG GI JI LTAR RTOGS PA'I CHOS RNAMS DPE 'KHYUD

DU MA SONG BAR RTZE GDONG DANG NGOR NA LENDRA CHOS 'KHOR LHA SA
SOGS DGON GNAS MANG POR TSIG DON GO BDE ZHING CHOD CHE BA,

DKA' BA'I GNAS RNAMS DPYIS PHYIN PAR BKROL ZHING ZHAL GSAL BA
BLO DANG MTSAMS PAR NYIN MTSAN KHOR YUG TU 'CHAD SPEL

GNANG BAS GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI BLO GROS KYI PADMO RGYAS SHING RIG
PA'I GNAS KUN KHYAB GDAL DU SPEL BAR MDZAD, KHYAD PAR DU DGUNG

LO SO GNYIS PA ME PHO BYI BA LO (1516) NA LENDRAR GSUNG NGAG RIN
PO CHE LAM 'BRAS BU DANG BCAS PAS THOG DRANGS ZAB RGYAS KYI CHOS

MANG PO BSTZAL, DE NAS MUS KYI BSAM GTAN PHUG TU LO HRIL PO GCIG

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SI TU CHOS KYI 'BYUNG GNAS MCHOG NI KHAMS SDE DGE DPAL SPUNGS
DGON GSAR DU 'DEBS PA PO YIN, 'KHRUNGS YUL 'BRI

ZLA ZAL MO SGANG GI KHONGS SDE DGE LHUN GRUB STENG DANG NYE BAR
AA LO NANG DING RI SGANG DU YAB NGAG DBANG TSE RING DANG YUM
PHRA 'GU MA

GNYIS LA SRAS SKU MCHED BZHI 'KHRUNGS PA'I THOG MA YIN, KHONG NI
RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA MO YOS LOR (1699) ZLA BA BCU

GCIG PA'I TSES BCU BDUN, RES GZA' PHUR BU SKAR MA NAM SO SNGA
DRO NYI MA SHAR BA DANG DUS MTSUNGS SU SKU 'KHRUNGS, 'KHRUNGS

MA THAG NAS KHU BO AA LO BLA MA KUN MKHYEN GYIS MGON PO SRUNG
ZHES MTSAN GSOL, DGUNG LO GSUM PA'I DUS SU KARMA PA SKU PHRENG
BCU

GCIG PA YE SHES RDO RJES SI TU SKU THOG BZHI PA CHOS KYI DBANG
PHYUG GI SKYES PHRENG DU NGOS 'DZIN GNANG, (DE YANG DANG PO BKRA
SHIS

DPAL 'BYOR GYI SKU SKYES DPAL MI 'KHRUGS CHOS KYI 'OD ZER RAM
CHOS KYI GO CHA YIN, GNYIS PA CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN, GSUM PA

CHOS KYI RDO RJE, BZHI PA CHOS KYI DBANG PHYUG LNGA PA CHOS KYI
'BYUNG GNAS, DRUG PA PADMA NYIN BYED DBANG PO, BDUN PA PADMA

KUN BZANG, BRGYAD PA PADMA DBANG MCHOG RGYAL PO, DGU PA DA LTA
'TSO ZHING GZHES PA'I PADMA DON YOD YIN,) DGUNG GRANGS LNGA

PAR YAB KYIS SBYOR KLOG BSLABS, 'BRI KLOG SOGS THOGS PA MED PAR
MKHYEN, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR AA LO DPAL 'BYOR

DGON DU RGYUN SPYOD KYI CHO GA PHYAG LEN SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS,

MKHAS PA'I DBANG PO DPAL GRUB MDUN SKAR RTZIS DANG SGRA RIG PA
SNYAN NGAG SKOR DANG, KHU BO BLA MA KUN MKHYEN MDUN DBU

PHAR 'DUL MDZOD SOGS NANG DON RIG PA LEGS PAR GSAN PAS YON TAN
GYI GZHI LEGS PAR BTING, KHYAD PAR DE'U DMAR

DGE BSHES LA DBYANG 'CHAR GYI RI MO MTHAR PHYIN PAR GSAN, MNGON
RTOGS RGYAN RTZA 'GREL 'DUL BA MDO RTZA 'DUL t'IKA LUNG RIG

GTER MDZOD RGYUD BLA MA'I RTZA BA DANG THOGS 'GREL BCAS THUGS
'DZIN GNANG, BCA' 'BUD BRDUNG GSUM GAR THIG DBYANGS

GSUM SOGS KYANG RIS MED KYI DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS PAD TSUL BZHIN
DU BSTEN NAS KHONG DU CHUD PAR MDZAD, LHA RIS KYANG RGYA

BAL BOD SOGS KYI LEGS CHA THAMS CAD PHYOGS GCIG TU BSDUS NAS
SGAR BRIS LA KHYAD THON MDZAD, YIG RIGS SNA TSOGS DANG

KHYAD PAR SLOB DPON SGEG PA'I RDO RJE'I PHYAG BRIS LANYDZA'I
MTSAN BRJOD DANG PARDHA LI'I BRIS MA BRTAG GNYIS SOGS LA NAN
GYIS SBYANGS,

GTER CHEN DBON PO AO RGYAN LHUN GRUB MDUN ZUR MANG SNYAN RGYUD
BDE MCHOG TSOGS LAS KYI GAR SNA SUM BRGYA DRUG CU GSANG GAR

DANG BCAS PA PHUL PHYIN SBYANGS, DGUNG GRANGS DGU PAR GSOL NGAN
GSOL BAS BSNYUN TSAB CHE BAR BYUNG, DE'I RING DU DPAL

'BYOR DGON DU YOD PA'I PHYAG DPE RNAMS LEGS PAR GZIGS PAS GSUNG
RAB SPYI'I GO BA RAGS TZAM 'KHRUNGS,

DGUNG GRANGS BCU BZHI PAR CHU PHO 'BRUG LO (1712) ZLA BA LNGA
PAR DBUS SU THENGS DANG POR BYON, LO DE'I CHO 'PHRUL ZLA BA'I

TSES BCO LNGAR ZHVA DMAR THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BRGYAD PA DPAL CHEN
CHOS KYI DON GRUB MDUN DU RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA BZHES, MTSAN

KARMA BSTAN PA'I NYIN BYED GTZUG LAG CHOS KYI SNANG BA ZHES
GSOL, ZHVA DMAR GYI COD PAN BZHES SHING SHIS BRJOD KYI ME TOG
'THOR,

GSER THAM DANG SKU CHAS SOGS CHE 'DON GYI GNANG SKYES BKA' DRIN
DU MA THOB, RGYAL DBANG KARMA PA BCU GNYIS PA DANG ZHVA DMAR

@475 BRGYAD PA GTZOS MKHAS GRUB KYI BLA MA DU MA LA MNYAM MED
RGYAL BA BKA' BRGYUD PA'I ZAB CHOS KYI RIM PA TSANG LA MA NOR
BA'I GZHUNG CI

RIGS PA GSAN BSAM GNANG, ZHVA DKAR RIN PO CHE'I MDUN SKAR RTZIS
DANG, SKYES TSAL DRUNG RAM BSOD NAMS MDUN BSDUS

TSAD LEGS PAR SBYANGS, RJE 'DI'I ZHVA DMAR PO BZHES DON YANG
RGYAL MCHOG DGU PA DBANG PHYUG RDO RJES, SI TU CHOS KYI RGYAL

MTSAN LA DUS GSUM RGYAL BA'I PHRIN LAS KARMA PA'I PHRIN LA RAB
'BYAM 'DZIN PA LA MNGA' GSOL BA'I CHED DU GNANG ZHING, DE

NAS BZUNG ZHVA DMAR PO BZHES PA YIN, SI TU GONG MA RNAMS LA ZHVA
NAG RIGS LNGA'I DBYIBS CAN YOD, TRE HOR RIN PO CHE

SOGS RNYING MA'I MKHAS CHEN MANG PO LA RNYING MA'I CHOS SKOR DU
MA GSAN, LHA LDAN GYI GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS DGON GNAS RTEN

GSUM MJAL TE LO GNYIS LHAG LA SDE DGE DPAL 'BYOR DGON DU TSUR
PHEBS, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PA'I DBYAR THOG DER TSAB TSA BLA

MAS ZHUS NGOR SHAR ZLA'I PHYOGS SU BTEGS, RIS MED KYI DAD LDAN
MANG PO CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GIS SMIN PAR MDZAD,

DGUNG GRANGS NYER GSUM PA LCAGS MO GLANG GI LO'I ZLA BA DRUG PA
(1721) LA MA YUM BCAS DBUS SU THENGS GNYIS PAR

PHEBS, DBUS GTZANG GI DGON GNAS DANG RGYAL DBANG ZHVA DMAR NAG
LHAN RGYAS KYI ZHABS PAD MJAL, YAB SRAS LHAN RGYAS

BAL YUL RTEN MJAL THENGS DANG POR PHEBS, BAL YUL YAM BU RGYAL
POS PHO BRANG DU GDAN DRANGS, BSNYEN BKUR BLA NA MED

PAR MDZAD, PAndI TA PRA DHAMNA DANG BIshTU BA TI K'A LA N'A YA
NA DZA YA MANGGA SOGS DANG SGRA DANG MNGON BRJOD SNYAN NGAG SOGS
KYI BGRO

GLENG MDZAD, PHAN TSUN DOGS GNAD MANG PO BKROL, SNGAR BOD DU MA
'GYUR BA'I RGYA GZHUNG 'GA' ZHIG MJAL, SLAR BOD DU

PHEBS, CHU PHO STAG GI LO (1722) ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES GNYIS
LA MTSUR MDO BO LUNG GI GTZUG LAG KHANG DU ZHVA DMAR COD

PAN 'DZIN PA BRGYAD PA DPAL CHEN CHOS KYI DON GRUB KYIS MKHAN
SLOB SBRAGS MA DANG, RJE BTZUN TRE HOR RIN PO CHE BZHI PA KARMA

BSTAN 'DZIN DAR RGYAS KYIS GSANG STON, BU 'BOR DGE SLONG KARMA
RGYA MTSOS DUS BGO BA, YANGS PA CAN GYI DGE SLONG BRTAN

MKHAS LDAN PA KARMA SHES RAB DANG KARMA TSE BRTAN BCAS LNGA
TSOGS KYI DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, BSLAB BYA PHRA MO TSUN
LA'ANG

GCES SPRAS GNANG BAS 'DUL BA 'DZIN PA KUN GYI TOG LTAR GYUR,

BKA' BLON NGA PHOD RDO RJE RGYAL PO'I MTHUS T'A LA'I BDUN PA
SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO'I MDUN LAM RIM GYI KHRID SOGS DGE LDAN GYI

CHOS SKOR GSAN PA DANG GSUNG GLENG SMAR BA MDZAD, SA SKYA'I CHOS
SKOR YANG MANG DAG GSAN PA SOGS DBUS PHYOGS SU LO BDUN MA

ZIN TZAM DU GNAS MJAL DANG GRVA SKOR GNANG, DER NANG DON RIG PA
SOGS RIG PA'I GNAS BCU PHRAG DAG LA BGRO GLENG DANG

'CHAD SPEL RGYA CHER GNANG, SLAR YANG GZHIS DGON DU PHEBS, DGUNG
LO SO DRUG PA SHING PHO STAG LO (1734) LA DBUS SU

THENGS GSUM PAR PHEBS, BAL YUL YAM BU RGYAL POS BKUR BZOS TSAD
MED KYIS GLANG CHEN RGYAN GYIS SPRAS TE BSDUS, BRAM

ZE'I PAndI TA DANG NANG PA'I PAn CHEN MANG PO LA BRDA SPROD RIG
PA'I SKOR DANG SNYAN NGAG MNGON BRJOD RIG BYED KYI GTAM RGYUD
SOGS

THUN MONG GI RIG GNAS DANG, THUN MIN SDE SNOD SKOR LA BGRO GLENG
MANG DU MDZAD, K'A SH'I'I PAndI TA DZA YA MANGGAS KHYOD BOD LA

DBUL PHYUG GI KHYAD PAR LAS MKHAS RMONGS KYI KHYAD PAR CHER MED
PA TSOR, 'PHAGS YUL YIN NA KHYOD LA GDUGS DKAR PO BDUN

PHUB DGOS PA 'DUG SOGS MGON PO GANG GI YON TAN LA BSTOD BSNGAGS
TSAD MED MDZAD,

DE LTAR PAndI TA RNAMS DANG BGRO GLENG DU MA GNANG BAS, THUN
MONG DANG THUN MIN GYI RIG PA'I GNAS THAMS CAD LA RNAM

DPYOD KYI RTZAL RDZOGS PAS SPOBS PA'I GTER CHEN BRDOL, GZHAN
DRING MI 'JOG PA'I RIG PA'I GNAS MTHA' DAG LA RNAM DPYOD

PHUL DU PHYIN, GSUNG THAMS CAD KYI TSIG DON TSANG MAR NOR BA CHA
SHAS TZAM YAN MED LA TSIG NYUNG DON 'DUS PA SHA STAG YIN,

ME STAG LOR (1746) GDAN SA DPAL SPUNGS GSAR 'DEBS KYI CHED DU SA
DPYAD GZIGS, ZLA BA DGU PA'I TSES GSUM NAS SKYES

RABS DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING GI SKYA RIS GNANG, RAB BYUNG BCU
GNYIS PA'I LCAGS LUG LO (1751) ZLA BA DANG POR DPAL

SPUNGS SU BTEGS, ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES GNYIS LA SA SLONG GI CHO
GA MDZAD, TSES BDUN LA LHA KHANG GI RTZIG RMANG BTING, HOR

ZLA BDUN PA'I NANG PHAL CHER GRUB, SA BYA LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PA'I
TSES GSUM LA SHING TSON GYI TSAG PAR RNAMS PHYAG BRIS GNANG,

TSES BDUN NAS LDEB BRIS KYI SKYA RIS MDZAD, KHYAD PAR RTOGS
BRJOD DPAG BSAM 'KHRI SHING GI BKOD PA RGYA YI SI THANG LTAR GYI
RI

MO TSON MDANGS BCAD RNAMS RGYA'I LUGS DANG, KHANG BZANG DANG CHA
LUGS SOGS RGYA BAL GYI YUL NYAMS SOGS KYI LEGS CHA

THAMS CAD BSDUS TE RMAD DU BYUNG BA'I ZHAL THANG SUM CU KHA LHAG
DANG, LDER BZO DANG BRKOS SKU SOGS KYI LAG RTZAL MANG DU SPEL

BAS LJONGS 'DIR BZO RIG GI BSTAN PA GZHIR BZHENGS SU BSLANGS,

BKA' BLON ZHABS DRUNG TSE RING DBANG RGYAL GYIS BSKUL BA'I 'OG
SUM RTAGS 'GREL CHEN <<MKHAS PA'I MGUL RGYAN MU TIG PHRENG

MDZES>> BRTZAMS, BOD KYI BRDA SPROD RIG PA'I DKA' GNAD MANG PO
GSAR DU DKROL, LCAGS PHAG LOR BKA' 'GYUR ZHU DAG

@476 GNANG, DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI SMYUG THOG PA BZHI BCU
KHA LHAG BSDUS, YIG GZUGS KYI LEGS CHA GCIG TU BSDUS TE

SDEB BRIS KYI SROL TSUGS, CHU GLANG LOR BKA' 'GYUR DKAR CHAG
BKRIS RTAGS BRGYAD KYI GRANGS DANG MNYAM PA'I LE'U MDZAD,

DA LTA SDE DGE'I PAR KHANG DU LE'U LNGA LAS BZHUGS MED, SA GLANG
LOR KHAMS SPRUL SOGS KYIS SNYAN NGAG GI DOGS NAS DRIS PAR

LAN LEGS PAR BSTZAL,

MDOR NA DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI RIS MED MKHAS DBANG GI YONGS
'DZIN BCU PHRAG LNGA LHAG BSTEN, SGRA TSAD BZO

GSO YAN LAG DANG BCAS PA'I THUN MONG RIG GNAS DANG NANG RIG SKOR
DBU PHAR 'DUL MDZOD SOGS MDO PHYOGS DANG BDE DGYES

GSANG GSUM SOGS SNGAGS KYI RGYUD SDE CHEN PO BZHI DANG, KHYAD
PAR ZAB LAM N'A RO CHOS DRUG GI SDOM PA SOGS GSAN BSAM SGOM

PA MTHAR PHYIN SGO NAS THUGS KYI DPAL BE'UR YONGS SU GTAMS,
MKHAS PA'I YANG RTZER SON, DBUS SU THENGS LNGA DANG,

BAL YUL DU THENGS GNYIS YUN NAN 'JANG RGYAL RONG GI RGYAL KHAG
SOGS MDO STOD MDO SMAD KUN TU ZHABS KYIS BCAGS, RIS

MED KYI BLA SPRUL DANG SDE 'BANGS YONGS LA JI LTAR MTSAMS PA'I
DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA SOGS KYI

BKA' DRIN BSTZAL, RANG NYID KYIS JI LTAR RTOGS PA'I SHES BYA MA
LUS PA, BAL YUL DANG GANGS CAN LJONGS KYI YUL GRU KUN TU

'CHAD SPEL GNANG BAS BSKAL PA'I MTHAR YANG MI NUB BA'I RGYAL
MTSAN BTZUGS, DPAL SPUNGS SOGS 'CHAD NYAN SGOM SGRUB KYI

GNAS GZHI DU MA GSAR BSKRUN DANG NYAMS PA SLAR GSOS MDZAD, DGE
TSUL SLONG STONG PHRAG LNGA NYE BAR BSGRUBS, SDE DGE RGYAL PO

DANG 'JANG RGYAL PO SOGS LA LUGS GNYIS KYI BSLAB BYA GNANG STE
YUL GRU KUN LA PHAN BDE'I GZHI THENGS PAR MDZAD, RAB BYUNG

BCU GSUM PA'I SHING PHO RTA LOR (1774) RGYA NAG GONG MA'I GDAN
ZHUS LTAR ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES LNGA NAS RIM PAR DPAL SPUNGS

NAS BTEGS, ZLA BA DE'I TSES BCO BRGYAD DKAR MDZES SU PHEBS, DER
BAD MKHRIS KYI SNYUN GZHI BYUNG BAS DKAR MDZES RDZONG

GI SA CHA KLU GANG THANG DU DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON DRUG TU PHEBS
PA SHING RTA LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES NYER BZHI PA'I MTSAN
MOR

DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU MNAL LO, ,SLOB MA SPEL BA'I SKOR,
KARMA PA BDUD 'DUL RDO RJE, ZHVA DMAR CHOS GRUB RGYA MTSO,

KA: THOG RIG 'DZIN TSE DBANG NOR BU, BOD BKA' BLON ZHABS DRUNG
TSE RING DBANG RGYAL SOGS CHE DGU KUN GYIS GTZUG GIS

GTUGS SHING SKABS DER THUN MONG GI RIG PA'I GNAS DANG KHYAD PAR
BRDA SPROD DANG SMAN RTZIS LHA RIS BCAS LA MKHAS PA PHAL CHE BA

KHONG GI SLOB MAR MA GYUR PA MED, KHONG NI MI RIGS GZHAN DAG GI
RIG GNAS SBYONG BAR HA CANG SPRO BA ZHIG YIN TE BOD LA SNGAR MED

PA'I RGYA GAR GYI GZHUNG DANG, RGYA NAG GI SMAN DANG LHA RIS
BCAS KYI GZHUNG GSAR BSGYUR MANG DU MDZAD, KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM

DPAL SPUNGS PAR MA POD BCU BZHI YOD PA'I LNGA CHA BZHI TZAM
TSANG MA THUN MONG RIG GNAS SKOR SHA STAG YIN, NGED DPE MDZOD

KHANG DU KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM CHA TSANG BZHUGS YOD,

SUM PA YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR NI, BOD KHA BA CAN GYI LJONGS MDO
KHAMS SMAD KYI MTSO SNGON PO'I LHO NUB RMA CHU'I 'GRAM SNGAR AO

ROD SOG PO G-YAS RUS THOG MAR DBANG BSGYUR BA'I SA'I THIG LE YUL
THO LI ZHES PAR RJE'U DPON GYI RIGS SU BYON PA'I PHA RDO RJE
BKRA

SHIS DANG MA JUN GHAR PA BKRA SHIS MTSO GNYIS LA SRAS LNGA DANG
SRAS MO GNYIS TE MING SRING BDUN 'KHRUNGS PA LAS, RJE 'DI NYID

BZHI PA YIN, KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SHING SPREL LO'I
(1704) ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I TSES BCO LNGA'I SNGA DRO NYI SHAR GYI
DUS SU

SKU BLTAMS, LO GSUM TZAM LA SLEBS DUS PHAS PAn CHEN GYI GSOL
'DEBS DGE LEGS YON TAN MA SHO LO KA GCIG BSLAB, ME

PHAG LOR (1707) SOG PO CHE HOR DGE SLONG ZHES PAR DGE RGAN BSTEN
NAS LO GNYIS KYI RING KLOG BSLABS SHING CHOS SPYOD 'GA'

ZHIG SBYANGS, 'JAM BZHAD NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS SUM PA
GONG MA'I SKU SKYE RTZAD GCOD KYIS LCAGS STAG LOR (1710) RJE

'DI DGUNG LO BDUN DU PHEBS PA NA SUM PA GONG MA'I SKU SKYE YIN
PAR THAG BCAD SKU 'GAG CIG BSKON TE DGE BSNYEN DU BSGRUBS,

RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I BKA' BZHIN SDE DPON DANG YAB YUM
GYIS THAR SHUS CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO'I SKU MDUN DU BSKYAL, DE LA

YONGS RDZOGS DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA DANG BAR MA RAB BYUNG GI
SDOM PA MNOS, MTSAN BLO BZANG CHOS SKYONG ZHES PA GNANG, MI

RING BAR BLA MA DE NYID KYIS ZHAL TA ZHIB RGYAS GNANG BA THUGS
LA 'CHANG BZHIN PAR PHA YUL DU PHYIR PHEBS, LCAGS YOS LOR SKU

'BUM MJAL BAR BYON, CHU 'BRUG (1712) LO'I ZLA BA GSUM PA'I YAR
TSES BRGYAD LA DGON LUNG GIS SUM PA BLA BRANG DU GDAN

DRANGS, DGON LUNG BYAMS PA GLING NI RGYAL DBANG BZHI PA YON TAN
RGYA MTSOS BKA' BZHIN RGYAL SRAS DON YOD CHOS KYI RGYA MTSO'I

RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I SHING PHO 'BRUG LOR (1604) ZLA BA GSUM PA'I
NANG BTAB, GNAS DER SNGAR KARMA PA ROL BA'I RDO RJE YUN RING

DU BZHUGS MYONG LA SBAS YUL DKAR PO'I LJONGS SU RGYA GAR GRUB
CHEN BRGYAD CU'I SGRUB PHUG KYANG MJAL DU YOD CING MTSO SNGON
PO'I

BYANG GI PHYOGS SU YOD,

SLOB CHUNG BA NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN DANG BLO GROS RGYA MTSO
RNAM GNYIS KYI MDUN LA RIG LAM CHE 'BRING CHUNG GSUM DANG 'DUL

BA MNGON PA GONG 'OG PHAR PHYIN BCAS LA SBYONG BRTZON MTHAR
PHYIN MDZAD, CHOS BZANG RIN PO CHE'I MDUN LAM RIM GYI KHRID DANG

SMON SEMS KYI SDOM PA ZHUS, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG CHOS LDAN GYIS
PE CING PHO BRANG NAS GOS BER DANG ZHVA SNE RING BSLAB BYA BCAS

GNANG BA 'BYOR, SHING RTA LO'I DPYID KAR LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG
CHOS LDAN SKU GSHEGS, GU SHRI'I SRAS CHUNG BA AA KHU BKRA SHIS
P'A

THUR TSANG GIS SBYIN BDAG BYAS TE DGON LUNG BYAMS PA LHA KHANG
CHEN PO'I STENG GSER ZANGS KYI RGYA PHUBS BSKRUN, SHING LUG LOR

GRIB NAD KYIS SDOD MI TSUGS PA ZLA BA PHYED GNYIS BAR BYUNG, ME
SPREL LOR ZLA BA DRUG PA'I TSES BRGYAD LA SLOB DPON CHOS BZANG

MDUN DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES, MTSO SNGON GYI DPON T'A YAN
HUNG THA'I JIS YON SBYAR NAS DGON LUNG DU BYAMS MGON GYI SKU

GSER ZANGS LAS GRUB PA 'DOM LNGA LHAG YOD PA BZHENGS, RAB 'BYAMS
PA RGYA TIG BLO BZANG DON GRUB DANG 'DAN MA DKA' BCU

MGO KHRA GNYIS KYIS DBUS GTZANG DU SLOB GNYER LA 'GRO DGOS PA'I
SKUL SLONG BYAS, RJE 'DI LA PHEBS 'DOD SKOM PA CHU 'DOD LTAR

BYUNG YANG SUM PA CHOS RJE KHU DBON GYIS RE ZHIG BKAG CHU YOS
LOR DGUNG LO NYI SHUR DPA' RIN NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS MDUN ZLA

BA LNGA PA'I NYER LNGA NAS DGE 'DUN BRGYA PHRAG BDUN LHAG DANG
LHAN DU RGYUD SDE BZHI'I DBANG KHRID GSAN, DRUG PA'I BCO LNGA'I
SNGA

DROR DBANG RDZOGS PA DANG RIM PAR MTSO SNGON DU BTEG LAM BAR GAR
THIG DBYANGS GSUM SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS,

'JIGS BYED GTZO BOR BYAS PA'I STENG DU SH'AKYA THUB PA SOGS LNGA
DANG 'OG TU CHOS SKYONG BDUN BCAS KYI MTSON THANG BZHENGS, BRAM

GZUGS NI SUM PA BLA BRANG DU BZHUGS LA, GZHAN RNAMS BZO BO RNAMS
KYI LHA DPE RU KHYER, MTSO SNGON STOD PHYOGS KYI DPON

RNAMS NANG 'KHRUG YOD PA'I RKYEN GYIS DPON BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN
GYIS MI SNA BTANG STE SO LO MO'I BAR DU BSKYAL, DE NAS SNGON

BTZUN PA LNGA KHRI LNGA STONG 'DUS PAR GRAGS PA'I 'BRI GUNG GDAN
SA MTHIL MJAL, HOR ZLA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BRGYAD LA BKRA SHIS

LHUN POR PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE SKU BCAR LA PHEBS, ZLA BA DE'I TSES
BCU GCIG PAR PAn CHEN BLO BZANG YE SHES DPAL BZANG POS

MKHAN SLOB SBRAGS MA GNANG ZHING GSANG STON KHA SKONG DUS BGO BA
SOGS GRANGS TSANG BA'I DBUS SU BSNYEN PAR RDZOGS, MTSAN YE

SHES DPAL 'BYOR GNANG, LHA LDAN SPRUL BA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG
RGYAL BA SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSO SOGS MJAL, RA STOD DU RTAGS

RIGS BLOR 'DZIN MDZAD, DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS SU GRVA TSANG BZHI
YOD PA LAS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG GI BSAM BLO KHANG TSAN LA ZHUGS,

@484 GRVA TSANG GIS CHOS MDZAD BSKOS, MOG CA 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA
MTSO BSTEN NAS RIG PA'I GNAS KYI GTZO BO GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO

RNAMS LA SLOB GNYER GNANG, BRGYUD SMAD SLOB DPON BYA KHYUNG BA
NO MON HAN RIN PO CHES SE RA'I DGE BSHES DU MA DANG KHONG

MNYAM DU YOD PA LA BHO DHI TZE'I PHYAG PHRENG BZHI KHUG MDZAD
NAS SUM PA'I DBU LA PHYAG 'BEBS GNANG, DRANG NGES RNAM 'BYED
YANG

DAG MTHA'I SEMS BSKYED KYI BGRO GLENG RIM PAR GNANG YANG KHAS
LEN MA SHOR BAS THUGS DGYES, GRAL MGOR BZHAG NAS GSOL

ZHAL ZHO'I BKANG BA GNANG STE PHOR BA DE'I NANG DU 'THUNG GSUNGS
DA PHYIN CHAD NGA RGYAL MA BYED CES BKA' PHEBS, ME LUG LOR

DBYAR CHOS SKABS SU 'BRAS SPUNGS SPYI'I CHOS SU RDO GCAL CHEN
MOR DRANGS NGES DANG DBU MA'I THAL ZLOG GI TSOGS LANGS BYAS,

DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS GSANG SNGAGS RDO
RJE THEG PA LA BAG CHAGS 'JOG RGYU'I RE BA YOD KYANG ZHABS PHYI
PA'I BAR

CHAD KYIS PHEBS MA THUB, SLAR YANG GROGS NGAN DES SUM PA KHU
DBON DANG KHONG GNYIS BAR MI RIGS PA MANG DU BYAS KYANG SDIG PA

'DAG PA'I MTHUN RKYEN DU GYUR, GROGS NGAN DE LA ZHON RTA GON PA
LAM CHAS BYIN NAS RANG YUL DU RDZONGS, DE NAS BZUNG MTHUN

RKYEN HA CANG DKON POR GYUR, NYIN MTSAN RGYUN 'KHYONGS KYIS SKYO
NGAL MED PAR SLOB GNYER SHA STAG GNANG, LCANG SKYA NGAG DBANG

CHOS LDAN LA BDE MCHOG LU HI PA DANG DRIL BU PA KUN RIG BCAS KYI
DBANG GSAN, SHAR RTZE MKHAN CHEN NAM MKHA' BZANG PO LA

LAM RIM CHEN MO'I KHRID DANG BDE LAM NYAMS KHRID SEMS BSKYED
'BOGS CHOG GSANG 'DUS 'GREL BA BZHI SBRAGS KYI BSHAD PA DU MA

DANG BKA' 'GYUR PA DAM CHOS RIN CHEN LA GSUNG 'BUM GYI LUNG DANG
MNGA' RIS PA BLO BZANG YAR 'PHEL LA BA RI BRGYA RTZA MGON

CHEN BCU GSUM SOGS KYI RJES GNANG DANG PRA TI RIN CHEN DON GRUB
DANG DE'I SLOB MA SMON LAM LHUN GRUB LA DBYANGS CAN SGRA MDO

DANG SKU 'BUM BSOD NAMS LA SUM RTAGS KYI KHRID, RGYUD SMAD SLOB
DPON PA TZA GRAGS PA LHUN GRUB LA LANYDZA WARTUL MCHOD RTEN THIG

RTZA GZAB GSHAR 'BRI TSUL SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS, SOG PO RAB
'BYAMS PA NGAG DBANG RGYA MTSO LA LNGA BSDUS SOGS DANG 'BRAS

SPUNGS SMAN RAMS PA LA NAG RTZIS BCAS GSAN,

DGUNG LO NYER LNGAR PHEBS PA NA GROGS GNYIS DANG BCAS LDOM BU
PA'I SPYOD PAS BSAM YAS ZANGS RI MKHAR DMAR DVAGS LA

SGAM PO DE WI KO tI SOGS LA GNAS MJAL DU BYON SLAR YANG 'BRAS
SPUNGS SU BYON TSE BKA' BLON TSOS PHO LHA THA'I JI'I STENG DU
DMOD

BZLOG BYED PA DANG THUG GTZANG DANG LA DVAGS MNGA' RI PA'I DMAG
LHA SA DANG NYE BAR BYUNG BAS, BKA' BLON TSOS SER 'BRAS

KYI GRVA PA RNAMS DMAG LA 'GRO DGOS ZHES BKA' BYUNG, HA CANG DZA
DRAG CHE BA'I DUS DER KHONG GIS SKU SROG LA MA LTOS PAR NGED
GRVA

PA RNAMS SHUL LAM RING MO NAS BRGYUD DE RGYAL BA YAB SRAS ZHAL
MJAL GSUNG THOS DANG SLOB GNYER DPYIS PHYIN PA BYAS NAS BSLAB

SDOM BSRUNG BA LAS G-YUL 'GYED PA LTA ZHOG SRIN BU PHRA MO TSUN
LA'ANG SROG GCOD BSAM PA MED 'ON KYANG GONG SA THAMS CAD MKHYEN

PA'I ZHABS TOG DANG GRVA SA'I LA RGYAR MI GNOD PA ZHIG NGES PAR
YOD NA DMAG DPON LA NGA RANG 'GRO CHOG CES KHAS BLANGS,

GTAM DES SER DMAG 'GRO RGYU DE BSHOL THUB SONG, YIN NA'ANG LOG
SEMS 'CHANG BA'I MI RNAMS KYIS KHONG LA ZAS NGAN DRANGS

PAS SMYUNG GZHI DRAG PO BYUNG, WA SHUS SMAN PA BLO BZANG DGA' BA
ZHES PAR BSTEN NAS RIM GYIS DUG NAD LAS GROL,

MI DBANG PHO LHA THA'I JI'I MCHOG NAS BDAG RKYEN DU KHONG 'BRAS
YUL SKYID TSAL DGON PA'I MKHAN PO BSKOS NAS BKA' SHOG

DANG THAM KA GNANG, 'BRAS YUL SKYID TSAL DGON DU LO GNYIS TZAM
BZHUGS NAS PHO LHA MI DBANG LA MKHAN PO'I DGONGS PA ZHUS,

DGON LUNG DU DPE CHA PO TI BCU PHRAG LNGA LHAG DANG GYON PA CA
LAG RTEN GSUM ZHAL 'BAG SOGS RDZONG BDA' GNANG, DE LTAR

DBUS GTZANG DU PHYIN PA'I 'DUN MA LEGS PAR GRUB NAS LCAGS PHAG
(1731) LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS PAR RTZA BA'I YONGS 'DZIN MKHAN

CHEN NAM MKHA' BZANG PO DANG RGYUD PA SLOB DPON ZHVA DMAR SHES
RAB RGYA MTSO SOGS LA THON PHYAG DANG 'DI PHYI'I SKYABS 'JUG
ZHUS

TE GROGS MI BCU BDUN DANG LHAN DU ZHABS RKYANG DU BYON, RTA BSU
DANG BSU STON GYI RIM PA DU MAS SDUN BSUS TE ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I

TSES BRGYAD LA DGON LUNG DU PHEBS, DER LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BKA'
CHOS DANG LA MO DGON DU NYIN GSUM LA DAM BCA' BZHAG

MCHOG SPRUL BSTAN PA'I NYI MA LA BKA' GDAMS THIG LE BCU DRUG
SOGS KYI DBANG ZHUS, SLOB DPON SMON LAM DPAL 'BYOR LAS

GSANG 'DUS SOGS DBANG DU MA ZHUS, DNGOS PO YOD DGU BLA MA RJE'I
ZHABS TOG TU PHUL, DE NAS SKU YUL DU PHEBS TE RGAS

GZHON THAMS CAD DGA' MGU LA LONGS SU SPYOD PAR BYAS TE SLAR YANG
DGON LUNG RI KHROD DU PHYIR PHEBS, DGA' LDAN RIN CHEN

GLING DU SER SKYA LNGA BRGYA LHAG LA STA GON DANG BCAS PA'I MI
DRA BRGYA RTZA'I DBANG BSTZAL, DPA' RI'I BKRA SHIS CHOS GLING
PAS GDAN

ZHUS LTAR MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I ZHAL THANG BRIS, PHYI NANG
GSANG BA'I RTEN TSUL MTHUN BSGRUBS, SNGAGS RAMS PA SLOB DPON

'BYUNG GNAS LA SKU LNGA'I GTOR CHOG TSE DPAG LHA DGU'I DBANG
GCOD DBANG NAM MKHA' SGO 'BYED SOGS DU MA ZHUS GCOD KYI CHO

GA BRIS CHOS RGYAL GYI GTOR CHEN 'DZUGS PHYAG LEN DANG GAR 'CHAM
BCAS ZHA LU PA'I RTZA TSIG LTAR GSAR 'DZUGS GNANG, SKU

@485 'BUM PA SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG SKU 'BUM RGYUD PA'I MKHAN
PO BLO BZANG KUN DGA' SOGS LA SA SKYA'I GSER CHOS SKOR DANG
GSANG

'DUS RDZOGS RIM BLO SBYONG DON BDUN MA SOGS GSAN, SKU 'BUM KHRI
PA DGE 'DUN DON 'GRUB LA DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I

DBANG ZHUS, SER LUNG DGON PA'I G-YAS NGOS SU RI KHROD DGA' LDAN
CHOS RDZONG BTAB, SER LUNG DGON DANG HOR RGYA BOD

GSUM GYI YON BDAG RNAMS LA RDO RJE PHRENG BA'I DBANG BSKUR
MDZAD, BKRA SHIS CHOS LUNG DANG SER LUNG GNYIS KYI KHRI PA'I
DGONGS

PA ZHUS, KHONG DGUNG LO SO GSUM LON PA 'BRUG LOR RGYA NAG RGYAL
PO CHAN LUNG GI GSER YIG PA 'BYOR, SPYI LO (1737) ME SBRUL

LO'I ZLA BA DANG PO'I YAR TSES LA BLA MA LNGA DANG GRVA PA NYER
LNGA BCAS DPON G-YOG SO GCIG RGYA NAG PE CIN DU PHEBS, RGYAL PO
CHAN

LUNG LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE DGA' LDAN GSER KHRI SPRUL SKU RNAMS
MJAL KHA ZHUS, SA RTA LO'I DPYID KA ZHABS MI BDE BA BYUNG NAS

DGONGS PA ZHUS, LAM DU RLUNG LHAGS KYIS MNAR BAS GDONG DANG LAG
PA NAG POR SONG BA WANG GI MAS MKHYEN NAS KHYOD LA BRO

NAD CHEN POS ZIN 'DUG GNAS SKABS RANG YUL LOG CHOG CES BKA'
THOB, PE CING NAS THON RJES SA 'GUL CHEN PO BYUNG NAS

NYING SHA MKHAR ZHIG SA LUG LO ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I TSES GSUM NYIN
DGON LUNG DU 'BYOR, LCAGS SPREL LOR SNON ZLA'I NANG KHONG

GIS SBYIN BDAG MDZAD NAS MCHOD RTEN GSER RTZI CAN KHRU GSUM PA
DANG DGON LUNG RI KHROD DANG ZHVA KHOG GI BDE SKYID SGRUB SDE
GNYIS

KYI 'DUS KHANG DANG LHA KHANG DGA' LDAN RTZE BZHENGS, MAR TSANG
GI LHA KHANG SOGS ZHIG GSOS GNANG, SLAR YANG BKRA SHIS CHOS

LUNG DANG SER LUNG DGON GYI KHRI PA BYAS, DGON LUNG GI 'DUS
KHANG ZHIG GSOS DANG MA PHAM PA'I SKU SMAN 'JIM GYI 'BUR BZO

CHEN PO DANG MCHOD RTEN 'DOM BCU GSUM PAR RAB GNAS BCAS LEGS PAR
GRUB, THU'U KVAN SPRUL BA'I SKU LA SKYABS 'GRO DANG

DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA SNGON DU 'GRO BA'I SGO NAS BAR MA RAB
BYUNG BSGRUB, DGUNG LO SO DGU PA CHU KHYI LOR RGYAL PO'I BKA'
BZHIN

DGU PA'I NYER GNYIS NYIN RGYAL SA PE CING PHO BRANG DU BYON, BCU
PA'I TSES LNGA LA GONG MA MJAL, MCHOD RTEN RTZE LNGAR GRAGS PA'I

LHA KHANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,PHYI LO SA CHU MA 'PHROD PAS NAD RO
LANGS NAS YUN RING BSNYUNG, HOR ZLA BZHI PA'I NANG RGYAL POS
GTAN

DU PHA YUL LOG CHOG PA'I DGONGS KHROL GNANG BAS BYA RNYI LAS
THAR BA BZHIN DGON LUNG DU YAR BYON, PO SHOG THU'I DGON DU LHA

KHANG GSAR RGYAG MDZAD, NANG RTEN RJE TZONG KHA PA SOGS KYI 'JIM
SKU GSER TSON MA LEGS PAR BZHENGS, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PA

ME STAG LOR ZLA BA GSUM PA'I NANG DGON LUNG GI KHRI PA'I 'GAN
KHUR GNANG, DGA' LDAN CHOS 'KHOR GLING DU SER SKYA BDUN BRGYA

LA BCU GCIG ZHAL GYI DBANG LUNG BSTZAL, GZHIS DGON DU CHO 'PHRUL
SMON LAM GSAR 'DZUGS GNANG, LCANG SKYA RIN PO CHE'I

BKA' LTAR DGON LUNG DU SGRA'I MTSAMS SBYOR LNGA PA SOGS DANG SUM
RTAGS SNYAN DNGAGS RTZIS SMAN SOGS KHRID PA'I GZHI BTZUGS,

DGUNG LO ZHE BZHI PA RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME YOS (1747) LOR
DGE LDAN RTZIS GSAR MA BU PHYI MO CHOS 'BYUNG YONGS 'DUS LJON

BZANG SOGS BRTZAMS TE PAR DU BRKOS, DGA' LDAN BDE CHEN GLING GI
'DUS KHANG GSAR BZHENGS KYI RGYU BDAG MDZAD, BSHAD

SGRUB DAR RGYAS GLING GI KHRI PA ZLA BA GCIG MDZAD DE 'DUS KHANG
GI STENG SHOD ZHIG GSOS GNANG, AARNYE SMAN RAMS PA NYI MA RGYAL

MTSAN LA DPAL LDAN RGYUD BZHI'I LUNG DANG SNGO SMAN NGOS 'DZIN
YAN CHAD KYI KHRID ZHIB RGYAS GSAN, PHYIS CHING GI RGYAL PO'I
GDAN

'DREN BYUNG BAS DER RNAM G-YENG DANG LE LO MED PAR PHYOGS SO SO
NAS BYON PA'I LHA SDE MI SDE DU MA LA MTSAN NYID BSDUS GRVA DANG
SGRA

GSO BA SNYAN NGAG SDEB SBYOR RTZIS SOGS KYIS KHRID 'DOD MOS LTAR
GNANG, DAD LDAN GYIS BSTABS PA'I DNGOS RDZAS KYIS DGON

LUNG LHA KHANG GSAR BZHENGS DANG PHYI NANG GI MTSON MDANGS YONGS
RDZOGS KHONG GIS BRIS, DNGOS PO YOD DGU RTZAL SPRUGS KYIS

DBUS SU MCHOD PA'I RTEN DU BSKUR, RI MO SBYANGS PA'I 'BRAS BUR
RDUL MTSON LA BRTEN PA'I DUS 'KHOR LHA MANG GI DKYIL 'KHOR

BZHENGS, KHONG GIS KHRI PA LO BCU BYAS RING GRVA CHUNG TSUN LA
CHAD LAS CHEN PO DANG GNAS DBYUNG BTANG BA SOGS MDZAD MA MYONG,

ZUR DU GZHAN NOR DAR KHA GANG MI LEN PAR DRANG PO'I GZHUNG
BSRANGS SO, ,RAB BYUNG SGRUB PA YANG DRUG BRGYA KHA LHAG BYUNG,
LCANG SKYA

RIN PO CHE LA BDE MCHOG GI DBANG ZHUS, GSANG MTSAN ROL PA'I RDO
RJE GSOL, DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE DRUG PA SA GLANG LOR DBUS

SU PHEBS, GRVA PA DANG RGYUD GRVA TSANG MA MNYAM TSOGS KYI DBUR
PHYIN, KHROM PA PHON CHE BA LA LAM RIM GYI KHRID TSE DPAG LHA
DGU'I

DBANG GNANG, KHYAD PAR TSIG 'PHRI SKAM PO MIN PAR DKA' GNAD KYI
DON LA BGRO GLENG YANG YANG MDZAD, MKHAS BTZUN BZANG

PO'I SNYAN GRAGS KYIS PHYOGS KUN TU KHYAB, SLAR YANG DGON LUNG
DU PHEBS MDO SNGAGS KYI DBANG LUNG SGRA DANG SUM RTAGS SNYAN
NGAG

SDEB SBYOR GSO DPYAD RTZIS DKAR NAG SOGS GDUL BYA RNAMS KYI 'DOD
MOS LTAR SKU TSEGS LA MI GZIGS PAR DGUNG LO GYA BZHI'I

BAR SLOB KHRID GNANG, DGUNG LO GYA BZHI PA ME MO LUG GI LO'I ZLA
BA DANG PO'I TSES BCO BRGYAD NAS SNYUN TSUL BSTAN, SA PHO SPREL

LO'I (1788) ZLA DANG PO'I TSES NYER DRUG NYIN PA'I SNGA MOR
SKU'I BKOD PA BSDUS SO, ,KHONG GI SLOB MA NI THU'U BKVAN CHOS
KYI NYI MA

DANG GRO TSANG BRAG RIN PO CHE DANG PAndI TA CHOS RJE BLO BZANG
LHUN GRUB SOGS MKHAS BTZUN BZANG PO MANG DU BYUNG, GSUNG CHOS
KYANG

DANG GSO RIG SKAR RTZIS SKU GZUGS KYI CHAGS TSAD MTSO SNGON GYI
LO RGYUS

YI GE'I BSHAD PA SOGS PO TI BRGYAD DU BSDUS TE, MKHAR SNGON PO
ZHES PA'I PHO BRANG GI NYE 'DABS CHU MGO SER PO'I DGON PAR

MA nI LAG SKOR SOGS KYI LAG LEN DANG PHAN YON BSHAD PA DAD LDAN

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SENG CHEN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR NI, BOD RAB BYUNG BCU
GSUM PA'I SHING MO 'BRUG GI LOR (1784) NYANG

STOD 'BRONG RTZE'I YUL GRUR SKU BLTAMS, DGUNG NA BYIS PA'I DUS
SU T'A LA'I BRGYAD PA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO DANG PAn CHEN BDUN PA

BSTAN PA'I NYI MA GNYIS NAS SENG CHEN SKU RABS GNYIS PA BLO
BZANG DPAL 'BYOR GYI YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN, DGUNG LO BDUN

PAR GTZANG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I DGON PAR CHOS SGOR ZHUGS, PAn
CHEN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA'I SPYAN SNGAR GTZUG PHUD PHUL ZHING KHONG
LA

MTSAN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN DPAL 'BYOR ZHES PA BSTZAL, LO DE'I
ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES BZHI NYIN PAR THOS BSAM GLING GI MKHAN

PO CHOS 'PHEL DON GRUB LA DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA ZHUS SHING RDO
RJE 'DZIN PA SNGAGS CHEN BLO BZANG TSE BRTAN GYI DRUNG NAS 'JIGS
BYED LHA

BCU GSUM MA'I DBANG SOGS THOG MAR ZHUS, THOS BSAM GLING GI GRVA
TSANG DU LO BCU GNYIS RING DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO

BSTEN NAS MDO PHYOGS KYI GZHUNG LUGS CHEN PO RNAMS LA THOS BSAM
MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD DE MKHAS PA'I DBANG POR GYUR CING DGUNG

LO BCU DGUR PHEBS PA NA DKA' CHEN GYI MING BTAGS LEGS PAR
BLANGS, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS THOG SNGAGS GRVAR ZHUGS NAS

GSANG SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG RNAMS LA THOS BSAM NAN SMIN MDZAD PA
DANG CHO GA PHYAG LEN GDANGS DBYANGS ROL TSIGS GAR DANG THIG

TSON SOGS LEGS PAR SBYANGS, BSKYED RDZOGS KYI SKOR LA YANG 'BAD
BRTZON GYIS BAG CHAGS CI THEBS MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYER

GSUM PA ME STAG LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PA'I TSES BCO LNGA NYIN PAR PHO
BRANG RGYAL MTSAN MTHON PO'I GZIM CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BA'I NANG
DU

PAn CHEN BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS MKHAN PO DANG
PAn CHEN YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS LAS SLOB

SNGAGS CHEN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GSANG STON DKYIL KHANG YE
SHES BRTZON 'GRUS KYIS DUS BSGO BA MDZAD DE DGE 'DUN GRANGS

TSANG DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR
MNOS, DE NAS PAn CHEN MDUN BYANG CHUB BDE LAM SOGS LAM

KHRID DU MA DANG GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM SOGS KYI DBANG SGRUB THABS
DANG RJES GNANG SOGS ZAB CHOS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU

MNOS, PAn CHEN YONGS 'DZIN 'BRONG RTZE BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS
DANG YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN GNYIS KYI SPYAN SNGAR

PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE DANG LHAN CIG TU ZAB CHOS MTHA' YAS PA GSAN,
LO BDUN TZAM RING GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG DU GSAN

BSAM MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD RJES DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR PAn CHEN RIN
PO CHE'I BKA' LTAR GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI KHRI THOG

NYER GCIG PAR MNGA' GSOL, DE NAS BZUNG BKRA SHIS LHUN PO'I RGYUD
PA GRVA TSANG GI GSANG SNGAGS RGYUD SDE BZHI'I RTZA 'GREL RNAMS

KYI BSHAD PA DANG DBANG RJES GNANG LUNG MAN NGAG SOGS 'CHAD NYAN
GYI BYA BA TSANG MA KHONG GIS MDZAD CING SOG PO SOGS YUL

PHYOGS GZHAN NAS YONG BA DANG SA DER GNAS PA'I DAD LDAN DON
GNYER CAN MANG PO LA DGE TSUL DANG DGE SLONG GI SDOM PA 'BOGS

PA SOGS RNAM DKAR 'PHRIN LAS KYIS MDZAD PA RGYA CHER SPEL, DE
LTAR LO BCU PHRAG 'GA'I RING MU MTHUD PAS SOG PO MKHAN CHEN

NO MIN HAN BLO BZANG TSE DBANG DANG DBUS GTZANG KHAMS GSUM GYI
MKHAN SLOB DGE BA'I GSHES GNYEN MANG PO KHONG GI SLOB MAR GYUR,

KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM SKOR NI, CHO GA DANG SGRUB THABS SNA TSOGS
GSAN YIG BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BCA' YIG GSUNG THOR BU

GZHAN DAG BCAS DKAR CHAG DANG BCAS PA CHOS TSAN SUM CU SO GNYIS
YOD CING CHOS TSAN RE RE BZHIN KA PA DANG KHA PA SOGS KYI

BRKOS PA RED,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

SER SMAD BLO BZANG THUGS RJE NI SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO BRGYAD
PA'I DUS SU KHAMS RGYAL THANG RDZONG GTER RONG SA DKAR ZHES

PA'I GRONG DU SKU 'KHRUNGS SHING, DGUNG LO CHUNG NGU'I DUS NAS
RGYAL THANG DGON DU RAB TU BYUNG NAS CHOS LA SLOB GNYER MDZAD,

DBUS GTZANG CHOS KYI 'BYUNG GNAS SU PHEBS, GDAN SA CHEN PO SE RA
THEG CHEN GLING GI NANG GSES SMAD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS,

BSDUS GRVA DANG, RTAGS RIGS BLO RIG SOGS LA SBYANGS NAS SHING
RTA'I SROL 'BYED NAS BZUNG STE PHAR PHYIN GYI GZHUNG RNAMS LA
SLOB

GNYER MDZAD, DE NAS DBU MA DANG, 'DUL BA, MDZOD BCAS GZHUNG CHEN
LNGA LA DPYIS PHYIN PA SBYANGS PA'I 'BRAS RTAGS SU

GRVA SKOR MDZAD DE DPAL LDAN STOD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU ZHUGS NAS
GSANG SNGAGS RDO RJE THEG PA'I GZHUNG PHYOGS LA SLOB GNYER
MDZAD,

PHUR LCOG NGAG DBANG BYAMS PA DANG, RGYAL MCHOG BSKAL BZANG RGYA
MTSO, PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES, YONGS 'DZIN YE

SHES RGYAL MTSAN, KLONG RDOL NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG SOGS LAS MDO
RGYUD MAN NGAG MTHA' DAG GSAN NAS RAB 'BYAMS GZHUNG LA

MI 'JIGS PA'I SPOBS PA BRNYES, GRVA TSANG GIS GSOL BA BTAB PA
LTAR, GRVA TSANG MKHAN PO MDZAD NAS SLOB GNYER BA RNAMS LA

DPE KHRID SOGS GNANG STE CHOS SRID GNYIS KYIS BSKYANGS GNANG
MDZAD, LJAGS RTZOM YANG KHRI CHEN NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS KYI
RNAM

THAR DANG, BLO RIG RTAGS RIGS, KUN GZHI'I SPYI DON DANG KUN
GZHI'I MTHA' DPYOD SOGS DANG, RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB

KYI LAS TSOGS 'PHO BA DPA' BO G-YUL 'JUG GI MAN NGAG SOGS MANG
DU MDZAD, SKU TSE SMAD LA SPANG LUNG RI KHROD DU BZHUGS NAS

THUN BZHI'I RNAL 'BYOR LA RTZE GCIG TU BRTZON NAS NYAMS RTOGS
KYI RTOGS PA DBYAR MTSO LTAR 'PHEL, KHRI BYANG CHUB CHOS 'PHEL

SOGS SKAL LDAN GYI SLOB MA MANG DU BYUNG, BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM
PA DANG YI DAM GSANG BDE 'JIGS GSUM, RTA MGRIN GSANG

SGRUB SOGS KYI DBANG LUNG KHRID SOGS KYI BDUD RTZI'I CHAR PHAB,
SPANG LUNG DGE BSHES RIN PO CHE ZHES PA'I DAM PA KHYAD PAR CAN

BZHUGS PA DE LA RI KHROD SKYONG LUGS GNANG NAS ZHING GZHAN DU
GSHEGS,

PA'I CHU SRIN SDER MO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (52) 9

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

RJE 'DI NYID MTSO SNGON ZHING CHEN HANG KRUNG RDZONG KHONGS
AAR TSA ZHES PAR DPON GYI RUS CAN YAB RTA MGRIN DANG, YUM TSE

MDO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I SHING SBRUL
(1845) LO'I HOR ZLA BCU PA'I TSES BCO LNGA LA NGO MTSAR BA'I
LTAS DU MA

DANG BCAS SKU BLTAMS, GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG GIS GSER TOG
SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN GNANG ZHING, RJE DE NYID LAS DGE

BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS, MTSAN BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSO
ZHES BSTZAL, LO DE'I ZLA BA LNGA PAR GSER TOG DGON DU GDAN

SAR BKOD, DGUNG LO LNGA PA LA RNAL 'BYOR PA CHEN PO SKAL BZANG
GRAGS PA DGE RGAN DU BSTEN NAS CHOS SPYOD DU MA THUGS 'DZIN

MDZAD, BDUN PA LA CHU BZANG RIN PO CHE LAS RAB BYUNG DANG DGE
TSUL GYI SDOM PA BZHES TE, BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS CHOS GRAGS

ZHES MTSAN GNANG, BRGYAD PA LA RJE SKU 'BUM DU GSER TOG SGAR
BAR ZHABS PAD BKOD CING, CHOS SKYONG GI LUNG PHEBS BZHIN

DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PA'I BAR DU RJE NYA KY'A NGAG DBANG CHOS
GRAGS YONGS 'DZIN DU BSTEN NAS PHAR TSAD KYI GZHUNG MANG PO
THUGS

'DZIN DANG DPE KHRID RIM BZHIN MDZAD, THUN MONG PA'I RIG GNAS
KYANG DPYIS PHYIN PAR SBYANGS, KHRID DANG RJES GNANG SOGS

GSANG SNGAGS GDAMS PA'I SKOR MTHA' YAS PA MNOS, BCU GSUM PAR
MKHAS MANG BYE BA'I BSTI GNAS BYAMS PA GLING GI TSOGS

CHEN DANG, DPAL LDAN BSHAD SGRUB GLING GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DE
NAS BZUNG LO DRUG GI RING LA GRVA RKYANG DKYUS MA'I NGANG TSUL

GYIS TSOGS CHEN DANG CHOS GRVA LA CHAG MED PHEBS, 'DZIN SKYOR
SBYANGS DANG TSOGS GLENG SNGA PHYIR RIGS PA'I DKA' GNAD MTHA'

DAG LA GZHAN DRING MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA BRNYES PA'I MKHAS
PA'I GRAGS PA RGYAS, GZHAN YANG, LO BCU BZHI'I YUN LA 'JAM

MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I THUGS BCUD DBEN SA SNYAN BRGYUD LAS
'ONGS PA'I GDAMS PA MTHA' YAS PA BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU

GSAN BZHES MDZAD, DGUNG LO NYI SHU PA LA SHING BZA' RDO RJE
'CHANG LAS BSNYEN RDZOGS BZHES, DE'I PHYI LOR RGYUD GRVAR
ZHUGS TE,

RGYUD KYI PHYAG BZHES THAMS CAD THUGS LA CHUB PAR MDZAD CING
PHYI LO NAS RGYUD PA'I KHRIR 'KHOD, SPYIR DGUNG LO NYER BDUN
NAS SO

GCIG GI BAR DANG, RE LNGA PA NAS LO NGO GSUM BCAS SKU 'BUM
BYAMS PA GLING GI CHOS KHRIR SNGA PHYIR BKOD, PHYI MA NI RGYAL
DBANG

BCU GSUM PA CHEN PO'I BKAS BSKO BZHAG MDZAD, SO BDUN PAR BYA
KHYUNG THEG CHEN YON TAN BSTAN RGYAS GLING GI CHOS KHRIR

BZHUGS PA BCAS KYI SKABS GRVA TSANG RANG RANG GI 'CHAD NYAN
CHOS SPYOD MTHA' DAG BSTAN PA'I DMIGS RKYEN DU 'GRO NGES PA
GNANG,

GZHAN YANG, DGUNG LO SO GCIG PA DANG, SO DGU NGA LNGA PA BCAS
LA SE CHEN CANG JUN P'E LI DANG, AU CU MU CHEN WANG GIS

GDAN ZHUS BZHIN BYANG PHYOGS HAL HA'I YUL DU LAN GSUM LA CHIBS
BSKYOD, BAR MA'I SKABS T'A KHU REL DU RJE BTZUN DAM PAR

MJAL, SKABS 'DI DAG TU PE CIN DANG, RI BO RTZE LNGAR GNAS
GZIGS DANG RTEN MJAL GANG RGYAS ZHUS, LAM BAR RNAMS SU

DAD LDAN SER SKYA SO SOR 'DOD CHOS KYI RE BA BSKANGS, DGUNG LO
RE BRGYAD PA NAS (1912) SKU 'BUM 'DU KHANG CHEN MO ME DGRAS

'JIG PA NYAMS GSO'I KHUR MTHA' DAG GI GTZO 'GAN BZHES TE, LO
GSUM DANG PHYED NA YONGS SU SOR CHUD MDZAD PA SOGS SDE

'DIR CHOS SRID KYI BKA' DRIN DPAG PAR DKA' BA GNANG, SPYIR RJE
'DIS YONGS 'DZIN RNAM GNYIS, DKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB

RIN CHEN BZANG PO, BLA BRANG SGO MANG RIN PO CHE SOGS BSHES
GNYEN CHEN PO BCU DRUG TZAM BSTEN TE, GZHUNG LUGS MTHA' DAG

GDAMS PAR SHAR BA NGES DON MKHAS PA CHEN PO'I GO 'PHANG LA
DBANG BSGYUR CING, DBANG LUNG ZAB KHRID SOGS MAN NGAG RGYA

@506 MTSO'I GTER DU GYUR, ZHAL SLOB KYANG STONG 'KHOR HO THOG
THU DANG, RGYA YAG TSANG SOGS NYI ZLA LTA BUS DBU MDZAD STOD
SMAD BAR

GSUM NAS BGRANG LAS 'DAS PA BYUNG, GZHAN YANG, DGE 'DUN GYI
SDE DU MAR BSNYEN BKUR DANG MCHOD BSHAMS, RTEN

BSDUS GRVA (2) 94

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I THUGS SRAS BSE NGAG DBANG
BKRA SHIS NI, MDO SMAD GSER LJONGS REB GONG GI YUL GYI

BYE BRAG BSE'I NYA LUNG ZHES PAR YAB RIN CHEN SKYABS DANG YUM
SNYING MO BYAMS GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I SA
PHO RTA LO

(1678) LA SKU BLTAMS, BYIS PA'I DUS NAS RTZIS PA ZHIG GIS SER
GOS GON DGOS ZER BAR BRTEN GRVA PA'I GOS KHO NA GYON,

MI RING BAR SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I SLOB MA MGAR GONG TSE BRTAN
RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG DU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA
MNOS,

MTSAN SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO ZHES BTAGS, DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PAR
DBUS SU BYON, 'BRAS SPUNGS DGON PAR BKRA SHIS SGO MANG GRVA

TSANG GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, DON GRUB RGYA MTSO SLOB DPON DU
BSTEN NAS BSDUS GRVA SOGS TSAD MA'I SKOR GSAN, YUN RING MA

'GYANGS PAR TSAD MA'I SKOR LA BGRO GLENG BYED THUB PAR GYUR,
DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR STAG TSANG RA BA STOD DU PHEBS, LO

GCIG LHAG RING 'BAD BRTZON TSAD MED MDZAD DE BSDUS TSAN TSANG
MA THUGS 'DZIN MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD, BLO GSAL RIGS SMRA MANG

PO'I DBUS NA 'GRAN ZLA BRAL BA'I MKHAS PAR GYUR, DE NAS SGO
MANG DU TSUR BYON NAS SLOB DPON 'OD ZER RGYA MTSO'I DRUNG NAS,

PHAR PHYIN SKABS BRGYAD PO DANG DBU MA BCAS GSAN CING DE DAG
GI RTZA BA RNAMS BLOR 'DZIN MDZAD, GZHUNG SAR GDONG LNGA'I
SGRA

DBYANGS KYI RGYUGS PHUL BAS T'A LA'I DRUG PA TSANGS DBYANGS
RGYA MTSOS THUGS DGYES PA CHEN PO MDZAD, GZENGS BSTOD DANG

GNANG CHA BSTZAL, DE NAS 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA BLA MAR BRTEN
NAS YANG BSKYAR DBU MA DANG PHAR PHYIN YONGS RDZOGS KYI BRTZI

@509 BZHAG BSHAD KHRID DANG BCAS GSAN CING THUGS 'DZIN MDZAD,
'DUL BA DANG MNGON PA'I GZHUNG RNAMS KYANG LEGS PAR SBYANGS

NAS DKA' BCU PA'I MTSAN RTAGS BLANGS, MI RING BAR 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I DRUNG DU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA ZHUS

MTSAN NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS ZHES PA BSTZAL, DGUNG LO NYER DGU
BAR DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSANG DU PHEBS NAS GSANG SNGAGS
KYI

CHOS LA SLOB GNYER GYI DBU BTZUGS, KHRI CHEN DGE 'DUN PHUN
TSOGS KYI DRUNG DU BDE GSANG 'JIGS GSUM SOGS KYI RGYUD DU MA

GSAN BSAM YUN RING MDZAD DE GSANG SNGAGS RDO RJE THEG PA'I
GZHUNG LUGS LA THOGS PA MED PAR GYUR, KHYAD PAR 'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I MDUN RGYUD 'GREL RNAMS KYI BSHAD
PA NAN TAN GYIS GSAN CING RGYUD 'GREL RNAMS KYI KHA SKONG YAN
LAG

DANG BCAS PA RDZOGS PAR GSAN PA DANG DE'I ZHOR LA 'DON RTA
DBYANGS GAR THIG SOGS PHYAG LEN PHRA MO TSUN CHAD ZHIB TU
SBYANGS

PAS GRVA RGAN GZHON KUN GYIS BSTOD BSNGAGS BYED, GZHAN YANG
'JAM BZHAD MDUN LAM RIM CHEN MO'I BSHAD LUNG DANG BSLAB

BTUS SPYOD 'JUG SOGS KYI BSHAD PA GSAN, BKA' POD LNGA'I DOGS
GCOD YANG YANG BYAS PAS 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA YANG

KHONG GI THUGS RIGS LA THUGS SHIN TU DGYES, DGUNG LO SO GNYIS
PA SA GLANG LOR (1707) 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE'I

ZHABS PHYIR MDO SMAD DU BYON, LAM BAR PHYAG G-YOG BYED PA'I
ZHOR LA MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG MANG PO'I DOGS BKROL YANG YANG

MDZAD PAS 'CHAD NYAN NYAMS LEN GANG LA THUG KYANG GZHAN DRING
MI 'JOG PA'I SPOBS PA THOB, LCAGS STAG LOR (1708) 'JAM

DBYANGS BZHAD PAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGON GSAR DU
BTAB CING, GRVA TSANG GSAR 'DZUGS SKABS KHONG GIS DGE

BSKOS MDZAD DE KHRIMS SGRIG LAM TSANG MA 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG
GRVA TSANG LTAR MDZAD, LO DE'I STON KHAR 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD
PAS

RANG GIS 'BRAS SGO MANG GRVA TSANG DU MNABS MYONG BA'I RAS BER
RNYING PA DANG DBU ZHVA BCAS GNANG NAS ``KHYOD RANG 'DI DAG
GYON NAS

BLA MA GYIS'' GSUNGS NAS BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI KHRI
PAR BSKOS, DE NAS BZUNG DGUNG LO RE GCIG PA SA RTA LO'I BAR LO
NYER

BRGYAD TZAM 'CHAD NYAN MDZAD, THOG MA'I LO DGU TZAM RING CHOS
MTSAMS RNAMS SU YANG BRTZI BZHAG CHAG MED DU BTANG BAS

'DZIN GRVA BCU GSUM LA PO TI LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN BTZUGS THUB PA
BYUNG ZHING BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGON PAR BSHAD GRVA
LEGS

PAR 'DZUGS PA'I RMANG GZHI BRTAN PO CHAGS THUB PAR BYUNG NGO,
KHONG NI KUN MKHYEN 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I YIG CHAR YUN

RING DU 'DRIS SHING NYAMS RGYUS CAN YIN STABS PO TI LNGA'I
'CHAD NYAN TSANG MA YIG CHA DE DAG GI THOG NAS MDZAD CING
TSANG MA LA ZIN

BRIS KYANG BKOD, KHYAD PAR BSDUS GRVA NI LO RE BZHIN THUGS
THOG NAS BSHAD PA SKYOR DPON RANG RANG GIS ZIN BRIS BYAS PAS,

BSDUS GRVA YONGS RDZOGS CUNG MI 'DRA BA NYER BDUN YOD KYANG
RJES NAS DPE RGYUN THOR BAR BRTEN DENG SANG GSUM BZHI TZAM LAS
MA

LHAG PAR MNGON, CHOS MTSAMS RNAMS SU YANG MDO SNGAGS KYI
GZHUNG MANG PO'I BSHAD PA MDZAD CING RTAGS GSAL GTONG BA'I

DUS SU THAL SKAD GTONG LUGS 'KHOR GSUM SKOR LUGS THAL MO SDEB
LUGS SOGS SLOB GNYER NAN TAN BYED BCUG STE SHIN TU GRA

'GRIG PO BYED PA DANG DPE CHA BLOR 'DZIN NI SLOB GNYER GYI
RMANG GZHI MED DU MI RUNG BA YIN GSUNGS NAS LCAG BSKUL CHER
MDZAD

CING RGYUGS LEGS PAR 'BUL MI LA GNANG SBYIN DANG DGYES BSTOD
DPAG MED MDZAD PAS GZHUNG CHEN MO'I RGYUGS 'BUL MKHAN

YANG JE MANG DU GYUR, SLOB MA RNAMS KYANG RIG PA'I GNAS KUN LA
DON GNYER CHE ZHING SGRIG LAM KUN SPYOD TSANG MA PHYI GTZANG
NANG

GTZANG KHO NAR GYUR, RTEN BRTEN PA GSAR BZHENGS MDZAD PA'I
SKOR LA MGON KHANG DANG BYAMS PA LHA KHANG SKU GDUNG KHANG
BCAS

GSAR DU BZHENGS PA DANG 'DU KHANG GI STENG SHOD TSANG MAR LOGS
RIS SHING TSON SOGS GSAR BSKRUN, LHA KHANG DE DAG NANG GI LHA

SKU DANG MCHOD CHA BCAS DANG DPON JU NANG PA'I GDUNG RTEN
DNGUL SRANG SUM BRGYA LAS BZHENGS PA'I MCHOD RTEN GSAR
BZHENGS,

RJE 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA NGAG DBANG BRTZON 'GRUS KYI SKU
GDUNG MDUN MAR ME MCHOD KONG STONG TSAR SOGS MCHOD PA'I YO
BYAD

DPAG TU MED PA GSAR DU BZHENGS, 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I GSUNG
PHAL MO CHE'I SHING PAR GSAR DU BRKOS, DE NAS

CHU BO BZHIN GONG NAS GONG DU 'PHEL BA'I GZHI BTZUGS SO,
,DGUNG LO

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

BLA BRANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI BLA MA RJE 'JIGS MED RIG PA'I
SENG GE NI, DGA' LDAN KHRI CHEN DPAL LDAN GRAGS PA'I SKU 'PHRENG

GSUM PA STE, KHONG NI RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME YOS (1747) LO
MJUG MDO SMAD SHAR PHYOGS HOR TSANG ZHES PA SKU GONG MA RNAM

GNYIS 'KHRUNGS PA'I YUL PHYOGS (KAN SU'U ZH'A HO RDZONG KHONGS
DMAR STENG ZHANG) DER KHYU MCHOG GI RIGS SU SKU BLTAMS, SKYABS

MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG PO BYAMS PA 'BUM GLING DU PHEBS LAM NAS
CHED GNYER GYIS BYON TE, GTZUG PHUD BZHES NAS MTSAN

'JIGS MED GRAGS PA ZHES BSTZAL, DGUNG LO LNGA BA LA BAN SGAR DU
GDAN DRANGS NAS DER BZHUGS SO, ,DGE SLONG BSAM GTAN

MDUN NAS KLOG BSLABS SHING 'BRI 'DON GNYIS KA TSEGS MED DU BYANG
BA BYUNG, DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA'I TSE DGA' LDAN KHRI CHEN RGYAL

MTSAN SENG GE NAS RANG GI BLA MA'I SPRUL SKU YIN PA'I GNAD KYIS
RGYA MKHAR SGAR DU GDAN DRANGS NAS, RJE DE'I BKA' LTAR SGAR

DER CHOS GRVAR PHEBS SHING, RJE DE LA CHOS BKA' 'GA' YANG GSAN,
DGUNG GRANGS BCU GSUM PA'I SKABS SKYABS MCHOG

'JIGS MED DBANG PO DBUS NAS PHEBS PAR RTZE GZHUNG DU CHIBS BSUR
BYON, BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHEBS DGOS GSUNGS PAR

SNGON GYI SKU TSE DU MAR 'BREL BA'I THUGS SMON GYI BDEN PA MNGON
DU GYUR TE, GSUNG DANG BLANGS MDZAD NAS DGUNG LO BCU BZHI PA

LA SKU GONG MA'I GDAN SA CHEN POR ZHABS SOR BKOD CING, GNYIS
PA'I YAR TSES DGE BAR RMAD BYUNG THOS BSAM GLING GI CHOS

GRVAR ZHUGS, DE NAS BZUNG DGUNG LO NYER GSUM PA'I BAR BKRA SHIS
'KHYIL RANG DU THUGS SBYONG GTZO BOR MDZAD, SKYABS

MGON RDO RJE 'CHANG GI SPYAN SNGAR ZAB RGYAS KYI GDAMS PA YANG
MANG DU GSAN CING, KHONG GI BKA' LTAR LCAGS STAG LOR DBUS SU

CHIBS BSGYUR NAS GANGS CAN MKHAS PA'I 'BYUNG GNAS DPAL LDAN BKRA
SHIS SGO MANG GI CHOS GRVAR SA KHYI LO'I BAR LO DGU'I YUN LA

BKA' POD CHEN PO LNGA'I THUGS GNYER RDO RUS THUG PA GNANG BAS
BSTAN PA'I GNAD LA GZHAN GYIS BKRI BAR MI NUS PA'I NGES SHES

RNYED, RJE GONG MA DE NYID, RGYAL DBANG BDUN PA CHEN PO'I YONGS
'DZIN DU SONG GSHIS GZHUNG SA NAS KYANG GZHAN LAS KHYAD DU

THON PA'I BKUR GZOS TSAD MED PA GNANG, PO TA LAR PAn CHEN BLO
BZANG YE SHES KYIS RGYAL DBANG MCHOG LA BKA' CHOS GANG

GNANG CHAG MED DU GSAN, LAM RIM CHEN MO DANG BDE LAM GYI ZIN
BRIS KYANG KHYAD DU 'PHAGS PA ZHIG BTAB, CHOS SRID KYI

MNGON PAR MTHO YANG DMAN CHA LA DGYES PA, YON TAN GYI GTER DU
GYUR PA SOGS BSNGAGS PAR 'OS PAS PAn CHEN THAMS CAD

MKHYEN PA MCHOG GIS KYANG DGYES GZIGS BLA NA MED PA MDZAD, SA
PHAG GI LOR MDO SMAD DU CHIBS BSGYUR BAR SKYABS MGON

MCHOG GI BKA' LTAR BSU BA SNGA PHYI DU MA DANG, GRVA TSANG GIS
SER SBRENG RGYAS PA SOGS BKUR STI DANG BCAS HOR ZLA BRGYAD PAR

GDAN SA BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU PHYAG PHEBS, DE'I PHYI LOR SKYABS
MGON MCHOG GI BKA' BZHIN DBEN GNAS DGA' LDAN RAB RGYAS

@514 KYI GZHI BTINGS, SKABS SKABS SU GDAN SAR BYON NAS SKYABS
MGON MCHOG GI DRUNG NAS SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG SOGS DANG,

GZHAN NAS KYANG BSKYED RDZOGS 'PHRUL 'KHOR LCAGS MKHAR, ZAB
KHRID DU MA SOGS ZAB RGYAS CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI BZHED DGUR

MNOS, DON GNYER CAN DU MAS ZHUS NGOR GSUNG 'BUM MANG PO'I LUNG
DANG DBANG RJES GNANG MTHA' YAS PA ZHIG GNANG YANG

'DIR YIG TSOGS LA 'JIGS PAS MA BKOD, SA BYI NAS LO BZHI'I RING
TSOGS CHEN GYI CHOS KHRIR 'KHOD DE CHOS SRID GANG CHA NAS

BSTAN PA'I DMIGS RKYEN DU 'GYUR BA GNANG, LCAGS GLANG LOR BRAG
DKAR DGON GYI KHRIR PHEBS, SPYIR RJE 'DI NYID LUNG

RTOGS YON TAN LA MNGA' BRNYES PA'I MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO ZHIG STE,
KLONG RDOL BLA MA RIN PO CHES HOR TSANG GSER KHRI BSKYED RIM

MTHAR PHYIN TE, RDZOGS RIM SNE ZIN DU 'DUG CES GSUNGS PA SOGS
LUNG 'DREN MANG YANG RE ZHIG MA BKOD, GANG LTAR

DGONGS PA RDZOGS PA'I LO KHAMS SOGS GSAL BA MA MTHONG YANG DGUNG
LO RE DGU BA SHING PHAG (1815) LOR ZHING BRJES PAR SNYAM

STE, RJE NYID KYI YANG SPRUL 'JIGS MED BSTAN PA'I NYI MA RAB
BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME BYI (1816) LOR 'KHRUNGS PA GDAN RABS SU

GSAL BAS DPOG THUB BO, ,
