RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

LHA DBANG RDO RJE RIN CHEN NI GRUB MTHA' BKA' GDAMS PA'I RING
LUGS 'DZIN ZHING, SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCU BZHI PA'I MI

YIN, KHONG GIS JO NANG DOL PO PA SHES RAB RGYAL MTSAN DANG,
KARMA PA RANG BYUNG RDO RJE, GANGS KHROD PA, SA BZANG PAn CHEN

MA TI, BKA' BZHI PA BSAM GTAN RIN CHEN SOGS MKHAS SHING GRUB PA
THON PA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BCU PHRAG 'GAR BSTEN

NAS, MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG MTHA' YAS PA GSAN TE, ZAB CHOS MANG POS
RGYUD PHYUG PAR MDZAD CING, MKHAN CHEN BKA' BZHI

PA BSAM GTAN RIN CHEN GYI MDUN NAS RAB BYUNG BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI
BSLAB SDOM LEGS PAR MNOS, KHONG GIS THEG PA CHE CHUNG DU

DBYE BA'I SGO NAS THEG DMAN LA SMAD PA DANG, GRUB MTHA'I PHYOGS
RIS KYIS GZHAN PHYOGS LA SMAD PA SOGS LA DGAG PA BRGYAB STE

GRUB MTHA' THAMS CAD 'GAL MED DU BSHAD PA DANG, THOS BSAM SGOM
GSUM 'GAL BAR BLTAS TE SGOM CHEN RNAMS LA 'PHYA ZHING

RANG NYID KYIS MI TSE HRIL POR TSIG RO'I RTZOD PA KHO NAS DUS
'DA' BAR BYED MKHAN RNAMS LA DGAG PA BRGYAB NAS, THOS BSAM

SGOM GSUM YA BRAL BYED MI NYAN PAR MA TSAD, MTHAR THUG SGRUB PA
SNYING POR BYED DGOS PAR BSHAD DE, KHONG RANG NYID KYIS SKU

TSE HRIL POR GNAS DBEN PA DANG DUR KHROD 'DREN PA SOGS NYAMS LEN
LA THUGS BRTZON KHO NA MDZAD, KHONG GI LTA BA DBU MA CHEN

PO'I LUGS TE, DON DAM SPROS BRAL NAM MKHA' LTA BU, GDOD NAS
STONG PA, RANG BZHIN GYIS STONG PA, RANG GI MTSAN NYID

KYIS STONG PA DANG, KUN RDZOB SNANG BA KUN BDEN MED SGYU MA LTA
BU RDZUN MA, 'KHRUL PA'I SNANG BA YIN PAR 'DOD, NYAMS LEN

NI PHYAG RGYA CHEN PO GTZO BOR 'DZIN, DE'I PHYIR KHONG GI GSUNG
RNAMS KYANG RANG GI NYAMS LEN MDZAD PA'I GO RIM LTAR BRTZAMS TE,

CHOS TSAN RE RE BZHIN KA KHA'I GO RIM BKOD 'DUG NGED DPE MDZOD
KHANG DU KHONG GI GSUNG 'BUM DBU MED BRIS MA DPE RNYING POD

'BRING ZHIG BZHUGS YOD,

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

LHO BRAG NAM MKHA' RGYAL MTSAN NI, YAB SLOB DPON NAM MKHA' BZANG
PO DANG YUM RIN CHEN RGYAN GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB

BYUNG LNGA PA'I ME STAG LO (1326) LA SKU BLTAMS,

DGUNG LO BDUN PAR RANG GI KHU BO RGYAL SRAS BZANG PO'I MDUN DU
DGE BSNYEN GYI SDOM PA MNOS SHING YI GE'I PHYI MO KA KHA NAS

BZUNG 'BRI KLOG SBYOR SDEB SBYONG BA'I DBU BTZUGS, LO BCU PAR
RAB BYUNG DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, KHU BO'I MDUN NAS

THUGS RJE CHEN PO'I CHOS SKOR DANG BKA' GDAMS CHOS SKOR SOGS DAM
CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO BCU GNYIS PAR PHUR PA'I

BSNYEN PA BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PA'I DGUNG SKEG LA DGE
SBYOR LA 'BAD DE SGRO BA DGON PA'I RTEN RNAMS LA BSKOR BA MANG

DU MDZAD PAS DGUNG GEGS SEL BA'I RTAGS THON PAR GRAGS, DGUNG LO
BCU BZHI PAR DAM CHOS 'DUL BA'I SKOR LA GSAN SBYONG

MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU DGU PAR LHA SA'I JO SH'AKA RNAM GNYIS MJAL
BAR PHEBS SHING DE NAS RGYA MA RIN CHEN SGANG DU MKHAN PO BKRA

SHIS RGYAL POS MKHAN PO DANG SLOB DPON GZHON NU DBANG PHYUG
GSANG STON, SLOB DPON DBU MA PA BCAS DGE 'DUN NYER GNYIS

TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA BLANGS, MKHAN CHEN
YE SHES GZHON NU'I DRUNG DU NYI KHRI SNANG BA DANG 'DUL tIKA
KARMA

SHA TAM BSLAB BTUS SOGS GSAN, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS PAR LHO BRAG
TU LTUNG BSHAGS SOGS SGRIB SBYONG LA THUGS BRTZON MDZAD

DE THUN RER PHYAG BDUN BRGYA RE 'TSAL BA'I DAM BCA' MDZAD, DGUNG
LO NYER GSUM PAR SGRO BA DGON DU NOR LHA BSGRUBS NAS ZLA

BA DRUG TZAM MTSAMS BZHUGS, ,DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PAR BLA MA BDE
BA 'BYUNG GNAS LHO BRAG KHAR TSUR PHEBS PA DE'I SPYAN SNGAR DAM

CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO SO GCIG TU PHEBS PA NA KHU BO RGYAL
SRAS BZANG PO DGONGS PA CHOS DBYINGS SU GSHEGS PAR BRTEN

@521 THUGS SKYO NGAL TSAD MED NGANG NAS GSHEGS PO'I DGONGS
RDZOGS DANG RTEN GSER SKU CHEN PO BZHENGS, DE NAS LO DER DGON
PA'I

YON BDAG DANG DGE 'DUN MANG MAS GSOL BA BTAB PA LTAR SGRO BA
DGON PA'I GDAN KHRIR BZHUGS SO, ,SKU MA 'DAS BAR DU SGRUB

PA NYAMS LEN DANG DBANG LUNG GNANG BA SOGS RNAM DKAR DGE BA'I
PHYAG LAS KHO NA MDZAD CING MNGON MKHYEN YANG THOGS MED YOD

PAS GRUB CHEN ZHES PA'I MING THOB PAR GRAGS, KHONG GI SLOB MA NI
DAD PA THOB PA'I SLOB MA CHIG 'BUM, GROL BA THOB PA LNGA BCU,

GRUB THOB TSAD LDAN BRGYAD SOGS SHIN TU MANG ZHING RJE BLO BZANG
GRAGS PA YANG KHONG GI SLOB MA YIN NO, ,

DGUNG LO BDUN CU DON DRUG TU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BDUN PA'I LCAGS
MO SBRUL LOR (1401) ZHI BAR GSHEGS, SKU GDUNG

ZHUGS 'BUL DUS SU SKU RUS LA LHA SKU RANG BYON DANG RING BSREL
MANG PO BYUNG BAR GRAGS SO, ,

BZHUGS YOD CING RANG RNAM MDOR BSDUS DANG MGUR SOGS GTZO

BOR NANG DON RIG PA'I SKOR KHO NA 'KHOD 'DUG

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'DIR AA KY'A ZHES PA'I MTSAN GYI 'BYUNG KHUNGS NI, SNGON AA KY'A
SKU RABS DANG PO SHES RAB BZANG PO DE NYID RJE SKU 'BUM

DGON PA'I NYE SKOR LI SHU SDE PA'I NANG AA TSANG GI KHYIM DU
'KHRUNGS PAS KHYIM RGYUD KYI MING GIS KHONG LA AA KY'A TSANG
ZHES PA'I MTSAN THOB

PA RED, DE NAS BZUNG KHONG GI SKU RABS TSANG MA'I MTSAN GYI DBUR
AA KY'A KHYIM RGYUD KYI MING RGYUN CHAGS SU GYUR, 'DIR KY'A ZHES

PA NI RGYA SKAD DE BOD SKAD DU KHYIM TSANG ZHES PA'I DON YIN LA
MTSO SNGON ZHING CHEN GYI RGYA BOD 'DRES MAR GNAS PA'I SA KHUL
DU DGON

PA LA ZI DANG KHYIM TSANG LA KY'A ZHES PA SOGS RGYA BOD ZUNG
'BREL GYI MING SHIN TU MANG NGO,

AA KY'A SKU RABS GNYIS PA BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN NI
MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL DU RAB BYUNG BCU GNYIS PA'I SA PHO BYI
BA

LO (1708) LA SKU BLTAMS,

SKU NA GZHON PA'I DUS NAS AA KY'A SHES RAB BZANG PO'I YANG SRID
DU NGOS 'DZIN NAS RJE SKU 'BUM DGON DU RAB TU BYUNG ZHING

@525 SBYOR KLOG BLOR 'DZIN SOGS LA 'BAD BRTZON MDZAD, DGUNG LO
GZHON NU'I SKABS SU DBUS LHA LDAN DU PHEBS TE SE RA DGON PAR

CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, SLOB DPON DANG DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO
BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS BCAS PAR GSAN SBYONG

MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD, LHA SA'I NYE SKOR GYI GNAS KHYAD PAR CAN DANG
RTEN PHUL BYUNG TSANG MA MJAL SKOR ZIN RJES DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD

PA SHING YOS LOR DBUS NAS MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL DU TSUR BYON,
MI RING BAR SKU 'BUM DGON GYI RGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI GSER KHRIR

MNGA' GSOL TE 'CHAD RTZOD RTZOM GSUM DANG BKA' LUNG DBANG GSUM
SOGS RGYAL BSTAN SPEL BA'I 'PHRIN LAS KHO NA MDZAD CING

SENG GE MKHAR GYI RI KHROD RMANG NAS GSO BA DANG SLOB MA RAB
'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS BLO GROS SOGS MKHAS PA MANG PO SPEL, RGYUD

PA'I BLA MA YUN RING MDZAD CING BZHUGS GNAS PHAL CHE BA SKU 'BUM
RGYUD GRVA'I BLA BRANG DU YIN MOD SKABS 'GAR SENG GE MKHAR RI

KHROD DU SGRUB PA NYAMS LEN MDZAD DE BZHUGS PA RED, SENG GE
MKHAR GYI SGRUB SDE 'DI NI AA KY'A GONG MA SHES RAB BZANG POS
DBYAR

GNAS MKHAN PO MDZAD CING CHOS 'CHAD NYAN DGE SGRUB SDIG SBYONG
SOGS KYI SROL LEGS PAR BTZUGS DGON PA'I SGRIG LAM YANG

'DUL BA NANG LTAR SHIN TU LEGS PA LA BRTEN DGON SDE 'DI NYID
PHYIS SU 'PHEL RGYAS BYUNG BA YIN LA, KHONG NI AA KY'A SKU RABS

GNYIS PA YIN STABS DGON DE'I BDAG PO MDZAD DGOS PA NI SMOS CI
DGOS, KHONG DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD TZAM NAS DGON DE'I

BDAG PO MDZAD NAS 'CHAD NYAN SOGS RNAM DKAR GYI 'PHRIN LAS RGYA
CHE MDZAD, DE NAS KHONG SENG GE MKHAR GYI SGRUB SDE'I 'DZIN

BDAG MDZAD MU'I SKABS RGYA NAG PE CING YUNG HO KUNG DGON PAR
'CHAD NYAN SLOB DPON DU PHEBS, KHONG DGUNG LO LNGA BCU PA RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I ME GLANG LOR (1757) SENG GE MKHAR GYI SGRUB
SDE'I GTZUG LAG KHANG SOGS ZHIG GSO BYED PA'I CHED DU PE CING

NAS DNGUL SRANG GNYIS BRGYA YAR BSKUR NAS LO GCIG LHAG TZAM LA
SGRUB SDER ZHIG GSO YONGS SU GRUB, PE CING DU LO GSUM LHAG

BZHUGS SHING RI BO RTZE LNGA SOGS RGYA NAG GI GNAS CHE KHAG LA
MJAL BSKOR PHEBS,

DGUNG LO LNGA BCU NGA GNYIS PA SA YOS LOR RGYA NAG NAS RANG YUL
MDO SMAD DU TSUR BYON, SENG GE MKHAR GYI SGRUB SDE YANG

GTZUG LAG KHANG NANG RTEN DANG BCAS PA ZHIG GSOS ZIN CING DER
BZHUGS NAS 'CHAD NYAN SGRIG BKOD SOGS GANG CI'I BYA BA

MTHA' DAG GI 'GAN BZHES TE RGYUD GRVA'I KHRID ZUR MDZAD, DGUNG
LO NGA LNGA PA CHU RTA LOR GONG MA CHAN LUNG GI BKA' LTAR T'A
LA'I

BRGYAD PA 'JAM DPAL RGYA MTSO KHRI 'DON BYED PA'I CHED DU DBUS
LHA LDAN DU BYON, KHAMS LI THANG DANG 'BA' SOGS BRGYUD DE LHO

LAM NAS LHA SAR PHEBS LAM BAR DGON SDE DANG GNAS CHEN RNAMS MJAL
ZHING 'BA' LI'I MTSAMS SU GNAS CHEN KAm PO GANGS RVA

MJAL BAS THUGS 'PHROG STE BSTOD PA SNYAN BRJID LDAN PA YANG
'PHRAL DU MDZAD, KHONG DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG TU PHEBS PA RAB

BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SA BYI LOR (1768) MDO SMAD SKU 'BUM DU SKU
GSHEGS SO, KHONG NI SKABS DER MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL NA

MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS BCAS PA'I TSIG DON GYI DKA' GNAS DGROL BA LA
ZLA DANG BRAL ZHING 'CHAD NYAN YANG YUN RING MDZAD STABS

SLOB MA MKHAS GRUB GNYIS LDAN YANG RAB 'BYAMS PA BSOD NAMS BLO
GROS DANG BSOD NAMS RGYAL MTSAN SOGS SHIN TU MANG PO SPEL,

KHONG GIS GSUNG RAB BRTZAMS PA'I SKOR LA BOD KYI BRDA SPROD SUM
RTAGS 'GREL PA DANG BZO GNAS THIG TSAD SKOR DKAR CHAG DANG

DRIS LAN SNA TSOGS CHAB SHOG RTZOD LAN RTZIS KYI SKOR PHAG GRU
SDE SRID SOGS BOD LA DBANG BSGYUR MYONG BA'I DPON KHAG GI GDUNG

RABS DBU MA'I LTA BA'I SKOR GYI BSHAD PA SOGS CHOS TSAN KA PA
NAS CHI PA'I BAR SUM CU SO DRUG DKAR CHAG BSNAN PAS SO BDUN

BCAS POD CHEN GCIG TU BSDUS PA RGYA NAG PE CING GI PAR MA ZHIG
NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD LA KHONG GI GSUNG TSANG MA

TSIG NYUNG ZHING DON 'DUS PA GO BDE BA SNYAN CHA LDAN PAR MA
TSAD GZHUNG DON RTOGS DKA' BA RNAMS GNAD PHIGS PAR BSHAD 'DUG

@526 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@527 *, ,AA KY'A YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DON GRUB KYI GSUNG 'BUM,
,

000934 PAR MA, KA

SEMS BSKYED MCHOD PA'I ZIN BRIS NYUNG BSDUS KYI TSUL DU BKOD PA
KUN BZANG MCHOD PA'I ME TOG CES BYA BA BZHUGS

SO, , (1) 13

RJE DHVA DZA'I ZHABS KYI SNGAGS KYI SPYI DON 'DZUB KHRID MNOS
SKABS KYI BRJED BYANG BDUD RTZI'I THIGS 'PHRENG ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (2) 42

RDO RJE 'PHRENG BA'I DBANG GI MTHONG BA BRGYUD PA'I PHYAG LEN
GSAL BAR BKOD PA SMIN BYED DBANG GI MDZES RGYAN ZHES

BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (3) 14

@531 SGRUB THABS RIN CHEN 'BYUNG GNAS KYI RJES GNANG GI ZIN BRIS
NYUNG BSDUS BZHUGS SO, , (4) 81

RIM LNGA GSAL SGRON GYI BSHAD LUNG ZIN BRIS DNGOS GRUB BDUD
RTZI'I ZEGS MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (5) 45

BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL DUS KYI 'KHOR LO'I RDUL TSON LA BRTEN PA'I
DKYIL 'KHOR SGRUB MCHOD CHA LAG DANG BCAS PA'I

PHYAG LEN GSAL BAR BKOD PA DVANGS SHEL ME LONG ZHES BYA BA
BZHUGS SO, , (6) 59

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

AA KY'A YONGS 'DZIN BLO BZANG DON GRUB BAM MTSAN GZHAN DBYANGS
CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS NI, MDO SMAD TZONG KHA'I YUL GYI

SHAR PHYOGS RMA KLUNG CHEN PO 'BAB PA'I BYANG 'GRAM, BOD SOG
'DRES MAR BSDAD PA'I THANG KY'A SDE PAR, RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM

PA'I SHING RTA LOR (1774) HOR GYI RUS SU SKU BLTAMS, SKU GZHON
NU'I DUS NAS BOD YIG 'BRI KLOG SOGS LA 'BAD PAR MDZAD

CING, SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI CHOS GRVAR ZHUGS, 'PHRIN LAS
BZANG PO DANG NGAG DBANG BZOD PA SOGS MKHAS DBANG GI

DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN BCU PHRAG GNYIS TZAM BSTEN NAS MDO SNGAGS
KYI GZHUNG LUGS RNAMS LA GSAN BSAM MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD,

SKU 'BUM DU SMON LAM CHEN POR GRVA SKOR DAM BCA' BZHAG PAS,
MKHAS PA KUN GYIS BSTOD PA'I ME TOG PHYOGS KUN NAS GTOR

ZHING, SMON LAM RAB 'BYAMS PA'I MTSAN SNYAN THOB, 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PA 'JIGS MED DBANG PO MCHOG DANG, LHAG

PAR SHING ZA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS YUN RING BSTEN NAS, SNYAN NGAG
SUM RTAGS, SDEB SBYOR, SGRA GZHUNG BCAS RIG PAR BYA

BA'I GNAS KUN LA SBYANGS PA MTHIL PHYIN MDZAD DE, MDO SNGAGS RIG
GNAS BCAS PAR MKHAS PA'I RTZER SON, DGUNG GRANGS

LNGA BCUR PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I CHU LUG LO (1823) LA
SKU 'BUM DGON BDAG AA KY'A YE SHES MKHAS GRUB RGYA MTSO'I YONGS

'DZIN DU GYUR, DE NAS BZUNG KHONG GI MTSAN LA AA KY'A YONGS
'DZIN ZHES PA RGYUN CHAGS SU GYUR, DGUNG GRANGS LNGA BCU NGA
DRUG

TU PHEBS PA SA MO GLANG GI LOR RGYA NAG RI BO RTZE LNGAR GNAS
MJAL DU PHEBS NAS RI BO DVANGS GSAL GYI GNAS BSTOD SNYAN 'JEBS

LDAN PA BRTZAMS, DGUNG GRANGS LNGA BCU NGA BZHIR PHEBS PA RAB
BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME PHAG LO (1827) LA SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA

GLING GI PAR KHANG NGO MTSAR RIN CHEN GLING DU RJE TZONG KHA PA
YAB SRAS KYI GSUNG 'BUM PAR BRKO BA'I DUS SU ZHU DAG PA'I 'GAN
'DZIN

MDZAD DE, LO DRUG LA PAR BRKOS ZIN PAR BYAS, BOD SOG GI BLA CHEN
MANG POS KHONG BLA MAR BSTEN NAS MKHAS PA'I DBANG POR

GYUR, SKU 'BUM SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI KHRI RABS BZHI PA PHE KY'A
BLO BZANG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS KYANG KHONG BLA MAR BSTEN
NAS

RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA MNOS, MDOR NA BOD HOR
SOG BCAS KYI SLOB MA MKHAS PA MANG PO GSAR DU SPEL, KHONG

NI BOD KYI RIG GNAS SPEL BAR THUGS LHAG PAR DGYES SHING, PHYI
RABS PA DAG LA LHAG BSAM SHIN TU DKAR BA'I MKHAS DBANG

DAM PA ZHIG STE, KHONG GI GSUNG RAB RNAMS SU 'DUL BA'I GLENG
'BUM DANG SA SKYA LEGS BSHAD SOGS KYI MING BRDA GO DKA' BA

DANG BRDA RNYING DAG GI BRDA BKROL PHYOGS BSDUS BRIS YOD CING,
DA DUNG BOD KYI NANG PA'I GRUB MTHA' RIS MED KYI 'BYUNG KHUNGS

MDOR BSDUS, SUM RTAGS, SDEBS SBYOR, SGRA RIG BCAS KYI NANG DON
MDOR BSDUS GO SLA LA NYUNG BA DANG, KHYAD PAR KHONG

GI GSUNG TSANG MA DON 'DUS LA TSIG TSOGS NYUNG BA'I SGO NAS RANG
CAG PHYI RABS PA DAG LA LTA BDE BA KHO NA YOD PA 'DIS KHONG NI

MKHAS NYAMS DANG 'JIGS NYAMS BSTAN MKHAN ZHIG MIN PAR PHYI RABS
PAR PHAN PA GTZO BOR 'DZIN MKHAN ZHIG YIN PAR GSAL

POR MTSON 'DUG KHONG DGUNG LO MTHON PO TZAM BZHUGS YOD TSOD 'DUG
KYANG, NAM TZAM 'DAS PA NI LO RGYUS GSAL POR MA

MTHONG BAS KHA TSOD GCOD MA SPOBS, KHONG GI GSUNG SKU 'BUM PAR
MA KA PA DANG KHA PA PO TI GNYIS CHA TSANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG
DU

BZHUGS YOD,

BZHUGS SO, , (4) 6

BRTEN PA'I BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR THUN DRUG GI NYAMS LEN DANG

'BREL BA DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS SOGS BZHUGS SO, , (5) 10

'JAM DBYANGS TSAR CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I RNAM THAR SOGS MGUR
TSAN BZHUGS SO, , (7) 7

RJE BTZUN MI LA 'JAM DBYANGS SA PAn RJE TZONG KHA PA GSUM GYI
RNAM THAR MGUR MA'I TSUL DU BSGRIGS PA BZHUGS SO, , (8) 8

RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS DMAR SER GYI ZHI RGYAS DBANG GSUM
GYI SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA RAB GSAL ME LONG DANG 'PHAGS

MA YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO'I RGYAS DBANG ZUNG GI SBYIN SREG BYA TSUL
BCAS LE TSAN GNYIS BZHUGS SO, , (9) 9

MGUR MA'I SKOR BLO GSAL CHOS LA SKUL BYED BZHAD PA RDO RJE DGYES
PA'I GLU DBYANGS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (10) 18

GRUB CHEN SKAL LDAN RGYA MTSO'I RNAM THAR MGUR MA'I TSUL DU
BSGRIGS PA THUGS RJE'I CHAR SPRIN BSKUL BA'I DPYID KYI PHO NYA

ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (11) 8

GI SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (12) 8

RJE BTZUN BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA RIG BYED MA LA DON RGYAN SO LNGA'I

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

AA KHYUNG SPRUL PA'I SKU NGAG DBANG MKHYEN RAB NI KHAMS MDO SMAD
AA MDO'I YUL DU 'KHRUNGS SHING, SPYI LO'I DUS RABS BCO

BRGYAD PA'I SMAD TZAM GYI MI YIN, DGUNG LO GZHON NU'I DUS NAS AA
KHYUNG SPRUL SKUR NGOS 'DZIN NAS, DGON PA STAG TSANG LHA MOR

GDAN DRANGS TE, GZIM SHAG DGA' LDAN BKRA SHIS G-YANG 'KHYIL DU
BZHUGS SU BCUG DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MKHAS DBANG

BCU GSUM GYI SPYAN SNGAR MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG GI ZAB CHOS MANG PO
GSAN, DPAL LDAN SA SKYA PA'I CHOS SKOR TSAR CHEN NAS BRGYUD

PA'I GSANG SNGAGS LAM 'BRAS KYANG PHAL MO CHE GSAN, KHYAD PAR
RNGA RGOD NAM MKHA' SENG GE LA THUN MONG RIG GNAS SKOR SNYAN
NGAG

ME LONG MA'I GZHUNG RDZOGS PAR GSAN CING, DPE BRJOD KYANG LEGS
PAR BKOD, MDOR NA MDO SNGAGS RIG GNAS KYI GZHUNG

LUGS MA LUS PAR SBYANGS PA MTHAR PHYIN MDZAD CING, DBANG LUNG
RJES GNANG BCAS MANG PO ZHUS TE, RANG GIS NYAMS LEN

DANG, DAD LDAN GZHAN DAG LA 'CHAD NYAN YANG YUN RING MDZAD,
MKHAS GRUB KYI SLOB MA YANG MANG DU SPEL,

GSUNG 'BUM SKOR LA, THUB DBANG GI MDZAD PA BCU GNYIS LAS BRTZAMS
PA'I MGUR SOGS MGUR MA MANG PO DANG,

'DUL BA DANG DBU MA'I SKOR GYI BSHAD PA, SNYAN NGAG DON RGYAN SO
LNGA'I 'GREL PA DANG DPE BRJOD RNAM THAR GSOL 'DEBS DANG,

BSTOD TSOGS SKOR, SUM CU PA'I DPE BRJOD, BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR
SOGS SGRUB THABS KYI SKOR BCAS CHOS TSAN RE RE BZHIN KA

'DUG 'DI GAR NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU GSUNG KHA TSANG GI PO TI

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN NI, BOD LDONG GI RIGS LAS
BRGYUD PA RNGA KHOG COG RTZE RGYAL PO'I NANG BLON NGA RO 'BUM

DANG YUM NAM MKHA' LCAM MO GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM
PA'I SA MO LUG LO (1799) LA 'KHRUNGS, BYIS PA LO GSUM

LON PA NA GUNG THANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME GDAN DRANGS TE KHONG GI
MDUN DU DGE BSNYEN BSGRUBS, SKU GONG MA BSOD NAMS CHOS

'PHEL GYI YANG SRID YIN MIN BRTAGS PA SNA TSOGS BRGYUD NAS AA
MCHOG GONG MA BSOD NAMS CHOS 'PHEL GYI SPRUL SKU YIN PAR THAG
BCAD,

DGUNG LO LNGA PAR SKU GONG MA'I SKU MCHED RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS
'BYOR RGYA MTSOS BYIS PA DKAR CHEN DGON DU GDAN DRANGS TE

GONG MA'I GDAN KHRIR BKOD, RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG YON TAN MDUN
DBANG RJES GNANG MANG TZAM ZHUS, BLO GLING YE SHES

YAR 'PHEL KLOG GI SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS CHOS SPYOD RIG GNAS
RNAMS SLOB SBYONG MDZAD, MKHAN PO BLO BZANG CHOS GRAGS

MDUN RAB TU BYUNG ZHING DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, BLA MA
MCHOD PA'I KHRID LUNG YANG GSAN, DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PA LCAGS

LUG LOR DBUS LHA LDAN DU BYON, RVA SGRENG DANG STAG LUNG SOGS
ZHIB MJAL RJES DGA' LDAN DGON PAR PHEBS, DGA' LDAN KHRI

DRUG CU RE DRUG PA NGAG DBANG SNYAN GRAGS DANG SHAR RTZE CHOS
RJE PHA BONG KHA PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL SOGS MJAL ZHING SHAR
RTZE'I TSOGS

CHOS SU BZHUGS, ,CHU SPREL SMON LAM CHEN MO'I SKABS T'A LA'I DGU
PA LUNG RTOGS RGYA MTSO MJAL, TRE BO CHOS MDZAD DANG MNYAM DU

TSAD MA RNAM 'GREL BCAS KYI TSOGS GLENG MDZAD, DE NAS DGA' LDAN
DANG GSANG PHU SOGS SU BKA' POD RNAMS KYI DAM BCA'

BZHAG TSIG DON BYANG CHUB CING LAN MYUR BAS KUN GYIS BSTOD,
GSANG PHU'I DBYAR CHOS LA CHOS LUGS RIS MED KYI GRVA TSANG

BCU TSOGS PA'I DBUS SU DKA' BCU'I MTSAN BTAGS BZHES, DE NAS DGA'
LDAN DU KHRI PA SOGS LA CHOS MANG TZAM ZHUS RJES

GTZANG DU PHEBS, BKRA SHIS LHUN POR PAn CHEN BDUN PA BSTAN PA'I
NYI MA MJAL, DER SENG CHEN BLO BZANG CHOS 'PHEL MDUN

CHOS 'GA' ZHIG ZHUS RJES RIM GYIS RANG YUL MDO SMAD DU TSUR
BYON, SPRUL SKU 'JAM DBYANGS RGYA MTSO MDUN NAS SNYAN NGAG
SBYANGS,

BLA MA BYAMS PA SOGS LA CHOS MANG PO ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER GNYIS
PA NAS BZUNG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU YANG YANG PHEBS NAS GUNG

THANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I SPYAN SNGAR DGE 'DUN GRANGS TSANG
DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA MNOS, 'JAM BZHAD 'JIGS

MED RGYA MTSO DANG SDE KHRI 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MA, DPAL
MING DKON MCHOG RGYAL MTSAN SOGS LA CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS

PA GSAN, SGRA PA MTHU STOBS LA SGRA DANG SA RIS SBYANGS, SNYAN
NGAG MKHAN 'JAM DBYANGS BDE CHEN MDUN SNYAN NGAG BSKYAR DU

ZHIB PAR SBYANGS, DGUNG LO NYER LNGA PA CHU LUG LOR (1823) GUNG
THANG BSTAN PA'I SGRON ME'I BKA' LTAR DGON GSAR 'DEBS KYI

DBU BTZUGS, RTZIG RMANG RKO BA'I DUS SU SA 'OG NAS LAS MI KUN
BZANG GIS 'JAM DBYANGS SMRA BA'I SENG GE'I RDO SKU ZHIG RNYED PA

KHONG LA PHUL BA DES RTEN GTZO BYAS NAS DGON BZHENGS PAS PHYIS
SU DGON PA'I MING SMRA BA'I SENG GE'I GLING ZHES PAR CHAGS,

DGON 'DIR KI RTI DGE BSHES BLO BZANG BYAMS PA KHRI PA DANG, SGO
MANG NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS DGE BSKOS BLO GLING DGE BSHES

DBU MDZAD BCAS BSKOS, SE 'BRAS DGE GSUM NAS THON PA'I DGE BSHES
MANG POS BGRO GLENG MDZAD DE 'CHAD NYAN GYI MGO

BTZUGS, DE NAS BZUNG DGON DER GZHUNG POD LNGA'I 'CHAD NYAN DANG
THUN MONG RIG GNAS KYI BSHAD KHRID BCAS 'PHEL RGYAS SU

PHYIN NAS RIS MED GRUB MTHA' KUN GYI MKHAS PA MANG DU THON, MGO
LOG GI YUL DU BSAM 'GRUB BDE LDAN ZHES PA'I DGON PA

@539 BTAB, RTEN BZHENGS KYANG MANG PO MDZAD, SNGA PHYIR RIS MED
KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DGU BCU LHAG BSTEN NAS ZAB CHOS

ZHUS SHING GZHUNG LUGS MANG PO GSAN PAS MKHAS PA CHEN POR GYUR,
ZHAL SLOB KYANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL GYI DGE BSHES SHES RAB RGYA

MTSO DANG 'BRAS SPUNGS DGE BSHES NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL, SGANG PA
SPRUL SKU, RGYAM KHO SPRUL SKU SOGS MKHAS GRAGS CHE BA MANG DU

BYUNG, DGUNG LO ZHE BRGYAD PA ME RTA LOR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU
PHEBS NAS DGE PA'I BSHES GNYEN RNAMS LA MTHA' MA'I MJAL KHA

ZHUS SHING DGON PA'I DGE 'DUN LA 'GYED MANG JA DANG RTEN BYIN
CAN MDUN MAR ME SOGS KYI MCHOD PA RGYA CHEN PHUL, DE NAS

YUN MI RING BAR ZLA BA BCU GNYIS PA'I TSES NYI SHU'I NYIN NAS
BZUNG SKU KHAMS CUNG ZAD MI BDE BA BYUNG, SMAN DANG RIM GRO SOGS

LA 'BAD KYANG PHAN PA MA BYUNG BAR DGUNG LO BZHI BCU ZHE DGU PA
RAB BYUNG BCU BZHI PA'I ME MO LUG GI LOR (1847) SKU MYA NGAN LAS

'DAS SO, ,

@546 RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

AA MCHOG 'JAM DBYANGS MKHYEN RAB RGYA MTSO NI, YUL MDO SMAD KYI
SA CHAR LHO BYANG GNYIS SU DBYE BA'I NANG TSAN LHO'I RGYUD RNGA

KHOG COG RTZE RGYAL PO'I MNGA' 'BANGS DANG NYE BAR YAB BSOD NAMS
NOR BU DANG YUM PHUN SUM TSOGS SKYID GNYIS KYI SRAS SU RAB BYUNG

BCU BZHI PA'I SA MO BYA LOR (1849) 'KHRUNGS, KHONG NI AA MCHOG
SKU RABS GSUM PA YIN LA, SKU RABS DANG PO BSOD NAMS

CHOS 'PHEL SHAR RGYAL MO RONG DANG NYE BAR AA MCHOG RGYAL PO'I
PHO BRANG DU SKU BLTAMS PAS RUS RGYUD KYI MING GIS PHYIS RABS
RNAMS LA

AA MCHOG SPRUL SKU'I MING THOB PA RED, KHONG SKU BLTAMS NAS YUN
MI RING BAR 'JAM BZHAD SKU PHRENG GSUM PA THUB BSTAN 'JIGS

MED RGYA MTSOS AA MCHOG DKON MCHOG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN GYI
YANG SRID DU NGOS 'DZIN MDZAD, CHOS SDE SMRA BA'I SENG GE'I
GLING GI

MI SNA RNAMS KYIS NA BZA' DANG YO BYAD PHUL, YAB YUM LA YANG BLU
YON LEGS PAR SBYIN, DE NAS GNAS BRTAN CHOS GRAGS KLOG

GI SLOB DPON DU BSKOS NAS SBYOR KLOG BSLABS, DGUNG LO BDUN PAR
RTA BSU RING THUNG DANG SER SBRENG RGYA CHEN DANG BCAS RANG GI

DGON PAR GDAN DRANGS, SHAR RTZE'I MKHAN PO BLO BZANG 'BYUNG GNAS
KYI SPYAN SNGAR DGE BSNYEN DANG RAB BYUNG GI BSLAB SDOM

MNOS, BLO BZANG MKHYEN RAB RGYA MTSO ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL, DE
NAS AA MCHOG GONG MA'I GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL, BYA BRAL

DGE 'DUN YAR 'PHEL DANG, 'DUL 'DZIN GRAGS PA RGYAL MTSAN GNYIS
YONGS 'DZIN BSKOS NAS RGYAN 'JUG DANG CHOS SPYOD CHO

GA BLOR 'DZIN BCAS 'BAD PAS SBYANGS,

DGUNG LO BCU GSUM PAR RJE BTZUN NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL MDUN DGE
TSUL GYI SDOM PA BLANGS, LO DE'I STON KHA NAS BSHAD

GRVAR ZHUGS TE LO GSUM LHAG GI RING BSDUS GRVA DANG BLO RIG
RTAGS RIGS SOGS NAS GZHUNG 'GA'I RTZA BA BLOR 'DZIN SOGS THOS

BSAM MDZAD, DGUNG LO BCU BDUN PAR DBUS SU DGA' LDAN DGON PAR
PHEBS NAS SHAR RTZE'I GRVA TSANG DU BSDUS GRVA DANG BLO

RTAGS RIGS BCAS KYI DAM BCA' BZHAG RIGS CHUNG TSOGS GLENG YANG
MDZAD, MI RING BAR LHA SAR JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS SOGS

RTEN BRTEN PA MJAL BA DANG, PO TA LAR T'A LA'I BCU GNYIS PA
'PHRIN LAS RGYA MTSO LA CHIBS RTA SHIN TU SPUS LEGS SOGS DNGOS

'BUL RGYA CHEN PHUL NAS MJAL, PHYAG DBANG GNANG ZHING THUGS
DGYES PA CHEN PO GNANG, SE 'BRAS DANG DPAL BSAM YAS

SOGS LA GNAS MJAL BYON, DE NAS GTZANG DU BYON NAS BKRA SHIS LHUN
POR PAn CHEN BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG MJAL ZHING CHOS

'BREL ZHUS, DE RJES DGA' LDAN DGON PAR LOG NAS YUN MI RING BAR
LHA SA'I SMON LAM CHEN MOR DGE 'DUN KHRI PHRAG DANG LHAN

CIG CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GI DGA' STON LA ROL, T'A LA'I BLA MA
DANG, RTA TSAG NO MIN HAN BCAS MJAL, SMON LAM ZIN RJES

DGA' LDAN DU BYON, SPYIR SLOB SBYONG MTHAR MA PHYIN BAR DU DGA'
LDAN DU BZHUGS MOS YOD KYANG, RANG DGON DU YONG DGOS

PAR NAN GYIS BSKUL BA DANG, CHOS GROGS 'GAS KYANG RANG YUL DU
'GRO DGOS PA'I BSKUL MA YANG YANG BYAS PAR BRTEN,

DGA' LDAN DGON PAR LO GCIG TZAM LAS MA BZHUGS PAR RANG YUL MDO
SMAD DU BYON, DGE BSHES BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS DANG,

BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS GRAGS PA SOGS SLOB DPON DU BSTEN NAS, PHAR
PHYIN DBU MA MNGON PA SOGS GZHUNG POD LNGA LA SLOB SBYONG

MDZAD CING DGE BSHES DKON MCHOG SENG GE LA DKYIL 'KHOR CHA TSAD
LAS BZHI'I THAB THIG DANG, DBANG GI PHYAG LEN BCAS

SBYANGS, RTZA BA'I BLA MA NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL MDUN GSANG
SNGAGS KYI SKOR LA, DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG DANG, RGYUD SDE BZHI'I

BSHAD KHRID, GZHAN YANG LAM RIM CHE CHUNG DANG, BLO SBYONG SNA
TSOGS BCAS CHOS BKA' MTHA' YAS GSAN, SA SKYA BLA MA DKON

MCHOG BLO GROS LA DBYANGS CAN SGRA MDO SOGS SGRA'I SKOR DANG,
SNYAN NGAG SDEB SBYOR, RTZIS BCAS THUN MONG GI RIG GNAS

RNAMS LA SLOB SBYONG MDZAD, RTZOM RGYUGS LEGS PAR PHUL BAS
DBYANGS CAN BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE ZHES PA'I MTSAN GSOL, DGE

BSHES BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO LA SUM RTAGS DANG SMAN GYI GZHUNG GSO
RIG RGYUD BZHI MAN NGAG LHAN THABS BCAS PA GSAN, DGUNG

LO NYER GNYIS PA LCAGS RTA LOR 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA SKU RABS
BZHI PA BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG DER PHEBS NAS

KHONG CHOS SDE DE'I CHOS SRID GNYIS KYI BDAG POR BSKOS, DE NAS
BZUNG DGON PA'I LAS SNE BSKO BZHAG DANG, SGRIG LAM DO DAM

SOGS BYA BA CHE PHRA TSANG MA PHYAG BSTAR MDZAD, DGE 'DUN RNAMS
LA DBANG BSKUR CHOS BSHAD SOGS MDZAD PA'I DBU THOG MAR

BTZUGS, DGUNG LO NYER BDUN PAR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BSNYEN RDZOGS
ZHU BAR BYON, SHES RAB RGYA MTSO'I SPYAN SNGAR BSNYEN

@547 RDZOGS KYI BSLAB SDOM MNOS, MTSAN 'JAM DBYANGS MKHYEN RAB
RGYA MTSOR GSOL, DE NAS TSUR BYON PA'I LAM BAR SMYUNG GNAS

PA MJAL ZHING CHOS 'BREL 'GA' ZHUS, DGUNG LO NYER DGU PAR DBEN
GNAS MKHA' SPYOD RTZER RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED SOGS BSNYEN

MTSAMS BZHUGS, DE NAS KHRI CHEN BYANG CHUB CHOS 'PHEL DANG THE
BO SPRUL SKU MKHYEN RAB SOGS LA ZAB CHOS MANG DU ZHUS, GUNG

THANG 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MA DER PHEBS PA MJAL ZHING
DBANG ZHUS PA DANG GANG CI'I ZHABS 'DEGS DANG BCAS DNGOS

DNGUL GYI 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL, DGUNG LO SO GSUM PA LCAGS
SBRUL LOR BKA' DRIN CAN GYI BLA MA NGAG DBANG CHOS 'PHEL DGONGS

PA RDZOGS PA'I RJES SU DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, DE NAS
RANG DGON DU 'CHAD NYAN DANG DBYAR GNAS MKHAN PO MDZAD PA

DBANG LUNG GNANG BA SOGS MDZAD, SHING RTA LOR GTER STON BDUD
'JOMS GLING PA NAG MED NYES BTZUGS KYIS DMAG DPUNG

DRAG POS GSOD PAR BRTZAMS PA NA, DNGUL RDO TSAD BDUN LHAG SBYIN
NAS SKU SROG BLU BAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO SO BDUN PA ME BYA

LOR 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAS KHONG RNGA STOD SGO MANG SGAR PA'I
GDAN KHRIR BKOD, CHOS DANG ZANG ZING GNYIS THAD NAS DGON DE

LEGS PAR BSKYANGS, BLA SPRUL MANG PO LA DBANG LUNG BCAS CHOS
SBYIN YUN RING BSTZAL, DGUNG LO ZHE GCIG PA LCAGS GLANG LOR

BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BYON NAS 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PAR PHAG MO DMAR
CHUNG GI DBANG SOGS ZAB CHOS 'GA' ZHIG PHUL, LO DE'I

PHYI LOR 'JAM BZHAD KHONG GI DGON PA SMRA BA'I SENG GE'I GLING
DU PHEBS, 'JAM BZHAD GZIM MAL YANG KHONG GI MAL KHRIR MDZAD

CING, NYID KYI DBU ZHVA KHONG LA GNANG BA BCAS 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PAS THUGS GTZIGS CHEN PO MDZAD, SA BYA LOR 'JAM

BZHAD BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG LHA LDAN DU PHEBS PAR
SKYEL MA DANG, PHEBS BRDZANG DNGUL SRANG LNGA BCU DANG DRE'U

BCAS PHUL, LCAGS PHAG LOR GUNG THANG RANG DGON DU GDAN DRANGS TE
'JIGS BYED KHANG TSAN GSAR 'DZUGS DANG, 'DU

KHANG GSAR BZHENGS SOGS LA RAB GNAS SOGS MDZAD CING, DGON DER
MKHAS GRUB NOR BU GLING ZHES BTAGS, RJES SU

YANG BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU THENGS 'GA' PHEBS NAS 'JAM DBYANGS
BZHAD PAR DBANG LUNG MANG DU PHUL, ME 'BRUG LOR (1916)

'JAM BZHAD DGONGS PA RDZOGS PAR DGE BRDZANG DANG SKU GDUNG ZHUGS
'BUL SOGS MDZAD, LCAGS BYA LOR 'JAM BZHAD SPRUL SKU

DGUNG LO DRUG TU PHEBS PA LA DGE BSNYEN DANG RAB BYUNG GI SDOM
PA 'BUL PHYIR BKRA SHIS 'KHYIL DU BYON, RAB BYUNG GI SDOM PA
DANG

'JIGS BYED DPA' GCIG PA'I DBANG BCAS PHUL ZHING, YI GE'I MA PHYI
KA KHA BSLAB PA'I DBU YANG TSUGS, KHONG NI 'JAM

BZHAD SKU RABS GNYIS KYI BLA MAR GYUR CING, SKABS DER MDO SMAD
PHYOGS LA SNYAN GRAGS LDAN PA'I BLA MA ZHIG YIN, KHONG DGUNG

LO DON BDUN DU PHEBS PA ME STAG LOR 'JAM BZHAD MCHOG SPRUL RANG
DGON DU GDAN DRANGS TE DBANG RJES GNANG 'GA' PHUL RJES

MCHOG SPRUL LA DNGUL DNGOS SPOM MTHO BA PHUL ZHING ZHABS PAD YUN
DU BRTAN PA'I BRTAN BZHUGS NAN TAN ZHUS, DGUNG LO

BRGYAD CU GYA DRUG TU PHEBS PA ME GLANG LOR 'JAM BZHAD SPRUL SKU
DBUS SU PHEBS SKABS LAM BAR PHEBS SKYEL THOG DBUS BRDZANG PHUL,

DGUNG LO GO GNYIS PA LCAGS 'BRUG LA 'JAM BZHAD DBUS NAS MAR BYON
PA BSU BA'I CHED DU DNGUL RVA'I BAR PHEBS NAS

'TSAMS 'DRI ZHUS, DGUNG LO DGU BCU GO DRUG TU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG
BCU DRUG PA'I SHING SPREL LO'I (1944) ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES

GNYIS LA DGONGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,

GSUNG 'BUM SMRA BA'I SENG GE'I GLING GI PAR MA POD GNYIS YOD PA
CHA TSANG NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU BZHUGS YOD,

000500 PAR MA DH'I:

'DZAM GLING BYANG PHYOGS KYI THUB PA'I RGYAL TSAB CHEN PO DPAL
LDAN SA SKYA PA'I GDUNG RABS RIN PO CHE JI LTAR BYON PA'I TSUL

GYI RNAM PAR THAR PA NGO MTSAR RIN PO CHE'I BANG MDZOD DGOS 'DOD
KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 334

RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS NYUNG BSDUS,

'KHON SH'AKYA BLO GROS KYI SRAS GNYIS PA, 'KHON DKON MCHOG RGYAL
PO DGUNG LO BZHI BCUR PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG DANG PO'I CHU MO

GLANG GI LO (1073) ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I YAR TSES LA RGYAB DPON PO
RI GLANG CHEN NYAL BA LTA BU'I DKYIL LA SA DKAR PO DAR DKAR

BRKYANGS PA LTA BU'I G-YAS 'GRAM DU DGON BTAB PA NAS BZUNG 'KHON
SA SKYA PA ZHES PA'I MTSAN SNYAN THOG MAR DAR, DE NAS RAB

BYUNG LNGA BA'I SHING PHO BYI BA'I LO'I (1324) BAR LO GRANGS
NYIS BRGYA LNGA BCU RTZA GCIG RING SA SKYA SPYI LA DBANG BA'I
GDAN RABS,

SLOB DPON BSOD NAMS RTZE MOS GDAN SA MA BZHES PA'I LUGS LTAR NA
'KHON GYI GDUNG RABS BDUN DANG GDUNG RGYUD MIN PA BA RI

LO TZ'A BA DANG, SHAR PA 'JAM DBYANGS RIN CHEN RGYAL MTSAN TE
GDAN RABS DGU BYUNG, GAL TE BSOD NAMS RTZE MO DANG,

DKAR SH'AKYA GRAGS GNYIS KYIS GDAN SA 'DZIN YOD PA'I LUGS LTAR
NA, BDAG CHEN BZANG PO DPAL YAN LA GDAN SAR

BZHUGS MKHAN GDUNG RGYUD BRGYAD DANG, GDUNG RGYUD MIN PA GSUM
STE BCU GCIG BYUNG BAR GO DGOS, SA SKYA SPYI LA DBANG

BSGYUR BA'I GDAN SA PA THA MA NI 'PHAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN
GYI GCUNG YE SHES 'BYUNG GNAS KYI SRAS BDAG NYID CHEN PO BZANG
PO

DPAL YIN LA, KHONG DGUNG LO SO BDUN PA RAB BYUNG LNGA BA'I SA
PHO KHYI (1298) LOR RGYA NAG NAS SA SKYAR PHEBS TE GDAN SAR

BZHUGS SO, ,RAB BYUNG LNGA BA'I SHING PHO BYI BA'I LOR (1324)
SKU GSHEGS PA'I BAR LO NYER BDUN GDAN SA MDZAD, BTZUN MO RGYA

MO GCIG DANG, SOG MO GCIG BOD MO LNGA STE BDUN BZHES, SNGA PHYIR
KHYON BSDOMS SRAS BCO LNGA TZAM BYON PAR GRAGS,

BDAG CHEN BZANG PO DPAL DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GSUM DU PHEBS PA
SHING PHO BYI BA'I LOR DGONGS PA RDZOGS, SKABS DER

SRAS CHE BA TI SHRI KUN DGA' BLO GROS DGUNG LO NYER DRUG LA
PHEBS PA DES RANG GI GCUNG RNAMS LA MA YUM MI 'DRA BA'I RIM PA
LTAR

GZHI THOG BLA BRANG DANG LHA KHANG BLA BRANG, RIN CHEN SGANG BLA
BRANG, DUS MCHOD BLA BRANG STE BLA BRANG BZHI SO SOR BGOS, DE
NAS

BZUNG SA SKYA LA GDUNG RGYUD BZHUGS PA'I BLA BRANG BZHIR GRAGS,
PHYIS SU SA SKYA SPYI LA DBANG BA'I GDUNG RGYUD MA BYON YANG
'GRO

MGON 'PHAGS PA'I GDAN SA GZHI THOG BLA BRANG CHEN MOR BZHUGS
SHING, TSOGS CHOS GSUNG BA SOGS MDZAD PA KHAG CHE BA RNAMS

MDZAD MKHAN LA GDAN SA PA'I MTSAN GSOL, AA MES ZHABS NGAG DBANG
KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS NI DUS MCHOD BLA BRANG GI

GDUNG RGYUD DU 'KHRUNGS, 'ON KYANG GZHI THOG BLA BRANG DU BZHUGS
TE SA SKYA'I GDAN SA YANG YUN RING BZHES, YAB SNGAGS 'CHANG

GRAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN DANG, YUM BSOD NAMS RGYAL MO GNYIS
LA SRAS GSUM STE CHE BA MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GRAGS PA

RGYAL MTSAN, 'BRING BA NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' DBANG RGYAL DGUNG LO
NYER LNGA PAR GSHEGS, CHUNG BA NI AA MES ZHABS NGAG

DBANG KUN DGA' BSOD NAMS YIN LA, YAB DGUNG LO SO LNGA DANG YUM
DGUNG GRANGS SO GCIG TU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I ME

MO BYA LO'I (1597) ZLA BA DANG PO'I TSES BCU BZHI'I NYIN DPAL SA
SKYA'I BLA BRANG PHUN TSOGS GLING DU SKU BLTAMS SO, ,DE NAS RIM

GYIS NAR SON TE DGUNG LO LNGA TSUN CHAD DU YAB YUM DANG 'BRAL
MED DU BZHUGS SO, ,YAB RJE'I SPYAN SNGAR DBANG DANG RJES GNANG

@595 'GA' ZHUS TE RDO RJE THEG PA'I CHOS SGO THOG MAR PHYE, YI
GE'I PHYI MO 'BRI KLOG SOGS KYANG THOG MAR YAB RJE'I DRUNG DU
SBYANGS, YAB

RJE CHOS KYI RGYAL POS NGOR AE WAM CHOS LDAN NAS GDAN SA PA NAM
MKHA' DPAL BZANG GDAN DRANGS TE DE'I MDUN YAB YUM DANG

LHAN CIG TU DBANG LUNG SOGS ZAB CHOS MANG PO GSAN, BYIS PA'I DUS
NAS THUGS SHIN TU ZAB CING SGAM PA DANG, SPYOD PA ZHI

ZHING DUL BA, LUGS GNYIS KYI BYA BA KUN LA NA TSOD RGAN PO DAG
LAS KYANG MKHAS PAR GYUR PAS, KUN GYIS ``SKYES BU DAM PA

'DI NI 'JIG RTEN AA MES CHEN PO ZHIG GO'' ZER PHYOGS KUN
BSGRAGS, DE NAS BZUNG KHONG GI MTSAN AA MES ZHES PA YONGS GRAGS

SU GYUR, DGUNG GRANGS DRUG TU PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU PA'I CHU
PHO STAG GI LO'I (1602) GNAM LO GSAR DU TSES PA'I DUS STON

CHEN POR KHU BO SA SKYA PA CHEN PO BYAMS PA DPAL NGAG DBANG BSOD
NAMS DBANG PO DANG YAB SNGAGS 'CHANG GRAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL

MTSAN SKU MCHED GNYIS LEGS PAR MTHUN PA'I BKA' MOL MDZAD DE
GDUNG SRAS SKU MCHED GSUM PO GSER KHRIR MNGA' GSOL,

SKU LA YAB RJE DANG MTSUNGS PAR NA BZA' GANGS LTAR DKAR BAS
MDZES PAR BRGYAN CING, DBU SKRA LCANG LO YID DU 'ONG BAS SPUD

PA'I STENG NA PAN ZHVA DANG, CHOS GOS ME LONG SOGS SKU CHAS SHIN
TU MDZES PAR GSOL TE MTHONG BA'I MOD LA YID 'PHROG PAR GYUR,

DBUS GTZANG GI BAN SKYA DRAG ZHAN KHRI PHRAG LHAG 'DZOM ZHING
ZANG ZING GI 'BUL NOR RGYA CHEN PHUL, KHRIR 'DON GYI CHO GA SHIN
TU RGYAS

PAR MDZAD, YAB KYIS DBU BYED CHEN MO BSOD NAMS LHA DBANG KLOG GI
SLOB DPON DU BSKOS, SA SKYA'I 'DON CHOG DANG CHO GA

PHYAG LEN GDANGS DBYANGS ROL TSIGS GAR 'CHAM SOGS GSAN SBYONG
MDZAD, SA SKYA LA DUS MCHOD DANG SGRUB MCHOD THUN MONG

DANG THUN MONG MIN PA SHIN TU MANG PO YOD PA RNAMS LO BZHI
LNGA'I RING TSANG MA THUGS SU CHUD PAR MDZAD, SA SKYA NGAG DBANG
BSOD

NAMS DBANG PO'I SPYAN SNGAR YAB DANG GCEN PO GNYIS DANG LHAN
GCIG TU SA SKYA PA'I CHOS SKOR DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG BCAS PA TSANG

MA ZHUS TE THUGS KYI BUM PA YONGS SU GANG BAR MDZAD, NGAG DBANG
BSOD NAMS DBANG PO RE ZHIG BYAS 'GYUR RDO RJE BRAG RDZONG NYID
DU

GDAN CHAGS TE SKU MTSAMS BCAD, KHONG SKABS DER DGUNG GRANGS BCU
GNYIS SU PHEBS PA SA SPREL LO'I ZLA BA BCU PA NAS DGUNG

LO BCU GSUM DU SU PHEBS PA SA BYA LO'I ZLA BA GSUM PA'I BAR GCEN
GNYIS DANG LHAN CIG BSNYEN MTSAMS ZLA BA DRUG TZAM BZHUGS

SO, ,DGUNG LO BCU BZHIR PHEBS PA LCAGS KHYI LO'I GNAM LO GSAR DU
BZHAD PA'I DUS NYIN PAR SA PAn LA BSTOD PA'I TSIGS SU

BCAD PA LJAGS RTZOM MDZAD CING RAB TU BYUNG BAR 'DOD PA'I DGONGS
PA RNAL MA 'KHRUNGS, LO DE'I ZLA BA GSUM PA'I TSES BZANG

LA SA SKYA'I DBU RTZE RNYING MA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG CHEN POR SA
PAn GYI DBU LO'I PHUD DBUL YUL THUB SKU RDO GDAN MAR GRAGS PA'I
SPYAN

SNGAR BLA MA NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS DBANG PO'I MDUN NAS RAB BYUNG
DGE TSUL GYI SDOM PA YANG DAG PAR MNOS, KHYIM PA'I RTAGS

CHA LUGS RING DU DOR NAS GOS NGUR SMRIG GI NA BZA' LEGS PAR
MNABS, BLA MA DE NYID LAS MDO SNGAGS KYI CHOS MANG PO MU

MTHUD NAS GSAN, DGUNG LO BCO LNGAR PHEBS PA LCAGS MO PHAG GI LOR
KHONG GI GCEN PO MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG KHAMS PHYOGS SU

PHEBS PA NA KHONG THUGS SHIN TU 'PHRENG BAS GDUNG SEL GYI TSIGS
SU BCAD PA ZHIG KYANG BRTZAMS,

KHONG DGUNG LO BCU DRUG PA CHU PHO BYI BA (1612) LO NAS DGUNG
GRANGS BCU BDUN PA CHU MO GLANG (1613) BAR NI GTZANG PA SDE

SRID PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL GYIS GTZANG GI RDZONG MKHAR RNAMS
BLANGS TE GTZANG GCIG GYUR BYED PA'I DUS KHEL BAS GTZANG DU SDE
'KHRUG

CHEN PO BYUNG, SA SKYA'I YON BDAG G-YAS RU BYANG PA DANG SHAR
KHA BA RIN SPUNGS PA SOGS THOG MAR YUL GZHAN DU BROS KYANG,

SLAD MAR DPON KHAG DE DAG LA YANG MNGA' 'BANGS GANG 'TSAM RE
THOB NAS BDE BAR GNAS THUB PAR GYUR, GLANG LO'I ZLA BA DANG

PO'I TSES BCO LNGA'I NUB MOR BKA' DRIN CAN GYI MA YUM BSOD NAMS
RGYAL MO ZHI BAR GSHEGS, KHONG BZOD THABS MED PA'I

THUGS LAS DRAG POS MNAR, BSNGO SMON DANG DGE RDZOGS RGYA CHEN
BSGRUBS, GCEN PO MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG KHAMS NAS SA

SKYAR PHEBS, SKABS DE DAG TU MUS CHEN SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN
NAS KHONG RANG SKU BGRES PAR BRTEN GLING KHA BDE BA CAN GYI GDAN

SA BZHES DGOS PAR BSKUL, DGUNG GRANGS BCO BRGYAD PA SHING PHO
STAG LO'I ZLA BA DGU BA'I MJUG TZAM LA SA SKYA NAS BTEGS TE

MUS PA'I PHYOGS SU PHEBS, SER PHRENG GZAB RGYAS BSGRIGS PA DANG
MUS CHEN SKU NGO MA DANG BCAS PAS BSUS, LO DE'I ZLA BA BCU

GCIG PA'I TSES GSUM NYIN PAR GDAN KHRIR BZHUGS, MUS CHEN PAS
GDAN SA GTAD RJES ZAB CHOS MANG PO BSTZAL, DER LO

GSUM THOS BSAM MDZAD RJES SA SKYAR TSUR PHEBS, SER SBRENG RGYAS
PA DANG BCAS BSUS TE GZHI THOG BLA BRANG DU BZHUGS SO, ,

GZHI THOG BLA BRANG GI GZIM CHUNG MKHA' SPYOD NYID DU RE ZHIG GI
BAR THOS BSAM LA 'GRUS PAR MDZAD, SKABS DER YAB RJE GRAGS

PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS ``KHYED RANG GIS RAB BYUNG GI RTUL
ZHUGS 'DI DOR LA NGED RANG LTAR BGYIS NA NGA YANG BSAM PA DE KAS

RDZOGS PA YIN, SA SKYA'I GDAN SA 'DI YANG KHYED KYIS 'DZIN
SKYONG SPEL GSUM BYED DGOS, GAL TE NGA'I NGAG LA MA NYAN NA NGA

YANG SU LA BSAMS NAS SDOD'' CES SOGS GSUNG NAN CAN PHEBS PAR
BRTEN YAB KYI BKA' GCOG MA NUS PAR GNAS SKABS KHAS

@596 MA LEN THABS MED GYUR, DE NAS MI RING BAR MUS CHEN SANGS
RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN LA LAM 'BRAS SOGS CHOS ZHU 'PHRO RNAMS ZHU BAR

PHEBS, YUN MI RING BAR YAB GRAGS PA BLO GROS RGYAL MTSAN NAS SA
SKYAR RDO RJE PHUR PA'I SGRUB MCHOD THOG TU PHEBS DGOS PA'I

BKA' 'BYOR BAS SA SKYAR TSUR PHEBS, DE DUS RJE MUS CHEN DGUNG LO
DON GSUM DU PHEBS YOD CING, KHONG LA ZAB CHOS ZHU

'PHRO MANG PO DA DUNG LHAG YOD PAR BRTEN, SA SKYAR YUN RING MA
BZHUGS NAS DGUNG LO NYER GCIG PA ME MO SBRUL LO'I ZLA BA BRGYAD

PAR SLAR YANG MUS PHYOGS SU PHEBS, GLING KHA BDE BA CAN GYI BSAM
GTAN PHUG TU MUS CHEN MJAL, BLA SLOB GNYIS PO THUGS

DGYES PA CHEN POS ZHAL GLENG MDZAD, DE NAS MUS CHEN DRUNG NAS
ZAB CHOS MA LUS BUM PA GANG BYO'I TSUL DU ZHUS, PHAR YANG

DAD LDAN GYI SLOB MA MANG POR BSHAD KHRID MANG DU MDZAD, NYIN
ZHIG BSAM GTAN PHUG TU KHONG BLA SLOB GNYIS THUGS DAL BAR

BZHUGS PA'I SKABS SHIG NA RJE MUS CHEN LA 'DI LTAR ZHUS ``SNGON
YAB RJE GRAGS PA'I MTSAN CAN NAS KHO BOR GDAN SA CHEN PO 'DZIN

SKYONG BYED DGOS PA DANG, GDUNG SPEL BYED DGOS PA SOGS ZHAL
GSUNG NAN CHEN GNANG BAS SEMS SKYO ZHING LAN YANG ZHU MA THUB

PA ZHIG BYUNG BAS JI LTAR BYAS NA LEGS'' ZHES BKA' 'DRI ZHUS,
MUS CHEN GYIS ``YAB KYI GSUNG LA YANG BDEN PA'I RANG BZHIN

'DUG 'ON KYANG KHYED LA SKU MCHED MANG BAS DE DAG GIS YAB KYI
DGONGS RE 'GRUB PA BYUNG NA KHYED RAB BYUNG BSGRUBS TE BSTAN

DON BSGRUBS NA PHAN PA CHE TZAM YONG BAS RIM GYIS DBYIBS TSUL LA
BLTAS NAS 'GAG SGO BRGAL BA'I GNAS TSUL BYAS NA LEGS PAS

DE LUGS THUGS LA ZHOG'' GSUNGS, DE NAS DGUNG LO NYER GCIG TU SON
PA SA SBRUL LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I YAR TSES LA GLING KHA

BDE BA CAN GYI BYA 'DABS BSAM GTAN PHUG GI YANG STENG DU MUS
CHEN SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN GYIS MKHAN PO DANG, THUB BSTAN

RNAM RGYAL GYIS MKHAN CHEN, BZOD PA RGYA MTSOS LAS SLOB, YANGS
PA CAN GYI MKHAN PO 'JAM DBYANGS CHOS BZANG PAS GSANG

STON, CHOS SKYONG RDO RJE PAS GRIB TSOD PA BCAS MDZAD DE DGE
'DUN 'DUS PA MANG PO'I DBUS SU BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI SDOM PA YANG

DAG PAR MNOS, DE NAS MI RING BAR ZLA BA BZHI BA'I TSES BCO
BRGYAD NYIN PAR YAB DGONGS PA RDZOGS, BCU DGU NYIN PAR

KHONG SA SKYAR PHEBS NAS YAB KYI GDUNG MJAL BAS THUGS SKYO BA
DRAG POS BRGYAL BA LTAR BYUNG ZHING SKU LUS KYANG SRA 'DZIN MI
THUB PAR

GYUR, SMON LAM DANG GSOL 'DEBS MANG PO GSUNGS SHING, GCEN PO
NGAG DBANG KUN DGA' DBANG RGYAL BCAS DANG LHAN

GCIG DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, DNGUL GDUNG RIN PO CHE BZO
KHYAD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BZHENGS NAS GZHI THOG BLA BRANG GI

RIG 'DZIN BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I GTZUG LAG KHANG DU BZHUGS SU BCUG
GO ,

YANG MUS CHEN GYI SPYAN SNGAR BYON NAS CHOS BKA' ZLA BA GCIG
TZAM RING GSAN, CHOS ZHU 'PHRO MTHA' DAG ZHUS RJES SA SKYAR

PHEBS LA NYE BA NA, RJE MUS CHEN PA'I DRUNG DU GANG CI'I BSLAB
BYA ZHU BAR PHYIN, MUS CHEN GYIS THUGS DGYES PA CHEN POS THOS

BSAM LA MU MTHUD 'BAD DGOS PA DANG, BSTAN 'GRO'I DON LEGS PAR
SGRUB DGOS PA SOGS KYI ZHAL GDAMS GNANG, DE

NAS BTEGS TE SA SKYAR PHEBS, CHU MIG RDZONG BDE MCHOG PHO BRANG
DU BZHUGS SO, ,ZLA BA LNGA BA'I TSES LNGA DRUG TZAM LA MUS CHEN

SANGS RGYAS RGYAL MTSAN SKU GSHEGS, GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL ZIN RJES,
KHONG LA GDUNG SKAL DBU THOD DUM BU ZHIG PHUL BAS,

THUGS SKYO NGAL TSAD MED DANG BCAS MCHOD 'BUL GSOL 'DEBS MANG DU
MDZAD, NANG RTEN DNGUL GDUNG RMAD DU BYUNG BA DANG,

MUS CHEN GYI 'DRA SKU DNGUL LAS BZHENGS PA KHRU GANG BA, SKU
BRNYAN SKU TSAD MA SOGS GSAR DU BZHENGS, DUS PHYIS LO DUS KYI

MCHOD 'BUL SGRUB MCHOD GSAR 'DZUGS BCAS DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHEN
BSGRUBS,

DGUNG LO NYER GSUM DU PHEBS PA SA LUG LOR DBU RU'I SA SKYONG YAR
RGYAB DPON GYI BTZUN MOS DBUS SU GDAN DRANGS PAS

RKYEN BYAS RANG NYID KYANG DBUS LHA LDAN GYI GNAS BYIN CHEN
DANG, RTEN KHYAD 'PHAGS RNAMS MJAL MOS CHE BAR BRTEN, BKRAS

LHUN DANG RGYAL RTZE SOGS BRGYUD LHA SAR BYON, DPAL BSAM YAS
SOGS GNAS CHEN KHAG DANG, JO SH'AK RNAM GNYIS BCAS RTEN

GTZO RNAMS LA MJAL PHYAG PHUL RJES RONG CHEN BRGYUD NAS ZLA BA
DGU PAR SA SKYA LA TSUR PHEBS, DE'I RJES SU BLA MA MKHAS CHEN
MANG

POR THOS BSAM YUN RING MDZAD CING, PHAR YANG DAM PA'I CHOS MANG
DU BSTZAL BA DANG, KHYAD PAR MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG

GRAGS PA SLOB DPON DU BRTEN NAS BLA MA DAM PA DE NYID SKU MA
'DAS KYI BAR 'BRAL MED DU DAM CHOS GSAN,

DGUNG GRANGS NYER BZHIR PHEBS PA LCAGS SPREL LO'I ZLA BA BZHI
PA'I TSES BCO BRGYAD NUB MOR GCEN PO NGAG DBANG KUN

DGA' DBANG RGYAL SKU GSHEGS, SA SKYA'I BKA' GROS LA DBANG BA
RNAMS DANG, BLA MA SLOB DPON DANG SKYA SER TSANG MAS MGRIN

GCIG TU KHONG LA GDAN SA 'DZIN DGOS PA'I ZHU BA PHUL, GTZANG PA
SDE SRID KARMA PHUN TSOGS RNAM RGYAL GYIS KYANG DE BZHIN GYI

BKA' GNANG BAR BRTEN, SNGON YAB KYI ZHAL GSUNG DANG SA SKYA
SPYI'I BSTAN PA LA DGONGS NAS 'DUL BA'I BSLAB SDOM PHUL TE RTEN

DGE BSNYEN GYI THOG NAS GDAN SA BZHES, SKYA SER KHRI PHRAG 'DUS
PA MANG 'GYED SOGS DANG DUS DRAN GYI MCHOD 'BUL BTZUGS PA

@597 SOGS DGONGS RDZOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, DNGUL GYI MCHOD RTEN
MANG PO DANG, GSER ZANGS LAS BYAS PA'I LHA SKU, MCHOD CHA

LEGS PA SOGS DGON PA'I MCHOD CHAS SHIN TU MANG PO BSKRUN CING,
LUGS GNYIS KYI BYA BA YANG SNGON 'GRO MGON 'PHAGS PA LTAR

'PHEL BAR MDZAD DO, ,

DGUNG LO NYER DRUG PA CHU KHYI LO'I ZLA BA DRUG PAR SDE SRID
KARMA BSTAN SKYONG DBANG POS GZHIS KA BSAM 'GRUB RTZER GDAN
DRANGS,

DPON SLOB BCU PHRAG LNGA LHAG TZAM GYIS ZHAG DU MA'I BAR SGRUB
MCHOD RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS SHING MI DBANG 'KHOR BCAS LA RDO RJE
PHUR PA'I

DBANG BSKUR, RDO RJE PHUR PA'I GTOR ZLOG MDZAD, MI DBANG LA GSER
ZANGS LAS BYAS PA'I RGYAL SRID SNA BDUN RTEN 'BREL

MTSON BYED DU PHUL,

MI DBANG NAS KYANG SA SKYA'I MCHOD GZHIS CHE PHRA THAMS CAD LA
KHRAL RIGS MI DGOS PAR MDZAD DE, YON MCHOD 'BREL BA

SHIN TU LEGS PA BYUNG ZHING, SKABS DE NAS BZUNG LO GRANGS MANG
TZAM GTZANG DBUS GNYIS LA DUS BDE ZHOD 'JAGS BYUNG,

KHONG DGUNG LO NYER BRGYAD PAR GCEN PO MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG
KHAMS NAS SA SKYAR YAR PHEBS, GCUNG PO SA SKYA'I GDAN SAR

BZHUGS PA DANG LUGS GNYIS LA MKHYEN RAB PHUL DU BYUNG BA LA YID
RANGS MCHOG TU BRTAS SHING NA SO RGAN PA YIN YANG GCUNG PO

GDAN SA PA YIN PA'I DBANG GIS GUS BKUR CHEN PO BYAS, DNGOS 'BUL
SPOM CHE BA PHUL,

DE NAS SA SKYAR DBU RTZE LHA KHANG SOGS SU BZHUGS PA'I BKA'
'GYUR RNAMS DKAR CHAG DANG BSTUN NAS GONG 'OG 'KHRUGS PA

DANG MA TSANG BA RNAMS KHA BSKANGS, SHAR PA CHEN PO'I BKA' 'GYUR
'DI RGYUN DU KLOG PA'I RTEN MDZAD CING GLEGS BAM TSANG MAR

GDONG DAR LNGA BRTZEGS, STENG DU BLA BRE NYI MA DANG RLUNG GI
GNOD PA 'GOG BYED YOL BA BCAS PHUL, SNGON LO RER BKA' 'GYUR

TSAR RE TZAM MA GTOGS KLOG SROL MED KYANG KHONG GIS GDAN SA
'DZIN NAS BZUNG TSAR GSUM RE KLOG PA'I RGYUN SROL BTZUGS,

LAM 'BRAS BLA MA BRGYUD PA'I RAS BRIS CHEN MO BZHENGS, LHA KHANG
CHEN MO'I PHYI'I BAD 'BUR RNAMS LA SNGON 'PHAGS PA'I SKABS RE

RE LA DRIL BU RE YOD PAR GRAGS KYANG PHYIS SU DUS RING BAS
'THOR, KHONG GIS SNGON GYI DRIL BU RNAMS DANG 'DRA BA MANG PO
GSAR DU

BSKRUN, DRIL BU SKUL BYED KYI RAS 'PHAN BCAS PHYOGS RE LA NYI
SHU RE YOD PAR BYAS, LHA KHANG GZHAN DAG LA'ANG DRIL BU MANG DU

BTAGS TE BRJID CHE BAR MDZAD, SA SKYA'I BLA CHEN KHAG DANG, SKYA
SER YONGS LA BKA' LUNG DBANG SOGS ZAB CHOS KYI BDUD RTZI

CHAD MED DU BSTZAL, GZHI THOG BLA BRANG ZHIG GSO RGYA BSKYED KYI
MKHAR LAS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, LI MA LHA KHANG DANG, RGYA NAG LHA

KHANG RTEN DANG BRTEN PAR BCAS PA GSAR DU BZHENGS, GOS CHEN SNA
TSOGS KYI MCHOD RDZAS DANG, RIN PO CHE DU MA LAS GRUB

PA'I MCHOD CHA MANG PO PHUL, SDE SRID KARMA BSTAN SKYONG GIS
THENGS MANG SPYAN DRANGS TE GZHIS RTZE'I PHO BRANG DU PHEBS
SHING SNGA PHYIR

RIM GRO MANG DU BSGRUBS, DGUNG LO BZHI BCU PAR 'BRUM NAG BZHES
KYANG RING MIN DVANGS, SPYAN ZHAN TZAM DU GYUR, DGUNG

LO ZHE GNYIS PAR SDE SRID BSTAN SKYONG DBANG PO'I BKA' LTAR NGAM
RING DU PHEBS TE GTOR ZLOG 'PHANGS, TSUR LAM KLU SGRUB RGYA

MTSO'I SPRUL SKUS SGRO MO LUNG DU SPYAN DRANGS NAS 'BUL BA RGYA
CHEN PHUL, DGUNG LO ZHE GSUM PAR (1639) GTZANG RGYAL NAS LHOR

DPUNG 'JUG BYAS, 'BRUG PA'I YON BDAG TSO'I KHANG PA MER BSREGS
PA BCAS KYI DUS SU KHONG BSAM 'GRUB RTZER PHEBS NAS SDE

SRID DANG MDA' DPON SGOR LUNG PA SOGS LA DMAG 'KHRUG MJUG SDUD
DGOS PA DANG, PHAN TSUN 'DUM 'GRIG BYED DGOS PAR

GDAMS PAS, 'KHRUGS PA 'JAGS GNAS SPRAD, DE DUS KHONG PHAG RIR
ZLA BA GCIG TZAM BZHUGS SO, ,GRUB THOB THANG STONG

RGYAL POS BTAB PA'I BSAM 'GRUB LHA KHANG DU BZHUGS GNAS MDZAD DE
RTEN BYIN CAN MANG PO BZHUGS PA RNAMS LA PHYAG MCHOD TSAD

MED PHUL, THANG STONG RGYAL PO'I GSOL 'DEBS SHIG KYANG BRTZAMS,
DE NAS TSUR SA SKYAR PHEBS NAS YUN MI RING BAR BDE

MCHOG PHO BRANG ZHIG GSO'I DBU BTZUGS, RTZIG RMANG NAS GSAR DU
BSKRUN TE, ZLA BA BZHI'I RING YONGS SU GRUB, DGUNG LO ZHE

LNGA PA LCAGS SBRUL LO (1641) LA SOG PO'I DMAG NGAN GU SHRI HAN
GYI DMAG GTZANG DU 'DZUL NAS GTZANG PA SDE SRID BSKOR BCOM BYAS,

DBUS GTZANG DU KHRAG GIS KHA LO BSGYUR TE SHIN TU MI BDE BA
BYUNG ZHING, DGON SDE MANG PO RTZA BRLAG TU BTANG, DBUS GTZANG
DU

'KHRUG ZING SHIN TU CHE BA'I DUS SU KHONG BAR 'DUM LA RE BA
MDZAD DE NGOR DU PHEBS, DE NAS SDE SRID BSTAN SKYONG DBANG PO'I
DRUNG

DU BYON NAS GDAMS NGAG BSLAB BYA BSTZAL, DE NAS BZUNG LO GSUM
GYI RING MU GE CHEN PO BYUNG BAS MI SER TSANG MA HA CANG NYAM

THAG PAR GYUR, 'ON KYANG SA SKYA 'DI SNGON SOG PO GONG MA'I BLA
MA YIN PA'I RKYEN GYIS GNOD PA CHEN PO RANG MA BYUNG BA RED,

DGUNG LO LNGA BCUR PHEBS PA ME PHO KHYI LO'I ZLA BA LNGA BA'I
TSES BCU GNYIS LA GCEN PO MTHU STOBS DBANG PHYUG GLO BUR 'DAS,
KHONG

THUGS LAS SHIN TU CHE BA'I NGANG NAS SKU GDUNG ZHUS 'BUL DANG
DGE RDZOGS RGYA CHEN BSGRUBS, SKU BRNYAN SKU TSAD MA GSER ZANGS

LAS GRUB PA DANG, GDUNG RTEN DNGUL GYI MCHOD RTEN THOG TSAD
PHYED GNYIS MA BCAS LO GCIG LA BZHENGS GRUB PAR MDZAD, LO

@598 (1646) DE'I ZLA BA BCU GCIG PAR LHOR PHEBS, 'BRUG DGE BAR
GYI DMAG 'KHRUG 'DUM PAR MDZAD, BOD 'BANGS SPYI'I

BDE THABS LA DGONGS NAS THABS CI YOD KYIS BAR SDUM MDZAD PAS
PHAN PA CHE TZAM BYUNG, LO GCIG LHAG DER BZHUGS TE DGUNG

LO NGA GNYIS PA SA BYI LO'I ZLA BA GNYIS PA'I NANG SA SKYAR
PHEBS, SA SKYA'I BLA CHEN DANG GRVA MANG LA LUNG CHOS RGYA CHEN
PO BSTZAL,

DGUNG LO NGA LNGAR PHEBS PA LCAGS YOS LO (1651) ZLA BA DANG PO'I
TSES GCIG LA RIGS SRAS NGAG DBANG BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG

RANG GI TSAB TU GDAN SAR BKOD, KHRIR 'DON GYI PHYAG BZHES ZAB
RGYAS BSGRUBS, RIGS SRAS LA GANG CI'I BSLAB STON DANG

ZAB CHOS YOD DGU'I DBANG LUNG RJES GNANG BCAS MANG DU BSTZAL,
GDUNG RTEN DU TSAR CHEN BLO GSAL RGYA MTSO YAB SRAS DANG,

MKHAN CHEN NGAG DBANG GRAGS PA SOGS KYI SKU BRNYAN DANG DNGUL
GYI MCHOD RTEN BZHENGS, DGUNG LO NGA BDUN DU PHEBS PA CHU MO

SBRUL LO'I DGUN GYI DUS SU MANG THOS KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO'I BLA
MA BLO GROS RNAM RGYAL GYI DBON PO MANG THOS GRAGS PA RNAM RGYAL
GDAN DRANGS

TE, DPAL SA SKYA'I DBU RTZE RNYING MA'I DRI GTZANG KHANG DU CHOS
GRVA LHO BYANG GI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN MANG PO LA DGE SLONG GI
SDOM PA

GNANG BCUG DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE GCIG TU PHEBS PA ME MO BYA LOR
(1657) PHAG RIR PHEBS, 'BRUG DGE BAR GYI DMAG

'KHRUG LO LNGA'I BAR 'DUM 'GRIG GI CHINGS BKOD, MI SER YONGS
DMAG 'KHRUG GI SDUG BSNGAL LAS GROL, 'BRUG PHYOGS KYI

DMAG DPON RNAMS KYIS 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL ZHING CHOS ZHUS, DE
NAS TSUR SA SKYAR PHEBS RJES GZHI THOG BLA BRANG DU BZHUGS TE

DAM PA'I CHOS KYI DGA' STON MU MTHUD NAS SPEL, DGUNG LO DRUG CU
RE GNYIS PA SA KYI LOR GTZANG CHU MIG BLA BRANG ZHIG RAL DU SONG

BA ZHIG GSO MDZAD, LO DE'I DGUN KHAR, SNGON PHAG RIR DBYINGS SA
PHYAG MDZOD NAS DBUS SU PHEBS DGOS PA'I SNYAN SENG

ZHUS PA LTAR RTZE CHEN GRONG STOD PA DPON G-YOG GDAN 'DREN DU
'BYOR BAS DPON SLOB BRGYA SKOR BCAS DBUS SU BYON, T'A LA'I LNGA

PAR MJAL 'PHRAD THOG THUGS SNANG GSHIN PA'I GSUNG GLENG MDZAD,
SOG PO'I DPON KHAG NAS 'BUL BA RGYA CHEN PHUL, RTEN

DANG BSAM YAS SOGS GNAS CHEN KHAG MJAL SKOR BYON ZLA BA BDUN
TZAM 'GOR RJES, PHAG LO'I ZLA BA BZHI PAR SA SKYAR TSUR

PHEBS, MGON KHANG GSAR BTAB DANG, LOGS BRIS GSAR BRIS SOGS DGON
RGYA BSKYED LEGS PAR MDZAD, DGUNG LO DRUG

CU RE GSUM PA SA PHAG LO'I ZLA BA LNGA PA NAS SNYUN BZHES TE SKU
NYIN RE BZHIN JE ZHAN DU GYUR,

DGUNG LO DRUG CU RE BZHIR PHEBS PA RAB BYUNG BCU GCIG PA'I LCAGS
BYI LO (1660) ZLA BA BCU GCIG PA'I TSES BCU NYIN

PAR MUN RUB LA NYE BA NA DGONGS PA RDZOGS SO, ,ZLA BA BZHI LHAG
TZAM RING SKU GDUNG LA MCHOD 'BUL RGYA CHEN MDZAD, PHYI LO'I ZLA

BA GSUM PA'I TSES PA BCU LA SKU GDUNG ZHUGS 'BUL MDZAD, GSER
DNGUL 'DRES MA'I MCHOD RTEN NOR BU SNA TSOGS KYI PHRA TSOM

CAN BZO BKOD PHUN SUM TSOGS PA BZHENGS NAS RING BSREL RNAMS NANG
BZHUGS SU DRANGS TE PHYI RABS PA DAG GI DAD RTEN DU

BZHAG

KHONG GI GSUNG NI SDE DGE'I PAR MAR POD LNGA LAS MED KYANG NGED
DPE MDZOD KHANG DU POD KA PA NAS 'A PA'I BAR POD NYER

GSUM BZHUGS YOD CING PHAL CHE BA BRIS MA KHO NA YIN NO, ,

@599 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@600 [CHINESE LANGUAGE]

@601 *, ,AA ROL BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO'I GSUNG 'BUM, ,

001224 PAR MA

YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I MNGA' BDAG BKA' DRIN MNYAM MED RJE
BTZUN BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO DPAL BZANG PO'I

ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI RNAM PAR THAR PA MDO TZAM BRJOD PA DAD LDAN
RNA BA'I BCUD LEN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (1) 1

SKYABS 'GRO'I DMIGS KHRID SKYONG TSUL PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS
ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (2) 11

BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,
, (3) 4

BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR BYIN RLABS MYUR 'JUG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,
, (4) 9

BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR LEGS TSOGS KUN SPEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,
, (5) 9

SBYOR BA'I CHOS DRUG NGAG 'DON BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, , (6) 11

BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA LA SHAR SGOM BYA TSUL GYI MAN NGAG
BZHUGS SO, , (7) 50

SKYE 'PHRENG GSOL 'DEBS BYIN RLABS SBRANG RTZI'I 'BYUNG GNAS
ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (8) 3

GSOL 'DEBS DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (9) 9

GRUB DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO'I GSANG BA'I RNAM THAR DANG
'BREL BA'I GSOL 'DEBS DNGOS GRUB KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA

BZHUGS SO, , (10) 4

GSOL 'DEBS LEGS TSOGS LHUN 'GRUB CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , (11)
6

@602 RTZOM PA PO'I LO RGYUS MDOR BSDUS,

AA ROL BLO BZANG LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSO NI AA MDO REB KONG YAR
NANG LCANG LUNG AA ROL ZER BA'I SDE TSOR LDONG GI RIGS RGYUD
YAB

BONG SHUL CHOS 'BUM RGYAL DANG YUM KLU MO RGYAL GNYIS KYI SRAS
SU RAB BYUNG BCU GSUM PA'I SHING GLANG LO (1805) ZLA BA BDUN
PA'I

TSES BZHI LA SKU 'KHRUNGS, AA MGRON GCOD RGAN GYIS DKON MCHOG
TSE RING ZHES MTSAN GSOL, DGUNG LO GSUM GYI STENG RONG

DBON 'JIGS MED TSANG DBUS SU PHEBS TE RGYAL SRAS BSKAL BZANG
THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED DANG, LA MO CHOS SKYONG GNYIS LA

YANG SRID YIN MIN BRTAG PA ZHUS PAS YIN PAR THAG BCAD, DGUNG
LO BZHI BAR RONG BO SHAR BLA BRANG CHEN PO DANG, NANG CHEN

KHAG GRVA TSANG PHAN TSUN GYI SKU TSAB BCAS NAS KHA DAR BTANG
ZHING, DGUNG LO DRUG PAR RONG BO DGON CHEN GYI BSE BLA BRANG
GI

SHAR LTA'I TSOMS CHEN DU GDAN SAR BKOD DE SKU GONG MA AA ROL
GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO ZHES RGYA MA RIN CHEN SGANG GI MKHAN PO DE
NYID KYI

SPRUL PA'I RNAM ROL DU NGOS 'DZIN BYAS, YI GE 'BRI KLOG DANG
'DON CHOS SOGS SBYANGS, DGUNG LO BDUN PA'I DUS SU RONG BO KHRI

CHEN DGE 'DUN MKHYEN RAB LAS RAB TU BYUNG STE DGE TSUL DU
BSGRUBS, MTSAN DGE 'DUN LUNG RIGS RGYA MTSOR GSOL, BSE

NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYANGS BKRA SHIS LAS CHOS BKA' MANG DU GSAN,
DGUNG LO BRGYAD PA'I DUS SU MKHAN CHEN DON YOD RGYA

MTSO'I MDUN 'JIGS BYED BCU GSUM MA'I DBANG ZHU SKABS MAndAL
BSHAD PA GNANG BAS KUN GYI YID 'PHROG NAS RIM BZHIN RONG

BO KHRI CHEN DGE 'DUN MKHYEN RAB, SHING BZA' PAndI TA, KHRI
SPRUL BLO BZANG RGYAL MTSAN SENG GE GSER KHANG RDO RJE 'CHANG
YAB

SRAS, BSOD GRAGS DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO, RJE PRADZNY'A MTSAN CAN
SOGS KYI ZHABS PAD BSTEN TE, DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG NGOMS

MED DU BZHES, RONG BO GRVA TSANG NAS GZHUNG LUGS LA SBYANGS TE
RJE BTZUN PA'I YIG CHA ZHIB SBYANGS DANG, KHYAD PAR BSDUS GRVA

RGYAS BSDUS, BYANG RTZE'I BLO RTAGS, DKA' CHEN BZHI'I RTZA BA,
PHAR PHYIN 'GREL CHUNG, RNAM BSHAD SNYING PO'I RGYAN, RJE

BTZUN THAL PHRENG, BSOD GRAGS SPYI DON, LEGS BSHAD SNYING PO
SOGS THUGS 'DZIN GYI STENG NAS RJE YAB SRAS KYI LEGS BSHAD

DANG SE 'BRAS DGE GSUM GYI YIG CHA SO SO, BU STON DANG RED
MDA' BA SOGS MKHAS PA SNGA MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RNAMS GUNG

BSGRIGS NAS 'PHAGS BOD KYI GTZUG LAG RGYA MTSOR RNAM DPYOD
KYIS LEGS PAR BRGAL, GZHAN YANG BYAMS CHOS DANG, BKA'

GDAMS GZHUNG DRUG SOGS MDO'I SKOR DANG, SNGAGS RIM CHEN MO,
RGYUD SDE SPYI RNAM, RGYUD 'GREL MAN NGAG SOGS ZHIB SBYANGS

MA MDZAD PA GTAN NAS MED, DBANG LUNG MAN NGAG SNA TSOGS ZHU BA
LA NGOMS PA MED PAR THA NA DGUNG LO BRGYAD CU'I SKABS

SU'ANG BKA' CHOS MANG PO RANG NYID KYIS GSAN PAR MDZAD CING,
GANG GSAN PA RNAMS BU SLOB RNAMS LA NYIN MTSAN KHOR MO YUG

TU GNANG BA DANG LHAG PAR MKHAS GRUB PHAL MO CHE'I GSUNG 'BUM
RNAMS KYI LUNG MAN NGAG BZHUGS TSAD SPEL BAR MDZAD, DGUNG

LO NYER LNGA'I STENG RI KHROD DU BYON PA NAS BZUNG ZAS GOS NGAN
NGON TZAM KHO NAR BSTEN, DBEN GNAS BSAM GRUB BDE LDAN,

STAG LUNG DPAL GYI RI BO, BDE YANGS BKRA SHIS NYAMS DGA', RAB
DGA' RGYAL MTSAN MTHON PO, BKRA SHIS CHOS RDZONG SOGS

NAGS KHROD RDZA KHROD KYI DBEN GNAS BRGYA PHRAG MANG POR 'GRIM,
DGUNG LO LNGA BCU'I BAR ZHON PA BZHON MA MYONG ZHING PHYE RTZAM
KHUG

MA GANG RE DANG SKU CHAS TZAM MA GTOGS PHYAG RDZAS GZHAN MED,
DUS RGYUN DU 'DUL BA'I GZHUNG RNAMS LA ZHIB GZIGS BAR MI CHAD

PAR MDZAD DE, RDZAS GANG BYUNG GZHAN DON DU BSNGO BA DANG,
GUNG TSIGS DUS LAS MI YOL BA, BYIN LEN BYED PA, RUNG CHU

'DEBS PA SOGS PHYAG LEN PHRA ZHING ZHIB PAR MDZAD, RAB BYUNG
BSNYEN RDZOGS KYI MKHAN BU STONG PHRAG LNGA LHAG BYUNG, RONG
BO

DGON CHEN DANG REB KONG SGRUB SDE BCO BRGYAD KYI GTZOS DGON MA
LAG SUM CU SKOR DANG, TSO LNGA, KA RING, BIS MDO, RDO

BIS SOGS KYI DGON SDE KHAG LA CHOS THOG GI ZHAL 'DEBS, 'GYED
MANG JA GTZUG LAG KHANG DANG RTEN GSUM GSAR BZHENGS DANG

SLAR GSO, MDO SMAD LHO BYANG GI RGYUD KYI SDE GRONG PHAL MO
CHE SO SOR MA nI DANG, SMYUNG GNAS, TSES BCU, MI BSAD KYI
STONGS,

RKUS 'JAL SOGS KYI SROL BTZUGS, SBYIN PA LA DGA' ZHING SLONG MO
BA LA LHAG PAR BRTZE BA, SDE BA DANG PHYOGS PA, YUL KHAMS

SOGS PHAN TSUN BAR GYI GYOD GZHI MI NYUNG BA BZLUMS, DUS RGYUN
NAD PA DANG, SNYOMS CHUNG DBUL PO RNAMS LA SKU DNGOS KYIS

GZIGS SKYONG MDZAD, 'JIGS MDZAD RDO RJE'I RNAL 'BYOR BZHI DANG
DRIL BU BA'I RIM LNGA LA NYAMS LEN GYI GTZO BOR MDZAD, BU

SLOB KYI GTZO BO NI RONG STON SKYABS MGON SKAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I
RGYAL MTSAN, MKHAN CHEN DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSO SOGS REB KONG

@603 PHYOGS KYI BLA SPRUL LNGA BCU TZAM DANG, RA RGYA'I SHING
BZA' BSTAN PA'I DBANG PHYUG DANG, YI NGOG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN
RGYAL

MTSAN, STONG SKOR TSANG, AA RIG MKHAN PO, GSER LAG GTZANG PA
TSANG THU MED GSER KHRI, MGON RGYA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS

BSAM GTAN, ZI NA MKHAN PO CHO SHES BYANG CHUB BSTAN PA'I SGRON
ME, RGYA YAG TSUL KHRIMS BSTAN PA'I NYI MA, BYA KHYUNG MKHAN
PO,

BLO BZANG NOR BU, G-YON RU BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS SOGS DANG,
GZHAN YANG BIS MDO DANG, GSER KHA, TSO LNGA, RDO BIS,

BLA BRANG, KHA RGYA, GTER LUNG, AA KHYUNG, BRA TSA, GTZOS, HOR
TSANG, THE BO SOGS MDO SMAD LHO BYANG GI DGON SDE YOD

DO COG GI DUS SKABS DER BZHUGS KYI BLA SPRUL GANG YOD KHONG GI
SLOB MAR MA GYUR PA MED, KHYAD PAR ZHVA DMAR PAndI TA DGE 'DUN

BSTAN 'DZIN RGYA MTSOS BLA MA'I BKA' LTAR REB KONG GI RI KHROD
RGYA BSKYED DE RI KHROD PA'I CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS CHOS
SDINGS BTAB,

DA DUNG MKHAS PA RIGS SMRA'I KHYU MCHOG BRGYA DANG, KUN SPANGS
RI KHROD PA BZHI BRGYAR NYE BA SOGS PHYAG RJES SU BSKRUN, GDAN

SA LCANG LUNG SGAR GSAR KYANG BTAB, GSUNG RTZOM LA SKYABS
KHRID DANG, LTA KHRID, RGYAL BA RGYA MTSO'I BSKYED RDZOGS SOGS
SGRUB

THABS SKOR DANG BKA' RGYA MA'I SKOR BCAS POD GSUM BZHUGS SO,
,DGUNG LO GYA GNYIS PA RAB BYUNG BCO LNGA'I ME PHO KHYI LOR

(1886) MYA NGAN LAS 'DAS SO, ,RNAM THAR RGYAS PA ZHVA DMAR
PAndI TAS MDZAD PA <<DAD LDAN RNA BA'I BCUD LEN>> DANG, MKHAN

CHEN DPAL LDAN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA GNYIS YOD, KHONG GI GSUNG
NGED DPE MDZOD KHANG DU KA PA POD GCIG BZHUGS SHING RONG BO

BDE CHEN CHOS 'KHOR GLING GI PAR MA'O, ,

@604 RTZOM SGRIG BYED MKHAN GYI MING THO,

RTZOM SGRIG PA GTZO BO, SUN WUN CING,

RTZOM SGRIG PA GZHON PA, MI NYAG MGON PO,

RNAM THAR RGYA YIG TU SGYUR MKHAN, THANG KHRI AAN,

RTZOM SGRIG GI BYA BAR GZHUG MKHAN, (MING RIM BOD YIG KA MAD
LTAR BSGRIGS PA)

KRA'O PING RU, KHO PHRENG MING, NGAG DBANG NOR BU, THANG
KHRA'O PHAN,

YUS HU'E HVA, BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO,

RTZOM SGRIG GI BYA BA 'GA' SHAS LA CHED MNGAG GDAN ZHUS LTAR
GZHUG MKHAN, (MING RIM BOD YIG KA MAD LTAR BSGRIGS

PA)

BKRA SHIS RIN CHEN, DUNG DKAR BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS, DRUNG CHEN
SMON LAM, 'BRI GUNG DKON MCHOG

BSTAN 'DZIN, 'BROG MI BYAMS PA BLO GROS, YE SHES DBANG PHYUG
BSHAD SGRA SRAS DGA' LDAN DPAL

'BYOR,

DPE SGRIG 'GAN 'KHUR PA, 'JAM DGA', BSTAN 'DZIN PHUN TSOGS,

KHA BYANG JUS 'GOD PA, KARMA RDO RJE TSE RING,

KHA YIG 'BRI MKHAN, SGROL MA SKYABS,

DPE BSDUR 'GAN 'KHUR PA, TSE RING MTSO MO,

SHES BYA'I GTER MDZOD,

MI RIGS DPE MDZOD KHANG GI DPE THO LAS

GSUNG 'BUM SKOR GYI DKAR CHAG (SMAD CHA)

MI RIGS DPE SKRUN KHANG GIS BSKRUN ZHING 'GREMS SPEL BYAS,

1997 LO'I ZLA 3 PAR PAR GZHI DANG PO BSGRIGS,

1997 LO'I ZLA 3 PAR PE CIN DU PAR THENGS DANG PO BRGYAB,

DEB RER SGOR 52.00
